headline: Sangano reBuy Zimbabwe Rinoti Vanhu Ngavatenge Zviri Kugadzirwa muNyika
text: Sangano reBuy Zimbabwe iro rinokurudzira kuti vanhu vatenge zvinhu zvinogadzirwa munyika rinoti kuita izvi kunobatsira kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Chirongwa cheBuy Zimbabwe ichi chakaparurwa muZimbabwe muna 2011 asi change chiri kunetsa kushambadzira nenyaya yekushaya mari. Vachitaura pamazana evanhu, muChinhoyi nemusi weMugovera, mukuru weBuy Zimbabwe Muzvare Letwin Mutasa vakati kutenga zvigadzirwa zvemunyika kunopa kuti dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari ripere sezvo mari yakawanda isingapere nekutenga zvinhu kune dzimwe nyika. Izvi zvakatsigirwa naMeya veChinhoyi VaTest Michaels avo vanga vari munyarikan pagungano iri. VaMichaels vakati Buy Zimbabwe inoita kuti makambani akavharwa avhurwe izvo zvinoita kuti munyika muve nemabasa. Gavhuna weRBZ Dr John Mangudya vanoti nekuda kwekushomeka kwemari uku, nyika ichaparura mabond notes ayo okonzerawo mutauro munyika vamwe vachiti achatoita kuti zvinhu zviende kumawere. Mukoti mukuru pachipatara cheChinhoyi Dr Kirsty Smith vanoti zvekudya zvinorimwa munyika hazvina maGMO ayo anozokonzera zvirwere. Muzvare Shamiso Kachere avo vanogadzira doro nekambani yeMbarure Distillers vanoti hwahwa hunogadzirwa munyika hwakanyorwa zviri mukati (alcohol content) kwete zvemakambani edzimwe nyika vasingataure chokwadi izvo zvinozoita kuti vanhu vararadze. Kambani yeBuy Zimbabwe yaikuridzira kuti vanhu vashandise zvigadzirwa zvemunyika yakabatana nekambani yeMetro Peech iyo yakapa mubayiro yakawanda kune vakatenga zvinhu zvakagadzirwa munyika mumwedzi mina yapfuura. Nekuvharwa kwemakambani akawanda munyika, Zimbabwe yave kutenga zvinhu kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neChina. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti kuti chirongwa ichi chishanda, vanogadzira zvinhu munyika vanofanira kugadzira zvinhu zvemhando yepamusoro soro uye zvinhu izvi zvinofanira kutengeswa nemutengo uri nani kwete kudhurisa. No media source currently available

headline: RBZ neZimtrade Dzoyedza Kumutsiridza Mabhizimisi emuBulawayo
text: Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe ichishanda neZimtrade svondo rino riri kuparura hurongwa hwekuyedza kumutsiridza maindasitiri ekuBulawayo. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi hadzisi kuwiririrana kuti zviri kuda kuitwa izvi zvinoshanda here kana kuti kwete. Nhumwa kubva kuRBZ neZimtrade dziri kutarisirwa kupinda muBulawayo nemusi weChitatu dzotaura nevemaindasitiri ava kusvika musi weChishanu. Maindasitiri akawanda muBulawayo akavharwa nekusamira zvakanaka kwenyaya dzezvehupfumi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachitungamira zvidzidzo paZimbabwe Ezekiel Guti University, Doctor Gift Mugano, vanoti zvekutumira chikwat kuenda kuBulawayo kupedzera hoko padehwe retsindi sezvo zviri kuda kuitwa zvichizivikanwa. Vati pane ongororo dzakaitwa nemasangano akaita saana Confederation of Zimbabwe Industries dzinotaura zvinoda kuitwa. Vatiwo chiri kunetsa inyaya yemari nekuti maindasitiri anoda mabhiriyoni maviri kuti asarambe achitatarika. Doctor Mugano vatiwo kuti Bulawayo ibudirire inofanira kukwanisa kukwikwidzana nemamwe makambani ari kuchamhembe kweAfrica vachiti mitero inobhadharwa muZimbabwe yakawandisa zvekuti inogona kupa kuti vekunze vasade kuita bhizimisi neZimbabwe. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaCalvin Mdzingiri, avo vanodzidzisa paUniversity of the Free State kuSouth Affrica, vati vanotenderana naDoctor Mugano vachiti zvinoda kuitwa yave garoziva. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti pave neongororo yekuti maindasitiri anoda kuvhurwa ane zvaanokwanisa kutengesa nyore kuvanhu. Mumiriri weMpopoma-Pelandaba mudare reparamende vari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaJoseph Tshuma, vati zvinhu zvakakosha kuti maindasitiri emuBulawayo amutsiridzwe. Asi nhengo yeparamende inomirira Bulawayo East mudare reparamende, Muzvare Thabitha Khumalo, vati Zanu-PF iri kuda kubata vanhu kumeso. MuZimbabwe vamwe vakazvimirira vanoti vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana havana mabasa nenyaya yekuvharwa kwemaindustry. Ongororo yakaitwa ne International Monetary Fund inoratidza kuti Zimbabwe inyika iri pachidanho chechipiri pasi rose kuva nevanhu vanozviitira mabasa emaoko kana kuti informal sector. No media source currently available

headline: Kushaikwa kweMari Kwovhiringira Vakawanda Zororo reKisimusi
text: Vamwe vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti vanonoka kutenga zvinhu zvekisimusi nekuda kwekusawana mari nenguva uye vamwe vanga vasina nguva nekuda kwemabasa panguva iyo vakawanda vari kushaya mari kumabhangi. Vamwe vagari ava vanoti vakanonoka kuwana mari sezvo vanga vasati vatambira mari dzavo dzemihoro. Mumwe mushandi wehurumende uyo anoshanda mubazi rezvemigwagwa, VaAnanias Jemedza, vanoti vanga vasati vatambira sezvo mari yavo yazoratidza kuti yapinda mubhanga ravo. VaJemedza vanoti nekuda kwekuti vashandi vehurumende vakawanda vatambira muzvitoro makazara uye mitsetse yekumabhangi yakakura. Mumwe mugari, VaChristopher Zembe, avo vatenga zvekudya zvemhuri yavo vanoti vakatadza kutenga zvinhu zvekisimusi zvemhuri yavo sezvo vainge vari kubasa. VaZembe vanoti vapihwa mukana wekutenga sezvo vachazodzoka kubasa musiwa 27 Zvita. VaJemedza vanoti gore rino zvinhu zviri nani sezvo mari dzavo dzauya vasati vatamba kisimusi uye vachiwana mari dzavo kumabhangi kunyange vari kupihwa madhora makumi mashanu pazuva chete. VaJemedza vanoti ane ganda ane nyama hazvienzane neasina. Zvichakadaro, muChinhoyi manga muine mitsetse yakakura pamabhangi akawanda vanhu vachida kutora mari dzavo. Mabhangi akawanda anga achipa vanhu mari inoita madhora makumi mashanu kunyange vakawanda vachti ishoma kushandisa pazororo rekisimusi. VaMacdonald Muzuva vanoti nyaya yemari idambudziko riri kurwadza sezvo vapihwa madhora makumi maviri kubhanga reCBZ. VaMuzuva vanoti vaifanirwa kunge vachienda kumusha asi vachatadza nekushaya mari sezvo vedzimotokari vari kuramba kuti vafambi vashandise Ecocash mukubhadhara. Zvitoro zvakawanda zvinotengesa zvekudya zvakaita seOK neTM zvanga zvakazara nevatengi vanga vachishandisa makadhi kubhadhara asi vatengi vanoti zvinhu zvavo zviri kudhura kudarika kutenga nemari chaiyo. Vamwe vagari vakatumirwa mari nehama neshamwari dziri kunze kwenyika kuburikidza nemakabhani akaita seMukuru vatadza kuwana mari dzavo vachinzi hapana mari.

headline: Michina yeChizvinozvino Yobatsira Vamwe Vabereki kuBhadhara Mari dzeChikoro
text: Apo zvikoro zvichangovhurwa kwekotoro yekupedzisira yegore, zvimwe zvikoro zvave kushandisa ma swipe machines izvo zvave kuita kuti vabereki varerukirwe nekubhadhara mari yechikoro yevana vavo. Asi zvisinei vamwe vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari munyika rinofanirwa kugadziriswa zvachose. Nekuda kwedambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari rave nenguva richiitika munyika mumabhangi munogara makatsokodzerana nevanhu vanenge vachitsvaga mari kunyanya pamazuva ekuvhurwa kwezvikoro. Asi zvimwe zvikoro zviri munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika zvave nema swipe machine uye zvave kubvumawo kuti vabereki vabhadhare nenzira yekushandisa mari yepafoni kunyanya yeEcocash. Vamwe wevabereki vataura neStudio 7 vati vanotambira danho iri sezvo rave kuvarerutsira panhamo yekutsvaga mari yekubhadharira vana vavo mari yechikoro. Mumwe wevanhu ava ndiMuzvare Mutsa Sibanda avo vati chikoro chemwana wavo chakatanga kushandisa swipe machine pakutanga kwemwedzi uno. Mumwezve mubereki VaBruce Tagwirei vati kunze kwekuve neswipe machine, chikoro chemwana wavo chave kutambirawo mari paEcocash izvo zvavati zvinobatsira kuti vasarasikirwe nenguva vachitsvaga mari pane kuita zvimwe zvinoraramisa mhuri yavo. Asi nekuda kwekuti kunetsa kwemari kuri kuramba kuchienderera mberi munyika vanhu vave kutambira kuti huremu hwemari yemabond note nemari yekunze uye nemari yekubhadhara munhu uchishandisa zvakasiyana. Semuenzaniso kana munhu uine zana remadhora ekuAmerica unogona kuwana zana nemakumi matanhatu emabond note. Kana munhu uchishandisawo card kutenga kana kubhadhara chezana remadhora unogona kubhadhariswa mari iri pakati pemadhora mashanu nemadhora gumi pamusoro. Mumwe mubereki asina kuda kudomwa nezita kana kubuda pamhepo ati chikoro chemwana wake icho chinove chimwe chezvikoro zvakazvimirira zvega muguta reBulawayo, chinoti chinoda kuti mari yechikoro ibhadharwe imwe iri mari chaiyo imwe kuchishandiswa card. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvedzidzo panyaya iyi. Nyanzvi munayaya dzezvehumhizha mukufambiswa kwemashako VaNigel Gambanga vatsinhirawo kuti danho rekuti vabereki vakwanise kubhadhara mari yevana vavo yechikoro idanho rakanaka chose. VaGambanga vati havawone chakaipa pakuti zvikoro zvakawanda zvishandise Ecocash sezvo zviri pachena kuti ndiyo nzira yekutumira kana kutambira mari iri kushandiswa nevanhu vakawanda munyika. VaButler Tambo vanove mutevedzeri wemukuru wesangano reCentre for Public Engagement, vachitaura semuongorori wezvehupfumi akazvimirira ega vati kunyange hazvo pane matanho ari kuedza kurerutsira vabereki kuti vabhadhare mari yevana vavo yechikoro, zvakosha kuti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari rigadziriswe zvachose risati ranyanyoipisisa. Mumwewo mubereki variwo mutori wenhau VaAdmire Kudita vatsinhira mashoko aya vachiti pane pamwe pakadai sekukwira makombi pekuti vanhu vanoda kushandisa mari chaiyo. Pakutanga kwegore rino bazi rezvedzidzo rakazivisa kuti raive ratora danho rekuti zvikoro zvinosvika zviuru zvipfumbamwe munyika zvive nema swipe machine senzira yekuita kuti vabereki varerukirwe nekubhadhara mari yechikoro asi zvikoro zvakawanda hazvisati zvave nemichina iyi. Senzira yekupedza dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari, gavhuna weRBZ Dr John Mangudya vakati munguva shoma inotevera vachaparura imwe mari yemabond notes. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHupfumi Dzopa Maonero Aakasiyana paHurongwa hweRBZ Hwenzwa Veruzhinji paMari yepaMadandemutande, Kana Kuti Digital Currency
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi dzinoti danho rebhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, rekunzwa pfungwa dzeveruzhinji pamusoro pehurongwa hwaro hwekuda kuparura mari inoshandiswa pamadandemutande, kana kuti Central Bank Digital Currency, (CBDC) rakanaka chose sezvo richipa mukana kune veruzhinji kuisawo maonero avo. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoti danho iri harina zvikuru zvarinobatsira nazvo veruzhinji sezvo vasina kutanga vapiwa ruzivo rwechinhu chavari kubvunzwa nezvacho vasati vapa pfungwa dzavo, izvo zvinozoita kuti zvavachapa zvishaye basa. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti vanoona riri danho rakanaka chose rekuti Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe iri kunzwa pfungwa dzevanhu pamusoro pemari yepadandemutande iyi, vachitiwo mari iyi yakakosha nekuti inochengeta huremu kana zvichienzaniswa nemari iri kushanda munyika pari zvino. Izvi zvinotsigirwawo neimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, avo vanotiwo vanoona danho rekuunza mari ye digital currency inenge ichitsigirwa nebhanga guru renyika rakanaka. Doctor Chitambara vanoti danho iri rinoitawo kuti vanhu vakawanda vange vachizoda kushandisa mari iyi vachiti kuvepo kwayo kunobatsira kupedzawo matambudziko ekushaikwa kwemari sezvinomboitika kumabhanga. Asi imwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda vari kuBritain, Muzvare Chenaimoyo Mutambasere, vane maonero akasiyana neevamwe. Muzvare Mutambasere vanoti bhanga guru renyika raifanirwa kutanga rambopa dzidziso kune veruzhinji kuitira kuti vagozoziva nezvemibvunzo yavanenge vachipindura. VaKuchera vanodzoka vachiti chingangotadzisa hurongwa uhu kubudirira inyaya yekuti zvikwanisiro zvinodiwa kuti madandemutande ashande zvisina dambudziko zvakaita semasaisai, magetsi nezvimwe zvinogara zvichinetsa muZimbabwe. Izvi zvinotsinhirwa naMuzvare Mutambasere, avo vanotiwo havaoni hurongwa hwekushandiswa kwemari yepadandemutande uhu huchibudirira nekuda kwematambudziko akasiyanasiyana akatarisana nenyika anosanganisira kushaikwa kwemagetsi, kunetsa kwekufambiswa kwemasaisai, nezvimwe zvakawanda. Tingaona here veReserve Bank of Zimbabwe vachitambira pfungwa dzeveruzhinji dzavari kuunganidza idzi? Doctor Chitambara vanoti maonero avo ndeekuti bhanga guru renyika richazvitambira nekuti hurongwa hwaro huri pachena. Bhanga guru rakazivisa musi wa 09 mwedzi uno kuti riri kupa mukana kune veruzhinji kuti vapewo pfungwa dzavo pakunaka kana kuipa kwehurongwa hwemari yepamadandemutande uhu uho riri kutsigira, uye mukana uyu unopera musi wa 07 Zvita. Kana mhando yemari iyi yakatambirwa neveruzhinji inenge ichizoshanda sezvinongoita dzimwe nzira dzekubhadhara nadzo dzakaita semari yemapepa kana yemusvo, makadhi ekumabhanga kanawo mafoni dziri kushanda munyika pari zvino. MuAfrica nyika yeNigeria ndiyo inonzi yakave yekutanga kushandisa mhando yemari iyi payakaparura e-Naira, uye dzimwe nyika dzinosanganisira South Africa neRwanda dzinonzi dziri kurongawo kuparura mhando yemari iyi. Dzimwewo nyika dziri mumubatanidzwa weEastern Caribbean Union dzinoti Antigua neBarbuda, Dominica, Grenada, Montserrat, St. Kitts neNevis, Saint Lucia, neSt. Vincent neGrenadines dzinonzi dzatove kushandisa mhando yemari yepamadandemutande iyi nechakare. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri Kunze kweNyika Zvoramba Zvichisimudza Mureza weNyika
text: Chimwe chizvarwa ichi ndaVaVakirai Mawema avo vari muWashington D.C umo vakadomwa nebepanhau reWashington Business Journal semumwe wevanhu makumi mana vane makore ari pasi pemakumi mana vane hunyanzvi hwekutungamira mune zvemabhizimusi. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zviri kuramba zvichisimudza mureza wenyika kuburikidza nemabasa akasiyanasiyana azviri kuita anoendesa mberi budiriro. Chimwe chizvarwa ichi ndaVaVakirai Mawema avo vari muWashington D.C umo vakadomwa nebepanhau reWashington Business Journal semumwe wevanhu makumi mana vane makore ari pasi pemakumi mana vane hunyanzvi hwekutungamira mune zvemabhizimusi. VaMawema vanoshanda sa senior associate kukambani yeGensler iyo ino zivikanwa pasi rose nehunyanzvi hwayo hwekudhirowa mapurani ezvivakwa pamwe nekuvaka. “Ndingazvitsanangura senyanzvi ndichiti ndiri architect anonyanyove nechekuita nesimba pamwechete nehudzamu hunounzwa nekufunga kwakadzama kunounzwa nebasa rangu zvikuru mukugadzirisa zvinetswa pasi rose,” vanodaro VaMawema. VaMawema vakapinda muAmerica 1997 vakasvikira kudunhu re California uko vakadzidza vakamboshanda vasati vatama vachinovaka musasa muWashington DC umo vagara kwemakore masere. Pamabasa anokosha avaita mukushanda kwavo sa architect, VaMawema vanoti mumwe wevanhu vakagadziridza nhandare yechikwata chenhabvu yemuAmerica, chePhiladelphia Eagles. “Ndaivewo muchikwata chakaedza kukwezva kuti mutambo we2024 Olimpics uitirwe muguta reWashington D.C. asi takazita vepiri mushure meBoston iyo yakazowana mukana uyu,” vanodaro VaMawema. Vanoti vanofarira mutambo we rugby uyo vakambotambawo pamwe nekuve muridzi wepembe vasati vaturika shangu dzebasa. VaMawema vanoitawo zvemumhanzi nechikwata chavo chinonzi Honey Band chiri mumusha weTakoma, uye vanoti vatsikisa mhanzi dzakati kuti. “Ndinoitawo zvakare mabasa ekubatsira vanotambura nekupavo nguva yangu kana kuti ku volunteer. Ndinoshanda nemasangano akati kuti asi randingadoma nezita ndere Junior Achievement, iro rakazvimirira uye richishandawo pasi rose. Tinobatsira vechidiki nekuvapfekedza hunyanzvi hwekufambisa upfumi nezvimwe zvakadaro,” VaMawema vanodaro. VaMawema, avo vane mudzimai nevana vaviri, vanoti vane tarisiro yekudzokera kumusha kana zvinhu zvagadzikana zvikuru munyaya dzeupfumi nemabasa kuitira kuti vakwanise kuzoshanda basa ravo chairo. Asi vanoti vane tarisiro yekuti zvinhu zvichagadzikana nekukasika kumusha. No media source currently available

headline: CZI Yozeya neChina Mamiriro Akaita Hupfumi
text: Sangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, CZI, iro riri kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mumaindasitiri, riri kuita musangano wakakosha svondo rino kuti rione kuti zvinhu zvavandudzwa kuitira kuti makambani atange kushanda zvakanaka. Musangano uyu uri kuitirwa kuCrown Plaza muHarare neChina. Vari kutarisirwa kupinda mumusangano uyu vakamirira mapazi ehurumende vanosanganisira gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, gurukota rezvemigodhi, VaWalter Chidhakwa, uye gurukota rezvemaindasitiri, VaMike Bimha. Mukuru weCZI, VaClifford Siwela, vaudza Studio7 kuti vamwe vari kutarisirwa kuvako vamiriri veInternational Moneteray Fund neWorld Bank vari munyika, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi nevamwe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, uye vachishanda neResources Exploitation, VaWashington Mehlomakulu, vanoti CZI inofanira kubuda nezvisungo zvainozoendesa kuhurumende kwete kumirira hurumende kuti iuye nezvisungo nekuti inenge yawandirwa nezvekuita. VaMehlomakulu vanoti basa rehurumende ndere kugadzira migwagwa, magetsi nezvimwe kwete kuronga zvemakambani. No media source currently available Sangano reCZI rinoti makambani emuZimbawe ari kushanda ari pasi pezvikamu zvitatu nezvitanhatu kubva muzana izvo zvopa kuti vanhu vakawanda varasikirwe nemabasa.

headline: Paramende Inoudza IMF Kuti Igadzirise Hukama Hwayo neZimbabwe
text: Asi VaFanizza vati hapana rubatsiro ruchapihwa Zimbabwe kudzamara yabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kuIMF. Nhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvebhajeti nekufambiswa kwemari dzaudza chikwata cheInternational Monetary Fund, IMF, chiri kushanya munyika kuti hadzisi kufara nekuti sangano iri harina zvariri kuita mukubatsira nyika nemari kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe iri kuita zvese zvayakanzi iite pasi pechirongwa che Staff Monitored Program Chikwata ichi cheIMF chaita musangano nekomiti iyi apo nhengo dzeparamende dziri mukomiti iyi dzati hadzisi kufara kuti IMF haina zvairi kuita kuona kuti Zimbabwe yatanga kuwana ribatsiro rwemari kubva kuIMF neWorld Bank. Sachigaro vekomiti iyi, VaDavid Chapfika, vaudza chikwata ichi chiri kutungamirirwa naVaDomeninco Fanizza kuti chirongwa cheStaff Monitored Program chakatanga panguva yehurumende yemunatanidzwa muna 2013 uye kusvika pari zvino chiri kungoenderera mberi. Vati munguva pfupi nyika inenge yave kugadzirira sarudzo uye hapana achazenge ave kutarisa nezvechirongwa ichi kana IMF ikasabatsira nekuti munhu wese anenge ave kuita zvesarudzo. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, VaSamson Mukanduri, vatiwo IMF inofanira kudzora moyo kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kuwana rubatsiro sezviri kuitawo dzimwe nyika dzinotambura. Asi VaFanizza vati hapana rubatsiro ruchapihwa Zimbabwe kudzamara yabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kuIMF. Vatiwo Zimbabwe inofanira kugadzirisa hushamwari hwayo nenyika dzayakakwereta mari vachiti nyika idzi inhengo dzeIMF uyewo ndidzo dzinotora danho rekuti Zimbabwe yobatsirwa here kana kuti kwete. Vatiwo nyaya iripo haisi nyaya yechikwereti chete asi kuti dzimwe nyika dzinoda kuti Zimbabwe igadzirise nyaya dzekutorwa kweminda sezvayakatsiidza kuti ichaita mubumbiro remitemo yenyika Vanoti havawoni chingatadzise kuti Zimbabwe ibatsirwe neIMF, World Bank nemamwe masangano kana izvi zvese zvikange zvaitwa. VaMasimba Manyanya avo vakamboshanda mubazi rezvemari vanoti nhengo dzeparamende dzine kodzero yekutsutsumwa neIMF sezvo pasina zvavari kuona zviri kuitika pahupfumi kubva pakatanga chirongwa ichi. Vanotiwo hapana ruzivo rwakanyanya pamusoro pechirongwa ichi uye chinodiwa chete inyaya yekuti nyika igadzirise zvinhu zvayo kuti isapedzesera yave kuenda kumasangano akaita seIMF kuti iwane rubatsiro. Zimbabwe ichekwereti chinodarika mabhiryoni masere kumasangano akaita seIMF, World Bank nedzimwe nyika izvo zvave kuitadzisa kuwana rubatsiro rwemari zvinova zvaita kuti hupfumi hwenyika husasimuke. VaFanizza nechikwati chavo vari kuongorora chirongwa cheStaff Monitored Program pamwe nekunzwa pfungwa dzehurumende, vemabhizimisi nemasangano akasiyana siyana uye vachandotura gwaro ravo kubhodhi yeIMF muna Kubvumbi apo pachatorwa danho rekuti Zimbabwe yobatsirwa here kana kuti kwete. No media source currently available

headline: Veruzhinji vonyunyuta neKukwidzwa kweMutengo weMafuta eKufambisa
text: Veruzhinji vanoti havasi kufara nekukwidzwa kwakaitwa mutengo wemafuta edzimotokari nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mngangagwa neMugovera vachiti izvi zvhichaita kuti hupenyu huomere veruzhinji munyika. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa neMugovera vakazisivisa kuti peturu yave kutengwa nemadhora matatu nemasendi makumi matatu nerimwe parita, ukuwo dhiziri rave kutengwa nemadhora matatu ane masendi gumi nerimwe chete parita. VaMnangagwa vakati vezvitoro havafanire kukwidza mitengo yezvinhu zvichitevera kukwidza kwakaitwa mafuta edzimotokari. Asi mutungamiri wesangano revanofamba nemotokari dzinotakura veruzhinji VaTafadzwa Goliati, vanoti veruzhinji vachadhurirwa nekufamba sezvo vemakombi nemabhazi vatokwidza mari dzekufamba. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Muzvare Nester Mutikani, vanoti zvichaomera hurumende sezvo vachiti hurumende icharamba ichipinza ruoko muhomwe mayo kuti ikwanise kutenga mafuta aya. Zvichakadaro, muutungamiri wesangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti vashandi ndivo vachanyanyoomerwa sezvo hurumende isina kuwedzera vashandi vayo mari dzemihoro, uku ichikwidza mutengo wemafuta edzimotokari. VaMnangagwa vakati hurumende yavo iri kutarisira kuwedzera vashandi vayo mihoro muna Kubvumbi wegore rino. Mutauriri wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reHashatag Tajamuka, VaPromise Mkwananzi, vanoti chave kudiwa ndechekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvitaure nezwi rimwe chete vachiti zvave pachena hurumende yaVaMnangagwa iri kumhanya nemakarimwa. Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakawedzera mitengo yemafuta edzimotokari, veruzhinji vaswera vari mumitsetse yekutsvaga mafuta aya sezvo vemagaraji mazhinji vanga vachiti havana mafuta acho. No media source currently available

headline: VeMabhizimisi Voramba Kudzikisa Mitengo Sezviri Kudiwa neHurumende
text: Kunyangwe hazvo hurumende yakapa kurudziro yekuti mitengo yezvinhu zvakawanda zvinodyiwa nevanhu idzikiswe kusvika payaive musi wa25 kurume, izvi zvinenge zviri kukona n’anga murapwa achida. Mitengo yezvinhu haisi kudzika. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vamwe vakuru veConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries kana Zimabwe National Chamber of Commerce tinzwe divi ravo. Asi gurukota rezvemaindustry Doctor Sekai Nzenza vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kushushikana nekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu vakati pamisangano yavakaita nevamwe vemabhizimisi vakatenderana kuti mitengo yezvinhu idzikiswe. Vatenda havo kuti vemabhizimisi varik kuti vari kuremerwawo nezvinhu kunyanya mari yekunze yekutenga zvinhu. No media source currently available Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanodzidzisa paNelson Mandela Metropolitan University vanoti zvekuda kutara mitengo yezvinhu hazvishande uye zvichatopa kuti zvinhu zvishaikwe muzvitoro. No media source currently available

headline: Muzvare Shingi Mangwiro Vokurudzira Vamwe Kuvhura Mabhizimusi Kumusha
text: Kuzvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri kunze kwenyika, nyaya yekuita zvirongwa zvebudiriro kumusha inotovatyisa. Vamwe vanotya kuti vanogona kudyirwa mari dzavo nehama kana shamwari mari dzavo dzavanenge vakadikitirira. Vamwewo ndivo vanoti vanotya kuti mabhizimusi avo kana zvirongwa zvavo zvinogona kusafambiswa zvakanaka. Asi mukati imomo mune vamwe vashoma vakaita saMuzvare Shingi Mangwiro, avo vanoti zviro zviyedzwa, chembere yekwaChivi yakabika mabwe yakanwa muto. Muzvare Mangwiro, avo vari mudunhu reMaryland muAmerica, vakanovhura chitoro chavo chinotengesa mbatya dzevana kubva pavacheche kusvika pamakore gumi nemaviri. Muzvare Mangwiro vanoti kunyange hazvo ivo vaimbotyawo kuti vanogona kubirwa kana kusafambisirwa bhizimusi ravo zvakanaka, vakaisa nzira dzinoita kuti vakwanise kutevere zvinenge zvichiitika muchitoro chavo, kunyange vari kunze kwenyika. "Unofanirwa kunge uri very organised and panenge paine ma systems atakaisa kuti inini ndikwanise kunge ndichi monitor kuti chii chiri kuitika zuva nezuva. So ndine vashandi variko na manager vandinenge ndichitaura navo everyday vachindipa ma updates," vanodaro Muzvare Mangwiro. Vanoti nekuda kwekuona kuti vakawanda vanotengesa mbatya kumusha vanonyanyotengesa dzemadzimai vachisiya dzevana nevanhurume, zvakavapa shungu yekuti vavhure chitoro chinotengesa mbatya dzevana, mabhuku, pamwe netwekutambiswa twevana. Asi vanoti dambudziko riripo guru ravari kusangana naro ndere mitero inodiwa neZimra, iyo vanoti yakakura uyewo zvinodiwa zvacho zvakawandisa. Mashoko aMuzvare Mangwiro anouya apo kambani yeGary Thomspon and Associates iri kushanya muAmerica ichikurudzira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica kuita mabhizinesi anobatsira mukusimudzira hupenyu hwavo pamwe nenyika yavo.  No media source currently available

headline: Kukwira kweMitengo yeZvakawanda Kwosiya Veruzhinji, Varimi, Vaomerwa
text: Kunyange hazvo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mngangagwa vakavimbisa masvondo mashoma adarika kuti hurumende ichadzorera mari muzvitengeswa senzira yekubatsira vanhu, vanhu vari kuti hapana chati chamboshanduka munyaya dzemitengo yezvinhu. Vanhu vakawanda vanonzi vari kuchema kuti mitengo yezvinhu zvavanoda zuva nezuva, kusanganisira zvekurimisa zvemwaka uno, iri kukwira zvisina mukare akamboona, izvo zvave kusiya vakawanda vachishaya pekutangira. Mutengo wezvekudya zvinosanganisira upfu nechingwa unonzi uri kungokwirawo pamadiro. Semuenzaniso, mutengo wechingwa unonzi wakakwira kubva pamadhora gumi nemana anemasendi makumi manomwe nemashanu ukaenda pamadhora gumi nemasere ane masendi makumi mana nemashanu parofu. Mutengo weupfu wakakwirawo mwedzi wapera nezvikamu zana kubva muzana. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachitungamira sangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu uku hakufanirwe kukatyamadza vanhu nekuti hurumende yakatozivisa kare kuti mitengo yezvinhu ichafambidzana nemisika yemari, iyo inomirawo nemari yekunze kwenyika, zvikuru nedhora rekuAmerica. Doctor Kanyenze vanoti zvinozivikanwa kuti musika wemari uyu hauna kumira zvakanaka sezvo uri kungoenda nzira imwechete, yekudonha kwehuremu hwemari yemunyika. Mutewedzeri wemunyori mukuru weZImbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaThomas Masvingwe vanoti kukwira kwemutengo wechingwa uku kwaomesera veruzhinji, zvikuru vashandi zvikuru, avo vanga vave kurwisa kuti vangokwanisa kuwana chikafu kaviri pazuva, mangwanani nemanheru. Matambudziko ekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu anonzi haasi kunzwengawo varimi, avo vanonzi vapererwa nemazano nekuda kwekuramba mitengo yezvikwanisiro ichikwira. Mukuru weTobacco Industries and Marketing Board, Doctor Andrew Matibiri vanoti kukwira kwemitengo yezvekurimisa kuri kubata varimi vose, kusanganisira varimi vefodya, izvo zvinogona kudzikisa ndimo mwaka uno. Doctor Matibiri vanoti chimwe chiri kunyanyonetsa varimi kushaikwa kwemagetsi, ayo ari kudzimwa dzimwa, izvo zviri kukanganisa vaya varimi vakanga vadyara fodya yekudiridzira. Tsaga refotereza yepamusoro rine huremu hwemakirogiramu makumi mashanu rinonzi rave kutengeswa muzvitoro zvakawanda zvinotengesa zvekurimisa nemutengo uri pakati pemadhora mazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nemazana matanhatu. Tsaga refotereza yepasi rine huremu hwumwechetehwo rinonzi rave kutengesewawo nemadhora emunyika ari pakati pemazana mana nemakumi manomwe nemazana mashanu emadhora, zvichienderana nekuti uri kushandisa nzira dzipi dzekubhadhara. Chimwe chinonzi chiri kukonzera kukwira kwemitengo zvakanyanya mutengo wemafuta edzimotokari, uyo wanga uchikwidzwa svondo roga roga. Doctor Kanyenze vanoti dambudziko remunyika iri rinogona kupedzwa chete kana pakaitwa munonera pamwe chuma chemuzukuru mune zveupfumi pamwe nezvepatongerwo enyika. Kusvika izvi zvaitika, veruzhinji vanonzi vacharamba vachinonga svosve nemuromo. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari Vopengera Mitero yeMigwagwa kuMasvingo
text: Vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vanoti havasi kufara nezviri kuitwa nekanzuru yavo zvekuti vabhadhariswe mitero yekushandisa migagwa yeguta iri, kana kuti roda levy, ivo vasina kuwirirana nekanzuru yavo. Vagari vanoti vakatsamwa nedanho iri nekuti kanzuru haina kuuya kwavari kuzotsvaga pfungwa dzavo. Zviri kunyanya kuvarwadza ndezvekuti pachine mutauro pamusoro pechimwe chirongwa chakadai, icho vagari vanoti havana kuona zvakashandiswa mari dzavaibatirwa. Mumwe mugari, VaPaul Rimai, vanoti kanzuru yavo haina kupinda muvanhu zvakakwana kuti ipihwe mvumo yekutora mari inoita madhora mana paimba yoga yoga. Masvingo ine vagari vanosvika zviuru makumi matatu. Izvi zvinoreva kuti kanzuru ichange ichiwana mari inoita zana nemakumi maviri ezviuru zvamadhora pamwedzi kubva kuvagari. Mugari wekuMucheke, VaSamson Gororo, vanoti havaoni kushanda kwechirongwa ichi sezvo munharaunda yavo musina migwagwa yakagadzirwa pavakambobhadhara mari dzavo. Asi meya weguta reMasvingo, VaHubert Fidze, vanoti chirongwa ichi chakadzoswa mushure mukuwirirana nevagari paigadzirwa bhajeti regore rino. VaFidze vanoti chirongwa ichi chakakosha kugadzirisa migwagwa yashata mudhorobha sezvo mari yemigwagwa inobva kuhurumende nebazi reZinara iri shoma, Vati vachatsanangurira vagari kuti mari iyi vachaishandisa sei. Asi vanotungamirira kufambiswa kwebasa musangano rinomirira kodzero dzevagari, reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance, VaAnoziva Muguti, vanoti vagari havana kupihwa mukana wakakwana kuti vape pfungwa dzavo panyaya iyi "Zvavari kutaura kuti vakaita ma consultations nevanhu pamabhajeti tinozviramba nekuti ma meeting avo vaimaita vasina kushambadzwa zvakakwana kuchiinda vanhu vashoma uye nguva dzavakaita vanhu vaiva kumabasa, ivo chavakakonewa sema councilors vaifanira kuenda ku maward avo kwete zvebhajeti,: Vadaro VaMuguti. Sangano iri rinoti riri kukurudzira nhengo dzaro kuti dzisabhadhare mari iyi kusvikira vagara pasi nekanzuru vachionesana zvakanaka panyaya iyi. Kanzuru inotarisirwa kuwana mari inoita miriyoni imwe nemamazana mana ane makumi mana ezviuru zvemadhora pagore kubva kumitero yemigwagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Trafigura Yoramba Kuti Yakapa Zimbabwe Mari yeKubhadhara Chikwereti kuWorld Bank neAfrica Development Bank
text: Vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mukambani yekuSingapore yeTrafigura, Zohra McDoolley-Aimone, aramba mashoko ekuti kambani yavo yakapa Zimbabwe mari inodarika bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora yekuti ibhadhare chikwereti kuWorld Bank neAfrican Development Bank. Achipindura mubvunzo kubva kuStudio7, McDoolley-Aimone ati vainge vanzwa mashoko kubva kumapepanhau ekuti Trafigura yainge yapa Zimbabwe mari asi akati aya manyepo. Atiwo vane mabhizimisi muZimbabwe ayo akazvipira kuramba achifambisa basa achishanda nehurumende asi panyaya yekukweretesa Zimbabwe, kambani yavo iri kuzorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya.. Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakazivisa mazuva mashoma apfuura kuti vainge vawana chikwereti chekuti vabhadhare mari yakawedzerwa pazvikwereti zvayo. Asi havana kutaura kuti mari iyi yainge yabva kupi. Kambani yeTrafigura Group inoshanda yakapinda muZimbabwe muna 2013 kuburikidza nekuisa hupfumi mukambani Puma Energy iyo yakaisa zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana mukambani ye Redan Petroleum. Redan ine nzvimbo dzinotengeserwa mafuta edzimotokari makumi manomwe nepfumbamwe, uye inopa mafuta endege panhandare ina. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti kambani yePuma Energy ndiyo inoshandiswa kubhadhara mari kuZimbabwe. Kambani yeTrafigura muna 2010 yakabatwa nemhosva yekurasa muchetura kubva kumakambani ekumawirira kunyika yeIvory Coast. Izvi zvakashorwa zvikuru nemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu akaita seAmnesty International. Kambani iyi inonziwo yakaita zvehuwori kuIraq pachirongwa chainzi Oil for Food icho chaipa vanhu vemuIraq zvekudya mafuta edzimotokari munyika iyi achitengeswa zvisina kujeka. Gore rapera Zimbabwe yakamboyedza kubhadhara chikwereti ichi ichishanda nekambani yemuNew York inonzi Lazard. Lazard yaishanda nebhanga reStandard Chartered Bank rekuBritain kuunganidza mari iyi asi zvakakona n’anga murapwa achida. Asi rwendo rwuno VaChinamasa vanoti vakawana mari kukambani yeTrafigura iri kunzi nevamwe vakaita semutungamiri webato rePeople's Democratic Party, uye vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi, VaTendai Biti, haina kujeka. VaBiti vanotiwo zvakaitwa naVaChinamasa kutyora mutemo wePublic Debt Management Act unoti kana hurumende ichida kukwereta mari yakawanda zvakadai inofanira kutanga yaenda kudare reparamende. VaBiti vashorawo bhanga reWorld Bank nekutendera VaChinamasa kuti vatyore bumbiro remitemo. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nevanokokera bato reMDC-T mudare reparamende, VaInnocent Gonese. Asi gweta rinombomirira mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, munyaya dzakawanda VaTerrence Hussein vanoti VaChinamasa havana mutemo wavakatyora. Ko zvinobatsira here kana Zimbabwe ikabhashara zvikwereti zvayo? VaBiti vanoti kuteya nzou neriva nekuti kana pasina kuvandudza mabatirwo ehupfumi, hakuna chinobuda. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paUniversity of Zimbabwe, Doctor Gift Mugano, vanoti zvinobatsira kunyange hazvo zvichinetsa kuzowana zvikwereti kubva kuIMF neWorld Bank. VaMugano vanoti vemakambani emuZimbabwe ndivo vachawana chouviri kubva mukubhadhara chikwereti ichi. Nyaya yehuowori nekutadza kufambisa zvakanaka hupfumi zviri kupa kuti Zimbabwe itadze kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo zvapa kuti hupfumi huende kuamwere. Asi hurumende inoti zvirango zvakatemerwa nyika ndizvo zvapa kuti itatarike. No media source currently available

headline: Vaiva Vashandi veMakambani eMangoda Vononga Svosve neMuromo kwaChiyadzwa
text: Vaimbove vashandi vemakambani anochera mangoda kwaChiadzwa vari kuyaura nenzara uye kudya nhoko dzezvironda mushure makambani aya akatorerwa marezinesi ekuramba achichera nehurumende. Vashandi ava kunyanya vagari venharaunda dzakapoteredza Marange vanoti varohwa nenhamo zvakanyanya. Vazhinji vakamiswa mabasa nechimbichimbi vange vakatadza kuwaniswa mari dzemihoro yavo. Makambani aichera mangoda anosanganisira Anjin, Mbada Diamonds, Kusena, DMC, Marange Resources nemamwe akamiswa kushanda zvikapa kuti vashandi vanopfuura churu vamiswe mabasa. Vamwe vevashandi ava kunyanya vagari venzvimbo iyi vava kuomerwa nehupenyu sezvo nharaunda iyi isina zvizhinji zvinokwaniswa kuitwa zvinopa chouviri uye yave zvakare nzvimbo yakachengetedzwa. VaGodknows Murire mumwe wevaimbove vashandi kukambani yeAnjin Investments yaichera mangoda avo vanoti kupera kwebasa nenguva yavaisatarisira kwakavapidza munyatwa yakaomarara. “Kunzi basa rapera kwakati kanganisa zvakanyanya sezvo hapana aitarisira izvi panguva iyoyo, nekuti tange tisina gadziriro or kuti kupihwa notice chaiyo. Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, "Kungomiswa suddenly kwataitwa kwakakuvadza nemhuri yose nokuti hurongwa hwange husipo wokuti pamwe ndizvo zvichazoitika.” VaMurire vanoti kupera kwakaita basa kwakapa kuti vazhinji vasare vaine zvikwereti kumabhanga, zvitoro, munharaunda nekwakawanda wanda izvo zvikwereti zvacho zvonetsa kubhadharika nekuti basa rakapera. “Panyaya yezvikwereti zvopa kuti tishupike kuzvibvisa kana kudzosera, apawo taingopihwa tumari tushoma tushoma apo takamiswa mabasa. Nekuwanda kwemaneeds sevanhu vaviva pabasa tasara tiri munhamo yekuti tobhadhadhara vanhu vaye seyi iwe wagara.” Vanodaro VaMurire VaCharles Kusena mumwezve mushandi wekuminda yemangoda akamiswa basa, avo kuchemawo nenyaya yezvikwereti izvo vanoti zvakatovapedzera zvipfuyo zvavo votengesa kuitira kudzosera mari yemabhanga neyemuvanhu vonge vonetsa voda kuvaendesa kumatare edzimhosva. Amai Mary Munjoma mugari wekuHot Springs pedyo nenzvimbo yaicherwa mangoda nekambani yeAnjin vane murume akamiswa basa. Amai Munjoma vanoti nhamo yapfunya chisero mumusha wavo izvo zvopa kuti vandosunza kana kuita maricho kunzvimbo dzakavapoteredza kuti vararamise mhuri yavo. “Kubva pakamiswa baba basa hupenyu hwatiomera zvekuti tave kuita marikicho sezvo pachisina chekuita baba vakagara. Mamwe mabasa ekutotiraramisa mhuri kuteza huni nekuita mikando, tave kupfeka mazitye atinopfekedza vana zvemadhora dhora nekuti chekuita chacho hapana.” VaBiggie Vheremu vaishandirawo imwe kambani yaichera mangoda kwaChiadzwa. Vanoti kumira kwavakaita basa mwedzi yodarika makumi maviri yapfuura kwovatemesa musoro nekuti havachazivi kuti zvichemo zvavo zvemari dzisina kupera kubhadharwa vachazviendesa kunaani uye nemari dzemazuva erivhi. “Tiri kuti tiri kushaya kwekuti tinozonanga ani pakuda kuti tinzwe kuti mari tichabhadharwa nani. Vaimbove vakuru vedu vekambani takavabvunza izvozvo asi hatina zvakare kupihwa mhinduro inogutsa saka ipapo pari kutinetsa kusvika parizvino.” Vaimbove vashandi vemakambani emangoda ava pamwechete nemhuri dzavo vari kuronga kuratidzira mumazuva mashoma ari kutevera vachinyunyuta nekusabatwa zvakanaka kwavari kuitwa nemapurisa ari kuchengetedza minda yemangoda iyi pamwechete nemasoja avo anoti ari kushungurudza vagari zvisakafanira. Vagari venzvimbo dzinoti, Hotsprings, Tonhorai, Chakohwa vari kunyunyuta zvakare nekusvibisirwa mvura yemunzizi dzavo zvakare kusapihwa mabasa pakambani yeZimbabwe Consolidated Diamond Mining Company kana ZCDMC. Vagari ava vari kushanda pamwe chete nesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanogara munzvimbo dzinowanikwa zviwanikwa reCentre for Research and Development, CRD. Mukuru weCRD VaJames Mupfumi vanoti ikodzero yevagari vekwaChiadzwa nenyaya yekushungurudzwa kwavo. “Isusu nyaya yedu tiri kuzama kushanda nemaCBOs (Community Based Organisations) ari kuno panyaya yaari kuda kuita ratidziro yavo nenyaya yeharassment yavari kusangano nayo mucommunity, angave maissues e-unemployment evana venyu, abuse yevana zvekare nyaya yewater pollution environmental degradation yemakomba akasiyiwa akadaro nemacompanies. Vanotiwo, "Tiri kunzwa zvakare kuti vana vari kumanikidzwa kufushira makomba aya vachinzi magweja, saka iorced labour iri kuuya kabisira futi.” Vagari venharaunda yeChiadzwa vanoti nenyaya yekusvibisirwa kwemvura murwizi Odzi nemakambani aimbochera mangoda vazhinji varasikirwa nezvipfuyo kunyanya mombe dzinosvika mazana masere, uye mbudzi nehwayi. No media source currently available

headline: Varimi Vonetseka neMbeu neZvikwereti zveKurimisa
text: Kunyange hazvo mvura yakaturuka, vakawanda mudunhu reMashonaland West vanoti havasati vaisa mbeu pasi sezvo vasina zvekurimisa, kushaya mbeu pamwe nefotereza izvo zviri kudhura zvakanyanya. Varimi vari kubhadhariswawo mari dzakasiyana zvichienderana nekuti vane dhora rekuAmerica here, mari yemunyika kana kuti Ecocash nedzimwe dzemakadhi. Hurumende nekune rimwe rutivi iri kukurudzira vamwe vemakambani akazvimirira kuti vabatsirewo varimi nezvikweti kurima zvakaita sesoya beans nezvimwe Varimi ava vanoti havana mbeu yekudyara sezvo iri kuvadhurira zvakanyanya. Mumwe murimi anorima kuMakonde VaIshmael Nyikadzino vanoti havana mari yekutenga mbeu nekudaro vave kutodyara chibage chemudura chavakakohwa gore rino icho vanofunga kuti chichadzikisa gohoo ravo. Pakiti yembeu yechibage yemakirogiramu gumi iri kutengwa nemadhora ari pakati pemazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe kusvika pamadhora mazana mana nemakumi maviri zvichienderana nekuti imbeu yemhando ipi. VaNyikadzino vanoti vagari vanofanirwa kupihwa chibage chehupfu sezvo kuine nzara zvekuti vanhu vachapedzisira vokanga mbeu. Zimbabwe yakatarisanawo nenzara inotyisa sezvo vanhu mamiriyoni masere vari kuda kubatsirwa nechikafu. Mumwe mugari akagariswa patsva kuBanket VaUpenyu Dzvove vanoti varimi vakawanda havana mombe dzekurimisa sezvo dzakafa. (The onus is on you to probe kuti what killed the cattle not write that he did not say) Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Farmers' Union (ZFU) VaWonder Chabikwa vanotiwo mbeu yakanonoka kuuya uye vakawanda vari kukundikana kuzadzikisa zviri kudiwa nemabhanga paine nguva kuti vakwerete mari pasi pechirongwa checommand agriculture. Vanhu vanokwanisa kukwereta mari pasi pechirongwa cheCommand Agriculture kuburikidza nebhanga reCommercial Bank of Zimbabwe (CBZ), Agribank, CBZ, Stanbic ne Zimbabwe Women’s Microfinace Bank. Mari iri kunzi ichashandiswa pachirongwa ichi inosvika mabhiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana maviri. Chirongwa cheCommand Agriculture ichi mukakore adarika change chichishorwa zvakanyanya sezvo dzimwe mari dzinodarika mabhiriyoni matatu dziri kunzi hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka. Kunyange hazvo varimi vari kuti vakaomerwa, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakaudza vagari vekuMahusekwa mudunhu reMashonaland East nguva pfupi yapera kuti mvura zvayaturuka vanofanirwa kubuda mudzimba varime vachiti vasina mbeu vanopihwa mbeu yehurumende pasi pechirongwa chePresidential Scheme. Asi vakanofanobata chigaro chevanotungamira mabasa edunhu reMashonaland West kana kuti Provincial Administrator VaChenai Media Mugandani vanoti mbeu iyi inongopihwa chete vanhu vanoshaiwa vasina kana mombe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekurima vachishanda neZimbabwe Farmers Unio VaPrince Kuipa vanoti varimi vari kusangana nematambudziko ekushaya zvekurimisa nekupihwa mbeu nehurumende nguva yapera. VaKuipa vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kupa varimi mbeu nguva iripo. Kunze kwekushaya mbeu vakawanda vanoti varimi vane minda asi havana zvikwanisiro. Mutungamiriri webato reMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa vachitaurawo pamusangano wakamboitirwa kuKariba vakashoropodzawo hurongwa hwehurumenda hwekutadza kupa varimi matirakita ekurimisa vachiti kurima nemombe zvinotadzisa varimi kurima minda yakakura kuti vakohwe pakuru. Hurumende inoti varimi vanosvika zviuru mazana manomwe vari kupihwa mbeu nefotireza pasi pechirongwa chePresidential Scheme vamwe vanosvika zviuru mazana mana vanotora zvikwereti pasi pechirongwa cheCommand Agriculture. No media source currently available

headline: Hupfu Hwowedzedzerwa Mutengo Zvakanyanya
text: Mutengo wehupfu hwakwira zvakanyanya mushure mekunge gurukota rinoona nezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vabvisa mari yange ichibhadharwa nehurumende kuti chibage chinotengeswa kuGrain Marketing Board kana kuti GMB chinge chakaderera mutengo. VaNcube vakazivisa nezvedanho iri pavakaparura hurongwa hwavo hwekushandiswa kwemari kana kuti bhajeti regore rinouya. Kunyangwe hazvo vemuzvitoro vange vatowedzera mutengo nemadhora makumi matatu, veGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe GMAZ vanoti vachaita musangano wechimbi chimbi kuti vaone kuti voita sei nenyaya yemutengo. Mutauriri weGMAZ VaGarikai Chaunza vaudza Studio 7 kuti ivo havatare mitengo yehupfu sezvo ravo basa riri rekugaya chete chibage chavanenge vatenga kuGMB. No media source currently available Kuwedzerwa kwemutengo hwehupfu kuri kuuya apo nyika yakatarisana nenzara inotyisa yapa kuti masangano anopa rubatsiro aparure hurongwa hwekupa vanhu vemumadhorobha vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri chikafu. Kumaruwa vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mashanu vakatarisanawo nenzara.

headline: Hurumende Inotara Bhajeti re$4.1 Billion Gore Rinouya
text: Hurumende inoti inotarisira kushandisa mari inosvika 4 point 1 billion dollars gore rinouya kunyange hazvo iri kutarisira kuwana mari inmoita 3 point 7 billion dollars. Hurumende inoti inotarisira kushandisa mari inosvika 4 point 1 billion dollars gore rinouya kunyange hazvo iri kutarisira kuwana mari inmoita 3 point 7 billion dollars. Izvi zvinoreva kuti mari iri kutarisirwa kushandiswa nehurumende inodarika nemazana mana emamiriyoni emadhora kubva pamari ichawanikwa nehurumende gore rinouya. Izvi zvabuda pachena paturwa bhajeti regore rinouya muparamende negurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa. VaChinamasa vati kunyange hazvo vachitarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchakura ne one point 7 percent gore rinouya, zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka sezvo nyika iine matambudziko akawanda anosanganisira kugadzira zvinhu zvishoma pane zvairi kutenga kunze, kushaikwa kwemari, mihoro iri pasi, kudhura kwezvinhu nezvimwe zvakawanda. VaChimamasa vati gore rinouya nyika ichawana mari shoma pane yayange ichitarisira. Vati kuti vemabhizimisi vave nechivimbo nenyika ino, panofanira kuve nemitemo yakanaka inokwezva vekunze, kudyidzana zvakanaka nedzimwe nyika pamwe nerunyararo sezvo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo dzemuna 2018. Vatiwo mvura inofanira kunaya zvakanaka kuitira kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire. VaChinamasa vati sezvo mabasa ekurima ariwo anosimudzira hupfumi hwenyika chikamu chekurima pasi pechirongwa cheCommand Agriculture ndicho chichapihwa mari yebasa yakawanda kudarika zvimwe zvikamu zvese. Command Agriculture ichapihwa $65.5 million Bazi redzidzo yepasi ndiro richawana mari yakawanda kudarika ese. Bazi iri richapihwa $803 million, asi semumapazi ese, mari zhinji inoenda kumihoro uye bazi iri ndiro rine vashandi vakawanda kudarika mapazi ese. Bazi rezvemukati menyika richawana $364.308 million, rezvekudzivirwa $340.522 million, rehutano $281.976 million ukuwo hofisi yemutungamiri wenyika ichawana $175.643 million. VaChinamasa vati vashandi vehurumende vachadya mabhiriyoni matatu emadhora kuburikidza nemihoro yavanotambiriswa gore rinouya. Vatiwo mari zhinji ichawanikwa nehurumende ichabva kumitero, iyo ichasvika pamabhiriyoni matatu nemazana mana emamiriyoni emadhora. VaChinamasa vazivisawo kuti vachamutsiridza chirongwa cheConstituency Development Fund gore rinouya uye mari iyi ichapihwa pasi peparamende kudzamara pave nemutemo unoona nezvemafambisirwo ehomwe iyi. VaChinamasa vakurudzira kuti paramende itambire kuumbwa kwehomwe yezvehutano yeHealth Fund Levy, iyo vati ichabatsira kuunganidza mari yekutenga mishonga nezvekushandisa muzvipatara zveveruzhinji. Humwe iyi ichawana mari kubva pakutengwa kwe airtime yembozhanhare. Vatorawo matanho akawanda nekudzika mitero yekuunganidza nayo mari. Vati apo paraffin yange ichipinda munyika isina mutemo, vakaona kuti pave nemakoronyera ari kusanganisa paraffin nedhiziri izvo zvave kuita kuti hurumende ishaye mari pamwe nekuuraya mota dzevanhu. Nekuda kwaizvozvo vati paraffin ichange yave kubhadhra mutero we40 cents parita rega rega kutanga muna Ndira gore rinouya. Munyori anoona nezvehupfumi muMDC-T , VaTapiwa Mashakada, vati bhajeti raVaChinamasa rinoratidza kuti hapana zviripo sezvo hurumende iri kutanga gore iine chikwereti. Asi gurukora rezvemadhorobha nematunhu, VaSavior Kasukuwere, vati bhajeti raturwa naVa Chinamasa rakanaka chose zvikurusei panyaya dzekuti vanhu vapihwe pekugara. VaChinamasa vazivisawo kuti chikwereti chenyika kumasangano anokweretesa pasi rose chasvika pa 11.2 billion dollars. Nhengo dzeparamende dzinotarisirwa kuzeya bhajeti raturwa naVaChinamasa nekuripasisa gore risati rapera.

headline: Vashandi veChitungwiza Vakamiswa Mabasa Vasina Kupiwa Mihoro Yavo Voronga Kukwira kuMatare
text: Vashandi vekanzuru yeChitungwiza vanodarika mazana maviri nemakumi matatu vakamiswa basa svondo rapera vaungana pamahofisi ekanzuru iyi vachida kuti vapiwe mari dzemihoro dzavanoti vakanga vasina kupiwa kwemwedzi inonzi ingada kusvika kumakumi matatu. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandi veChitungwiza, Reverend Ephraim Katsina vanoti kanzuru yakapotsa pakutanga yamisa vashandi ava mabasa isati yavabhadhara mari dzavo dzayakanga isati yavapa. Reverend Katsina vanoti vaedza kuita musangano nemunyori mukuru wekanzuru yeChitungwiza VaGeorge Makunde asi hapana chinobatika chabuda mumusangano uyu. Vanoti vachasangana zvakare neChipiri, kukundikana kuwirirana votora matanho ekuenda kumatare edzimhosva, uye kusanganawo negurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, vaSaviour Kasukuwere. “Tinoda kunzwa kubva kuna minisita kuti vakatendera here kuti kanzuru imise vashandi ava mabasa,” vanodaro Reverend Katsina Nemusi weChina svondo rapera kanzuru yakamisa vashandi ava mabasa ichi shandisa mutongo weSupreme Court wakabuda muna Chikunguru, kunyange hazvo mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakanga vasaina bhiri rekuvandudza mutemo wezvevashandi kuti uve mutemo. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata VaMakunde kanawo meya weChitungwiza VaPhilip Mutoti kuti tinzwe divi rekanzuru panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Inotambira Kuvepo kweTNF iri paMutemo
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti rinotambira nemufaro kuvepo kwemutemo unotara mashandiro eTripartite Negotiating Forum kana kuti TNF. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti sevashandi vanofara kuti pave nehwaro hwekuti nhaurirano pakati pevashandi, vashandirwi nehurumende dzive pamutemo, sezvo kwemakore makumi maviri adarika TNF yanga ichishanda zvisiri pamutemo. Musangano wekutanga weTNF pave nemutemo uyu uri kutarisirwa kuitwa nemusi weChitatu svondo rino, apo panotarisirwawo kukurukurwa zvakati wandeyi zvinobata TNF zvakaunganidzwa masvondo maviri adarika pamusangano wakaitwa kuKadoma. VaMoyo vanoti zvimwe zvichakurukurwa zvichabva kukomiti yakaiswa kuti itarise matambudziko akatarisana nenyika mune zveupfumi uye zvinosanganisira matambudziko akatarisana nenyika anosanganisira kushaikwa kwemagetsi nemvura munyika. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata divi revashandirwi pamwe nehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Makumi Mashanu Vomiswa Mumatare Vachipomerwa Kuita Chioko Muhomwe
text: Vachuchisi vemuAmerica vari kupomera vanhu makumi mashanu mhosva yekuita zvehuori kuburikidza nekubhadhara mari dzechioko muhomwe kuitira kuti vadzidzi vane vabereki vakapfuma vawane nzvimbo dzekudzidza muzvikoro zvepamusoro soro zvine mukurumbira. Vachuchisi vanoti izvi zvaiitwa pasi pehurongwa hwaitungamirwa nesangano rakazvimirira reEdge College & Career Network. Vachuchisi vemuBoston mudunhu reMassachusetts vakapomera neChipiri mukuru wesangano iri, VaWillaim “Ricky” Singer, mhosva yekuita huori. Vachuchisi vakapomerawo mhosva dzehuori vamwe vatambi munyaya dzemafirimu vane mukurumbira vanosanganisira Felicity Huffman na Lori Loughlin, pamwe nevadzidzisi vemitambo muzvikoro zvepamusoro soro muAmerica. Zvikoro izvi zvinosanganisira Georgetown muWashington DC, Yale University mudunhu reConnecticut, Stanford neUniversity of Southern California mudunhu reCalifornia nezvimwe. Mari dzaibhadharwa dzsechioko muhomwe dziri pakati pezana rezviuru zvemadhora kusvika kumamiriyoni matanhatu emadhora. Sangano raVaSinger rinonzi rakawana mari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu emadhora mukati memakore manomwe kubva muna 2011 kusvika 2018. Muzvinafundo pa Devry University ku Ohio, Va Elliot Masocha, vanoti zvakaitwa izvi hazvina kunaka zvachose sezvo zvichikanganisa vadzidzi vari pazvikoro izvi pamwe chete nekudzikisa huremu hwezvikoro izvi. Muzvinafundo Masocha vanoti vadzidzi vese vakapinzwa muzvikoro izvi pachishandiswa chioko muhomwe vanofanirwa kubviswa muzvikoro izvi sezvo kuramba vari muzvikoro izvi kuchizokanganisawo vamwe vadzidzi. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari Vodyira Marasha Kanzuru yeHarare
text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira vagari vemuHarare, reHarare Residents Trust, rinoti rakaendesa nemusi weChipiri gwaro renyunyuto kukanzuru yeguta reHarare pamusoro pemitero ya 2021, iyo rinoti iri pamusoro uye iri kuremera vagari sezvo vachinzi vaibhadhare ichitangira musi wa 01 Ndira 2021. Gwaro iri, iro rinonzi rakasainwa nevagari vanodarika zviuru zvishanu, avo vari kunyunyuta kuti vazhinji vave kumanikidzwa kubhadhara mari dziri pakati pemadhora emari yekuAmerica makumi mana kuvagari vekumisha yeveruzhinji, nemadhora makumi manomwe kusvika kuzana kuvagarai vari kumisha yevashoma pamwedzi. Mukuru weHarare Residents Trust, VaPrecious Shumba, vanoti mitero iri kubhadhariswa vagari nekanzuru yeHarare haikwanisike, haina kukodzera uye inotowedzera matambudziko agara aine vagari ari kukonzerwa neCovid-19 sezvo vazhinji vasati vave kukwanisa kushanda zvizere. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna meya weHarare, VaStewart Mutizwa, sezvo vasati vapindura mibvunzo yedu yatavatumira pamusoro penyaya iyi. Ngatinzweyi hurukuro yaitwa naJonga Kandemiiri weStudio 7 naVaShumba. No media source currently available

headline: Meya weHarare Oparura Gwaro Rinoburitsa Mamiriro Akaita Guta Iri
text: VaManyenyeni vanoti pane zvinhu zvakawanda zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa nekanzuru yavo kuitira kuti hupenyu hwevagari vemuguta iri huve nani. Meya weguta reHarare, VaBernard Manyenyeni, vaparura neChipiri gwaro remamiriro akaita zvinhu muguta iri. VaManyenyeni vanoti pane zvinhu zvakawanda zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa nekanzuru yavo kuitira kuti hupenyu hwevagari vemuguta iri huve nani. VaManyenyeni vanoti shuwiro yavo ndeyekuti zvinhu zvigadzirike muguta iri kuitira kuti vagari vavimbike nekanzuru. VaManyenyeni vanoti vachayedza kushandura mafambisirwo ari kuitwa zvinhu mukanzuru kusanganisira mafambisirwo emari dzinobhadharwa nevagari kuitira kuti guta re Harare richishandise mari zvine hungwaru. "Zvakakosha kuti tigadzirise zvinhu mukanzuru kuitira kuti vanhu vabhadhare mari dzemitero vakafara kuitira kuti mabasa afambe zvakanaka muguta reHarare," Va Manyenyeni vaudza Studio7. VaManyenyeni vaenderera mberi vachiti vachatarisa mihoro yevashandi vekanzuru vepamusoro kuti vawone kuti mari dzavanotambira dziri kuenderana here nemari dziri kutambirwa nevamwe vashandi vanoita mabasa aya kune dzimwe nzvimbo sezvo veruzhinji vari kushoropodza kanzuru vachiti iri kupa mari kuvashandi vepamusoro asi vane mabasa epasi vachinonga svosve nemuromo. "Zvakakosha kuti mihoro yevashandi vedu vane zvinzvimbo zvepamusoro ienderane nevamwe vanoita mabasa aya kune mamwe makambani. Takambodzikisa mari dzinotambirwa nevamwe vashandi kuti zvienderane nemamiriro emunyika saka ticharamba tichiita izvi kusvika zvinhu zvagadzirisika," Va Manyenyeni vaudza Studio7. No media source currently available

headline: Bhodhi Idzva reZimra Rinogadzwa Richitungamirwa naVaCallisto Jokonya
text: Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vakazivisa neChitatu mazita evanhu vatanhatu vachange vari mubhodhi idzva reZimbabwe Revenue Authority, Zimra. VaNcube vakati sachigaro webhodhi iri vachange vari muzvinabhizimisi ane mukurumbira, VaCallisto Jokonya, mutevedzeri wavo ari Amai Josephine Matambo. Dzimwe nhengo dzebhodhi iri ndiVaGeorge Guvamatanga, VaIsaac Kwesu, Memory Nguwi naDoctor Morris Mpofu. Mutungamiri wesangano revanotenga vachitengesa reInternational Crossborder Traders Association, VaDenis Juru, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange havo vachiremekedza VaJokonya semunhu anoziva zvemabhizimisi, VaJokonya havangakwanisi kupedza huori huri kuZimra nekuti huori uhu hunobva kumusoro soro kwehurumende kunove iko kunofanirwa kutanga kugadziriswa. VaJokonya vaudza Studio7 kuti vanga vari kunze kwenyika uye havakwanisi kutaura nesu. No media source currently available

headline: Kukwira Kwaita Mitengo yeZvinhu Munyika Kworwadza Vakawanda.
text: Veruzhinji vari kuchema chema zvikuru nekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu inonzi yakwira zvakanyanya kubva payanga iri mumazuva ehurumende ya va Robert Mugabe. Vataura ne Studio7 vati saga refotireza ravaitenga madhora makumi matatu, nhasi vave kuritenga madhora makumi matanhatu. Vanoti shangu dzevana vechikoro dzavaitenga madhora makumi maviri, vave kudzitenga nemadhora makumi masere. Vanhu ava vanoti zvinhu zvese zvakwira mitengo uye hupenyu hwaomera vanhu zvisineyi nekuti unoenda kubasa kana kuti kwete. Muzvare Portia Katiyo, avo vari ku Kadoma, vanotiwo zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika zvekuti hupenyu hwava kuvaomera. Izvi zviri kuitika panguva iyo vana chiremba vari kuramwa mabasa uye varairidzi vachiti vachaenda kubasa mazuva maviri chete pasvondo nekuda kwekuomerwa nehupenyu. Munyika muri kutaridza kuti hamuna kugadzikana nekuda kwekunetseka kuri kuita vanhu. NeMuvhuro vashandi vemumigodhi vaitiwo vave kuda kubatana nevarairidzi, navana chiremba mukukanda mapadza pasi. Vezvitoro vanonzi vave kutiwo vanoda mari dzekunze kwete kutambiriswa bond notes izvo zviri kuita kuti veruzhinji vatambure zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inomisa Kanzuru yeGweru Kukwidza Mitero
text: Kanzuru yeguta reGweru yamanikidzwa nehurumende, kuburikidza negurukota rezvematunhu, VaIgnatius Chombo, kusakwidza mitero sezvo bhajeti rayo risati ratambirwa nebazi rezvematunhu. No media source currently available Kanzuru iyi, iyo yaive yakwidza mitero kubvira pakupera kwemwedzi waNdira, yarambidzwa kuita izvi nebazi rezvematunhu sezvo bazi iri risati rapasisa hurongwa hwekanzuru iyi hwekushandisa mari gore ra2015. Muhurongwa hwayo hwekushandisa mari hwegore rino, kanzuru yaida kukwidza mitero yakasiyana-siyana nezvikamu makumi matatu nezvishanu kubva muzana. Asi sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezvemari mukanzuru yeGweru, VaAlbert Chirau, vanoti vebazi rezvematunhu vakati kanzuru inofanirwa kugadzirisa zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana, kusanganisira nyaya yekuti vakuru vakuru vekanzuru vapiwe mari yemihoro inoenderana neyakatarwa nehurumende, uye kuti mari inoshandiswa kubhadhara vashandi vekanzuru isapfuure zvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana zvemari inowanikwa nekanzuru kubva kumitero. VaChirau vanoti kanzuru iri kugadzirisa zvakanzi zvigadziriswe izvi nevebazi rezvematunhu, uye vanotarisira kuti bhajeti rekanzuru richapasiswa munguva pfupi inotevera. Pakupera kwemwedzi waNdira nepakutanga kwaKukadzi vamwe vagari vemuGweru vakaratidzira vachitsutsumwa pamusoro pehurongwa hwekanzuru hwekuda kukwidza mitero, uyewo nyaya yekuti kanzuru iri kuendesa kumagweta vagari vari kukundikana kubhadhara zvikwereti zvemitero zvavainazvo kukanzuru. VaChirau vanoti pave nehurongwa hutsva hwekuti kanzuru haichaendesi vagari vane zvikwereti kumagweta pasina kutaurirana. Vanoti kanzuru yakatora danho rekuti kwemwedzi mitanhatu inotevera magweta ekanzuru haafanirwe kubata kana kutengesa midziyo yevagari vari kubhadhara zvikwereti zvavo kumagweta aya, uye kuti munguva imwe cheteyo, avo vanobhadhara mitero yavo nenguva vasina zvikwereti, vachabvisirwa zvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana zvemari yavanobhadhara. VaCornelia Selipiwe ndivo sachigaro weGweru Residents and Ratepayers Association rinove sangano rine dzimwe nhengo dzakaratidzira nguva pfupi yapfuura. Va Selipiwe vanoti vanotambira nemufaro mukuru danho rekudzorera mitero payaive isati yakwidzwa pakupera kwaNdira. Vanoti tarisiro yavo ndeye kuti bazi rezvematunhu richapa pfungwa yekuti kanzuru yeGweru isakwidza mitero zvachose sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzemari Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti kanzura nevagari vanofanirwa kugara pasi votaurirana kuitira vagari vaziviwo kuti zvavanoda kuitirwa nekanzuru zvinoda mari inobva muvagari. Nyanzvi idzi dzinotiwo kanzuru inofanirwawo kuisa zvido zvevagari pamberi, uye kutambirisa vashandi vayo mari dzinoenderana nemari inowanwa nekanzuru kubva kumitero.

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kuita Zvirongwa Zvinounza Mabasa
text:
Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti Zimbabwe inofanirwa kusunga dzisimbe kuitira kuti munyika muve nemabasa kuitira kuti vose vari kupedza zvidzidzo vawane chekuita senzira yekusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika.

Mukuru weAffirmative Action Group mudunhu reMatabeleland, VaReginald Shoko, vanoti kubvira pavakapinda pachigaro ichi, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa varatidza chido chikuru chekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika. Asi VaShoko vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurongwa hwavo huchikasika kushanduka kubva pakuve hwepamurormo chete huve hunobatika. VaShoko vanotiwo kunze kwekuve nevemabhizimisi vekunze vanosima mari munyika, zvakakoshawo kuti pave nehwaro hwakajeka hunoita kuti zvizvarwa zvemuZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvikwanisewo kusima mari yazvo munyika pasina kutyira kuti mari iyi inogona kutsakatika. Izvi zvinotsigirwawo naVaButler Tambo avo vanove muongorori wezvehupfumi anoshanda akazvimirira ega. VaTambo vanoti zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe ibhadhare zvikwereti zvainazvo kumabhanga epasi rose eInternational Monetary Fund neWorld Bank kuti igokwanisa kuwana mari inobatsira kumutsurudza hupfumi. Asi vanotiwo zvakakoshawo kuti zvikwereti izvi zvitange zvanyatsowongororwa uyewo kuti kana nyika yawana imwe mari kubva kumabhanga aya ishandise mari iyi nenzira kwayo. Mutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti vanotsinhira nyaya yekuti hupfumi hwenyika hungagadzirika chete kana nyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzatanga dzagadziriswa. VaMutasa vanoti panofanirwa kuve nemuonera pamwe pakati pehurumende, vashandi nevashandirwi kuti zvinhu zvinyatsofamba.

VaMutasa vanoti Zimbabwe ine rombo rakanaka rekuve nyika ine zviwanikwa zvakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira zvirimwa zvinogona kushandiswa kubatsira kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire nekukasika kana zvikabatwa zvakanaka. Pakuti chii chingaitwe kuti vechidiki vawane zvingavape pundutso muhupenyu hwavo kusanganisira dzidzo pamwe nemabasa, VaMutasa vanoti zvakakosha kuti nyika irase nyaya yehuwori uye idzokere pakukoshesa kudzidzisa vechidiki kuti humene-mene haubhadhare. Mukuru weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaSifelani Jabangwe, vanoti kukura kwehupfumi hwenyika kuri kusimukira kubvira hurumende payakatora danho rekubatsira kumutsurudza makambani emuno nekumbomisa kupinzwa munyika kwezvimwe zvinhu zvinogadzirwa kunze kwenyika zvichizotengeswa muno. Vanoti sangano ravo rine hwaro hunoratidza kuti makambani anokwanisa kuti amutsurudzwe uyewo vanotsinhira nyaya yekuti nyaya yekumutsurudzwa kwehupfumi inoda muonera pamwe. Dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoti Zimbabwe inofanirwa kuita hurongwa hunokwezva vari kunze kwenyika kuitira kuti vadzoke kumusha kuzobatsira kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti Zimbabwe ine vanhu vanoziva mabasa akasiyana siyana vari kunze kwenyika vanokwanisa kukwezva kuti vadzoke kumusha. Nyanzvi idzi dzinotiwo vanotengesa mumigwagwa vanofanirwa kuitirwa hurongwa hwakajeka, kuitira kuti vabhadharewo mitero kuhurumende, sezvo mitero inobviswa nevashandi pamwe nemakambani, iri iyo nzira unounganidza mari dzinofanirwa kushandiswa nehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: Musangano weTNF weKuzeya Mari yeMushandi wePasi Wotadza Kuitwa
text: Musangano weTripartite Negotiating Forum kana kuti TNF wange uchifanira kuitwa neChina wekuzeya nyaya yekuti mushandi wepasi pasi munyika yose otambira marii hauna kuzoitwa sezvo sachigaro wemusangano uyu, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vange vakabatikana. Asi izvi hazvina kufadza sangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU. Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vanoti hakuna zvizhinji zvaikwanisa kuitwa kana VaNcube vasipo sezvo vari ivo vakabata homwe yemari. No media source currently available Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti zvinenge zvakanakawo kuti vanhu vaudzwe pachine nguva kuti musangano hauchisiri kuitwa. No media source currently available  Mutungamiri wesangano reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, Doctor Israel Murefu, vanoti vange vasumwa havo nenyaya yekuti VaNcube vanenge vasipo asi vakawedzerawo kuti panoda kuzeyiwa nyaya yekudonha kwedhora remunyika. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reProudly263 Global Robatsira Vana veZimbabwe Vari Kunze Kutanga Mabhizimusi
text: Sangano reProudly263 Global, iro rakaumbwa nezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa mushure mekunge zvaona kuoma kwakaita kutanga mabhizimusi kana usiri chizvarwa chenyika iyi, riri kubatsira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika pamwe nezviri munyika nemikana yekutanga mabhizimusi azvo zvega. Vakavamba sangano iri uye vari ivo CEO veProudly263 Global, VaStanley Makwara, vanoti vakaonawo kubatana kwezvimwe zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zviri muSouth Africa, uye kutsigirana kwazvinoita mune zvemabhizimusi, izvo zvakaita kuti vati kana vana veZimbabwe vanozvigonawo. VaMakwara vanoti chinangwa chesangano ravo, iro rave nenhengo dzinodarika zviuru zvitatu, ndechekusimudzira mabhizimusi nemagariro evanhu kuburikidza nekubatana vachizivana. Vanotiwo seProudly263 Global, vakaumbawo bhanga rinonzi Hello Sahwira Mhlobo (HSM Bank), rinove remubatanidzwa wezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa, mushure mekuona kunetsa kwazvinoita kuti munhu ange achikwanisa kukwereteswa mari nemabhanga emo yekuti atange bhizimusi. VaMakwara vanoti bhanga ravo rinokurudzira kuchengetedza mari uye rinowanisa nhengo dzaro zvikwereti zvine mutengo wakaderera kudarika kumamwe mabhanga. Vanoti remangwana resangano ravo rakajeka zvekuti vanoona vana veZimbabwe vari kunze vachikwanisa kuvaka upfumi hweZimbabwe ivo vari kunyika dzavagere. No media source currently available

headline: NSSA Yobatsira Vakuvari, Asi Vari paMudyandigere Votsamwiswa neMari Dzavari Kupihwa
text: Apo vanhu vari kutambira mari yemudyandigere vari kuramba vachichema-chema kuti mari yacho ishoma, gurukota rezvekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, Amai Prisca Mupfumira, vanoti hurumende iri mushishi kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Vachipindura mibvunzo kubva kuvatapi venhau pamusoro pekuti mari inotambirwa nevanhu vari pamudyandigere ichawedzerwa riinhi, Amai Mupfumira vati bazi reNSSA riri mushishi kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Amai Mupfumira, avo vange vari munyarikani pachiitiko cheOpen Day yeNSSA Workers’ Compensation Rehabilitation Centre, vatiwo hurumende ine hurongwa hwekuti vanhu vanozvishandira pachavo vega vagokwanisa kuvewo vachibhadhara mari kuNSSA kuti vagozokwanisawo kuwana mari yemudyandigere kana vakwegura. Pari zvino vanhu vari pamudyandigere vanotambira madhora makumi mana pamwedzi uye hurumende yaive yati ichawedzera mari iyi kuti isave iri pasi pezana remadhora kubva muna Kurume wegore rino, asi izvi hazvina kuitika. Amai Mupfumira vati kubvira muna Kubvumbi wegore rino NSSA yakatanga hurongwa hwekubatsira nemari pakuviga nhengo dzeNSSA dzinenge dzafa. NSSA Rehabilitation Centre inzvimbo inorapa vanhu vanenge vakuvara vari pamabasa uye nzvimbo iyi ine mimwe michina yechizvino-zvino isingawanikwe kune zvimwe zvipatara. Mukuru weNSSA, Muzvare Liz Chitiga, vabvuma kuti vanhu vakawanda havazive nezvenzvimbo iyi, asi vati kambani yavo ine hurongwa hwekuti veruzhinji vakwanise kurapiwa panzvimbo. Mumwe wevanhu vakarapwa paNSSA Rehabilitation Centre ndiVaZuze Nzerere avo vakakuvara vari mumugodhi mavaishanda. VaNzerere, avo vasisakwanise kufamba vega, vati vakarapwa vakadzidziswawo mabasa ekusona uye vanofara kuti kambani yavaishandira yakavadzorera pabasa. Panguva imwe chete NSSA Rehabilitation Centre inokwanisa kuve nevanhu makumi manomwe vanenge vachirapwa vachigarapo. Nzvimbo iyi, iyo iri pedyo nechipatara chikuru cheMpilo yakavhurwa mugore ra1971. No media source currently available

headline: Magetsi Onetsa Kuwana kuMasvingo
text:
Vagari vekuMasvingo vanoti vari kugara vasina magetsi nguva zhinji izvo zviri kuvhiringa mararamiro avo sezvo zvinhu zvakawanda zvavanoshandisa zvichida magetsi kuti zvishande. Vagari vakawanda vanoti vari kupedza maawa akawanda vasina magetsi pazuva sezvo kambani yeZesa iri kudzima magetsi aya isina kumbovayambira.

Mumwe mugari wemuHillside, Amai Entrance Takaedza, vanoti kutsvaga dzimwe mhando dzemoto kunovadhurira sezvo vachipedzisira votenga huni kana gasi asi iwo vakabhdhara mari yakawanda vachitenga magetsi ekushandisa pasi pechirongwa chePrepaid meters.

Vamwe vagari vanoti nekuda kwekudzimwa dzimwa kwemagetsi, mabhizimusi akawanda ari kudonhera pasi. Mumwe muzvinabhizinesi akazvimirira, VaCaleb Mangoma, avo vanoita basa rekuweredha, vanoti nezuro vakaswera vakagara vasina basa ravaiita nekuti magetsi akaenda kwemaawa anopfuura gumi.

Mukuru webasa muhofisi yeConsumer Council of Zimbabwe muMasvingo,
VaDumisani Mungutsini, vanoti kudzimwa kuri kuitwa magetsi zvisina
tsurukano kunotyora kodzero dzevatengi. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano revagari reMuasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance , Muzvare Rumbidzai Magurupira, vanoti kodzero dzevagari dzekuwana mvura dziri kutyorwa sezvo magetsi ari kudzimwa kudhamu reMutirikwi kunopombwa mvura.

Mutaruri wekambani yemagetsi munyika, Muzvare Prisca Utete, vakaudza
Studio 7 kuti itumire mibvunzo yayo patsambambozha asi havasati vapindura. Gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, VaSoda Zhemu, vakati vaisakwanisa kutaura nekuti vaiva pamusangano pane ruzha vakati Studuio7 izovafonera vapedza asi vakange vasisadairi nhare yavo.

Vagari vanoti kuenda kwemagetsi nguva dzakawanda hakusi kukanganisa kubika mudzimba chete, asi kuti kuri kukanganisawo kudzidza kwevadzidzi pamasai-sai munguva ino yekuvharwa kwenyika nepamusana pedenda reCovid-19. Dunhu reMasvingo rave nemasvondo anosvika mana magetsi achinetsa mazuva ose izvo zvave kufungisa vazhinji dambudziko\ remagetsi rakamboitika mugore ra2008. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzoyambira Kuti 2017 Richava Gore Rakaoma Zimbabwe Ikasavandudza Zvinhu
text: Gore rapera ra2016 igore range rakaomera vazhinji pamwe nehurumende. Munyika makaita dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari zvakapa kuti bhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe riparure mari yemabond notes asi asiri kubatsira kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Hurumende yaitadza kubhadhara vashandi vayo mihoro paine nguva uye nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi pamwe nematongerwo enyika dzinoti vanhu vanofanira kusunga dzisimbe nekuti 2017 igore richange rakaoma kudarika gore rapfuura. Hupfumi wenyika hauna kukura sezvange zvakatarisirwa uyewo mari yaitarisirwa kuwanikwa nehurumende yakadzikira zvakanyaya mugore richangopfura. Hurumende yakashandisa mari yakwanda kudarika mari yaya kawana izvo zvakaita kuti isare iine chikweretti chemadhora anodarika bhiriyoni. Zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe nezviviri kubva muzana zvemari yehurumende zviri kuenda kumihoro yevashandi izvo zvopa kuti zvinhu zviomere hurumende. Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakadzika mutemo unorambidza kupinda munyika kwezvinhu zvinogadzira muno kana kuti Statutory Instrument 64, nyika iri kuramba ichitenga zvinhu zvakawanda kunze kudarika zvainotengesa nekuda kwekuti maindasitiri haasi kushanda zvakanaka. Izvi ndezvimwe zvinonzi zvakakonzera kushaikwa kwemari munyika zvikazoita kuti Reserva Bank of Zimbabwe iunze mhando yemari yemaBond Notes muna Mbudzi wegore rapera. Mubhajeti ravo regore rino, gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vanotarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchakura nechikamu chimwe nechidimbu kubva muzana (1.7percent) Vanonoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti ramangwana reZimbabwe harina kujeka nekuti zvese zvakakanganisika muna 2016 pamwe nevakazvikanganisa vachiripo uye havana shanduko yavari kuita. Vanoti vano bvumirana nemaonero emasangano akaita seInternational Monetary Fund neWorld Bank ekuti hupfumi hwenyika hucharamba huchidzikira mugore rinouya. Vanotiwo kunyange hazvo VaChinamasa vane matanho avakaparura mubhajeti regore rinouuya ekukwezva vekunze kuti vauye kuzosima mari yavo muno pamwe nekusimudzira mabhizimisi havawoni izvi zvichiiitika nekuda kwezvikonzero zvekunetsa kwemari. Vanotiwo zvikwereti zveZimbabwe kumasangano akaita se World Bank, African Developement Bank nedzimwe nyika ndizvowo zviri kutadzisa nyika kuwana mari yekusimudzira maindasitiri ayo. VaKuchera vanoti havaoni vemabhanga, masangano nenyika dzekunze vachisunungura homwe nekuti hurumende yeZimbabwe inoratidza kuti haisati yazvipira kuita zvinodiwa kuti ikwanise kutanga kukwereteswa mari. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaJames Johwa, vano bvumirana naVaKuchera vachiti kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kuwana rubatsiro rwemari inofanira kutanga yabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo. Vanoti pari zvino Zimbabwe haikwanisi kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo zvino darika mabhiriyoni gumi emadhora nekuti maindasitiri ayo haasi kushanda uyewo n nyaya yehuwori mukutengeswa kwezvicherwa. VaJohwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya yemitemo isina kujeka pamwe nemakakatanwa ari mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF ndizvo zvimwe zviri kuvhiringa hupfumi hwenyika. Mukuru weZimbabwe Democracy Institute of Zimbabwe, Dr Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vanotiwo nyaya dzematongerwo enyika asina kumira zvakanaka munyika zvikuru sei muZanu PF ndidzo dziri kuita vekunze vasauye munyika pamwe nekuti mabhizimisi emuno asashande zvakanaka. Vanoti semaonero avo kurwisana muZanu PF kuchaenderera mberi mubato iri gore rinouuya izvo vati zvichavhiringidza hupfumi zvakanyanya. Kunze kweizvi, munyori anoona nezvehupfumi mubato guru rinopikisa munyika reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai vachimirira Hatfield mudare reparamende, Dr Tapiwa Mashakada, vaudza Studio 7 kuti huwori ndiwo humwewo huri kuvhiringa mabasa ezvehupfumi munyika. Vanoti kana nyaya iyi ikasagadziriswa havawoni chinosanduka munyaya dzehupfumi mugore rinouuya. Asi vanomirira rimwe sangano remabhizimisi reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu vanoti vanoona sekuti gore rinouya rinenge rakanaka nekuda kwemitemo yakadzikwa nehurumende zvikuru sei mutemo wekudzivirira zvimwe zvinogadzirwa kunze westatutory instrument 64 pamwe nekushandiswa kwemaBond Notes. Asi vanoti dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari rinofanira kugadziriswa.  Asi VaJohwa naVaKuchera vanoti maBond Notes haana zvanobatsira uyewo hurumende iri kutadza kutobhadhara vashandi vayo zvisinei nekuti pave kushandiswa maBond Notes. VaMashakada vanoti zvinosuwisa kuti vashandi vazhinji vehurumende vakatamba Kisimusi vasina mari dzavo vachiti kana maBond Notes acho haasikuwanikwa. Asi vanomirira Highfield West mudare reparamende VaPsychology Mazivisa veZanu-PF vanoti zvirango ndizvo zviri kupa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hugwadame. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi nematongerwo enyika dzinotiwo nyaya yesarudzo dzichaitwa muna 2018 ndiyo ichavhirindidza nyaya dzehupfumi uye vanofunga kuti vakunze nevamabhizimisi vanogona kumirira kusvika sarudzo idzi dzaitwa vasati varonga kuti vasime mari yavo munyika. VaChinamasa vanoti hurumende yavo inoda chose kugadzirisa hukama hwayo nenyika dzepasi rese pamwe nemasangano akaita seWorld Bank neIMF uye ndosaka yakaumba hwaro hwekuti ingabhadhare zvikwereti zvayo sei kumasangano aya nedzimwe nyika. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Yotyira Kuti Vashandi Vachagumurwa kuCBZ Vachanonga Svosve neMuromo
text: Sangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions kana kuti ZCTU rinoti kusamira zvakanaka kwemitemo yevashandi kwave kupa kuti vashandi vakaita sevave kudzingwa mabasa kuCBZ vamanikidzwe kuenda pamudyandigere vasina chavainacho. CBZ inoti iri kumisa vanhu mabasa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 uye yave kushandisa michina yakawanda. Mutsamba kuvashandi, mukuru webhanga reCBZ, VaBlessing Mudavanhu, vakati kutanga nezuro kusvika musi wa 18 Chibabvu vashandi vaizozvipira kuenda pamudyandigere asi vakakundikana vaizotanga kumanikidzwa kusiya basa muna Chikumi. Vanoti izvi zviri kuitwa nekuda kwekuoma kwezvinhu zvakonzerwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 uye kushandiswawo kwemichina yechizvino zvino. Mutungamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mumabhanga uye vashandi vari panyanga dzamushore sezvo vachipihwa mari shoma mushure mekumanikidzwa kusiya basa. Vanoti mutemo unofanira kuvandudzwa kuti vashandi vawane chouviri. Mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru musangano reZimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers’ Union, VaShepard Ngandu, vatiwo havakwanise kumirira vashandi kana vazvipira voga kusiya basa asi kana vatanga kumanikidzwa vanopindira. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutungamiri wesangano revemabhanga reBankers’ Association of Zimbabwe, VaRalph Watungwa, sezvo nhare yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Asi vakatomboyambira kuvatori venhau kuti nekuda kwemichina vashandi vacharasikirwa nemabasa. Gukota rezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vaudza Studio7 kuti vachaita musangano nevebazi ravo kuti vazeye zviri kutaurwa nevashandi panyaya yemudyandigere. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vati panoda mubatira pamwe chuma chemuzukuru vachiti hurumende munguva ino yeCovid-19 inofanira kugara pasi nevashandi nevashandirwi yoona kuti nyika ingabude sei mukanwa mamupere. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vati kumiswa kwebasa kwevashandi hakusi kuvashandisa nekuti hupfumi hwenyika hauna kumira zvakanaka zviri kukonzerwa nekusagadzikana munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vati zvakakosha kuti vashandi vazvisimudzire panyaya yedzidzo yehumhizha nehumhetura sezvo michina yechizvino zvino yave kushandiswa nemabhanga inoda vashandi vashoma. Asi vakuru vanoti havo panomera muswe panonyerekedza nekuti bhanga iri range ravhara mamwe mapazi muHarare anoti Samora Machel, Cripps Road, Highfield, Msasa, Sapphire House uye Belmont kuBulawayo. Mamwe akavharwa anosanganisira, Gutu, Checheche, Gwanda, Nembudziya, Chegutu ne Nyanga. Bhanga iri range richikurudzira vanhu kuti vashandise nharembozha nemasaisai eInternet pazvirongwa zvaro zvinoti CBZ G-Touch, Internet Banking uye kushandisa makadhi. No media source currently available

headline: Bazi reMari Rokokera Musangano weBhajeti ra2019 kuBulawayo
text: Kutanga nemusi weChitatu matare anoti repamusoro reSenate nereHouse of Assembly achapinda mumusangano wekuzeya nyaya yebhajeti regore rinouya uchange ichikokerwa nebazi rezvemari. Musangano uyu uri kuitirwa muBulawayo. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika, bhajeti iri igangaidzwa kumukwenyi mhezi yawawira mudumbu kugurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube. Musangano uyu uri kutanga neChitatu kusvika musi weSvondo, uye nhengo dzose dzedare reparamende dziri kutarisirwa kuti dzinge dziripo. Hurumende pari zvino iri kukwereta mari yakawandisa kuti iyedze kuzadzikisa mabasa ayo. Mari iyi iri kukweretwa munyika nekunze,uye chikwereti ichi chinonzi chava kusvika pamabhiroyoni makumi maviri emadhora. Izvi zvinonzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi zviri kupa kuti Zimbabwe ikundikane kubuda mumadhaka mairi munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Vanokokera Zanu-PF mudare reparamende, VaPupurai Togarepi, vanoti bato ravo rinoda kuti pazeyiwe nyaya dzekubatsira varombo kunyanya. Panyaya yekuti hurumende iri kushandisa mari yakawandisa, VaTogarepi vati chiri kuda kuitwa chete kuwedzera mari dziri kupinda muhomwe yehurumende. Asi vaive gurukota muhurumende yemubatanidzwa vachiona nezvegwara rehupfumi vari nhengo yeMDC, VaTapiwa Mashakada, vanoti havaone paine chinobuda pabhajeti iri. Masangano evarairidzi anoti ari kuda kuti hurumende ivape mari ichishandisa madhora ekuAmerica sezvo mari yemaRTGS isisina simba. Mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti hurumende inofanira kukoshesa nyaya dzehutano. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanotiwo hurumende inofanira kudzikisa mari yairi kushandisa. Vatiwo panofanira kujekeswa kuti VaNcube vachabhadhara sei zvikwereti zvehurumende. Bhajeti iri riri kutarisirwa kuparuwa mwedzi uno ndiro rekutanga richaparurwa naVaNcube uye rakatarisirwa nevanhu vakawanda. VaNcube vakatozivisa kare kuti vanoda kuderedza mari iri kushandiswa nehurumende uye kugumura vamwe vashandi vehurumende basa. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Zvirango Zvokanganisa Zimbabwe Kugadzirisa Dambudziko reKushanduka kweMamiriro eKunze
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa neChipiri vakataura pamberi pemusangano wekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze kana kuti Climate Change kuGlasgow, Scotland vachiti Zimbabwe yakazvipira kuita zvose zvinodiwa kuti ideredze kusvibiswa kwemweya wekufema. Asi vakatiwo vari kumbokanganiswa nezvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa nyika. Vatiwo nyika dzakabudirira dzinofanira kubatsira dzevarombo dzisiri kukanganisa zvakanyanya mamiriro ekunze Vachitaurawo pagungano iri, mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden vakakumbira ruregerero nedanho rainge ratorwa nevaive mutungamiri wenyika wavakakunda musarudzo VaDonald Trump rekumbobuda muchibvumirano cheParis Agreement chekukurudzira nyika kuti dzitore matanho ekuti mamiriro ekunze asanyanye kushanduka. VaBiden vatiwo nyika dzichiri kubudirira dzinoda mari inosvika zana remabhiriyoni kana kuti US$100 billion pagore mukuderedza nyaya dzekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze. Vati America ichaparura hurongwa hwemabhiriyoni matatu kana kuti 3 billion pagore mukubatsira munyaya dzekugadzirisa mamiriro ekunze. Asi panyaya yezvirango veAmerica neEuropean Union vari kurambawo vakamira semusambangwena vachiti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa inofanira kuvandudza zvinhu munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika.
