Hurumende yeZimbabwe yange ichitiwo VaMnangagwa vachasangana nemutungamiri wehurumende yeBritain VaBoris Johnson asi pane mashoko ari kubva kuhurumende yeBritain ekuti zvinenge zvakona n’anga sezvo vati vakabatikana havakwanise kutaura naVaMnangagwa. Mukuru musangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu kuchamhembe kweAfrica VaDewa Mavhinga vati Zimbabwe inoziva hayo zvinoda kuitwa zvakafana nekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Musangano wekuScotland uri kukokerwa neUnited Nations uchapetewa musi wa 12 Mbudzi. No media source currently available

headline: VaBiti Vanoti VaChinamasa naVaMangudya Havana Chavanobura kuMisangano yeIMF neWorld Bank kuAmerica
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa nagavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe Doctor John Mangudya vapinda muWashington DC nhasi kumisangano yeWorld Bank ne International Monetary Fund inonzi “Spring meetings.” Misangano iyi inotanga nhasi kusvika musi weSvondo. Vachitaura neStudio 7 VaMangudya vati vachatanga kupinda mumisangano mangwana sezvo vari kusvika muWashington manheru anhasi kubva kuNew York. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi VaTendai Biti vanova nhengo yeMDC Alliance vati havaone paine chinobuda pamisangano iri kupindwa naVaChinamasa naVaMangudya sezvo vari kutatarika kuvandudza hupfumi. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Votaura neHurumende Kuti Vabatsirwewo Munguva yeKuvharwa kweNyika
text: Sangano rinomirira vanotengesera mumigwagwa, reVendors Initiative for Social Transformation, VISET, rinoti rinotarisira kuti rwendo rwuno hurumende ichabatsirawo nhengo dzaro nemari munguva ino yadzisiri kukwanisa kushanda nekuda kwemutemo wekumbovharwa kwenyika. Mashoko eVISET anouya zvichitevera kuvharwa kwenyika kwemazuva makumi matatu, kana kuti lockdown Level 4, iyo yakadzikwa svondo rapera nehurumende. Mukuru weVISET, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanoti mukumbovharwa kwakaitwa nyika gore rapera, nhengo dzavo dzakawanda hadzina kukwanisa kuwana rubatsiro rwaingovimbiswa nehurumende kuti rwuchapiwa vanozviitira mabasa emaoko. VaWadzayi vanoti vatotanga hurongwa hwekutaudzana nebazi rezvemabhizimusi madiki neepakati, kuti vaone kuti vangayeukwa here munguva ino. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rebazi iri. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T Inoti Zimbabwe Inoda Mari Yakawandisa Kuti Ivandudze Hupfumi
text: MDC inotungamirwa naVa Morgan Tsvangirai inoti hupfumi hwenyika huri kutoda kuti Zimbabwe iwane mari ine chitsama yainopihwa kamwe chete kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimudzirwe zvine mutsindo. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mu Harare neChishanu, munyori anowona nezvehupfumi mu MDC-T, Va Webber Chinyadza, vati hupfumi hwenyika hwaenda kumawere nepamusana pekutadza kutonga kuri kuita hurumende ye Zanu PF vachiti hupfumi hwenyika huri kutadza kukura kusvika pahwakambosvika muna 1972 nyika isati yawana kuzvitonga kuzere. No media source currently available Kuti zvinhu zvinakire veruzhinji munyika, Va Chinyadza vati pave kutoda mari ine chitsama inopihwa nyika kuti isimudzire kumutsiridzwa kwemaindaisitiri, nyaya dzekurima, kucherwa kwezvicherwa pamwe nezvimwe zvese zvakabata hupfumi hwenyika. Va Chinyadza vati hurumende haisi kukoshesawo nyaya dzekurima dzinove dzakabata hupfumi vachiti hurumende haisi kuisa mari yakawanda munyaya dzekudiridzira sezvo mamiriro ekunze ari kushanduka. Vati panofanirwa kuiswa mari inoita bhiriyoni rimwe nemazana manomwe ezviuru zvemadhora munyaya dzekurima asi chiri kuvashamisa ndechekuti hurumende yakaisa miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu zvemadhora munyaya dzekudiridzira zvirimwa mumwaka wegore rino. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri we Zanu PF, Va Simon Khaya Moyo, kuti tinzwe divi rebato ravo panyaya iyi. Asi mutungamiri wenyika vari zvakare mutungamiri we Zanu PF, Va Robert Mugabe, vakaudza nyika neChipiri kuti vari kutarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchasimuka kubudikidza nekusimbaradza nyaya dzekurima. Zvichakadai, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vachishanda vakazvimiria, Va Masimba Manyanya, avo vaimbova mukuru aiwona nezvehupfumi mubazi rezvemari, vaudza Studio7 kuti pane zvakawanda zvinoda kugadziriswa kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire. Nekune rumwe rutivi, gurukota rezvemari, Va Patrick Chinamasa, neChina vakakumbira masangano anokweretesa mari akaita se International Monetary Fund ne World Bank kuti abatsire Zimbabwe nekuikweretesa mari kuti hurumende igadzirise zviri kunetsa muhupfumi hwenyika. Va Chinamasa vanoti Zimbabwe yave nemakore anodarika makore gumi isati yambowana kana kobiri kubva ku World Bank vachiti hurumende iri kushushikana zvikuru nekusapihwa mari kwairi kuitwa nebhanga repasi rose iri. Asi mumiriri we World Bank mu Zimbabwe, Va Guang Zhen Chen, vakaudza Va Chinamasa kuti Zimbabwe inofanira kugadzirisa mitemo yose nezvimwe zvese zviri kutadzisa kuti vekunze vanoda kuzosima mari munyika vauye. Mumiriri weIMF muZimbabwe, VaChristian Beddies, vakaudza Studio7 kutanga kwesvondo rino Zimbabwe inofanirwa kutanga yabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo zvose kuitira kuti ipihwe chikwereti chitsva. Va Manyanya vati chimwe chinoda kugadziriswa inyaya dzematongerwo enyika kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kuwana mari yairi kuda iyi. Zimbabwe ine chikwereti kunze chemari inoita mabhiriyoni masere nezviuru mazana mana emadhora. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti kutadza kuri kuita Zimbabwe kubhadhara chikwereti ichi kumasangano anokweretesa mari kuri kuita kuti hurumende isakwanise kupihwa zvimwe zvikwereti zvemiri yairi kuda kusimudzirisa hupfumi hwenyika.

headline: Vagari vemuMasvingo Vanoti Mari yeChirongwa cheKuendesa Masimba Kumatunhu Ngaigadziriswe Dambudziko reMvura
text:
Vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vanopfuura chiuru vakanyorera dare reparamende gwaro kuti rikurudzire hurumende kuti iise mutemo wekuti mari yechirongwa chekuendesa masimba kumatunhu kana kuti devolution muMasvingo ishandiswe mukutenga mishina mitsva inopomba mvura sezvo iripo isiri kushanda zvakanaka. Vagari ava vachitungamirirwa nesangano ravo reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance kana kan kuti MURRA, vakasiya gwaro iri kumunyori wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mundenda, vachiti vaneta nedambudziko rekushomeka kwemvura iro rinogona kupedzwa zvachose kana
pakatengwa ne kuvandudza mishina inopomba mvura kudhamu reMutirikwi.

Vanona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muMURRA, Muzvare Rumbidzai Magurupira vanoti danho iri ndiro chete ringapedze dambudziko remvura. Vagari vanoti mari yedevolution iri kuuya iri kuiswa kune zvimwe zvirongwa zvakafanana nekuvandudza mapaipi esuweji nekugadzira migwagwa izvo vanoti hazvina kunyanya kukokosha.
Mumwe mugari akasainawo gwaro iri, Amai Sungano Zvarebwanashe vanoti sevagari vane simba rekutaura zvavanoda kuti zviitwe. Mishina iripo iyo yachembra inopomba mvura inosvika mamega litres makumi matatu, ayo anokwana vagari zviuru makumi mana nevashanu pazuva, asi mudhorobha rave nevagari vanopfuura zviuru zana. Vagari zana vanoda mamega litres anosvika makumi mashanu pazuva. Studio 7, yatadza kubata mutauriri wedare VaMundenda avo vange vasingadairi nharembozha yavo kana kupindura tsamba kuti tinzwe divi ravo uye
nezvetsamba iyi. Asi sangano reMURRA raratidza Studio 7, gwaro racho rine chidhindo
chedare reparamende chekutenda kuti rakagamuchirwa. Nhengo yeparamende yeMasvingo Urban, VaJacob Nyokanhete, vebato reMDC-Alliance, vati vanotsigirana nevagari veMasvingo.

Izvi zvatsigirwawo negurukota redunhu reMasvingo, VaEzra Chadzamira, vanozvazve nhengo yeparamende kuMasvingo West, vari vebato reZanu PF vatiwo.
Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti danho rakatorwa nevagari rakanaka, uye sekanzuru vanotsigirana navo vachiti panodiwa mari inosvika mamirioni makumi matanhatu ekuAmerica kuti paitwe chirongwa chekutenga mishina mitsva kuti
dambudziko remvura ripere zvachose. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Yokurudzira Nhaurirano dzeMihoro Kuti Dziitwe Izvozvi
text: Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vari kukurudzira makambani ose kuti atange misangano nemasangano evashandi vachikurukura nyaya dzemihoro. Kurudziro yaVaMoyo inotevera kusawirirana pakati pehurumende, ZCTU nesangano revashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, Emcoz, panyaya yekuti Tripartite Negotiating Forum itare mari inotambirwa nemushandi wepasi pasi kana kuti minimum wage. Asi VaMoyo vanoti kukwira kuri kuita mitengo yezvinhu kwave kupa kuti ZCTU ide kuti paitwe nhaurirano dzechimbi chimbi dzekugadzirisa nyaya dzemari yemihoro. No media source currently available Asi mutungamiri weEmcoz, Doctor Israel Murefu, vanoti mitengo iri kukwira hongu asi zvinogona kusaramba zvakadaro nekupindana kwenguva. No media source currently available

headline: Zvinhu Zvoramba Zvichidhura Kunyangwe Hurumende Yakabvumidza Kutengwa kweZvimwe kuSouth Africa neDzimwe Nyika
text: Kunyangwe hazvo hurumende yakabvumidza vanhu kuti vatenge zvinhu kubva kuSouth Africa, Botswana, Mozambique, Zambia nedzimwe nyika ichiti zvichapa kuti mitengo yezvinhu munyika iderere, zvinhu zvinenge zvave kutowedzera mitengo zvimwe nezvikamu mazana mashanu kubva muzana zvapa kuti vanhu vaomerwe nehupenyu zvakanyanya. Sangano reZCTU rinoti kuti zvinhu zvinakire vashandi vave kutoda kuwedzerwa mari inodarika zvikamu mazana matanhatu kubva muzana. Zvinhu zvekudya, michovha, mari dzechikoro dzevana nezvimwe zvawedzerwa mitengo zvakanyanya. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze vanotungamira sangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe vanoti chiri kupa kuti zvinhu zvidhure inyaya yekuti vanotenga zvinhu kunze vanotenga mari pamukoto vozodhurisa. Mutemo wekurambidza kutengwa kwezvinhu kunze wakambenge wadzikwa muna 2016 senzira yekusimudzira maindustry munyika. Asi huruemnde gore rapera yakazoti yave kutendera kuti zvimwe zvinhu zvitengwe kunze sezvo yaipomera vemabhizimisi mhosva yekudhurisa zvinhu. No media source currently available

headline: Buy Zimbabwe Yokurudzira Vanhu Kutenga Zvinogadzirwa muNyika
text:
Panguva yezororo reKisimisi negore idzva munyika munopindazvinhu zvakawanda zvakasiyana siyana zvinotengwa kubva kunze. Sangano reBuy Zimbabwe rinoti nyika inrasikirwa nemari yekunze yakawanda uye maindasitiri emuno anotadza kusimukira nekuda kwekutengwa kubva kunze kwenyika kwezvinhu zvinogona kugadzirwa muno. Nekudaro sangano iri riri kukurudzira kuti veruzhinji vafarire kutenga zvinhu zvinogadzirwa munyika

Mukuru wesangano reBuy Zimbabwe VaAlois Burutsa vanoti zvakakoshera nyika kuti veruzhinji vatenge zvinhu zvinogadzirwa munyika kuitira kubatsira kuchengetedza mari yekunze iyo inogona kushandiswa pakutenga zvimwe zvakaksoha zvisingagadzirwe muno zvakadai semichina.

VaBurutsa vaudza Studio 7 kuti kubvira zvakatanga sangano ravo muna2011 vanofara kuti chinangwa chavo chabatsira kusimudzira kutengwa kwezvigadzirwa zvemuno munyika. Zimbabwe inoshandisa mari yakawanda gore rega rega mukutenga zvinhu kubva kunze kwenyika. Gore rakapera nyika yakashandisa mabhiriyoni manomwe nemamiriyoni mazana matanhatu kana kuti 7.6 billion zvichienzaniswa ne4.6 billion yakashandiswa muna2020.

Zvimwe zvezvinhu zvinonyanya kutengwa kunze zvinosanganisira mafuta edzimotokari, mafetireza, nemichina asi pane zvimwewo zvakawanda zvinogadzirwa muno zvinobvawo kunze.

Mutungamiri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries VaKurai Matsheza vatsinhirawo kuti zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vafarire kutenga zvinhu zvinogadzirwa muno vachiti izvi zvinobatsirawo kuti munyika muve nemabasa.

CZI inoti pari zvino maindasitiri emunyika ari kushanda zvinosvika pazvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana uye kushomeka kwemagetsi nderimwe dambudziko guru rinoita kuti asashanda nemazvo.

VaBurutsa vanopokana nemaonero ekuti zvnhu zvakawanda zvinogadzirwa munyika zvinodhura uye hazvinyatsogadzirwa nemhando yepamusoro sezvinoita zvinobva kunze.

VaFelix Chari, mudzidzisi wezvidzidzo zvepamusoro panyaya yezvehupfumi vanoti vanobvumirana nemaonero ekuti zvinhu zvakawanda zvinogadzirwa munyika zvinodhura vachiti izvi zvinoitika nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakawanda. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vaachishanda nesangano relabour and Economic Developmemt Research Institute of Zimbabwe Dr Prosper Chitambara vatiwo chirongwa cheBuy Zimbabwe chakanaka asi zvimwe zvinogadzirwa zvinozodhura sezvo kugadzira zvinhu munyika kuchidhura. Vachitaura pakuparurwa kwevhiki rekukurudzira kutengwa kwezvinhu zvinogadzirwa muno muHarare nezuro, mutungamirir wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakati hurumende inotsigira chirongwa ichi nekuti chinobatsira kudzivirira kuunzwa munyika kwezvinhu zvinogadzirwa kunze
zvinenge zvine mutengo wakadereresa izvo vakati zvinokanganisa budiriro yenyika.  Zvitoro zvikuru zvinosanganisira OK Zimbabwe zvirimowo muchirongwa cheBuy Zimbabwe ichi. Zimbabwe inonyanya kutenga nekutengesearana neSouth Africa, China, United Araba Emirates, Singapore, United Kingdom neRussia. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzedzvehupfumi dzinoti VaMnangagwa vanotaura zvinhu zvisiri kuitwa nehurumende. Semuenzaniso, mushure mekunge zvigadziraw zvemunyika zvawedzerwa mutengo nekuda kwekushaya simba kwedhora remunyika, gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakabva vabvumidza vezvitoro kutenga zvinhu kunze pasina kubhadhara mitero.

headline: Musangano weVarairidzi neHurumende Inotadza Kugadzirisa Zvinetswa
text: Masangano anomiririra vadzidzisi aita musangano nevakuru mubazi rezvedzidzo umo munyori mubazi rezvedzidzo, Amai Tumisang Thabela, vakurudzira masangano aya kuti vanyorerane pasi mashandiro avanoda kuita nebazi rezvedzidzo. Vamwe vapinda mumusangano uyu uye vari mutungamiriri weAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vaudza Studio 7 kuti musangano uyu hauna kubata zvinonetsa vadzidzisi kana kuedza kugadzirisa zvinhu zvinonetsa munyaya yedzidzo. “Zvizhinji zvatange tichitaura hazvinei nezvemashandiro atinoita kumabasa kwedu. Musangano uyu wange uri waPermananat Secretary mutsva achizivana nemaUnion; achikumbira maUnion kuti vanyorerane pasi mashandiro avanoda kuita nebazi rezvedzidzo,” VaMasaraure vaudza Studio 7. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata Amai Thabela kuti tinzwe divi ravo. VaMasaraure vati musanagano uyu hauna zvikuru zvawabatsira nazvo uye chirongwa chevadzidzisi chekurega basa svondo rinouya hachina kuchinja. Svondo rakapera, sangano reARTUZ rakazivisa kuti kutanga musi wa 7 Ndira 2019, nhengo dzaro dzicharamwa basa kwenguva isingazikanwi kusvika hurumende yanzwa zvichemo zvavo. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata vamiriri vemamwe masangano evarairidzi. Asi VaMasaraure vati hurongwa hwekurega basa huchaenderera mberi svondo rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inobhadhara Chikwereti Chayo kuZESA
text: Hurumende inoti yabhadhara chikwereti chayo chemagetsi kumbani yemagetsi yeZESA uyewo yabhadharwa chikwereti cheZESA kukambani yemagetsi yeESKOM yekuSouth Africa. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota, gurukota rinoona nezvemamhando dzemoto, VaFortune Chasi, vati hurumende yabhadhara chikwereti chayo chemamiriyoni makumi maviri emadhora kuZESA uyewo yapa kambani iyi mamwe mamiriyoni makuma maviri emadhora ekuti kambani iyi ivandudze basa rekugaya magetsi. Vatiwo vabhadhara chikwereti cheZESA kuESKOM chemamiriyoni gumi emadhora ekuAmerica. Vati izvi zvichabatsira kuti nyika ideredze dambudziko rekushomeka kwemagetsi munyika iro raita kuti nyika igove magetsi kana kuti loadshedding. VaChasi vatiwo veruzhinji, makambani nemakanzuru vanofanira kubhadhara magetsi. Vatiwo nyaya yemagetsi inofanira kubatanidza vanhu munyika kuona kuti vogadzirisa sei dambudziko rekushomeka kwemagetsi. Vachitaurawo mushure medare remakurukota, gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vati dare remakurukota ratambira danho rakatorwa nebazi rezvemari svondo rino rekudzora dhora remuno rikati danho iri richaunza kugadzikana munyika munyaya dzehupfumi. Pavabvunzwa nezvekuti vanhu vane maNostro Foreign Currency Account nevaya vanotumirwa mari nemakambani akaita Western Union nemamwe, vachawana mari yavo here kana kuti vachamanikidzwa kuitengesa kumabhanga, Amai Mutsvangwa vati vanhu ava vacharamba vachiwana mari dzavo ari madhora ekuAmerica, mapaunzi nedzimwe mari dzekunze. Asi kunyange hazvo Amai Mutsvangwa vati dare remakurukota ratambira gwaro reStatutory Instrument 142, masangano evashandi pamwe nevemabhizimisi audza hurumende kuti mutemo uyu unofanira kubviswa sezvo wakaitwa pasina kuwirirana sezvinodiwa pasi pemutemo weTNF. Masangano aya atuma gurukota rezvevashandi, Doctor Sekai Nzenza, kuti vaendese nyaya iyi kudare remakurukota svondo rinouya kuti mutemo uyu ubviswe. Zimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions inoti vashandi vacharamwa mabasa kana izvi zvikasaitika. Mutemo uyu, uyo wakaburitswa nemusi weMuvhuro wave pamberi pekomiti yeparamende yeParliamentary Legal Committee iyo inoongorora kuti mitemo haipikisane nebumbiro remutemo here kana kuti kwete. Rimwe gweta risina kuda kudomwa nezita raudza Studio7 kuti rinoona nesekuti mutemo uyo hauna kunyorwa zvakajeka uye zviri pachena kuti hurumende ine vanhu kana makambani ainoda kubata pachishandiswa mutemo uyu. Zvichakadai nhengo dzeparamende nhasi dzati nyaya yekuzvidza paramende kuri kuitwa nemakurukota ehurumende iri kuenderera mberi yave kunganganisa mashandiro eparamende. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvedzidzo, Amai Priscillar Misihairambwi Mushonga, vaudza mutauriri weNational Assembly, Advocate VaJacob Mudenda, kuti makomiti ave kutadza kuita basa rawo nekuti makurukota ehurumende pamwe nevanyori vemapazi ehurumende havawanike, sezvo vanenge vasipo nguva dzese. Amai Mushonga vati zviri pachena kuti zvose zvinotaurwa nemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, hazvisi kuitwa nekuti makurukota avo nevanyori vawo havana basa ravari kuita. Vati nekuda kwazvovo vave kuda kuita musangano wemasachigaro emakomiti eparamende nemutungamiriri wenyika. Advocate Mudenda vatambira chikumbiro chaAmai Mushonga uye vaudza mukuru webasa rehurumende muparamende zvakare vari gurukota rezvemitemo neparamende, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, kuti varonge musangano nemutungamiri wenyika. Chitatu chega chega vatevedzeri vemutungamiriri wenyika, makurukota ehurumende nevatevedzeri vavo vanosungirwa kuenda kuparamende kunopindura mibvunzo kubva kunhengo dzeparamende asi vazhinji vavo havaendi. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Yoyambira Hurumende Kuti Iremekedze Zvibvumirano Zvinoitwa muTNF
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti hurumende haisati yapindura chikumbiro chayo chekuti hurumende isiyane nenyaya yekurambidza kushandiswa kwemari yekunze. Sangano iri rinoti kusavimbika kwehurumende kuchapa kuti vashandi vapinde mumigwagwa. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vaudza Studio7 vanoti zviri pachena ku kuti hurumende haisi kuremekedza nyaya dzevashandi pasi pehurongwa hwe Tripartite Negotiating Forum, TNF. VaMoyo vanoti vashandi vanoda chose kutaurirana nehurumende nevashandirwi asi vanoda vanhu vakavimbika. Hurumende yakadzora kushandiswa kwemari yemuno kana kuti Zimbabwe Dollar mwedzi uno pachishandiswa SI 142 izvo zvakashamisa vanhu vakawanda. VaMoyo vanoti havabvumirani neWorld Bank panyaya yavo yekusimudzira Zimbabwe panyaya yekufambisa zvinhu zvakanaka munyaya dzemabhizimisi. VaMoyo vanoti masangano akaita seWorld Bank ne International Monetary Fund masangano anoita zvinhu zvinofadza vatongi kwete veruzhinji. Mukuru wesangano weZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedziysai Runhanya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo zvichiita sekuti World Bank ne IMF dziri kunakirwa nezviri kuitwa neZimbabwe, masangano aya anoita zvisingafadze veruzhinji. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Sekesai Nzenza, kuti timwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo vanga vasingadaire nharembozha yavo. Asi ZCTU iri kuramba yakatsika madziro ichiti hurumende ikatadza kubuda nehurongwa hunotambirwa nevashandi paichaita musangano wayo wedare remakurukota, vashandi vacharatidzira zvakasimba. ZCTU yakadaidzira kuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo muna Ndira kwemazuva matatu. Mumhirizhonga yakaitika mumazuva matatu aya, pane vanhu vakapfurwa vakafa, uye mazana nemazana evanhu vakasungwa. No media source currently available

headline: VeMajeri Votadza Kuita Mabasa Avo Zvakanaka neKushaya Mari
text: Zimbabwe Prisons and Correctional Services kana kuti ZPCS inoti pane zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri mumajeri kune dzimwe nyika zviri kutadza kuuya kuzopedzesa mutongo wazvo mumajeri emuno nekuda kwekuti hazvina magwaro ekuzvarwa kana kufambisa. Izvi zvataurwa nemumwe mukuru muZPCS, Senior Assistant Commissioner, Spetosomusa Chinobva, vachipa humbowo kukomisheni inoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu, yeZimbabwe Human Rights Commission pamusoro, pekuti kusavepo kwemagwaro aya kunokanganisa basa ravo sei. Vati Zimbabwe ine chibvumirano nenyika dzakaita seZambia chekuti zvizvarwa zvemuno zviri mumajeri kuZambia zviuye kuzopedzisa mitongo yazvo muno, ukuwo zvizvarwa zvekuZambia zviri mumajeri emuno zvinopedzesera mitongo yazvo kuZambia. Asi Amai Chinobva vati vari kutadza kuunza zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuZambia nekuda kwekuti hapana humbowo kana magwaro anoratidza kuti vasungwa ava zvizvarwa zvemuno. Vati ongororo yavakaita yakaratidza kuti zvakakosha kuti vasungwa vapike mitongo yavo vari munyika dzavo umo vanokwanisa kushanyirwa nehama dzavo. Vatiwo pane vanhu vakawanda vanopinda mumajeri vasina magwaro ekuzvarwa kana zvitupa uye izvi zvinotadzisa vasungwa ava kunyora bvunzo vari mumajeri sezvo magwaro aya achidiwa. Amai Chinobva vatiwo rimwe dambudziko ririko nderekuti vasungwa vanofira mumajeri vasina magwaro vanovigwa sembwa sezvo hamadzawo dzisingazivikanwe. Zvichakadai Amai Chinobva vati vasungwa vari mumajeri vanobvumbidzwa pamutemo kupihwa mukana wekuti vanotoresa vana vavo magwaro ekuzvarwa kana kufambisa. Zvichakadai komiti yeparamende inooa nezvemukati menyika yaudzawo komisheni iyi kuti yakaitawo ongororo yavo kudunhu reMatabeleland South uko zvakabuda pachena kuti vanhu vari kunetseka kuwana magwaro ekuzvarwa pamwe nekufambisa. Sachigaro wekomiti iyi VaLevi Maihlome vati semaonero avo vanhu vese vasina magwaro aya zvikuru sei vakabatwa batwa neGukurahundi vanofanira kupihwa magwaro aya pasina mubvunzo kuti vakwanise kurarama sevamwewo vanhu. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, Dr Elasto Mugwadi, vati zvataurwa nekomiti yeparamende izvi zvinoenderana nezvakabuda muongororo yavo uye vanoda kuti matambudziko aya agadziriswe pamwe nekuti kodzero dzevanhu dziremekedzwe. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa muSouth Africa, Anopinda muMafekitari Achisunga Vashandi veKunze
text: Mapurisa akabatana nevashandi vebazi rezvekupinda nekubuda munyika pamwe nevebazi rezvevashandi apinda mumamwe mafekitari ari munzvimbo yeIndustria muJohannesburg achisunga vashandi vanobva kune dzimwe nyika vari muSouth Africa vasina magwaro anovabvumidza kugara nekushanda munyika iyi. Dandemutande reTwitter rehurumende yeSouth Africa razivisa nezvedanho iri kuburikidza nemavhidhiyo nemifananidzo zvanga zvichiratidza zvaswera zvichitora matanho. Dandemutande iri rinotiwo vemakambani vawanikwa vaine mhosva yekutyora mutemo wezvevashandi nemabasa pamwe nekushanda zvakanaka mumakambani, uye vanga vachibva vasungwawo vachibhadhariswa mafaindi. Sangano reAfrican Diaspora Forum rinonzi raswerawo riri mushishi kuedza kubatsira vasungwa ava, avo vanonzi vaendeswa kukamba yeLindela. Pataenda pamhepo sangano iri ranga richiti pane zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinosvika zana nemakumi mashanu zvasungwa muzviitiko izvi. Bazi rezvemukati menyika muSouth Africa razivisa kuti vasungwa vose ava vachadzoserwa kunyika dzavo. Hamusi muSouth Africa chete muri kusangana zvizvarwa zvezimbabwe nematambudziko ekudzoserwa kumusha, sezvo izvi zvichinzi zviri kuitikawo muBotswana. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, uye vachishanda nesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti zviri kuitwa nemapazi ehurumende yeSouth Africa izvi ndizvo zvaiitwa nehurumende yevachena munguva yehutongi hwehudzvanyiriri. VaMavhinga vanoti chikuru chiri kukonzera kuti vabvakure vashande vasina magwaro kunonoka kwebazi rezvemukati menyika kuwanisa vanhu vanenge vanyorera kuti vabatsirwe, uye nehuwori. Vanoti chiri kukanganwikwa nehurumende yeSouth Africa ndechekuti guta rakaita seJohannesburg rakavakwa nevabvakure vaishanda mumigodhi munguva yechirongwa cheWitwatersrand Native Labour Association (WNLA), icho chinonyanyozivikanwa seWenela. VaMavhinga vanoti panofanirwa kugarwa pasi nenyika dzemugungano reSADC kuitira kuti dzitsvage nzira dzinobatsira vanhu, kwete kutevera miganho yavanoti yakadzikwa nevachena. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai Anoita Mabasa eMaoko Ocherechedza Zuva reMadzimai
text: Madzimai anorarama nekutengesa zvinhu pamwe nekuzviitira mabasa emaoko anobva mumatunhu akasiyanasiyana aungana nhasi muHarare achipemberera pamwe nekurangarira zuva remadzimai, kana kuti International Women’s Day, iro rakacherechedzwa musi wa 8 Kurume pasi rose. Madzimai aungana aya anosanganisira nhengo dzesangano reZimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Association, iro rinonzi ndiro raronga musanganu uyu, pamwe neVendors Initiative for Social Economic Transformation, VISET. Imwe nhengo yeVISET yapinda mumhemberero idzi, Muzvare Tariro Munyereyi, vanoti madzimai ataura nezvematambudziko aanosangana nawo mukuita mabasa avo emaoko, zvikuru vanotengesera mumigwagwa. Muzvare Munyereyi vanoti madzimai asunga kuti pave nekudyidza kwakanaka pakati pevanotengesera mumigwagwa ava, makanzuru pamwe nehurumende kuitira kuti vakwanise kushanda pamwechete. Vanoti madzimai akawanda ari kushungurudzwa uye kutyorerwa kodzero dzavo kana vachinge vasungwa, izvo vanoti zvinozosiya vamwe vavo vave kuzvikandira mumaoko emapurisa aya kuti vasashungurudzwa. Vanotiwo panofanirwa kuve nedzidziso yakakwana pamusoro pezvirwere zvakaita seHIV/AIDS mumadzimai nevanasikana vanorarama nekutengesa ava. No media source currently available

headline: Hupfumi hweNyika Hworamba Huchienda kuMawere, Vamwe Vachiti Huwori Ndiyo Honzeri
text: Zvinhu zvinonzi zviri kuramba zvichienda kumawere munyaya dzezveupfumi munyika zvichionekwa nekushaikwa kwemafuta edzimotokari, kushaikwa kwemari yekunze, pamwe nekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu. Vamwe vanoti huwori munyika ndihwo honzeri hombe mumatambudziko aya, ayo anonzi ari kusunga vanhu, zvikuru varombo, zuva nezuva, vachipomera hurumende kutarisa rutivi panoitwa huwori uhwu. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehupfumi munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, uye vari mutewedzeri wasachigaro webato reMDC, VaTendai Biti vanoti matambudziko ari munyika ari kukonzerwa nekusafambiswa zvakanaka kwehurumende nevari kuitungamira. VaBiti vanoti huwori, sehawavanoti huri kuZINARA, huri kuregwa huchitambarara munyika, izvo zvave kukanganisa kukura kwehupfumi. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaProsper Chitambara, vanoti matambudziko ari munyika ari kunyanya kukonzerwa nekushaikwa kwechivimbo nehurumende kune vanoda kutanga mabhizimusi avo kana kudyara mari dzavomunyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzevashandi nemabasa, VaThomas Masvingwe vanotsinhirawo nyaya yekuti huwori dzihwo hwauraya nyika, vachiti matambudziko ose aya ari kurasirwa kuvashandi, avo vavanoti havasati vawedzerwa mihoro kwenguva yakareba kwazvo. Asi nhengo yevechidiki veZanu PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vanoramba kuti matambudziko ari munyika ari kukonzerwa nekusagona kutonga kwehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachiti matambudziko aya akasiiwa nehurumende yaVaRobert Mugabe pamwe nezvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe. VaChitambara vanoti matambudziko mune zveupfumi ari munyika anogadziriswa chete kana pakaitwa nhaurirano munyika. Izvi zvinotsigirwawo naVaBiti, avo vanoti kusvika munyika maitwa nhaurirano pakati pavaMnangagwa nemutungamiri weMDC VaNelson Chamisa, zvinhu zvicharamba zvichiomera vanhu, zvikuru varombo. Kusvika matambudziko ose aya agadziriswa, uye vekunze vanoda kudyara mari dzavo munyika vave nechivimbo nehurumende, ruzhinji rwevana veZimbabwe rwucharamba rwuchinonga svosve nemuromo munyika yechipikirwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vanozvibatira Mabasa eMaoko Votambira neMufaro Kuvhurwa kweNzvimbo dzeKutengesera muHarare
text: Kanzuru yeguta reHarare inoti boka revanorarama nekuzviitira mabasa emaoko ravhurwa zvakare muguta iri asi pachiteverwa zvakasimba mitemo yezvehutano yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Kanzuru yazivisa nezvekuvhurwa kwemusika weCopacabana Traders Mall, uko vachange vachitengesera mumusika uyu vachange vachibhadhara madhora mashanu emari yekuAmerica pazuva. Kanzuru yazivisawo kuti musika mukuru weMbare wave pedyo nekuvhurwa zvichitevera kuvandudzwa kwawanga uchiitwa kuti ufambirane nenyaya dzekuchengetedzwa kwehutsanana. Vanorarama nekutengesa vanoti vanotambira nemufaro kuvhurwa zvakare kwenzvimbo dzekutengesera uku vachiti vazhinji vavo vanga vave kunonga svosve nemuromo kubva pakadzikwa mutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Mukuru wesangano reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanoti vanotambira danho iri nemufaro asi vanofunga kuti madhora mashanu ari kunzi vanhu vabhadhare pazuva imari yakawandisa. Asi mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vaudza Studio 7 kuti musika weCopacabana Traders’ mall hausi pasi pekanzuru yeHarare izvo zvinoita kuti vasave nechekuita nekutarwa kwemari dzinobhadharwa nevanhu pazuva. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru weSurvival Vendors Union of Zimbabwe, VaObey Mwariwangu, vatiwo sesangano vanotambira danho rekuvhurwa zvakare kwemisika iri, asi vanoona sekunge mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19 yakanyanya kuomera vanhu. VaMwariwanguu vanoti vanotengesa ava ndivo vachange vachitarisirwa kutenga voga mishonga inouraya hutachiwana pamwe nema face mask, izvo vanoti zvinogna kudhurira vakawanda. Hatina kukwanisa kubata varidzi veCopacabana Mall kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Vanochengetedza Mhuka Vaviri Vourayiwa neVanovhima Zvisiri paMutemo kuKariba
text: Vashandi vaviri veZimbabwe National Parks and Wildlife kana kuti Zimparks vanofungidzirwa kuti vakauraiwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vanovhima mhuka zvisiri pamitemo vekuZambia nemusi weChipiri. Vane ruzivo nezvakaitika vanoti vamwe vaviri vanochengetedza mhuka kubva kubazi reZimparks vakaita mahwekwe nevanofungidzirwa vaizvhima zvisiri pamutemo mudhamu reKariba. Panonzi pakaita kakurwisana apo vanochengetedza mhuka ava vakange voyedza kuendesa vanofungidzirwa kuti vaivhima zvisiri pamutemo ava pakamba yeChanga kuKariba. Zvinonzi nyaya iyi yakazozivikanwa mushure mekunge chikepe chevanochengetedza mhuka ava chaonekwa chichiyangarara chisina munhu uye chisina injini. Mutauriri weZimparks VaTinashe Farawo vatenda kuti izvi ndizvo zvakaitika vachiti vashandi vavo vaviri havasikuzivikanwa kwavari parizvino. VaFarawo vanoti vaendesa nyaya iyi kumapurisa uye kuferefetwa kwekushayikwa uku kuri kuenderera mberi uye vari kushanda pamwechete nevebazi rezvekuchengetedzwa kwemhuka kuZambia. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commisioner Paul Nyathi kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Kubatwa kwevanhu vanovhima zvisiri pamutemo kunonzi kwakanyanya pamuganhu weZimbabwe neZambia. Vanovhima mhuka zvisiri pamutemo munyika mbiri idzi vari kusungwa vachitongwerwa makore akawanda mujeri. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi Vanga Vasara Vanowana Mabhonasi Avo
text: Hurumende yazokwanisa kupedza kupa vashandi vayo vose mari dzemabhonasi zvichitevera kutambira kwaitwa mari nevashandi vehurumende vose vanga vasara. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende ava, re Public Service Association, Amai Cecilia Alexander, vanoti nhengo dzavo dzatanga kuvazivisa kuti dzawana mari idzi kumabhanga kwadzo. Izvi zvinoreva kuti hapachina mushandi wehurumende asati awana bhonasi yake. Hurumende yakanonoka kubhadhara vashandi vayo mari dzemabhonasi idzi kubva muna Mbudzi wegore rapera nekuda kwekunetsekana kwayo mukuunganidza mari. Mwedzi uno hurumende yakakundikana zvakare kubhadhara vashandi vayo paine nguva izvo zvakazoita kuti iendese mberi nesvondo rose mazuva ekutambira aya. Varairidzi vaifanirwa kunge vakatambira mari dzavo neChipiri chesvondo rino vaudzwa kuti vave kuzotambira neChipiri chesvondo rinouya. Amai Alexander vanoti dai hurumende yaonawo kuti vashandi vayo vose vaenzaniswa kwete kuti vamwe ndivo vanogarotanga kutambira nhengo dzavo dzichingoramba dzichipedzisira kutambiriswa.

headline: Hurumende Yoendesa Mberi Musangano neveMabhizmisi weKuzeya Mutemo Wayo paMitengo
text: Musangano wange uchifanira kuitwa nemusi weChitatu pakati pehurumende nemasangano anomirira vemabhizimisi uchikokerwa nebazi rezvemari nesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers (CZR) unonzi wambosendekwa parutivi kusvika svondo rinouya. Izvi zvaitwa kunyange hazvo zvinhu zvaita manyama amire nerongo munyaya dzezvehupfumi zvichitevera danho rakatorwa nehurumende rekudzika mutemo wechimbi chimbi kana kuti Presidential Powers (Temporary Measures) (Financial Laws Amendment) Regulations 127 of 2021. Mutemo wakadzikwa mukupera kwesvondo rapera uyu unomanikidza vemabhizimisi kuti vatengese zvinhu nemutengo unoendererana newepamusika wemari weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, foreign exchange rate kwete pamukoto. Pakangodzikwa mutemo uyu zvimwe zvinhu zvakabva zvawedzerwa mutengo uku vamwe vemabhizimisi vachiti havachadi kutambira madhora ekuAmerica kunyangwe hurumende iri kuti ngaashandiswe asi nemutengo wepamusika weRBZ kana kuti foreign exchange auction. Mhute yaputira nyika panyaya dzezvehupfumi iyi yapa kuti padaidzirwe musangano wechimbi chimbi uyu. Asi mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu, vati musangano wekuzeya mamiriro ezvinhu wasendekwa parutivi nekuti hurumende yati inoda nguva yekumboona kuti mutemo uyu uri kushanda sei. Gavhuna weRBZ, Doctor John Mangudya, uye mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvemari, VaClemence Chidawu, vange vachitarisirwa kupinda mumusangano uyu. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaMangudya avo takatumirawo mibvunzo yavasati vapindura. Asi mumashoko padandemutande reTwitter RBZ inoti danho nho iri harisi rekuda kuomesera vemabhizimisi asi kuti kuunza kugadzikana pamusika nekumisa huori kune vemakambani vanowana mari kubhanga guru renyika nemutengo uri pasi asi vodhurisa zvinhu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanotiwo mutemo uyu hauna kunyanya kuipa nekuti unodzikamisa dhora remunyika neku kuti vatengi vasaomeserwe sezvo vamwe vemabhizimisi vari kuwana mari kuRBZ vari kubatira vanhu. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaVictor Bhoroma, vane maonero akasiyana vachiti havasi vose vari kuwana mari kuRBZ uye bhanga iri riri kutatarika kupa vanenge vanzi vapihwe mari dzacho nenguva. Pasi pemutemo uyu, vanenge vawana mari pamusika wemari weRBZ voishandisa zvisizvo vanonzi vachabhadhairiswa miriyoni imwe chete yemadhora uye vemabhanga vanonzi vanoita zvehuori kupa makambani matsamba ekuti vawane mari pamusika weRBZ vanonzi vachabhadhariswa mamiriyoni mashanu sechirango. Vemabhizimisi vanonzi vanoramba kutambira dhora remuZimbabwe vachabhadhariswa mari inosvika zviuru makumi mashanu kana kuti 50 000. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yovimbusa Kugadzirisa Dambudziko reMafuta eKufambisa Dzimotokari
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu Doctor Joram Gumbo vanoti Zimbabwe yawana mari yechikwereti yekuti ipedze dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kuchema chema nenyaya yekuti vave kupedza nguva yakareba vachitsvaga mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari uye vemakombi nemabhazi vabva vawedzera mutengo. Kunze kwekushaikwa kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari, nyika yakatarisana nedambudziko rekushayawo mafuta ekubikisa, chingwa nezvimwe zvekudya. Vanhu vave kumanikidzwawo kutenga zvinhu zvemari inosvika madhora makumi maviri kuti vatange bhodhoro rimwe chete remafuta kana vachida kutenga nekadhi vasina mari yekuAmerica. Asi padambudziko remafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari, VaGumbo vanoti vari kuyedza kugadzirisa dambudziko iri vachibatsirana neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. Vati RBZ yatenda kupa bazi ravo mari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi matatu nemaviri kubva pamamiriyoni makumi maviri pavhiki roga roga. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnanagagwa Vovimbisa Vanachiremba Mari Asi Kuramwa Mabasa Kunoenderera Mberi
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanonzi vakaudza bazi rezvemari kuti ripe imwe mari kuna vanachiremba avo vari kuramwa mabasa kubva kutanga kwemwedzi uno. Mari iri kuwedzerwa ndeye muripo kana vana chiremba vadaidzwa kuti vadzokere kubasa kana vachinge vapedza basa ravo, kana kuti on call allowance. Mashoko aya akaturwa kunana chiremba ava neHealth Services Board kana kuti HSB, iyo inoona nezvemabasa evose vanoshanda mubazi rezvehutano pamisangano yakaitwa nemusi weChipiri neChitatu. Asi kuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba kuri kuenderera mberi sezvo vari kuti HSB haisi kuvaratidza mapepa acho anonzi akabva kubazi rezvemari. Kuramwa mabasa uku kwava nemazuva makumi maviri nesere pasina zvanyoreranwa pasi kunze kwekungonzi hurumende iri kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavana chiremba. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mukuru weHSB, Dr Lovemore Mbengeranwa, kana gurukota rezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, sezvo vose vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. Mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Mxolisi Ngwenya, vanoti kuramwa mabasa kuchaenderera mberi kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzezvehupfumi Dzoti Gwaro Re2019 Budget Strategy Paper – BSP Rrakanaka, Basa Guru Kuzadzisa Zvarinotaura.
text:
Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Elliota Masocha vanodzidzisa paDevry University kuOhio vanoti gwaro rakaparurwa negurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube rebhajeti regore rinoshanda chete kana hurumende yakazvipira kuvandudza zvinhu. Muzvinafundo Masocha vanoti hurumende ine magwaro akawanda ayaburitsa asi hapana chinobuda. Gwaro iri rinonzi 2019 Budget Strategy Paper uye rino buritsa pachena zvinoda kuitwa nehurumende mukushandiswa kwemari kusvika muna 2021. Rinobatsirawo hurumende kuronga nezvemuone wayo unonzi Vision 2030. Gwaro iri rinotaurawo pamusoro pekuderedzwa kwezvinofanira kubhadharwa nehurumende uye kupedzwa kwe zvikwereti zvenyika. Embed

headline: Vanhu Vorasikirwa neMari Vachiyedza Kunotsvaga Mabasa paMuzinda weSouth-Sudan muHarare
text: Vanhu vazhinji nemusi weChipiri vakafambira dhongi rakaora kumuzinda weSouth-Sudan muZimbabwe kuBelgravia mushure memashoko aifamba pamadandemutande eFacebook neWhatsApp kuti muzinda uyu wange uchizotora vanhu vanoda mabasa kuti vaende kunyika iyi. Nyika yeSouth Sudan haina kugadzikana sezvo muguta guru renyika iyi reJuba muchigara muine hondo. Vari kurwisana muSouth-Sudan ndevanotsigira mutungamiri wenyika iyi VaSalva Kiir nevaimbova mutevedzeri wavo VaRiek Machar. Vakawanda vaenda kumuzinda uyu muHarare vabva vachiridza tsamwa sezvo mashoko ekuti pange pachida kutorwa vanhu kuti vange vachipinda mabasa anzi ndeemanyepo. Asi aka handi kekutanga vanhu vachiita chipata pata chekuenda pamuzinda uyu sezvo vanamukoti vakambonyeperwa kuti kwaita mabasa muna Chikumi vakaendawo kumuzinda uyu. Gurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa vakati kunyangwe hurumende yainge yazivisa kuti iri kushanda neSouth-Sudan kutsvagira vanhu mabasa, kusvika parizvino hapana chibvumirano chati chaitwa. Izvi zvakakonzerwawo nekuti pana vanamukoti vanodarika zviuru zvitatu vasina mabasa. Nyaya yekunyeperwa kwavanamukoti yakatozeyiwa mudare reparamende. Mumwe wevanhu vapumha dova vachienda kumuzinda weSouth Sudan ndiVaSamson Chitema avo vati kunyangwe kuSouth Sudan kusina kugadzikana, kuri nani pane kugara muZimbabwe. Muzvare Miriam Mugodhi avo vange vachiratidza kurwadziwa zvikuru pamwe nekushupikana vati vabva kuBulawayo chaiko. Vati vange vatofunga kuti mudzimu wavaona sezvo vaine magwaro anodiwa. . VaPeter Museve avo vakaita zvidzidzo zveMasters vaudza Studio 7 kuti mamiriro aita zvinhu munyika apa kuti vanhu vaende havo kuSouth-Sudan uko kunogara kuchirira pfuti. Studio 7 yataurawo naVaJames Mukomva avo vati havasisina tarisiro yemabasa pasi pehurumende yemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Kunyangwe zvazvo nyika yeSouth-Sudan ichitevedza tsika dzechiMuslim Mukurru weZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Dr Pedzisai Ruhanya avvanoongorora magariro evanhu pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika vati vana veZimbabwe vazhinji vacho vanotendera muchiKristu havasisina hanya nekwavanowana mabasa. Dr Ruhanya vati kuoma kwehupenyu munyika kuri kuita kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvitsvake mabasa chero kwaamuka. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende inofanira kudzika mitemo inokwezva vemabhizimisi vekunze nekuti nyika yaenda kumawere. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemunyori mukuru musangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions VaJaphet Moyo avo vati vashandi vari pamabasa paerizvino havasi kutambiriswa mari dzemihoro uye makambani akawanda ari kuramba achivharwa. Mutungamiri webato rePDP uye vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi, VaTendai Biti vanoti zvakawanda zvinoda kuitwa nehurumende kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Vachitsvaga rutsigiro pasarudzo dzemuna 2013, vebato reZanu PF vakavimbisa kuti vachaumba mabasa anosvika mamiriyoni maviri. Asi kusvika pari zvino makambani ari kuramba achivharwa zvichisiya vazhinji kunyangwe vakadzidza vasina chekubata. Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vanoti nyaya yezvirango ndiyo iri kupa kuti Zimbabwe itadza kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti VaMugabe ndivo vari kutadza kutungamira zvikuru vachitadza kugadzirisa nyaya dzehuori. Kunyangwe zvazvo Studio 7 isina kukwanisa kutaura nemumiriri wemuzinda weSouth-Sudan muZimbabwe uyo ange asipo, pamukova wemuzinda uyu pange pakanamirwa mapepa ange achizivisa veruzhinji kuti mashoko aishambadzwa ekuti vaitora vanhu vekunoshanda kunyika yavo ange ari emanyepo. Munguva pfupi yapfuura, zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakanyeperwa kuti kwainge kwaita mabasa kuKuwait neSaudi Arabia asi zvikazoguma zvobatwa senhapwa munyika idzi.  No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Onetsana neVanotengesera Mumigwagwa yeGuta reHarare
text: Vanotengesa mumigwagwa varwisana nemapurisa ekanzuru neZimbabwe Republic Police ayo ange achida kuvabvisa mumigwagwa nechisimba uye pakuvara mapurisa nevanotengesa vane chitsama mukurwisana uku. Vanotengesera mumigwagwa varwisawo mapurisa vachiatema nematombo. Mapurisa ekanzuru neZimbabwe Republic Police ange achitenderera neguta achisunga nekutora zvinhu zvevanotengesa mumigwagwa kubva mangwanani izvo zvazotsamwisa vazhinji vatanga kurwisa mapurisa panguva dzekuma12 masikati. Zvitoro zvakawanda nemabhanga mumigwagwa yakaita saFirst, Jason Moyo, George Silundika naAngwa avhara apo mapurisa ange ave kurwisana nevanotengesa mumigwagwa. Veruzhinji vakurira mapurisa ayo apinda mumarori awo akatiza ndokuzodzoka chinguvana ave nezvombo zvehutsi hunokachidza pamwe nemotokari dzine mvura inovava. Muparurisa anodzivirira nyonganyonga azokokwawo kuzopedza mvongamupopoto yange yave muguta. Meya veHarare, VaHebert Gomba, vaudza vatori venhau kuti kanzuru haisi kurwisana nevanotengesa mumigwagwa uye iri kutaurirana navo kuti vaende kunzvimbo dzakatarwa kuti vatengesere. Asi vati mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police vari kuona kuti vanotengesa mumigwagwa vaenda kunzvimbo dzavanofanira kutengesera. Vati mangwana chaiwo vachaita musangano nevanhu ava kuti vazeye nyaya iyi. Munyori mutsva weguta reHarare, VaHosia Chisango, avo vawana basa iri nhasi vatiwo vanhu vari kutengesera panzvimbo dzisingaite uye kubvira pavakatanga chirongwa chekubvisa vanhu mumigwagwa, guta rachena. Vati chirongwa ichi chicharamba chichienderera mberi kudzamara dambudziko rekorera rapera muguta. Vaviri ava vatiwo zvichitevera kubuda kwekorera muguta pamwe nezvakaitwa nehurumende kuti yave State of Emergency, zvimwe zviri kuitwa muguta zviri kuitwa nehurumende uye vati ivo havazive kuti zvinhu zviri kutorerwa vanhu zviri kuendeswa kupi. Mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira vanotengesa mumigwagwa reVendor Initiative for Socio-Economic Transformation, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane nhengo dzesangano ravo nhatu dzakuvara munyonga nyonga yanhasi. VaWadzayi vatiwo vashamisika zvikuru nekuita kwemapurisa sezvo paine musangano wavachaita mangwana nekanzuru nevese vane chekuita nenyaya iyi. VaWadzayi vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakaudza hurumende kuti nyaya yekubvisa vanhu mumigwagwa nechimbi chimbi haiite uye kuti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vagare pasi voita nhaurirano nechinangwa chekuti munhu wese akwanisa kuita basa rake akasununguka. Hurumende yakamisa mabasa ekutengesera mumigwagwa mumadhorobha ese munyika senzira yekudzivirira chirwere chekokera icho chinokonzerwa netsvina. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesera Mumigwagwa Voronga Kuendesa Kanzuru yeHarare kuMatare
text: Sangano rinomirira vanotengesera mumigwagwa, reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VISET, rinoti riri kuronga kuendesa kanzuru yeguta reHarare kumatare edzimhosva nenyaya yekuparadza kwarinoti iri kuita zvinhu zvenhengo dzaro. Mukuru wesangano iri, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanoti pari zvino magweta avo ari mushishi kugadzira magwaro ekuti vaende nawo kumatare. VaWadzayi vanoti svondo rapera vashandi vekanzuru vakaparadza zvinhu zvenhengo dzavo panzvimbo yemabhizimusi yeBudiriro 5, izvo zvakaita kuti nhengo dzavo dzirasikirwe nezvinhu zvaikosha mari yakawanda kwazvo zvadzaifanirwa kutengesa kuti dziwane cheuviri. VaWadzayi vanoti kanzuru ichiri kuenderera mberi nekukanganisa mashandiro enhengo dzavo dzinotengesera munzvimbo dzakasiyasiyana dzeguta reHarare. Asi mutauriri wekanzuru VaMichael Chideme vakaramba mashoko ekuti kanzuru yavo iri kurapadza midziyo yevanhu vanotengesera mumigwagwa, vachiti chavari kuita chete kuchenesa guta. VaChideme vakaudza Studio 7 kuti kanzuru yavo yagara ichi kurudzira vanotengesa zvinhu ava kuti vaende kunotengesera munzvimbo dzakatarwa zviri pamutemo, asi vanosarudza kutengesera pamberi pezvitoro zviri kubhadhara mitero. Asi VaWadzayi vanoramba mashoko aya vachiti kanzuru ndiyo ine dambudziko sezvo iri kuisa misika kure nevanotenga. VaWadzayi vanoti midziyo yenhengo dzavo yakaparadzwa inokosha mari inodarika zana rezviuru zvemadhora. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vononga Svosve neMuromo neNyaya yeHupfumi Hwaenda kuMawere
text: Veruzhinji munyika vanoti kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi hwenyika kwakonzera kuti hupenyu huvawomere kunyange hazvo hurumende ichiti ine hurongwa hwakasimba hwekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika. Vanhu vakawanda munyika vanoti hupenyu hwavawomera zvichitevera kuwondomoka kuri kuramba kuchiita hupfumi hwenyika. Mumwe wevanhu ava, VaGodfrey Banhwa vanogara mumusha weBudiriro muno mu Harare vanoti vakaburira muzvidzidzo zvavo zve Development Studies pane imwe yunivhesiti yemuno asi vanoti vave nemakore matatu vagere kumba. VaBanhwa vanoti vavakuswera vachigeza motokari dzevanhu mudhorobha kuti vakwanise kuchengeta mudzimai wavo nemapatya avo. Muzvare Kudzai Chiwanza vanogara ku Southerton vanoti kuwoma kuri kuramba kuchiita zvinhu munyika kwanyanya kuomera vanhukadzi vachiti chipfambi chizhinji chiri kuitwa munzvimbo dzakawanda chiri kukonzerwa nekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyika. Muzvare Chiwanza vanoti kushayikwa kwemari kwavakukonzera kuti madzimai mazhinji atadze kutenga zvipfeko zvemukati panguva yavanenge vachitevera. Nekuda kwekuooma kuri kuramba kuchiita hupenyu, vanhu vazhinji mu Harare vavekutsvaga zvinhu zvingavararamise. Amai Getrude Govere vanogara mu Gen Norah vanoti mushure mekuenda papenjeni makore mashanu apfuura, vakaona zvakakodzera kuti vatange kuswera vachitengesa matohwe, tsubvu pamwe nemasau mudhorobha vachiti penjeni yavo ishoma zvikuru zvekuti havakwanise kuterera imba yavanogara nemhuri yavo. Amai Govere vanoti vanobva kumamisha vachivahodhesera michero yavanotengesa vanenge vakatarisirawo kuwana chouviri pamichero yavo asi nguva zhinji vanogara vakashaya mari yekuvapa sezvo vachiti mari inenge yapeera mukubhadhara mafaindi kukanzuru yeHarare iyo isiri kubvumidza vanhu kuti vatengesere kunzvimbo dzisina kutatrwa. Vanoenderera mberi vachit havasi kuda kuenda kunzvimbo dzakatarwa nekanzuru idzi vachiti mari yavanowana mukutengesa kwavanoita haikwane kuti vabhadhare mitero kukanzuru pamwe nekuchengeta mhuri yavo. VaFarai Kabesha vanogara ku Mbare vanoti vanoswera vachitsvaga chero munhu anenge achida kubatsirwa kutakura zvinhu pamusika kuti vawane chouviri. VaKabesha vanoti havana chavari kuona chiri kuitwa nehurumende kuedza kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika. Nekugarochema-chema kuri kuita veruzhinji, vamwe vanhu vakaita sa Amai Govere vanoti hurumende yaVaRobert Mugabe inofanira kutsvaga nzira dzkuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika nekukasika. Amai Govere vanoti zvinhu zvakamboita nani pakawumbwa hurumende yemubatanidzwa muna 2009 asi zvinhu zvakazotanga kuwoma zvakare pakaitwa sarudzo. Asi VaKabesha vanoti chave kutodikanwa ndechekuti pambotsvagwa imwe hurumende ine pfungwa itsva dzinogona kufambisa hupfumi hwenyika zvakanaka. VaMugabe vakaudza nyika svondo rapera kuti hurumende yavo ichashanda zvakasimba kusimbaradza nyaya dzezvekurima kuitira kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire. Hurumende yavo inoti chirongwa chekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika che Zimbabwe Agenda for Sustainable Socio Economic Transformation kana kuti Zimasset chikazadziswa chinogona kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika uhwo hwagwadama. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti Zimbabwe ikasawana chikwereti chimwe chakakura kubva kunze kugadzirisa hupfumi acharamba ari manyautsa mukanwa chembere kurota ichiyamwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voomerwa neHupenyu neKushaya Mabasa
text: Nyaya dzekuvharwa kwemakambani dzinonzi dziri kuramba dzichiwedzera huwandu hwevanhu vasina mabasa munyika, izvo zvinonzi zvave kuita kuti veruzhinji vararame nekutengesa chero chinobatika. Mazuva apera hurumende yakazivisa kuti inogona kuvharisa kambani yenharembozha yeTelecel Zimbabwe, ichiti kambani iyi iri kushanda isina rezinesi. Kana danho iri rikabudirira, izvi zvinenge zvoreva kuti vashandi vanodarika chiuru vanenge vorasikirwa zvakare nemabasa. Mamwe makambani akawanda anosanganisira yeZimpapers, iyo inodhinda mapepanhau ehurumende, anonzi ari mushishi yekumisawo vashandi mabasa. Masvondo maviri apfuura, kanzuru yeChitungwiza yakazivisawo kuti ine hurongwa hwekumisa vashandi vanodarika mazana matanhatu mabasa nekuda kwekuoma kwezvinhu munyaya dzeupfumi. Kubva kutanga kwegore rino, mabhanga akawanda akaputsika uye vashandi vanodarika chiuru vakarasikirwawo nemabasa. Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi dzinoti izvi zvinoreva kuti vose vanhu vari kurasikirwa nemabasa ava vanenge vopinda mukuita mabasa ekuzviriritira, umo mazara nechekare. Nyanzvi munyaya dzevashandi uye vachitungamira sangano reConcerned Affiliates of the ZCTU, VaLovemore Matombo, vanoti mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika haachadi kuti vashandi nevashandirwi vabatane pahuro, sezvo iri risiri dambudziko revashandi. VaMatombo vanoti kugadzirisa dambudziko iri panofanirwa kutanga pagadziriswa kuti matambudziko enyika ave upfumi hwenyika. Vanoti izvi zvinogadzirisika chete kana hurumende ikatora danho rekugadzirisakuburikidza nekudzokera kuchibvumirano cheKadoma Declaration, icho chakanyoreranwa mugore ra2001. Mukuru wesangano revashandirwi, reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, EMCOZ, VaJohn Mufukare vanotiwo vanobvumirana nemaonero aVaMatombo, sezvo mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika iye zvino asisina kufanana nemamiriro akanga akaita zvinhu mugore ra2001. Sangano remubatanidzwa wemasangano evashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti vashandi vakawanda vakarasikirwa nemabasa mugore rino chete mushure mekuvhara kwemakambani akawanda. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende neVashandi Vayo Votadza Kuwirirana paNyaya yeMihoro
text: Musangano pakati pevamiriri vehurumende nevamiriri vevashandi vehurumende weNational Joint Negotiating Council, uyo wanga wakatarisirwa nevakawanda kuti uchaburitsa chimuko, unonzi hauna chawaburitsa mushure mekunge vashandi varamba mari yanga yaiswa patafura nehurumende. Zvinonzi hurumende yanga yati inokwanisa kuwedzera vashandi vayo mihoro nemadhora makumi mapfumbamwe nemanomwe pamunhu iri mari yemaRTGS, iyo inonzi yarambwa nevamiriri vevashandi ava. Hurumende inonzi yati inokwanisa kuwedzera mari idzi nemari inoita zana nemakumi masere emamiroyoni emari yeRTGS semari ichawedzerwa kubva muna Chikunguru kusvika panopera gore muna Zvita. Izvi zvinosiya mushandi mumwe chete achiwedzerwa nemaRTGS makumi mapfumbamwe nemanomwe pamwedzi wega wega. Vashandi vari munhaurirano idzi vanga vachimirira nemasangano avo vanosvika zviuru mazana matatu nezvipfumbamwe, kunynage hazvo mamwe masangano akaita seProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe asina kupinda mumusangano uyu. Gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, neMuvhuro vakazivisa nyika kuti hurumende yaizozivisa neChipiri nezvemari yairi kuda kuwedzera nayo vashandi vayo, avo vari kuchema kuti vave kukwangwaya nenhamo. Pari zvino mushandi wepasi muhurumende anonzi ari kutambira mari inosvika madhora mazana mana nemakumi matatu yemaRTGS pamwedzi. Vashandi vari kuchema kuti mari yavo haichatenge chinhu sezvo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichikwira panguva iyo mihoro yavo isina kwairi kuenda. Sachigaro vesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reApex Council, Amai Cecilia Alexander, vanoti vashandi vapinda mumusangano uyu vachitarisira kuti hurumende ichapa mushandi wepasi mari inoita RTGS$4750.00 pamwedzi. Amai Alexander vanoti vashandi vehurumende vakatovazivisa kare kuti kana pasina chabuda kubva mumusangano uyu, vanofanirwa kuenderera mberi nehurongwa hwavakange vanahwo muna Kurume hwekukanda mapadza pasi. Vanoti sevashandi, vari kutarisira kuti hurumende ichadzoka kwavari svondo rino risati rapera, uye ivo vachasanganawo seApex Council nemusi weChitatu kuti vapire nhengo dzavo zvabuda mumusangano uyu pamwe nekuti varonge gwara rekutora kuenda mberi. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Vochema Chema neKushungurudzwa neMapurisa
text: Apo nyika ichiri mukucherechedza mazuva gumi nematanhatu ekudzivirira mhirizhonga inechekuita nekuti uri munhukadzi kana munhurume, vamwe vanorarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa kunyanya madzimai vari kuchema chema nekwavanoti kushungurudzwa vachidzingirirwa nemapurisa Vachitaura neStudio 7, mumwe ANOTENGESA Mumugwagwa Amai Anna Moyowashe vati zvinotuma madzimai kutengesera mumigwagwa kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi. Vati vakawana chouviri kukutenegesa zinhu kwavanoita zvinogona kuderedza dambudziko remhirizhonga mudzimba. Vaenderera mberi vachiti chinopa kuti vatengesere pese pese inyaya yekutsvaka pavanokwanisa kuwana vatengi. Izvi zvatsigirwawo naAmai Otilia Chikandira avo vati mhirizhonga iri kunyanyokonzerwa nehurombo nekuti mhuri dzinenge dzisina chekubata.Vatiwo shuviro yavo ndeyekuti vatengese vakasununguka. Mumwewo munhurume anotengesera mumugwagwa, VaAngirayi Moyowatidhii vatiwo kudzingirirwa nemapurisa kunopa kuti vaende kumba vari maoko chete zvinokwanisa kuwedzera dambudziko remhirizhonga mudzimba. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare VaInnocent Ruwende vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyangwe zvazvo vanotengesa mumugwagwa varikuchema chema nekugaroita hwakiti negonzo nemapurisa kusanganisira ekanzuru vati vatengesi vanofanirwa kutevedzera mitemo yekanzuru. Mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vatiwo basa ravo nderekuona kuti vanhu vatevedzera mitemo. Vamwe vanotengesa mumigwagwa vanokuvara mushure mekurowa nemapurisa kana kuti vachitiza uye vamwe vanotsikwa nekuurayiwa nemotokari dzemushika shika dzinenge dzichitandaniswa nemapurisa. Mazuva gumi nematanhatu ekudzivirira mhirizhonga inechekuita nekuti uri munhukadzi kana munhurume anotanga kucherechedzwa musi wa 25 Mbudzi kusvika musi was 10 Zvita. No media source currently available

headline: Vanofamba neMabhazi Vochemachema neKukwidzwa kweMari paNguva ino yeZororo
text: Veruzhinji vari kuda kufamba pazororo reKisimusi negoredzva vanoti havasi kufara nekukwira kwaita mari dzekubhadhara mumabhazi panguva iyo mafuta edzimotokari asiri kuwanikwa, hurumende ichiti dambudziko rekushayikwa kwemafuta rinogona kutora nguva yakareba kuti rigadziriswe. Vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 vanoti kukwira kwaita mabhazi panguva ino yezororo reKisimusi kuri kuvarwadza zvikuru sezvo mari iri kuvanetsa kuwana, vachiti zvinhu munyika zvaoma semafuta agwambira mubhodhoro. Pasvika Studio 7 pamusika unokwirirwa mabhazi anoenda kumaruwa weMbare, panga paine vanhu vakawanda vanga vachitsvaga chokufambisa kuti vaende kunzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana. Mumwe wevanhu vari kuti varwadziwa nekukwira kwaita mabhazi ndiAmai Viola Mafa, avo vati vanga vachida kuenda nemhuri yavo kuMhondoro asi vawana mabhazi akwira zvakapetwa kaviri. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevesangano rinomirira vemabhazi ano anotakura veruzhinji sezvo nhare dzavo dzanga dzisiri kudairwa. Asi mumwe mutyairi webhazi rinoenda kwaMutare uyo ati anongoda kudaidzwa nezita rekuti Nohoreka, ati chaita kuti vakwidze mitengo yemabhazi ndechekuti mafuta edhiziri vari kuawana achidhura pamukoto sezvo mumagaraji mazhinji musina mafuta. Zvichakadai, kukwira kunonzi kwaita mabhazi uku kwashorwa zvikuru nesangano rinomirira vafambi rePassengers Association of Zimbabwe. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaTafadzwa Goliati vatiwo havasi kufara nekurambwa kuri kuitwa mari dzendarama kana kuti ma coins nevemabhazi, iriyo imwe yemari dzavari kuwana. Vati kunyange hazvo hurumende yakaisa mabhazi eZupco mumigwagwa yakawanda, mabhazi aya mashoma zvikuru pakatariswa huwandu hwevanhu vari kuda kufamba nguva ino yezororo. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nagavhuna webhanga guru munyika VaJohn Mangudya kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira zvakare nharembozha yavo. VaGoliati vatiwo hurumende inofanira kugadzirisa dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemafuta kuitira kuti veruzhinji vasaoneswe chitsvuku nevemabhazi avo vanonzi vari kuchemachema nekukwira kuri kuita mafuta edzimotokari nguva nenguva. Gurukota rinoona nezvemando dzemoto, VaFortune Chasi, vanoti dambudziko rekushayikwa kwemafuta munyika richaramba rakapfunya chisero munyika sezvo hurumende isina mari yekunze inokwana kuti itenge mafuta anokwanira nyika. Vanhu vakawanda munyika vakatarisira kufamba nguva ino yezororo reKisimusi negoredzva kuti vanoona hama neshamwari sezvo vazvinji vavo vachange vasiri pamabasa panguva ino yezororo. Asi nekuoma kwaita zvinhu munyika nekudhura kuri kuita mabhazi nemichovha vazhinji vanoti vanogona kunoita zvichoni kunzendo dzavanenge vafamba. No media source currently available

headline: WFP Yopemha Imwe Mari Yekubatsira Vanhu Mamiriyoni Mana muZimbabwe
text: Bazi reUnited Nations rinoona nezvechikafu reWorld Health Organization raisa chikumbiro cheimwe mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana maviri nemana kana kuti US$204 million yekubatsira vanhu mamiriyoni mana vemuZimbabwe vatarisana nenzara. Nzara iyi iri kukonzerwa nekusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura, kukwira zvakanyanya kwemitengo yezvinhu uye chirwere cheCovid-19 chapa kuti vakawanda varasikirwe nemabasa. Nyaya yekuoma kwezvinhu iri kuuya hayo apo gurukoota rezvemari Muzvinafund Mthuli Ncube vari kuti mitengo yezvinhu iri kudzika. WFP inoti mwedzi yakaomesesa iri kutanga ikozvino kusvika muna Kurume gore rinouya apo vanhu vanenge votanga kukohwa. Vanhu vari kutarisirwa kuti vanenge vatarisana nenzara mamiriyoni matanhatu nezviuru zvipfumbamwe kana kuti 6,9 million. Huwandu uhu hunosanganisirawo vanhu mamiriyomi maviri nezvuru mazana matatu mumadhorobha vatarisana nenzara inotyisa. Mumiriri weWFP muZimbabwe Amai Francesca Erdelmann vanoti mari iyi ikasawanikwa nechimbi chimbi vanhu mamiriyoni mana vanoyaura nenzara zvisina mukare akamboona. Ongororo yakaitwa nehurumende nemamwe masangano inonzi ZIMVAC inoti vanhu mamiriyoni manomwe nezvuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 7,6 million vakatarisana nenzara munyika. No media source currently available

headline: ZIMTA Inoti Nhengo Dzayo Hadzichakwanisa Kuramba Dzichienda Kumabasa
text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi, re Zimbabwe Teachers Association (ZIMTA), rabatanawo nemamwe masangano evarairidzi pakuzivisa kuti nhengo dzaro hadzichakwanisa kuramba dzichienda kumabasa sezvo dzisisina mari dzekufambisa. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaRichard Gundani, vanoti nhengo dzavo dzichange dzichienda kumabasa kaviri chete pasvondo, Muvhuro neChishanu. VaGundani vanoti danho ratorwa nesangano ravo rinotsinhira danho rakaziviswa nesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende, re APEX Council, rekuti vashandi vehurumende vakanga vasisakwanise kuramba vachienda kumabasa mazuva ose. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaEnergy Mutodi vakaudza Studio 7 neSvondo kuti hurumende yakasununguka kuramba ichiita hurukuro nevashandi vayo pamusoro pemihoro yavo. Masangano anomiririra varairidzi, e Propgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe neAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ndemamwe masangano evarairidzi akatozivisa kare kuti nhengo dzawo dzakanga dzisisakwanise kuramba dzichienda kumabasa. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, sangano rinomiririra varairidzi vekumaruwa, re Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, rinoti nhengo dzaro dzave kutangidza kuratidzira vhiki yega yega kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvevarairidzi. Mutungamiriri wesangano iri, VaObert Masaraure, vaudza Studio 7 kuti sangano ravo richatangidza kudzidzisa nekubatsira vana vechikoro pa nzvimbo dzavachazivisa asi kwete muzvikoro. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi re zvedzidzo kuti izvi zvichibvumidzwa here nemitemo yenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Vorega Kunotora Mari Dzavo dzeMudyandigere
text: Komisheni inoona nezvekufambiswa kwemari dzemudyandigere kana kuti Insurance and Pension Commission-IPEC, inoti kune mari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemanomwe isati yatorwa nevanhu vakaenda pamudyandigere. Vachitaura nhasi muChinhoyi pamusangano waitwa nekomisheni iyi nevanochengeta mari inobhadharwa nevashandi yemudyandigere mukuru anoona nezvekudyidzana mukomisheni VaLlyod Gumbo vanoti vari kushushikana nekusatorwa kwemari yakawanda zvakadaro. VaGumbo vanoti mari iyi inofanirwa kubhadharwa kuvanhu vanosvika zviuru mazana mashanu. VaGumbo vakurudzira vose vakambobhadhara mari yemudyandigere asi vasina kuzoitora kuti vaende kwavaibhadhara mari kana kukambani dzavaishandira vanobvunza nekuti mari iyi hapana munhu anogona kuitora kunze kwemuridzi wayo chete. Mumwe mushandi apinda mumusangano wanhasi VaPrince Mpala vanoti mari dzemudyandigere dziri kupihwa vanhu ishoma zvichienzaniswa nemari yavanenge vabhadhara uye vanopihwa mari isisina huremu. VaMpala vanoti mari dzemudyandigere dzakabhadharwa iri mari yekuAmerica dzinofanirwa kubhadharwa dzichishaswa reti (rate) inenge ichishandiswa nguva iyoyo yeInterbank rate Gurukota rezvevashandi Amai Sekai Nzenza vakatenda kuti mari dziri kutambirwa nevashandi dzishoma uye vakati vanoda kuita hurukuro negurukota rezvemari muzvinmafundo Mthuli Ncube kuti mari idzi dziwedzerwe. Mumwe mukuru weKomisheni iyi VaJosphat Kakwere vanoti vashandi vanofanirwa kutaurira mhuri dzavo kuti vari kubhadhara mari yemudyandigere kwete kuvanza sezvinoita vakawanda. VaGumbo vanoti mari iyi ikagara makore mashanu iri muPension Fund isati yatorwa inozoendeswa muGuardian Fund uko inogara kwemakore makumi matatu yakamirira kutorwa nemuridzi wayo.

headline: Zimbabwe Inopihwa $961 Million neIMF
text: Zimbabwe nhasi yatambira mazana mapfumbwamwe nemakumi matanhatu nerimwe emamiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica (US$961m) kubva kuInternational Monetary Fund (IMF) pasi pechirongwa chesangano iri chekugadzirisa nyaya dzehupfumi munyika dzepasi rose uhwo hwavhiringwa nedenda reCovid-19. Izvi zvaziviswa negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, pamwe nagavhuna webhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Dr John Mangudya. Mumashoko avo kuvatori venhau, vaviri ava vati zvaitwa neIMF izvi zvichasimbisa mari yemuno. Vati mari iyi ichashandiswa zvakajeka kutsigira mabasa ehutano, dzidzo, vanotambura, kusimudzira maindasitiri, mabasa ekurima, kugadzirisa migwagwa nezvimwe. Vati imwe mari yabva kuIMF, iyo yapihwa Zimbabwe pasi pechirongwa cheSpecial Drawing Rights, ichashandiswawo mukurwisa Covid-19, nyaya dzehutano, dzidzo nekubatsira vanotambura nezvimwe ichashandiswa kutenga nhomba. Asi mamwe mapato anopikisa munyika audza Studio 7 kuti VaNcube vanofanira kutsvaga mvumo yekushandisa mari iyi kubva kuparamende. Mumiriri weHatfield muparamende, Dr Tapwia Mashakada veMDC-T, vanove zvekaare gurukota rinoona nezvemari mubato iri vati zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe yawana ruyamuro rwekusimudzira hupfumi hwayo panguva ino yeCovid-19. Vatiwo chinodiwa chakakosha kuti mari iyi ishandiswe pajekerere. Vati dare reparamende rinofanira kuve nechekuita nekushandiswa kwemari iyi. Izvi zvatsigirwa nemutevedzeri wemutauririri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, avo vaudza Studio 7 kuti paramende ndiyo inomirira vahu nekudaro ndiyo inofanira kugara pasi kuti mari iyi yoshandiswa sei. Vati vana veZimbabwe vanofanira kubatana mukuona kuti mari iyi yashandiswa zvakanaka. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubato reZanu PF sezvo mushandi mukuru mubazi rekuburitswa kwemashoko mubato iri, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yedu pataenda pamhepo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, vachishanda nesangano reLabour, Economic Devopment Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Dr Prosper Chitambara, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mari yabva kuIMF iyi hachisi chikwereti nekudaro inofanira kushandiswa zvine hungwaru. Vatiwo mari iyi inofanirawo kushandiswa panyaya dzekuvandudza mabasa emuvura nekugaya mumagetsi vachiti kana izvi zviripo vekunze vanouya kuzosima mari dzavo munyika. IMF yakapa nyika dzepasi rose mazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu emabhiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica kuti dzisambaradze hupfumi hwadzo uhwo hwuri kuvhiringwa nedenda reCovid-19. Mune imwewo nyaya komisheni inoona nezvekushanda kwevatongi vematare munyika, Judicial Service Commission, (JSC),nhasi yaziviisa kuti bvunzo dzekutsvaga vatongi vapfumbamwe vedare repamusoro idzo dzakambomiswa zvichitevera kuvharwa kwenyika nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19, dzave kuzoitwa svondo rinouya kutnga musi wa30 Nyamavhvhu kusvika musi wa1 Gunyanya. Pane vanhu makumi matatu nevashanu vachapinda mubvunzo idzi vanosanganisira mukuru wevatongi vematare amajisitiriti, kana kuti Chief Magistrate, VaMunamato Mutevedzi. Muchiziviso chayo nhasi, JSC yati bvunzo idzi dzichaitirwa kuhotera yeRainbow Towers. Munguva ino yedenda reCovid-19, JSC inoti haisi kukurudziri veruzhinji kuti vaende kubvunzo idzi ichiti dzichange dzichiburitswa pamadandemutane ayo eFacebook neTwitter uyewo panhepfenyuro yeZimbabwe Broadcasting Corporation. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzozeya Hurongwa hweKudzora Dhora Munyika
text: Hurumende yakazivisanemusi weMuvhuro kuti vanhu vanenge vave kusungirwa kuti vashandise mari yemunyika chete yemaRTGS. Izvi zvakonzera kusawirirana munyika vamwe vachiti zvakanaka asi vamwe vachiti kwave kuita kwewashaya kutsvaga uta nemugate. Vachitaura kuVictoria Falls kumusangano wemhuka dzemusango kana kuti Africa World Summit, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaudza vanhu kuti Zimbabwe yave nyika yagadzikana sezvo yave nemari yayo. Vati vanofanira kuroverwa maoko kuti vakwanisa kudzora dhora remunyika. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvezvehupfum, VaTendai Biti, vanova mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, vanoti danho rakatorwa nehurumende harishandi zvachose. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMavambo Kusile Dawn, Dr Simba Makoni, avo vakambovewo gurukota rezvemari. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paNelson Mandela Metropolitan University, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vatiwo zviri kuitwa nehurumende hazvinapundutso. VaMakoni vanoti zviri pachena kuti chiriporipocho chakaitwa nehurumende munongedzo wekuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka vachiti nyaya yevashandi vehurumende vainge vati vanoda mari yekuAmerica yemuhoro ndizvo zvapa kuti hurumende ibve yachinja mutemo. Dr Makoni vanotiwo zvakaitwa nehurumende hazvisi pamutemo sezvo yaifanira kutanga yaenda kudare reparamende kunovandudza mutemo wakadzikwa muna 2009 kuti mari dzose dzishandiswe munyika kusanganisira yeAmerica, South Africa, Botswana nedzimwe. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa naVaBiti avo vati vambosimudza nyaya iyi mudare reparamende. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanoti zvakaitwa nehurumende hazvina kuipa. Mashoko aVaJokonya atsinhirwawo namuzvinabhizimisi VaGilbert Muponda, avo vanova nhengo yeZanu PF yakakwikwidza ikakundikana musarudzo yekutsvaga mumiriri weWarren Park muparamende. Asi Dr Makoni vanoti zvinoshamisawo kuti sei gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vari kuchinja chinja. Muzvinafundo Mugano vanotiwo zvaitwa izvi zvikasabudirira VaNcube vanenge vazvikanda mukanwa mamupere. Zimbabwe yakapedzisira kushandisa mari yayo chete muna 2009 sezvo dhora range ranyanyaya kushaya simba. Ko zvaitwa zvingashande here? Vanopikisa vanoti kupedzera hoko padehwe retsindi. Asi vehurumende vanoti imbwa hora haifunidzi nhando. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inodzikisa Mutengo wePasipoti yeChimbichimbi
text: Hurumende yazivisa kuti yadzikisa mari inobhadharwa pakutora mapasipoti zvechichimbi asi yawedzera mari inobhadharwa pamapasipoti anononoka kubuda. Gurukota rinoona nezvinotika mukati menyika, VaKazembe Kazembe, vazivisa kubudikidza nemutemo weStatutory Instrument 16 of 2022, kuti mapasipoti echimbichimbi kana kuti emergence passports, ayo anga achitorwa nemadhora ekuAmerica mazana matatu ane gumi nemasere ($318), ave kutorwa nemadhora mazana maviri ekuAmerica. Muchiziviso ichi, hurumende yakwidza mari yepasipoti inononoka kubuda, kana normal passport, kubva pamadhora makumi mashanu nematatu kusvika pazana rimwechete remadhora ekuAmerica. Mari iyi ndiyo imwecheteyo ichange ichibhadharwa kana munhu achida kutora pasipoti yechizvinozvino, kana kuti e-passport, yakaparurwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa mwedzi wapera. Pamusoro pemari iyi, VaKazembe vatiwo veruzhinji vachange vachisungirwa kubhadhara mari inoita madhora makumi maviri ekuAmerica kuti vawane iri kudaidzwa kuti Quick Response Code inoita kuti ma e-passport akwanise kuverengeka pamichina yechimanjemanje yave kushandiswa nedzimwe nyika. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Muzvare Tabeth Madziva, vati vafara zvikuru nekudzikiswa kwemari yekutora mapasipoti echimbichimbi vachiti mari yanga ichibhadhariswa nehurumende pakutora mapasipoti aya yanga yakawandisa. Asi umwe mugari wekuEpworth, VaKennedy Mazivanhanga, vati havasi kufara nekukwidzwa kwaitwa mari yekutora pasipoti isiri yechimbichimbi nemadhora makumi mana nemanomwe ekuAmerica. Mutauriri wemubatanidzwa wemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaObert Masaraure, vati hurumende inofanira kutora matanho ekuti vanhu vakwanise kuwana magwaro ose zviri nyore kubva kumagwaro ekuzvarwa, zvitupa kusvika kumapasipoti. VaMasaraure vatiwo veruzhinji vari kurasikirwa nemikana yakawanda kunze kwenyika nekuti vanenge vasina magwaro ekufambisa sezvo vazhinji vasina magwaro ekufambisa. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaKazembe sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nhare dzavo pamwe nevekumahofisi amabharani mukuru, kana kuti Registrar General, kuti tinzwe kuti vachadzikisa here mutengo wemapaspipoti zvakare uye kuti matanho api avachatora pane avo vane mapasipoti asati abuda vave nenguva vakamirira mapasipoti avo. Asi munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vakanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter kuti michina yekudhinda mapasipoti echizvinozvino inokwanisa kudhinda mapasipoti zviuru makumi matatu (30 000) pazuva zvichireva kuti michina iyi ikatanga kushandiswa Zimbabwe inokwanisa kudhindira vanhu vose vakamirira mapasipoti avo vanofungidzirwa kuti vanosvika zviuru mazana maviri mukati memavhiki maviri. No media source currently available

headline: Makurukota eHurumende Osangana neVashandi Kuti Vazeye Nyaya dzeMari yeMihoro Iyo Yonoka Kuuya
text: Makurukota ehurumende anoti rezvehupfumi, rehutano uye revashandi vehurumende vapinda mumusangano muHarare nevesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reApex Council kuti vazeye nyaya dzekunonoka kwemari yemihoro. Hurumende yakazivisa svondo rapera kuti ichanonoka kutambirsa vashandi vayo mari izvo zvapa kuti paite ropa rakaipa pakati payo nevashandi ava vamwe vachiti vave kuronga kuratidzira. Nekuda kwekuvharwa kwemakambani akawanda munyika gurukota rezvevashandi Amai Prisca Mupfumira vanoti hurumende yave kuwana mari shoma kubva kumutero zvopa kuti itadze kubhadhara vashandi. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti nyaya yehuori ndiyo yapa kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire nerongo munyika. Musangano uyu uri kuenderera mberi parizvino sezvo wanonoka kutanga.

headline: Chikwata cheIMF Chinopeta Rwendo kuZimbabwe Chichirumbidza Mabatirwo eHupfumi, Asi Chichiti Haisati Yave Kukodzera Kupiwa Rubatsiro Rwemari
text: Chikwata che International Monetary Fund (IMF) chichitungamirirwa naVaDhaneshwar Ghura, neMuvhuro chakapeta rwendo rwacho rwemazuva masere muZimbabwe, umo chaiita hurukuro nevakuru vehurumende, vakuru vebhanga guru renyika pamwe nevemabhizimusi pamusoro peshanduko dziri kuitika mune zvehupfumi pamwe nemamiriro ahwo. Mugwaro ravakaburitsa mushure mekupeta rwendo urwu, VaGhura vakati hupfumi hweZimbabwe hwaratidza kusimba kukuru nekumuka kwahwo munguva yakaoma. Vakati hondo iri pakati peRussia neUkraine, kusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura pamwe nemitengo yezvinhu iri pamusoro zviri kukanganisa hupfumi nemagariro evanhu muZimbabwe, izvo zvakasakadzwa kare nedenda reCovid-19. IMF yakapembedzawo matanho ari kuitwa nehurumende ekudzikamisa mutengo wemari yekunze, asi ichitiwo panodiwa mamwe matanho ekunyatsodzikamisa hupfumi ane hupenyu hunoenda mberi. Kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe yakapembedzwa neIMF nekukwanisa kubhadhara chikwereti chayo kuIMF muna 2016, sangano rinokweretsa mari iri rakati haisati yasvika pakuti ikwanise kupiwa rubatsiro rwemari nekuda kwekukundikana kubhadra kwayo zvikwereti zvayo zvekunze. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi pamwe nekudyidzana kwenyika dzepasi rose, Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vanoti zvinofadza chose kuti IMF yakarumbidza Zimbabwe nematanho ayakatora ekukwanisa kuraramisa hupfumi hwenyika, panguva iyo dzimwe nyika pasi rose dzaitarisana nematambudziko aitosvitsa pakubviswa kwevatungamiri pazvigaro. Asi Muzvinafundo Masocha vanoti havaoni hurumende ichibudirira kuzdzisa zvayakakomekedzwa kuti izadzise nekuti zvinhu zvave nemakore ichiudzwa nezvazvo asi isina matanho ainotora. No media source currently available

headline: Vechidiki Voita Ongororo Inobata Kushaikwa kweMari Munyika
text: Apo veruzhinji vari kuramba vachinetseka nekushaya mari mumabhangi rimwe sangano revechidiki muBulawayo ratanga chirongwa chekuita ongororo yematambudziko akasiyana siyana ari kusangana nevanhu nekuda kwekushandiswa kwema bond notes munyika. Vechidki ava vanoti chinangwa chavo ndechekuzoendesa tsvakurudzo yavo kubhanga guru renyika senzira yekuedza kubatsira kupedza matambudziko aya.\n\nMukuru wesangano reYouth Economic Forum, VaFarikai Masiyamhuru, vanoti sangano ravo raona zvakakodzera kuita tsvagiridzo pamusoro pematambudziko ari kutarisana neveruzhinji kubva mukushaikwa kuri kuitwa mari mumabhangi. VaMasiyamhuru vati vakazivisa Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe nezvechirongwa chavo vachiti zvakakosha kuti vanhu munyika vaise misoro pamwe chete mukuedza kuwana nzira dzekupedza dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari munyika. VaMasiyamhuru, avo vanoshandira imwe kambani hombe inogadzira nekutengesa mbatya, vanoti vakatanga sangano reYouth Economic Forum nevamwe vavo gore rakapera nechinangwa chekupa vechidiki mikana yekuti vazeye nezvemagariro evanhu uye nezvehupfumi ukuwo sangano iri richishanda sechipangamazano munyaya idzi. VaChirenje Moyo avo vanove nhengo yesangano reYouth Economic Forum vati senzira yekuita ongororo yavo vanenge vachitaura neveruzhinji vachivabvunza zvavari kusangana nazvo zuva nezuva mukutsvaga mari kumabhangi. VaMoyo vanoti kunze kwekunetseka kuwana mari mumabhanga mamwe matambudziko avatonzwa kubva kuvanhu munguva pfupi yavatanga chirongwa chavo anosanganisira kuti vakuru vakuru vemabhangi akasiyana siyana havautaure nevanhu vachivatsanangurira zvizere pamusoro pedambudziko rekushomeka kwemari. Vatiwo vakawanda vari kuchema nerekuti mukutsvaga mari kumabhangi vari kurasikirwa nenguva yakakura pamwe nemari shoma yavanenge vainayo. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, kana kusangano reBankers Association of Zimbabwe. Nyika yakatanga kushandisa mari yemabond notes muna Mbudzi gore rapera mushure mekunge mukuru weRBZ, VaJohn Mangudya, vachiti iyi yaive nzira yekubatsira kugadzirisa kushomeka kwemari yekunze munyika uye zvaizoitika kwenguva pfupi. VaMangudya vakatiwo ma bond notes akatadza kushanda zvakanaka, vaizosiya basa. Zimbabwe yakatanga kushandisa mari yekunze mugore ra2009 mushure mekunge mari yemunyika yapera simba rekutenga. VaMasiyamhuru vati maonero avo ndeekuti nyika inofanirwa kuve nemari yayo asi mari iyi inofanirwa kuunzwa kana mamiriro ezvehupfumi agadziriswa uye veruzhinji vachinyatsoziviswa zvizere pamusoro penyaya iyi. VaMasiyamhuru vati vanotarisira kupedza ongororo yavo mukati memasvondo maviri vobva vaendesa zvavanenge vawana kuRBZ. Mutevedzeri wemukuru wesangano reCentre for Public Engagement, vachitaura semuongorori wezvematongerwo enyika akazvimirira ega, VaButler Tambo, vanoti vanhu munyika vane tsika yekufira mumbereko semwana asingacheme vachiti zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vakwanise kutaura pachena pamusoro pematambudziko avakatarisana nawo kunyanya panyaya yekushaikwa kwemari munyika. Vanhu munyika pavakabvunzwa kuti vanoda kuti mabond notes ashandiswe here kana kuti kwete, vakawanda vakati kwete asi hurumende yakaenderera mberi nekuunza mari iyi ichiti izvi zvaizobatsira kushaikwa kwemari munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Harare Agriculture Show Yotanga
text: Kuratidzirwa kwezvirimwa, mabhizimisi nemamwe mabasa paHarare Agricultural Show kwakatanga nemusi weMuvhuro muHarare vanoronga showa vachikurudzira veruzhinji kupinda muchiitiko ichi kuti vawane mikana yekutanga mabhizimisi pamwe nekusimudzira mabasa ekurima. Sachigaro veZimbabwe Agricultural Society, varongi veHarare Agricultural Show, VaIvan Craig, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti huwandu hwevari kuratidza zvirimwa, mabhizimisi nemabasa hwakakwira nezvikamu gumi nezviviri kubva muzana gore rino uye vanotarisira kuti show yegore rino ichanikidza kudarika gore rapfuura. Vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vaende kuHarare Agricultural Show uko vati kunodzidzwa zvakawanda pane nekutandara. VaCraig vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanofara chose kuti varimi vakaunza zvipfuwo nembeu dzemhando yepamusoro gore rino. Vatiwo kunze kwekudzidza zvekurima nemabhizimisi, kuchange kuine mafaro nevaimbi vakawanda pamwe nekutandadzwa nevamauto, mapurisa nezvikwata zvakasiyana siyana. Mukutandara imomo veBuy Zimbabwe avo vanokurudzira kugadzirwa nekutengeswa kwezvinhu munyika vanoti vachange vachishambadzawo zvinhu zvinogadzirwa muno. Mukuru weBuy Zimbabwe Zimbabwe, VaMunyaradzi Hwengwere, vaudza Studio 7 kuti gore rino vachange vachisanganisa mafaro nekupemberera hunyanzvi hwevana vemuZimbabwe. Imwe kambani iri kuratidzira gore rino IFlying Leopard Limited limited iyo inogadzira midziyo inorerutsira vanhu kutakura zvinhu yakaita semabhara anodhonzwa nemabhasikoro. VaDuncan Nyathi vanoti midziyo yavanogadzira inokwanisawo kushandiswa nevanhu vanoita mabhizimisi echidiki vakaita sevanotengesa mumigwagwa.
