Show yegore rino iyo iri kuitwa pasi pedingindira rekuti Field to Industry: Produce. Connect Develop ichavhurwa zviri pamutemo nemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemusi weChishanu. Varimi nevamabhizimisi vanotarisirwa kubuda nemibairo inosvika zana rezviuru zviuru zvemadhora gore rino. Gore rapfuura vanhu zviuru mazana maviri (200 000) vakapinda muHarare Agricultural Show uye gore rino panotarisirwa kuti pachapinda vanhu zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu. (250 000).

headline: Rimwe Sangano reVarimi Rotsigira Hurongwa hweKubhadhara Vachena Vakatorerwa Minda
text: Rimwe sangano revarimi reZimbabwe Farmers Union (ZFU), rinoti rinotambira nemufaro hurongwa hwehurumende hwekuti varimi vatema vari mumapurazi akatorerwa vachena vabhadhare mitero ichashandiswa mukuripa vachena ava budiriro dzavakanga vaita pamapurazi avo. Mukuru weZFU, VaPaul Zakariya vanoti kubhadhara zvivakwa nebudiriro zvakasiya zvaitwa nevachena ava kunopa varimi vechitema ava chiremera chekuti vakabhadhara zvavari kushandisa, kwete kuti vakaita zvekubvuta. “Handiona sekuti chingave chinhu chingaremera vanhu kuti vave ne ownership yakadzika pamusoro peminda yavanenge vachishandisa. Idanho rinokwanisa kuti ritipe chiremera munharaunda yatinogara uyewo nepasi rose kuti vakanga varipo paminda iyoyo vakabhadharwa,” VaZakariya vanodaro. VaZakariya vanoti kubhadhara kwavari kuita mari idzi kuburikidza nemitero iri kubhadhariswa varimi vakagariswa patsva ava hakusi kuti vari kutenga ivhu ravari kurima kwete. “Varimiri vanenge vachibhadhara zvivakwa nebudiriro dzakaitwa nevachena ava, kwete kuti tiri kutenga ivhu redu, kwete.” Mukutanga kwemwedzi uno gurukota rezveupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa vakazivisa kuti hurumende yakanga yave kutanga kuita ongororo mumapurazi kuti ione kukosha kwakaita budiriro dzakasiiwa nevachena vakatorerwa mapurazi ava. Vakati izvi ndizvo zvinozovapa ruzivo rwekuti murimi oga oga obhadhara marii, uye murimi wechichena akabviswa papurazi apa anozopiwawo marii. Kutanga muna 2000, vachena vanodarika zviuru zvina vanonzi vakabviswa zvine chisimba pamapurazi avo achipiwa kune vatema, asi minda mizhinji yakararira nekuda kwekushaiwa zvikwanisiro kwevarimi vatsva ava. No media source currently available

headline: Vatori veNhau Voyambira Kuti Mitemo Mitsva Iri KUrongwa Isavambunyikidze
text: Sangano reMedia Alliance of Zimbabwe rinoti rinoda kuti mitemo ine chekuita nezvenhau isambunyikidze vatori venhau kuitira kuti vashande vakasununguka nguva dzose. Mashoko aya anouya apo nyika iine hurongwa hwekuvandudza mitemo inobata kutorwa kwenhau. Pamusangano wayaita nevatori venhau muHarare neChipiri, Media Alliance of Zimbabwe yati kodzero dziri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika dzinofanirwa kuzadziswa. MAZ yati inoshungurudzikana zvikuru nekusungwa, kurohwa pamwe nekuvhiringwa kunoitwa vatapi venhau munyika. Gweta rinoshanda neMedia Institute of Southern Africa – Zimbabwe Chapter, VaKuda Hove, vati basa rekutapa nhau harifanirwe kutorwa semhosva uye vanotarisira kuti mitemo mitsva ine chekuita nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko igadzirise dambudziko iri. Hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa inoti ine chido chekubvisa mutemo we Access to Information and Protection of Privacy Act, kuvandudza Broadcasting Services Act nemitemo ine chekuita nezvekushandiswa kwemadandemutande - Cyber Security Laws. Hurumende inoti ichaunza mitemo mitatu mitsva ine chekuita nezvekutapwa kwenhau uye pakatotanga hurukuro. Bazi rinoona nezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, richitsigirwa nezvipangamazano mukunyorwa kwemitemo mubazi rezvemitemo, riri mubishi rekunyorabhiri rekuvandudza mutemo we Information, Broadcasting Services Ammendment Bill pamwe neZimbabwe Media Commission Bill. VaHove vatiwo vari kutarisira kuti hurumende igadzirise zvavakataura pamusoro pemutemo iyi zvinosanganisira kuti vanhu vanoda kutanga terevhizeni kana radio stations, havafanirwi kupiwa mari pachena anonzi madonations. Vatiwo vari kushushikanawo kuti Zimbabwe Media Commission iri kupiwa masimba ekusungisa vanhu vanenge vakanganisa zvine chekuita nenhau. Vachitaurawo vakamirira zvakare MAZ, VaNigel Nyamutumbu, vati kunyange hazvo vachigamuchira zviri kuitwa, uye vari kupindawo mumisangano ine chekuita nekuvandudzwa kwemitemo iyi, vakangomirira kuona kuti hurumende ichazadzikisa here zvainovimbisa. Kunyange hazvo tisina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kugurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, makurukota ari kuona nezvekunyorwa kwemitemo iyi akazivisa patwitwer svondo rapera kuti vaive vakaungana kuNyanga nevane chekuita nezvekodzero dzekufambiswa kwemashoko zvakasununguka vachikurukura mitemo iyi. Hurumende inotiwo mitemo iyi inofanirwa kuti ifambirane nezviri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika. Asi MAZ inotiwo kuchine mitemo yakawanda inobata vatori venhau nekufambiswa kwemashoko kwakasununguka inofanirwa kutariswa. Mitemo iyi inosanganisira Official Secrets Act, Censorship and Entertainment Act, Criminal Law Codification and Reform Act pamwe ne Interception of Communications Act. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vosvika kuBotswana Kunonyorerana Zvibvumirano zveKudyidzana naVaMosisi
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vasvika kuBotswana kumusangano wekudyidzana unoitwa mukati memakore maviri nenyika iyi kana kuti Bi-National Commission. VaMnangagwa vaenda nemakurukota anosanganisira rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko amai monica mutsvangwa uye rezvehutano dr obadiah moyo. Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana vati nhaurirano dzakatanga nemusi weChipiri uye mangwana VaMnangagwa nemumwe wavo VaMokgweetsi Masisi vachava zvapupu pakunyoreranwa kwezvibvumirano zvatenderanwa. Zvibvumirano zviri munyaya dzezvekutengeserana, dzidzo uye nyaya dzezvehutano. No media source currently available

headline: SADC Inoti Yakwanisa Kudzikamisa Zvinhu kuMozambique muHondo neVanopfurikidza Mwero
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nezuro vakabatana nevatungamiri venyika dziri muSADC Troika uye dzakatumira mauto kuMozambique kunorwisa vanopfurikidza mwero mudunhu reCabo Delgado. Mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa ndivo vaive sachigaro pamusangano waiirirwa padandemutande uyu. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau SADC yakati ichibatsirwa nemauto eRwanda yakwanisa kudzikamisa zvinhu mudunhu iri kunyangwe paine kurwisana pano neapo asi ikati yave kubatsira kuunza budiriro mudunhu iri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paAfrica University kwaMutare Doctor Iris Shiripinda vaudza Studio 7 kuti vamwe vatungamiri venyika yemuSADC haisi kunyatsozvipira kupedza hondo yemuMozambique sezvo vachitia sekunge vanoona chouviri pazviri. No media source currently available

headline: Mamwe Makambani Ozorwa Mafuta eNguruve Yaasina Kudya paNyaya yeKuburitswa kweMari Kunze kweNyika
text: Vamwe vana muzvinabhizinesi vari kushora zvikuru hurumende nekubudisa mazita evanhu nemakambani anonzi akabudisa mari kunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo vachiti hurumende haina kuita tsvakiridzo yakakwana sezvo vamwe vane mazita akabudiswa vasina mhosva dzavakapara. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano wakokerwa neZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce neChina muHarare vamwe vemabhizimusi vachiti vakasvibiswa mazita avo zvakanyanya nehurumende izvo zvokanganisa mabhizimusi avo. Mukuru weGlobal Solar LED Bulbs, VaJeffree Rugare, vati vakatoshamiswa vachiona kambani yavo yakanyorwa pavanhu vanonzi vakabuditsa mari asi ivo vachizvichenura panyaya iyi. VaRugare vaudza musangano uyu kuti chinonyanyovarwadza ndechekuti izvi zvakasvibisa kambani yavo kunyange hazvo vachiti hazvina chokwadi mukati. Mukuru weZNCC, VaChristopher Mugaga, vatiwo shuviro yavo ndeyekuti zvabuda mumusangano wavaita zvisvike kumutungamiri wenyika kuti azive kuti vamwe vevari kupomerwa kubudisa mari zvisiri pamutemo vakachena panyaya idzi. VaMugaga vatiwo mabhizimusi ari kunyunyutawo zvikuru achiti hurumende inenge iri kukoshesa mabhizimusi ekunze ichitsikirira vemabhizimusi emuZimbabwe. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaTerence Mukupe,vati hurumende yakaita zvayaifunga kuti ndozvingabatsira nyika. VaMukupe vati vose vari kuti vakachena vanofanirwa kutora matanho ekuratidza humbowo hwekuti havana mhosva. Vachipindura kunyaya iri kupomerwa hurumende yaVaMnangagwa yekuti vanhu vakabudisa mari zhinji huye vachizivikanwa munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika havana kunyorwa mazita avo, VaMukupe vati vanhu vane ruzivo nezvevamwe vakabudisa mari ngavazivise hutungamiriri pamwe nemapurisa. Gweta rine mukurumbira munyika, VaTendai Biti, vatiwo mutemo yenyika haina kugadziriswa zvakakwana kuti ubate vanobudisa mari, uye vakurudzira kuti kunyatsonyorwa mutemo unobata vanobudisa mari. Vemabhizimusi vatiwo hapana tsananguro yakazara inoratidza kuti chinonzi externalization yemari chii huye chii chinonzi nehurumende “Illicit Financial Flows.” No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru dzeChitungwiza neHarare Dzoenderera Mberi Dzichiputsa Zvivakwa Zvisiri paMutemo
text: Makanzuru eHarare neChitungwiza nhasi aenderera mberi nekupwanyira vanhu midziyo yavo achiti zvivakwa izvi zviri kunze kwemutemo. Panguva yanga ichiitika izvi, dare repamusoro reHigh Court ranga richinzwa chikumbiro chekuti kupwanywa kwezvivakwa izvi kumiswe. Kanzuru yeHarare ichishanda pamwechete nemapurisa nhasi yapwanya zvivakwa zvevanotengesera mumigwagwa pamwe nedzimwe nzvimbo dzinotengeserwa motokari kuMbudzi round-about ukuwo kanzuru yeChitungwiza ichipwanyawo zvimwe zvivakwa zvakadai mudhorobha iri. Mutungamiri wesangano revanotengesera mumigwagwa reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VaSamuel Wadzai, vati sangano ravo rarwadziwa zvikuru nedanho ratorwa nekanzuru yeHarare. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vaudza Studio7 kuti kanzuru yavo haisi kuzoramba yakapeta maoko vanhu vachiita madiro aJojina muguta ravo. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reChitungwiza Residents Trust, Muzvare Alive Kuveya, vati kanzuru yemudhorobha ravo yakabvira nezuro kupwanyira vanhu midziyo yavo. Muzvare Kuveya vatiwo chiri kuvarwadza ndechekuti vamwe vari kupwayirwa zvivakwa zvavo ivo vachibhadhara mitero kukanzuru vachiti pari zvino havachazive chekubata sevagari. Meya wedhorobha reChitungwiza, VaLovemore Maiko, vati zviri kuitwa izvi hazvisi kuitwa nekanzuru iri yoga vachiti chirongwa ichi chirongwa chiri kuitwa nemapazi ehurumende akawanda. VaWadzai vakurudzira hurumende kuti itange yatarisa raramo yevanhu pakatariswa kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi hwenyika kwete kuti imhanyire kutorera veruzhinji chingwa chiri pamuromo. Panguva yanga ichipwanya zvivakwa zviri muHarare neChitungwiza, dare repamusoro iro ranga richifanira kunzwa chikumbiro cheChitrest chekuti kupwanywa kuri kuitwa zvivakwa izvi kumbomiswa rati richazonzwa chikumbiro ichi nemusi weChina. VaTafadzwa Muguti, vanove Provincial Development Coordinator wedunhu reHarare vakaburitsa mashoko nezuro vachiti chirongwa chekupwanya zvivakwa zviri kushanda zviri kunzwe kwemutemo chichaitwa muHarare, Chitungwiza neRuwa senzira yekuchenesa dunhu reHarare. Zvichakdai, rimwe sangano rinomirira vagari vemuHarare, reCombined Harare Residents Association, raburitsa mashoko richikurudzira hurumende kuti isiye makanzuru aite zvisungo zvawo ega kwete kuaudza zvekuita. Pakamboitwa chirongwa chakadai muna 2005 icho chaidaidzwa kuti Operation Murambatsvina, nhume yeUnited Nations, Amai Anna Kajumulo Tibaijuka, vakati chirongwa ichi chakasiya vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana manomwe (700 000) vasina pekugara uye zvekudya. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inotadza Kuzivisa Vashandi Vayo Mazuva eMihoro yaChikunguru
text: Hurumende inonzi yakundikana zvakare kuzivisa vashandi vayo mazuva avachawana mihoro yaChikunguru. Izvi zvinotevera musangano unonzi washevedzerwa negurukota rezvevashandi nemabasa Amai Priscah Mupfumira wapindwa nehutungamiri hwe vashandi, uyo unonzi wapera usina chasungwa. Amai Mupfumira vanonzi vazivisa hutungamiri uhwu kuti musangano uyu wanga wakangonangana nekuvazivisa mamiriro akaita zvinhu panyaya yemihoro yavo, uye nekuti hurumende iri kuedza napose painogona kuti itambirise vashandi vayo paine nguva. Sachigaro weApex Council Amai Cecilia Alexander vanoti Amai Mupfumira wavavimbisa kuti vachasangana navo zvakare neChishanu svondo rino kuti vavape mazuva emihoro aya. “Tanosangana na minister, asi kuti hatina kuenda seApex Council, vanga vandidaidza ini semutungamiri wevashandi ndikaendawo ne leadership yedu, vachida kuti vatiudze kuti vasvika papi nema dates eJuly salaries ,” Amai Alexander vanoti vachamirira kunzwa neChishanu ichocho, asi vachazosanganawo sevashandi nemusi weMuvhuro vachizeya zvinenge zvabva kugurukota. Vashandi vehurumende vanositanga kutambira mari vakaita semauto, vasori nemapurisa vanonzi havasati vawana mihoro yavo yemwedzi uno. Hurumende iri kutatarika kuwana mari izvo zvakakonzera kuti ikundikane kubhadhara vashandi vayo nenguva mwedzi wapera. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kuumba Hwaro hweKubata Mari Dzinobva Kune Vari Kunze
text: Nhengo yeZanu PF, VaNick Mangwana, vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuumba hwaro hunoita kuti ikwanise kubata mari dzinobva kuzvizvarwa zvenyika zviri kunze kwenyika, kuburikidza nekuisa boka revari kunze kwenyika pasi pebazi rimwechete, kwete zviri kuitika pari zvino zvekuti mapazi anodarika mashanu anofunga kuti vari kunze vari pasi pawo. Kurudziro iyi inouya zvichitevera kurudziro yemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, mukutanga kwesvondo rino vari kuEthiopia yekuti vana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika vabatsire mukuvaka nyika kuburikidza nekutumira mari kumusha pamwe nekuita zvirongwa zvebudiriro. VaMugabe vakapa muenzaniso weEthiopia iyo vakati yakwanisa kuita zvivakwa zvakawanda pamwe nebudirio nekuda kwezvizvarwa zvayo zvakawanda zviri kunze kwenyika. VaMangwana vanotiwo kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze zvikwanisewo kupiwa mikana yakaenzana nevari kumusha, zvinofanirwawo kubatirwa mitero inoenda muhomwe yehurumende, sezvinoitwa nevedzimwe nyika. Asi zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvinoti zvinosvibiswa mwoyo nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kweupfumi hwenyika, zvematongerwo enyika pamwe nekusajekeswa kwemimwe mitemo yenyika. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachitaura vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti vamwe vanotumira mari kumusha havashandisi mabhanga zvakanyanya nekushaiwa chivimbo nawo. VaKuchera vanotiwo mari inobhadhariswa nemakambani anoshandiswa kutumira mari kumusha yakawanda zvikuru, izvo zvinozoita kuti vanhu vashandise dzimwe nzira dzakaita sekutumira mari nevatyairi vemabhazi nezvimwe zvakadaro. Zvizvarwa zvenyika zviri kunze zvinonzi gore rapera zvakatumira mari inosvika $840 million, iyo inonzi yakabatsira nyika zvakanyanya sezvo iri kunetsekana kuwana mari. No media source currently available

headline: Nyaya yeHurumende Yekumanikidza Makombi Kushanda neZUPCO Yokonzera Mutauro
text: Danho rehurumende rekuda kumanikidza vose vane makombi kuti vashande vari pasi pekambani yeZUPCO iyo iri kutatarikawo rakonzera mutauro wakanyanya munyika. Vamwe vanoti iri idanho rakanaka asi vamwe vachiti uku kukoka mhepo wakatakura mamera mutswanda. Pari zvino ZUPCO ndiyo chete iri kubvumidzwa kutakura vanhu munguva ino yecoronavirus. Vachitaura kuruzhinji neMugovera nezvematanho ekurwisa chirwere checoronavirus, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakati ZUPCO chete ndiyo inobvumidzwa kushanda parizvino. Gurukota rinoona nezvematunhu VaJuly Moyo vakamboudzawo nhepfenyuro yeZBC kuti vemakombi kana vachida zvekutakura vanhu vanofanira kushanda vachiita mushandirapamwe neZUPCO. Vamwe muhurumende vanoti mudhorobha vemakombi vange voita madiro aJojina vakaisa miswe nekoko uye kuda kuvati vatakure vanhu vashoma nguva ino kusiya mapera akarinda chitunha. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwa nemutauriri wesangano reChitungwiza Commuter Omnibus Operators Association, VaFarai Muza vanoti zvinobatsira veruzhinji vemakombi vakashanda neZUPCO. Asi mumwe ane makombi, Bishop Shelton Mudyaro veShekkaianah Glory Ministries Global vanoti zvekushanda vari pasi peZUPCO hazvina zvazvinovabatsira vachiti kambani iyi inovapa mari dzemaRTGS asi vachida mari yekunze kutenga zvekugadzirisa motokari dzavo kana dzisiri kushanda zvakanaka. Pose panorwa nzou, huswa ndihwo hunonzwa nekutsokodzerwa, kunetsana kwevamakombi nehurumende kwapa kuti vashandi vaomwere nezvinhu sematauriro emunyori mukuru musangano reZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vanoti vashandi vave kusvika kumba pakati pehusiku nekuda kwekushaya zvekufambisa. Mutungamiri wesangano revanotakurwa nemabhazi nemakombi rePassanger Association of Zimbabwe VaTafadzwa Goliati vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kune veruzhinji vave kumanikidzwa kukwira marori zvinogona kupa kuti vatapurirwe zvirwere sezvo vamwe vemarori vasiri kuvhenekwa hutachina hwecoronavirus kunyangwe vachingofamba famba. No media source currently available

headline: Mamwe Masangano eVarairidzi Anonyorera Mutungamiri weNyika Tsamba Achisvitsa Zvichemo zveVarairidzi
text: Nhengo dzerimwe sangano revarairidzi, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, dzapinda mumigwagwa dzichiratidzira pamwe nekusiya gwaro renyunyuto kumahofisi akasiyanasiyana richikurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise zvinyunyuto zvevarairidzi. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure vanoti gwaro iri, iro ranyorerwa kumutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, rasiiwa muzvikoro, kubazi redzidzo, kubazi revashandi nemabasa, pamwe nekumahofisi emutungamiri wenyika, uye rine zvinyunyuto zvitatu zvanoda kuti zvikasike kugadziriswa nehurumende. VaMasaraure vanoti zvichemo zvavo zviri pamusoro pemihoro yavo iyo vanoda kuti idzoserwe pamari dzavaitambira muna 2018, kuchengetedzeka kwehutano hwevarairidzi nevadzidzi muzvikoro kubva kuCovid-19, uyewo kuti hurumende ibatsire vana vasiri kukwanisa kubhadhara mari dzechikoro kuburikidza nekuvaisa muchirongwa che Basic Education Assistance Module, BEAM. Izvi zviri kuitikawo panguva iyo masangano evarairidzi manomwe ari pasi pemubatanidzwa we Federation of Zimbabwe Education Unions (FOZEU) anyorawo gwaro kuna VaMnangagwa achiti ari kushushikana nekuparara kwaita zvinhu muzvikoro, uye kwaanoti kushaya han;ya kwehurumende kugadzirisa nyaya dzemihoro yevarairidzi. VaMasaraure vanoti kana hurumende yakakundikana kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo vacharambawo vachingoratidzira. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvevashandi nemabasa, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima kuti tinzwewo divi ravo. Asi neSvondo VaMavima vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti hurumende iri kugadzirisa zvichemo zvevashandi vayo zvemihoro, vachiti iri kuronga kuvapa zvikamu makumi manomwe nezvishanu kubva muzana kubva mwedzi uno kusvika muna Chikumi. Vamiriri vevashandi vari pasi pesangano reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions svondo rapera vakaramba kutambira zvikamu makumi maviri nezvishanu kubva muzana zvakanga zvaiswa patafura nehurumende. Mutauriri webazi rezvedzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro vanoti varairidzi havafanirwe zvavo kutya kudzokera kumabasa nekuti bazi ravo rakaisa hurongwa hwekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hweCovid-19 muzvikoro. VaNdoro vanotiwo hurumende yagara ichibatsira vana vanotambura kuburikidza nehomwe yeBEAM saka hazvisi zvinhu zvingatadzisa varairidzi kudzokera kumabasa sezvo paine hurongwa hwekubatsira vanoshaya nechakare. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: Vanorarama neKutengesa Voomerwa Munyika
text: Apo mamiriro ezvehupfumi munyika ari kuramba achienda kumawere, vanhu vakawanda munyika vave kuwana raramo nekutenga nekutengesa zvinhu zvakasiyana siyana. Ukuwo mabhizimisi anotiwo ave kutyira ramangwana rawo kana zvinhu zvikasachinja nekukasika sezvo vanhu vasisina simba rekutenga zvinogadzirwa nemabhizinesi aya. No media source currently available VaThomas Ngara murume ane makore makumi nemaviri ekuberekwa. VaNgara, avo vanorarama nekutengesa airtime, fodya, nezviwitsi mumigwagwa yeguta reBulawayo, vanoti vave nemakore anopfuura mashanu vachirarama nekutengesa uku mushure mekunge vapererwa nebasa pane imwe kambani yaigadzira mbatya yavaishandira. VaNgara vanoti mari yavanowana mukutengesa kwavanoita iri kuramba ichivaitira shoma pakuti vakwanise kuriritira mudzimai wavo nevana vaviri. Asi vanoti vari kuwana vachimanikidzwa kuramba vachitengesa nekuti hapana zvimwe zvekuita. VaDouglas Dube vanotengesawo pamwe chete naVaNgara uye vanotsinhirawo kuti nekuda kwemamiriro akaita zvehupfumi munyika, hupenyu huri kuramba huchivaomera zvekuti vanotyira kuti kana zvinhu zvikasachinja vachapedzisira vave kutadza kuendesa mwana wavo kuchikoro kana kuwana mari yekuti vakwanise kurarama zuva nezuva. Mukuru-mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Associations, Muzvare Musawenkosi Nyoni, vanoti vave nemakore anosvika gumi nematatu vachiita basa rekutenga nekutengesa mbatya pane imwe flea market iri muguta eBulawayo. Muzvare Nyoni vanoti vakakwanisa kuita zvinhu zvakwawanda zvinobatika mumakore apfuura. Asi pari zvino zvinhu zvave kuvaomera sezvo pave nevanhu vakawanda vanoita basa rekutengesa. Muzvare Nyoni vanoti sangano ravo rine nhengo dzinosvika zviuru gumi asi nekuda kwekuomerwa nehupenyu nhengo dzesangano iri dzakawanda dziri kutadza kubhadhara madhora matanhatu anobhadharwa pagore kuve nhengo yesangano iri. Muzvare Nyoni vanoti kunyange hazvo zvinhu zvakamboomera veruzhinji munyika mumakore a2007 na2008 muzvitoro musina chekutenga, izvi zvaive nani nekuti vanhu vaikwanisa kuwana mari yekunotenga zvinhu kunze kwenyika. Vanoti kuwoma kwezvinhu pari zvino kwakasiyana nekuti veruzhinji vari kunetseka nekuwana mari sezvo vanhu vakawanda vasiri pamabasa vachitiwo vanotyira kuti kana zvinhu zvikaramba zvichinetsa munyika munopedzisira maita mhirizhonga. Vemabhizmisi kana makambani kunyanya madiki vari kuchema-chemawo nenyaya yekuti mari haizi kubatika. Studio7 yakaedza kunzwa mamiriro akaita zvinhu mumabhzimisi asi sachigaro weZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, ZNCC, mudunhu reBulawayo, VaTshidzanani Malaba, vakati vaive vakabatikana uye vakatadza kupindura mubvunzo yavaive vati tivatumire vachiti vaive vakabatikana. Takakundikanawo kutaura nemutevedzeri wemukuru mukuru weZNCC mudunhu reMatabeleland, naVaCrispen Mugova, avo vakatiwo vaive vakabatikana. Asi munguva pfupi yapfuura sangano reZNCC rakakurudzira hurumende kuti itore matanho ekugadzirisa mamiriro ezvehupfumi munyika nekukasika richiti kusaita izvi kunogona kuunza matambudziko akapfurikidza munyika. Mukuru weimwe kambani inoita zvemagetsi, VaRegis Munyoro, vanoti zvinhu hazvina kuvamirira zvakanaka. VaMunyoro vanoti kambani yavo yave kunetseka pakuwana vekuitira basa vachitiwo pavanowana basa vavanenge vaitira mabasa vanonetseka pakubhadhara vamwe vachitotadza zvachose zvekuti ivo vanozonetsekawo pakubhadhara vashandi vavo pamwe nekutenga zvinhu zvinodiwa kuti vakwanise kuita basa ravo. Nekuda kwekuti makambani akawanda akavhara kana kuti ari kutatarika, hurumende yange yave kutarisira kuti vanhu vanogona kuwana raramo nekuzvishandira pachavo vega vachiita zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira kutenga nekutengesa pamwe nekuve nemakambani madiki anoita zvakadai sekugadzira midziyo yemumba yakaita semibhedha nemasofa nezvimwe zvakadaro. Asi nekuti kuzvishandira ndiyo yave raramo yavakawanda uye nekuti mari haizi kubatika, kuzvishandira uku hakuchawanise vanhu raramo yakanaka. Chipangamazano wesangano rePublic Research Institute of Zimbabwe iro rine muzinda waro muBulawayo, VaButler Tambo, vanobvuma kuti kana mamiriro ezvehupfumi munyika akasachinja hupfumi hwenyika hunogona kuramba huchiwondomoka zvekuti makambani achiri kushanda anogona kuvhara uye izvi zvinogona kukonzera matambudziko kumabhangi ari munyika ayo vanoti anogona kuzowondomokawo. VaTambo vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa nekukasika mitemo inokwezva vemabhizimisi vekunze kwenyika kuti vave nechido chekusima mari muZimbabwe vachitiwo Zimbabwe inofanirwa kugadzirisa hukama hwayo nenyika dzeku madokero pamwe chete nemabhangi eWorld Bank neInternational Monetary Fund. Vamwe vaongorori vezvehupfumi pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika vanoti kana hurumende ikasagadzisira zvinhu nekukasika, veruzhinji, avo vave kusvika pakupererwa nechekuita nekuda kwekutambura, vanogona kuzopedzisira vave kuita zvemhirizhonga senzira yekuratidza kutsutsumwa kwavo.

headline: Vashandi veNRZ neMhuri Dzavo Vorara paMahofisi eKambani Yavo muHarare Vachiratidzira
text: Vashandi vekambani yeNational Railways of Zimbabwe muHarare vari pakuramwa mabasa vanonzi vaungana nemhuri dzavo kumahofisi ekambani iyi ekuLochnivar, kuRugare vachiti havachina kwekugara, vamwe vachiti vakaburitswa mudzimba dzavairoja. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano rinomirira vashandi veNRZ reZimbabwe Amalgamated Railways Workers’ Union, ZARWU, VaKamurai Moyo vanoti madzimai evashandi ava nevana vavo vakabatana nevarume vavo kubva neChishanu chapfuura vachirara pamwe nekuswera panze pemahofisi ekambani iyi. Vanonzi vari kuda kuti NRZ ibhadhare mari dzavo dzemihoro dzemwedzi gumi nemishanu dzavasati varipwa, uyewo dzekubatsirika nekufamba dzavasati varipwa kwemwedzi mishanu. “Vashandi havana zvimwe zvavaikwanisa kuita kunze kwekuenda kunogara pakambani iyi sezvo pari ipo chete pavasingabhadhare rendhi,” vanodaro VaMoyo. Vanoti chimwe chakanyanya kutsamwisa vashandi idanho ravanoti rakatorwa nekambani yavo rekuenda kudare rinoona nezvemabasa ichida kuti vashandi vatsanangure zvikonzero zvavari kuramwira mabasa. “Panzvimbo yekuti vashandi vakwire ivo kumatare, kambani ndiyo yave kumhan’ara, zvakafanana nekuti munhu anenge akurova ndiye futi anomhanya kuno kukwirira kumatare,” VaMoyo vanodaro. Mutauriri weNRZ VaFanuel Masikati vatenda kuti vashandi vari pakuramwa mabasa uye vari kurara pamahofisi ekambani yavo muHarare. VaMasikati vaudza Studio 7 kuti kambani yavo ine chido kwazvo chekuti ibhadhare vashandi vayo asi mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzeupfumi ndiwo ari kuvatadzisa kuzadzisa chido ichi. Vati bhizimusi rekutakura vanhu pamwe nezvinhu iro rinosiraramisa NRZ mazuva ano rakadzikira zvikuru, vakati nhaurirano pakati pevashandi nevashandirwi dziri kuenderera mberi. Vashandi veNRZ muHarare, Mutare, Gweru neBulawayo vari kuramwa mabasa kubva svondo rapera vachida kubhadharwa mari dzavo idzi. No media source currently available

headline: Varairidzi Vopika kuti Vachaenderera Mberi neKuramwa Mabasa Panovhurwa Zvikoro
text: Sangano re Progressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe rinoti hurongwa hwekuratidzira nekuramwa mabasa kwevadzidzisi huri kuenderera mberi neChipiri panovhurwa zvikoro, sezvavakazivisa, kunze kwekunge hurumende yauya nezvibvumirano zvinotambirika pamusoro pezvinyunyuto zvevarairidzi. Zvinyunyuto izvi zvinonzi zvinosanganisira kuda kuti vawedzerwe mari, kubvumidzwa kuti vaende pazororo, kubviswa kwezvematongerwo enyika muzvikoro, uye kudzorerwa kwemari dzinopiwa varairidzi kana vachiita mamwe mabasa ari pamusoro pekudzidzisa kwavanoita. Hurumende yakatozivisa kuti ichatora matanho ekudzinga mabasa vose varairidzi vachapinda mukuramwa mabasa kuri kukurudzirwa uku. Asi mutungamiriri wesangano iri, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti havabvumi kuvhundutsirwa nekutyisidzirwa sezvo bumbiro remitemo richivabvumidza kuita izvi. Hurumende yakazivisa kuti ichaita musangano neMuvhuro nevamiriri vesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reApex Council, wekuzeya nezvezvichemo zvevashandi vehurumende. Asi mamwe masangano evarairidzi, anosanganisira PTUZ neZIMTA, anoti akabuda muApex Council akaumba sangano reFederation Of Zimbabwe Educators’ Unions (FOZEU), kuitira kuti vazvimirire mukurwira zvichemo zvavo sevarairidzi. Doctor Zhou vanotiwo nguva yareba vadzidzisi vachitambura uye vachiedza kusvitsa zvichemo zvavo kuhurumende asi pasina chinobuda. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoburitsa Bhiri reKuvandudza Chimwe Chikamu cheAIPPA
text: Hurumende nhasi yaburitswa mugwaro rayo kana kuti Government Gazette rebhiri reMedia Information Bill rekuvandudza chimwe chikamu chemutemo weAccess to Information and Protection of Privacy Act. Chikamu chiri kuvandudzwa ndechechikamu chegumi kana kuti Section 10:27 kuti chienderane nechikamu chechimakumi matanhatu nembiri kana kuti section 62 chebumbiro remutemo. Chikamu chiri kuvandudzwa ichi chakanangana nekuti vatori venhau vangawane sei mashoko kubva kumapazi ehurumende nemakambani ayo. Munyori mukuru wezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanoti bhiri iri rinoratidza pachena kuti hurumende yakazvipira kuvandudza mitemo yange ichinzi inodzosera kumashure hutongi hwejekerere nemashandiro evatori venhau. Vati mapazi ehurumende anenge ave nemushandi anenge achishanda nevatori venhau kuvapa zvavanenge vachida zvakakoshera ruzhinji. Asi vamwe vatori venhau vanoti bhiri itsva iri harina kunyanya kusiyana nemutemo weAIPPA. VaMangwana vanoti izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro. Gweta vari nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo yekuburitswa kwenhau VaChris Mhike vanoti pachine zvakawanda zvinoda kugadziriswa. Mumwe mutori wenhau anemukurumbira zvikuru vari mupepeti mukuru weZimFact VaChris Chinaka vanoti iri idanho rekutanga asi rwendo rwurefu. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemutungamiri weMedia Monitors Zimbabwe Muzvare Patience Zirima. Vatori venhau nevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti mitemo yeZimbabwe yakaita seAIPA nePOSA haina kusiyana zvakanyanya nemitemo yaishandiswa nehurumende yeRhodesia yakaita seLaw and Order Maintenance Act, Official Secrets Act, Emergence Powers Act, Censorship of Publications Order of 1965. Asi hurumende inoti iri kuyedza kuvandudza zvinhu uye hurumende inofanirawo kuona kut vatori venhau havafukure hapwa zvinokanganisa nyika sematauriro aVaMangwana. Mutemo uyu uchaendeswa kuvanhu wozodzoswa kudare reparamende mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti uve mutemo. No media source currently available

headline: America Inoti Zimbabwe Haisi Kujekesa Mashandisirwo eMari dzeHurumende neKupihwa kweMarezinesi eZvicherwa
text: Gwaro raburitswa nebazi rehurumende yeAmerica rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika kana kuti State Department rinoratidza kuti hurumende dzinoshandisa mari yeruzhinji zviri pachena here pamwe nekuti dzinopa sei marezinesi ezvicherwa rinoratidza kuti kunyangwe zvazvo Zimbabwe ichinzi yakaedza zvichienzaniswa negore rapera, haisati yasvika panotarisirwa. Gwaro raburitswa nebazi rehurumende yeAmerica rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, kana kuti State Department iri rinoratidza kuti Zimbabwe iri panyika makumi matanhatu nepfumbamwe dzinonzi hadzisati dzoratidza pachena mashandisirwo emari yehurumende . Asi panyika idziwo Zimbabwe iripanyika makumi maviri nenomwe dzinonzi zvichienzaniswa negore rapera dzirikuvavarira kuita zvinhu zvavo pachena. Kuti nyika inzi inoshandisa mari pachena inenge ichizivisa veruzhinji hurongwa hwemari kusanganisira mashandisirwo nekuwana mari kunoita mapazi nemakambani ehurumende. Nyika inonziwo yakachena kana hurumende ichibudisa pachena magwaro anechekuita nekupiwa kwemarezinesi ezvicherwa pamwe nekuti vanenge vawana marezinesi awa vaawana sei. Vachitaura nezvegwaro iri, Amai Megg Riggs vanoshanda kumuzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe vati gwaro ravo regore rino rinoratidza kuti Zimbabwe yakaedzesera zvichienzaniswa negore rapera kuratidza mashandisirwo emari munyika asi vachiti izvi hazvina kukwana. Amai Riggs vati Zimbabwe yakabudisa pachena hurongwa hwebhajeti pamwe nekushandiswa kwemari. Vatiwo hurumende yeZimbabwe yakakwanisawo kuwanisa ruzivo rwezvekushandiswa kwemari kuneveruzhinji pamwe nekuzivisawo zvimwe zvezvikwereti zvinenyika. Asi Amai Riggs vati Zimbabwe yakakundikanawo kuzivisa zvikwereti zvine makambani ehurumende pamwe nemari inowanikwa nemakambani awa. Amai Riggs vatiwo Zimbabwe haisiwo kuzivisa pachena veruzhinji kuwaniswa kwemarezinesi ezvezvicherwa. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvezvicherwa kuti tinzwe maonero avo nezvekupiwa kwemarezinesi ezvezvicherwa sezvo tatadza kubata gurukota rebazi iri VaWinston Chitando. Patafonera mutevedzeri waVaChitando Va Polite Kambamura vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanga vachazotaura nesu kana vasununguka asi vanga vasati vatibata pataenda pamhepo. Tatadzawo kubata gurukota rinoona nezvemari VaMthuli Ncube. Vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko kubato reZANU PF vanga vasatiwo vapindura mibvunzo yedu pataenda pamhepo. Asi mukuru wesangano rinorwira kuchengetedzwa kwezvivanikwa munyika, reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFari Maguwu vati nyaya yezvezvicherwa muZimbabwe haibudiswi pachena vachiti kurudziro yavo kuhurumende kuti ibudise ruzivo urwu pachena. Gwaro iri rakaongorora nyika dzinosvika zana nemakumi mana neimwe idzo dzinowana mari yerubatsiro kubva kuhurumende yeAmerica. Zimbabwe nedzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica dzakadai se Algeria , Angola, Lesotho, Liberia ,Malawi Mozambique nedzimwewo hadzisati dzasadzikisa zvinotarisirwa. Gwaro iri rinotiwo dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica dzakadai se Botswana, The Gambia, Ghana, Nigeria, South Africa, Kenya nedzimwewo dzakachena panyaya dzekufambiswa kwemari. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vanhu Votamba Kisimusi Vasina Chekubata muZimbabwe
text: Vanhu vakawanda muHarare vanoti kisimusi yegore rino yanga isinganakidze kudarika yemakore ose sezvo vatadza kuenda kumisha yavo uye vashaya zvinwiwa nezvokudya muzvitoro. Veruzhinji muHarare vanoti vatadza kuenda kuzororo rekisimusi nekunetsa kwanga kuchiita mabhazi kuwana kuMbare Musika. Mumwe wevanga vachida kuenda kunoona hama neshamwari ndiAmai Nancy Sakarombe avo vati vashaya chekufambisa kuenda kumusha kwavo kuGokwe. Vamwewo vanga vasina nzendo vakaita saAmai Rosyln Masiyazi vanoti vaswera vachimbeya vachitsvaga zvinwiwa nezvokudya muzvitoro kuti vakwanise kutandara nemhuri asi zvinhu izvi zvanga zvisiri kuwanikwa semakore ose. VaKennedy Chigiji vanogara mumusha weWarren Park vaudzawo Studio7 kuti mumabhawa manga musiri kuwanikwa doro vachiti izvi zvazoita kuti vaswere varere. Vezvitoro vatataura navo vanoti zvinwiwa zvisingadhake pamwe nedoro zvawandirwa panguva ino yekisimusi sezvo vagara vachiwana zvinwiwa izvi zviri zvishoma kubva kumakambani anobika doro nezvinwiwa zvisingadhake izvi ayo ari kuchemawo kuti ari kushaya mari yekunze yekutenga zvinodiwa pakugadzirisa zvinwiwa izvi. VaGibson Rukobo, avo vanogara mumusha weGreendale, vanoti vatadzawo kushanyira hama dzavo kuUzumba sezvo vaswera vari mumutsetse wekutsvaga mafuta emotokari vaine mhuri yavo vachida kuenda kumusha. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakati dambudziko remafuta edzimotokari richapera mukupera kwemwedzi uno asi zviri kuitika zviri kuratidza kuti dambudziko iri riri kutotandavara. Zvichakadai, hurumende inoti veruzhinji vanofanira kumbotiwirira kwemakore mashomanana iyo ichiedza kugadzirisa kusamira zvakanaka kwakaita hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yofunga Kutengesa Makambani Ayo
text: Hurumende inoti iri kuronga kutengesa zvikamu zvehupfumi mumakambani ayo, kana kuti ‘parastatals’. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvemari nekurongwa kwehupfumi, VaTerrence Mukupe, vanoti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nekusapinza mari kwemamwe makambani ehurumende aya. VaMukupe vanoti hurumende inogona kuenda mberi ikatengesa kambani yese kwete zvikamu zvayo chete kana zvichinge zvakakodzera. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti zvavakuda kuitwa nehurumende kuda kupa makambani aya kuvanhu vanozivikanwa kare, kana avo vanodyidzana nehurumende. Sangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions rakagara richiti makambani ehurumende aifanirwa kuitwa makambani akazvimirira kuitira kuti ashande nemazvo. VaMukupe vati kutengeswa uku kuchaitwa pachena kune ani zvake ane mari kunyange havo vachaedza kubatsira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvingada kutengawo zvikamu mukambani iyi kana kambani yose. “Pari zvino, hapana hurongwa hwekuti makambani aya ngaatengeswere vari muZimbabwe chete. Kana ave kuzoburitswa, kunokwanisa kutariswa kuti wauya uri munhu wemuZimbabwe, uri wemuno, unayo mari yako, unokwanisa kupiwa mukana nokuti uri mwana wemuZimbabwe asi chikuru ndechokuti tinoda kuti makambani aya atange kufamba,” VaMukupe vaudza Studio 7. Mamwe emakambani aya anosanganisira Air Zimbabwe, Zimbabwe Electricity Supply Authority, pamwe neNational Railways of Zimbabwe. Makambani mazhinji aya ane zvikwereti zvikuru kunyanya Air Zimbabwe iyo inonzi zvikwereti zvayo zvinosvika mazana matatu emamirioni emadhora. VaMukupe vanoti mamwe makambani akaita seZESA haagoni kutengeswa nekuti makambani akakoshera nyika nehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Varairidzi Vosiya Basa Vachinotsvaka Mabasa Matsva
text: Sangano rinomirira varairidzi vekumaruwa, re Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, rinoti hapana hurukuro dziri kuitwa pakati pehurumende nevarairidzi panyaya yekugadzirisa zvichemo zvevarairidzi. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vaudza Studio7 kuti sangano ravo harisi kufara richiona vana vechikoro vachishaya mari yedzidzo, ukuwo varairidzi vachishaya mari yekuenda kubasa. VaMasaraure vati nhengo zhinji dzesangano ravo dziri kunyora matsamba ekuzivisa kusiya kwadzo basa dzichititi dzave kunotsvaka mamwe mabasa ekuita sezvo mihoro yavari kupiwa nehurumende isingakwani kuchengeta mhuri dzavo. Tatadza kubata gurukota rezvedzidzo, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavhima, kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Kunetsa kweMari Munyika Kwoita Kuti veMabhanga Vape Musvo weMasendi
text: Kuenderera mberi kwedambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari kumabhanga emunyika kunonzi kwave kupa kuti mamwe mabhanga ape vanenge vachitora mari dzavo kumabhanga mari dzinosvika zana remadhora pazuva dziri dzemusvo wemasendi gumi. Asi izvi zvinonzi hazvisi kuderedza kureba kwemitsetse kumabhanga, kunyange hazvo mabhanga ari kukwanisa kupa vanhu mari dzemusvo idzi. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi, vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti chimwe chiri kuwedzera dambudziko remari munyika inyaya yekuti makadhi ekumabhanga haasi kukwanisa kushandiswa kumaruwa, uko vanhu vachiri kuda kushandisa mari chaiyo. Doctor Chitambara vanoti chikuru chiri kuita kuti dambudziko rirambe raita ndambirira sehosha yekurwere kushaya chivimbo munyaya dzezveupfumi hwenyika kuri kuitwa nevanhu. Doctor Chitambara vanoti vanokurudzira kuti dai hurumende yarasa ma bond note, yoshandisa mari yeRand yekuSouth Africa, zvimwe dambudziko remari raipera. No media source currently available

headline: Mauto, Vasori neMapurisa Voshandiswa Kumanikidza Varimi Kuti Vaendese Chibage kuGMB
text: Varimi vakawanda munyika vari kuchema chema nedanho rehurumende rekuti mauto, vasori nemapurisa pasi peJoint Operation Command vaone kuti vamanikidzwa kutengesa chibage kuGrain Marketing Board. Vakuru muhurumende vaudza Studio 7 kuti izvi zviri kuitwa sezvo zviri kutyirwa kuti kushaikwa kwehupfu kunogona kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika. Mutsamba yakanyorwa nemunyori mukuru mubazi rezvekurima Doctor John Basera kuGMB iri mumaoko eStudio 7, pachibage matani zviuru makumi matatu zvakohwewa kana kuti 30, 000 metric tonnes, matani zviuru zvishanu kana kuti 5000 metric tonnes chete ndizvo zvaendeswa kuGMB. Patabata VaBhasera vati tivatumire mibvunzo asi vange vasati vapindura. Hurumende yakadzika mutemo wechimbi chimbi weStatutory Instrument 145/19 kumanikidza varimi kutengesa chibage kuGMB kana paita goho shoma Mapurisa, mauto nevasori vari kunzi mutsamba iyi vaende kumapurazi vachiona kuti varimi havasi kuviga chibage here kana kutengesa pamukoto. Vanonziwo vaite maroad blocks kuona kuti hapana vari kutakura chibage zvisina mvumo yeGMB here. Asi nhengo yeparamende yakazvimirira vachimirira Norton vari murimi vaTemba Mliswa vashora zvikuru zviri kuda kuitwa nehurumende izvi. Vaudza Studio 7 kuti varimi vanoda kupihwa mari inoendererana nemari yavakashandisa pakurima. Vati zvekurimisa zvakaita sembeu nefotereza zvinotengwa nemadhora ekuAmerica.  No media source currently available Sachigaro weGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe VaTafadzwa Musarara vakaudzawo Studio 7 kuti vainge vatenga chibage chinosvika matani zviuru mazana mana kana kuti 400, 000 metric tonnes kubva kuZambia neMalawi. Varimi vakawanda vari kuZambia vakatorerwa mapurazi muZimbabwe.. Kuyedza kugadzirisa nyaya yenzara, hurumende iri kuitawo misangano nebazi reUnited Nations reWorld Food Programme kuti ipihwe chikafu sezvo zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo. Munyori mubazi rezvemagariro evanhu VaSimona Masanga vanoti misangno iyi iri kuenderera mberi. WFP inoti kubva mwedzi uno kusvika muna Gumiguru, Zimbabwe inoda mari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi mashanu nematatu kana kuti US$53 million kubatsira vanhu mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 5,3 million.

headline: Nyanzvi Dzozeya Bhajeti Raturwa naVaChinamasa
text: Zvakabuda mubhajeti neChina zviri kuratidza kuti vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kuramba vachirasikirwa nemabasa zvopa kuti vanonge svosve nemuromo. Kubva muna 2011, gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vanoti vanhu vanopfuura zviuru makumi mashanu nevashanu varasikirwa nemabasa. Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakaparura gwaro rezvehupfumi reZimAsset ichivimbisa mabasa mamiriyoni maviri mumakore mashanu anotevera, zvinhu zvichakaita manyama amire nerongo. Asi nenyaya yekusagadzirisa zvematongerwo enyika uye kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu, Zimbabwe ichiri kubatwa seyakageza negoka munyama zvopa kuti pashaye vekunze vanoibatsira nemari inosvika mabhiriyoni makumi maviri nemanomwe emadhora ekuti chirongwa ichi chishande. Mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti hurumende inofanira kushanda nevashandi nevashandirwi mukugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika. Ukuwo nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vaimbotungamira sangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanotiwo VaChinamasa vabaya dede nemukanwa nekunyatsotaura zvinoda kuitwa kuti hupfumi hugadzirike. No media source currently available

headline: Muzvare Dondo Votarisira Kuve kuMusangano weU.S. Leaders' Summit Uchange Uri muWashington, D.C., Svondo Rinouya
text: Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzemadzimai, rePhumulani Minnesota African Women Against Violence, Muzvare Comfort Dondo, vanoti vachange vachizeya nezvematambudziko ari kusangana nemadzimai munyika panyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzavo. Muzvare Dondo vanoti vachaita izvi kumucheto kwemusangano wevatungamiri veAmerica nemuAfrica, weU.S Africa Leaders’ Summit, uyo uchange uri muWashington DC svondo rinouya. Vanoti vachange vari kuita izvi panguva iyo chirongwa chemazuva gumi nematanhatu ekurwisana nemhirizhonga, kana kuti 16 Days of Activism Against Gender-Based Violence chichangopera, vachiti vari kuita izvi senzira yekuti nyaya iyi igare ichizeyiwa, kwete kungomirira mazuva echerechedzo chete. 'Tiri kutarisira kuti pachave nehurukuro dzakadzama dzichange dzichiitwa kumisangano iyi,"Muzvare Dondo vaudza Studio7. No media source currently available

headline: IMF Inoti Zimbabwe inofanira Kusunga Dzisimbe neKubhadhara Zvikweti Kuti Igadzirise Hupfumi
text: Bhanga guru rinokweretesa mari nyika dzepasi rino reInternational Monetary Fund, IMF, rinoti Zimbabwe inofanira kuzvipira kuvandudza zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi kana ichida kubuda mumadhaka mairi. IMF inoti nyika inofanira kurwisa huori, kusimbisa dhora remunyika uye kuva nemazano ekuti ingabhadhare sei chikwereti chayo chinodarika mabhiriyoni gumi emadhora ekuAmerica kana kuti US$10 billion kune vekunze chete. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, IMF inotiwo Zimbawe inofanira kuvawo nemazano anokwezva vemabhizimisi vekunze uye kugadzirisa nyaya dzemagariro evanhu nehutano munguva ino yekurwisa denda reCovid-19. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti Zimbabwe iri mugwara zvisinei nezviri kutaurwa neIMF. Vati izvi zviri kuonekwa kuburikidzwa nekuwanikwa kwemari yemunyika mumabhanga, musika wekutenga nekutengserana mari yekunze kuReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, kugadzirwa kwezvivakwa nezvimwe. Vatiwo hupfumi hwenyika hauchadi vekunze vakawanda sezvo vanhu munyika vachirarama nekuzviitira mabasa avo emaoko anongoda kusimudzirwa. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvezvepfumi, VaVictor Bhoroma, vanotiwo IMF yarova nemonemo vachitiwo zviri kutaurwa nebhanga iri ndizvo zvagara zvichitaurwa nevana veZimbabwe kuti huori hunofanira kumiswa uye hurumende haifanire kuramba ichikwereta mari ichikundikana kubhadhara. Zimbabwe ine zvikwereti kuWorld Bank, Paris Club neAfrican Development Bank izvo iri kutatarika kubhadhara zvopa kuti itadze kuwana zvimwe zvikereti. Zvikwereti izvi zviri kupa kuti nyika itadze kukwereteswa imwe mari. Vachipawo pfungwa dzavo, mukuru wesangano reCEO Africa Roundtable, VaOswill Binha, vati Zimbabwe inofanira kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika kwete kuda kuita kunge chitsuwa. Vatiwo vemabhizimisi vakawanda vekunze vanoteerera zvinotaurwa neIMF nekudaro hurumende haifanire kungoisa zvimiti munzeve ichiita zano ndega. Gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vanotiwo vari kutarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchakwira nezvikamu zvinodarika zvinomwe kubva muzana kana kuti 7,4%. Asi IMF inoti inotarisira kuti hukwire nezvikamu zvinoti darikei zvitatu zvishoma kubva muzana kana kuti 3,1%. Mwedzi unouya, IMF inoti iri kuita musangano padandemutande neZimbabwe mukuyedza kuumba hwaro hwekuti patangwe chimwe chirongwa chekubatsira Zimbabwe neruzivo kana kuti Staff Monitored Programme. Chirongwa chakadai chakaitwa kusvika muna Kukadzi gore rapera asi IMF yakati Zimbabwe yainge yatora gwara risiri iro. No media source currently available

headline: Bazi rezveHupfumi Rinokanzura maTender eParamende, Ukuwo Paramende Ichiti Yakabata Yega Huwori Uhwu Yakakanzura
text: Bazi rezvemari rakanzura hurongwa hwedare reparamende hwekuda kutenga makombiyuta kubva kune mamwe makambani maviri emunyika mushure mekunge zvaonekwa kuti mitengo yakatarwa yakanyanyisa, izvo zvinoratidza kuti pakaitwa zvehuwori. Tsamba yakanyorwa nemunyori mukuru mubazi rezvemari VaGeorge Guvamatanga kumunyori wedare reparamende, VaKannedy Chokuda nemusi weChitatu inoratidza kuti mushure mekunge bazi rezvemari ranzwa nezvema tender maviri aya rakatora matanho ekukanzura ma tender. Makambani akanga apiwa basa rekutengesera paramende makombiyuta ari mutsamba yavaGuvamatanga iyi anoti ye Blinart Investments P/L iyo yakanga yanzi iwanise ma laptop zana nemakumi manomwe nematatu, 173, yakanga yachaja mari inoita US$1 602 755.77, zvichireva kuti laptop imwechete yaitengwa nekutengo unoita US$9 264.00. Kambani yeMid-End Computers and Hardware (P/L) yakanga yanzi iwanise paramende makombiyuta makumi manomwe nemapfumbamwe, 79 erudzi rweDesktops aikosha US$243 052.36, zvichireva kuti kombiyuta imwechete yaitengwa nemari inodarika zvishoma zviuru zvitatu zvemadhora ekuamerica. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumakambani aya kana kubazi rezvemari. Asi paramende yaburitsawo mashoko ekuzviisa kure nenyaya iyi, ichiti ndiyo yakatotanga kuona kukwira kwemitengo yemakombiyuta iyi, izvo zvakaita kuti ibva yangokanzura ma tender aya. Tsamba yanyorwawo kune veruzhinji naVaChokuda inoti paramende inotarisisa zvikuru hurongwa hwezvose zvainotenga, uye chiitiko ichi mumwe mukana wekuti iwedzere nekusimbisa mashandiro ainoita. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemari kana kuti Public Accounts Committee, VaBrian Dube, vari nhengo yebato reMDC, vanoti sekomiti yeparamende vanofadzwa zvikuru nekubatwa kwehuwori hwakadai, vachiti vose vane chekuita nenyaya iyi vanofanirwa kuongororwawo. No media source currently available

headline: Hondo Pakati peAir Zimbabwe neSouth African Airways Yoenderera Mberi
text: Hondo inotyisa yange yamuka pakati pekambani yeAir Zimbabwe neSouth African Airways inonzi haisati yanyatsopera zvopa kuti kufamba kwendege pakati penyika mbiri idzi kukanganisike. Kunetsana uku kwakatanga nemusi weChishanu zvakapa kuti ndege dzimbotadza kubhururuka zvichikonzerwa nenyaya yemamwe magwaro anonzi neSouth Africa ange asina kumira zvakanaka. Magwaro aya anonzi Foreign Operations Licenses. South Africa yakamisa ndege yeZimbabwe kubhururuka kubva kuJohannesburg ichienda kuHarare. Zimbabwe yakabva yamisawo ndege dzeSouth Africa kupinda kana kubuda munyika. Vanhu vazhinji vari kukanganiswa zvikuru mafambiro avo pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Gurukota rinoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu VaJoram Gumbo vati mari iri kudiwa inosvika zviuru zvitatu pandege imwe chete. VaGumbo vati haina kuwanda uye makore ose vaingoshanda neSouth Africa pasina aiti anoda magwaro aya. Parizvino, ndege shoma ndidzo dziri kubhururuka pakati peZimbabwe neSouth Africa nyaya dzemagwaro aya dzichigadziriswa.  No media source currently available

headline: Dare rePamusoro Rotonga Kuti Makurukota Ataurire Ruzhinji nezveMabhizimisi Avainawo
text: Dare repamusoro reHigh Court rinoti gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi nemuchuchisi mukuru wehurumende, VaPrince Machaya vakatyora bumbiro remitemo nekutadza kwavakaita kudzika mutemo unosungira vakuru-vakuru muhurumende kubuditsa pachena hupfumi hwavo. Izvi zvinotevera chikumbiro chakasvitswa kudare nenhengo yeparamende inomirira Harare North, VaAllan Rusty Markham kuti bumbiro remutemo ritevedzerwe. Mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaJacob Manzunzu, nezuro vakatura mutongo wekuti VaZiyambi naVaMachaya havana kudzika mutemo unosungira vakuru-vakuru muhurumende kuti vaburitse pachena hupfumi zvavakati zvinopesana nezvavanosungirwa kunge vakaIta zviri mubumbiro remitemo renyika. Pasi pechikamu 198 (a) chebumbiro remitemo, paramende inofanira kudzika mutemo unoona kuti vakuru-vakuru muhurumende vaburitsa hupfumi hwavo pachena nguva nenguva nekutara zviga zvinofanira kuetevdzerwa nemakambani ehurumende pamwe nekurangwa kwevanenge vatyora mutemo uyu. Nokudaro, VaManzunzu vakapa VaZiyambi naVaMachaya mwedzi mitatu yekuona kuti mutemo uyu wadzikwa. VaMarkham vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kufara zvikuru nemutongo uyu. VaManzunzu vakati zviri mubumbiro remitemo zvinofanira kuzadziswa uye hazvifanire kutora nguva kuzviita nekudaro vakakurudzira VaZiyambi naVaMachaya kuti vatore matanho ekuti mutemo unobata nyaya iyi wadzikwa. Mumiririri weHighfield West muparamende uye vari nhengo yekomiti yePublic Accounts mudare iri, VaHappymore Chidziva, vati chinhu chakakosha zvikuru kuti mutemo uyu udzikwe vachiti izvi zvinobatsira zvikuru mukurwisana nehuori uhwo hunonzi hwatambarara serunyemba munyika. Mukuru wesangano reTransparency International Zimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Chikumbu, vati zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vazive kuti vatungamiri vavo vari kuwana sei mari dzavo kuti pasaite huori. Vanokokera bato reZanu-PF mudare reparamende VaPupurai Togarepi vaudza Studio 7 kuti mutemo unofanira kutevedzerwa asi vakati zvakakosha kuti nekune vamwe vemabhizimisi zviitwe kuti vasaite huori. VaMachaya vati titaure naVaZiyambi nezvenyaya iyi asi VaZiyambi vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo uye vanga vasati vapiundura mibvunzo yatavatumira kuti tinzwe kuti vachapikisa mutongo uyu here kana kuti kwete uye kuti matanho api avachatora. Asi pakunzwikwa kwenyaya iyi, vaviri ava vakaudza dare kuti kudzikwa kwemutemo uyu hachisi chinhu chinofanirwa kuitwa naivo chete vachiti vedare reparamende nedare remakurukota ehurumende vanofanirawo kuunzwa kudare kuti vazvipindurire sezvo vane chekuita nekudzikwa kwemutemo uyu. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, sezvo vari kuRwanda kwavari kupinda mumwe musangano vachimirira paramende.  No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kuongororwa Hutachiwana hweCoronavirus Munyika Hunoramba Huchikwira
text: Gurukota rezvehutano, Doctor Obadiah Moyo, vazivisa kuti munyika mave nevanhu vanosvika makumi manomwe nemakumi mana nemumwe vari kuongororwa kana vaine hutachiwana hwe coronavirus vanonzi vakabva kunyika dzine dambudziko rechirwere ichi. Dandemutande reTwitter rebazi rezvehutano razivisa kuti VaMoyo vataura mashoko aya pamusangano wemapazi akasiyanasiyana wekutarisa nezvegadziriro iripo pakudzivirirwa kwechirwere ichi kuti chisapararira munyika. Kanzuru yeguta reHarare inonzi yasarudzawo zvipatara zviviri zvinoti Wilkins neBeatrice Infectious Disease Hospital senzvimbo dzichashandiswa mukudzivirirwa kwechirwere ichi. Coronavirus inonzi yauraya vanhu vanosvika mazana mana nemakumi maviri nevanomwe muChina chete, kuchitiwo mumwe chete kunze kweChina, kunove kuPhilippines. Vamwe zviuru makumi maviri nemazana manomwe nevana vanonzi vabatwawo nechirwere ichi muChina chete. Studio7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvehuutano Doctor Moyo kuti tinzwe zvizhinji panyaya iyi. Asi gurukota iri rakaudza Studio7 mukupera kwesvondo kuti bazi raro rakagadzirira kurwisana nehutachiwana uhwu. Vakambove gurukota rezvehutano, uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC, Doctor Henry Madzorera, havaone sekunge hurumende yakagadzirira zvakakwana mukudzivirira hutachiwana uhwu sezvo vasati vambonzwa kana pave nevashandi vakadzidziswa kurwisana nedambudziko iri. Doctor Madzorera vanoti panofanirwa kutorwawo matanho akasimba ekuongorora vanopinda vachibva kunyika dzine chirwere ichi, pachiitwawo zvakare matanho ekuvarambidza kupinda muvanhu sezvo chirwere ichi chiri nyore kuparadzirwa muvanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Chirwere cheCovid-19 Chodzoka Zvine Hukasha Apo Vakawanda Vamira Kuzvidzivirira
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muHarare nemusi weChina zvaunza huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kusvika pamazana matatu ane gumi kana kuti 310. Nemusi weChitatu wakare vanhu zana nemakumi matanhatu nevana kana kuti 164 vakabatwawo nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vose ava havana nhoroondo yekubuda kunze kwenyika. Izvhi zvave kureva kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino hwave zvuru gumi nechimwe zvine mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nemaviri kana kuti 11, 522. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vave zvuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana mashanu ane makumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 9, 599 mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu makumi mana nevashanu vapora nezuro. Vanhu vachiri kurwara churu chimwe chete nemazana matanhatu ane gumi nevatatu kana kuti 1, 613. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kuyambira kuti chirwere ichi chadzoka kechipiri zvine mutsindo kana kuti second wave sezvo huwandu hwacho hwawedzera zvakanyanya. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevarwere kana kuti Community Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti vanhu vakawanda havachaterere kurudziro yekuzvidzivirira kubva kudenda iri zvopa kuti vakawanda vabatwe nechirwere ichi. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa kuStudio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana mana, kana kuti 2,4 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zvuru makumi mashanu nemanomwe ane makumi mashanu nevanomwe kana kuti 57, 057. Vapora vadarika mamiriyoni maviri kana kuti 2 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica yose. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere che coronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi manomwe nematatu ane zvuru mazana manomwe, kana kuti 73, 7 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica, iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose, inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vadarika zviuru mazana matatu ane zvuru zvitatu kana kuti 303, 000 kuchitiwo vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu ane zviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 16, 7 miillion. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu, kana kuti 1, 6 million, asi vapora vachidarikawo mamiriyoni makumi mana nerimwe ane zvuru mazana manomwe. Vanhu vapora pasi rose vave mamiriyoni makumi mana nemanomwe ane zvuru mazana matatu kana kuti 47,3 million. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vave Kufa neCovid-19 Hunokwira Panguva Iyo Chirwere Chadzika Midzi Munyika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neMuvhuro kuti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwasvika pamakumi masere kana kuti 80, zvichitevera kushaya kwevamwe gumi. Bazi iri rakatiwo huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose hwakanga hwakwira kusvika pazviuru zvina nemakumi manomwe nevashanu, kana kuti 4 075, mushure mekunge vanhu zana nemakumi mashanu nevana, kana kuti 154 vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Vanhu vapona kubva ku Covid-19 vanonzi vakanga vasvikawo pachiuru nemakumi mashanu nevanomwe, kana kuti 1 057. Vanhu vose vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi ndevaya vanonzi vagara vari munyika, vasina nhoroondo yekumbobuda munyika. Vanhu vanodarika chiuru nemazana maviri kana kuti 1 200, vanonzi vabatwa nechirwere ichi muHarare chete, izvo zvaita kuti rive dunhu ringanzi mwoyo wechirwere ichi pari zvino. Pasi rose Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nemasere nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 18,300 000 vabatwa nwechirwere ichi, icho chaurayawo vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvina nemazana manomwe, kana kuti 694 700. Nyanzvi mume zvehutano vari chiremba kuCharlotte kuNorth Carolina muAmerica, Dr. Simbiso Ranga, vanoti kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi pamwe nekufa nacho zvinhu zvinoshungurudza zvikuru. Dr. Ranga vanoti izvi zvave kureva kuti vanhuwo zvavo pamwe nhurumende vanofanirwa kuongorora zvakare nzira dzavari kushandisa mukudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi kuti vaone kana dziri kushanda sezvinotarisirwa. Vanokurudzirawo vanenge varasikirwa nehama dzavo kuburukidza nechirwere ichi kuti vatore matanho akasimba anoita kuti vasatapurirwe chirwere kubva kumufi, anosanganisira kusageza mufi, uye kupfeka nhumbi dzinodzivirira kutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana. No media source currently available

headline: Covid-19 Yoramba Ichiuraya Vanhu Vakawanda Munyika
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa pamwe nekubatwa nechirwere che Covid-19 huri kuramba huchikwira mazuva ose, izvo nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti mucherechedzo mukuru wekukomba kwaita chirwere ichi munyika. Izvi zvinotevera kufakwevanhu makumi matatu nevatatu nezuro nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19, pamwe nekubatwa nechirwere ichi kwevanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mana nemakumi mana nevaviri, 1 442, nezuro wakare. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa,Dr Henry Madzorera, vati kukwira kwehuwandu nekufa kwevanhu mucherechedzo mukuru wekudzika kwemidzi kwaita chirwere cheCovid-19. VaMadzorera vati chitsvambe chave kumumhu wese kuitira kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Imwe nyanzvi munya dzezvehutano uye vari mumiririri weChinhoyi mudare reNational Assembly, VaPeter Mataruse, vatiwo zvinoshungurudza kuti vanhu vari kuzara kundufu izvo zvinoita kuti vatapurirane chirwere ichi. VaMataruse vati veruzhinji vanofanirwa kutevedzera mitemo inobata Covid-19, uye vagare mudzimba. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, Va Donald Mujiri, vati bazi ravo riri kurwadziwa zvakanyanya nekufa kuri kuramba kuchiita vanhu munyika zvichikonzerwa neCovid-19. VaMujiri vakurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vanobaiwa nhomba pamwe nekutevedzera mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 kusanganisira kupfeka mamasiki vakavhara mhuno nemuromo, kugeza maoko nguva dzose, kusaungana uye kumira mumitsetse vanhu vakatarangana. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava chiuru nemazana masere nemakumi mana nemumwe(1841), uye vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vava zviuru makumi mashanu nezviviri nemazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevatatu, 52, 663. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga vakanga vava zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi masere nezvisere nevana, 788,004, uye vabayiwa nhomba yepiri vakanga vava zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nezvina nemazana manomwe negumi nevana, 564,714. Huwandu uhu hunotarisirwa kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichizivisa zvayawana nhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba yeCovid-19 vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti pachine mutoro mukuru wekuti hurumende ibaye vanhu nhomba nehuwandu hwairi kutaura pachitariswa huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba kusvika pari zvino. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yozengurira Kudzinga Vashandi Vayo Vasati Vabayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 seZvayanga Yavimbisa
text: Vashandi vakawanda vehurumende vasati vabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 neMuvhuro vakaenda kubasa zvisinei nemutemo wechimbi chimbi wehurumende wekuti vange vasati vabayiwa nhomba kusvika musi wa 15 Gumiguru vamire kuenda kubasa vachinziwo havasi kuzotambiriswa mari dzemihoro Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vanoti hurumende haisi kuzodududza padanho iri kunyangwe ichitambira zvichemo zvevamwe vashandi vasati vabayiwa. Vati vanogara kunzvimbo dzisati dzasvika nhomba vanofanira kunge vabayiwa musi wa 31 Zvita usati wadarika. Vayambira vari kutsika madziro kuti vachadzingwa basa. Asi mutauriri wesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reZimbabwe Conferderation of Public Sector Trade Union, VaGibson Mushangu vati hurumende haifanire kuita zano ndega panyaya iyi vachiti havasi kuziviswa kuti zvii zviri kuitwa kuvashandi. VaMushangu vati kunyange hazvo zvakakosha kuti vashandi vabaiwe nhomba kuti vazvidzivirira kubva kuCovid-19, hurumende inofanirawo kukoshesa kuwedzera vashandi mari dzemihoro. Mutungamiriri we Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe VaObert Masaraure, vaudza Studio 7 vati kunyangwe hazvo vari kukurudzira nhengo dzavo kuti dzibayiwe nhomba, parizvino vari kukurudzira nhengo dzisina kubayiwa kuti dziende kumabasa vachitiwo hurumende haisi kutarisa zvichemo zvavo. Mutungamiriri weProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane dzimwe nhengo dzesangano ravo dzisina kuenda asi vakadzikurudzira kuti dziende kubasa mangwana. VaZhou vati pane zvikonzero zvakawanda zviri kuita kuti varairidzi vasabaiwe nhomba. VaZhou vati sekuziva kwavo, varairidzi vanodarika zviuru makumi matatu chete ndivo vega vabaiwa nhomba mbiri uye varairidzi vanodarika zviuru zana havasati vatambo baiwa nhomba yekutanga. Mutauriri mubazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vati bazi rehutano ndiro rinoziva kuti varairidzi vangana vakabaiwa nhomba asi vakati zvikamu makumi mapfumbabwe kubva muzana zvevarairidzi vese munyika zviri kuenda kubasa. Sangano guru revashandi reZCTU rakaenda kumatare richiti kumanikidza vashandi kubayiwa nhomba kutyora bumbiro remutemo asi nyaya iyi yakanzi haisi nechimbi chinbi nematare. Hurumende yakaburitsa mutemo wekuti vanhu vabayiwe kuburikidza negwaro rayo kana kuti Government Gazette.

headline: Madzimai Ovhenekwa Chirwere CheGomarara PaChena kuMashonaland West
text: Mamwe madzimai ekuHurungwe mudunhu reMashonaland West vanoti havasi kuwana hutano hwakakwana sezvo vachifamba mitunhu yakareba kuenda kumakiriniki nezvipatara. Vachitaura panzvimbo yeKasimure kuHurungwe, apo panga pachitariswa madzimai kuti vane gomarara repamuromo wechibereko here, Amai Bertha Zhou vanoti madzimai akawanda ari kufa negomarara rechibereko kumamisha sezvo vasina mari dzekufambisa kuenda kunorapwa. Amai Zhou, avo vatariswa chibereko chavo icho changa chichivarwadza kwemakore matatu, vanoti zvirongwa zvakadai zvinofanirwa kuenda pazvikoro zviri pedyo nevanhu kwete kunzvimbo dzinokwirwa mabazi. Mumwe mudzimai atariswa nhasi, Amai Talent Katora, vanogara mumusha maVaNyarenda, vanoti vanonzwa kurwadziwa pasi peguvhu ravo izvo zvaita kuti vade kutariswa kuti vane gomarara repamuromo wechibereko here. Amai Katora vanoti vadzidzawo kuti mudzimai akapfeka mishonga yekudzora nhengo yesikarudzi yemudzimai mukana wekubatwa negomarara repamuromo wechibereko unenge wakakura. Mumwe mudzimai, Amai Maudi Sengwe, vanoti kunyange vakambotariswa gomarara makore maviri apera vatariswa zvakare nhasi vachiti vanoda kuve nechokwadi kuti havana kubata chirwere ichi mumakore maviri apfuura. Chirongwa chaitwa nhasi chekutarisa kana madzimai anegomarara, chaitwa nebazi rezvehutano, vakabatana nePopulation Services pamwe neNational Aids Council avo vari kuchecheudza varume munzvimbo dzavari kufamba. Parizvino vasvika nzvimbo dzinoti Batwa, Mauya neKasimure, mangwana vanenge vari kuMagunje vozopedzisira neChirundu neMugovera. No media source currently available

headline: VaMohadi Vokuridziva Vanhu Kuti Vasimbaradze Kuzvidzivirira Kubva kuCoronavirus
text: Mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaKembo Mohadi nemusi weChina vakakurudzira vanhu kuti vangwarire kutapurirwa chirwere checovid19 icho chiri kubata vanhu vakawanda munyika nepasi rose. VaMohadi vanova sachigaro wekomiti yekurwisa chirwere ichi kana kuti Covid 19 Taskforce vainge vaine mamwe makurukota ehurumende vachishanyira kuChinhoyi University of Technology (CUT) vakakurudzira vanhu kuti vapfeke zvekuzvidzivirira muromo nemhuno kana kuti maface masks. VaMohadi vati chirwere cheCovid-19 chakaita kuti vanhu vamuke nekushandisa ruzivo rwavainarwo kupedza matambudziko ari munyika kusanganisira zvikwanisiro zvekudzivirira hutachiona hwecoronavirus. Asi mumwe mushandi anogadzira maface masks paCUT asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti mari yavari kuhoreswa ishoma zvikuru zvichienzaniswa neyavari kuwana kana vatengesa zvavanenge vagadzira. Mushandi uyu anoti vari kupihwa mari zvichienderana nekuti vagadzira maface masks mangani achiti mari yakawanda yaakatambira madhora zviuru zvishanu-ZWL$5 000 asi anoti vakambotambira ZWL$300. CUT iri kugadzira maface masks zviuru zvitatu pazuva zvinovapa madhora zviuru mazana matanhatu pamwedzi ZWL$600 000 sezvo face mask imwechete ichitengeswa nemadhora makumi mashanu. Panyaya yekuti sei paCUT paine maface masks nemasanitizer akawanda zvimwe zvipatara zvichiti hazvina zvinhu izvi, mutauriri weCUT VaMusekiwa Tapera vanoti akatengwa kari akamirira kuzotorwa. VaTapera vatadza kuti taurira kuti vakambopihwa marii nehurumende yekutanga kugadzira zvikwanisiro zvinoderedza kutapuriranwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC Alliance VaHlatshwayo vanoti zvinoshamisa kuti vamwe vana nevarikunyoresa bvunzo vari kushaya maface masks asi achigadzirwa muzvikoro. VaHlatshwayo vanotiwo zviri kuitika mukutenga zvikwanisiro zvinoratidza kuti huori hwatekeshera muhurumende. Vamwe vapinda musangano wanhasi vanoti hazvina kujeka kuti ndiani chaiye ari kuwana mari pakutengeswa kwezvikwanisiro zviri kugadzirwa muzvikoro kana zvichitadza kupanana zvikwanisiro. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakachengetedzwa kuBulawayo Vachiongororwa Covid-19 Vanoti Hurumende Iri Kuvabata neKuseri kweRuoko
text: Vamwe vevanhu vakachengetedzwa nehurumende kuBulawayo vachiongororwa kuti vane Covid-19 here kana kuti kwete, vanoti havasi kufara kuti vari kuramba vakaiswa mu quarantine iwo mazuva avo anobvumirwa nemutemo kunge vakachengetedzwa, akapera. Vanhu vataura neStudio7 vanoti vava nemazuva makumi maviri nematatu vari mu quarantine, asi hurumende haisi kuvaudza kuti vachanzi vaende kudzimba dzavo riini. Vanhu ava vanotiwo vari kushungurudzwa nemapurisa. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa kubata. MuBulawayo munonzi mune vanhu vari kugara paBulawayo Polytechnic, nepaUnited College of Education vakabva kuBotswana mushure mekunge nyika iyi yadzosera zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe kumusha kwazvo pakatanga kunetsa chirwere cheCovid-19. Vamwe vevanhu ava vanoti vakamanikidzwa kubuda muBotswana, vamwe vakasiya midziyo yavo. Pavakabviswa kuBotswana, vanhu ava vakatanga vambogariswa paPlumtree High School, uye vanonzi vaisvika zana nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu. Asi vakazoendeswa kuBulawayo senzira yekudzikisa kumanikidzana kwavanga vakaita kuPlumtree. Mumwe wevanhu vakabva ku Botswana vachiita zvekumanikidzwa musi wa 7 Kubvumbi, uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita rake, anoti hurumende iri kuvabata nekuseri kweruoko. No media source currently available Asi munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Va Nick Mangwana, vati hurumende yakamirira kuona zvakabuda muongororo yekuti vanhu ava vane chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete. VaMangwana vatiwo vanhu ava vanotarisirwa kuenda kumisha yavo munguva pfupi inotevera kana zvakabuda muongororo zvichiratifdza kuti havana hutachiwona hweCoronavirus. Zimbabwe yava nevanhu makumi mana vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19, uye vanhu vana, vakatoshaya nechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Varwere Voburitswa Muzvipatara Sezvo Musina Vashandi
text: Chipatara chikuru chemuChinhoyi chavhara mawadhi akawanda nekuda kwekushomeka kwavana mukoti avo vari kuramwa mabasa nyika yose. Mukuru wechipatara ichi, VaCollet Mawire, vanoti vakamanikidzwa kuvhara mawadhi evarume nemadzimai evanorwara, medical ward, pamwe nemawadhi evarume nemadzimai evanorwara nezvinoonekwa, surgical ward nekuda kwekuramwa mabasa kwana mukoti vanosvika mazana matatu. VaMawire vanoti varwere vose vakaiswa muwadhi yemadzimai ari kutarisira kusununguka sedanho rekuti varapwe nanamukoti vashoma varipo. VaMawire vanoti kunyange zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka pachipatara vanoti havasati vafirwa nevanhu zvine chekuita nekuramwa basa kwana mukoti. Vamwe varwere vakaburitswa muchipatara vari kushora danho ravana mukoti rekuramwa mabasa vachisiya vanhu vachirwara muchipatara. Mumwe murwere asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti vana mukoti havafanirwe kukoshesa mari kudarika hupenyu hwevanhu. VaGilbert Tsomondo avo vanobva kuMhangura vatora baba vavo vaburitswa muchipatara vasina kunyatsopora. VaTshomomndo vanoti hurumende navana mukoti vanofanirwa kuwirirana nekuti varwere vasina mhosva ndivo vanofa. VaMawire vanoti pari zvino havana huwandu hwavana mukoti vari kudzidzira basa vari kuyamura muwadhi yakasanganiswa varwere. Varwere vakawanda vari kuburitswa vasina kupora vari kudzokera kumba uko vanoti vanogona kufa sezvo vasina mari yekuenda kunorapwa nanachiremba vakazvimirira. Vana mukoti vakatanga kukanda mapadza avo pasi nezuro vachiti hurumende yakavanyepera kuti ichagadzirisa zvinhu, asi iyo pasina chayiri kuita. No media source currently available

headline: Mutemo weBritain Unorambidza Vanobva kuZimbabwe Unonzi Unobata Vashanyi Chete.
text: Gweta vari chizvarwa cheZimbabwe uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF kuBritain, Doctor Simba Mavaza, vanoti danho rakatorwa nehurumende yeBritain rekumborambidza vanhu vanobva kuZimbabwe nedzimwe nyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica rakangonangana nevanhu vanenge vachida kushanyira nyika iyi, kwete vanenge vaine magwaro ekugara pamwe nekushanda muBritain. Doctor Mavaza vanoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvagara zviine mabasa azvo kana kudzidza muBritain, uye zvine magwaro ekuzvarwa enyika mbiri idzi zvakabatwa nemutemo uyu zviri kunze kweBritain zvinokwanisa kudzokera zvisina dambudziko kana zvichingokwanisa kuzadzisa zvinodiwa nemiutemo wekudzivirira kuparadzirwa kweCovid-19. Muzinda weBritain muZimbabwe wakazivisa kutanga kwesvondo rino kuti hurumende yawo yakadzika mutemo unomborambidza vashanyi vanobva kuZimbabwe pamwe nedzimwe nyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica kupinda muBritain, senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, icho chabata zvakasimba dunhu reSADC, kusanganisirawo neZimbabwe. Doctor Mavaza vanoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvichiri kunze kweBritain zviri kuda kunzwisisa nekujekeserwa pamusoro pemutemo uyu. Asi vanoti danho ratorwa neBritain iri rakanaka chose sezvo rcihidzivirira kupararira kwedenda ranetsa pasi rose iri. No media source currently available

headline: VanaChiremba Vanorwira Kodzero dzeVanhu Voramba Kuti Typhoid Iri Kudzikira muNyika
text: Sangano ranachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights rinoti kunyange hazvo hurumende ichiti chirwere chemanyoka cheTyphoid chadzikira, humbowo hunoratidza kuti chirwere ichi chakateshera muguta reHarare nenzvimbo zhinji munyika. Vachitaura mushure mekuenda kuchipatara cheBeatrice Infecttious Hospital muHarare uko kuri kurapwa vanhu vanfungidzirwa kuti vanetyphoid, gurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa vakati kanzuru yeHarare pamwe nebazi ravo vakamisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Vakati pavanhu makumi mashanu vanofungidzirwa kuti vane typhoid kuchipatara ichi vazhinji vacho vaibva kuMbare uko kwashaya mwana ane makore gumi nematatu nechirwere ichi musi weKimusi. Asi munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights Dr Evans Masitara vati pane vanhu vakawanda zvikuru vari kubatwa neTyphoid muHarare nedzimwe nzvimbo munyika. VaMasitara vati vanhu vakawanda vari kuenda kuzvipatara zvakazvimirira uye vane humbowo hwekuti nyaya yetyphoid haizi kutaurwa nemazvo nebazi rezvehutano. Vanotiwo zvinosuwisa kuti vanhu vari kurwara nechirwere chinokwanisa kudzivirirwa uyewo vati vese vari kubata nezvirwere zvemanyoka vanofanira kuendesa kanzuru yeHarare nedzimwe dziri munzvimbo dzavanogara kumatare kuti varapwe pachena vachiti makunzuru ndiwo anebasa rekuona kuti vanhu vawana mvura yakachena uyewo kuti marara atakurwa. Asi mutauririri we kanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme vanoti kanzuru yavo iri kurapa vanhu vese vane zvirwere zvemayoka pachena. Humbowo kubva kubazi rezvehutano hunoratidzawo kuti mwedzi uno chete pane vanhu vanodarika zviuru gumi vakabatwa nezvirwere zvemanyoka munyika yese uye pane vanhu vana vakatofa nekuda kwezvirwere izvi munyika yese. Zvirwere izvi zvakwanda kuMashonaland Central neManicaland kozotiwo Mashonaland West, Harare neBulawayo. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vanhu Vaviri Vofa neCovid-19 kuManicaland
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwakwira kusvika pamakumi matatu nevatanhatu zvichitevera kufa kwemumwe murume nemudzimai kuManicaland nechirwere ichi nezuro. Vanhu vanosvika zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro. Pavanhu ava, zana nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika, vamwe vaviri vakabva kuSouth Africa mumwe chete kuZambia. Kunyangwe hazvo chirwere checoronavirus chave kupararira zvakanyanya munyika, hurumende iri kutatarika kugadzirisa zvinhu muzvipatara zvapa kuti vashandi vemo kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba vapinde mumwedzi wechipiri vachiramwa mabasa. Mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vakuru vemuzvipatara zvehurumende reSenior Hospital Doctors Association Dr Aaron Musara vanoti nemusi weChina vanenge vatangawo kuramwa mabasa nekuti hurumende yakundikana kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo zvekuti vawedzerwe mari yemirhoro nekuwana zvikwanisiro zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kucoronavirus. No media source currently available Gurukota rinoona nezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakamboti hurumende yakagadzirira kuzeya nyaya yemihoro nevashandi asi kusvika parizvino zvienenge zvakona n’anga murapwa achida. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana masere ane makumi mana nemana kana kuti 844, 000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vadarika zviuru gumi nezvinomwe ne mazana matanhatu anemakumi masere nevaviri kana kuti 17,682. Vapora vadarika zviuru mazana mana nemakumi masere nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 489, 000. Pasi rose, Johns Hopkins university inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu ane zviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 16,3 million, kuchiti vafa vadarikawo zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nechimwe kana kuti 651 thousand. America yave nevanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mana nezviuru mazana maviri nemakumi matatu kana kuti vadarika 4, 2 thousand vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi manomwe kana kuti 147,00.

headline: Zimbabwe Yosimbaradza Mitemo yeCovid-19 Lockdown
text: Hurumende inoti yadzosa mitemo yose yakashandiswa pakatanga kubuda chirwere cheCovid-19 gore rapera sezvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kuramba vachibatwa pamwe nekufa nechirwere cheCovid 19 huri kuramba huchikwira munyika. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota ehurumende, gurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakati hurumende yadzosa mirawu yose yekuona kuti vanhu vatevedzera zvose zvinodiwa kuitira kurwisa denda reCovid-19 iro riri kuramba richikura munyika. Vakati vanobatwa nemhosva yekutyora mitemo yakatanga kushandiswa gore rapera, vacharangwa zvakasimba, uye vane mabhizinesi anotyora mitemo iyi, vachatorerwa marezenisi avo. Amai Mutsvangwa vakatiwo pane vanhu vari kurwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe vari muzvipatara zvehurumende, avo vari kushandisa zvikamu makumi maviri nechimwe kubva muzana chenzvimbo dzakachengeterwa kuti dzishandiswe nevarwere veCivid-19 muzvipatara zvehuruymende. Amai Mutsvangwa vakati makurukota ehurumende akatenderera nzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana achiona nzvimbo dziri kusangana nematambudziko anosanganisira zvekushandisa, kushomeka kwevashandi vezvehutano, kushomeka kwemweya unobatsira kufema varwere, kana medical oxygen nezvimwe. Amai Mutsvangwa vakatiwo dare remakurukota rakurudzira kuti bazi rezvemari riwanise nechimbi chimbi mari inoita mamiriyoni mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nemasere kana kuti 368 million RTGS kuti ishandiswe mukuona kuti vanhu vatevedzera mitemo yeLockdown Asi munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, uye vakambove gurukorta rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vanoti matambudziko ari kutaurwa nehurumende akagara ariko huye hurumende ingadai yakagadzirisa matambudziko aya. VaMadzorera vanotiwo vanokatyamadzwa nehuwandu hwevarwere veCovid-19 vanonzi vari muzvipatara vachiti zvimwe zvipatara zvakatozara kare nevarwere ava. Zvipatara zvehurumende zvakawanda pamwe nedzimwe nzvimbo dziri kuchengeterwa varwere veCovid-19 dzinonzi hadzina mweya wekubatsira kufema, medical oxygen, varwere veCovid-19 vanenge varwarisa. No media source currently available

headline: Kukwira kweHuwandu hweVane Covid-19 Kwoita Kuti Hurumende Ikurudzirwe Kuvheneka Vanhu Vakawanda
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti vanhu vanosvika zviuru zvitatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri, kana kuti 3 092, vakabatwa nechirwere charura pasi rose cheCovid-19, uye huwandu hwevanhu vafa hwakakwira kusvika pamakumi mashanu nevatatu, kana kuti 53. Bazi iri rakazivisawo kuti huwandu hwevanhu vakanga vapora kusvika nezuro hwakanga hwave pavanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nevana, kana kuti 924. Vanhu vanosvika mazana maviri negumi nevatatu kana kuti 213, vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu zviuru zvitatu nezana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemumwechete, kana kuti 3 191, vakavhenekwa kuona kana vaine chirwere ichi. Dunhu reHarare ndiro riri pamusoro pahuwandu hwevanhu vane chirwere ichi, riine vanhu vanosvika chiuru nemakumi manomwe nevashanu, kana kuti 1 075, richiteverwa nedunhu reBulawayo, iro rine vanhu mazana masere nevashanu kana kuti 805 vabatwa nechirwere ichi kusvika nemusi weChina. Makambani akawanda munyika anonzi ari kumbovhara zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwevamwe vashandi vaine chirwere ichi. Nemusi weChitatu, kambani yemabhazi yeZUPCO, iyo inove ndiyo chete ine mvumo yekutakura veruzhinji munguva ino yemutemo unorambidza kufamba famba kwevanhu, yakazivisa kuti vashandi vayo gumi vakanga vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi mushure mekuvhenekwa nevashandi vebazi rezvehutano. Izvi zvinonzi neimwe nyanzvi yezvehutano vari chiremba, Dr. Edgar Munatsi, hurumende inofanirwa kusimbisa hurongwa hwekutevera vese vakambosangana nevashandi ava pamwewo nevanho vose vari kuwanikwa vaine chirwere ichi, uyewo vose vanofamba nemabhazi eZUPCO vanofanirwa kuvhenekwawo kuti havana chirwere ichi here. Dr. Munatsi vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutarisisa zvakare hurongwa hwayo hwekuti ZUPCO ndiyo chete inofanirwa kunge ichitakura veruzhinji munyika, kuitira kuti ibvumidzewo vamwe vane dzimotokari dzavo kutakurawo vanhu.
