Johns Hopkins University Hospital yemuno muAmerica inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nemanomwe nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 17.3 million vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose, icho chaurayawo vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nezvitatu kana kuti 673,000 pasi rose. Dr. Munatsi vanoti kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kuongororwa kana vaine chirwere cheCovid-19 pazuva hwave kuwanda, hurumende inofanirwa kutokwinya kuti iwedzere kuitira kuti irwisane nechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi muNyaya dzeHutano hwePfungwa, Doctor Nzuzu, Vobatsira Vane Matambudziko eZvinodhaka Vari kuZimbabwe
text: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara muJacksonville mudunhu reFlorida muAmerica, Doctor Emmanuel Nzuzu, avo vanove nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano hwepfungwa pamwe nezvekubatsira vane dambudziko nezvinodhaka, vanoti vakazvipira kubatsira vane dambudziko rezvinodhaka vari kumusha. Doctor Nzuzu pari vari zvino vari kumusha kuZimbabwe uko vari kushanda nevanhu vane matambudziko ekutadza kusiya zvinodhaka zvakasiyanasiyana zvinosanganisira mbanje, mapiritsi nedoro, kuburikidza nekuita misangano. Doctor Nzuzu, avo vave nemakore anodarika gumi nemanomwe vachiita basa rekudzidzisa vane matambudziko nezvinodhaka kuburikidza nekushanda muzvipatara zvakasiyanasiyana pamwe nedandemutande ravo, vanoti vakaenda kuZimbabwe nekuona kukura kwedambudziko nezvinodhaka ravanoti rabata nyika. Vanoti kubva pavasvika kuZimbabwe muna Mbudzi, vaita misangano miviri muHarare, uye vane tarisiro yekuti vachange vachiita mimwe misangano kunze kweHarare. Doctor Nzuzu vanoti kune vanoda kubatsirwa vanokwanisa kuvabata panharembozha yavo yavari kushandisa muZimbabwe inoti + 263 776 505 052, kanawo kutsvaga bhuku ravo rakanangana nekubatsira vanenge vaine matambudziko ekukundikana kusiya zvinodhaka rinonzi, “How to Stay Sober”. Vanoda rubatsiro vanokwanisawo zvakare kuenda padandemutande ravo rinoti https://www.howtostaysober.info, apo vanhu vanogona kuenda vachiwana zvidzidzo zvekuti vangakwanise sei kusiya zvinodhaka. Doctor Nzuzu vakaberekerwa kuChipinge vakazoenda kuAmerica muna 2003. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi yeHutano Yoyambira Kusimbiswa kweMitemo Inodzivirira Kupararira kweCovid-19 Kana Miganhu neSouth Africa Yavhurwa
text: Imwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano inoti kuderera kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kuwanikwa vaine chirwere che Covid-19 munyika pamwe nevari kufa nacho chinhu chakanaka chose, asi izvi hazvifanirwe kuita kuti vanhu vavarairwe vokanganwa kuzvichengetedza. Doctor Mathew Nyashanu, avo vanodzidzisa zvehutano paNottingham Trent University kuBritain, vanotiwo hurongwa hweSouth Africa hwekuvhura miganho yayo hwakanakira vana veZimbabwe vagara vachipinda munyika iyi kunoita mabhindauko avo, asi vanhu vanofanirwa kurangarira kuti nyika iyi ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa muAfrica yose vabatwa pamwe nekufa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Doctor Nyashanu vanoti nekuda kwaizvozvo, panofanirwa kutorwa matanho akasimba ekuona kuti vese vachapinda munyika iyi vavhenekwa zvakasimba, uye vakachengetedzeka kuti vasanotapura chirwere ichi vachizodzoka nacho munyika vachizoparadzirawo kune vamwe. Vanotiwo hurumende inofanirwa kuti iwedzere huwandu hwevanhu vanovhenekwa pazuva, uyewo kuti igozodzivirira kuunganidzwa kwevanhu kumiganho vozopedzisira vatapurirana hutachiwana zvakare. South Africa yakazivisa kuti ichavhura miganho yayo musi wa 01 Gumiguru, unove mwedzi unouya kubvumidza vashanyi nevanoda kunoita zvebhizimusi munyika iyi, uye ichavhurawo nhandare nhatu dzichasvikira vanhu. Doctor Nyashanu vanoti nekuda kwekukwira kwehuwandu vave kubatwa zvakare neCovid-19 pasi rose, nyika dzakawanda dzinosanganisira Englad, Germany, France neAmerica dzave kusimbisa zvakare matanho ekudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Inoti Mashandiro eZUPCO Ari Kuisa Vanhu Munjodzi yeCovid-19
text: Munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti nyaya yekukundikana kuita basa kwekambani yeZUPCO kuchapa kuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chipararire zvakanyanya sezvo vanhu vari kugara vakaunga vakamirira kutakurwa. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu havafanire kuungana vakawanda kuitira kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 chotanga kupararira zvekare zvine mutsindo.Vanhu vakawandisa vanotarisirwa kuungana vanenge vari makumi matatu asi pari parufu chete. Hurumende yakabvisa makombi ose mumugwagwa ichiti vanoda kushanda vanofanira kushanda pasi pekambani yeZUPCO asi vakawanda vacho vanoti kambani iyi haibhadhare. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatiwo vemakombi vainge vokonzera njodzi mumigwagwa nekudaro vaifanira kubviswa. Mukuru wekambani yeZUPCO, Engineer Evaristo Madangwa, vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti vanoda mabhazi zviuru zviviri kuti vashande zvakanaka asi ikozvino vane mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nemaviri chete.Vanotiwo mwedzi uno vari kutarisira mamwe mabhazi kubva kuBelarus. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vanoti VaMnangagwa Vakaita Zano Ndega paMitemo yeKudzivirira Covid-19
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti mimwe mitemo yakatarwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemusi weChipiri yakananganga nekudzivirira kupararira kwemhando itsva yeCovid-19 inonzi omicron inoratidza kuti havana kutanga vataura nevane ruzivo nezvehutano. VaMnangagwa vakazivisa nyika kuti vashanyi vose kusanganisira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe vanofanira kuvhenekwa hutachiona hweCovid-19 panhandare yendege, kuitwa izvi kunoda madhora makumi matanhatu ekuAmerica. Vanenge vapinda munyika vanonzi vanofanira kugara pavo vega kwemavhiki maviri vachibhadhara mari dzavo. Vanhu vave kunzi vagare mudzimba kubva nenguva dza9 manheru kusvika na 6 mangwanani. VaMnangagwa vanoti izvi vari kuzviitira kuti nyika idzivirire kupararira kwemhando itsva yeCovid-19 iyi. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano Dr Henry Madzorera vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kuitwa nehurumende hazvibatsire vachiti kuungana pavanhu zvikuru mumabhazi neparufu. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyaya dzezvehutano reCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvimwe zvakaitwa naVaMnagangagwa zvinoratidza kuti vange vasina kutaura nenyanzvi sezvo zvichinetsa kuzadzikisa. Vati Zimbabwe haina nzvimbo dzakakwana dzekuti vanhu vagare mavhiki maviri vari voga uye vati kuti vanhu vanzi vamire kufamba nenguva dzepfumbamwe manheru zvinonetsa nekuti hakuna mabhazi ekufambisa.. Zvichakadaro, mumashoko kuvatori venhau, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti zvichatora mavhiki akawanda kuti dzizive kuti mhando itsva iyi yakamira sei. Imwe kambani inogadzira nhomba yenstraZeneca inoti yatotumira nyanzvi kuBotswana neEswathini kuti dzitange kuita tsvakiridzo yezvemhando itsva iyi. Mamwe makambani anoti Johnson, Pfizer neModerna anoti atangawo kuita tsvakiridzo dzezvemhando itsva iyi. No media source currently available

headline: USAID Yopa Rubatsiro Kune veChidiki Vanorarama neHutachiona hweHIV
text: Vechidiki vanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS vatambira nemufaro mari yerubatsiro yapiwa kusangano rakazvimiririra reAfricaid Zvandiri nesangano nebazi rehurumende reAmerica reUnited States Agency for International Development. Africaid yapiwa mamiriyoni makumi maviri emadhora kuti ishandise muzvirongwa zvevechidiki munyaya dzeHIV/AIDS. Mumwe wevechidiki vari kurarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS achishanda neAfricaid, Tanyaradzwa Vinho ati mari yavawana iyi ichavabatsira kupa dzidziso kune vechidiki munyaya dzechirwere ichi. Izvi zvatsigirwa naVengai Hadji ane makore makumi maviri nematatu anoraramawo nehutachiona uhu. Hadji ati shuviro yake ndeyekuti vechidiki vanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS vadzidziswewo mabasa ekuzviraramisa muhupenyu sezvo vamwe vavo vari nherera. Mumwe anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muAfricaid, Amai Martha Maodzeke vaudza Studio 7 kuti vane chivimbo chekuti mari yavapiwa ichavabatsira kuvandudza hupenyu hwevechidiki munyaya dzeHIV/AIDS. Amai Maodzeke vati kubva mumatunhu matanhau avange vachishanda vanenge vawedzera kusvika pamakumi maviri nemaviri. Vanomirira sangano reUnited States Agency for International Development kana kuti USAID muZimbabwe Amai Stephanie Funk vati vanofadzwa nebasa reAfricaid iro ririkupa tarisiro kune vechidiki munyaya dzeHIV/AIDS. Mari yekubatsira vechidiki iyi inouya panguva iyo gwaro reongororo rakabudiswa United Nations Programme on HIV and AIDS kana kuti UNAIDS riri kuburitsa pachena kuti kunyange hazvo ndufu dzine chekuita neHIV/AIDS dziri kuderera kubva mugore ra2005, vechidiki vari pakati pemakore gumi nemashanu nemakore makumi maviri nemana vari kusarira munyaya dzekuongororwa ropa nekuwana mishonga yeHIV/AIDS.

headline: United Nation Population Fund Yokurudzira Zvirongwa Zvekubatsira VeChidiki Kuti Vasatapurirwe HIV
text: Bazi reUnited Nation Population Fund kana kuti UNFPA riri kukurudzira kuti mabasa ekuti vechidiki vasatapurirwe chirwere cheHIV asimbaradzwe kuitira kudzikisa huwandu hwevari kutapurirwa kana kuti prevalence rate huri pazvikamu gumi nezviga zvitanhatu kubva muzana kana kuti 14,6%. Vachitaura mushure memusangano nemukuru wenational Aids Council Dr Tapuwa Magure, mukuru weUNFPA munyika Dr Ester Muia vakati kuderedza kupararira kwechirwere ichi, zvakakosha kuti vose vari mubasa iri vashande nevechidiki. VaMagure vakati hurumende yakazvipira kuzadzikisa kurudziro iyi. Mutauriri weNational Aids Council Amai Tadiwa Nyatanga-Pfupa vati sangano ravo rine zvirongwa zvakawanda zvekubatsira vechidiki. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeGuta reHarare Inotara Nzvimbo dzeKubaira Vanhu Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Kanzuru yeguta reHarare yazivisa kuti ine nzvimbo makumi matatu neimwe, kana kuti 31, dzayakatara dziri mumisha inogara vanhu kuti dzinge dzichibairwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti kanzuru yavo, ichishanda nebazi rehutano, yakatora danho iri senzira yekurerutsira veruzhinji kuti vasafamba mitunhu yakareba kunobaiwa nhomba, uyewo kuitira kurerutsa dambudziko rekuungana kwevanhu vave kuda kubaiwa nhomba pari zvino. Nzvimbo dzaziviswa nekanzuru dzinoti: Braeside FHS Clinic, Hatfield Satellite Clinic, Sunningdale Satellite Clinic, Waterfalls Satellite Clinic, Tariro Satellite Clinic, Rutsanana Polyclinic, Western Triangle Satellite Clinic, Glenview Satellite Clinic, Glen View Polyclinic, Glen Norah Satellite Clinic, Budiriro Polyclinic. Budiriro Satellite Clinic, Mufakose FHS Clinic, Kambuzuma Polyclinic, Kuwadzana Satellite Clinic, Kuwadzana Polyclinic, Warren Park Polyclinic, Rujeko Polyclinic, Belvedere Satellite Clinic, Mabelreign Satellite Clinic, Marlborough Satellite Clinic, Avondale Satellite Clinic neMt. Pleasant Satellite Clinic. Mbare Polyclinic, Hatcliffe Polyclinic, Borrowdale Satelite Clinic, Highlands FHS Clinic, Eastlea FHS Clinic, Greendale FHS Clinic, Mabvuku Satelite Clinic, pamwe chete neHighfields Polyclinic. VaChideme vazivivasawo kuti zvipatara zviviri zvehurumende zvinoti Parirenyatwa Central Hospital neSally Mugabe Central Hospital, uyewo zvakazvimirira zvoga zvinoti Cimas Borrowdale Clinic ne Health Point zviri kubairwawo nhomba yekudzvirira Covid-19. Panyaya yekuti vamwe vari kutadza kubaiwa nhomba ivo vaswera vari mumitsetse, VaChideme vanoti dambudziko riripo nderekuti vakoti vaita vashoma zvichienzaniswa nehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubuda vachida kubaiwa, asi vanoti vanotarisira kuti dambudziko iri richagadzisirwa nekukasika. Vanovimbisawo kuti makirinika avo ane nhomba inokwanira vanhu vose vachiti vachawaniswa zvakare nehurumende imwe yenhomba mamiriyoni maviri yapinda munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Vofa Munjodzi dzeMumigwagwa
text: Mutauriri wemapurisa, Chief Supritendent Paul Nyathi, vanoti vanhu makumi mana nevasere vashaya kubva musi wa 15 Zvita kusvika pari zvino munjodzi dzemumigwagwa. Masvingo ndiyo inonzi ine vanhu vakawandisa vashaya munjodzi dzemumugwagwa vanove gumi nevana. Kune vamwe vanonzi vashaya vakawanda kuMatabeleland South neMidilands. Mapurisa anoti pane njodzi mazana manomwe negumi nemasere dzitika pari zvino zvichienzaniswa nemazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe. Vanhu vakuwara gore rino vanosvika mazana mashanu zvichienzaniswa nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevana gore rapera. Mapurisa anoti kusatyaira zvakanaka ndiko kwopa kuti njodzi dzirambe dzichiwanda.

headline: Mvura Yonetsa Vagari vekwaGutu kuMasvingo
text:
Vagari vakawanda kwaMpandawana kwaGutu vanoti vari kutyira kubatwa nezvirwere zvakaita seCholera sezvo vave nemasvondo anodarika matatu vasina mvura mudzimba dzavo zvichinzi mushina unopomba mvura wakafa. Vagari vanoti vakaudzwa nebazi reZinwa rinovapa mvura kuti kune mishina yakafa kudhamu rinopombwa mvura asi havafari nenguva yareba yatorwa dambudziko iri risina kugadziriswa. Vagari vemumisha yeve ruzhinji yakaita seku Hwiru nekuGona vanoti nekushomeka kwemvura vave kushandisa mvura yemumatsime asina kuvharwa pamwe nezvikova iyo iri kukanganisa hutano hwavo. Sachigaro wesangano rinomiririra vagari reGutu United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance, VaLloyd Mufudze, vanoti vagari vazhinji vave kugara vachinzwa midumbu nekushandisa mvura yakasviba yemumatsime.

Mumwe mugari wemumusha weGona, VaTafunga Mamombe, vanoti kushaikwa kwemvura kwenguva refu kwave kutyorwa kodzero dzavo. VaMamombe vati vakaudzwa kuti mushina uchagadziriswa nekukurumidza asi nanhasi chabuda hapana. Vamwe vagari vari kupomera kanzuru yeGutu, mhosva yekusaita hany’a nedambudziko ravo nekusunda bazi reZinwa kuti rigadzirise dambudziko iri. Asi mukuru webasa mukanzuru yekwaGutu, VaAlexender Mutembwa, vaudza Stduio 7 parunhare kuti dambudziko iri riri kuZinwa, ivo havana simba rekuvamhanyisa kuti vagadzirise. Kanzura veward 34 maMupandawana, VaBernard Chimwango, vanoti vakambozama kutaura ne Zinwa kuti igadzirise zviri kunetsa, asi bazi iri riri kuisa zvitanda munzeve.

Asi mutaururi weZinwa, VaTsungirai Shoriwa, vati vane hurombo nekutadza kugadzirisa dambudziko iri, asi vati riri kugadziriswa nechimbi chimbi. Vagari vanoti dambudziko remvura rinotyirwa kuti ringango wedzera kupararira kweChirwere cheCovid-19 icho chinokurudzirwa kushandiswa kwemvura yakakwanda uye yakachena. No media source currently available

headline: Chirwere cheCovid-19 Chonetsa Mumajeri
text:
Bazi rinoona nezvekuchengetwa kwevasungwa mumajeri reZimbabwe Prisons and Correctional Services, ZPCS, raramba kuzivisa huwandu hwevasungwa vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika panguva iyo vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika mumajeri vari kuti dambudziko reCovid-19 ranetsa zvikuru mumajeri ari munyika. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri weZPCS munyika, VaPeter Chaparanganda, avo vakanga vavimbisa kutipa huwandu hwevasungwa vane chirwere cheCovid-19, vadududza nhasi vachiti tipihwe nachiremba mukuru wemajeri, Dr Evidence Gaka. VaChaparanganda varamba kutipa nhamba dzaDr Gaka vachiti vanoda
kutanga vataura navo asi vazodzima foni yavo vasati vatipa nhamba
dzacho. Asi svondo rakapera Dr Gaka vakaudza bepa nhau reHerald kuti vari
kushushikana nehuwandu hwevasungwa vari kubatwa mumajeri nechirwere cheCovid-19 vachiti muChinhoyi vasungwa gumi nevatatu vainge vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Mutauriri weZPCS mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaPeter Kondowe,vati
mumwe musungwa abatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvakwidza huwandu kusvika pagumi nevana. Kunyange nzvimbo inochengeterwa vasungwa muChinhoyi iine vasungwa gumi nevana vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19, vashandi vepo vanoti huwandu uhwu hunogona kunge hwuri pamusoro sezvo manhamba evasungwa vanenge vabatwa nechirwere ichi asingaziviswe kune vashandi vose. Kusaburitswa kwemanhamba kunonzi kwakamboita kuti vamwe vashandi
varambe kukwira motokari imwechete nevasungwa kuenda kumatare
edzimhosva vachiti vanofamba netsoka sezvo pari pedyo vachityira
kutapurirana chirwere cheCovid-19. Asi zvinonzi vakazokwira motokari imwechete mushure mukunge vashandi
vayambirwa kuti vakatizwa nevasungwa vachaiswa panguva yakaoma. VaKondowe vati vanofunga kuti huwandu hwevasungwa vari kubatwa
nechirwere ichi hwakawanda muChinhoyi nekuda kwekuti matare
edzimhosva ekuKaroi akambovharwa vasungwa vakawanda vakaendeswa
kuChinhoyi.

Panyaya yenhomba yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19, VaKondowe vati
vasungwa, vanochengeta vasungwa, pamwe nemhuri dzavo vanosvika makumi mashanu nevana vakabayiwa nhomba pazororo reEaster chete. Pajeri reMutimurefu rekuMasvingo zvinonzi kune vasungwa makumi manomwe nevasere vakabatwa chirwere cheCovid-19 masvondo maviri akapfuura. Zvinonzi mujeri reRemand muHarare vasungwa vakawanda vari kurwara
nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvekuti vaimbove meya weguta reHarare, VaJacob Mafume, vakabata chirwere ichi pavakambosungwa vakaendeswa kuremand mwedzi mishoma yapfuura. Mukuru wesanganore Zimbabwe Association for Crime Prevention and
Rehabilitation, VaEdison Chihota, vati vari kushushikana
nevasungwa vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vachiti hurumende
inofanirwa kuburitsa vamwe vasungwa sezvayakavimbisa. VaChihota vati vasungwa vanofanirwa kubayiwa nhomba nekukurumidza
sezvo vachipinda nekubuda nguva dzose mujeri. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nevaimbove gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Henry Madzorera,
avo vanoti vasungwa vanopara mhosva diki vanofanirwa kubhadhariswa
fayindi uye kuti vasungwa vapihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kuitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba.

Hurumende yakazivisa kuti pane vasungwa vanosvika zviuru makumi maviri nezviviri kana kuti 22 000 mumajeri anofanirwa kunge ayine vasungwa zviuru gumi nezvisere kana kuti 18 000. Tatadza kubata gurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, kuti tinzwe kuti
danho rehurumende rekudzikisa huwandu hwevasungwa mumajeri richaitwa riini. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu zviuru zvitanhatu nezana
nemakumi mashanu nevanomwe kana kuti 6157 vakabayiwa nhomba yekutanga nezuro izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga pazviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvitatu zvine mazana mana nemakumi mashanu nevana kana kuti 123 454.

Bazi iri rakazivisawo kuti nezuro hapana munhu akafa nechirwere
cheCovid-19 izvo zvakaita kuti vanhu vafa nechirwere ichii varambe vari
chiuru chimwechete nemazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nevashanu kana kuti 1525. Vanhu gumi nemumwe chete vakabatwa nechirwere ichii
nezuro izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechichere cheCovid-19 pazviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matatu nevana kana kuti 36 934.

Vanhu vachiri kurwara nechirwere ichi vava mazana matanhatu nemakumi
mashanu nemumwechete kana kuti 651.

headline: Chimwe Chirwere Chakafanana neCovid-19 Chinonzi Chatangidza Kubata Vana
text: Vanachiremba vanoti chimwezve chirwere chavanoti chakaita se Covid-19 asi chakanangana nevana, chave kunetsa mumatunhu mazhinji muAmerica neku United Kingdom. Matunhu gumi nemashanu muAmerica anoti arikuongorora chirwere ichi, icho chiri kubata vana asi chisati chazivikanwa zvakakwana, vachiti chirwere ichi chakaita se coronavirus. Gavhuna vedunhu reNew York, VaAndrew Cuomo, vanoti vezvehutano mudunhu reNew York vawana vana vanopfuura zana vanechirwere ichi, icho chinonzi chakafanana nechimwezve chirwere chinonzi Kawasaki Desease. Vati magavhuna ematunhu gumi nemashanu muAmerica vave kuongororavo chirwere ichi mumatunhu avo. VaCuomo vati avo vane vana vakamboenda padyo nemunhu ane Covid-19 masvondo apfuura, vanofanirwa kuziva kuti iyi iyambiro uye vanofanirwa kuenda nemwana kuna vanachiremba nekukurumidza. Vana vatatu vane makore mashanu, makore manomwe neumwe ane makore gumi nemasere vatofa nechirwere ichi mudunhu reNew York. Vachipa humbowo mberi kweparamende ye America nemusi weChipiri, chiremba vanoona nezvezvirwere zvinotapuriranwa, Dr Anthony Fauci, vakayambira hurumende nemagavhuna mu America kuti vangwarire chirwere chave kutanga kuonekwa muvana, vachiti chirwere ichi chinoratidza sekuti chine hukama necoronavirus. Vanachiremba kuUnited Kingdom ndivo vanonzi vakatanga kuona chirwere ichi, vachichifananidza nechirwere chinonzi Kawasaki Disease, chirwere chakaipisisa kuvana vanenge vambobatwa nezvimwe zvirwere. Tabvunza nyanzvi mune zvehutano, Doctor Frenk Guni, kuti varondedzere pamusoro pechirwere ichi chanangana nevana vadiki. No media source currently available

headline: Chirwere cheMapapu muVana Vadiki Chinonzi Chabata Guta reHarare
text: Bepanhau reHerald rinoti muHarare maita chirwere chemapapu chiri kubata vana vadiki, pachibudawo mashoko ekuti chipatara chevana vadiki chemunyika cheHarare Children's Hospital, icho chiri paHarare Central Hospital, chiri kukundikana kubatsira vana vose vari kuendeswa pachipatara ichi. Chipatara ichi chinonzi hachina michina inodiwa mukubatsira kuti vana ava vakwanise kufema. Bepanhau iri rinoti nezuro vana vanosvika zana nemakumi mana vaive vatambirwa pachipatara ichi vachinetsekana nechirwere ichi. Mazuva mashoma adarika, hurumende yakazivisawo kuti zvipatara zvayo hazvichina oxygen, izvo zvinonzi zvakaita kuti chipatara chevana cheHarare Children’s Hospital chimbovhara zvimwe zvikamu zvacho. Mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Doctors for Human Rights, Doctor Fortune Nyamande, vanoti kushaikwa kwe oxygen munyika kuchatowedzera dambudziko rechirwere chemapapu chanetsa muguta guru renyika ichi, zvichizoita kuti chirwere ichi chipararire kune mamwe matunhu. Doctor Nyamande vanoti chirwere chemapapu ichi chinonyanyobata vana vane makore mashanu zvichidzika, uye vanenge vachinetseka kufema. Vanoti vabereki vanokwanisa kudzivirira vana vavo kubva kuchirwere ichi kuburikidza nekuita hutsanana, zvikuru pamweya wakavapoteredza. No media source currently available

headline: Vakoti Vakawanda Vari Kubatwa neChirwere cheCovid-19 Vachiita Basa Ravo
text: Sangano revakoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nekukundikana kwehurumende kupa vashandi vemuzvipatara zvikwanisiro zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere cheCovid-19. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa kwevakoti gumi nevasere nechirwere ichi pachipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospitals kana kuti UBH mushure mekurapa mumwe murume ainge aine chirwere ichi. Mwedzi wapera vamwe vakoti gumi nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi pachipatara cheMpilo. Vamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara paUBH kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba makumi matanhatu nevasere vakambomanikidzwawo kumbogara kudzimba mushure mekurapa mumwezve murwere weCovid-19. Mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vakuru reSenior Hospital Doctors Association Dr Aaron Musara, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu zvakatonyanya kuipa kuzvipatara zvematunhu zvisina zvekudzivirira vashandi zvakakwana. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mukuru anoona nezvekurwisa chirwere ichi, Dr Agnes Mahomva, sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Mutungamiri musangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnoch Dongo, vati zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kuvakoti nevamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 munyika hwakwira kusvika pamazana masere nemakumi masere nevashanu, kana kuti 885. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kushushikanawo nekukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munharaunda hwakakwira zvakanyanya neChitatu sezvo pavanhu makumi mapfumbamwe nevasere vakabatwa nechirwere ichi, makumi mana nevasere vakachitapurirwa munharaunda pasina nhoroondo yekubuda kunze kwenyika. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi munyika vave mazana maviri nevatanhatu, kana kuti 206. Vanhu vafa vachiri vapfumbamwe uye vavhenekewa chirwere ichi munyika yose vadarika zviuru makumi masere nezviviri kana kuti 82,000. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vana Vane Chirwere cheMoyo Vanombonorapwa kuItaly Vofira muNyika neKutadziswa Kufamba neCovid-19
text: Apo pasi rose riri kutarisana nekurwisa chirwere charura cheCovid-19, zvimwe zvirwere zvakaita sezvemoyo zvikuru muvana vadiki zvasara zvisina ari kunyatsozvirapa izvo zvoisa vana vakawanda munyika munjodzi huru vamwe vachifa. Vabereki vevana vane chirwere ichi vanonziwo vanogona kutangawo kurwara nepfungwa sezvo basa rekuvariritira rakaoma. Chimwe chirongwa chakanganiswa nedenda iri ndechekuenda kwevana vemuZimbabwe kuItaly kunorapwa chirwere chemaburi pamoyo kana kuti Congenital Heart Disease-CHD. Vanachiremba vekuItaly vanoenda kuchipatara cheRoman Catholic cheAll Soul’s Mission kwaMutoko uko vanosarudza vana vanenge vari munjodzi huru vovaendesa kuItaly. Vanachiremba ava vanoshandawo nemamwe masangano akaita sereBrave Little Hearts. Sangano reBrave Little Hearts rakaumbwa naAmai Tendai Moyo wekuBulawayo avo vakashaikirwa nemwana wavo Rudorwashe aiva nechirwere cheCHD ichi. Sangano iri rinounza pamwe chete vabereki vane vana vane denda iri kuti vapangane mazano. Mumwe mubereki ane mwana akashaya ave nemakore maviri nekukundikana kunorapwa kuItaly gore rapera nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 ndi Amai Angelina Manda vaudza Studio 7 nezvekurwadziwa kwavari kuita nekurasikirwa nemwana. Vachitaura nezvematambudziko evabereki vari kurwarirwa, Amai Tendai Chatikobo, vanotungamirira sangano reBrave Little Hearts muHarare vati zvinhu zvakaoma kuchengeta mwana ane chirwere chemoyo ichi. Amai Chatikobo, avo vanemwana anemakore matatu ane denda remwoyo iro risingakwanisike kugadzirika, vati maoparesheni aya aisimboitwa kuzvipatara zvehurumende zviri munyika kare asi ikozvino hakuchina vanachiremba vakawanda vanokwanisa kuvarapa. Vashoma varipo vanodhurawo zvakanyanya. Vatiwo Covid-19 yakavhiringidza hurongwa hwavo uye kuda kuzviita munyika kunodhura. Studio 7 yataurawo nemumwe mubereki VaTatenda Katayi vanoti havo vakaita rombo rakanaka sezvo mwana wavo akakwanisa kuenda kuItaly muna 2019 Covid isati yatanga. Vati vari kufarawo kuti mwana wavo ave kukwanisa kuenda kuchikoro nevamwe. Asi vamwe vabereki vanonzi vanonoka kuendesa vana kunorapwa nekushaya ruzivo vachifunga kuti vange varoyiwa. Amai Moyo vanova vakavamba sangano reBrave Little Hearts vati kune mhando makumi mana ematenda emoyo asi denda remaburi epamoyo rakawanda munyika uyezve rinokwanisa kurapika rikakurumidzirwa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Josephat Chiripanyanga vaudza Studio 7 kuti vana vese vanozvarwa vaine maburi aya asi anovhara pavanenge vasungunukwa, asi vakati pane dzimwe nguva anotadza kuvhara. Vanoti vana ava vanozokura vave nedambudziko rokuzarirwa nekuneta uye vasingakure vaine huremu hunoendera nemakore avo. Mukuru weAll Souls Mission Hospital Dr Massimo Migani vati ichokwadi kuti chirongwa chokuendesa vana kuItaly kuti vanoitwa maoparesheni chakambomiswa asi vanotarisira kuti chinogona kusimudzirwa kupera kwegore rino kana kutanga kwegore rinouya. Kubva muna 1985 vana vanodarika mazana mana vaenda kunorapwa kuItaly. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reThe National Age Network of Zimbabwe Rocherechedza Zuva reHutano Richitarisa Hutano hweVakwegura
text: Sangano rinoona nezvekukwegura kwevanhu munyika, reNational Age Network Zimbabwe, nhasi riri kucherechedza zuva rehutano pasi rose, reWorld Health Day. Zuva iri rinocherechedzwa musi wa7 Kubvumbi pasi rose, asi sangano iri rakasarudza kuricherechedza musi wa 13 Kubvumbi, kumahofisi esangano reWorld Health Organisation, WHO, ari kuNewlands, muHarare. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano iri, VaMarck Chikanza, vanoti vachatorawo mukana wekucherechedza zuva iri vachiparurawo gwaro rakanangana nehutano hwevanhu vakwegura, uye kupemberera kusvitsa makore makumi manomwe kwesangano reWorld Health Organisation. Vanoti gwaro ravachaparura iri rakabuda mushure mekushanda kwavakaita pasi pechirongwa chinonzi “Better Health for Older People in Africa” munyika ina dzinoti Zimbabwe, Mozambique, Ethiopia, neTanzania. “Shure kwekudarozvo, takabva taona zvakakosha izvo kuti tiite iyo inonzi National Health and Aging Strategy. Muno muZimbabwe takaiti National Health Aging Strategy,” Vanodaro VaChikanza. Vanoti vakaronga kutandadza vanhu nemitambo yakasiyanasiyana, inosanganisira mhanzi kubva Salvation Army Band. VaChikanza vanotiwo vakakoka vanhu vakawanda, masangano akazvimirira, pamwe nemapoka ehurumende kumhemberero dzavo idzi. Sangano reNational Age Network of Zimbabwe, mubatanidzwa wemasangano akazvimirira anokwana kuita gumi nemaviri, uye mubatanidzwa uyu wakaumbwa muna 2012 uchitarisa mararamiro nemashandiro aiita vanhu vakwegura, zvikuru mumapurazi. Mubatanidzwa uyu unoshandawo zvakare nemapoka maviri ehurumende, anoti rinoona nezvezvirwere zvisingatapuriranwe, riri pasi pebazi rezvehutano, pamwe neboka rezvekurima, reAgritex, iro riri pasi pebazi rezvekurima. No media source currently available

headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chopona Nepasaka reShumba kuSouth Africa Mushure Mekutemwa neDemo
text: Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe VaImmanuel Zinja vanoti vanotenda Mwari kuti vachiri vapenyu mushure mekuda kupondwa kwavakaitwa kunzvimbo yeBredasdorp kuWestern Cape mavhiki apfura nezvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa zvainge zvapihwa mvumo yekuratidzira murunyararo nemapurisa asi zvikazotanga mhirizhonga. VaZinja vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakapona nepaburi retsono mushure mekutemwa nedemo mumusoro nemhomho yevairatidzira ichiti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvidzokere kumusha kwazvo sezvo zvainge zvotorera zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa mabasa. VaZinja vanoti vakaenda kuSouth Africa mugore ra 2014 umo vange vachiita basa rekutema huni vakazotora mudzimai wavo kuti auye kuzogara vano. Vanoti mudzimai wavo uyu akazvitakura parizvino. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vamwe vana vavo vari kuZimbabwe uye vari kutsvaga rubatsiro rwekuti vadzokere kumusha sezvo basa rakapera uye vave kurwara.

headline: Mumwe Mudzimai weChidiki Ofa neCovid-19 muHarare
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti mumwe mudzimai wemuHararare ane makore makumi maviri nerimwe okuberekwa akashaya nemusi weMugovera nechirwere cheCovid19. Mudzimai uyu anonzi ainge asina nhoroondo yekuenda kunze kwenyika zvinonzi navanachiremba zvinogona kureva kuti chirwere cheCovid19 chiri kutenderera munharaunda vanhu vasingazvizive. Pave nevanhu vasere vashaya munyika nekuda kwechirwere ichi. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwakwirawo kusvika pamazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemasere kana kuti 698. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa kwevamwe vanhu makumi manomwe nevatatu nechirwere ichi neMugovera. Pavanhu ava, makumi mashanu nevashanu kana kuti 55 vakabva kuSouth Africa, vatatu kuBotwana, vamwe vatatu kuMozambique, vaviri kuAmerica mumwe chete kubva kuZambia uye vamwe vasere vakachitapurirwa munyika. Pavanhu vakabatwa nechirwere munyika vaviri ndivo chete vanozivikanwa kuti vakachiwana sei asi patotanga chipatapata chekutsvaga kuti vamwe vatnhatu vakachiwana sei. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi munyika izana nemakumi masere nemumwe kana kuti 181. Vanhu vavhenekewa chirwere ichi munyika vadarika zviuru makumi manomwe nemasere kana kuti 78 000. Kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kuri kuuya apo vashandi vakawanda vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vanachiremba nevakoti vari kuramwa mabasa vachiti mari yavari kutambiriswa ishoma zvikuru. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kugurukota rezvehutano Doctor Obadiah Moyo sezvo vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatakavatumira. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Edgar Munatsi vanoti kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kuSouth Africa avo vanodarika zviuru zana zvine makumi masere nemasere kana kuti 188 000, zvinhu zvinogona kuipirawo Zimbabwe. Vafa muSouth Africa vadarika zviuru zvitatu. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana mana ane makumi matanhatu nevatatu kana kuti 463, 000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica uye vashaya vadarika zviuru gumi nerimwe zvine makumi masere nematanhatu kana kuti 11, 086. Vapora vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri ane makumi maviri kana kuti 222,000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni gumi nerimwe ane zviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 11,2 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi ichiteverwa neBrazil. Vanhu vafa muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana zvine makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 129, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana masere kana kuti 2,8 million. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nerimwe kana kuti 531,000. Vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni matanhatu kana kuti 6 million.

headline: Kushaya Dzidziso Kwopa Kuti Vakawanda Vatapurirwe Chirwere cheCovid19 Vadzoka kuZimbabwe
text: Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano anoona nezvemamiriro enharaunda uye nzvimbo dziri kuchengeterwa vanhu vari kubva kunze kwenyika kana kuti maqurantine centres VaVictor Nyamandi vanoti kushaya ruzivo rwakakwana ndiko kwopa kuti vanhu vakawanda vatapurirane chirwere checoronavirus munzvimbo idzi. Vanoti vari kushushikanawo zvikuru nekutiza kuri kuita vanhu munzvimbo idzi mushure mekunge mapurisa azivisa kuti vanhu zana nemakumi masere nevana vainge vatiza. Pavanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nevashanu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika, mazana mana nemakumi mana nemasere vakabva kunze kwenyika, makumi manomwe nemanomwe vachitapurirwa chirwere ichi munyika. Dare repamusoro rakatombopa mutongo wekuti hurumende igadzirise zvinhu kunzvimbo dzinochengeterwa vanhu idzi mushure mekunge sangano ravanachiremba reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights rakwidza nyaya kumatare richiti hakuna hutsanana. No media source currently available

headline: Kupararira kweCoronavirus Kune Vasina Kubuda muNyika Kwotemesa VanaChiremba Musoro
text: Mumwe chiremba Dr Edgar Munatsi vanoti vanhu vanofanira kungwarira zvikuru kupararira kwave kuita chirwere checoronavirus munyika zvikuru kune vanhu vasina nhoroondo yekumbobuda munyika kana kusangana nevane chirwere ichi vanozivikanwa. Dr Munatsi vanoti kurwara kwevanhu kuMhondoro, Mrewa neChegutu vasina nhoroondo yekushanya kunze kwenyika idambudziko guru chaizvo zvinogona kuti hurumende haisi kuita zvakakwana kuvheneka hutachiona uhu. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muZimbabwe hwasvika pamakumi matatu nematanhatu kana kuti 36. Vanhu vapora kubva muchirwere ichi vapfumbamwe uye vafa vachiri vana. Tichiri panya iyi, huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni mana nezvuru mazana mana kana kuti 4,1 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere. Vanhu vafa vave kuda kwechirwere ichi vadarika zvuru mazana maviri zvine makumi masere nematatu 283, 000. Asi pavanhu ava vapora ndivo vakawanda vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete nezvuru mazana mana kana kuti 1, 4 million. Mashoko atumirwawo Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kubazi rezvehutano resangano iri reAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zvuru makumi matanhatu nematatu, 63, 000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica uye vashaya zvuru zviviri nemazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe  2, 290. Vapona vanosvika zvuru makumi maviri nechimwe 21, 000. No media source currently available

headline: Vechidiki Vochenesa Guta Ravo reChinhoyi
text: Vechidiki vedzisvondo vari kubatana nekanzuru yeChinhoyi mukuchenesa guta ravo pamwe nenzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji kuitira kuti vadzivirire zvirwere zvinobatwa nekuda kwemvura yakasviba. Vechidiki ava vanosvika makumi mashanu, vachibva kumasangano akasiyana siyana, vakafamba vachinhonga marara pamwe nekubvisa tsvina munofamba nemvura kuti isajenge kana kuyeredza tsvina ichienda munzvimbo munotorwa mvura yekunwa nevamwe vanhu izvo zvinozokonzeresa kuti varware. Mumwe wechidiki, Memory Godzwa, anonamata neApostolic Faith Mission, AFM, anoti apinda muchirongwa chekuchenesa nharaunda kuti adzivirire zvirwere muvanhu pamwe nekufa kwezvipuka zvinogara mumvura kana mvura yakasviba. Mumwe wechidiki, Jonathan Manyere, uyo anonamata nechechi yeFaith Ministry mumusha unogara veruzhinji weChikonohono, anoti kuchenesa nharaunda kwevechidiki vedzichechi dzakasiyana vari pamwechete zvinosimbaradza humwe pakati pemachechi. Mukuru wechirongwa chekuchenesa nharaunda, VaVisitor Munangi, vanoti vakaona kuti zvirwere zvinokonzerwa nekunaya kwemvura zvinowanda nekunaya kwemvura. Mumwe wevakuru vemubatanidzwa wemachechi, Rev Andrew Chikomo, vanoti danho rakatora machechi rinoratidza pachena kuti machechi havatarise pane zvemweya chete, asi kuti vane hany'a nehutano hwenhengo dzavo. VaMunangi vanoti chirongwa chekuchenesa nharaunda mutoro wevanhu vose nekudaro vachakoka vemamwe masangano asiri emachechi pamwe nevana vechikoro kuti vadyare pfungwa yekuita hany'a nekusviba kwenharaunda. VaChikomo vanoti vachatanga kuisa pekurasira marara munzvimbo dzakawanda kuti munhu asafambe akabata marara kwenguva yakareba asati asvika pane bhini. No media source currently available

headline: Makambani Opindawo Muhurongwa hweKutenga Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Vemabhizinesi vaparura chirongwa chekubaya vanhu nhomba vachishanda pamwe chete nehurumende nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Vemabhizinesi vaparura chirongwa chinonzi Business Preparedness, Prevention and Response to Covid -19 kana kuti BPPRI kuti vabatsirane nehurumende kudzikisa huwandu hwevanobatwa neCovid-19 kuburikidzanekutenga nhomba nezvimwe zvekushandisa muzvipatara kurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19. Vachitaura pakuparurwa kwechirongwa ichi nhasi muHarare, sachigaro weBPPRI, Amai Getrude Mashonganyika, vati vemabhizimusi vanoda kuti dambudziko reCovid-19 ripere kuitira kuti mabhizinesi avo abudirire izvo zvakavasunda kuti vatengewo nhomba dzeCovid-19 kuitira kuti nyika ikurumidze kuva nehuwandu hunotarisirwa hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba munyika yose, kana kuti herd immunity. Kambani yeCIMAS ndiyo ichange ichitungamirira vemabhizimusi muchirongwa chekutengwa kwenhomba idzi. Vachitaura pachiitiko ichi, sachigaro weCimas, Amai Emma Fundira, vatiwo chinangwa chavo ndechekuti vanhu vakawanda vazvidzivirire kuchirwere chinouraya ichi. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezveutano, Dr John Mangwiro, vatiwo vafadzwa zvikuru nekubatana kwemabhizimusi nehurumende mukurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 VaMangwiro vatiwo vari kutarisira kuti makambani aya achapawo veruzhinji, kunyanya kunzvimbo dzakasarira shure, ruzivo pamusoro pezvakanakira kubaiwa kwenhomba. VaMangwiro vatiwo hurumende yakasarudza kushandisa nhomba yeSinopharm neSinovac nedzimwewo nekuti ndidzo dzinogona kuchengetedzeka zvakanaka munyika. CIMAS inoti vemabhizimusi vakaisa madhora ekuAmerica miriyoni imwe chete kutsigira chirongwa chekutengwa kwenhomba. Nezuro, vanhu zviuru gumi nezvinomwe nemazana matatu nemakumi mana nevashanu, 17 345, vakabayiwa nhomba yekutanga nezuro wakare, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga pazviuru mazana matatu nemakumi masere nezvisere nemakumi maviri nemumwe chete, 388 21. Vanhu zvuru zvitanhatu nemazana manomwe nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe, 6 729, vakabayiwa nhomba yepiri nezuro wakare, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba yepiri pazviuru makumi matanhatu nezvipfumbamwe nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri, 69 992. Zimbabwe iri kushandisa mishonga yeSinovac neSinopharm kubaya vanhu, kunyange hazvo World Health Organization ichiti haisati yapa mishonga iyi chitambi chekuti ishandiswe kuruzhinji rwevanhu. Zimbabwe inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano dzoshushikana neKuderera kweVanhu Vari Kubaiwa Nhomba yeTatu yeCovid-19
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti vanhu gumi nevatanhatu (16) vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose, uye vamwe vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nezana nemakumi maviri (1,121) vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Izvi zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pazviuru zvishanu zvine zana nevasere (5 108), ukuwo vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kubva zvachatanga vava zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi maviri ane zana nemakumi manomwe nevasere (220 178). Vanhu vapora kubva kuCovid-19 vakasviika pazviuru zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nechimwe (191 000). Kusvika pakupera kwezuva neChina, vanhu vakanga vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 vakanga vave mamiriyoni mana ane zviuru zana nemakumi mashanu nezvitatu zvine mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nevapfumbamwe (4,153,879). Vabayiwa nhomba dzose mbiri vave mamiriyoni matatu, ane zviuru zana nemakumi matanhatu nezvipfumbamwe nemazana manomwe nemakumi masere nevashanu, (3,169,785). Vabaiwa nhomba yetatu kubva zvayatanga kubaiwa musi wa Zvita 27, 2021, vakasvika pazviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana mashanu nevatatu (1,503), huwandu hunonzi nedzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano hahufadzi. Nyanzvi yezvehutano vari mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti hurumende nemasangano akazvimirira vanofanirwa kushanda zvakasimba mukupa dzidziso kune veruzhinji pamusoro penhomba iyi, uye kukurudzira kuti vaende kunobaiwa nhomba yetatu iyi. Vanoti panofanirwa kuitwa zvirongwa zvinoita kuti vezvehutano vapinde muvanhu vachibaya nhomba idzi kana nyika ichida kusvitsa huwandu hwainotarisira kubaya, kwete kumirira kuti vanhu vaende kuzvipatara nenzvimbo dziri kubairwa veruzhinji. VaRusike vanotiwo zvakakosha kuti vashandi vari pamberi mukurwisana neCovid-19, vakwegura pamwe nevagara vaine zvirwere zvavanazvo vaende kunobaiwa nhomba yetatu iyi, vachiti inobatsira kuwedzera simba renhomba mbiri dzekutanga. Studio 7 yaedza kubata mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri kuti tinzwe zvizhinji pamusoro penhomba yetatu iyi asi vati havasi munyika. Tatadza kubata vavati titaure navi, Amai Joyleen Chimonyo sezvo nhare yavo yanga isingabatiki. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voshaya Chikafu paRujeko Isolation Center kuMasvingo
text:
Hurumende iri kukandirana nyoka mhenyu nekanzuru yeMasvingo panyaya yekuti ndiyani anofanirwa kupa chikafu varwere veCOVID-19 vakachengetwa paRujeko Isolation Center. Hama dzevanhu vari kugara paRujeko Isolation Center dzinoti varwere vari panzvimbo iyi havasi kuwana chikafu nguva dzose, zvokuti zvinhu zvatonyanya kuipa svondo rino. Nzvimbo iyi inotakura vanhu gumi, uye yakapihwa hurumende nekanzuru yeMasvingo pasi pehirongwa chehurumende chekuchengeta vanhu vanenge varwarisa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Mumwe mugari ane hama yake pachipatara apa ada kuzivikanwa nekunzi Baba Gari, nekutyira kuti hama yavo inozopinzwa panguva yakaoma, vati
varwere vari kuchema chema kuti vave nemazuva vasingapuhwi chikafu, uye hama dzevarwere ava dzisingabvumidzwi kuigira hama dzavo chikafu Mukuru webazi rezvehutano muMasvingo, Dr Amedus Shamu, vati ivo
havasi kuziva kuti sei chikafu chiri kushaikwa nekuti chinofanaira
kubva kukanzuru sezvo iri iyo yakapa hurumende nzvimbo iyi.

Asi meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke, vati harisi basa rekanzuru yavo kupa varwere chikafu sezvo varwere ava vari mumaoko ehurumende. VaMaboke vati kubva pavakapa nzvimbo iyi kuhurumende, hurumende ndiyo yanga ichipa varwere ava chikafu chichibva kuchipatara chikuru cheMasvingo General Hospital.

Hama dzevarwere ava dzinoti hurumende inofanirwa kugara pasi nekanzuru dambudziko iri rogadziriswa sezvo varwere ava vachida chikafu chinovalka muviri panguva iyo vanenge vari kurwara. Mumwe mugari wemuMasvingo ane hama iri paRujeko Isolation Center, uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita rake, ati dambudziko iri rinofanirwa kugadziriswa nekukasika nekuti hupenyu hwevarwere huri kuiswa panguva yakaoma. Kushaikwa kwechikafu uku kuri kuitika panguva iyo vanhu mazana maviri nevanomwe vakatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro mudunhu reMasvingo chete. Hurumende inoti vanhu makumi masere nemumwe chete, 81 vakafa munyika ne chirwere che Covid-19, uye vanhu zviuru zviviri nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe, 2 089 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vava zviuru zvitatu nemazana mana nemakumi maviri nemumwe chete, 3,421, uye vvabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava zviuru zana nezvishanu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu, 105,656. Vanhu zviuru makumi matatu nechimwe nemazana matatu nemakumi
manomwe nemumwe chete, 31,371 vakabaiwa nhomba yekutanga nezuro, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga pamirioni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvitatu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu, 1,593,656. Vakabaiwa nhomba yepiri nezuro vaive zviuru gumi nezvinomwe nemazana maviri ane makumi mana nevanomwe, 17,247 izvo zvakasvitsa vabaiya nhomba iyi pazviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi matatu ane mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nevasere, 730,378. Hurumende inoti inoda kubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi munyika mese kana
kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekurwisa denda
reCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Vanoita zveChipfambi Vozeza Kunotora Mapiritsi kuZvipatara
text: Ongororo yakaitwa neCenter for Sexual Health and HIV/AIDS Research inoratidza kuti vanoita mabasa echipfambi vakawanda vave kutya kuenda kunotora mishonga yavo yeHIV/AIDS kana kunorapwa zvimwe zvirwere pamwe nekuwana dzidziso, sezvo vachiti vari kunyombwa kana kushungurudzwa nanamukoti. Ongororo iyi yakaitwa mushure mekuona vakawanda vevanhu ava vasisaendi kuzvipatara nemakirinika, zvisineyi kuti bazi rezvehutano nemasangano akasiyana siyana ari kukurudzira kuti vanhu vaongororwe hutachiwana pamwe nekuenda kunopihwa mushonga kana vachinge vawanikwa vainahwo. Vachitaura pamusangano wange wakarongwa neveZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights maererano neongororo yavo, vanoona nekufambiswa kwezvirongwa muCESHHAR, Amai Sibongile Mtetwa, vakati vanoita mabasa echipfambi vari kushungurudzwa pamwe nekupomerwa mhosva yekuparadzirwa hutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS. Vanoti ongororo yavo yakaitwa pasi pechirongwa che“Sisters With a Voice” yakaburitsa pachena kuti vanhu ava ndivo vanonekwa pekupedzisira kana vachinge vaenda kumakirinika. Vanoti semuenziso mumwe mudzimai akashungurudzika chose mushure mekuudzwa namukoti wepane imwe kirinika yavasina kuda kudoma kuti sei ainge achiita zvivindi zvekuuya kukirinika kuzotora mapiritisi asi iye akazvitsvakira hutachiwanda ega. Vanotiwo pane zvakawanda zvinoitika muzvipatara nemakirinika zvave kuita kuti vanoita zvechipfambi veregedze kuenda kuzvipatara izvi sezvo vachitya kunonyadziswa pamberi pevamwe varwere. Amai Mtetwa vanoti kuita kwakadai hakuna kunaka uye sangano ravo richishanda nebazi rezvehutano nemamwe masangano vave kushanda nanamukoti nevamwe vanoshanda muzvipatara kuti vabate vanhu ava pamwe nevarwere zvakanaka. Vanoti kana izvi zvikaitika vanhu vanosununguka kuenda kunotora mapiritsi avo eHIV/AIDS pamwe nekurapwa zvirwere zvepabonde. Ongororo iyi yakaratidzawo kuti pane vanhu vanoita zvechipfambi vanodarika zviuru makumi mashanu vakaenda kumakirinika eCESHHAR kubva muna2009 kusvika pari zvino uye zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana zvevanu ava zvaive neHIV/AIDS. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti nyika haigoni kukunda muhondo yekurwisana neHIV/AIDS kana ikasapinza vanoita mabasa echipfamibi muzvirongwa zvayo zvekunwa mapiritsi anowedzera hupenyu ema anti-retorivals, kudzivirira chirwere ichi pamwe nekurapwa zvirwere zvepabonde. Sangano reNational Aids Council rinoti ririkubatsira vanoita mabasa echipfambi kuumba sangano ravo kuti vakwanis kuzeya nyaya dzavo pamwe nekurwira kodzero dzavo. NAC inoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu ava vapewo pfungwa dzavo maererano nezvinoitika mubasa ravo kuitira kuti vanogadzira mitemo vaumbe mutemo vachiziva zvinoitika mubasa iri. Mumwe anorarama nemabasa echipfambi akaita hurukuro neStudio 7 Amai Sharo Mazviwa vakati nhamo ndiyo inovasunda kupinda mumabasa aya Sachigaro wesangano reDoctors for Human Rights Doctor Rutendo Bonde vanoti kodzero dzevanhu ava dzinofanira kukosheswa. Chirongwa cheSisters With a Voice chinobatsira vanoita mabasa echipfambi nemapiritsi emaARVs, kuvarapa zvirwere zvepabonde, kuvapa dzidziso pamusoro pezvirwere izvi , kuvadzidzisa kodzero dzavo, pamwe nekuvakurudzira kuti vaende kuzvipatara kuti vandoongororwa hutano hwavo. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoronga Kuongorora Madzimai Akawanda Chirwere cheGomarara
text: Hurumende inoti inotarisira kuve yaongorora gomarara remuromo wechibereko pamadzimai mamiriyoni matatu nemazana maviri panozosvika gore ra2020. Asi hurumende iri kutendawo kuti kune mamwe maruwa uchava mutoro sezvo kusina michina. Amai Yeukai Zhou vanobva kwaNhema kuShurugwi vanoti kunyanyangwe hazvo vachiziva kuti zvakakosha kuongoorwa gomarara rechibereko kusavepo kwezvipatara pedyo navo zvinoisa hutano hwavo panjodzi. Aya ndiwo matambudziko akasangana nemadzimai akawanda ari mumaruwa kunova kunogara vanhu vazhinji. Vamwe chiremba vari nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano hwemadzimai Dr Angeline Mapanga vanoti gomarara remuromo wechibereko iri rinokonzerwa neHuman Papiloma Virus inotapuriranwa pabonde. Gwaro reNational Cancer Prevention and Control Strategy for Zimbabwe (2014-2018) rinoti pamagomarara ese, gomarara remuromo wechibereko ndo ririkunyanyouraya madzimai nezvikamu makumi matatu nechidimbu kubva muzana. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo gomarara rechibereko idambudziko guru munyika. Mumwe mukuru mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Bernard Madzima vanoti vari kuvavarira kuve vaongorora gomarara iri pamadzimai mamiriyoni matatu nemazana maviri ezviuru panozosvika gore ra2020. VaMadzima vanoti parizvino pagore kuri kuongororwa madzimai anosvika zana rezviuru vachiti huwandu uhwu huripasi zvakanyanya uye nyika inofanirwa kuwedzera huwandu hwevanhu vanoongororwa. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo Zimbabwe rine nzvimbo dzinosvika zana nemakumi matatu dzinoongorora gomarara remuromo wechibereko. Mumwe mushandi wekuZimbabwe Association of Church Related Hospitals Amai Anna Machakata Rufu avo vane zvipatara zvinopawo madzimai mikana yekunoongororwa gomarara remuromo wechibereko pachena vanoti hapana chingakonese Zimbabwe kusvitsa huwandu hwemadzimai avanotarisira kuve vaongorora gomarara iri muna 2020. Amai Muchakata Rufu vanoti zvakakosha parizvino kupa madzimai ruzivo rwekuti zvii zvakanakira kuongororwa gomarara remuromo wechibereko. Vatiwo madzimai anofanira kubvunza pazvipatara zviri pedyo navo kuti vaziviswe kwavanogona kunoongororwa pachena. Gwaro rakaburitswa nekomiti yeseneti inoona nezvekuenzaniswa kwemikana nebudiriro mushure mukushanyira zvipatara zvine michina yekuongorora gomarara iri rakaburitsa pachena kuti pavanhu zviuru zvinomwe vakaongororwa pachipatara cheParirenyatwa, zviuru zviviri vakashaya. Rufu urwu runonzi rurukukonzerwa nekuti vanhu vanenge vanonoka kuenda kuchipatara kana kuti vanenge vasina mari yekutenga mushonga uyo unodhura. Komiti iyi inotiwo muna 2018 bazi rezvehutano rakapihwa mari inosvika zviuru mazana makumi mashanu zvekushambadzira chirwere ichi asi gore rino rakapihwa zviuru makumi manomwe nemashanu chete. Komiti iyi yakakurudzira hurumende kuti ishambadzire nezvechirwere ichi kumunhu wese uye kuumba homwe yekurapa gomarara sezvakaitwa HIV/AIDS. No media source currently available

headline: Veruzhinji Vokurudzirwa Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vakawanda vabaiwe nhomba yeCovid-19 kuitira kuderedza huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa nechirwere ichi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano uye vari mutungamiri wesangano reMedical and Dental Private Practitioners of Zimbabwe Association, Dr Johannes Marisa, vaudza Studio7 kuti kana vanhu vakawanda munyika vakabaiwa nhomba yeCovid -19, zvinoderedza njodzi yedenda iri iro ranetsa pasi rose. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vatiwo vanhu vakabaiwa vakawanda zvinoderedza kufamba kwechirwere ichi. VaMadzorera vatiwo zvakakosha kuti hurumnde izivisewo veruzhinji mashandiro ari kuita nhomba munyika vachiti izvi zvikazivikanwa neveruzhinji zvinobatsirawo mukuwedzera huwandu hwevanhu vanoenda kunobaiwa nhomba idzi. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvehutano sezvo takundikana kubata mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano , Doctor John Mangwiro, pamwe nemutauriri webazi iri, VaDonald Mujiri. Asi hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekumisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti Covid-19 yakauraya vanhu makumi maviri nevatanhatu nezuro, uye vanhu mazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika vava zviuru zana negumi nezvipfumbamwe nemazana mashanunevasere(119 508), uye vafa nechirwere ichi vava zviuru zvinanemakumi manomwe nevatatu, (4 073). Vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga munyika yese vave pamamiriyoni mavirinezvuru gumi nezvitatu nemazana matatu nemakumi mana(2 013340). Vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vave miriyoni nezvuru zana nemakumi manomwe nezvipfumbamwe nemazana matanhatu nemakumi masere nevanomwe(1 179 687). No media source currently available

headline: Chirwere cheCovid-19 Chovhiringa Zvakanyanya Vadzidzi Vakawanda Munyika
text:
Huwandu hwevadzidzi vari kuramba vachibatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 horamba huchikwira kuMasvingo nemamwe matunhu. Izvi zvinotevera kubudiswa kwemashoko evana vakabatwa nedenda iri
nezuro mudunhu Masvingo ayo anoti vana makumi matanhatu nevashanu
vakabatwa neCovid-19 nezuro muzvikoro zvitanhatu. Bazi revehutano rinoti mwana mumwe chete akabatwa paMashoko High nevana makumi maviri paChinorumba High kuBikita, vana vatanhatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi paGutu High, vana makumi maviri nemumwe vakabatwa paMushayavanu High uye paDeure High pakabatwa vana gumi nevatanhatu. Mumwe mubereki, Amai Joyce Mhungu, vati vave kutyira hupenyu hwevana vavo uye kukanganisika kwedzidzo muvana nenyaya yedenda iri. Mumwe mubereki, Amai Entrance Takaedza, vati huremende yakamhanyira kuvhura zvikoro isina kugadzirira kudzivirirwa kwedenda iri zvakanaka muzvikoro.

Mutungamiri wesangano revadzidzisi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaTakavafira Zhou, vati dambudziko iri ratekeshera muzvikoro zvose zviri munyika. Asi mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vati hurumende
yakange yakagadzirira asi kuti vadzidzi nevadzidzisi vakauya vane chirwere ichi muzvikoro. Mutauriri weProvincial Covid-19 Task Force muMasvingo, VaRodgers
Irimayi, vati panodiwa zvirongwa zvekudzidzisa vana mirawo
yekudzivirira denda iri muzvikoro kuti ridzikire.

Vamwe vabereki vanoti vava kutyira kuti vana vakawanda vachatadza kugadzirira kunyora bvunzo dzavo, kana kutotadza kunyora bvunzo idzi nepamusana pekurwara nedenda reCovid-19. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vapfumbamwe vakashaya nedenda reCovid-19 nezuro munyika yose, uye vanhu mazana maviri nemakumi masere nevashanu 285 vakabatwa nechirwere cheCOVID-19 nezuro wakare. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava zviuru zvina nemazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu, uye vabatwa nechirwere ichi vava zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvinomwe nemazana matatu ane makumi matanhatu nevasere, 127, 368. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga munyika vave mamirioni maviri
nezviuru mazana mapufumbamwe nezvisere nemazana mashanu ane gumi nevana, 2 908 514. Vabayiwa nhomba yepiri munyika vave mamiriyoni maviri nechiuru chimwe chete nemazana mapfumbamwe ane makumi masere nevanomwe, 2,001
987. Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichazivisa zvayawana muongororo dzaitwa nhasi. Hurumende inoti iri kuda kubaya nhomba vanhu mamiriyoni gumi munyika kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekurwisa denda reCovid-19

headline: Hurumende Yononoka Kubhadhara Vashandi Vanobatwa neCovid-19 Vachiita Basa Ravo
text: Vashandi vezvehutano vanoti vazhinji vavo havasati vawana mari dzavanofanirwa kupiwa kana vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid. Vashandi ava vanotiwo havasi kufara nekuvatyityidzirwa kwavari kuitwa nehurumende iyo iri kuti vasina kubaiwa nhomba vachanyimwa mari dzeCovid Allowance. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association, Va Enoch Dongo, vati vashandi vezvehutano vakawanda vacho havasati vawana mari dzekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vari pabasa kunyange hazvo vave nenguva yakareba vanyorera kuti vawane mari idzi. VaDongo vati nhengo dzavo dzinenge dzichida mari iyi padzinenge dzichirwara kuitira kuti vdzikwanise kutenga zvikwanisiro. VaDongo vatiwo mamiriyoni makumi manomwe nemashanu emadhora (75 million) anonzi akasendekwa parutivi kuitira kuti mari iyi ibhadhare vashandi vezvehutano vanobatwa neCovid-19, haikwani sezvo vakabatwa neCovid-19 vadarika zviuru zvina. Imwe nhengo yeZimbabwe Hospital Association, VaPrince Butau,avo vakabatwa neCovid-19 gore rapera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakazowana mari muna Kurume gore rino kunyange vakange vanyorera mari iyi gore rapera. Asi VaButau vati hurumende inofanirwa kunge ichipa mari kwehupenyu hwese munhu anobatwa neCovid-19 ari pabasa. Mumwe mukoti asina kuda kudomwa nezita audza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo akabatwa nechirwere ichi kutanga kwegore rino, haasati awana mari kunyange hazvo akanyora mapepa anodiwa. Panyaya yekutyityidzirwa nehurumende kuti vasina kubaiwa nhomba vachanyimwa mari dziri kupiwa vashandi vese vezvehutano dzeCovid-19 allowance, VaDongo vati zvakaipa zvikuru kumanikidza vanhu kubayiwa nhomba. VaButau vati mari inoita zviuru zvitanhatu nemazana maviri emaRTGS iri kupihwa seCovid-19 allowances ishoma zvakanyanya. Vatiwo hurumende inofanira kugara pasi nevashandi vezvehutano yotaurirana navo pamusoro pekubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuHealth Services Board asi gurukota rezvekubudiritswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakaudza vatori venhau nemusi weChipiri kuti hurumende iri kubhadhara mushandi anenge abatwa neCovid-19 ari pabasa mari inotangira pamazana matanhatu emadhora ekuAmerica kusvika pachiuru chimwe chete chemadhora ekuAmerica. Pamusoro pezvo mushandi wezvehutano anopihwa zviuru zvitanhatu nemazanamaviri emaRTGS semari yekubatsirikana munguva yeCivid-19. Vakatiwo Health Services Board yainge yabhadhara vashandi mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevaviri pavashandi vezvehutano zviuru zvina nemazna mana ane makumi mana nevana vakanyorera kuwana mari iyi. Amai Mutsvangwa vakati mari yakaiswa parutivi nehurumemde haikwani kubhadhara vashandi vese vakabatwa neCovid-19 vakati zvinoda kuti hurumende iwedzere mari iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Dr Mahomva Vokurudzira Vanhu Kuti Vabayiwe Nhomba yeCovid-19 Apo Vakawanda Vobatwa neChirwere Ichi Zvakare
text: Mukuru anoona nezvekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agnes Mahomva vari kukurudzira vanhu munyika kuti vabayiwe nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire zvakanyanya munyika. Dr Mahomva vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti ongororo dzose dziri kuitwa munyika nekunze dziri kuratidza kuti vakabayiwa nhomba vane mukana wakakura wekurarama kunyangwe vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Bazi rezvehutano rakatozivisa kuti mhando yeCovid-19 inopararira zvakanyanya yeomicron yave kutotenderera munyika. Nemusi weSvondo, bazi rezvehutano rinoti munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave zviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemumwe kana kuti 4, 701. Vanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nevatatu kana kuti 523 vabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zana rezviuru nemakumi matatu nepfumbamwe zvine makumi mana nematanhatu kana kuti 139, 046. Vanhu mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nemana zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana kana kuti 3 874 694 vakabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kekutanga. Vanhu vabayiwa kaviri sezviri kukurudzirwa vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi masere nemana zvine makumi mana nemashanu kana kuti 2 884 045. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba mukupefra kwemwedzi uno kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana.

headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chinosarudza Kunoshanda neVarwere Vane Covid-19 MuNew York
text: Dunhu reNew York muAmerica ndiro ririkuona hudzamu hukuru hwechirwere checoronavirus kupfuura mamwe nematunhu ose muAmerica. Kutaura kuno, kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevarwere nevarikufa hwave kudzika, dunhu reNew York rarasikirwa nevanhu vanopfuura zviuru makumi maviri nezvisere (28,000) asi vanhu vachingori kubatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi kupfuura mune mamwe matunhu muAmerica. Gavhuna wedunhu reNew York, VaAndrew Cuomo, vakakumbira rubatsiro kubva kune vanamukoti navanachiremba nevamwe vari mubasa rezvehutano, kusanganisa vari pamudyandigere, kuti vaende kuNew York kunobatsira dunhu iri mukurapa nekuchengeta varwere vane Coronavirus. Vazhinji kubva kumatunhu akasiyanasiyana vakazvinzwa vakaenda kuno batsira varwere vane coronavirus mudunhu reNew York. Umwe wevakanzwa chikumbiro chaGavhuna Cuomo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, Muzvare Chiwoneso Mpofu, uyo panguva iyo akange achishanda mudunhu re Ohio, muno muAmerica. Muzvare Mpofu anoti panguva yaakange achifanirwa kunyorerana chibvumirano chebasa chitsva nechipatara chaaishandira kuOhio, akaona zvakakodzera kuenda kuNew York, uko kuchakangotarisana nedambudziko rechirwere che coronavirus, achiti ruzivo rwake rwurikudiwa zvakanyanya nevarwere ava kuNew York. Muzvare Mpofu anoti kuve mukoti haisi nyaya yekutsvaka mari asi kuti chinhu chinenge chagara chiri muhana yemunhu. Studio 7 yabata Muzvare Chiwoneso Mpofu kuti vatitsanangurire kuti sei vakafunga zvekupinda munzvimbo irikufiwa nevanhu vazhinji, pamwe chete nevanamukoti. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Vanoda Kuti Vanhu Vatange Vabaiwe Nhomba Svondo Rino
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanoti vari kutarisira kuti vanhu vatange kubayiwa vhiki rino nhomba yeCovid-19 yakasvika munyika neMuvhuro mangwanani kubva kuChina. Hurumende inotiwo ine tarisiro yekuti panozopera gore rino vazhinji vanenge vabaiya nhomba senzira yekudzivirira kutapukira kwechirwere ichi. Vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter, VaMnangagwa vakati vari kutarisira kuti vanu vabayiwe nhomba nechimbichimbi kuitira kudzivirira vanhu uye kuti hupfumi hwenyika hutange kusimukira. VaMnangagwa vakatambira zviri pamutemo nhomba iyi kuState House neMuvhuro masikati kubva kumumiriri weChina muZimbabwe VaGuo Shaochun vange vakamirira mutungamiri wenyika yavo VaXi Jinping. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano Dr John Mangwiro vatsinhirawo mashoko aVaMnangagwa vachiti pamusoro penhomba vakapihwawo majekiseni acho vachiti vari kutarisira kuti kubaiwe kwenhomba iyi kutangwe chero vhiki rino. Dr John Mangwiro vati tarisiro yehurumende ndeyekuti vanhu mamiriyoni gumi vange vabaiwa panopera gore rino. Izvi zvatsigirwa nevakasanobata chigaro chemunyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano VaRobert Mudyirandima avo vati kunyangwe hazvo hurumende iri kutarisira kubaya huwandu uhwu kuchiri kuitwa hurukuro nemakambani anogadzira nhomba dzeCovid-19. VaMudyirandima vatiwo panenge pachibaiwa nhomba yeSinopharm yakagadzirwa kuChina iyi, hurumende inenge ichitoita tsvakurudzo yekuti nhomba iyi inoshanda here kumhando dzehutachiona weCovid-19 huri munyika. Vachigamuchira nhomba iyi kuRobert Mugabe International Airport gurukota rezvehutano uyewo vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga varumbidza pamwe nekutenda nyika yeChina. VaChiwenga vatiwo mucherechedzo wehushamwari hwakasimba pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Vachitambidzawo nhomba iyi kunaVaChiwenga, mumiririri weChina muZimbabwe VaGuo Shaochun vatiwo Zimbabwe ishamwari yeChina nekudaro havana dambudziko nekubatsira nyika ino pakuiwanisa nhomba yeCovid-19. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Muzvare Patricia Muchekeza vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo, hurumende yatambira nhomba yekutanga yekupiwa pachena vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende itenge mishonga iyi nechimbi chimbi. Izvi zvatsigirwawo nevaimbova gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Henry Madzorera avo vati vanga vakatarisira kuti nhomba yekupiwa iyi ichauya pamwechete nenhomba zviuru mazana matanhatu hurumende yaiti vakatenga. VaMadzorera vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kungwarira kuti vasazosundwe kutenga nhomba yekuChina zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe nekuda kwekuti vapiwa zviuru mazana maviri pachena. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Professional Nurses Union VaRobert Chiduku vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo vakoti vachiziva nezvekubaya nhomba vanoda rumwe ruzivo nezvenhomba yeCovid-19 zvinosanganisira kuti vaziviswe kuti nhomba iyi ichange ichibaiwa pai huye rutivi rwupi nezviratidzo kana isina kuwirirana nemuviri wemunhu vasati vabaya kana kubayiwa. Vamwe vanga vari kunhandare yendege pasvika nhomba iy vanosanganisira gurukota rezvemari VaMthuli Ncube, vakasanobata chigaro chegurukota rekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika nemamwe makurukota ehurumende. Vanamazvikokota munyaya dzezvemishonga kusanganisira veMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe vari kutarisirwa kuongorora nhomba iyi kuti ndeyechokwadi here kwemazuva maviri isati yatanga kubayiwa vanhu. Vari kutanga kubayiwa vanosanganisira vanachiremba, vakoti nevamwe vanoshanda muzvipatara, vanoshanda pamiganhu nenhandare dzendege uye vane zvirwere zvinovaisa panjodzi yakakura yekufa nechirwere ichi. Nhomba iyi yakagadzirwa nekambani inonzi Sinopharm inova yehurumende yekuChina inogadzira mishonga. China yakapa mvumo kuti nhomba iyi itange kubayiwa vanhu mukupera kwaZvita gore rapera. Nyika yakatanga kushandisa nhomba iyi iUnited Arab Emirates ichiteverwa neBahrain. Dzimwe nyika dziri kutenga mushonga uyu dzinosanganisira Singapore, Turkey, Brazil ne Chile. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Voteerera Kurudziro yeHurumende yeKufamba Vakapfeka "maMask"
text: Vanhu vakawanda vateerera kurudziro yemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa yekuti vapfeke zvidziviriro ka kuti mamask asi vamwe vachishora hurumende nekutadza kuvapa zvinhu izvi pachena sezvinoitwa nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika munguva yesarudzo zvekupa vanhu nhumbi. Amai Sithembile Kawocha avo vanga vakavhara muromo nemhuno yavo nedhuku ravo rakasakara vanoti kupfeka mask chinhu chakanaka mukudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiona hwecoronavirus asi vanoti hurumende ingadai yakapa vanhu vose mamask aya pachena. Amai Kawocha avo vanoita basa rekutenga nekutengesa vanoti havana mari yekutenga chidziviriro chinokurudzirwa navanachiremba sezvo vasiri kuenda kubasa. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi Amai Tafadzwa Karonga. VaMunesu Munesu vanoti zvidziviriro zvinokurudzirwa zviri kudhura nekudaro vakagadzira chavo vega. VaMunesu vanoti vanhu havafanirwe kupfekera mapurisa asi kuchengetedza hutano hwavo. Kurudziro yekuti vanhu vapfeke mamask yakabva yaita kuti mitengo yacho ikwire zvakanyanya. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidza kuti mamask ari kutengeswa nemari inobva padhora rimwechete kusvika pamadhora mashanu ekuAmerica. VaJeremiah Maruza vanoti chimwe chiri kunetsa ndechekuti mamaski haasi kuwanikwa uye paanowanikwa anenge achidhurira vakawanda. Vamwe vanhu vanoti mari dzemafaindi kune munhu anowanikwa asina kupfeka mask iyo inobva pamadhora mazana mashanu kusvika pamadhora zvuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu-ZWL$36 000-kana kugara mujeri kwegore kana kuti faindi nekugara mujeri yakawandisa. Mutori wenhau webepa reMirrior VaDennis Kagonye vanoti kupfeka masiki kwakanaka zvikuru asi vanoti mutongo wekusapfeka masiki wakanyanya. Gweta reMISA Zimbabwe Muzvare Nompilo Simanje vanoti mutemo uyu hauna kunyatsojeka uye unogona kuisa vanhu munjodzi. Vanotiwo Zimbabwe inokoshesa zvemitemo inoomesera vanhu kwete kushanda navo kuti vagadzirise matambudziko avanenge vatarisana nawo. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti mutongo wakatarwa nehurumende wakanyanya vachiti hurumende inenge yave kuda kutsvaka mari sezvo dzemitero dzave shoma panguva ino yekuti vanhu vari kunzi vagare mudzimba. Dr Madzorera vanoti mamask anonyanya kushanda kana munhu wese akaapfeka . Ongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidzawo kuti mapurisa anga asinei nevanhu vanga vasina kupfeka mamasiki mumaguta. Vamwe vezvitoro zvikuru zvakaita seOK, TM, Gain neMetro Peech vanga vasinga bvumire vanhu vanga vasina mamask kupinda muzvitoro zvavo asi change chichishamisa ndechekuti vatengi vange vachizobvisa mamask kana vave mukati vachitenga. Vashandi vemuzvitoro vange vakabvisawo mamask avo. Hurumende yakawedzera mazuva ekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba nemasvondo maviri kusvika musi wa17 Chivabvu ichibva yaisa mitemo inosanganisira kupfekwa kwemamask nemunhu wese anenge achifamba paruzhinji. No media source currently available

headline: Vabereki veMwana Ane Chirwere cheChiropa Vokumbira Rubatsiro
text: Hupenyu hwemwanasikana Manqoba Mabhena, uyo akaberekwa aine chirwere chechiropa chinonzi Biliary Atresia huri kuramba huri panjodzi sezvo vabereki vake vasati vawana mari yekuti ainde kunorapwa kuIndia. Amai vaManqoba, Muzvare Shamiso Yikoniko vanoti vana chiremba vakavataurira kuti chiropa chemwana chinogona kumira kushanda chero ipi nguva kana akasarapwa nekukurumidza. Vanoti vanoda mari inosvika zviuru makumi mana nematatu ($43,000) yekuti vainde kuIndia kunorapisa mwanasikana wavo. Asi pare zvino vanoti vawana mari inokwana chiuru gumi nemasere ($18,000) chete. Naizvozvo, Muzvare Yikoniko vari kukumbira rubatsiro kumhuri yeZimbabwe. Vanoti zve vanoda kubatsira vanogona kuisa mari mubhuku ravo rebhanga reFBC. Account number yavo inoti 3070070770125. Munogona zve kushandisa Ecocash muchishandisa number dzinoti 0772 935 224. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Vopesana Pakupa Vana Vasati Vabvazera Maparitsi eKuronga Mhuri
text: Vanhu vakawanda vari kupesana panyaya yekuti vana vasati vabvazera mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri pamwe nemishonga yekudzivirira zvirwere zvepabonde. Masarira, vanoti sangano ravo rakaendesa nyunyuto dzaro kuparamende senzira yekutsvaga nzira dzekuchengetedza hutano hwevechidiki ava. Amai Debra Mwase vanoshanda nesangano re Katswe Sisterhood vanoti nyaya iyi inofanira kuongororwa zvakadzama nokuti vana vari kuita zvepabonde vachiri vadiki zvokuti panofanirwa kuwanikwa nzira yokuvadzivirira kunjodzi yezvirwere zvepaponde zvinotapuriranwa. Nyanzvi yezvehutano, Dr Chido Dziva – Chikwari, vanoti panofanirwa kuwanikwa nzira dzokubatsira vechidiki ava. Mufundisi Mazvarirashe Mabugu vanotenderana nevabereki vari kupikisa danho rekuda kuisa mutemo unobvumidza vana ava kutora mapiritsi okuronga mhuri vachiti ndiko kuparara kuchaita rudzi rwamangwana. Nyazvi yehutano, Dr Josephat Chiripanyanga, vanoti havakurudzire vana vasati vasvitsa makore gumi nemasere kuti vaite zvepabonde nokuti zvinowedzera mukana wokusangana nezvirwere zvakasiyana zvikuru gomarara repamuromo wechibereko. Dr Chiripanyanga vanoti vana ngavarairwe kuti vagare vari mugwara rakarurama zvinozoita kuti varambe vachiendera mberi nechikoro sezvo pfungwa dzavo dzinenge dzakangoteya pakubudirira mudzidzo dzavo. Mutevedzeri wemukuru anoona nazvezvirwere zvisingatapuriranwe mubazi rehutano Dr Justice Mudavanhu vanoti gomarara repamuromo wechibereko ndiro rakanyanyisa kuwanda muvarapwi. Asi vanoti rinokwanisa kurapwa zvokutopera kana madzimai akakurumidza kuenda kunoongororwa kuzvipatara nemakiriniki. Ongororo yakaitwa nesangano reWorld Health Organisation rinoti vana vari pakati pemakore gumi nemashanu nemakore makuni maviri nemana munyika vari kutapurirwa zvirwere zvepabonde zvinenge gomarara repamuromo wechibereko iro rinozobatwa kazhinji risingachakwanisike kurapika nokuti rinenge rapararira kunhengo dzakakosha dzinoita kuti munhu ararame. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri muSouth Africa Zvotaura nezveCoronavirus
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa nemusi weSvondo vakatora matanho akaomarara mukuyedza kurwisa pamwe nekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus chatekeshera pasi rose Vanhu makumi matanhatu nevana vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika iyi. VaRamaphosa vakazivisa kuti South Africa kutanga nemusi weChitatu inenge yave kuvhara mimwe miganhu yayo uyo kurambidza kushanyira kana kutambira vanhu vari kubva kunyika dzabatwa nechirwere ichi dzinosanganisira Italy, Iran, South Korea, Iran, Spain, Germany, US, Britain ne China. Zvikoro zviri kuvharwawo musi uyu uye vanhu vari kurambidzwa kuungana kusanganisirawo kumiswa kwemitambo. MuSouth Africa mune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri kubatwa mumambure ezviri kuitwa kudzivirira chirwere ichi. VaOffice Jaka, avo vanobva kuKwekwe, vanoti vane chivimbo chekuti South Africa ichakwanisa kupedza dambudziko iri kunyange hazvo riri basa guru. Asi va Jaka vanoti varikunyanyo shungurudzika zvikuru, nevana vavo vaviri varikuita zvidzidzo zveElectrical Engineering kuChina. VaEmmanuel Mboti vanotiwo kunyangwe hazvo zvaitwa naVaRamaphosa zvakanaka, vichakanganisa hupfumi hwenyika yavo. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kumiswa kwemitambo kuchakanganisa kurarama kwevakawanda. Chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chechidiki, chinogara muSouth Africa, VaMunyaradzi Mukanyiwa, vanoti vanowirirana nemashoko ataurwa naVaMbote. No media source currently available

headline: Vechidiki Voyambirwa Kuti "Morning After Pill" Haridziviriri Kubatwa neHIV
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezveutano dziri kuyambira vanasikana kuti vasajairira kugaronwamapiritsi ekudzivirira kubata pamuviri anonzi pachirungu ma “emergency contraceptive pills,” asi kuti vashandise nzira dzekuronga mhuri kana voiita zvepabonde. Mapiritsi ekudzivirira pamuviri aya anonwiwa mangwanani mushure mekunge munhu aita zvepabonde asina kuzvidzivirira nemakondomu. Mapiritsi aya anonyanyozivikanwa nezita rekuti, “Morning after pill.” Nyanzvi munyaya dzeHIV/AIDS, Amai Muchanyara Mukamuri, vanoti kunyanyoshandiswa kwema morning after pill kunongoratidza kuti vechidiki vari kuita zvepabonde vasina kuzvidzivirira. Amai Mukamuri vanoti vechidiki vanonyanyotya kubata pamuviri pachinzvimbo chekuti vatye zvirwere zvepabonde zvakadai seHIV/AIDS. Amai Mukamuri vanotiwo tsvakiridzo dzakaitwa dzinoratidza kuti kushandiswa kwakanyanya kwemapiritsi aya kunoita kuti vanhu vawedzere kusimba, kuita zvirwere zvakadai sema Ovarian Cysts nezvimwewo. Chiremba vanoshanda nesangano re Zimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, Doctor Nicholas Wazadza, vanotiwo pamusoro pekuwedzera kusimba, mapiritsi aya akaramba achinwiwa, haazokwanisi kudzivirira pamuviri. VaWazadza vanotiwo vanoyambira vechidiki kuti kunwa mapiritsi aya hakudziviriri zvirwere zvepabonde. Doctor Moses Macheka, avo vanoshanda neZimbabwe National Family Planning Council, vanoti vanhu havafanirwi kushandisa nzira iyi senzira yekuronga mhuri. Ma Morning after Pill anoshandiswa kudzivirira pamuvirikana anwiwa mukati memazuva matatu mushure mekuita zvepabonde pasina kushandiswa makondomu senzira yekuzvidzivirira. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Ine Vanhu Vana Vafa, Uye Makumi Maviri neVasere Vabatwa neCovid-19
text: Huwandu hevanhu vabatwa neCoronavirus huchiri pamakumi maviri nevasere, uye vakashaya nechirwere vava vana. Zimbabwe yaongorora vanhu zviuru zvina nemazana mapfumbamwe ane makumi mapfumbamwe. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti kusvika nezuro, Harare ndiyo ine vanhu vakawanda vabatwa neCoronavirus ichiteverwa neBulawayo. MuHarare mune vanhu gumi nevaviri vabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye muBulawayo mune vanhu gumi. KuMashonaland East kune vanhu vana kozoti matunhu eMatabelelalnd North neMashonaland West ane munhu mumwe akabatwa neCoronavirus. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvehutano kuti pane vanhu vangani vaongororwa nhasi uye kuti zvii zvabuda muongorora iyi. Bazi rezvehutano rinozivisa zvinenge zvabuda muongororo dzayo manheru ega ega uye izvi zvinoitwa tabva pamhepo. Zvichakadai, varimi vefodya nhasi vazivisa kuti vanofara chose nedanho ratorwa nehurumende rekutora basa ravo pamwe nekutengesa fodya sebasa rakakosha panguva ino apo nyika yakavharwa senzira yekudzvirira kupararira kweCoronavirus vachiti izvi zvichaita kuti vatengese fodya yavo pasina kunetsana kana kuvhiringidza nemapurisa kana vamwe vanochengetedza mutemo. Mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira varimi vefodya munyika, reZimbabwe Tobacco Assocciation, VaRodney Ambrose, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotambira danho iri nemufaro. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vakazvimrira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudzaStduio 7 danho rehurumende rakanaka chose sezvo fodya yakakosha pahupfumi hwenyika nekuti rinounza mari yekunze. VaAmbrose vaudza Studio 7 kuti nhengo dzesangano ravo dzatogadzirira kutengesa fodya vachiti vangomirira chete kuti bhanga guru renyika rigadzirise nyaya yekuti vachabhadharwa sei. Misika yefodya yaifanira kuvhurwa svondo rino asi izvi zvakambomiswa kuitira kuti pagadziriswe nyaya yekuti varimi vachabhadharwa sei. Murimi wefodya kuNyabira pedyo neHarare, Amai Helen Shumba, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vatogadzirira kutengesa fodya yavo. VaKuchera vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe vabude pachena nekukasika kuti varimi vanobhadharwa sei kuitira kuti misika yefodya ivhurwe kuitira kuti nyika iwane mari yekunze nekukasika. Gore rapfuura pakamboita mutauro, pakavhurwa misika yefodya varimi vachiramba kutengesa fodya yavo mushure mekunge hurumende yaputsa chibvumirano chayainge yaita nevarimi chekuti vaizobhadharwa nemadhora ekuAmerica. Mukuru wekambani yehurumende inoona nezvekutengeswa kwefodya munyika, yeTobacco Industries Marketing Board, Dr Andrew Matibiri, vaudza Studio7 kuti RBZ inotarisirwa kuita musangano nevarimimangwana kuitira kuti vabude nechisungo chekuti varimi vachabhadharwa sei misika isati yavhurwa. VaMatibiri vaudza Studio 7 kuti mangwana chaiwo vari kutanga zvidzidzo zvekudzisa varimi zvavanotarisirwa kuita pakuendesa fodya kumisika nekuita pamisika kudzivirira kupararira kweCoronavirus. Zvimwe zvezvinhu ndezvekuti motokari dzinotakura fodya kuendesa kumisaka dzinobvimidzwa vanhu vaviri chete uye kuti vana vane makore ari pasi pegumi nematanhatu havabvumidzwe pamisika yefodya. Gore rino panenge pasina bhanga pamisika yefodya uye varimi vese vachaenda kumisika vachange vachiongororwa nekuita zvese zvinotarisirwa nebazi rezvehutano neWorld Health Organisation kudzivirira kupararira kweCoronavirus. TIMB iri kukurudzira vanotenga fodya kuti vatenge fodya munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana munyika senzira yekuderedza huwandu hwevarimi vanoenda kuHarare kuzotengesa fodya yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Zvinhu Zvoita Manyama Amire Nerongo kuChipatara cheMplilo
text: Mukuru wechipatara cheMpilo abvuma kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka pachipatara ichi zvichitevera danho ravana chiremba vakuru munyika rekukanda mapadza pasi. Mukuru wechipatara cheMpilo VaLeonard Mabande vati pana vana chiremba vadiki makumi mashanu nemumwe vadzingwa basa pachipatara ichi kusvika pari zvino. Chipatara cheMpilo icho chinove ndicho chipatara chikuru chechipiri munyika china vanachiremba mazana maviri nevana uye VaMabande vati kudzingwa kwavana chiremba vadiki kuri kuita kuti zvinhu zviome. Asi vati vari kuedza nepose pavanogona kuti vabatsire varwere vachiti vari kubatsirwawo nemadhokotera echiuto asi havana kukwanisa kutaura kuti vangani. Vamwe varwere vange vachiuya kuzvikamu zvevanorapwa vachibva kumba zveOutpatients neCasualty vange vachidzorerwa kumba nekuda kwekushomeka kwavana chiremba. Mumwe wevanhu vakadai ndiVaJohn Ndlovu avo vati vanonzwa musana asi vaudzwa kunzi vadzokere kumba nekuti pachipatara pange pasina vana chiremba. VaNdlovu vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende igadzirise zvichemo zvavana chiremba. Pachipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospitals pange paine varwerewo vakawanda kuzvikamu zveOutpatients neCasualty uye vamwe vange vachidzokera kumba vasina kukwanisa kuonekwa navana chiremba. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemukuru wechipatara ichi Amai Nonhlanhla Ndlovu sezvo vanzi vange vari mumusangano. Mumwe murume angozvidoma nezita rekuti Sithole ange aine mwana wake uyo ave nenguva achirwara. Ati nekuda kwekusave pabasa kwavana chiremba anomboenda nemwana wake uyu kuzvipatara zvakazvimirira asi ati haangakwanise kuita izvi nguva nenguva. Akurudzirawo kuti hurumende naana chiremba vataurirarane vanzwisisane.
