Dr Tawanda Zvakada avo vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors’ Association vanoti nhengo dzavo dziri kuti hadzisi kuzotsvaga basa kuhurumende zvekare sezviri kukurudzirwa nebazi rezvehutano. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari vemuHarare Vokumbira Kuti Nguva yeKubayiwa Nhomba yeTyphoid Iwedzerwe
text: Vamwe vagari vemuHarare vari kukumbira hurumende kuti iwedzere nguva yechirongwa chekuti vanhu vabaiwe nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere chetyhoid nedzimwe nhomba dzezvimwe zvirwere sezvo chisina kushambadzirwa zvakakwana. Guta reHarare ndiro rine dambudziko guru rechirwere chetyphoid munyika yose. Hutachiona hwetyphoid hunopa kuti munhu anzwe kupisa muviri, kuita manyoka uye kurutsa. Chirwere ichi chinokwanisa kutapuriranwa mumvura kana chikafu kana munhu asina kugeza maoko nemvura yakachena. Amai Juliana Musengi vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakamborwara neTyphoid katatu kubva zvavakatamira kuHarare vachibva kuMashonaland Central sezvo vachiti vainge vasingazive kuti mvura yemugurta haina kuchena. Vamwe vabereki vanonziwo vari kuramba kubayisa vana nhomba nekushaya ruzivo sezvo pasina kunyatsoshambadzirwa nekupihwa dzidziso yakakwana. Sachigaro weWomens Coalition Harare Chapter, Amai Charity Mandishona vakarudzira vabereki kuti vabayise vana nhomba vachiti kusaita izvi kunoisa hupenyu hwavo munjodzi yekufa kana kuremara. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano inoshanda mukanzuru yeHarare Dr Michael Vere vati chirongwa chekubaya nhomba ichi chinosanganisirawo kubayiwa majekiseni egomarara nezvimwe uye vanoti chirongwa ichi chakatanga musi wa4 Chivabvu chikapera musi wa 4 Chikumi. Doctor Vere vati vari kufara nekutambirwa kuri kuitwa nhomba yeHPV yekudzivirira gomarara repamuromo wechibereko. Mukuru mubazi rezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa kana kuti Department of Chemical Pathology paUniversity of Zimbabwe, Muzvinafundo Hilda Matarira vatiwo kuwandisa kwaita vanhu muHarare nekushaikwa kwemvura yakachena ndiko kwave kupa kuti vanhu varware netyphoid. Kubva muna 2010, chirwere cheTyphoid chakatanga kupararira zvakanyanya muZimbabwe uye muna 2018 bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu zviuru zvina kana kuti 4000 kusanganisira vana vakabatwa nechirwere uye vanodarika zvikamu makumi manomwe nezvitatu kubva muzana kana kuti 73% vari muHarare. Rimwe dambudziko range rave rekuti chirwere ichi chainge chisidadavire mimwe mishonga. Asi ikozvino vana ava vari kubayiwa nhomba inonzi inoshanda zvakanaka kudzivirira kuparira kwechirwere ichi inonzi Typhoid Conjugate Vaccine kana kuti TCV. Nhomba yeTVC iyi yakatanga kubayiwa munyika muna 2019, paine chinangwa chekubaya nhomba vana mamiriyoni matanhatu nezviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 6, 2 million. Vana vari kubayiwa vari pakati pemwedzi mipfumbamwe nemakore gumi nemashanu. Asi chirongwa change chambomiswa sezvo hurumende yange yorwisa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Hurumende iri kushanda nesangano rePATH kuti vanhu vawane nhomba iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Africa Yotadza Kusvitsa Zvikamu Zvakatarwa neWHO zveVanhu Vabayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 Gore Rino Risati Rapera
text: Sangano reWorld Health Organisation-WHO-rinoti nyika dzakawanda dzemuAfrica kusanganisira Zimbabwe dziri kutadza kubaya nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 kusvika pazvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana gore rino risati rapera sezvanga zvakatarwa nesangano iri. Vachitaura nezuro pamusangano we International Conference Public Health in Africa, mukuru weWHO, Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, vakati nyika makumi mana nesere panyika makumi mashanu neina dziri muAfrica dzichatadza kubaya zvizvarwa zvadzo zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana sezvanga zvakatarwa neWHO. Dr Tedros vakati rimwe dambudziko riri kuitika mudunhu reAfrica nderekuti nyika idzi hadzisi kuburitsa huwandu hwechokwadi hwevanhu vari kufa kana kurwara nechirwere cheCovid-19. Mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, Va Itai Rusike, vanoti kusabuda nehuwandu chaihwo hwevanhu vari kubatwa neCovid-19 zvinokonzerwa nekuti munyika hamuna zvikwanisiro zvemhando yepamusoro zvekuongorora kuti munhu ane Covid-19 here kana kuti kwete. VaRusike vanoti zvimwe zviri kutadzisa nyika dzemuAfrica kusanganisira Zimbabwe kubaya vanhu vakawanda idambudziko rekushandisa nhomba dzinobayiwa kaviri pamwe nekusawana kweveruzhinji ruzivo rwechokwadi nenguva. Mukuru munyaya dzekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika, Dr Agnes Mahomva, vanoti sehurumende vachiri vakatarisira kuti vachabaya vanhu zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana sezviri kukurudzira neWHO vachiti vachazobvuma kuti vatadza musiwa 31 Zvita 2021 wapfuura. Kusvika pakupera kwezuva nezuro, Zimbabwe yakazivisa kuti yakange yabaya nhomba yekutanga vanhu mamiriyoni mana nezviuru makumi maviri nezvitatu negumi nevatu (4 023 013). Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba mbiri kusvika mukupera kwezuva nezuro vainge vava mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu nezana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri, (3 035 192). WHO inoti vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni makumi manomwe nemanomwe, kana kuti zvikamu zvisere chete kubva muzana vakabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 muAfrica yose. Zimbabwe yakwanisa kubaya zvikamu gumi nezvipfumbamwe kubva muzana, zvinoreva kuti mumazuva gumi nemana asara kuti gore ripere, Zimbabwe inofanirwa kubaya vanhu zvikamu makumi maviri nechimwe kubva muzana, kana kuti 21%, unova mutoro mukuru pakatariswa nguva yatorwa kuti isvika pazvikamu gumi nezvipfumbamwe kubva muzana, kana kuti 19%. Zimbabwe inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Yabvisa Zvipingaidzo Zvanga Zvichikonzera Mitsetse Mirefu Munzvimbo Dziri Kubayiwa Vanhu Nhomba dzeCovid-19
text: Hurumende inoti vakoti muzvipatara nemakirinika vanofanirwa kunge vachiita basa rebaya vanhu nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 chete kwete kunyora makhadhi nekuvabya sezvavari kuita pari zvino ichiti ndizvo zviri kupa kuti mitsetse irambe yakareba munzvimbo idzi. Vachitaura mushure mekushanyira mamwe makirinika ekanzuru yeHarare ari kubaya nhomba dzeCovid-19 mumisha yeBudiriro neMufakose vaine mumiriri weUnicef muZImbabwe, Dr Tajudeen Oyewale, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Dr John Mangwiro, vati vave kupedza dambudziko iri nekupinza vana bharani vachaita basa rekunyora makadhi chete kuitira kuti vakoti vaite basa rekubaya chete. Vati kufamba kwavaita mumakirinika nhasi kwavaratidza kuti basa rekubaya vanhu harisi kafamba sezvinotaririsirwa nekuti vakoti, avo vanotove vashoma, vanopedza nguva vachinyora makadhi pachinhambo chekubaya vanhu. VaMangwiro vatiwo munhu wese anenge aenda pakirinika kana chipatara chipi zvacho anofanira kubaiwa nhomba yaanoda kwete kuudzwa kuti tiri kubaya nhomba yekutanga kana yepiri chete sezviri kuitika pane dzimwe nzvimbo dziri kubaiwa vanhu. Vati nhomba dzirimo munyika nekudaro vanhu ngavabaiwe. Dr Oyewale vati vaona kuti pane gwanza rinoda kuvharwa kutira kuti vakoti vaite basa rekubaya vanhu chete uye vatiwo vanhu vemunharaunda vanofanira kubatsira vakoti kuti vabaiwe nekukasika. Mukuru wezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Dr Prosper Chonzi, vati kunyange hazvo paine matambudziko pano nepapo, huwandu hwevanhu vari kubaiwa nhomba mumakirinika avo huri kukwira zvekuti kiririnika inobaya vanhu vashoma inobaya vanhu vanodarika zana nemakumi mashanu uye dzimwe dzave kubaya vanhu vanodarika mazana matatu pazuva. Asi vagari vemuBudiriro neMufakose vati nzvimbo dzinobairwa vanhu dzinofanirwa kuwedzerwa sezvo dziri shoma. Amai Yvone Katiyo Studio7 vatiwo vakoti vepaMufakose Family Health Care vashoma izvi zviri kupa kuti vawandirwe nevanhu. Mumwe mudzimai ati anonzi Mai Ticha audza Studio7 kuti kuti vangadai vakabaiwa nhomba yepiri musi wa11 Nyamavhuvhu asi izvi zviri kutadza kuitika nekuti vanhu vari kuda kubaiwa vawandisa. Vanhu munzvimbo zhinji munyika vave kuvata pamitsetse yekubaiwa nhomba dzeCovid-19 sezvo makambani akawanda nehurumende vave kuti vasina kubaiwa vave kunzi vasaenda kumabasa kana kurambidzwa kuita zvinhu zvakaita sekushandisa mabhazi ehurumende. Zimbabwe inoti ine hurongwa kwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekudzvirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Nezuro vanhu mazana mashanu negumi nevana vakabatwa neCovid-19, uye gumi nevasere vakafa nedenda iri. Kusvika nezuro vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga vainge vava mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru zana nemakumi mana nezvishanu nemazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevanomwe (2 145 537, ukuwo vanhu vainge vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vanga vava miriyoni nezviuru mazana matatu nezvina nemazana masere nevaviri (1 304 802.) Vanhu vafa denda iri vave zviuru zvina nezana nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu (4 156). No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Gumi neVatatu (13) Vofa neCovid-19 Mukutanga kweGore ra2022
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti mukutanga kwegore ra2022, vanhu gumi nevatatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vafa nechirwere icho kubva zvachatanga kupararira muna 2019 vave zviuru zvishanu negumi nevanomwe kana kuti 5 017. Vanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nevashanu kana kuti 955 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave mazana maviri ezviuru negumi nevana ane mazana maviri negumi nevana kana kuti 214 214. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga vave mamiriyoni mana nezviuru zana nemakumi maviri nemapfumbamwe zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nemaviri kana kuti 4 129 952. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba kaviri vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru zana nemakumi mana zvine mazana matatu nemakumi mana nemashanu kana kuti 3 140, 345. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba katatu zvikuru vanoshanda muzvipatara, vakwegura nevamwe vane zvirwere zvinovaisa munjodzi yekurwara zvakaipisisa vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru zvishanu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nematatu kana kuti 5, 623. Bazi rezvehutano rine hurongwa hqwekubaya vanhu mamimiriyoni gumi nhomba kuti inyatsoshande zvakanaka. Hurongwa hwaivepo hwaive hwekuti izvi zviitwe mukupera kwaZvita gore rapera asi hazvina kubudirira.

headline: Vabereki Vane Vana Vane "Autism" Votarisana neMatambudziko Makukutu
text: Vabereki vevana vanoita matambudziko pakutamba nevamwe kana kuita zvinhu zvinotarisirwa pazera ravo kana kuti vane "autism" vanoti vatarisana nedambudziko guru pakuriritira vana ava. Vanoti hupenyu hwavo hwakaomarara nepamusana pekuti vana vane autism havakwanisi kuita zvinhu zvinoitwa nevamwe vechidiki kana kushamwaridzana navo. Baba Luke Pencil veku Malbereign muHarare vane mwana wavo ane makore gumi ane autism. Baba Pencil, avo vane makore makumi mana nematanhatu ekuberekwa vanoti dambudziko guru rinosangana nevabereki ava nderekushaya ruzivo pamusoro pe autism. “Izvi hazvina kunge zvabatwa nana chiremba kunyange mwana akarwara kwenguva refu ndichienda kunana chiremba vakasiyana siyana nekunana mukoti vakasiyana siyana.” Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Pakashayikwa kana mumwechete akatibatsira chaizvo kuti mwana wenyu condition yake inonzi autism. Aiti akachema zvainzi ah, baba hamuzivi mwana anongochema, zvinoreva kuti haasi kunzwa zvakanaka kana kuti muri kumuitira zvaasingadi. Asi uchiedza kutsanangura kuti aiwa, mwana uyu pane zvaanoita zvandisinganzwisise zvakafanana nekuti dzimwe nguva anoramba kupfeka bhutsu, dzimwe nguva anoramba kugerwa musoro.” Baba Pencil vanoti vabereki vakawanda vanokatyamadzwa nekugumbuka zvikuru pavanoona kuti mwana wavo ari kukura zvakasiyana nevamwe vana. Vanoti ivo vakaita mhanza yekukurumidza kuziva zvaiitika kumwana wavo. “Vana ava vanenge vane ma censory issues anenge akavhiringika, haana kuita seevamwe vana. Saka kana achigerwa ane zvaanonzwa zvisinganzwiwi nevamwe vana vose saka achiita muitiro waanoita iwowo.” Vatiwo, “ Saka izvozvo ndizvo zvakaita kuti tinzwisise kuti ho mwana wedu condition yaaninayo inonzi autism. Izvozvo ndinoda kuti nditsinhire kuti izvi handina kuzviwana kunana chiremba kana kunana mukoti. Ndakatozvinzwawo kune mumwe mubereki akanga ari affected, akatoenda pa radio akanotaura. Ndopatazowana information yakadaro.” Baba Pencil vanoti murume nemudzimai vanofanira kubatana kwete kunongedzerana kana mwana asangana nedambudziko. “Saka izvozvo zvakatipa simba rekuti kuti mwana wedu aite zviri nani, tikwanise kumumaneja, regai tinorisecha.” Vatizve, “ Tikabva taenda pa internet. Iripo information pa internet. Ukaiwana zvinoita kuti umaneje mwana wako zviri nani. Zvinoita kuti kuwadzana kwako naye kuve kuri nani, kuwadzana kwake nenharaunda yakamukomberedza kuve nani.” Amai Emma Muchefa avo vane mwana ane autism, vanoshandira hurumende vari pa Domboshava training centre. Vanoti madzimai mazhinji ane vana vane autism anoshungurudzika zvikuru. “Vazhinji vana baba vanotiza, uye hama hadzizvitambiri. Kazhinji burden inosiyirwa amai, seni as a mother of three, two vari disabled murume akabva aenda ndikasara ndiri a single mother.” Amai Muchefa vatizve, “ Saka dambudziko rinenge rave rekuti unenge uchida kuenda kubasa, uri kuda ku physio nemwana iyeye, uri kuda zvekudya uri kuda zvekupfeka zvevana ivavo, uri kuda medication. Saka kazhinji kacho uri kuda zvekufambisa, hauna kana motor kana wheel-chair.” Amai Tendai Kamutero veku Domboshava vane mwana wavo ane autism. Vakatozozviziva mwana uyu ave nemakore matatu kuti ndizvo zvaari. Amai Kamutero vanoti kuriritira mwana uyu zvinovanetsa semunhu ari pamushando. “Pandinoenda kubasa, munhu anosara naye haanzwisisi zvaanoda nekuti haatauri.” Vatizve, “Sign language haaizivi, haakwanisi ku communicator naye. Asi iye takatozomudzidza kuti kana ave nenzara kana chikafu chiri paanosvikira anotora ega. Kana kuti ukaona akukudhonza, isaini yekuti ane nzara.” Amai Constance Mandishona vane vana vana, uye vaviri vavo vakaremara. Amai Mandishona, avo vanoshanda muhurumende vakapihwa imba yekugara kuMufakose mushure mekunge vakuru vavo vaona kutambura kwavaiita. Vanoti vakaremara vanofanira kusimudzirana. “Ipapo ndisati ndapihwa imba ndakanga ndisina pfungwa dzekuti I can advocate kana kumiririrawo kana kutsigira munhu akaremara.” Amai Mandishona vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Ndakazogara pasi ndikazvibvunza kuti, hongu ndamiririrwa, ko vari kunze uko vasina anovamiririrawo tochiita sei? Nekuti inini pandakabatsirwa nemba, Permanent secretary mai Nhekairo vakandiudza kuti, Cony, dai vana vako wanga wakavachengetesa kumaraini, vachiita kunge musara pavana, I wasn’t going to assist you. But pese patinotaura unotungamidza vana vako kumberi kuti ma’am vangu vazodai nekuti hauna kunyara navo saka tazokudai. Ndakakwanisa kubatsira vamwe vabereki vairi. Mumwe wacho anonzi mai Boora anoshanda ku President’s department. Ane mwana wakewo ane autism. Ndikamuti akoma nyaya yangu yakamira yakadai, inini ndakawanawo imba. Imimi can you not write a letter mukwanisewo kuti mubatsirwe? Vakapihwa flat ku Ardbennie.” Dr Cotilda Mangoma mugari wemuHarare uye vanofamba vachipa dzidziso pamusoro pe autism. Vanoti vabereki vevana vakadai vanofanira kushingaira kutsvaga ruzivo kuitira kuti vana vavo vave nepundutso. “Inini ndiri kuona kuti zvakakosha kuve neruzivo mukati memhuri nemhaka yekuti chinhu chawave kuziva unoziva kuti unochibata sei, unochibata nemutoo upi.” Dr Mangoma vanotizve, “Saka ini ndinoti vana baba nana mai vane vana vavasinganzwisisi kuti ingave autism here kana kwete zviri nani vatsvake rubatsiro kubva ku clinic level. Kana vabva ikoko voudzwa kuti enda ku rehabilitation. Rehabilitation yoferefeta kuti itype ipi ye autism, pamusana pekuti akasiyana siyana, akawanda. Nekuonekwa kunoita mwana, nemaitiro ake unobva waudzwa kuti aiwa ichi ndechakati, then rubatsiro rwobva rwauya. Angave anogona nezvemaoko, angave munhu ari bright kuchikoro, zvese zvinobatsirika along those lines.” VaPardon Gonorashe mushandi wehurumende ane hunyanzvi hwekubatsira veruzhinji, kunyanya vanotambura kuti vave neraramo iri nani. Vanoti vabereki vevana vane autism vanofanira kuve padyo nepavanowana ruzivo pamusoro pe autism.“Saka paida kuti patange pawanikwa centre yekuti vanhu vari kumaruwa, vangadai vari kuBinga, Muzarabani kana kuti kuMberengwa vakaona kuti vane vana vane autism they can refer vana ivavo kuno.” Vatizve,“Tikashevedza ma parents vari kumaruwa vanogona kuuya kuma campaign akaita seaya.” VaGonorashe vanoti hurumende inofanira kuisa mari yakawanda gore rega rega kuzvirongwa zvakanangana ne autism. “Hakuna zviri kunyanya kuitwa about disability as a whole.” Vatizve, “Then mukazopinda mudisability sector imomo munozoona kuti autism is relegated kuzasizasi kune other forms of disability. Saka ngatitorei disability sector se ine mari shoma mu budget. Then yapihwa mari shoma already, autism iri kuzasizasi zvekuti ikoko kunosvika one cent. Ndosaka kune vanhu vashomanana vari kutari nezve autism as a right.” Sangano guru rezvehutano pasi rese reWorld Health Organisation rinoti pavanhu zana nemakumi matanhatu ega ega mumwechete wavo anenge aine autism. Vamwe vanhu vane autism vanokwanisa kuzviriritira asi vakawanda vavo vanotozoda kuchengetwa hupenyu hwavo hwese. No media source currently available  .

headline: Vanhu Makumi Maviri neVaviri Vanowanikwa Vaine Chirwere cneCovid-19 muNyika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neChitatu kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwakakwira kusvika pazviuru zvinomwe nemazana mashanu ane makumi mapfumbabwe nemasere, kana kuti 7 598 mushure mekunge vanhu makumi maviri nevaviri kana kuti 22, vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Pavanhu ava vanhu makumi maviri nemumwe kana kuti 21 vagara vari munyika, mumwe chete ari akadzoka munyika kubva kuSouth Africa. Hapana munhu akshaya nechirwere ichi izvo zvakaita kuti vanhu vafa varambe vari pamazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevana, kana kuti 224. Vanhu vakanga vapona kubva kuCovid-19 kusvika neChitatu vanonzi vakanga vasvika pazviuru zvishanu nemazana masere ane makumi maviri nevatatu, kana kuti 5 823. Izvi zvakasiya vanhu chiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu nemumwe, kana kuti 1 551 vachiri kurwara nechirwere ichi. Pasi rose vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe nezviuru mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvisere kana kuti 29 398 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi, icho chaurayawo vanhu vadarika zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matata zvine mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 930 900.

headline: Vanhu Vashanu Vofa neCovid-19
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChishanu kuti vanhu vashanu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemumwe kana kuti 1, 501. Vanhu makumi mana nevasere kana kuti 48 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru makumi matatu nematanhatu ane makumi namomwe nemumwe kana kuti 36, 471. Vanhu gumi nevashanu kana kuti 15 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvichireva kuti vapora kubva zvatanga chirwere ichi kupararira vave zviuru makumi matatu nemana ane gumi nemumwe kana kuti 34 011. Vanhu vachiri kurwara mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 959. Zvichakadaro, huwandu hwevashandi vemuzvipatara nevamwe vanoita mabasa anopa kuti vasangane neveruzhinji kusanganisira vatori venhau nevanochengetedza majeri vabayiwa nhomba yeSinopharm yakapihwa Zimbabwe neChina hwasvika pazviuru makumi matatatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 36, 359. Vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubazi rezvehutano VaDonald Mujiri vanoti chinangwa chehurumende ndechekuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi vabayiwe nhomba kuti inyatsoshanda. Pasi Rose Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevaviri kana kuti kuti 532, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 29 million. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 2,6 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nemanomwe zvine zviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 67,5 million. No media source currently available

headline: France Yowana Imwe Mhando yeCovid-19 Asi WHO Ichiti Vanhu Vasanyanye Kutya Havo
text: France inoti yakawana imwe mhando itsva yeCovid-19 inonzi IHU iyo ichiri kuongororwa hayo kuti inokonzera hurwere hwakaita sei navanamazvikokota munya dzezvirwere. Mhando yeIHU iyi inonzi yakawanikwa mune munhu ainge ashanyira nyika yeCameroon. Pari zvino, vatambi venhabvu vemunyika nevamwe vemuAfrica vari kuCameroon kumakwikwi eAfrica Nations Cup. Asi vachitaura nenhepfenyuro yeBloomberg nevamwe vatori venhau nemusi weChipiri, vanoona nezvezvirwere zvitsva musangano reWorld Health Organization, VaAbdi Mahamud, vanoti mhando itsva yeIHU iyi haisi hayo kunyanya kuvavhundutsa sezvo isiri kupararira zvakanyanya kubva zvayakatanga kuonekwa uye vave nenguva vachiiongorora. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa, Muzvinafundo Davison Saungweme, avo vanodzidzisa paUniversity of North Georgia muno muAmerica, vari kukurudzira vanhu kuti vabayiwe nhomba yeCovid-19 sezvo chirwere ichi chiri kuramba chichiuya nedzimwe mhando. Muzvinafundo Sangweme vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvirwere zvemavirus zvakaita seCovid-19 zvinoramba zvichiuya nedzimwe mhando. dzimwe mhando itsva dzinogona kuuraya vanhu, asi dzimwe dzinenge dzisina simba rakanyanya. Zvichakadaro, vanhu makumi matatu nemumwe vakafa nechirwere ichi nezuro zvasiya vafa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru zvishanu nemakumi manomwe nevasere. Vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumu mapfumbamwe nemumwe chete kana kuti 1 591 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro. Izvi zvakasiya vabatwa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru mazana maviri negumi nezvinomwe nemazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nevasere, kana kuti 217 678. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga vave mamiriyoni mana nezviuru zana nemakumi mana nechimwe zvine zana nemakumi mashanu nevasere, kana kuti 4 141 158. Vabayiwa nhomba kaviri vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru zana nemakumi mashanu nezvitatu zvine makumi mashanu nevasere ,kana kuti 3 153 058. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba katatu zvikuru vanoshanda muzvipatara, vakwegura nevari munjodzi yekurawara zvakaipisisa vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru zvinomwe nemazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nevana kana kuti 7 254. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuti inyatsoshanda zvakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: Mumwe Mwana Ofa neChirwere cheTyphoid kuMbare
text: Apo vamwe vanhu vange vari kufara pazororo rekisimusi, imwe mhuri yekuMbare yakafirwa nemwasikana wayo uyo ano fungudzirwa kuti akarwara netyphoid kwenguva pfupi. Vagari vemumusha uyu munzvimbo yeNational vanoti tsvina kana kuti sewage iri kuyerera nepadzimba dzavo iri kupa kuti vatyire hupenyu hwavo. Vagari vemuMbare vanoti chinonyanyorwadza ndechekuti musikana uyu ange akabuda zvinofadza pabvunzo dzake dzeGrade 7 aine 4 units uye kunyange hazvo kanzuru yeHarare yati iri kuongorora kuti chii chakanzozera kufa kwake, vagari vemunzvimbo iyi vati kubuda kwemasiweji achierera mudzimba dzavo ndiko kwakonzera kufa kwemwana uyu. Vagari vakawanda mumigwagwa inoti 8th na 9th vaudza Studio 7 kuti kanzuru yeHarare yange isiri kuterera zvichemo zvavo zvekuti vazogadzira mapaipi emasewage akaputika uye vanhu vakawanda munzvimbo iyi vakatoendeswa kuchipatara vachirwara nemanyoka. Mumwe mugari wemuna 9th uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita audza Studio 7 kuti kufa kwemwana uyu kwarwadza vanhu vakawanda. Ambuya Anne Marry Karimushanje vanoti mumusha weMbare maita dambudziko guru remasuweji ari kupitika mudzimba zvekutoti vave kutyira kuti vana vakawanda vachafa nezvirwere zvemanyoka. Tinashe Karise uyo ane tuckshop yake munzvimbo iyi audza Studio 7 kuti seweji iri kuerera pese yave kukanganisa bhizimisi rake uye nhunzi dzave kuzara mutuckshop make. Mugwaro ravaburitsa kuvatori venhau, mutauriri weHarare City Council, VaMichael Chideme, vati kanzuru iri kuongorora rufu rwemwana uyu uye vatsinhirawo kuti hanzvidzi yake pamwe nevamwe vanhu vane chitsama kubva munzvimbo iyi vari muchipatara uye vari kufungidzirwa kuti vane typhoid. Vatiwo pane vanhu makumi matatu kubva munzvimbo iyi vakatorapwa sezvo vaifunguidzirwa kuti vane typhoid. Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Dr Proper Chonzi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mufi ange achiratidzika kunge ane typhoid asi kanzuru haisati yave nehumbowo hwekuti ange aine typhoid here kana kuti kwete. Dr Chonzi vati zvinokonzera typhoid zvinozikanwa uye kanzuru iri kuedza napose painogona napo kugadzirisa nyaya dzekutakurwa kwemarara nemasiweji senzira yekudzivirira chirwere ichi. VaChideme vatiwo kanzuru yatanga chirongwa chekudzidzisa vanhu pamusoro pezvirwere zvetyphoid necholera pamwe nekukosha kwehutsanana. Kanzuru yeHarare yakazivisa muna Mbudzi kuti yakatarisira kuti zvirwere zvemanyoka zvichawanda panotanga kunaya mvura uye yakati vese vanenge vachirwara nezvirwere izvi vacharapwa pachena. Bazi reCentres for Disease Control rinoona nezvehutano muAmerica rinoti kudzivirira chirwere chetyphoid vanhu vanofanira kubhoirisa chikafu kana mvura, kubika chikafu, kuchimenya kana kutorega kudya muchirungu, “Boil it, cook it, peel it or forget it.”

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kutaura neIzwi Rimwe Chete paNyaya yeCovid-19
text: Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzehutano, reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende itaure nezwi rimwe chete panyaya yekubayiwa kwevanhu nhomba yeCovid-19 uye kuti inopinda munyika riini. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamwe nemutevedzeri vavo, uye ari gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vakazivisa nyika nezuro, China, kuti vanhu vachabayiwa nhomba iyi pachena sezviri kuitwa kune nyika dzakawanda. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko anopesana ainge ataurwa negurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, avo vakamboti vanhu vachabhadhariswa mari yenhomba, asi vakazobuda vachiti vatori venhau vainge vasina kubata mashoko avo nemazvo. Kunyange hazvo VaNcube vakabuda vachipikisa zvainge zvaburitswa nesangano enhau, pane vhidhiyo iri kuburitsa VaNcube mbune vachiti mushonga uyu uchange uchitengeswa. Asi VaNcube vakazoti nhomba iyi ichapihwa vainoida pachena. Izvi ndizvo zviri kunzi naVaRusike hurumende inofanirwa kutaura neizwi rimwe chete zvikuru panyaya yakakosha kudai. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Voenda Kunobayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 Vachibhadhara Mari
text: Vamwe vagari vekuMasvingo vava kuona zviri nani kuenda kunobayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 munzvimbo dzinobhadhariswa mari sezvo vasiri kubatsirwa munzvimbo dzinobayiwa vanhu nhomba pasina muripo. Mumwe mugari wemumusha weRujeko, VaKnowledge Matumba,vati vakandobayiwa nhomba kuchipatara chisiri chehurumende nekuti vakapedza masvondo maviri vachienda kunomira mumutstse asi vachitadza kubayiwa sezvo zvipatara zvehurumende zviri kubaya vanhu vashoma pazuva. VaMatumba vati kuzvipatara zvisiri zvehurumende hakuna mitsetse uye vanhu vanobhadhariswa mari inosvika madhora maviri ekuAmerica iyo yakatarwa nehurumende. Mumwe mugari, VaJohanes Chihwani, avo vati vakabayiwawo kuchipatara chakazvimiririra vati kunyange kuchibhadhriswa, mari yacho ishoma uye haupedzi nguva yakareba wakamirira kubayiwa. Mutauriri weZimbabwe National Family Planning Council muMasvingo, VaHebert Chikosi, vati vanhu vazhinji vari kuuya kuzobaiwa nesangano ravo senzira yekutiza mitsetse kuzvipatara zvehurumende. Chimwe chipatara chakazvimirira cheCIMAS, chiri kubayawo vanhu muMasvingo asi chinobaya nhengo dzacho dziri pachirongwa chekurapiwa chemedical Aid. Mumwe mushandi ataura ne Studio 7 paCIMAS aramba kudomwa nezita rake nekuti haabvumidzwi kutaura nevatori venhau ati nhengo dzavo zhinji dziri kubayiwa nyore dzisingabhadariswi. Muridzi weMakurira Private Hospital, Dr Phenias Makurira, vati zvipatara zvakazvimiririra zviri kubetsera hurumende chaizvo kutapudza huwandu hwevanoda kubayiwa nhomba vachiti chipatara chavo chiri kutangawo kubaya vanhu svondo rinouya. Mutauriri weCovid-19 Taskforce muMasvingo, VaRodgers Irimayi, vati hurumende inotenda kubatsirwa kwairi kuitwa nevezvipatara zvakazvimirira uye inokurudzira vanhu kuti vaende ikoko senzira yekutapudza huwandu kuzvipatara zvehurumende. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuwedzera nzvimbo dzinobayiwa vanhu nhomba pamwe nekutenga nhomba dzakawanda. Nezuro vanhu makumi maviri nevaviri vakafa nechirwe che Covid-19 munyika izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vanhu vafa pazviuru zvina nemazana maviri nemakumi maviri, 4 220. Vanhu mazana matatu nemakumi masere nevatanhatu, 386 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pazviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezviviri nemazana maviri nemakumi masere nevasere 122 288. Vanhu vabayiwa nhoba yekutanga munyika vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana maviri nemakumi manonwe nechimwe nemazana manomwe nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe, 2 271 729. Vabiawa nhomba yepiri vave miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mana nemakumi maviri nezvinomwe nezana nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe, 1 427 159. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekurwisa denda reCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Kubaiwa kweNhomba Munyika Kuri Kuitwa Zvisina Mutsindo
text: Chirongwa chekubaya nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kuvashandi vezvehutano mudunhu reMasvingo chapinda muzuva retatu, bazi rehutano richiti huwandu hwevanhu vari kubayiwa nhomba huri kuwedzera kunyange hazvo risina kupa huwandu hwacho. Mukuru webazi rehutano muMasvingo, Dr Amedus Shamu, vati kunyange hazvo chirongwa ichi chakatanga zvishoma nemusi weMuvhuro, vashandi vakazobaiwa nhomba iyi nezuro nanhasi vawedzera. Dr Shamu vaudza Studio 7 kuti musi wekutanga vashandi vazhinji vaisagutsikana nenhomba iyi asi mushure mekutsanangurirwa, vazhinji vave kubaiwa. Kunyange hazvo Dr Shamu vati hofisi yavo haisati yapuwa huwandu hwevashandi vose vabaiwa pari zvino sezvo vashandi vavo vakabuda vachipinda muzvipatara zvemumaruwa, vanotarisira kubaya vashandi chiuru gumi nechimwe mudunhu rose pamazuva gumi. Asi vamwe vashandi vataura neStudio7 vati vashandi vemubazi rezvehutano vakawanda vari kuramba kubaiwa nhomba iyi, iyo yakabva kuChina. Vashandi vepachipatara cheMasvingo General Hospital vari kubaya vanhu nhomba vange vari pachipatara cheMushagashe neSummetone nhasi. Chipatara ichi chiri kunze kwedhoroba reMasvingo uko kwabaiwa vanhu vashoma vasingapfuuri gumi. Mumwe mushandi aramba kudomwa nezita rake paMushagashi audza Studio 7 kuti haasati ave nechivimbo chekuti nhomba iyi yakanaka. Vashandi vabaiwa nhasi varamba kutaura neStudo 7 iyo yatumirwa mapurisa kuti ibve pavange vachibairwa nhomba. Mutauriri weCovid-19 Taskforce muMasvingo, VaRodgers Irimayi, vati havasati vave nehuwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba pamazuva matatu asi musi wekutanga chete vashandi vakabaiwa mudunhu rose vakasvika zana nemakumi matanhatu nevasere. Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kutyira nhomba iyi, asi Dr Shamu vakurudzira kuti vanhu ava vabaiwe vachiti nhomba iyi yakanaka sezvo yakatendedza nebazi rezveutano pamwe neWorld Health Organisation. Dunhu reMasvingo rakapiwa nhoma yevanhu zviuru makumi maviri nezviviri(22 000) kunyange hazvo iyo iri kuda kubaya vashandi zviurugumi nemumwe(11 000) pachirongwa chekutanga chiri kuitwa mumazuva gumi. Nezuro vanhu vakange vabaiwa nhomba munyika yose vanosvika zviuri zvina nemakumi mana nemumwe chete, (4041) Nezuro vanhumakumi mana nevasere vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika mose, vanomwe vakashaya. Nyika pari zvino yave nevanhu zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu nemazana mapfumbamwe negumi vabatwa nechirwere ichi, (35 910), uye vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nezviviri nemazana maviri ane makumi masere nevasere, (32 288). Vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vave chiuru chimwe nemazana mana nemakumi mana nevasere, (1448). No media source currently available

headline: Vagari vemuMaguta Voshora Makanzuru neKutadza Kuwanira Vanhu Mvura Yakachena
text: Masangano anomirira vagari mumaguta nemadhorobha ari kushoropodza makanzuru achivapomera mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu nekutadzayekutadza kuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena. Izvi zvakabuda pamusangano wakaitwa muHarare nemusi weChina wakapindwa nemapazi ehurumende akasiyana siyana, makanzuru uye vagari vemumadhorobha. Sachigaro weCombined Harare Residents Association, VaSimba Moyo, vanoti musangano uyu wakabatsira kuti vakwanise kuonesana neve makanzuru nezvekukomba kwedambudziko remvura. VaAnoziva Muguti, mutungamiriri weMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance kana kuti MURRA vati mudhorobha ravo kodzero dzevanhu dziri kumbunyikidzwa nekanzuru iri kuvavharira vagari mvura. Vemasangano aya vataura kuti makanzuru ari kutyora chikamu chechimakumi manomwe nemanomwe chebumbiro remutemo renyika icho chinopa vagari kodzero yekuwana mvura yakachena nguva dzose. Vamwe vakaita saVaPrecious Shumba, veHarare Residents Trust (HRT), vati mune dzimwe nzvimbo muHarare dzakaita seMabvuku, vanhu vatove nemakore akawanda vasingawani mvura. Vatizve mvura yemuguta mavo hainwike nekuti haisi kucheneswa zvakakwana nekanzuru yavo. Asi vanotungamirira bazi remvura mukanzuru yeHarare, Engineer Hosiah Chisango, vati kanzuru yavo inochenesa mvura vachisvitsa pachipimo chinodiwa ne bazi reUnited Nations rinoona nezvehutano reWorld Health Organization. “Tinoshanda nemaresidents representative ose muno muHarare tichivaudza kuti mvura yedu yakachena ngavanwe.” Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Tiri kuonesana kuti quality yedu iri kuimprover, ikozvino 96% ye masamples atiri kutesta ari kupasa saka hapana hutachiona hunowanikwa.” Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaHubert Fidze vaudzavo musangano uyu kuti nyaya yekushwaikwa kwemari munyika nemariro ehupfumi hwenyika zviri kukanganisa makanzuru kuti ape vagari mvura yakakwana. “Dambudziko remvura sekuona kwandaita muno mukati meZimbabwe ririko sezvabuda mumusangano uno.” Vanotiwo, “Dambudziko guru riripo nderemari. Vanhu vawanda mumaguta asi supply yakaramba akadaro. Tine mari yatiri kuda kuti tiwedzere mvura asi mari hatisi kuiwana.” Vemasangano anomirira vagari vatenderana kushanda pamwe nevanotungamira maguta kuti vabude nemazano ekupedza dambudziko remvura, vachikurudzira kuti vagari vabhadhare mvura uye vemakanzuru vashandise mari iyi zvakanaka. Nyaya yekushaikwa kwemvura yakachena ndiyo inopa kuti nyika itarisane nematambudziko akaita serecholera uye typhoid. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzoshushikaka neMadzimai Ari Kufa Achisununguka Vana
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kuyambira kuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chinogona kunge chapa kuti huwandu hwemadzimai ari kufa achisungunuka huti wedzerei. Ongororo yakaitwa nebazi reUnited Nations rinoona nezvevana reUNICEF muna 2019, inoratidza kuti madzimai mazana mana nemakumi matanhatu kana kuti 462 pamadzimai zviuru zana kana kuti 100 000 vanofa vachisungunuka muZimbabwe. Huwandu uhu hwange hwakati derere pane madzimai mazana matanhatu negumi nevana kana kuti 624 vaifa vachisungunuka pamadzimai zviuru zana kana kuti 100 000 muna 2017. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzemadzimai reWomen’s Action Group, Amai Edna Masiiwa, vanoti huwandu hwemadzimai ari kufa achisungunuka hwakaderera asi kufa kwemudzimai kana mumwe chete kunoshungurudza. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kugara kure nezvipatara kunopa kuti hupenyu hwemadzimai huve munjodzi sezvo vachizosvika pakuda kusungunuka vasati vavhenekwa nachiremba sezvinokurudzirwa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Tonotenda Michael Simemeza vatiwo zvimwe zvinokonzera kufa kwemadzimai zvinosanganisira denda remoyo uye zvimwe zvirwere zvinotapuriranwa pabonde. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, Dr Josephat Chiripanyanga, vakurudzirawo zvakanyanya varume kuti vapote vacheperekedzana nemadzimai avo kuenda kumakiriniki kuti vanzwe zvinenge zvichitaurwa navanachiremba zvinozobatsira kuti madzimai asungunuke nyore. Vatiwo nekuda kwekupararira zvakanyanya kwechirwere cheCovid-19, hurumende dzakawanda kusanganisirawo yeZimbabwe hadzichakoshese hutano hwemadzimai akazvitakura nezvimwe zvirwere. Mukuyedza kubatsira madzimai akazvitakura munyika yeZimbabwe, sangano reUnited Nations Population Fund kana kuti UNFPA, rakanyorerana chibvumirano nenyika yeJapan chekubatsira nemari inosvika miriyoni imwechete nezviuru mazana matatatu emadhora ekuAmerica, kana kuti USD1,3 million. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, vachishanda nesangano reUNFPA, Dr Edwin Mpeta vanoti chirongwa ichi chichabatsira zvipatara nemakiriniki zvemumaguta eHarare neBulawayo sezvo muri imo makaonekwa kuti mune madzimai akawanda ari kufa achisungunuka. Doctor Mpeta vanoti zvipatara nemakiriniki zvichatengerwa zvinoshandiswa pakubatsira madzimai akazvitakura uye nezvipfeko zvekudzivirira kutapuriranwa kweCovid 19 pakati pemadzimai akazvitakura nevakoti navanachiremba. UNFPA inoti pagore, madzimai zviuru gumi nezvishanu kana kuti 15, 000 vanosungunuka kuBulawayo ukuwo vamwe zviru makumi mana nevashanu kana kuti 45, 000 vachisungunuka muHarare. Pamadzimai ose aya, zviuru mapfumbamwe kana kuti 19, 000 vanoda kuvhiyiwa uye vachabatsirwa nemari yabva kuJapana iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kushanda neMasangano eVashandi muKushambadza Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Hurumende iri kukurudzirwa kuti ishande nemasangano anomirira vashandi mukushambadza kwairi kuita nhomba inodzivirira Covid-19, kuitira kuti chirongwa chekubaya nhomba ichi chibudirire. Kurudziro iyi inobva kumukuru wesangano reCommunity Workin Gropu on Health, VaIta Rusike, uye inouya panguva iyo vanhu vari kuzvipira kubaiwa nhombaye Sinopharm iripo iye zvino vari kuramba vari vashoma. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti vanhu zana negumi nevasere kana kuti 118, ndivo chete vakabaiwa nhomba munyika yose nemusi weChina, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba iyi munyika yose pazviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu zvine gumi nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 36 019. VaRusike vanoti kana pakasatorwa matanho akasimba nekukasika pakushambadzwa kwenhomba iyi, chirongwa chePhase 2 chichangotanga ichi chinogona kungofanana nechePhase 1, icho chisina kuwana vanhu vakawanda. Asi mukuru ari kutungamira hurongwa hwekurwisana neCovid-19, Dr. Agnes Mahomva, vanoti kubva pakutanga, hurumende yanga ichingoshanda nemapoka ose muhurongwa uhwu saka nekudaro hapana vari kusiiwa kunze. Dr. mahomva vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vatambire chirongwa ichi sechavo, vachitri hurumende iri kuita payo saka zvasarira veruzhinji kuti vapindewo mazviri. Zvichakadaro, hurumende yakazivisawo nemusi weChina kuti vanhu vatatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19, vamwe makumi matatu nevatanhatu vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Izvi zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga hwasvika pazviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nevanomwe, kana kuti 36 377. Huwandu hwevanhu vafa hwakasvikawo pachiuru nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri, kana kuti 1 492. Vanhu vapona kubva kuchirwere ichi vakasvika pazviuru makumi matatu nezvitatu zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi manomwe nevaviri, kana kuti 33 972. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vabatwa neCovid-19 Hunoramba Huchikwira Munyika
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika huri kuramba huchikwira zvakanyanya zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwevamwe gumi nevanomwe (17) vaine chirwere ichi pakati pevanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana mana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu (2 495) vakavhenekwa nemusi weChina. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neChina manheru kuti huwandu hwevanhu vane chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose hwange hwave pazana nemakumi mana nevapfumbamwe (149). Vanhu vapona kubva kuchirwere ichi vasvikawo pamakumi maviri nevasere (28), uye vafa nechirwere ichi vachiri vana (4). Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo vanachiremba pachipatara cheGweru Provincial Hospital vakabudirira neChina wakare kusunungutsa mudzimai aive nepamuviri ane chirwere cheCovid-19, muchiitiko chinove chekutanga muZimbabwe. Sangano ravanachiremba vakuru, reZimbabwe Senior Hospital Doctors Assciation, rinoti vanachiremba ava vakakwanisa kusunungutsa mudzimai uyu kuburikidza nekumuvhiya kuti vakwanise kuburitsa mwana. Huwandu hwevanhu vavhenekwa kuti vane chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete munyika yose hunonzi hwasvika pazviuru makumi mana nemazana masere ane makumi mana nevanomwe (40 847). Chipatara cheJohns Hopkins chemuAmerica chinoti pasi rose huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwadarika mamiriyoni mashanu nemazana masere ezviuru (5,8 million), kuchitiwo vafa vadarika mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu ezviuru (360 000). Chipatara ichi chinoti vanhu vaongororwa pasi rose vadarika mamiriyoni gumi neshanu nemazana matanhatu ezviuru (15.6 million). Muno muAmerica vanhu vanodarika miriyoni nemazana manomwe ezviuru (1.7 million) vabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye vashaya vadarikawo zviuru zana nechimwe nemazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nemumwe chete (101.621). Mumwe chiremba ataura akazvimirira, Doctor Gilson Mandigo, vanoti zvinotyisa kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa chirwere che Covid-19 hwanyanya kukwira zvikuru svondo rino. Asi vanoti chakanaka panyaya iyi ndechekuti vanhu ava vari munzvimbo dzavakachengetedzwa kana kuti quarantine centres, zvekuti havakwanise kuparadzira chirwere ichi kune vamwe vagara vari munyika. Doctor Mandigo vakorokotedzawo kubudirira kwakaita vanachiremba vekuchiptarata cheGweru Provincial Hopsital, vachiti mucherechedzo wekuti hazvisi zvinhu zvose zvakashata zviri kubuda mubazi rezvehutano, kune zvimwe zvakanakawo zviri kuitika, kunyange hazvo vanachiremba navanamukoti vari kushupika. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yozadzisa Zviga zveUnited Nations?
text: No media source currently available No media source currently available Hurumende inoti Zimbabwe iri kubudirira zvikuru mukurwisa dambudziko reHIV/AIDS uye iri kukwanisa kuzadzikisa zviga zve Millenium Development Goals, MDGs, zvakatarwa neUnited Nations. Mashoko aya ataurwa nemukuru anoona nezve HIV/AIDS ne TB mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Owen Mugurungi, avo vanoti vari kufara nekuderera kwevanhu vari kubatwa neHIV/AIDS uye kuwanikwa kwemishonga nezvime. Zviga zve MDG’s izvi zvakatarwa muna Gunyana 2010 uye zvinofanira kunge zvazadzikiswa panopera gore rino. Chiga chechitanhatu che MDG’s ndechehutano chakanangangana nekurwisa zvirwere zvakaita sse HIV/AIDS, TB nezvimwe. Asi vamwe vanorarama neHIV vanoti nyaya yehupfumi isina kumira zvakana yave kupa kuti zvose zvange zvaitwa nehurumende zvidzokere kumashure. Vanoronga mabasa musangano re International Community of Women Living with HIV in Zimbabwe, Amai Martha Tolana, vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa nyaya yehupfumi kuitira kuti zviga izvi zvizadziswe. Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakaudza dare reparamende muna Zvita pakuparura bhajeti regore rino kuti kubva muna 2011 makambani zviuru zvina nemazana mashanu ainge avharwa, uye vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi mashanu nezvishanu vainge varasikirwa nemabasa kusvika pari zvino.

headline: Vamwe Votadza Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 yeKutanga Ichinzi Yapera
text:
Vanhu vakawanda vari kuda kubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 yekutanga mudunhu reMashonaland West vari kutadza kubaiwa zvichinzi hakuna nhomba yekutanga asi vanhu vachikwanisa kubayiwa nhomba yechipiri chete. Mumwe wevanhu vanga vachida kubayiwa nhomba muChinhoyi nhasi, VaTendayi Masakasa, vati vanzi vadzoke svondo rinouya sezvo kuri kungobayiwa nhomba yepiri chete.

Mumwe chiremba ari kuona nezvekubayiwa nhomba mudunhu reMakonde, Dr Paradzai Mudzengerere, vabvuma kuti pane dambudziko rekushaikwa
kwedzimwe mhomba asi vati zviri kukonzerwa nevanhu vari kunobayiwa
nhomba kunzvimbo dzisiri dzavakabayiwa nhomba yekutanga. Dr Madzengerere vati vave kupa nhomba yeSinopharm chete munzvimbo
dziri kubayirwa vanhu sezvo nhomba iyi iripo yakawanda kudarika dzimwe
nhomba. Dr Mudzengerere vakurudzira vanhu kuti vanobayiwa nhomba yepiri
kunzvimbo yavakambobayiwa nhomba yekutanga. Dambudziko riri kuMashonaland West rinonziwo riri kuwanikwa kumamwe matunhu ari munyika. Svondo rapera, mukuru anoona nezvehutano muBulawayo, Dr Welcome Mlilo, vakaudza bepanhau reThe Chronocle kuti dunhu ravo rakanga richitarisana nekushomeka kwenhomba dzeCovid-19 zvekuti vakanga vachibaya chete vabiyiwa nhomba kepiri. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirongwa zveCovid-19 National Task Force, Dr Agnes Mahobva, vati vakuru vezvehutano mumatunhu vari kuongorora nezvenyaya yekushaikwa kwenhomba mudzimwe nzvimbo sezvo vakatanga kuzvinzwa pama dandemutande. Asi vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance,Dr Henry Madzorera, vati kudzoserwa kwevanhu vari kuda kubaiwa nhomba zviri kuratidza kusarongeka kwehurumende munyaya yekutenga nekupa matunhu
nhomba dzinokwanirana.

Hurumende inoti mava nenhomba dzinodarika miriyoni imwe chete nemazana manomwe ezviuru idzo dzinosanganisira Sinopharm, Sinovac nedzimwe. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Mutsvangwa, vakazivisa svondo rapera kuti nyika iri kutarisira dzimwe nhomba zviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 500 000 kubva kuChina mwedzi uno. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kusvika
pari zvino vave chiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana kana kuti 1594 zvichitevera kufa wevanhu vaviri nezuro. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vave zviuru makumi matatu nezvisere zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanhatu nemumwe chete kana kuti 38 961, zvichitevera kubatwa kwevanhu gumi nevanomwe nezuro. Vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 yekutanga vave zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nezvishanu zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nevasere kana kuti 675 678. Vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vave zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi mana nezvina zvinemazana mana kana kuti 344 400. Izvi zvinoreva kuri nhomba dzashandiswa munyika yose dzasvika pamiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru makumi maviri nemakumi manomwe nesere, kana kuti 1 020 078. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu vanosvika
mamiriyoni gumi, 10 million, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva
muzana, 60%, zvevanhu vari munyika senzira yekudzivirira kupararira
kwechirwere cheCovid-19.

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzokurudzira Veruzhinji Kukoshesa Mitemo Inodzivirira Kupararira kweCovid-19
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neSvondo kuti hapana munhu akashaya nekuda kweCovid-19 uye vanhu gumi nemumwe, kana kuti 11, ndivo vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi kubva pavanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevashanu, kana kuti 535, vakavhenekwa nyika yose. Izvi zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nedenda iri kubva parapinda munyika gore rapera muna Kurume vave zviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nemumwe, kana kuti 36 271. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga vakasvika pachiuru nemazana mana nemakumi masere nevashanu, kana kuti 1 485, kuchitiwo huwandu hwevanhu vapona kubva kuCovid-19 hwakasvika pazviuru makumi matatu nezvitatu zvine mazana masere nemakumi matatu nevana, kana kuti 33 834. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisawo kuti vashandi vari pamberi mukurwisana neCovid-19 vanosvika mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevatanhatu, kana kuti 226, vakabaiwa nhomba yeSinopharm, yekudzivirira hutachiwana hunokonzera Covid-19. Izvi zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba iyi kubva zvatanga chirongwa ichi pazviuru makumi matatu nezviviri zvine mazana maviri nemakumi mana, kana kuti 32 240. Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano pamwe nemapurisa vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nehuwandu hwevanhu vasiri kutevedzera mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana yakatarwa neW-H-O pamwe nebazi rezvehutano kubva pakanyevenutswa mutemo we lockdown svondo rapera. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vanoti lockdown yakabatsira chose kuderedza huwandu hwevari kubatwa neCovid-19. Asi vanoti panofanirwa kuramba paine dzidziso pamusoro penzira dzekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri kunyange hazvo mitemo yakanyevenutswa. Svondo rapera mapurisa akazivisa kuti kusvika neChishanu chapfuura vanhu vaidarika zviuru zvishanu vakanga vasungwa kubva musi wa 01 nemhosva yekusapfeka zvivharangozi,kana kuti ma mask, danho rinonzi nemapurisa vari kushushikana naro. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe, kana kuti 3,9 million, vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vadarika zviuru zana nezvishanu rine mazana manomwe nemakumi maviri nevaviri, kana kuti 105, 722. Vapora muAfrica vadarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 3, 5 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere che coronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni zana negumi nematanhatu nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe, kana kuti 116, 9 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica, iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose, inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nezvishanu, kana kuti kuti 525, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemasere ane zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 28, 9 million. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 2,5 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nematanhatu kana kuti 66, million. No media source currently available

headline: VanaChiremba Voramba Kurudziro yeHurumende Yekuti Vadzokere kuMabasa
text: Vanachiremba munyika varamba kutambira kurudziro yehurumende yekuti vadzokere kumabasa nhasi vakatiwo vave kuda kubuda musangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reHealth Apex Council. Vanachiremba ava vaungana muHarare vakaratidzira pachipatara cheParirenyatwa vachiti hazvibatsiri kuti hurumende ivatyisidzire kuti vadzokere kumabasa vasina mari. Mumwe chiremba anga achiratidzira Dr Learnmore Shoti vati kuda kuvatyisidzira kuti vadzokere kumabasa hakuna zvakunoshanda sezvo vari kunonga svosve nemuromo. Mumwe chiremba asina kuda kudomwa nezita atiwo sezvo hurumende iri kukwidzawo zvinhu zvakaita semafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari, magetsi nezvimwewo zvichienderana nehuremu hwedhora rekuAmerica (Interbank Exchange Rate), naivo vanodawo kuti mari dzavo dzemihoro dzienderane nerate inenge iripo pavanotambira. Vanachiremba varatidzira vakananga kumahofisi eHealth Services Board uko vanosiya tsamba yenyunyuto vachishora nyaya yekutyisidzirwa uye vachitiwo vari kuda kubuda zviri pamutemo kubva musangano reHealth Apex Council rinomirira vashandi vose vehurumende. Vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori musangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association, Doctor Tawanda Zvakada vati vanachiremba vaona zvakakodzera kubuda mumubatanidzwa wevashandi vari pasi pebazi rezvehutano sezvo risisamirire zvido zvavo. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wesangano ravanachiremba reZHDA, Doctor Masimba Dean Ndoro vati vari kuda kuti HSB itsvake imwe nzira yekuti vanzwe zvichemo zvavanachiremba kuitira kuti dambudziko ravo rigadziriswe. Vana chiremba vashoma shoma ndivo vanga varikubatsira pachipatara cheParirenyatwa izvo zvasiyawo varwere vari panyanga dzamushore. Amai Sandra Mushonga avo vane mwana ari muchipatara cheParirenyatwa vati mwana wavo haasi kuonekwa nanachiremba nguva dzese. Vati dai hurumende yagadzirisa zviri kudiwa navanachiremba kuitira kudzivirira kurasikirwa nehupenyu. Kunyangwe hazvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka kuzvipatara, sachigaro weHealth Services Board, Dr Paulinus Sikhosana vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanachiremba vadzokere kumabasa. Dr Sikhosana vatiwo kuumba rimwe boka rekuti vawane kutaurirana nanachiremba zvinotora nguva. Health Apex Council ine masangano anosvika gumi nemaviri anomirira vashandi vakasiyasiyana vari mubazi rezvehutano kubvira kune vanoita zvekuchenesa muzvipatara. Vana chiremba vanoti kusangana kwevanhu vanoita mabasa akasiyana-siyana kuri kupa kuti vamwe vashandi vabvume mari dzinenge dzataurwa nehurumende chero dziri shoma shoma. Kuramwa mabasa kwavana chiremba uku kwakatanga musi wa3 Gunyana. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Vobatwa neZvirwere Zvesiki neZvimwe
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nezvirwere zvepabonde hwadzikira nezvikamu makumi matanhatu nezvina kubva muzana, mukati memakore gumi nemashanu apfuura, zvirwere izvi zvichakawanda munyika uye zviri kunyanyobata vanhu vane makore makumi maviri nemashanu kusvika pamakore makumi mana nemapfumbamwe. Vachitaura pamusoro pemamiriro akaita zvirwere zvepabonde nerurindi, munyika pamwe nezviri kukonzera zvirwere izvi, kukomimiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvehutano, Dr John Mangwiro, vati munyika mune zvirwere zvapabonde zvakawanda zvakaita seGonorrhea neSyphlis neHIV. Vatiwo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cherurindi hwakadzikiria zvichitevera kudzikira kubatwa kuri kuitwa vanhu nehutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvepaponde mubazi iri, Dr Tsitsi Appolo, vati huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nezvirwere izvi hwakawandira kumatunhu eMidlands neMashonaland West. Vati mumatunhu aya zvirwere izvi zvakawandira munzvimbo dzinoitwa zvekuchera goridhe uko kune vanhu vakawanda. Dr Appollo vanoti humbowo hunoratidza kuti munhu mumwe chete pa vanhu vashanu anenge aine chimwe chirwere chapabonde anenge aine hutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS. Vatiwo zvakaonekwa kuti pavanhu gumi vanobatwa nezviwere zvepabonde mumwe chete anenge akambobatwa nechirwere ichi. Vati mekuda kwaizvo vari kuita zvirongwa zvekuona kuti vanhu vanogara munzvimbo dzinobatwa vanhu vakakwanda nechirwre ichi vaongororwa kuti havana zvirwere izvi here, kuvakurudzira kushandisa makondomu pamwe nekushandisa nzira dzepabonde dzisingaparadzire zvirwere. Vazhinji vari kubatwa nezvirwere zvepabonde, vachairi vemotakari hombe kana kumagonyeti, vanorarama nekutengesa bonde, varume vanorara nevamwe varume pamwe nevanofamba muzvimbodzinocherwa goridhe nezvimwe kana kuti maArtisinal miners. Dr Appollo vati pakaita dambudziko pakuendesa makondomu munzvimbo zhinji munyika muna 2018, 2019 pamwe negore rino izvo zvakaitawo kuti vakawanda vabatwe nezvirwere zvepabonde. Vati bazi ravo rine hurongwa hwekurapa zvirwere zvakaita seSyphilis, pamwe nekuti vana vasatapurirwe hutachiwana hweHIV nanamai vavo. Vatiwo munhu wega wega anenge aine chirwere chepadone aakenda kuchipatara kana kirinika anobva aongororwa kuti haana hutachiwana hweHIV here. Asi vati pari zvino nyika haina mishonga yakakwana yekurapa maSTIs uye zvakakosha kuti paramende ione kuti vapihwa mari inokwana kutenga mishonga iyi. Munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvakakosha kuti hurumende ikoshese nyaya dzehutano pamwe nekugadzira hupfumi kuti vanhu vawane mabasa vaswera vachikorokoza. Vatiwo mishonga inofanira kuwanikwa muzvipatara kuitira kuti vange vaine zvirwere varapwe. Dr Mangwiro vati pane mimwe mishonga yave kutadza kurapa maSTIs uye vave kuongorora mishonga iyi kuti vaone kuti inokodzera here kuti varambe vachiishandisa. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Votarisirwa Kutanga Kubayiwa Nhomba yeSinopharm neMusi weChina
text: Hurumende iri kutarisirwa kuparura chirongwa chekubaya vanhu nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 nemusi weChina uye inoti vachabayiwa pachikamu chekutanga chechirongwa ichi vanosanganisira machiremba, vakoti nevamwe vashandi vezvehutano. Izvi zvinotevera kupedza nemusi weChitatu kwekudzidziswa kwemashandisirwo enhomba iyi kwaitwa vashandi vehutano munyika yose. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemshoko, Seneta Monica Mutsvangwa, vanoti vashandi vehutano vange vari kudzidziswawo zvinhu zvakaita sekuti mishonga iyi inochengetwa sei. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti nhengo dzesangano ravo dziri kupinda muzvidzidzo izvi munyika yose. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevamwe vapinda muzvidzidzo izvi asi VaDongo vati hapana chakanyanyooma pazvidzidzo izvi sezvo vakoti vagara vachibaya nhomba dzezvimwe zvirwere. Vati vange vachitarisira kuti zvidzidzo izvi zvivape vakoti ruzivo pamusoro pemashandiro enhomba yeSinopharm. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota neChipiri manheru, Amai Mutsvangwa vakati nhomba iyi ichaendendeswa kumatunhu pachishandiswa nzira dzinoendeswa mimwe mishonga. Vakatiwo kunze kwevashandi vehutano, vamwe vachabayiwa pachikamu chekutanga mauto, mapurisa nemagadhijere uyewo vashandi veZimbabwe Revenue Authority pamwe neAgritex. Pachikamu chechipiri pachabaiwa varairidzi vezvikoro zvepasi nezvepamusoro uye vamwe vese vachabaiwa pasi pechikamu chekupedzesera. Amai Mutsvangwa vanoti vese vachabaiwa vachanyorwa mazita avo pasi uye vachaudzwa kuti vachazobaiwa riini zvekare sezvo vachifanira kubaiwa kaviri. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi izvo zvichaita mari inodarika mamiriyoni matanhatu nezviuru mazana manomwe zvemadhora ekuAmerica. South Africa yakaparura hurongwa hwayo hwekubaya nhomba iyi neChitatu mutungamiriri wenyika iyi, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vachibaiwa veruzhinji vachiona. . No media source currently available

headline: Vanachiremba Vakuru Voratidzira muHarare
text: Munyori mukuru musangano ravanachiremba vakuru reZimbabwe Senior Hospital Doctors Association, Doctor Aaron Musara, vanoti vachange vachiratidzira muHarare nekusafara kwavo nemamiriro akaita zvinhu muzvipatara zvehurumende. Vanachiremba ava vari kutarisirwa kuenda netsamba yenyunyuto kudare reparamende. Kuratidzira uku kuri kuuya apo gurukota rezvehutano, Doctor Obadiah Moyo, vakaudza Studio7 nezuro kuti hurumende haisi kuzotaurirana navanachiremba vari kuramwa kana kuti vakadzingwa mabasa. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, mushure mehurukuro nemusi weChina nevakuru vekereke yeRoman Catholic vakati vanachiremba vakadzingwa vaikwanisa kudzokera kumabasa mukati memazuva maviri pasina kutorerwa matanho. Asi izvi zvinenge zvakona n'anga murapwa achida sezvo Doctor Moyo vanoti vashoma ndivo vakatambira kurudziro uyi. Vanachiremba vanoti vari kuda kuti hurumende itange yaratidza kuzvipira kugadzirisa zvinhu zvaita manyama amire nerongo muzvipatara zvinosanganisira kushaikwa kwemishonga uye michina yekushandisa. Dr Muasara vaudza Studio7 kuti vanachiremba vanoda chose kushanda asi zvinhu zviri kuvarwadza kuti vamwe varwere vave kungofa nekuda kwekuti havana zvikwanisiro. No media source currently available

headline: Chirongwa cheNhomba yeCovid-19 Chakapinda muZuva Retatu Panguva Iyo EU Ichiti Ichawanisa Zimbabwe Imwe Nhomba
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neChitatu kuti kusvika nenguva dzeina dzemasikati, vashandi vari pamberi mukurwisana nedenda reCovid-19 vanosvika zviuru zviviri nemazana manomwe nevana, kana kuti 2 074, vakanga vabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 nyika yose. Izvi zvakaitika apo chirongwa chekubaya nyika yose chakapinda muzuva retatu. Bazi iri rakazivisawo kuti vanhu vasere vakafa kana kuti 8, uye vamwe makumi mashanu kana kuti 50, vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu chiuru nemazana masere nevana, kana kuti 1 804, vakavhenekwa. Vanhu zana nemakumi mashanu nevana, kana kuti 154, vakanga vari muchipatara pakupera kwezuva musi weChipiri. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 nyika yose hwakasvika pazviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanhtatu, kana kuti 35 960, kuchitiwo vanhu vafa kubva patanga chirwere ichi nyika yose vakasvika pachiuru nemazana mana ane makumi mashanu nevatanhatu, kana kuti 1 456. Zvichakadaro, sangano reEuropean Union rinoti Zimbabwe munguva pfupi inotevera iri kutarisirwa kuwana nhomba inodarika miriyoni imwe chete kana kuti 1, 152 million, pasi pechirongwa che Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations, kana kuti COVAX. Izvi zvakabuda padandemutande reTwitter reEU. Chirongwa cheCOVAX chinotungamirwa nesangano reWorld Health Organization richibatsirwa nemasangano akasiyanasiyana, kunyanya reEuropean Union, uye chakanangana nekubatsira nyika dzichiri kubudirira. Pari zvino Zimbabwe yakapihwa nhomba zviuru mazana maviri, kana kuti 200 000, kubva kuChina, iyo yakatanga kubayiwa muHarare svondo rapera uye mamwe matunhu kutanga neMuvhuro. China yakazivisa neChitatu kuti ichapa Zimbabwe imwe nhomba zviuru mazana maviri. Zimbabwe inoti yakatenga imwe nhomba zviuru mazana matanhatu kubva kuChina inosvika mukupera kwemwedzi uno. Asi vakuru mubazi rezvehutano vasina kuda kudomwa nemazita vanoti vanhu vari kuuya kuzobayiwa vachiri vashoma. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, Dr. Brighton Chireka vanoti vanotenda bazi rezvehutano nedanho rayakatora rekuti vashandi vezvehutano vave pakati pevanhu vakatanga kubaiwa nhomba munyika yose. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Haisati Yavhura Mabhodha Ayo?
text: Vamiriri vehurumende kumuganho weBeitbridge neSouth Africa vanonzi nezuro vakazivisa kuti nyika haisi kuzovhura miganho yayo nhasi, zuva riri kuvhurwawo miganho yenyika yeSouth Africa, sezvanga zvakatarisirwa nevakawana. Mutungamiri wesangano revanotenga nekutengesa kunze kwenyika, reInternational Cross-Border Traders Associationa, VaDenis Juru, vanoti vakaudzwa nezvedanho iri nezuro pamusangano wavakaita nevamiriri ava. South Africa inonzi yakazivisa kuti yaizovhura miganho yayo nhasi, izvo zvakapawo vana veZimbabwe tarisiro yekuti nyika yavo yaizoitawo zvimwechete. Asi hurumende yeZimbabwe yakagara yazivisa zvayo kare kuti yaizovhura chete nhandare dzendege musi wa 01 Gumiguru, unove nhasi. Miganho pamwe nenhandare dzendege zvakavharwa muna Kurume senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, kanawo munyori mubazi ravo, VaNick Mangwana, kunyange hazvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichirira. Sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaKindness Paradza, vatiwo vanga vasati vanzwa nezvenyaya iyi. Ngatinzweyi hurukuro yaitwa naJonga Kandemiiri weStudio 7 naVaJuru. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yova Nyika Yekutanga muAfrica Kubaya Vanhu Jekiseni reMushonga weHIV/AIDS
text: Zimbabwe nemusi weChina yakabatana nedzimwe nyika mukucherechedza World Aids Day vanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS vachiti pane zvichiri kuda kugadziriswa kuti Zimbabwe izadzise donzvo rekupedza denda iri panozosvika 2030 . Zimbabwe ndiyo nyika yekutanga muAfrica kushandisa mushonga wejekiseni rekudzikisa hukasha hwechirwere cheHIV rinonzi cabotegravir uye nyanzvi dzinoti iri kuita zviri nani kurwisa denda iri kudarika nyika dzakawanda. Dunhu reSADC ndiro rine vanhu vakawanda vane chirwere ichi pasi rose zvikuru muSouth Africa. Vachitaura kumhemberero dzaitwa kuMarondera kuRudhaka Stadium nhasi mukuru weNational Aids Council, Doctor Bernard Madzima vatiwo zvakakosha kuti munhu wese akwanise kuwana rubatsiro kana ane chirwere cheHIV/AIDS vachiti izvi ndizvo zvinobatsira nyika kuti ikwanise kuzadzikisa chiga chekuderedza nekupedza kupararira kwehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS Vachitaura neStudio 7 Amai Martha Tholanah vave nemakore makumi maviri nerimwe vachirarama nehutachiona hweHIV/ AIDS vati Zimbabwe inofanirwa kugadzirisa matambudziko akadai sehurombo nemhirizhonga yekushungurudzwa kwevana vadIko pabonde mukuedza kuzadzikisa tarisiro yekupedza kupararira kwehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS. Amai Tholanah vatiwo mapiritsi anoshandiswa nevanorarama neHIV/AIDS anogona kukonzerawo mamwe matambudziko nekudaro zvakakosha kuti nyika iise zvirongwa zvinoita kuti vanorarama nehutachiona vaongororwe pachena nguva nenguva zvinhu zvakadai sechiropa neitsvo . Mumwezve anorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS Pastor Maxwell Kapachawo vati kupedza dambudziko rekupararira kwehutachiona zvakakosha kuti nyika igadzirise matambudziko arimunyaya dzezvehutano. Amai Olive Thabeni mukuru werimwe sangano rinoshanda nevanorarama neHIV/AIDS reLife Empowerment Support Organisation vati zvakakosha kuti vanhu vanorarama nechirwere ichi vabatsirwe kudzivirira zvimwe zvirwere zvakadai segomarara rechibereko pachena . Zuva reWorld Aids Day rinocherechedzwa musi wa1Zvita gore negore richishandiswa sezuva rekurangarira avo vakashaya ne kuda kwechirwere cheAIDS pamwe nekuyeuchidzana nezvechirwere ichi. Zuva iri rakatanga kucherechedzwa muna 1988 zvakurudzirwa nesangano rinoona nezvehutano pasi rese reWorld Health Organisation. Dingindira regore rino ririkukurudzira kuti munhu wese anorarama nehutachiona awane kubatsirika zvisinei nechimiro chake. No media source currently available

headline: Victoria Falls Inokwanisa Kubaya Nhomba Vanhu Vakawanda Zvekukwanisa kuDzivirira Kupararira kweCovid-19
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neSvondo kuti munhu mumwechete akafa neCovid-19 uye vamwe vanhu makumi maviri nevaviri kana kuti 22, vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Izvi zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nyika yose pachiuru chimwe nemazana mashanu ane makumi mashanu nevanomwe, kana kuti 1 557. Ukuwo, vanhu vasere, vazhinji vavo vari vana vechikoro, vanonzi vakaiswa kwavo voga (quarantine) kuBulawayo mushure mekuwanikwa kwedenda reCovid-19 pachikoro cheMzilikazi Primary School. Mukuru wezvehutano mudunhu reBulawayo, Dr. Edwin Sibanda, vaudza bepanhau reChronicle kuti vasere ava vakaendeswa kuchipatara cheThorngrove neku Elangeni Training Centre mushure mekuona kuti vamwe vevanhu ava vanogara mudzimba diki izvo zvinovatadzisa kuzogara kwavo voga. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvakachatanga hwakasvika pazviuru makumi matatu nezvisere zvine makumi masere nevatanhatu, kana kuti 38 086. Ukuwo, bazi rezvehutano rakazivisawo kuti vanhu zviuru gumi nezviviri nezana negumi nevaviri, kana kuti 12 112, vakabaiwa nhomba yekutanga neSvondo izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba iyi pazviuru mazana matatu nemakumi matatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana matanhatu, kana kuti 336 600. Vamwe zviuru zvishanu nemazana masere nevanomwe, kana kuti 5 807, vakabaiwa nhomba yepiri zvakasvitsawo huwandu hwevabaiwa nhomba iyi pazviuru makumi mashanu nezvitatu zvine mazana mana negumi nevasere, kana kuti 53 418. Izvi zviri kuuya panguva iyo dhorobha reVictoria Falls rakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vakwanisa kubaiwa nhomba dzose pazvikamu makumi manomwe nezvinomwe kubva muzana, kana kuti 77 percent. Izvi zvinopa kuti Victoria Falls, iyo inonzi ine vanhu vanokodzera kubaiwa nhomba vanosvika zviuru makumi maviri nezvishanu, kana kuti 25 000, rive dunhu rekutanga munyika kudzivirirwa kubva mukupararira kwedenda iri, kana kuti herd immunity. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo vakabaiwa nhomba yavo yekutaga vari kuVictoria Falls, varumbidza zvikuru danho rakatorwa nedhoorobha iri rekubaya vanhu vakawanda kudaro nhomba. Studio 7 yabata mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirirwa kweCovid-19, Dr. Agnes Mahomva kuti tinzwe zvizhinji, asi vati vanga vari mumusangano. Asi mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti zvinofadza chose kuti Victoria Falls yakwanisa kuwana vanhu vakawanda kudaro vabaiwa nhomba, asi vanoti dhorobha iri rakakwanisa kuita izvi sezvo rakangotanga nekubaya munhu wese. VaRusike vanoti mamwe madhorobha nemaguta vakatanga kubaya nhomba iyi muzvikamu zvikamu, izvo zvakaita kuti vanhu vaibaiwa vave vashoma. Asi vanoti kubayiwa nhomba kwevanhu vanosvika zvikamu makumi manomwe nezvinomwe kubva muzana uku kunogona kushaya basa kana vashanyi pamwe nevanhu vanobva munzvimbo dzakapoteredza dhorobha iri vasina kubaiwawo sezvo vachikwanisa kusiya zvakare hutachiwana hweCovid-19 pavanopinda nekubuda mudhorobha iri. Dhorobha reVictoria Falls rinonzi rakawaniswa nhomba inoita makumi matanhatu ezviuru, zvichireva kuti vagari vanosvika makumi matatu ezviuru vanokwanisa kubaiwa nhmbo dzose dziri mbiri. No media source currently available

headline: Zvimwe Zvikoro Zvorambidza Vabereki Kushanyira Vana Vavo Pachityirwa Korera
text: Zvimwe zvikoro zvakaita seChinhoyi High mudunhu reMashonaland West zvave kurambidza vabereki vane vana vanodzidza vachigara muzvikoro izvi kushanyira vana vavo kana kuvaigira chikafu senzira yekudziviri kupararira kwechirwere chekorera. Mumwe wevanochengeta vana vanodzidza vachigara pachikoro cheChinhoyi High asina kuda kudomwa nezita sezvo asingabvumirwe kutaura nevatori venhau ati hapana mubereki ari kubvumidzwa kuuya pachikoro apa, uye hapana chikafu chekunze chiri kubvumidzwa pachikoro apa. Muchengeti wevana uyu ati pachikoro apa pane dambudziko rekushomeka kwemvura zvekuti vehutano vakavabvakachira vachiona kuti zvakamira sei pachikoro. Mumwe mubereki, VaSimon Moyo, avo vanga vauya kuzoona mwana wavo vaine zvekudya, vati varambidzwa. Vatiwo vakuru vechikoro vanofanirwa kupatsanura zvekudya zvingangoita korera kwete kurambidza zvekudya zvese zvese nezvinenge zvatengwa muzvitoro. Zvichakadaro, vamwe vanotengesa zvinhu muChinhoyi vashoropodza hurongwa hwekanzuru hwekubhadharisa zvimbuzi uye kuti vatengesere pedyo nezvimbuzi. VaKillian Mashoko vati kanzuru inofanirwa kumbomisa kubhadhariswa kwezvimbuzi zviri munzvimbo dzekutandarira mudhorobha. VaMashoko vati kanzuru haifanirwe kupa vanhu pekutengesera pedyo nezvimbuzi izvo vanoti hazvina hutano. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rekanzuru yeChinhoyi panyaya iyi. Hurumende yakambomisa kuungana kwevanhu vakawanda panzvimbo imwechete nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere chekorera icho chauraya vanhu makumi matatu nevaviri munyika pari zvino. Chirongwa cheZimbabwe International Book Fair changa chichifanirwa kutanga muHarare neMuvhuro, chakambomiswa nekuda kwechirwere chekorera icho chatekeshera muHarare, zvikuru munzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji dzeGlen View neBudiriro. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Votadza Kushanyira Botswana Kunyangwe Bhodha Ravhurwa neKushaya Tsamba dzeCovid-19
text: Kunyange hazvo Botswana yavhura zvizere mabhoda ayo mashanu nhasi kusanganisira muganhu waro uri pedyo neguta rePlumtree weRamokgwebana, kwanga kuine motokari nevanhu vashomanana vanga vachipinda nekubuda munyika iyi. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio7 pamuganhu uyu nhasi inoratidza kuti ruzhinji rwezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvanga zvichidzoserwa kumusha nekuti zvanga zvisina chitambi chinoratidza kuti havana chirwere cheCOVID-19. Botswana yakatsidza kuti haina kubvumidza ani zvake anobva kuine imwe nyika kupinda munyika iyi asina gwaro rinoratidza akavhenekerwa COVID-19 akawanikwa asina chirwere ichi chashura mare pasi rose senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri. Asi hurongwa hwaitwa neBotswana uhu huri kuita kuti vazhinji vatadze kufamba famba nekuti hazvisi nyore kuti munhu avhenekerwe hutachiwana hweCOVID-19 sezvo vanovheneka vari kubhadharisa makumi matanhatu emadhora ekuAmerica. Amai Gertrude Maravanzira vaudza Studio7 kuti vakambofunga kujamba bhodha sezvo nyika dzakavharwa murume vavo ari kuGaborone ivo vari kuZimbabwe asi vakatya izvo zvaita kuti vaite nhangemutange. Asi chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chisina kuita rombo rakanaka saAmai Maravanzira ndiVaWalter Mukanga avo vaudza Studio7 kuti vava nemazuva maviri vari gere pabhodha reRamokgwebana sezvo vashandi vebazi rehutano munyika iyi vari kuramba gwaro ravo vachiti ndere kunyeba.  VaMukanga pamwe chete nevamwe vavo vaviri vanoti Agrippa Murimba naRaymond Uchena vane chivimbo chekuti vachakunda kuti vano joina chikwata chebhora cheMorupule Wanderers munyika iyi.  VaMurimba, avo vanoti vaitambira chikwata cheHarare City, vanoti chirwere cheCOVID-19 chaunza kusagadzikana kukuru uko chaita kuti vatambi vebhora vave nedambudziko rekutsvaga mafuro manyoro. Mukuru wesangano reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation kana kuti VISET VaSamuel Wadzai vaudza Studio7 kuti mari dziri kudiwa nevanovheneka denda iri dzakawandisa. VaWadzai vakurudzira hurumende kuti ive nehurongwa hwekubatsira nhengo dzesangano ravo nevamwe vanorarama nekutenga midziyo kuBotswana vachinotengesa kumusha kuitira kuti vasashandire dhongi rakaora. Kunyange hazvo ruzhinji rwuri kuchema chema, gurukota rinoona nezvehutano muBotswana VaEdwin Dikoloti vanoti nyika yavo haisi kuzodududza shure panyaya yezvitambi vachiti ndiyo nzira chete ingabatsira kuti hutachiwana uhu husapararire. Botswana ine vanhu zviuru gumi nemazana manomwe ane makumi mana nemaviri vabatwa nechirwere ichi kotiwo makumi matatu nevana vafa nokuda kwedenda iri. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Vanoshanyira Zvipatara Vachiona Varwere
text: Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaNelson Chamisa, vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise matambudziko ari kusangana nanachiremba nevana mukoti munyika kuitira kuti nyika isarasikirwe nehupenyu hweveruzhinji. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mushure mekushanyira chipatara chehurumende cheHarare Central uko vana chiremba nevana mukoti vari kuramwa mabasa vachigunun’una nemari dzemihoro, VaChamisa varatidza kushushikana zvikuru nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzezvehutano. Mumwe murwere anga ari muchipatara, VaFungai Mahachi, vati havasi kunyatsorapwa zvakakwana sezvo vana chiremba nevana mukoti vari kuramwa mabasa. VaChamisa varumbidza vana chiremba nevakoti vashoma vanga vari pabasa nhasi vachibatsira vanhu vakazvitakura pamwe nevanga vachisununguka vachiti tsiye nyoro dzavari kuita dzekubatsira vanhu ava panguva iyo vari kuramwa mabasa chinhu chinokudzwa zvikuru. VaChamisa vati kana bato ravo richinge rapinda mumasimba vachaedza kugadzirisa matambudziko ose ari kusangana nenyika zvikuru sei munyaya dzehutano. Zvichakadai, sangano rinomirira vanachiremba reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association raburitsa mashoko ekuti nhengo dzaro dzicharamba dzakakanda mapadza pasi kudzamara nhuna dzavo dzanzwikwa nehurumende. Sangano iri rinoti vana chiremba vanodarika chiuru havasi pamabasa sezvo vari kuda kuti zvichemo zvavo zvigadziriswe. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kudivi regurukota rezvehutano, Va David Parirentatwa. Vana chiremba vava nemasvondo anodarika maviri vachiramwa basa sezvo vasiri kuwirirana nehurumende panyaya dzemihoro. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Vave neHukama Hwakasimba naVaMugabe Avo Vari Kurwara Vari kuSingapore
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nezuro vakaita hurukuro neZBC uye bepanhau reHerald ichaburitswa musi wa 18 Kubvumbi pazuva rekupemberera kuwana kuzvitonga kuzere. VaMnangagwa vakati muhurukuro iyi vari kuwirirana zvikuru nevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe avo vanoti vari kurapwa kuSingapore parizvino. Vanoti munhu wavanoremekedza zvikuru. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaJoy Mabenge vanoti VaMugabe naVaMnangagwa vashanda vose kwenguva yakareba nekudaro hazvishamise kuti vanoramba vachidyidzana. No media source currently available Vakatiwo vanhu vanofanira kusungunuka kutaura nyaya yeGukurahundi asi vasingakumbire ruregerero pane zvavanonzi vakaita munguva iyi apo vainge vari gurukota rezvevasori.

headline: Vari Kunze kweNyika Votadza Kuziva reMangwana Ravo muSarudzo
text: Sezvo chirongwa chekunyoresa kuvhota cheBiometric Voters’ Registration mop-up chiri kupetwa nemusi weChina munyika yose, vakawanda vari kunze kwenyika vanoti havachazivi remangwana ravo panyaya yekuti vachapinda here kana kuti kwete musarudzo dziri kutarisirwa gore rino vachivhota vari munyika dzavagere. Mumwe wevari kunze ava ndaAmai Chenaimoyo Mutambasere vesangano reZimbabwe Citizens Initiative, avo vari kuLondon kuBritain. Amai Mutambasere vanoti havachaoni hurumende iine chaichavaitira kuti vakwanise kunyoresa kuvhota kuitira kuti vazovhota gore rino, sezvo pachiratidza sekunge pasisina nguva. Asi vanoti zvakangonakawo zvakare kuti vatange vanzwa zvichabuda munyaya yakakwidza kudare reConstitutional Court nezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvichimirirwa neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights,yekuti zvibvumidzwe kuvhota zviri munyika dzazvigere. Nyaya iyi yanzi nedare inzwikwe musi wa 14 Kukadzi 2018. Amai Mutambasere vanoti kana dare rakapa mutongo unotsigira kuti vavhote vari nyika dzavari, kana dai vakasakwanisa zvavo kuvhota gore rino, zvinenge zvangovanakira musarudzo dzinouya. Asi dzimwe nyaya mbiri dzakambopinzwawo mumatare dzakafanana naiyoyi hadzina kuunzira vana veZimbabwe vari kunze mufaro, sezvo matare akarasa nyaya idzi, uyewo kupa mutongo usingavafadze. Kunyange hazvo pasati patarwa zuva resarudzo, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatoyambira kare kuti sarudzo dzinogona kuitwa mwedzi waChikunguru usati wasvika. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvemutemo dzinoti izvi hazvigoni kuitika sezvo bumbiro remitemo richiti sarudzo dzinofanirwa kuitwa chete pakati pa22 Chikunguru na22 Nyamavhuvhu, kunze kwekunge VaMnangagwa vaparadza dare reparamende. Chirongwa che BVR chiri kudzokororwa ichi kana kuti mop-up, chiri kutarisirwa kupetwa neChina, asi vanhu vanonzi vacharamba vachinyoresa kuvhota mune dzimwe nzvimbo mumatunhu avagere. No media source currently available

headline: Dare reConCourt Rinorasa Chikumbiro cheMisa Zimbabwe
text: Dare repamusoro-soro reConstitutional Court rarasa chikumbiro chesangano reMisa Zimbabwe chekuti vatori venhau vapihwe mukana wekutora mifananidzo yemavhidhiyo pachange pachinzwikwa nyaya yakakwidzwa kudare nemutungamiri weMDC Alliance VaNelson Chamisa. VaChamisa vari kuda kuti zvakabuda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika yakaitwa musi wa30 Chikunguru zvisendekwe parutivi, vachiti ivo ndivi vakakunda musarudzo iyi, kwete zvakataurwa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, zvekuti mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ndivo vakakunda. Vachisvitsa chikumbiro ichi mudare, gweta reMisa Zimbabwe, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, vati vatori venhau vanobva kumakambani akasiyana-siyana vanofanirwa kubvumidzwa kutora mifanananidzo yemavhidhiyo mudare vagoibuditsa pamadandemutande nepazvivhitivhiti panguva imwecheteyo inenge ichiitika zvinhu kwete kuti komisheni inoona nezvematare yeJudical Services Commission ibvumidze kambani yeZBC yoga kuita izvi. Amai Mtetwa vatiwo kambani yeZBC haifanirwe kuva iyo yoga inobvumidzwa kutora mifananidzo mudare mangwana sezvo mamwe makambani enhau akazvimrira akangofananawo neZBC ane marezenesi ekutepfenyura. Vati zvakaitwa neJudicial Services Commission zvekupa ZBC chete mvumo yekutepfenyura zvichange zvichiitika mudare zvinoita sekuti kambani yeZBC yakakosha kupfuura mamwe makambani enhau uye vati zvichadhurira mamwe makambani enhau ari kuda kutepfenyura kunzwikwa kwenyaya ichange iri mudare mangwana sezvo kambani yeZBC yati ichange ichibhadharisa mari inoita zviuru gumi nezvitatu zvemadhora pazuva kumakambani achada kushandisa mifananidzo ichange ichitorwa nekambani iyi mudare mangwana. Amai Mtetwa vaenderera mberi vachiti ZBC haibatike kune dzimwe nzvimbo munyika uye ruzhinji rwevanhu rwave kukwanisa kuona zvinenge zvichiitika munyika kubudikidza nekutepfenyurwa kunoitwa nevanoshandisa mbozhanhare vachiisa pamadandemutande panguva inenge ichiitika zvinhu. Vatiwo zvakanaka kuti mamwe makambani akazvimirira abvumidzwe kutepfenyura ari padare riri kunzwikwa nyaya iyi mangwana sezvo achitepfenyurira vanhu vari muZimbabwe pamwe nevari kunze kwenyika vari kuda kuziva zvichange zvichiitika panyaya iyi mangwana. Asi gweta ranga rakamirira VaMnangagwa, VaTinomudaishe Chinyoka, vati Misa Zimbabwe haina nhepfenyuro yainotepfenyura zvingapa kuti inzwikwe. Gweta ranga rakamirira Judicial Services Commission, VaAddington Chinake, vatiwo mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira, Busani Bafana, uyo anga achigitsigira chikumbiro cheMisa Zimbabwe ichi achiti anodawo kutora mifananidzo mudare, haana rezenesi rekutepfenyura nokudaro nyaya yake haina kusimba.
