Magweta anga akamirira ZBC panyaya iyi atiwo ZBC inokwanisa kupa makambani ose mifananidzo yaanoda nemhando yaanenge achida zvisinei nekuti ndeemuno kana kuti ndeekunze sezvo achiti ZBC yave nemichina yechimanjemanje inokwanisa kuita izvi. Mukuru wevatongi munyika, VaLuke Malaba, avo vanzwa nyaya iyi, varasa chikumbiro cheMisa Zimbabwe vachiti Misa Zimbabwe naBafana havana marezenesi ekutepfenyura saka nokudaro havana chavangarwira panyaya iyi. VaChinyoka, vati vafara nemutongo waturwa nedare. VaChinyoka vati zvasvitswa kudare neMisa Zimbabwe hazvina musoro. Zvichakadai, kambani yeZBC yaswera ichiita gadziriro dzekuti igotepfenyura zvinenge zvichiitika mudare mangwana pachanzwikwa nyaya yakakwidzwa kudare naVaChamisa yekuti zvakabuda musarudzo zvisendekwe parutivi sezvo vachiti sarudzo idzi dzakabirirwa zvemhando yepamusoro-soro naVaMnangagwa nebato ravo reZanu PF. Rimwe remagweta ari kumirira VaMnangagwa panyaya iyi, VaPaul Mangwana, vati vagadzirira zvizere kunzwikwa kwenyaya iyi vachiti vane tarisiro yekukunda panyaya iyi. VaJacob Mafume, vanove gweta riri kumirira mumwe wevakakwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, VaNoah Manyika, avo vari kutsigira chikumbiro chaVaChamisa chekuti zvakabuda musarudzo zvisendekwe parutivi, vaudzawo Studio7 kuti nyaya yavo iri pachena semhanza zvekuti dare harifanire kutora nguva richinzwa nyaya iyi. Zvichakadai, munyori muJudicial Services Commission, VaWalter Chikwanha, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti vatongi vedare reConstitutional Court vachanzwa nyaya iyi neChitatu vachaita basa ravo nemazvo vasina divi ravakarerekera. Magweta aVaChamisa neaVaMnangagwa achange achisvitsa nyaya dzavo zviri pamutemo, ukuwo vatongi vedare iri vachivabvunzurudza. Dare iri rinofanirwa kupa mutongo waro mukati memazuva gumi nemana kubva musi waziviswa nyika nezvesarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available

headline: VaMudzuri Vanoti VaTsvangirai Vachakunda Musarudzo yeMutungamiri weNyika
text: Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri we MDC-T, Engineer Elias Mudzuri, vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nemashoko avari kutambira ekuti murongi wemisangano muZanu PF, retired Brigadier General Engelbert Rugeje, vari kutyisidzira vanhu vachivayeuchidza nezvemhirizhonga yakaitika musarudzo dza 2008. VaMudzuri vanoti VaRugeje, semunhu akasiya chiuto, vanofanirwa kuchiita semunhuwo zvake, kwete kuramba vaine mweya wekutyisidzira vanhu munguva yegadziriro yesarudzo. VaRugeje vakaburitswa mubepanhau rekuMasvingo vachinzi vainge vataura mashoko ekutyisidzira vanhu pamusangano wavakaita kuMasvingo mazuva mashoma apfuura. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi raVa Rugeje pamashoko avari kunzi vakataura. Asi VaMudzuri vanoti vanhu vekuMasvingo vava kugara vachitya sezvo vachiziva mabasa aVaRugeje munyaya dzekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. VaMudzuri, ava vanobva kuZaka kuMasvingo, vanoti vanoyeuka zvakaitwa naVaRugeje kuZaka muna 2008, mushure mekunge vakurudzira vanhu veZanu PF pamwe nemauto kuti varwise musha wekwaMudzuri. Asi VaMudzuri vanoti zvisineyi nekutyisidzirwa kuri kuitwa vanhu, zvikuru kumaruwa, mutungamiri webato ravo, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vachakunda mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. “Gore ra 2018 nderedu. MDC inokunda musarudzo. VaMnangagwa vakakundwa naBlessing Chebundo, nokudaro sarudzo yemutungamiri ine zvakawanda zvinotariswa pamunhu. VaMnangagwa havamire pana VaTsvangirai,” vadaro VaMudzuri. No media source currently available

headline: VaTshinga Dube Vanotsanangura Zvakaitika "Bhambu" Risati Raputika
text: Vaimbove gurukota rinoona nezvevakamborwa hondo yerusununguko, VaTshinga Dube, vanoti bhambu rakaputika neMugovera panguva iyo ivo nemudzimai wavo vakange vachitaura nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantine Chiwenga. VaDube vanoti vakakuvara pabvi asi mudzimai wavo akambovhiringika amedza hutsi hwakabva mubhambu iri. “Zvinhu zvacho zvakaitika nekukurumidza zvokuti ndinenge ndichinyepa kuti chii chakaitika,” VaDube vakaudza Studio7. “Takange tigere apo pakauya General Chiwenga vachida kukwazisa mudzimai wangu. Panguva iyoyo ndipo pakatanga kudhuvuka ini ndikarara pasi asi mudzimai wangu akafema hutsi hwebhambu iri vakadonha nechekumusoro kwangu. Zvinhu zvacho zvakaitika nekukurumidza.” Vanhu vakawanda vanodarika makumi mana vakakuvara pachiitiko ichi, kusanganisira mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaKembo Mohadi, mudzimai wemumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Mary Chiwenga nevamwe. Kusvika pari zvino, vanhu vaviri vafa zvichitevera kuputika kwechombo neMugovera. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, havana kukuvara. Mutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, vanoti hurumende yaisa mari parutivi ichapihwa munhu ane mashoko achaita kuti vakapara mhosva ava vasungwe. No media source currently available

headline: Vadzidzisi VekuMaruwa Vanoti vaveKushungurudzwa neVasori VeCIO
text: Sangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, kana kuti ARTUZ, rinoti raudza magweta aro kuti vafambise nyaya yekutyisidzirwa kwavari kuitwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori veCIO. Mukuru weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti pane varume vatatu vanozivikanwa varikutyisidzira nhengo dze sangano ravo uye vachitaura pachena kuti vari kuzoparadza sangano iri. “Chekutanga vanoti kuendesa kwatakaita Zanu-PF kumatare edzimhosva kuti iregere kushandisa vana, maticha nezvinhu zvezvikoro." Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, "Chepiri vanochema nesu kuti makaendeserei ZEC kumatare edzimhosva uye, chechitatu, vanoti takaenderei kuConstitutional Court nenyaya yevadzidzisi,” VaMasaraure vakaudza Studio 7. Zvichakadaro, ARTUZ yaburitsawo gwaro ichiti inomira pamwe chete nevarairidzi veku Swaziland avo vari kunetsana nehurumende yavo pamusoro pemari yemuhoro. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vashoma Vanonyoresa Zvakare Muchikamu Chechipiri cheBVR
text: Chikamu chechipiri chechirongwa chekunyoresa chapera neMuvhuro, Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, ichiti vanhu vanyoresa kusvika musi weSvondo vangoti pfuureyi zvishoma mamirion maviri nemazana matatu ezviuru, pasingatarise vanyoresa neMuvhuro. Zvaburitswa neveZEC zvinoratidza kuti dunhu reBulawayo rine vanhu zviuru makumi masere nezvitatu, kana kuti zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana zvevanhu vanyoresa. Dunhu reMatabeleland South ranyoresa vanhu zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe nezvina, ukuwo dunhu reMatabeleland North riine zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvipfumbamwe. Dunhu reHarare rine vanhu vakawanda vanove zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nezvitatu, vanove zvikamu makumi maviri nezvinomwe kubva muzana. Dunhu reManicaland ndiro riri panzvimbo yechipiri pahuwandu hwevanhu vanyoresa kuvhota. Dunhu iri rine vanhu zviuru mazana matatu, zvinove zvikamu makumi matatu nezvitatu kubva muzana. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kune veZEC kuti vatipe huwandu hwose kusvika papera chirongwa ichi. Asi sachigaro reZimbabwe Election Support Network, ZESN, VaAndrew Makoni, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo zvinhu zviri kufamba zvakanaka munzvimbo dzakawanda munyika, sangano ravo riri kushushikana nenyaya yekuti vanhu vanyoresa vachiri vashoma. VaMakoni vati vanoshushikana nenyaya yekuti vaongorori vavo pamwe nevamwe vanhu kunyanya kumaruwa, vari kutyisidzirwa nemadzishe kana masabhuku, izvo zvatsinhirwa naAmai Rindai Chipfunde-Vava vanove mukuru weZESN. Kushaya magwaro ekuzvarwa pamwe nekuunza magwaro asiri iwo anodiwa ndizvo zvimwe zvezvikonzero zviri kunzi neveZEC zviri kutadzisa vanhu vakawanda kunyoresa. VaTafadzwa Mujeri, avo vari muchirongwa chevechidiki vebato reMDC T chekukurudzira vanhu kuti vanyorese kuvhota chinoziikanwa kunzi “Bereka Mwana Tiende” vaudza Studio 7 kuti ongororo yavo inoratidza kuti kushaikwa kwemagwaro ekuzvarwa ndiro remamwe matambudziko makuru akatarisana nevanhu munzvimbo yeBulilima mudunhu reMatabeleland South. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuhofisi yeRegistrar General panyaya iyi. Murongi wemabasa musangano reAbammeli Human Rights Lawyers’ Network, VaTineyi Mukwewa, vanoti sangano ravo rine chirongwa chekubatsira vanhu kuti vawane magwaro ekuzvarwa. Chikamu chechitatu chechirongwa chekunyoresa vanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota chinotanga musi weChina, Mbudzi 16 chichipera musi waZvita 1. Chikamu chechina chinove chekupedzisira, chinotanga musi waZvita 4 chopera musi was Zvita 19. No media source currently available

headline: Musatore Mativi, Mutongi Anoudza ZBC neZimpapers
text: Bato guru rinopikisa reMovement for Democractic Change ratambira mutongo wedare, reHigh Court, wekuti makambani enhau ehurumende, eZimpapers neZimbabwe Broadcasting Corporation, akatyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika nekuita basa rawo akarerekera kuZanu PF. Vachitaura pamusoro pemutongo wakapihwanaJustice Joseph Mafusire mudare High Court kuMasvingo nemusi weChitatu panyaya yakwakwidza kudare iri ne Fitinne Trust nevamwe vaviri, mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC, VaLuke Tamborinyoka, vati mutongo uyu unotsinhira zvavagara vachitaura pamusoro peZBC neZimpapers. Asi vati chakakosha pari zvino kuona kuti mitemo yezvekutapwa kwenhau yavandudzwa kuitira kuti makambani akaita seZBC neZimpapers ashande achitevedza bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Gweta musangano reMedia Insitute of Southern Africa- Zimbabwe, VaKuda Hove, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kufara chose nemutongo uyu nekuti ndozvavagara vachitaura nekurwira kuti ZBC ishande isina divi rayakarerekera. VaHove vati mutongo uyu wasimbisa shoko ravo uye vachaushandisa mubasa ravo rekukurudzira kuvandudzwa kwemitemo yezvekutapwa kwenhau kuti ienderane nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Asi vati pachine mutoro kuti pave neshanduko pamashandiro emakambani Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumutauririri weZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi vanoongorora nyaya dzematongerwo enyika, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chiramhanzu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti sarudzo hadzihwinwe nekutibato rapihwa mukana wekutaura pachivhititi. Vatiwo bato ravo haritevedze mitongo yematare edzimhosva kuti rikunde musarudzo, asi kuti rinotsvaga rutsigiro kune veruzhinji. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, VaBekezela Gumbo, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo mutongo uyu wakanaka chose hauna zvauchabatsire nekuti sarudzo dzakatopera uye hauna zvauchasandura. Vati mitongo yaakaita seuyu inofanira kuitwa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa kuti ive nechekuita nesarudzo dzinenge dzichiitwa munyika VaGumbo vatiwo veruzhinji havafaniri kufara zvakanyanya vachiti hurumende inozikanwa zvikuru nenyaya dzekusatevedza mitongo yematare edzimhosva. Kunyange hazvo vasina kutaura zvakanyanya kuZBC neZimpapers, mumutongo wavo Justice Mafusire vakati makambani ya anofanira kutevedza zvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo. Masango mazhinji emuno neekunze akaongorora sarudzo akaburitsawo kuti ZBC neZimpapers dzaita basa dzakarekerera kurimwe bato izvo zvakakanganisa mafambiro nezvakabuda musarudzo. Gurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vakatoudza paramende kuti hurumende ichagadzirisa zvimwe zvakataurwa nemasangano aya kuti sarudzo dzinouya dzisaite mutauro. No media source currently available

headline: America Yogadzirira Kutumira Vaongorori veSarudzo
text: Muzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe unoti gadziriro dzeAmerica dzekuzongorora sarudzo dzemuZimbabwe dzave pachidanho chepamusorosoro. America inoti chikwata chayo chekutanga chatove muZimbabwe chakamirira chikwata chihombe chevaongorori vesarudzo vachazenge vari muZimbabwe vachiongorora sarudzo. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wavaita nemutauriri weNational Assembly, Advocate Jacob Mudenda muHarare, mumwe mushandi mukuru pamuzinda uyu, Amai Jennifer Savage, vati vanofara nezviri kuitwa mukuvandudza mutemo wesarudzo. Asi Amai Savage varamba kutaura pamusoro pekuti vemapato havasi kufara nebhiri rekuvandudza mitemo yesarudzo vachiti vachazopa pfungwa dzavo kana richinge rapasa muparamende. Bhiri iri, iro rakapasa muNational Assembly svondo rapfuura, ratanga neChipiri kuzeiwa mudare reseneti. Amai Savage vati vari kunzwa zvakawanda pamusoro pesarudzo dzegore rino uye tariro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende ichaita zvese zvairi kuvimbisa kuti sarudzo dzinge dzakachena. Amai Savage vati musangano wavo naVaMudenda wange wakanangana nekuvandudza kudyidzana kweZimbabwe neAmerica. Vati America icharamba ichibatsira Zimbabwe mune zvakasiyana siyana uye pari zvino ichangobva mukupa rubatsiro rwemamiriyoni zana nemakumi mashanu emadhora pasi pechirongwa chemutungamiriri wenyika iyi chekurwisana neHIV/AIDS, chePresident’s Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief kana kuti PEPFAR. Zimbabwe iri kuita sarudzo gore rino kekutanga vaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vabva pachigaro uye mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnanangagwa vari kuvimbisa sarudzo dzakajeka. VaMnangagwa vanotiwo vese vanoda kuongorora sarudzo idzi vakasununguka kuita izvi uye hurumende yavo yakatokoka nyika makumi mana neshanu nemasangano gumi nemashanu pasi rese kuti vazoongorore sarudzo idzi. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rinotara Zuva Rekunzwa Kupikisana kwaVaNduna naVaKonjana kuChegutu West
text: Dare rinotonga nyaya dzine chekuita nesarudzo, reElectoral Court, neMuvhuro rakatara musi wa 24 Gunyana sezuva rarichanzwa nyaya yakakwidzwa kudare iri naVaGift Konjana veMDC Alliance, avo vakakwikwidza musarudzo yemumiriri weChegutu West muparamende. VaKonjana vari kupikisa zvakaziviswa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, zvekuti VaDexter Nduna veZanu PF ndivo vakakunda musarudzo iyi. Dare iri ranga rakatarisirwa kupa mutongo waro panyaya iyi neMuvhuro, asi gweta riri kumirira VaKonjana, VaMoses Nkomo veZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, vanoti dare rakazoendesa nyaya iyi mberi mushure mekunge magweta aVaNduna asvitsa mudare humwe humbowo hwavanga vasina kunge vavasuma paine nguva. Vanoti magweta aya akasvitsa mudare mamwe maV11 nema V 23 (a) neV23 (b) avanga vasina izvo zvakaita kuti vakumbire dare nguva yekuti vaverengi magwaro aya. Vanoti pavazodzoka kudare vazowirirana vose kuti dare rishevedze vashandi veZEC kuti vatsanangure nezvavakazivisa mumagwaro ari pamberi pedare, uye kuti vatsanangure kuti vakawana sei mafigiri ari mumagwaro aya. ZEC yakanga yazivisa kuti VaNduna ndivo vakakunda mushure mekuwana mavhoti anoita zviuru gumi zvine mazana mapfumbamwe ane makumi matatu nemaviri, VaKonjana vachiwana mavhoti zviuru gumi zvine mazana masere ane makumi maviri nemasere. Asi VaKonjana vari kuti ZEC yakakanganisa mafigiri aya, ichideredza huwandu hwavakawana. ZEC inonzi yakatenda kuti yakakanganisa, izvo zvakazoita kuti izivise VaKonjana kuti vaende kudare. VaNkomo vanoti kunyange hazvo ZEC yakaona kukanganisa kwayo, mutemo wesarudzo haubvumidzi kuti izvigadzirise yoga, vachiti izvi zvinokwaniswa kuitwa nedare chete. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gweta raVaNduna, VaTawanda Zhuwarara. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende, Vanopikisa neVakazvimirira Vokurudzirwa Kugara pasi Kuti Vazeye Matambudziko Ari muNyika
text: Panguva iyo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo dza 2023, zvinhu zvinonzi zviri kuramba zvichiita manyama amire nerongo munyika munyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu hurumende pamwe nemapurisa vachipomerwa mhosva yekusatevedzera bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Zvimwe zvinonzi zviri kunetsa munyika pari zvino kuparara kwehupfumi hwenyika izvo zvinonzi zviri kuwedzera matambudziko ari munyika. Munyaya dzemihoro inonzi haina zvaichatenga, vashandi vehurumende vakazivisa svondo rino kuti nhaurirano dzavaiita nehurumende pamusoro pemihoro dzakaparara dzisina chabuda vashandi vachipomera hurumende mhosva yekusavimbika uye kuita zanu ndega pakuwedzera vashandi mari. Ukuwo, mubatanidzwa wemasangano akazvimirira weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition pamwe nemamwe masangano evashandi vehurumende vakanga varongawo kuti vanhu vapinde mumigwagwa neChishanu kuti varatidzire, asi mapurisa anonzi akanyima sangano iri mvumo. Vashandi vehurumende vakavimbisa zvakare kuramwa mabasa kutanga neMuvhuro unouya kana nyaya yemihoro yavo isina kugadziriswa. Asi mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pamwe nebato ravo reZanu PF, vagara vanopomera mizinda yenyika dzekunze iri munyika mhosva yekupindira munyaya dzeZimbabwe nekukonzera matambudziko ose anonzi ari kusangana nenyika vachiti mizinda iyi iri kuda kusvibisa hurumende yavo pamberi pesarudzo dza 2023. Nhengo yeZanu PF, Doctor Simba Mavaza, avo vari kuBritain, vanotsinhira mashoko eabto ravo pamwe neVaMnangagwa ekuti vari kuda kuratidzira vari kushandiswa nenyika dzekumawirira kuti vabvise hurumende yakasarudzwa zviri pamutemo. Asi vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vachitungamira sangano reHeal Zimbabwe Trust, VaRashid Mahiya, vanoti hapana munhu ari kutmwa nevekunze kuratidzira, vachiti vana veZimbabwe vari kutumwa nematumbu avo ane nzara. VaMahiya vanoti kuti dambudziko iri ripedzwe, vanhu vose vanofanirwa kugara pasi votaurirana, danho riri kutsigirwawo naDoctor Mavaza, vachiti rakanaka asi vachikomekedza vemapato anopikisa pamwe nevemasangano akazvimirira kuti vatungamidze nyika yavo mberi mune zvose. No media source currently available

headline: Tajamuka Inoti VaMkhwananzi Vambomira Kutaurira Sangano Iri
text: No media source currently available Chikwata cheTajamuka chinoti chatambira chikumbiro chemutauriri wacho, VaPromise Mkwananzi,chekuti vambosuduruka apo nyaya dzehuwori nekusashandisa mari zvine mwero dzavari kupomerwa dziri kuongororwa. Komiti inoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muTajamuka yaita musangano muHarare neMuvhuro apo yaumba komiti ichaongorora nyaya dziri kupomerwa VaMkwananzi. VaGift Ostallos Siziba ndivo vacbata chinzvimbo chemutauriri wechikwata ichi. VaSiziba vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya dzaVaMkwananzi dzakatanga kubuda pamadandemutande mazuva apfuura uye komiti yadomwa iyi ichaunganidza humbowo isati yapa pfungwa dzayo kuti zvingaitwe. Zvichitevera zvainyorwa nekutaurwa pamadandemutande nedzimwe nyaya dzavaipomerwa, VaMkwananzi vakazivisa nezuro manheru kuti vainge vave kumbosuduruka kuti vagadzirise nyaya iyi. Pane zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoti zvaibatsira Tajamuka nemari zvave kupomera VaMkwananzi mhosva yehuwori pamwe nekusashandisa mari zvine mwero. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMkwananzi kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo vange vasiri kudaira mbozhanhare yavo. Asi vachinyora padandemutande, VaMkhwananzi vakati vari kumbomira kuita mutauriri wesangano iri zvichitevera kupomerwa kwavari kuitwa nyaya nemunhu wavati anonzi Fadziso Doyce nee Jena, kuitira kuti zita ravo risikanganise mafambiro ezvinhu muTajamuka. Munyori mukuru weMDC – T Youth Assembly mudunhu reHarare, VaDenford Ngadziore, vaudza Studio 7 kuti senhengo dzeTajamuka/Sesijikile, zvaitikika izvi hazvifaniri kudzorera basa rechikwata ichi kumashure. Vati chikwata ichi chine nhengo dzakawanda uye dzinofanira kuenderera mberi nebasa. Munyori mukuru musangano revadzidzi vemuzvikoro zvepamusoro, reZimbabwe National Students Unions, VaMakomborero Haruzivishe, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvaitika muTajamuka/Sesijikile zvakakosha uye zvinoratidza kuti kana paita nyaya, dzinofanira kuongororwa, zvisinei kuti ndiani anenge aidziita. Vati ZINASU yakapinda muTajamuka/Sesijikile nekuti vanotsigira zvinorwirwa nesangano iri. Chikwata cheTajamuka/Sesijikile icho chinove mubatanidzwa wemasangano evechidiki anorwira kodzero dzevanhu pamwe nevechidiki kubva kumapato anopikisa chakaumbwa gore rapfuura. Chikwata ichi chinorwira kuti munyika muve nehutongi hwejekerere pamwe nekuti vanhu vagare zvakanaka.

headline: Mutungamiri weEquatorial Guinea, VaNguema, Votarisirwa Kusangana naVaMugabe
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeEquatorial Guinea VaTheodoro Obiang Nguema Mbasogo vakasangana nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pavakazeya nyaya dzekusimbaradza kudyidyana pakati peZimbabwe nehurumende yekuMalabo. Vachitaura nevatori venhau paState House nezuro manheru mushure memusangano wavakaita nemutungamiri weEquatorial Guinea, VaTheodoro Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakati hapana zvitsva zvavakazeya naVaMbasogo munhaurirano dzavakaita kunze kwekungosimbaradza hukama hwagara huripo pakati peZimbabwe neEquatorial Guinea vasati vatora matomhu kubva kune vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. VaMbasogo vakaudzawo vatori venhau kuti kudyidzana pakati peZimbabwe nehurumende yavo kucharamba kuchienderera mberi zvisinei nekuti Zimbabwe yave nemutungamiri mutsva. VaMbasogo, avo vaitaura vachiturikirwa, vakati hurumende yavo iri kutsigira zvirongwa zviri kuitwa naVaMnangagwa zvakanangana nebudiriro yenyika. Vachiturikirwa, VaNguema vakati parwendo rwuno vakanga vasina zvitsva zvavakauya kuzotaura asi kungosimbaradza kudyidzana kwagara kwagara kuripo kuitira kuti vasimudzire nyika dzavo dzose dziri mbiri. Zvichakadai, VaMbasogo vakatarisirwa kuita musangano naVaMugabe, avo vavaidyidzana navo zvikuru vasati vatorerwa masimba ehutongi naVaMnangagwa zvakakonzera kuti pasave nekuwirana pakati paVaMugabe naVaMnangagwa. Musangano uyu wakatarisirwa kuitirwa kumba kwaVaMugabe kuBlue Roof kuBorrowdale mangwanani ano. Zvichakadai, vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika mukushanya kwemutungamiri weEquatorial Guinea vanoti VaMbasogo vatumwa nemashoko kuna VaMugabe abva kuna VaMnangagwa ane chekuita nekuti VaMugabe naVaMnangagwa vayanane pakubvutirana kwavakaita masimba. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaMalvern Mkudu, avo vanoshanda vakazvimirira, vanoti havaone VaMbasogo vachikwanisa kuita mutongi gava pakati pevaviri ava. VaMugabe naVaMbasogo vane hushamwari hunobvira kure uye VaMbasogo vakambobatsirwa naVaMugabe masoja emuno paakabata ndege yaiva nevanhu vainge vakatakura zvombo zvekunopidigurisa hurumende yaVaNguema kuMalabo. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo neimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda nesangano reRevolutionary Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaTjenesani Ntungagwa. Vapedza kusangana naVaMugabe, VaMbasogo vakatarisirwa kusangana zvakare naVaMnangagwa vasati vaoneka kudzokera kunyika kwavo nhasi wakare. Kupinda munyika kwakaita VaMbasogo nezuro kwakananganawo nekusvitsa chidimbu chepakati chegore kubva pakagadzwa VaMnangagwa semutungamiri wenyika munaMbudzi gore rapera. No media source currently available

headline: VaChiwenga Vovimbisa Kusimudzira Nzvimbo yeArcadia Vachiti Yakasarira Zvikuru
text: Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vanoti hurumende iri kuronga zvekudzosa dhora remuZimbabwe senzira yekuedza kupedza dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari munyika. Vachitaura nevatsigiri veZanu PF pamusangano waitirwa paArcadia Community Hall muno muHarare, VaChiwenga vati hurumende ine hurongwa hwekudzosa dhora remuZimbabwe senzira yekuedza kupedza dambudziko rekushayikwa kwemari. VaChiwenga vakurudzirawo vezvitoro kuti vabvume kutambira mhando dzemari yakaita seEcocash pamwe nekuti vashandise makadhi ekumabhanga. VaChiwenga vati kudzoswa kwedhora remuZimbabwe kuchaitwa zvichienderana nekusimuka kunenge kuchiita hupfumi hwenyika vakati zvinhu zvese zvinofanira kunge zvanakira veruzhinji muna 2025. Mumwe mutsigiri weZanu PF anga pamusangano uyu, Muzvare Susan Mapisa, vati pfungwa dzaVaChiwenga dzakanaka zvikuru sezvo mari yave kungowanikwa pamukoto. Asi mumwe mutsigiri weMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, Muzvare Rebecca Masukume, vanogara muArcadia makare umo maitirwa musangano uyu, vati zvataurwa naVaChiwenga izvi hazvina musoro. VaChiwenga vavimbisa kuti hurumende ichaita kuti vanhu vose vanogara muArcadia vatariswe zvakafanana nevamwe veganda dema vachiti makaradhi mazhinji ari kuonekwa sema alien vakati vachaita kuti vapihwe zvitupa zvisina kunzi alien. Vatiwo nharaunda yeArcadia inofanira kusimudzirwa munyaya dzemigwagwa, nzvimbo dzekutandarira pamwe nekuita kuti zvikoro zvepamusoro kana kuti secondary zviwande munzvimbo iyi sezvo mune zviviri chete. Mumwe mugari wemuArcadia, Amai Anne Downward, vati hupenyu hwakavaomera zvekuti vari kuswera vachipemha. Asi VaChiwenga vati kana veruzhinji vakavhotera Zanu PF musarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru, zvinhu zvichavanakira. No media source currently available

headline: VaRamaphosa Vokwikwidzana naAmai Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma Musarudzo yeMutungamiri weANC
text: Vanhu vakawanda vakateya nzeve dzavo kuSouth Africa kuti vanzwe zvichabuda musarudzo yehutungamiri hutsva hwebato reANC. Mutungamiri we ANC, VaJacob Zuma, havasi kukwikwidza sezvo bumbiro remitemo yebato risingavabvumidze kutungamira bato iri kwematemu anodarika maviri. Vari kukwikwidza chigaro chemutungamiri webato re ANC, ndiVaCyril Ramaphosa, vanova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika pari zvino, pamwe nevaimbove gurukota rezvekunze kwe South Africa, Amai Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma, avo vaimbove mudzimai wemutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaJacob Zuma. VaRamaphosa vakadomwa nemabhuranji chiuru chine mazana mana nemakumi matanhatu nemapfumbamwe, ukuwo Amai Dlamini-Zuma vakadomwawo nemabhuranji chiuru nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemana. Vanhu vari kuvhota musarudzo iyi vanosvika zviuru zvina nemazana manomwe. Vari kukwikwidza pachigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato ndiVaDavid Mabuza, naMuzvare Lindiwe Sisulu. Vari kukwikwidza chigaro chasachigaro ndiVa Gwede Mantashe na Nathi Mthethwa, ukuwo VaSenzo Mchunu naVa Ace Magashule ndivo vari kukwikwidza chigaro chemunyori mukuru webato. Vari kuda chigaro chemubati wehomwe ndiVa Paul Mashatile, pamwe na Maite Nkoana Mashabane Hutungamiri hutsva hwe ANC huri kutarisirwa kuziviswa neMuvhuro. Bato reANC ndiro chete ratonga South Africa kubva nyika iyi yawana kuzvitonga muna 1994, apo muchakabvu VaNelson Mandela, vakavhoterwa semutungamiri wenyika muna 1994. Nyanzvi mune zvamatongerwo enyika, uye vari mukuru we Human Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, Va Dehwa Mavhinga, vanoti pari zvino vanhu vese vakamirira kunzwa zvichabuda mukuverengwa kwemavhoti. No media source currently available

headline: Komisheni yaVaMothlante Yobvunzurudza Mapurisa neMauto nezveKuurayiwa kweVanhu
text: Komisheni iri kuongorora kupfurwa kwakaitwa vanhu muHarare musi wa 1 Nyamavhuvhu inoti kutanga neMuchuro kusvika Chipiri ichange yotanga kubvunzurudza mapurisa nemauto nezvekupfurwa kwakaitwa vanhu vatanhatu nemauto. Vamwe vevanhu ava vairatidzira kunonoka kubuda kwezvainge zvabuda musarudzo vamwe vachingozvifambira havo. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa ndivo vakadoma komiti iyi uye sachigaro wayo ndiVaKgalema Mothlante vaive mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa. Mumwe komishina Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku vanoti vakaona zvakakodzera vachabvunzawo vatungamiri venyika nezvenyaya iyi.  No media source currently available

headline: Mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance Unoita Musangano Wekutanga muHarare
text: Mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa weMDC Alliance, waita musangano wawo wekutanga mumusha weEpworth muHarare, uyo unonzi wapindwa nemazana evatsigiri vemapato ari mumubatanidzwa uyu. Mumwe wevatungamiri vemapato ari mumubatanidzwa, VaJacob Ngarivhume vanoti vatora mukana uyu kutsanangurira vatsigiri vavo vapinda mumusangano uyu pamusoro pehurongwa hwemubatanidzwa wakatarisana nesarudzo dzegore rino. Vangarivhume vanoti nyaya huru yavaudza vatsigiri vavo ndeyekuvandudzwa kunofanirwa kuitwa mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo idzo sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. VaNgarivhume vanoti zvavanyunyuta nazvo nedezvekusachinja maitiro kweZanu PF muzvinhu zvakaita sekuwaniswa kwemapato ose mikana yakaenzana panhepfenyuro dzehurumende. “Saka tati isusu zvimwe zvezvinhu zvatichagara tichipusha, kana kuti tichirwa kuti tiite hondo yekuti zvinhu izvozvo zvirongeke, zvigadzirisike,” vanodaro VaNgarivhume. Musangano uyu unonzi wapindwa nevatungamiri vemapato ari muMDC Alliance ose kunze kwemutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, avo vanonzi vanga vakamirirwa nevatevedzeri vavo VaElias Mudzuri naVaNelson Chamisa. Mutungamiri werimwe bato reMDC, VaWelshman Ncube vanonzi havanawo kukwanisa kunge vari pamusangano uyu, asi vachinzi vanga vakamirirwawo nemutevedzeri wavo, VaEdwin Mushoriwa. VaTsvangirai ndivo vachamirira mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, Vove Pakati peVatungamiri veDzimwe Nyika Vari KuBritain paKuvigwa kwaMambokadzi Elizabeth Vepiri
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden nemudzimai wavo Amai Jill Biden vari muLondon kurufu rwaMambokadzi Elizabeth Vepiri, avo vari kutarisirwa kuradzikwa nhasi kuKing George VI Memorial Chapel. VaBiden, avo vakasvika kuBritain neMugovera, nezuro vanyorawo mashoko avo enyaradzo mubhuku rekuchema Mambokadzi. VaBiden ndemumwe wevatungamiri venyika dzakawanda vachange vari parufu rwaMambokadzi Elizabeth Vepiri pamwe nemadzimabo anobvawo kunyika dzakasiyanasiyana. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vari kumirirwa kurufu urwu negurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaFrederick Shava, sezvo ivo VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kunge vachienda kuNew York svondo rino kumusangano weUnited Nations Genreal Assembly, UNGA. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muBritain, Doctor Simba Mavaza, vanoti kuvepo kwaVaBiden kurufu rwaMambokadzi Elizabeth Vepiri pamwe nekuradzikwa kwavo zvinoratidza kukosha kwehukama hwaivepo pakati paMambokadzi neAmerica, uye kudyidza kweBritain neAmerica. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Vanoti Vachaongorora Mhirizhonga Yakaitika Paivigwa VaMahlangu
text: Mutungamiri webato reMovement for Democratic Change, MDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanoti bato ravo richaongorora nyaya yekuti pane vamwe vechidiki vebato ravo vakanganisa kuvigwa kwemumiriri weNkulumane muparamende, VaThamsanqa Mahlangu, neMugovera. Vachitaura kekutanga nezvenyaya iyi, VaTsvangirai vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane mashoko ekuti vamwe vakuru vemusangano vakatengera vechidiki doro kuti varwisane. Asi VaTsvangirai vati chikuru chakaita kuti vasaenda kumarinda eLady Stanley kunoviga mufi inyaya yekuti paive nekunetsana kwakanyanya mumhuri. Kunetsana uku kwakapa kuti VaMhlangu vachemerwe kudzimba nhatu. Pakuvigwa kwavo dzimwe hama dzainge dzisipo. Kunze kwekunetsana kwemhuri, painge paine kukandirana makobvu nematete pakati pevechidiki veMDC vanobva kuNkulumane nekuLuveve. Kuratidza kuti zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire merongo mubato iri, mutauriri webato, VaObert Gutu, vakaburitsa mashoko ekuti chikuru change chapa kuti VaTsvangirai nevamwe vakutu vebato vasaende kumarinda inyaya yekunetsana kwemhuri. Asi sachigaro webato, VaLovemore Moyo, vakaburitsawo mashoko vachipikisana naVaGutu vachiti kusawirirana mubato kwainge kwapawo kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire nerongo. No media source currently available

headline: Vechidiki veMDC Vanga Vari muHusungwa Vanopiwa Mukana weKubvisa Mari yeChibatiso
text: Vechidiki vaviri veMDC, vanoti VaMakomborero Haruzivishe naVaAllan Moyo, avo vanga vari muhusungwa kubva svondo rapera pavakasungwa vachinzi vakapinda mukuratidzira kusina mvumo, vapiwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kuitira kutongwa vachibva kudzimba dzavo. Vaviri ava vakatanga kupinda mudare neMugovera asi vakanzi vadzoke zvakare mudare neMuvhuro mushure mekunge vachuchisi vapikisa kuti vasapiwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso vachiti vanogona kupara zvakare mhaka dzavari kupomerwa kana kukundikana kuzodzoka kudare. Gweta ravo, VaObey Shava veZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, vanoti vaviri ava vabhadhariswa mari inoita chiuru chemadhora emari yemunyika pamunhu, uye vanzi vasavhiringidza vafakazi, vagare pakero dzavapa kudare, pamwe nekuzviratidza kumapurisa kaviri pasvondo. VaShava vanoti VaHaruzivishe naVaMoyo, avo vari kuramba mhosva iyi, vanzi vagodzoka kudare musi wa 09 Kurume, unove mwedzi unoya. VaHaruzivishe naVaMoyo vakasungwa pamwechete nevamwe vechidiki makumi matatu nevana vachipomerwa mhosva yekupinda mukuratidzira kwakarongwa nevechidiki veMDC neChitatu chapfuura, asi vamwe makumi makumi maviri nevaviri vakazoregwa vachienda vasina mhosva dzavakapomerwa. VaShava vanoti semagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, vari kushushikana zvikuru nehuwandu hwevanhu vari kusungwa zvisina shumo, vavanoti vari kutyorerwa kodzero dzavo nehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Voshuvira Zimbabwe Zuva Rakanaka Ichicherechedza Kusvitsa Makore Makumi Mana Ichizvitonga
text: Mutungamiri weMDC, Va Nelson Chamisa, vatumira mashoko avo kuruzhinji rwevanhu vemuZimbabwe vachivakorokotedza pakusvika kwaita Zimbabwe makore makumi mana yawana kuzvitonga. VaChamisa vati vari kuziva kushupika kuri kuita veruzhinji munyika panguva iyo nyika yakatarisana nedambudziko rechirwere Coronavirus, uye vachimanikidzwa kugara mudzimba senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi, icho chabata vanhu makumi maviri nevana muZimbabwe, uye kuuraya vanhu vatatu. Chirwere ichi chabata vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nemazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe ezviuru, uye kuuraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi mashanu nezvinomwe. VaChamisa vati zvakakosha kuti nyika itarise kwayakabva, uye zvakaitika mumakore makumi mana apfuura, senzira yekuvaka hwaro hweremangwana renyika. Vati mumakore apfuura aya, pane zvakawanda zvakaitwa munyaya dzekugadzirisa zvaikanganiswa. Asi vati zvinhu zvinosuwisa kuti nyika yakaona kupondwa kwevanhu vanodarika makumi maviri ezviuru kumatunhu e Matabeleland ne Midlands, munguva yeGukurahundi. VaChamisa vatiwo vanhu vakawanda vakatyorerwa kodzero dzavo munguva yeMurambatsvina, uye musarudzo dzakaitwa muna 2008, idzo dzakaona ropa revanhu vakawanda richideurwa. VaChamisa varatidzawo kushushikana nehuori hwavati huri kuitika munyika, uhwo vati huri kuparadza hupfumi hwenyika. VaChamisa vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti muZimbabwe muve nepfungwa yakanangana nekusimudzira hupenyu hwemunhu wese, muve nesarudzo dzinoitwa zvisina kupikisana mukati. VaChamisa vatora mukana uyu kuenzanisa kukosha kwemakore makumi mana nezviri mubhaibheri zvinobata makore mana akaitika akaratidza kusimuka kwevana veIsrael mushure mekushupika kwemakore akawanda vari kunze kwenzvimbo yavo yechipikirwa kwemakore makumi mana. Bhaibheri rinoratidza kuti chinangwa chaMwari chaive chekuti vana veIsrael vatore nyika yavo yavakanga vavimbiswa mukati memazuva, asi izvi zvinonzi zvakazotora makore makumi mana kuti zviitike. Mutungamiri veMDC vatiwo zvisineyi nematambudziko akatarisina neveruzhinji panguva ino, vanoshuvira zororo rakanaka renyika vanhu vachicherechedza kusvika kwavaita makore makumi mana nyika yawana kuzvitonga muna 1980. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Vanoti Kutadza Kutungamira Kwapa Kuti Africa Isarire Shure
text: Mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC Alliance VaNelson Chamisa vanoti nyaya yekutadza kutungamirwa kwenyika yapa kuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzitadze kuzadzikisa tarisiro yemagamba akaita savanamuchakabvu, Kwame Nkrumah, Julius Nyerere nevamwe vakatungamira mukurwisa hutongi hwevasveta simba. VaChamisa vataura mashoko ayo kuStudio 7 pazuva rekupemberera kuumbwa kwesangano remubatanidzwa wenyika dzemuAfrica weOrganization of African Unity rave kuzivikanwa nekuti African Union. Vati kuti Africa ikwanise kubudirira, inofanira kuve nehutongo hwejekerere ichiremekedza kodzero dzevanhu kwete kuti mauto apote achitungamira nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. VaChamisa vatiwo zvakakosha kuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzigare pasi dzione kuti dzingagadzirise sei matambudziko aunza hurombo mudunhu rine zviwanikwa nezvimwe zvinokwanisa kusimudzira magariro evanhu kana vachitaura nezwi rimwe chete. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanodzinga Gurukota reMhando dzeMoto, VaFortune Chasi, Vachiti Vatadza Kuita Basa Ravo
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vadzinga basa vanga vari gurukota rinoona nezvemando dzemoto, VaFortune Chasi, vachiti havasi kuita basa ravo sezvavanga vachitarisira. Mumagwaro abudiswa nemunyori mukuru mudare remakurukota, Doctor Misheck Sibanda, VaMnangagwa vati vamisa VaChasi basa nekuti vange vasisiri kubata basa ravo sezvinotarisirwa nehurumende. VaMnangagwa vadoma mumiriri weMuzarabani North mudare reparamende, VaSoda Zhemu, segurukota idzva rezvemhando dzemoto. Kudzingwa basa kwaVaChasi kunoteverawo kumbomiswa basa kwakaitwa sachigaro webhodhi reZESA, VaSydney Gata, pamwe nenhengo dzese dzebhodhi reZesa vachipomerwa nyaya dzehuori. Pavakabvisa bhodhi reZesa, VaMnangagwa vakati komishini inoona nezvehuori iongorore nyaya dzehuori mukambani yeZesa. Panga paine kutatsurana pakati paVaGata naVaChasi. VaChasi vakambenge vambomisa VaGata basa avo vakaramba kutambira izvi vachiti mutungamiriri wenyika akavadoma pabasa iri, ndivo voga vaigona kuvamisa basa. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vati vakatyamadzwa nekumiswa basa kwaVaChasi vachiti vange vachivaona semunhu anga ari kugona basa. Vatiwo vanoona sekuti VaChasi vagurisirwa panzira basa rekuedza kugadzirisa huori kukambani yeZESA. Mumwe mutori wenhau webepa repadandemutande reZimbabwe Morning Post, Elias Mambo, uyo akanyora nyaya dzakawanda dzehuori kukambani yeZESA, atiwo anoona sekuti hurumende yarasikirwa nekumisa VaChasi basa. Mambo ati kunetsana kwaVaChasi naVaGata munyaya yekuedza kupedza huori kunogona kuve kwakonzera kumiswa kwavo basa. Vamwewo pamadandemutande akasiyana siyana vatiwo havanzwisisi kuti sei VaChasi vamiswa basa vachiti zvinhu zvange zvave nani munyaya dzekuwanikwa kwemagetsi kwemagetsi munyika. Asi mumwe muongorori wezvematongerwo enyika, VaJoy Mabhenge, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo zvisina kujeka mumagwaro ehurumende kuti sei VaChasi vamiswa basa, vati kana zviine chekuita nekurwisa huori hapana chakaipa. VaMnangagwa vadomawo Dr Anxious Jongwe Masuka kuti vave gurukota rezvekurima mushure mekufa neCOVID-19 kwaVaPerrence Shiri mwedzi wapera. VaMasuka vange vari mukuru we Zimbabwe Agricultural Society, uye vanzi vane hunyanzvi munyaya dzekurima zvichitevera kushanda kwavakaita muzvinzvimbo zvakasiyana siyana zvinosanganisira kurimwa kwefodya. VaChasi vava gurukota rechitatu kudzingwa basa naVaMnangagwa zvichitevera kudzingwa basa kwaVaObadiah Moyo mwedzi wapera vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuori, uye Amai Prisca Mupfumira gore rapera. No media source currently available

headline: Build Zimbabwe Alliance Inoti Haisi Kuzobatana neMamwe Mapato Musarudzo
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reBuild Zimbabwe Alliance, BZA, Doctor Noah Manyika, vanoti bato ravo harina kubatana nemamwe mapato anopikisa kana kupinda mumibatanidzwa iripo nekuti hazvisi kuoneka kuti mapato aya akamirirei uye kuti gwara nezvinangwa zvavo ndezvipi. VaManyika vanoti bato ravo ndiro rega rine gwara uye ndiro rakatanga kubudisa gwaro regwara nevimbiso yaro kuvanhu izvo zvavanoti zvave kutevedzerwa nemamwe mapato. VaManyika vanoti chinangwa chebato ravo ndechekukwikwidza munzvimbo dzese dzeparamende, seneti nekanzuru. “Mukatarisa ‘manifesto’ yedu, muchaona kuti zvakasiyana nezvinoda kuitwa nemamwe mapato. Tinotaura isu kuti tichabvisa mamwe mapazi ehurumende aripo akawanda wanda asina basa raarikuita, akangosikirwa chete kuti shamwari dzevanhu varikutungamira vawane mabasa; tinoabvisa iwayo, toita mapazi ehurumende gumi nemashanu chete,” VaManyika vaudza Studio7. Kunyange hazvo VaManyika vasiri kuda kupinda musarudzo vakabatana nemamwe mapato, nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzinoti mapato anopikisa anofanirwa kubatana kuitira kuti akunde Zanu PF zvine mutsindo. No media source currently available

headline: VaBiti, Vakuru veZCTU Vomiswa Pamberi peMatare
text: Vaimbova gurukota rezvemari VaTendai Biti vanova mutevedzeri wasachigaro mubato reMDC vari kutarisirwa mudare repamusoro nhasi vachikumbira kuti dare iri rimbovapa gwaro ravo rekufambisa kuti vaende kunorapwa kuSouth Africa. Izvi zvinotevera mutongo wamejastiriti VaFrancis Mapfumo wekuramba kuvapa gwaro iri mukupera kwemwedzi wapera vachityira kuti vanogona kuzotadza kudzoka. VaBiti vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora mutemo wesarudzo vachinzi vakaburitsa zvakabuda musarudzo zvisati zvaziviswa.Asi vari kuramba mhosva iyi. Zvichakadaro, vamwe vatungamiri vevashandi uye nhengo dzesangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions vakasungwa nezuro vari kutarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare redzimhosva nhasi zvekare vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kukonzera kusagadzikana kana kuti “disorderly conduct.” Vakasungwa vanosanganisa mutungamiri weZCTU VaPeter Mutasa, munyori mukuru wesangano iri VaJaphet Moyo nedzimwe nhengo dzavo. VaBiti neveZCTU ava vari kumiririrwa nemagweta eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights kana kuti ZLHR. Mutauriri weZLHR VaKumbirai Mafunda vati vane chivimbo chekuti vachawana mitongo inogutsa panyaya mbiri idzi. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaMwonzora, Votarisirwa Kuita Musangano kuZimbabwe Grounds neVatsigiri Vavo neSvondo
text: Mutungamiri wechimwe chikwata che MDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vari kutarisirwa neSvondo kuita musangano mukuru munhandare yeZimbabwe Grounds mumusha weHighfields wekutsvagira nhengo dzavo rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzema by-election dziri kuitwa mwedzi uno. Mutauriri waVaMwonzora, VaLloyd Damba, vanoti vanotarisira kuti vatsigiri vavo vachabuda nehuwandu hwavo kuenda kumusangano uyu, vachiti havatarisire kuti vangarambidzwa nemapurisa kuunga sezvakamboitika kuEpworth. Panyaya yekuti vanotarisira vanhu vakawanda here misangano yanga ichimboitwa naVaMwonzora yaipindwa nevanhu vashomashoma, vadamba vanoti vanhu havafanirwi kufananidza misangano yaiitirwa mudzimba nemuzvikoro nemusangano mukuru we rally, sezvo zvakatosiyana zvachose. No media source currently available

headline: VaMwonzora naVaMangwana Vokakazadzana neNyaya yeNhaurirano Pakati paVaMnangagwa naVaChamisa
text: Kubva zvatorwa mhiko nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, musi wa26 Nyamavhuvhu, Zimbabwe yaramba yakatarisana nematambudziko makukutu munyaya dzezvehupfumi nematongerwo enyika. Kuoma kwezvinhu uku kwava kupa kuti vakawanda munyika vakurudzire hurumende nemapato anopikisa kuti vataurirane. Iyi ndiyo kurudziro iri kupihwawo nenyika dzakabudirira dzakaita seAmerica neBritain kuti munyika muve nekugadzikana. VaMnangagwa vakambovimbisa kuti vachaumba hofisi yemukuru webato rinopikisa mudare reparamende asi kusvika pari zvino hapana chati chabuda sezvo zvichinzi Zanu-PF neMDC ave makara asionane. VaMnangagwa vanoti havasi kuda zvekuumba hurumende yemubatanidzwa sezvakamboitwa pakawama nyika kuzvitonga kuzere muna 1980 uye kushanda pamwe kwebato rePF-Zapu neMDC VaMugabe vachiri panyanga. Asi munyori mukuru muMDC VaDouglas Mwonzora vanoti naivo havadi hurumende yemubatanidzwa asi hurumende inombobata matomu zvinhu zvichigadziriswa. Asi munyori muMDC, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana vanoti MDC kana ichida nhaurirano inofanira kutanga yatenda kuti VaMnangagwa ndivo vakakunda musarudzo. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu PF Yoyambira Vanoda Kuratidzira
text: Zanu PF inoti inomira nemashoko akataurwa nemutungamiri wayo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamusangano wakaitwa nemusi weChishanu mudare rePolitburo yebato iri. VaMnangagwa, avo vanove zvakare mutungamiri wenyika, vakayambira masangano evashandi, machechi, nemasangano akazvimirira, kuti anangane nemabasa awo ari pamutemo, kwete kupindira mune zvematongerwo enyika. VaMangagwa vakatiwo vanozviziva kuti masangano aya ari kushanda nemapato anopikisa muda kuvhiringidza mashandiro ehurumende yavo. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, avo vanoti ichokwadi kuti masangano akazvimirira aya ava kuita zvematongerwo enyika achisiya basa rekuchengetedza kodzero dzevashandi. VaMugwadi vanoti hurumende inozviziva kuti masangano aya ari kuda kuratidzira zvisiri pamutemo, uye mapurisa achange achiita basa rawo nemazvo mukuona kuti hapana anobvumidzwa kutyora mitemo yenyika munguva ino yeCovid-19. VaMugwadi vatiwo sangano guru reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, riri kuita zvematongerwo enyika. Vati mutungamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vakamboyedza kuyananisa vatungamiri veMDC vari kunetsana, izvo zvinoburitsa pachena kuti sangano iri rinodyidzana nemapato anopikisa hurumende. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata VaMutasa kanawo MDC kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi mutungamiri weAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti sevashandi vane kodzero dziri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika, vanoshushikana zvikuru nemashoko aVaMnangagwa. VaMasaraure vanoti vashandi havasi kuzofa vakanyarara kana hurumende ichitadza kugadzirisa nyaya dzemihoro yavo, uye vacharamba vachitaura zvinyunyuto zvavo. Asi VaMugwadi vati hurumende inonzwisisa zvikuru zvichemo zvevashandi ndosaka yakawedzera mihoro yevashandi vehurumende nezvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana, pamusoro pezvo, ikavapa zvakare madhora ekuAmerica makumi manomwe nemashanu semari yekubatsirikana munguva yekurwisa Covid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu PF Inoita Sarudzo dzeKutsvaga Hutungamiri hweMatunhu
text: Sarudzo dzebato reZanu PF dzekutsvaga vatungamiriri vematunhu dzaitwa nhasi mumatunhu ose emunyika, uye zvizhinji zvabuda musarudzo idzi zvihaziviswa mangwana. Munzvimbo dzakawanda muHarare dzinosanganisira Mbare neHopley vanhu vatanga kuvhota mangwanani sezvange zvakarongwa. Asi kune dzimwe nzvimbo dzakaita seMufakose vanhu vatanga kuvhota panguva dzekuma3 masikati zvekuti kusvika pari zvino vachiri kuverenga zvabuda musarudzo. Amai Lisa Makoni, vanove sachigaro wemadzimai muMaurice Nyagumbo district kuHarare South Constituency, vaudza Studio7 kuti sarudzo dzafamba zvakanaka munzvimbo mavo. Vachitaura mushure mekuvhota paStodart Hall kuMbare, mutevedzeri weWomen’s League muMbare 1 District, Ambuya Garise, vati sarudzo dzekutsvaga hutungamiriri hutsva hwedunhu ravo dzafamba zvakanaka kunyange hazvo pange paine vakawanda vari kuda zvigaro. Vamwewo ambuya vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanofara kuti sarudzo dzabuda zvakanaka uye vati vachagara paStodart Hall kudzamara zvabuda musarudzo zvaziviswa. Murongi wemisangano muZanu PF, VaMike Bimha, vati zvichemo zvavange vanzwa kusvika pari zvino ndezvekuti kune dzimwe nzvimbo vanhu vanooka kutanga kuvhota. Vati vange vakamirira kunzwa zvizere kubva kumatunhu ese munyika. VaBimha vatiwo vanotarisira kuti kuverengwa kwemavhoti kunopera mangwana. Kunyange hazvo sarudzo idzi dzichinzi dzafamba zvakanaka, vamwe vakabuda musarudzo idzi vati vaityityidzirwa. VaaLazarus Dokora vekuMashonaland Centra vanoti vakabuda musarudzo idzi sezvo zvinhu zvanga zvisina kumira zvakanaka. Nhasi, VaAbia Mujere vazivisa kuti havachapinda musarudzo, asi havana kupa zvikonzero zvakati tsvikiti. KuMashonaland East, VaOzias Bvute, vakarambidzwa kukukwidza zvisina tsarukano kunyange hazvo zita ravo raimbenge ratambirwa nePolitiburo. VaBimha vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanenge vatyityidzirwa vanofanira kumhan’ara kubato kuti vanenge vaita izvi vatorerwe matanho. Mune makwikwi anotyisa muZanu PF zvekuti pamatunhu ese munyika, VaLarry Mavhima, ndivo vega vakashaya anovakwikwidza pachinzvimbo chasachigaro wedunhu reMidlands. MuHarare mune vanhu vashanu vari kuda chigaro ichi vanoti, VaChris Chuchu, VaGoodwills Masimirembwa,VaGodwin Gomwe, VaJason Pasade naVaBoniface Karoro. No media source currently available

headline: Vanoongorora Sarudzo Vorumbidza Mafambisirwo Aitwa Sarudzo muKenya
text: Zvizvarwa zveKenya zvapinda musarudzo idzo dzinonzi nevanoongorora mafambisirwo esarudzo dzaitwa murunyararo kunyange hazvo dzanonoka kutanga mune mamwe matunhu nekuda kwedambudziko nemichina yekuvhotesa. Zvigaro zvanga zvichivhoterwa zvinoti chemutungamiri wenyika, nhengo dzeparamende, maseneta, magavhuna pamwe nevatungamiri vematunhu. Musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, makwikwi makuru anonzi ari pakati pemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaWilliam Ruto nevakambove mutungamiri wehurumende, VaRaila Odinga, avo vari kutsigirwa zvakanyanya nemutungamiri wenyika, VaUhuru Kenyatta. Sarudzo dzemuKenya idzi dzapawo mukana kuzvizvarwa zvenyika iyi zviri kumhiri kwemakungwa kuti zvikwanise kuvhota kekutanga munhoroondo yenyika iyi zviri munyika dzazvigere, kuchitiwo mukana wepiri kune vari kunze kwenyika asi vari muAfrica. Zvizvarwa zveKenya zviri munyika gumi nembiri dzinoti Canada, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, America, Qatar, South Africa, Germany, Rwanda, Burundi, Uganda, Tanzania neSouth Sudan zvakwanisa kunge zvichipinda musarudzo idzi. Vamwe vawaniswawo mukana wekuvhota kekutanga imhuri yeVaShona iri muKenya, iyo yakawaniswa magwaro ekuti vave zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi. Vamiriri vemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu pamwe neanoona nezvesarudzo muZimbabwe uye vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika varikowo kuKenya uko vanga vachiongorora sarudzo idzi. Mumwe wevariko ndisachigaro veZimbabwe Election Support Network, VaAndrew Makoni, avo vanoti vagutsikana nemafambisirwo aitwa sarudzo nesangano rinotungamira sarudzo munyika iyi reIndependent Electoral and Boundaries Commission (IEBC), vachiti raratidza kurongeka, zvinokwanisa kudzidzwawo neZimbabwe Electoral Commission. VaMakoni vatiwo wafadzwa nekuona kuti mauto nemapurisa anga ari munzvimbo dzanga dzichivhoterwa haana kukanganisa kana kupindira mumafambisirwo esarudzo idzi. Zvichabuda musarudzo zvinotarisirwa kutanga kuziviswa neChitatu. Vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemaviri vanonzi ndivo vakanga vakanyoresa kuvhora musarudzo dzemuKenya idzi. No media source currently available

headline: Manifesito yeMDC Alliance Yovimbisa Mabasa neHupfumi Hwakanaka Kana Yotonga
text: MDC Alliance yaparura gwaro raichatevedza pakuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nehupenyu hweveruzhinji kana VaNelson Chamisa vakasarudzwakutungamira nyika musarudzo dzemwedzi unouya. Vachitaura pakuparurwa kwegwaro iri iro ravari kudaidza kuti Sustainable and Modernisation Agenda for Real Transformation, kana kuti SMART, VaChamisa vati veruzhinji vacharohwa nembovha yemufaro munyika kana veruzhinji vakavavhotera kuve mutungamiri wenyika musarudzo dzegore rino. VaChamisa vatiwo gwaro ravo reSMART rine mhinduro dzose dzinodikanwa mukugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika vakati kana vakasarudzwa kuve mutungamiri wenyika, hurumende yavo ichatsvaga hushamwari nenyika dzakabudirira uye vachaita zvose zvinodiwa kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire zvavati zvinozobatsira mukusimudzirwa kwehupenyu hweveruzhinji munyika. Vachitaurawo pakuparurwa kwegwaro iri, vaimbova gurukota rezvemari uye vari mumwe wevatungamiri veMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, vati kana vakasarudzwa kuti vatungamirire nyika seMDC Alliance vachaita kuti vakatora minda vapihwe magwaro anoratidza kuti ndivo varidzi veminda, kana kuti ma title deeds, pamwe nekuripa vakatorerwa minda vachiti hapafanire kuve nerusaruraganda panyaya yekuti anowana munda munyika ndiyani. Vatiwo vachatsvaga kuti Zimbabwe ikanzurirwe zvikwereti zvayo kumasangano ekunze anokweretesa mari akaita seInternational Monetary Fund neWorld Bank. VaChamisa vatiwo kana vakapinda panyanga mwedzi unouya vachave nemakurukota ehurumende asingadarike gumi nemashanu vachiti zvakakokosha kugadzirisa migwagwa iri munyika, kuwanisa veruzhinji mabasa pamwe nekurwisana nehuori. Zvimwe zviri mugwaro raparurwa neMDC Alliance iri zvinobatawo nyaya dzekutevedzwa kwemutemo munyika, hutungamiri hwakatswasuka, kuwanisa madzimai pamwe neveruzhinji mikana yakaenzana uye kuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaEarnest Mudzengi, vati gwaro raparurwa neMDC Alliance nhasi riri kutaura neveruzhinji pamatambudziko avakatarisana nawo munyika pari zvino. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vati vanoona sekuti pane kakusawirirana pane zviri kutaurwa naVaChamisa naVaBiti sezvo VaBiti vachiti Zimbabwe inyika ine varombo vakawanda asi nekune rumwe rutivi VaChamisa vachiti Zimbabwe ine hupfumi hwakawanda asi chanetsa hutongi hweZanu PF hwavanoti hwakaondomora zvinhu zvakawanda munyika. Kuparurwa kwegwaro iri kwaitwa panguva iyo veZBC vanga vachibuditsa pachivhitivhiti zvose zvanga zvichiitika panguva iyoyo. MDC Alliance inowanzonyunyuta neZBC iyo yainoti inoda kupakurira veruzhinji zvinoitika kuZanu PF chete. Mutungamiri weMedia Institute of Southern Africa muZimbabwe, VaThabani Moyo, vanoti ZBC inofanira kugara ichiita zvakadai nguva dzose vachitiwo mutemo unoona nezvesarudzo unosungira ZBC nemamwe makambani enhau kuti apakurire veruzhinji zvinenge zvichiitwa nemapato ose kwete kuburitsa nhau dzakarerekera kudivi rimwe chete No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Pane Vari Kuronga Kupidigura VaMnangagwa
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemukati menyika VaCain Mathema vanoti mapurisa ave kugara akadzipakatira sezvo vachiti pane vari kuda kupidigura hurumende yemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuburikidza nekuratidzira. Vatiwo pane vemasangano ekunze vari kuda kushanda nevemasangano akazvimirira kuronga kuratidzira munyika. VaMathema vaudza vatori venhau muHarare nhasi kuti hurumende haisi kuzopeta maoko ichirega vanhu vachiratidzira vachitungamirwa nevemapato anopikisa nevemasangano akazvimirira oga. No media source currently available Gurukota iri raramba kuti hurumende ndiyo iri kupa kuti zvinhu zvisagadzikana munyika nenyaya yemitemo yayo yapa kuti hupfumi huende kumawere. Vati zvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa nyika ndizvo zvapa kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire nerongo. Vati zvakakokerwa neMDC uye vakayambira bato iri kuti risaratidzire risina mvumo yehurumende. Asi nyika dzakatemera Zimbabwe zvirango dzinoti zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru venyika vanotonga nedemo. Mutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Yadzokoa/Mayibuye IZimbabwe Doctor Victor Chimhutu vati zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvekutadza kugadzirisa hupfumi ndizvo zviri kupa kuti zvinhu zvisagadzikana munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhukadzi Vechidiki Vokurudzirwa Kupinda Musarudzo
text: Sangano reInstitute for Young Women’s Development rinoti riri kushanda nemamwe masangano evechidiki mukukurudzira vanhukadzi vechidiki kumaruwa kuti vatore zvigaro zvematongerwo enyika musaruzdzo dza 2018. Mukuru wesangano iri, Muzvare Glanis Changachirere, vanoti vakatanga basa iri zvichetevera musangano wavakaita gore rapfuura uyo wakaratidza kuti madzimai echidiki kumaruwa haana zvigaro mungava mumakanzuru kana muparamende. Muzvare Changachirere vanoti madzimai aya anosangana nematambudziko akawanda akaita sekushaiswa mukana, mhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika nezvimwe uye ivo vari kuita basa rekuvadzidzisa nezvekodzero panyaya dzesarudzo. Muzvare Changachirere vanoti kana madzimai aya akasadaro, anosarira munyaya dzebudiriro nekuti hapana anenge achisumdzira nyaya dzavo mumakanzuru kana muparamende. Vanotiwo kunze kwemuparamende nemumakanzuru, madzimai echidiki anofanira kutora zvigaro zvehutungamiriri munzvimbo dzavanogara. Muzvare Charity Chaturuka vesangano reZimbabwe Young Women for Peace Building vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kubuda pachena kuti madzimai echidiki ekumaruwa haana ruzivo nezvekodzeo dzavo. Vanotiwo rimwe dambudziko rine madzimai nderekushaya mari dzekuti vatsvagise rutsigiro kana vachida kupinda musarudzo. Mumwe wevechidiki, VaKudakwashe Makanda, avo vanoshanda ne Youth Initiative for Community Development Trust, vanotiwo vari kubatsira vechidiki vangave madzimai kana varume kuti vazive kodzero dzavo musarudzo. Vati ichokwadi kuti kunyange vechidiki vakada kumira pasarudzo, nyaya yemari inonetsa uye panofanira kutsvagwa nzira yekuvapa mari dzekuti vapinde musarudzo. Vanoti semamimiriro akaita zvinhu vane mari kana vanobva kumhuri dzakapfuma ndivo chete vane mikana yekupinda musarudzo. Muzvare Changachirere vanoti pasi pechirongwa chavo che Her Right of Way Give Way Campaign vari kukuridzira hurumende, mapato ezvematongerwo enyika nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira kuti apewo mukana kune vechidiki kuti vakwikwidze musarudzo dzinotevera. Vanoti vanozviziva kuti izvi zvinogona kutora nguva asi pari zvino vari kuda kuti pazvigaro makumi matanhatu zvinopihwa madzimai zvisingakwikwidze muNational Assembly makumi matatu zvinofanira kupihwa vechidiki. Mamwe masangano ari kushanda neInstitute for Young Women’s Development ndeanoti Zimbabwe Organisation for Youth in Politics, Platform for Youth Development, Plumtree Development Trust pamwe neMission To Live Trust. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Voshora VaMugabe neKumanikidza Vanhu Kufora Vachitiwo Vave Kunzwa Zviri Nani
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change VaMorgan Tsvangirai nemusi weChitatu vakatumira mashoko kumhuri yeZimbabwe vachivimbisa kuti munguva pfupi inotevera vachange vodzoka kumusha vachibatsirana navo kurwira rusununguko. VaTsvangirai parizvino vari muchipatara kuSouth Africa uko vati vari kunaya. Vatenda mhuri yeZimbabwe nemudzimai wavo amai Elizabeth Tsvangirai nekuvatsigira vari muchipatara. Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa atiwo achadzoka munyika kuzoenderera mberi nekumirira zvido zvevanhu vachinetsana nevanhu vari kutyora kodzero dzevanhu munyika. Vati vari kuzvizivawo kuti vanhu vemuZimbabwe vari kunetseka zvikuru. VaTsvangirai vati vari kunzwawo kuti bato reZanu-PF ravharisa nyika yose nekumanikidza vanhu kusanganisa vanotengesa mumigwagwa kuti vaende kunofora vachitsigira mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. VaTsvangirai vati chinofanira kunge chichifora kuenda mberi handi vanhu asi kuti hupfumi. VaTsvangirai vatiwo vari kuenderera mberi vachinaya uye kurwarwa kwavo hakufanire kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika. Vatiwo nyika yeZimbabwe itori pakaoma kudarika hutano hwavo. Mutauriri waVaTsvangirai vaudza Studio 7 kuti mhuri yeZimbabwe ngaigadzikane zvayo sezvo VaTsvangirai vachange vobatana nawo mukurwira hutongo hwejekerere. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu PF Yopomera Vari Kunze Mhosva yeKufurira Vari Kumusha Kuti Varatidzire
text: Panonzi pave nekukandirana nyoka mhenyu pakati pezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvigere munyika nezvimwe zvigere kunze kwenyika pamusoro pekuratidzira kwanga kwakarongwa nebato reMDC, vari munyika, zvikuru veZanu PF, vachiti kuratidzira uku kuri kukuchidzirwa nevari kunze kwenyika. Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo mapurisa munyika yose ari kurambidza kuratidzira uku kuburikidza nekuzara mumigwagwa pamwe chete nemauto akamirira kuparadza vanenge vaungana vachida kuratidzira. Imwe nhengo yeZanu PF, VaBelieve Gaule, vanoti vari kunze kwenyika vari kufurira hama dzavo kuti dzipandukire hurumende vachidzityisidzira kuti havazotumira zvakare mari kumusha kana vakasapinda mumigwagwa. VaGaule vanoti vari kunze kwenyika vanenge vagere zvavo pamutambarakede, vachishandisa vari kumusha ava. Vamwe ndivo vari kunyora pamadandemutande vachikurudzira vari kunze kwenyika ava kuti vadzoke kumusha munguva dzekuratidzira idzodzo vachibatana navo, kwete kuita vana tinhadzirwe. Asi mumwe wevari kunze kwenyika, vari sachigaro webato reMDC mudunhu reDC-Maryland-Virginia, VaCharles Mutama, vanoti vanogona kunge vari kunzi vari kufurira vari kumusha asi chavari kuda kugadzirisa zvinhu munyika. VaMutama, avo vanove zvakare mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Diaspora for Democracy, vanoti nekuda kwaizvozvo, vanokurudzira hama neshamwari dzavo kuti vapinde mumigwagwa vachiratidzira senzira yekugadzirisa zvinhu.  No media source currently available

headline: Nziyo Dzoshandiswa Kukwezva Vechidiki Kuti Vanyorese Kuvhota Muna 2023
text: Rimwe sangano rinoshanda rakazvimirira kuChitungwiza rinoti rabatana nevamwe vaimbi mukutsikisa nziyo dzinokurudzira vechidiki kuti vanyorese kuvhota musarudzo dzichaitwa muna 2023. Sangano reChitungwiza Community Development Network rinoti rakaona zvakakodzera kuti vechidiki vanyorese kuvhota musarudzo dzemuna 2023 richiti vechidiki ndivo vachiri kutarisira zvakawanda muhupenyu saka vanofanira kusarudza kuti ramangwana ravo richange rakamira sei kuburikidza nekuvhotera hutungamiriri hwavanoda musarudzo idzi. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano iri, VaAdmire Mutize, vanoti vakaona kuti vechidiki vazhinji vanotevera zvikuru mimhanzi yemusambo weZimDancehall vakaona zvakakodzera kuti vashandise musambo uyu kuvakurudzira kuti vanyorese mazita avo kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota musarudzo dziri kuuya. VaMutize vanoti pari zvino vakatoburitsa dambarefu rine nziyo gumi dziri kukurudzira vechidiki kuti vabude nehuwandu hwavo vanonyoresa sevavhoti. VaMutize vanotiwo chimwe chakaita kuti vashandise mimhanzi inyaya yekuti vanhu vazhinji havadi kubuda pachena kuti vanoita zvematongerwo enyika saka nokudaro vanoti mimhanzi inosvitsa shoko ravo muchinyararire kuvanhu vakawanda. Vamwe vaimbi vari muchirongwa ichi vanosanganisira Nomatter Mandaza uyo anozivikanwa mumusambo weZimDancehall nezita rekuti “Lady Sky”. Lady Sky anoti vaimbi vechisikana vari kusanganawo nematambudziko ekushungurudzwa nevechidiki vanoshandisa zvinodhaka panguva yavanenge vachitsikisa mimhanzi yavo yekukurudzira vechidiki kuti vavhote. Mumwe muimbi, Jairos Makoni, uyo anoshanda zvakare semutsikisi wemimhanzi anoti denda reCovid 19 riri kuvatadzisa sevaimbi kuimba pajekerere vachikurudzira vechidiki kuti vanyorese kuvhota. Kunyange hazvo vaimbi ava vari kuitawo pavanogona napo kukurudzira vechidiki kuti vanyorese kuvhota, munyori mupurovhinzi yeHarare muboka revechidiki muMDC Alliance, VaDenford Ngadziore, vanoti Zimbabwe Electoral Commission yakavhara nzvimbo dzakawanda dzinonyoreswa kuvhota. VaNgadziore vanoti vachatora matanho akakura kwazvo kuti ZEC inyorese vanhu sevavhoti. Mukuru anoona nezvesarudzo muZEC, VaUtoile Silaigwana, vati tivatumire mibvunzo asi vanga vasati vapindura pataenda pamhepo. ZEC yakamboburitsa mashoko ichiti iri kushushikana zvikuru kuti vanhu vazhinji havasi kuenda kumahofisi avo kunonyoresa sevavhoti. MDC Alliance inoti iri kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vanyorese kuvhota ichiti iri kutarisira vanhu mamiriyoni matanhatu kuti vavhotere bato rayo ukuwo Zanu PF iri kutendererawo nenyika yose ichikurudzira vanhu kunyoresa kuvhota, ichiti iri kutarisirawo kuti ivhoterwe nevanhu mamiriyoni mashanu musarudzo dzemuna 2023. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T yaMuzvare Khupe Yoronga Kuenda kuMatare Kuti Ipiwe Iyo Mari yeMapato eZvematongerwo eNyika
text: Bato reMDC-T inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa rinonzi neMuvhuro rakati dare repamusoro ribvise panyaya dzinofanirwa kunzwikwa nechimbichimbi nyaya yekurwira zita rebato yarakanga rakwidza kudare iri. Bato raVaChamisa riri kunetsana nebato reMDC-T rinotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe vachirwira kuti ndiani anofanirwa kushandisa zita rekuti MDC-T. Zvichitevera kutururwa kwenyaya iyi kudare, bato raMuzvare Khupe rinonzi rakabva raudzawo magweta aro kuti akwire kumatare achida kuti iro bato iri ripiwe iro mari inoita miriyoni imwechete nemazana masere ezviuru zvemadhora yakabva kuhurumende ichipiwa kubato reMDC-T pasi pehurongwa hwekupa mari kumapato ezvematongerwo enyika ane nhengo muparamende. Mari iyi inonzi yakapiwa kubato reMDC-T risati ratsemuka asi yakazoshandiswa neMDC-T yaVaChamisa. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC-T inotungamirwa naMuzvare Khupe, VaObert Gutu, vanoti sebato vanoda kuti mari iyi ipiwe kubato ravo sezvo riri iro riri pamutemo. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reMDC-T inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa panyaya iyi. Asi gweta rebato iri VaThabani Mpofu vaudza bepanhau reHerald kubvisa kwavo nyaya yekurwira zita kudare hazvirevi kuti vave kurasa nyaya iyi, asi kuti vachaitevera sedzimwe nyaya dzisingadi kunzwikwa nechimbichimbi. No media source currently available

headline: SADC Inoyambirwa Kurega Kukurumidza Kurumbidza Sarudzo Mudunhu Rayo
text: Sangano remubatanidzwa wenyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica reSouthern African Development Community kana kuti SADC riri kukurudzirwa kuti riregedze kukurumidza kuti sarudzo dzinenge dzitwa mudunhu dzafamba zvakanaka pasati panyatsopenengurwa zvinenge zvaitika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti SADC kazhinji inongotambira zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo kunyanya kana zvichitsigira mapato ari kutonga. MuZimbabwe, SADC inonzi yakakurumidzazve kuti sarudzo dzainge dzakachena asi ikozvoino kana ZEC iri kutenda kuti yakaresva mukuverenga mavhoti. Bato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance rakabva rakwira kudare reConstitutional Court richiti sarudzo dzainge dzabirirwa zvemhando yepamusoro soro. Nyaya yekutoreswa mhiko kwemutungamiri wenyika yakabva yasendekwa parutivi. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vachitungamira sangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDehwa Mavhinga vanoti vanhu vanofanira kumira kutaura nezvenyaya iyi kusvika dare rapa mutongo waro. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vanodarika Zviuru Makumi Maviri neZvishanu Vonyoresa kuVhota
text: Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, vanoti huwandu hwevanhu vanyoreswa kuvhota kumatunhu akasiyana siyana kubva zvakaparurwa chirongwa chekunyoresa vavhoti muna Gunyana hwapfuura zviuru makumi maviri nezvishanu. Vatiwo sangano ravo rave mubishi kuunza munyika mimwe michina yose inodiwa kuti vaumbe gwaro idzva revavhoti iri. NeChipiri svondo rinouya, ZEC inenge yopinda mumatunhu akawanda vachinyoresa vavhoti uye nhasi vaparura hurongwa hwekuzivisa vanhu nezvinenge zvoitwa svondo rinouya. Amai Makarau vanoti mukati memavhiki maviri vanenge vave nemuchina wekuvheneka minyoro yemimwe kana kuti mafinger prints kuona kuti hapana munhu anoresa kaviri.

headline: Bato reCCC rinoti Misangano Yaro muKupera kweSvondo Yave Kuzoenderera Mberi Mushure Mekugara Pasi neMapurisa
text: Mapurisa anonzi amborambidza bato rinopikisa reCitizens’ Coalition for Change kuita misangano nevatsigiri varo mukupera kwesvondo kuMarondera nekuBinga North. Tsamba dziri mumaoko eStudio 7 dzinoratidza kuti mapurisa anga ashandisa mutemo weMaintenance of Peace Act, kana kuti MOPA, kurambidza bato reCCC kuita misangano nevatsigiri varo kuMarondera mangwana uye neMuvhuro kuBinga North. Asi mutauriri weCCC, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere, vaudza Studio 7 kuti misangano yavo yave kuzoenderera mberi kuMarondera, Binga North, Beitbridge neTsholotsho mushure mekuita musangano nemapurisa. Mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaObert Masaraure vashora kumborambidzwa kweCCC kuita misangano yayo panguva iyo bato reZanu PF risiri kurambidzwa kuita misangano yaro. VaMasaraure vakurudzira komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission kuti imire pakati ichigadzirisa nyaya dzakadai. Asi mutauriri weZEC, Amai Joice Leticia Kazembe, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti komisheni yavo haina kwayakarerekera, vakakurudzira kuti mapato ane zvichemo asvitse zvichemo zvawo kukomiti ye multi-party liason kuti nyaya idzi dziongororwe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vari mutungamiri webato reDemocratic Party, VaUrayazi Zembe, vati zviri kuitwa nemapurisa zvekurambidza VaChamisa nebato ravo kuita misangano zvinoratidza kuti munyika hamuna hutongi hwejekerere. Studio 7 yakundikana kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi sezvo tatadza kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi. Zvichakadai, Zanu PF yakatarisirwa kuitawo misangano mikuru miviri nevatsigiri vayo mukupera kwesvondo. Musangano uchaitwa ku Karoi mangwana Mugovera uchange uchitungamirwa nasachigaro vebato iri Amai Oppah Muchinguri-Kashiri kuchitiwo nemusi weSvondo mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato reZanu PF uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga vachange vachisangana nevatsigiri vebato ravo kwaMutare.

headline: Dare Redzimhosva Roshorerwa Kutambira Zvakaitwa NeMauto
text: Dare guru redzimhosva rinoti kutora masimba nechisimba kwakaitwa nemauto svondo rapera kuri pamutemo. Vachitaura neChishanu mushure mekunzwa nyaya yakakwidzwa kudare iri nevesangano rakarwa hondo yerusununguko, mutongi Justice George Chiweshe, vakati zvakaitwa nemauto, achitungamirwa nemukuru wavo, VaConstantino Chiwenga, zvinobvumidzwa neChikamu 212 che bumbiro remitemo weZimbabwe. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, Va Dewa Mavhinga, vanoti nyaya iyi haina kuziviswa kune veruzhinji uye haina kubatwa zvakanaka. Va Mavhinga vanoti hapana akapiwa nguva yekutaura akamirira rimwe divi. No media source currently available

headline: Gurukota reZanu-PF Rokokwa Kuzopawo Vatsigiri veMDC-T Chikafu paMusangano Wavo
text: Mumiriri weMutasa South VaTrevor Saruwaka vebato reMDC-T vanoti vanyora tsamba vachikoka gurukota rezvemabasa nekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu Amai Prisca Mupfumira vebato reZanu-PF kuti vauye kumusangano wavo nemusi weMugovera kuzopawo vatsigiri veMDC-T chikafu sezvavaiita kuvatsigiri veZanu-PF kuNorton uko bato reZanu-PF raitsvaga rutsigiro. VaSaruwaka vanoti vanyora tsamba iyi mushure mekunge Amai mupfumira vati vanokwanisa kuenda kumisangano yeMDC-T kana yevamwe vanopikisa ndokunge vakokwa. Asi VaSaruwaka vanoti havasati vawana mhinduro kubva kuna Amai Mupfumira. Musangano uyu uri kuitirwa kuHonde Valley paMasere Business Centre.

headline: Paramende Yokurudzirwa Kuti Iferefete VaKuda Tagwirei
text: Vanhu vakawanda vari kukurudzira kuti paramende iferefete zvakadzama zvakaburitswa nesangano re The Sentry, remu America rinoongorora huori hunoitwa pasi rose, pamusoro pamuzvinabhizinesi, uye ari chipangamazano chemutungamiri wenyika, Va Kudakwashe Tagwirei, avo vanonzi vari kuita zvehuori vachiburitsa munyika mamiriyoni nemamiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica nenzira dzisina kujeka vachishandisa makambani avo The Sentry yakaburitsa gwaro rinonzi Shadows and Shell Games – Uncovering an Offshore Business Empire in Zimbabwe, iro rinoratidza kuti VaTagwirei vanoshanda nevakuru vakuru muhurumende kusanganisira mahofisiemutungamiriri wenyika, gavhuna webhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Dr John Mangudya. Mutsambambozha yakanyorerwa VaTagwirei nemumwe mukuru wekambani yavo iri kunze kwenyika, yeSotic International, Ronelle Sincliar, yakazivisa mazita evanhu vachange vari mumakambani eThe Lighthouse Trust, The Lionaides Trust, The Alcaston Trust, The Amphion Trust neThe Norfolk Trust, muchengetedzi wemakambani aya ari Dr John Mangudya. Asi The Sentry inoti hapana kujeka kuti VaMangudya vane ruzivo nazvo here kana kuti kwete. Asi Dr Mangudya vaudza Studi 7 kuti vakaverengwa gwaro reThe Sentry asi vakati havana zvavanoziva nezvenyaya iyi. Asi vamwe vanoti VaMangudya vanofanirwa kutora matanho ari pachena kana chiri chokwadi chekuti hapana zvavanoziva nemakambani aVaTagwirei, ayo ari kupomerwa nyaya yekuburitsa mari munyika nenzira dzisina kujeka ivo VaMangudya vari ivo mukuru webhanga rinopa mvumo yekuburitswa kwemari munyika. Mumiriri weDzivaresekwa muNational Assembly zvakare vari nhengo yekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekufambiswa kwemari dzehurumende yePublic Accounts Committee, VaEdwin Mushoriwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti nekuda kwekuti vakuru vakuru muhurumende vanoshanda naVaTagwirei, paramende ndiyo yega yasara inofanira kuongorora mashandiro ari kuita makambani aVaTagwirei nehurumende. VaMushoriwa vati vanoziva kuri nyaya iyi yakaoma asi vakatiwo veruzhinji munyika vanofanira kutaura kana kuita ruzha pamusoro penyaya iyi nekuti ndivo vanorasikirwa apo mari inoburitswa munyika nenzira dzisina kujeka sezvinonzi zviri kuitwa nemakambani aVaTagwirei. VaMushoriwa vati zviri mugwaro reThe Sentry zvinotsigira zvakagara zvichitaurwa nevakawanda munyika uye vati komiti yakatoita imwe ongororo pamusoro peimwe kambanani yaVaTagwirei, yeSakunda Holdings, iyo yakapihwa basa nehurumende zvisina kujeka. VaMushoriwa havana kuda kutaura nezviri muongoro yavakaita kunze kwekuti zvakabuda mungororo yavakaita zvichaburitswa muparamende mwedzi uno. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi uye vari mukuru wezvirongwa musangano reZimbabwe Network for Social Justice, VaTendai Ruben Mbofana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti gwaro reThe Sentry rinotyisa sezvo richidoma vakuru vakuru muhurumende. Vati zvave pachena kuti nyika yakabatwa pahuro neVaTagwirei nechikwata chavo uye zvave kutoda ongororo inotungamirwa neparamende kana nematare edzimhosva kuongorora zviri kuitika sezviri kuitwa kuSouth Africa. Vati munhu wese ane chekuita nenyaya iyi anofanira kubvunzurudzwa uye vanowanikwa vaine mhosva voendeswa kumatare zvisinei nezvinzvimbo zvavo muhurumende kana kumapato avo ezvematongerwo enyika. VaMbofana vatiwo vana veZimbabwe vanofanirawo kutora matanho panoitika nyaya dzakadai vachiti ndivo vega vanokwanisa kudzivirira huwori hunoita kuti vatambure mari dzichiburitswa munyika. South Africa yakaumba Zondo Commission kuti iongorore huwori hunozi hwaiitwa nemhuri yekwaGupta iyo inonzi yange yabata vaive mutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaJacob Zuma, makurukota avo pamwe nemakambani ehurumende. The Sentry inoti nyika nemasangano ekunze anofanira kuongorora makambani aVaTagwirei muZimbabwe nekunze sezvo ari kuita bhizimisi zvisina kujeka. Intoyambirawo kuti vanoda kuita mabhizinesi muZimbabwe vangwarire kupinda mumabhizinesi anodyidzana nemakambani anonzi ari pasi paVaTagwirei, sezvo achikwanisa kutemerwa zvirango neAmerica sezvakaitwa VaTagwirei neSakunda Holdings yavo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, vashishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Dr Propser Chitambara, vati havawoni VaTagwirei vachiferefetwa pakatariswa kudyidzana kwavanonzi vanoita nevakuru vakuru munyika. Muimwe tsambambozha inoratidza kuti yakabva kuna VaTagwirei musi wa Chivabvu 31, 2019, ichienda kuvakuru vakuru vemakambani ari pasi paVaTagwirei, VaTagwirei vakanyora vachiti “HE wants that money to be paid after I show him the directors, owners of Sotic documents.” Kunyange hazvo zita remutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangangwa, risina kudomwa, nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dziri kutevera nyaya idzi dzinoti tsambambozha yaVaTagwirei payakati HE, yaireva His Excellency, izvo zvigona kuburitsa pachena kuti mutungamiri wenyika arimowo mudandemutande remakambani aya ari pasi paVaTagwirei. Kunze kwekuva chipangamazano chaVaMnangagwa, VaTagwirei vanonzi ihama zvakare yemutungamiri wenyika. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa kubata. Studio7 yakaedza kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvemari, asi gurukota rebazi iri, VaMthuli Ncube, vakanga vasingabatike panharembozha yavo. Gwaro reThe Sentry rinoti VaNcube vanoramba kuti bazi ravo rinoziva zviri kuitwa naVaTagwirei. No media source currently available

headline: Chirongwa cheKuongorora Mazita Chinotanga neChinono muMasvingo
text: Mudhorobha reMasvingo dzimwe nzvimbo dzanonoka kuvhurwa, mushure mekunge zvikwanisiro zvakita sezvigaro pamwe nemagwaro evavhoti zvanonoka kuendeswako neZEC. Apowo vagari vazhinji vanga vachiuya mumwe mumwe zvichiratidza kuti vazhinji havasi kuziva nezvechirongwa ichi nekuda kwekuti hachina kunyatsoshambadzwa. VaMuranganwa Chanyau, veku Ward 3 muMasvingo vati vaongorora zvinyorwa zvavo, asi basa rambononoka kutanga. “Inspection ndainda ndikaona zita rangu ririmo but patanga process ichifana kutanga na 7 am yanonoka panga pasina ma materials se funirture uye mamwe ma premises anga akavharwa zvichiratidza kuti zvanga zvisina kunyatsorongeka.” Asi vamwe vakaita saVaChrispen Mutyavakuru, vanoti kunyange pambononokwa, chirongwa ichi chakanaka zvikuru uye chazofamba zvakana. “Ndinoona zvinhu zvacho zvakarongeka zvisingambobviri zvekuti dai vanga vashambadzira kuti vanhu vave vanouya vakawanda vachiona mazita akabhukiwa zvakanaka.” VaInnocent Taweni vakurudzira boka reZEC kuti rivandudze zvirongwa zvekushambadza chirongwa ichi vachiti vanga vasingatozivi nezvacho, asi vangosangana nacho vauya pazvitoro kuzobvisa bhabharasi. Zvichakadaro vamwe vanoti chirongwa ichi chatanga chakaneta nekuti vashandi veZEC vakabva kuhurumende vari kuita basa iri vari kushanda vasingafari zvichitevera kudzikiswa kwakaita mari dzavanofanirwa kubhadharwa pazuva. ZEC yakaudza vashandi ava, vazhinji vavo vakaita basa rekunyoresa vavhoti, kuti yave kudzikisa mari kubva pamadhora makumi matatu kusvika pamakumi maviri ichiti yaita izvi nekuda kwekuti hurumende haina mari. Izvi zvinonzi hazvina kufadza vashandi avo vakapika kuti vachashanda zvishoma nezvishona, semumwe mushandi akataura neStudio 7 akaramba kudomwa zita rake. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mukuru weZEC muMasvingo, VaZex Pudurai kuti vatipewo pfungwa dzavo pane zvaitika. Asi Amai Priscilla Chigumba, vanove sachigaro veZEC, vakabvuma kuti mari yevashandi yakadzikiswa asi hapana zvavaikwanisa kuita nekuti hurumende haina mari. Chirongwa ichi chatanga nhasi nyika yose uye chinopera musi wa 29 Chivabvu. Asi vamwe vanoti chakaramba chichiitwa nechinono uye chisina kuwedzera kushambadzwa, vazhinji vachatadza kuongorora mazita avo kuitira kuti vanenge vasina kunyorwa zvakanaka vakwanise kunyoresa patsva pachirongwa chekunyoresa, icho chakawedzerwawo nzvimbo dzekunyoresera. No media source currently available

headline: VaKasukuwere Vanobvisiswa Zviuru Zvitatu zveMadhora seChibatiso
text: Vaimbova gurukota rezvematunhu muhurumende yaVaRobert Mugabe, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, vabvisiswa zviuru zvitatu zvemadhora kuitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo. Izvi zvinotevera kumiswa pamberi pedare vachipomerwa mhosva ina dzekushandisa masimba avo zvisirizvo vachiri muhurumende. VaKasukuwere vari kupomerwa mhosva ina vachinzi vakapfurikidza mwero mukuita basa ravo pavaimbova gurukota rezvevechidiki pamwe nepavakazove gurukota rezvematunhu. Muchichisi wenyaya idzi, VaMichael Reza, vaudza dare kuti VaKasukuwere vakashandisa masimba avo zvisiri izvo pavaiva gurukota rezvechidiki pavanonzi vakapa basa kambani yeBrainworks kuti imire pakati pehurumende nemakambani anochera zvicherwa akaita seUnki Mine neZimplats munhaurirano dzekuti makambani aya atevedzere mutemo waimbovapo wekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema. VaReza vati VaKasukuwere vaifanira kupa kambani yeBrainworks kana imwewo kambani mushure mekunge nyaya yekupa basa iri yaendeswa kuti pasarudzwe kambani yaizoita basa kana kuti tender. Pane dzimwe nyaya nhatu dzavanonzi vakapara vari gurukota rezvematunhu, VaReza vati VaKasukuwere vakashandisa masimba mukupa Amai Junior Shuvai Gumbochuma, vanove mukoma wevaimbova mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, masitendi ekuvaka dzimba muHarare pamwe nekuMasvingo vasina kutevedzera nzira dzinoshandiswa mukupihwa kunoitwa masitendi. Kubva zvabviswa VaMugabe pachigaro muna Mbudzi gore rapera, kune makurukota akati kuti asungwa achimiswa pamberi pematare edzimhosva. Makurukota aya anosanganisira VaIgnatious Chombo, Va Samuel Udenge, VaJoseph Made, VaJason Machaya nevamwe. Vose makurukota aya vanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vaitsigira chikwata cheGeneration 40, icho chairwisana neTeam Lacoste, iyo inonzi inotsigira VaMnangagwa. Nyaya isati yatanga kuzeyewa, vakafanobata chigaro chemuchuchisi mukuru wenyika, VaKumbirai Hodzi, avo vanga vachishanyira matare vachiona mamiriro akaita zvinhu mumatare, vaudza mutongi wedare kuti nyaya dzehuori sedziri kupomerwa VaKasukuwere dzinofanira kunzwikwa nekukasika uye kuti dzibatwe neruoko rwakasimba kuti veruzhinji vaone kuti hurumende yakazvipira kurwisana nehuori. Mune imwewo nyaya yaitika pamatare, mamejasitiriti matsva makumi matanhatu atoreswa mhiko dzekuva mamejasitiriti pamberi pemukuru wemamejasititi munyika, VaMishrod Guvamombe. Izvi zvauyawo panguva iyo dzimwe nyaya dzanga dzichinonoka kufambiswa mumatare nepamusana pekushomeka kwemamejasitiriti zvikuru sei mumadhorobha madiki. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Mitemo yeSarudzo Inoenderana neZvisungo zveSADC neAU
text: Sangano ronoongorora nyaya dzesarudzo reElection Resource Centre rakanyora tsamba kumutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, richivakurudzira kuti vaone kuti mitemo yesarudzo yagadziriswa kuti ienderane nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mukuru wesangano iri, VaTawanda Chimhini, vati mutsamba yavo vakayeuchidza VaMnangagwa kuti zvimwe zvavari kuda kuti zvienderane nemitemo yenyika zvinhu zvavakambovaudza kare mumakore avainge vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika uye gurukota rezvemitemo. Vachipa muenzaniso mitemo inofanira kuringana nebumbiro remitemo, VaChimhini vati Zimbabwe Electoral Commission inofanira kunge yakazvimirira. Vati ZEC ikasaita mutongi gava pachaita mutauro pakuvhota. Vatiwo mutemo wenyika unoti munhu wose ane kodzero yekuvhota kusanganisira vari kunze kwenyika uye vari mumajeri, izvo vati hazvisi kuitika. Sangano reERC rakanyorawo tsamba kugurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, uye mutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, vachivakurudzira kuyananisa mitemo yesarudzo nebumbiro remitemo pamberi pesarudzo dzegore rino. No media source currently available
