headline: Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, Vanodoma Makurukota Avo
text: Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, nemusi weChina vakadoma makurukota ehurumende yebato ravo kana kuti shadow ministers makumi maviri nematanhatu, pamwe nemamwe gumi achange ari makurukota ematunhu, kana kuti provincial ministers. Vamwe vevakadomwa kuve makurukota vanosanganisira VaMorgen Komichi, avo vakadomwa kuve gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika; VaTapiwa Mashakada vari gurukota rezvehupfumi; Dr. Ruth Labode segurukota rezvehutano; Amai Paurina Mpariwa vari gurukota rezvevashandi nemabasa, kuchitiwo VaPeter Moyo vachidomwa segurukota rinoona nezvekugadzikana kwenyika. Mwanakomana wevakave mutungamiri weMDC wekutanga, mushakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaVincent Tsvangirai, vakadomwawo kuve gurukota rinoona nezvevechidiki, mitambo netsika. Vakadomwa kuve makurukota ematunhu vanosanganisira VaMorgen Femai, avo vachange vari gurukota redunhu reHarare; VaGift Konjana vari gurukota redunhu reMashonaland West; Amai Jane Chifamba vari gurukota reMashonaland East; VaGift Chimanikire vari kuMashonaland Central, kuchitiwo VaGiles Mutsekwa vari gurukota redunhu reManicaland. Mutauriri waVaMwonzora, VaLloyd Damba, vanoti mutungamiri webato ravo akatora danho iri achitevera kodzero dzinowanikwa munyika ine hutongo hwejekere idzo dzinobvumidza mapato anopikisa kuti aumbewo dare remakurukota rinenge richiona kuti hurumende yemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa iri kushanda sei. No media source currently available

headline: Makerere Oshora Bhiri reKuvandudza Mutemo weMashandiro eMasangano Akazvimirira Oga
text:
Vamwe vemakereke vanoti bhiri rinoona nezvekunyoreswa nemashandiro
emasangano akazvimiririra oga kana kuti Private Voluntary Organisation
Amendment Bill richaderedza rubatsiro rwavanopa kune vanotambura.

Sachigaro wemubatanidzwa wemakereke mudunhu reMashonaland West
reZimbabwe Heads of Christian Denominations-ZHCD-Pastor Tafadzwa
Mafukidze vanga vari pamusangano wemusi weChina vakati bhiri iri rikave
mutemo richakanganisa basa ravanga vachiita rekubatsira
vanhu munyaya dzezvekudya, dzidzo nezvehutano.

Vachipa pfungwa dzekereke kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemabasa
nekugara zvakanaka kwwevanhu VaMafukidze vakati bhiri iri richaitawo kuti kushanda kwemasangano anoshanda akazvimiririra kuome kudarika zviripo parizvino.

Mumwe mudzimai apinda mumusangano wanhasi Muzvare Patricia Chibaya
vakati hurumende inofanirwa kuregedza vemasangano akazvimirira
vachiita basa ravo vakasununguka. Muzvare Chibaya avo vari kukwikwidza kuita kanzura muChinhoyi
musarudzo dzema by-elections kupera kwemwedzi uno vakamirira bato
reCitizens Coalition for Change vanoti vemasangano akazvimiririra
vakabatsira madzimai akawanda kuti vasatye kukwikwidza. Asi mumwe wechidiki wekuMakonde, VaGodknows Muzhandamhuri vanoti bhiri iri rakanaka rakadaro vachiti vemasangano akazvimiririra vanokurudzira
vanhu kuti vapandukire hurumendep.

Vanhu vakawanda vati panyaya yekufambiswa kwemari ingangoshandiswa
munyaya dzezvehutototo pane mitemo yakawanda inodzivirira izvi
yakafanana neweMoney Laundering Act. Vanhu vakaratidza kusafara nemasimba akawanda ari kupihwa kugurukota
rehurumende pabhiri iri, simba ravati rinogona kushandiswa zvisiri
izvo sezviri kuitika. Gurukota rezvemitemo Vaziyambi Ziyambi vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende ichatanga yanzwa pfungwa dzevanhu isati yavandudza mutemo. No media source currently available

headline: Pakisimusi, VaMnangagwa Vanoti Vari Kuziva Kuti Vakawanda Vari Kunonga Svosve neMuromo
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vatumira mashoko kumhuri yeZimbabwe pazororo rekisimusi vachiti vari kuziva kuti vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kutambura uye havasi kuisa zvimiti munzeve kana kuita sevasiri kuzviona. Vati pane zvakawanda zvavari kuyedza kuita kuyedza kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vari kuyedza kuumba hukama nedzimwe nyika, kurwisa huori uye kuunza hutongo hwejekerere. VaMnangagwa vakurudzira vanhu vose kuti vave nerudo kuvavakidzani vavo nekubatsira varombo sezvo iri nguva yekupembera hupenyu hwaJesu Kristu. Vati kubva zvavakatora mhiko yekutungamira nyika vari kushanda zvakasimba kuzadzikisa zvirevo izvi. VaMnagagwa vati pakisimusi ino vanhu vemuZimbabwe havafanire kutarisa shure asi mberi chete netarisiro yekubatsira mhuri, nharaunda uye nyika.

headline: Mhirizhonga Inotyisa Yoitika kuChitungwiza
text: Vechidiki muMDC inotungamirwa naVa Morgan Tsvangirai vanoti havasi kuzopeta mavoko avo vachirwiswa nevechidiki ve Zanu-PF. Vechidiki ava vanoti yasvika nguva yekuti vadzoserewo zvakasimba pose pavanorwiswa sezvo mapurisa ari kutsigira Zanu-PF pose panoitika zvemhirizhonga, vatsigiri veMDC vari ivo vanosungwa chete. Mashoko aya anotevera kurwiswa kwakaitwa munyori anoona nezvemisangano mu MDC kuChitungwiza, VaDelma Amos Kaliyati, mukupera kwesvondo. VaKaliyati, avo vari muchipatara zvichitevera kukuvara zvakaipisisa kwavakaita, vanonzi vakachengetedzwa nemapurisa sezvo vari muhusungwa zvichitevera mhirizhonga yakaitika neSvondo. Zvichitevera kurwiswa kwakaitwa VaKaliyati nevamwe vavo, vechidiki ve MDC vanonzi vakapindirawo munyaya iyi vachiedza kudzoserawo kurwiswa kwakange kuchiitwa vamwe vavo, izvo zvakaita kuti pakuvare vanhu vakati wandeyi, vamwe vakaendeswa kuchipatara. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kuziva huwandu hwevanhu vakakuvara muchiitiko ichi. VaKaliati vakarwiswa zvakare svondo rapera apo vaibatsira vanhu vanoda kunyoresa kuvhota. Vamwe vanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu PF vakakanda chombo chinoputika pamba paVaKaliyati, mukadzi wavo akakuvara zvakaipisisa muchiitiko icho. Nhengo yeZanu PF, VaJim Kunaka, vanoramba zvese zvataurwa neveMDC vachiti vanhu vebato ravo havana nguva yokufamba vachirova vanhu sezvo vari mubishi rekukuridzira vanhu kunonyoresa kuitira kuti vagokwanisa kuzovhota musarudzo dzichaitwa gore rinouya. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: VaDouglas Tapfuma Vanonyimwa Mukana weKubvisa Mari yeChibatiso
text: Mumwe mukuru mukuru muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika nedare remakurukota, VaDouglas Tapfuma, vamiswa pamberi pedare ramejasitiriti nhasi vachipomerwa mhosva nhatu dzehuori. Muchuchisi wenyaya iyi, VaCharles Muchemwa, vaudza dare kuti VaTapfuma vakashandisa masimba avo zvisirizvo pavakakonzeresa kutengwa kwemotokari nomwe kubva kuSouth Africa dziri muzita rehurumende asi vakazodzishandisa sedzavo. VaMuchemwa vati motokari dzose idzi dzakakonzera kuti hurumende irasikirwe nemari inoita madhora ekuAmerica zviuru gumi nechimwe nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matatu nenhanhatu (US$11 936) sezvo pasina kubhadharwa mari yekupinza motokari idzi munyika kana kuti import duty. Rimwe remagweta aVaTapfuma, VaEsau Mandipa, vaudza dare pavanga vachikumbira mukana wekuti musungwa abhadhariswe mari yechibatiso kuti VaTapfuma vari kuramba mhosva yavari kupomerwa sezvo vachiti motokari idzi ndedzehurumende sezvo mapepa ekuti dzisabhadhare mari yekupinzwa munyika akasainwa nemunyori mukuru muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika pamwe nedare remakurukota, VaMisheck Sibanda. Mupurisa ari kuferefeta nyaya iyi achishanda nekomisheni inorwisa huori yeZimbabwe Anti Corruption Commission, VaTimothy Guta, vaudzawo dare kuti VaTapfuma havafanire kubuditswa muhusungwa sezvo vachiti vachiri kuvaferefetwe nenyaya yekupinzwa kwedzimwe motokari munyika dzinodarika zana vachishandisa chinzvimbo chavo zvisirizvo. Vati VaTapfuma, avo vave Chief Director Monitoring and Evaluation kuhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, vanogona kuvhiringidzana nevafakazi vasina kudomwa mudare uye vanogona kusazomirira kana vakapihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso sezvo vachiti humbowo huri kuvaroverera huri fararira. Asi mutongi wedare, VaHosea Mujaya, vatura mutongo wekuti VaTapfuma varambe vari muhusungwa sezvo vachiti vanogona kuvhiringidzana nevafakazi zvisinei nekuti havachashanda kuState House. Zvaturwa nedare zvatsinhirwa nerimwe remagweta aVaTapfuma, VaValentine Mutatu. VaMutatu vati vave kukwidza nyaya iyi kumatare epamusoro. VaMujaya vati VaTapfuma vadzoke musi wa15 Nyamavhuvhu pachaenderera nyaya iyi Mberi. VaTapfuma vakambodomwawo munyaya yehuori kukambani yemarasha yeWankie Colliery uko kunonzi kwakashayikwa mamiriyoni matanhatu emadhora ekuAmerica. VaTapfuma ndivo vave musungwa wechipiri anove mukuru muhurumende asungwa nenyaya yehuori kubva pakagadzwa komisheni itsva yeZacc nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa musi waChivabvu 30, 2019. Asi MDC yakaburitsa mashoko ekuti komisheni iyi, iyo inotungamirwa naAmai Loice Matanda Moyo, vanove mudzimai wegurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, haina mazino. VaMoyo, ndivo vakabuda pachivhitivhiti muna Mbudzi 2017 vachizivisa nyika kuti mauto ainge opindira mune zvematongerwo enyika zvakazokonzeresa kuti vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiye basa. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Vonanga kuNew York Kunopfachura Nyika Isina Mari yeMushonga
text: Hurumende iri kushorwa zvikuru nenyaya yekusafambisa mari dzebhajeti zvakanaka zvopa kuti vanhu vambopota vachishaya mishonga yakaita semaARV, nemishonga yegomarara, uye mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Kunyangwe hazvo bhanga guru renyika riri kutatarika kuburitsa mari dzekutenga zvinhu zvakakosha izvi, mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vari kutarisirwa kuenda kuNew York, muAmerica nevana vavo, vakuwasha, vamwe vehukama nemakurukota vanosvika makumi manomwe uye vanonzi vari kupihwa mari yakawanda zvikuru. VaMugabe nechikwata chavo ichi vari kutarisirwa kunge vari muNew York musi wa 19 kusvika musi wa 23 Gunyana. Nyanzvi munyaya ndzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti zvinhu muhomwe yehurumende hazvina kumira zvakanaka nenyaya yekutadza kubata bhajeti yenyika zvakanaka. Vaimbova gurukota rezvemari, VaTendai Biti, vanoti pose panobuda VaMugabe munyika vanobuda nemari inosvika mamiriyoni mana emadhora zvinopa kuti nyika izotadza kutenga zvinhu zvakakosha. Va Kanyenze vanoti mari iri kuendeswa kuhofisi yaVaMugabe yakawandisa uye kunyika yakaita seZimbabwe zvinokonzera matambudziko. Asi nhengo yeZanu-PF inova sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaKindness Paradza, vanoti VaMugabe semutungamiri wenyika vane kodzero yekufamba. Mukuru wesangano reThe AIDS and Arts Foundation Zimbabwe Program iro rinoshanda nevechidiki vanorarama neHIV/AIDS, VaEmmanuel Gasa, vanoti mimwe mishonga iri kumbopota ichishomeka nenyaya yekusakosheswa kwenyaya dzezvehutano. Asi vachitaura paVOA LiveTalk, mazvikokota munyaya dzezvehutano, Dr Elophi Sibanda, vakati mushonga weAbacavir wave kuda kubviswa nekuti uri kukonzera mamwe marwadzo. VaGasa vatendawo izvi asi vakati kuda kutenga mimwe mishonga kuri kukona n’anga murapwa achida. VaGasa vanotiwo kushandisa mari yemabond notes kuri kutopa kuti zvinhu zviome. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Edgar Munatsa, vatiwo mishonga mizhinji iri kushaikwa muzvipatara zvehurumende. Kunyangwe vatenda kuti mari iri kunonoka kuuya kubva kuReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, gurukota rinoona nezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, vati mishonga yange yave kushaikwa yavepo. Mune mamwe madhorobha munonzi muri kumbopotawo muchishaikwa mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari zvinonzi nenyanzvi zvichapa kuti hupfumi hutoenda kumawere. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nedambudziko rekushaya simba kwemari yayo zvakapa kuti ishandise mari dzekunze dzakawanda muna 2009. Asi nekutadza kugadzirisa hupfumi uye nyaya yehuori, hupfumi hwaenda kumawere. Hurumende inoti zvayo matambudziko ari kukonzerwa nezvirango zvayakatemerwa nenyaya yekutora minda kubva kuvachena. Asi vanopikisa vanoti zvirango zvakakonzerwa nekutonga nedemo. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yokurukurwa kuMusangano weAfrican Commission on Human Rights
text: Zimbabwe yange iri mugango kumusangano weAfrican Union unoona nezve kuchengetedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kana kuti African Commission on Human and People’s Rights uyo uri kupembererawo makore makumi matatu Africa yatanga boka rinoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu iri. Nyaya dzakazeyiwa pane zviri kuitika muZimbabwe inyaya yehurumende yekudzinga vanhu papurazi reManzou kuMazowe kuti ripihwe mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, uye nyaya yekudzingwa basa zvisina kujeka kwemuchuchisi mukuru wehurumende, VaRay Goba. Mumakore apfuura Zimbabwe ndiyo inonzi yaigara iri mudariro ichipomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu asi zvinonzi zvave nanu. Nyaya yekudzingwa basa kwaVaGoba yange ichinzwikwawo mudare repamusoro nhasi muHarare mushure mekunge sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, ZLHR raendesa mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, neJudiciary Servces Commission vachiti vakatyora bumbiro remutemo. Masangano akawanda ekuZimbabwe anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, kusanganisa ZLHR, ari kumusangano uyu. No media source currently available

headline: United Nations Yobatsira Vapoteri veZimbabwe Vodzingwa kuBotswana
text: Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevapoteri pasi rose reUNHCR kumaodzanyemba kweAfrica rinoti riri munhaurirano nehurumende yeBotswana dzekutsvaga nzira yekupedza dambudziko rakasangana nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muhupoteri muBotswana. Pane vapoteri mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe kusanganisira vana vadiki vari kutsika madziro munyaya yekuti vazvipire kudzoserwa kumusha muchirongwa chevoluntary repatration vachiti kuZimbabwe kwakaberekera ingwe. Kunyangwe hazvo hurumende yeBotswana yaiti bazi rinoona nezvekupinda nekubuda kwevanhu munyika iyi richavaita musengabere mushure mekudzosera vamwe vavo mazana mana nemakumi maviri kubva munaZvita kusvika pakati kwemwedzi uno, vapoteri ava vari kuramba vakamira semusambangwena. Muzvare Heinn Shin, avo vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko musangano reUNHCR, vaudza Studio7 kuti vari munhaurirano nehurumende yeBotswana senzira yekutsvaga pundutso panyaya iyi. Muzvare Shin vaenderera mberi vachiti vapoteri ava, vane makore anopinda gumi vari muhupoteri pamuzinda weDukwi Refugee Camp muBotswana, vhavasi kufara nekuda kudzoserwa kumusha nechisimba. Sezvo Botswana yakaisa ruoko rwayo pachibvumirano chekuchengetedza kodzero dzevapoteri che1951 UN Refugee Convention, Muzvare Shin vanoti nyika iyi inosungirwa kupa zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe hupoteri vachiti kusadaro kumbunyikidza kodzero dzevapoteri nokuti hupenyu hwavo hunogona kupinda munataisireva kana vakadzoserwa kunyika yavo. Vachitsigira mashoko aMuzvare Shin, gurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika yeBotswana, VaKagiso Mmusi vanoti hurumende yavo haisikudzosera kumusha avo vasiri kuda nechisimba kumusha. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe icho chiri muhupoteri, Amai Toendepi Mverechena vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakanzwawo nerunyerekupe kuti sangano reUHNCR riri kutaurirana nehurumende yeBotswana kuti vatsvagirwe kwavangaendeswe. Vachitsigira mashoko aAmai Mverechena, mumwe ari muhupoteri achibva kuZimbabwe uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita sezvo achitya kubvongodza muto kuseva achada, anoti kupindira kweUNHCR munyaya yavo kwaunza kugadzikana muhana dzevazhinji sezvo hurumende yeBotswana yati dzikamei. Pari zvino, paDukwi Refugee Camp pasara vapoteri zviuru zviviri chete zvinosanganisira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, Somalia, Uganda, Burundi nedzimwewo nyika dzekumabvazuva kweAfrica. No media source currently available

headline: Kuratidzira kweMDC-T Koitwa Musi wa14 Kubvumbi
text: Izvi zvinotevera danho ratorwa nebazi rinoona nzvekuchengetedzwa kwerunyararo reJoint Operation Command, iro rati kuratidzira kweMDC-T kuri kuitwa musi uchange mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vachisangana nevaimbove varwiri verusununguko. Bato reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, iro ranga rakaronga kuratidzira musi wa7 Kubvumbi, rinoti rave kuzoratidzira musi wa14 Kubvumbi. Izvi zvinotevera danho ratorwa nebazi rinoona nzvekuchengetedzwa kwerunyararo reJoint Operation Command, iro rati kuratidzira kweMDC-T kuri kuitwa musi uchange mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vachisangana nevaimbove varwiri verusununguko. Vachitaura neStudio7 nhasi, VaMorgan Komichi, avo vari kutungamirira kuratidzira uku vanoti kudaidzwa kwavo neJoint Operation Command hazvisi zvinhu zvitsva sezvo pose pavanoda kuratidzira vachidaidzwa nebazi iri. VaKomichi vati vaudzwa neJOC kuti havagoni kuenderera mberi nekuratidzira musi uyu sezvo VaMugabe vachange vachisangana nevaimbove varwiri vehondo yerusununguko musi wakare. VaKomichi vati vane chivimbo chekuti vachawana mvumo yekuratidzira sezvo bato reZanu PF richiratidzira parinodira. Sachigaro wevechidiki mubato reMDC, VaHappymore Chidziva, vati ratidziro iyi ndeyekuratidza kunyunyuta kwevana veZimbabwe nekushaikwa kwemabasa munyika pamwe nekurarama kweveruzhinji vachinhonga svosve nemuromo. VaChidziva vatiwo pavo vatopedza nekuudza mapurisa nezveratidziro yavo nekudaro havazomiriri mvumo. Bato reMDC rinoti kunyange hazvo VaMugabe pavaitsvaka rutsigiro muna 2013 vakavimbisa kuti kwaizoumbwa mabasa anosvika mamiriyoni maviri, zviri kuitika ndezvekuti panozosvika sarudzo muna 2018, vanhu vane huwandu humwewo vari pamabasa vachange vamiswa mabasa. Bato reMDC ratiwo richaratidzira zvine runyararo. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vokurudzira Sarudzo Dzakachena seChaive Chido chaVaTsvangirai
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vaenda kunobata maoko kumhuri yekwaTsvangirai zvichitevera kushaya kwemutungamiri webato reMDC-T, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, uye zvinonzi vakurudzira kuti sarudzo dzegore rino dzinge dziri sarudzo dziri pachena sezvaidiwa NaVaTsvangirai. Vachitaurawo pamusangano wavazoita nevatsigiri vavo paHarvest House, vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weMDC-T, VaNelson Chamisa ,vati mutungamiri wenyika VaMnangagwa vaenda kunobata maoko kumhuri yekwaTsvangirai kumba kwemufi vaine vatevedzeri vavo vanoti VaConsntantino Chiwenga naVaKembo Mohadi, vakavimbisa kuti sarudzo dzegore rino dzichange dzakacheka senzira yekuzadzikisa zvido zvaVaTsvangirai. Mumwe wevana waVaTsvangirai, anonzi Richard Tsvangirai, uyo asiri mwana wemudzimai waVaTsvangirai wekutanga, mushakabvu Amai Susan Tsvangirai, audza vatsigiri veMDC kuti VaChamisa vanofanira kuzadzisa zvaidiwa nababa vavo. Asi vamwe vana vose vaVaTsvangirai vanga vasipo pamusangano wepaHarvest House uyu. Zvichakadai, munyori mukuru muMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, avo vanoti havasi kucherechedza VaChamisa semunhu akafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri webato, vatadziswa kutaura nevatsigiri vaVaChamisa pamusangano. Musangano uyu wapindwawo nemutungamiri webato rinopikisa kuNamibia reADT, VaMcHenry Venami, avo vati ruzhinji rweZimbabwe rwunosungirwa kuzadzisa zvido zvaVaTsvangirai zvekuti munyika muve nehutongi hwejekerere kubudikidza nekuvhotera MDC musarudzo dzegore rino. Mutumbi waVaTsvangirai waendeswa kumba kwavo kuHighlands kwaucharara usati waendeswa kumusha kwavo kwaHumanikwa, mudunhu reBuhera kuManicaland neMuvhuro. Mutumbi uyu waswera uri kusvondo yeMethodist kuMabelreign uko kwaipindirwa svondo naVaTsvangirai. Mufi akatarisirwa kuvigwa neChipiri kuBuhera. No media source currently available

headline: Vadzidzi Gumi neVana Vosungwa Vachiratidzira paUniversity of Zimbabwe
text: Vadzidzi vepaUniversity of Zimbabwe vanoti vacharamba vachienderera mberi nekuratidzira kunyangwe vamwe vavo gumi nevana vakasungwa nezuro vachinyunyuta nekuwedzerwa kwemari dzedzidzo. Vachitaura neStudio 7, rimwe remagweta arikumiririra vadzidzi ava vaPaidamoyo Saurombe vanoshanda nesangano remagweta anorwira kodzero reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vati vadzidzi gumi nevana vakasungwa nezuro havasati vaudzwa mhosva yavari kupomerwa VaSaurombe vanoti pavadzidzi vakasungwa apa pane vamwe vakakuvara. Studio 7 hainawo kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Vachitaura nevatori venhau nhasi muHarare vanomiririra vadzidzi vepaUniversity of Zimbabwe vati mari dzechikoro dzirikudiwa dzinokatyamadza sezvo vazhinji vavo vasiri kukwanisa kuzounganidza mari dzirikudiwa idzi. Mutungamiriri we Student Representative Council yepaUZ vaAllan Chipoyi vanoti mari irikudiwa iyi ichasiya vana vevarombo vasingawani dzidzo University of Zimbabwe yakakwidza mari dzechikoro izvo zvichasiya vaibhadhara mari shoma pachikoro ichi vobhadhara mari inosvika zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi mana nezvishanu kana kuti 340 000 kubva pazviuru makumi mashanu nezvinomwe 55 000. Avo vanoda kuita zvidzidzo zveMasters varikutarisirwa kubhadhara mari inodarika miriyoni yemadhora emuno. Munyori mukuru muSRC , VaMunashe Cuthbert Masiyiwa vatsigirawo vachiti ongororo yavakaita inoratidza kuti vadzidzi vazhinji vari pachikoro ichi vanobva kumhuri dzisingawani mari yakawanda. VaMasiyiwa vatiwo vanoda kuti mapurisa asungunure vadzidzi vakasungwa. Vadzidzi ava vanyorawo tsamba yenyunyuto iyo vanoti yasainwa nevadzidzi vanodarika zviuru zvishanu. Vati vachanosiya tsamba yenyunyuto iyi kudare reparamende, kubazi rezvedzidzo yepamusoro pamwe nekuZimbabwe Human Rights Commission. Vadzidzi ava vanotiwo kana mari ikasadzikiswa vachange vachizoendawo kumatare. Muzvare Everjoy Chidindi vebato rinopikisa reLabour Economists and Afrikan Democrats vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti zvinokatyamadza kuti mari dzinodiwa nehurumende hadzienderani nemari irikutambiriswa veruzhinji. Hatinawo kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro Muzvinafundo Amon Murwira kana vakuru vepaUniversity of Zimbabwe. Asi vachinyora padandemutande reTwitter , munyori mubazi rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko vaNick Mangwana vanoti vasingakwanisi kubhadhara mari dzechikoro kumauniversity kune zvirongwa zvakadai sekubhadhara mari padiki padiki pamwe nekupiwa zvikwereti. Vatiwo pane varikuda kupinza zvematongerwo enyika munyaya dzekukwidza kwemari dzechikoro asi izvi zvarambwa nevamiririri vevadzidzi avo vatiwo hazviiti kuti vanzi vabhadhare mari iyi zvishoma zvishoma nekuti yakawandisa. Zvimwe zvikoro zvedzidzo yepamusoro zvakwidzawo mari zvakanyanya zvinosanganisira Masvingo Polytechnic iyo yakakwidza mari dzeNational Certificate kubva pazviuru makumi maviri nezvina zvemadhora emuno 24 000 kuenda pazviuru zana nezvishanu (105 000). Gweru Polytechnic neLupane State University ndovamwewo zvakare vakakwidza mari dzechikoro.

headline: VaBiden Vanokunda VaTrump Musarudzo yeMutungamiri weAmerica
text: Vaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, vakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri weAmerica zvichitevera kukunda kwavaita mudunhu rePennsylvania.  VaBiden, avo vane makore makumi manomwe nemasere ekuberekwa, vatora zvigaro zvose makumi maviri zve electoral college zvemudunhu rePennsylvania ndokuita zvigaro zvinodarika mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe vachidarika zvigaro zvinodiwa kuti munhu adomwe semunhu akakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. VaBiden vakunda mutungamiri weAmerica pari zvino, VaDonald Trump, avo vakabuda pachena kuti vari kupikisa mumatare maverengerwo akaitwa mavhoti mumamwe matunhu emuAmerica.  VaBiden vachaitwa mutungamiri weAmerica wechimakumi mana nematanhatu apo vachagadzwa zviri pamutemo muna Ndira gore rinouya. Kukunda kwaVaBiden kunoreva kuti mutevedzeri wavo, Amai Kamala Harris, vari kupinda munhoroondo yekuva mudzimai wekutanga, uye ari mutema, kuva mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika munhoroondo yeAmerica yemakore mazana maviri nemakumi mana nemana.  VaBiden vakashanda vari mutevedzeri waVaBarack Obama kubva muna 2009 kusvika muna Ndira 2017, apo pakatoreswa VaTrump mhiko yekuva mutungamiri wenyika mushure mekukunda Amai Hilary Clinton musarudzo yakaitwa muna Mbudzi 2016. VaBiden vakashandawo senhengo yedare Senate kwemakore makumi matatu nematanhatu. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika uye vari mudzidzisi paDeVry University kuOhio, Professor Elliot Masocha, vanoti zvanga zviri pachena kuti VaBiden vachakunda musarudzo iyi. Asi VaMasocha vanoti VaBiden vane mutoro mukuru wekugadzirisa zvinhu munyika pamwe nekunze kwenyika zvavati zvakavhiringwa naVaTrump. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inonzi Ndiyo Iri Kutungamira Mukutyorwa kweKodzero dzeVanhu
text: Sangano remubatanidzwa wemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyika, reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, rinoti kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika kuri kunyanya kuitwa nehurumende. Pakodzero dzakatyorwa mugore rakaongororwa iri, Zimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum inoti zvikamu makumi manomwe nezviviri kubva muzana zvekodzero idzi, zvakatyorwa nemapazi aehurumende anosanganisira mapurisa, mauto nevasori. Vachitaura mushure mekuparura gwaro ravo rinonzi “ State of Human Rights Report Zimbabwe 2018,” chipangamazano muZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, VaDzikamai Bere, vati mumwaka uyu mapaziehurumende ndiwo akanyanyotyora kodzero dzeveruzhinji. VaBere vatiwo kuremekedza kodzero zvinoda kuti hurumende izvipire mukuchengetedza kodzero dzeveruzhinji. VaBere vati kodzero yakanya kutyorwa gore rapera ikodzero yekuungana kwevanhu vakasununguka. Vatiwo vanhu vakafa apo vaiita zvinhu zvinobvumidzwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mukuru weZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, Amai Blessing Gorejena, vatiwo kutyorwa kwekodzero munyika kwawanda zvakanyanya kupfuura makore mashoma apfuura. Amai Gorejena vatiwo kuti Zimbabwe ibudirire mukuchengetedza kodzero dzevanhu, hurumende inofanirwa kuona kuti yaremekedza kodzero dzemunhu wese pasina kutarisa kuti abuda mumba maani. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende paongororo yeZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum iyi. Asi mumwe wechidiki mubato reZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vati kunyange hazvo vanhu vane kodzero munyika, kodzero idzi hadzifanirwi kukanganisa mafambiro ebasa munyika. VaMugwadi vati magwaro anoburitswa aya haana mature ose. Zimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum inotiwo hurumende inofanirwa kuumba hwaro hwenhaurirano nezvizvarwa zvese zvenyika; kuona kuti bumbiro remitemo yenyika yaremekedzwa; kugadzirisa mitemo inotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika; kuona kuti vese vanokanganisira vamwe vamiswa pamberi pematare vachitongwa nemhosva dzavanenge vapara, uye kusimbaradza dzidziso muvanhu pamusoro pekodzero dzavo. Masangano anorwira kodzero pamwe nemamwe mapato anopikisa akapomera hurumende mhosva yekusaremekedza kodzero yehupenyu pakapfurwa vanhu nemasoja muna 2018 mushure mesarudzo izvi zvakaitika zvakare muna Ndira gore rino.

headline: Chikwata cheCOMESA Chinoti Nyika Yagadzirira Sarudzo Dzakachena.
text: Chikwata chakatumwa nesangano reCommon Market For Eastern and Southern Africa (COMESA) kuzoongororo gadziriro dzesarudzo kuti dziri kufamba sei munyika, chapeta chirongwa ichi chichiti nyika yakagadzirira kuita sarudzo dzakachena. Mukuru wechikwata ichi, Ambassador Ashraf Gamaal Rashed, vanonzi vataura kuti nyika iri mugwara rakanaka rekugadzirira kuita sarudzo dzakachena uye vavimbisa rutsigiro rwavo kunyika kusvika sarudzo dzapera. Chikwata ichi chasanganowo negurukota rezvekunze kwenyika VaSibusiso Moyo muHarare, uye chakasangana kare neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, mapurisa eZRP, mutongi mukuru wematare, VaLuke Malaba, pamwe nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika nevemasangano akazvimiririra. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, vachidzidzisa paPretoria Univesity, Doctor Tyanai Masiya vanoti vaongorori veCOMESA ava vanogona kudaro vakapotsa maonero nekuti zvizhinji zvisati zvaiswa mugwara. Zvichakadaro, sangano re European Union razivisawo kuti ranyorerana nehurumende yeZimbabwe chibvumirano chekushanda pamwe chichabvumidza sangano iri kuti ritumire chikwata chichaongorora sarudzo dziri kuitwa gore rino munyika. Chibvumirano ichi chinonzi chanyoreranwa pakati pegurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe VaSibusiso Moyo, nemumiriri we European Union muZimbabwe, VaPhillipe Van Damme, zvichitevera kukokwa kwakaitwa sangano iri nehurumende yeZimbabwe muna Kurume kuti rikwanise kutumira chikwata chichaongorora sarudzo. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yozadza Mapurisa Mumigwagwa neKuda Kumisa Kuratidzira
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemukati menyika, VaIgnatius Chombo vanoti mapurisa achange akadirwa munyika yose neChitatu apo pakatarisirwa kuti veruzhinji vacharamwa mabasa zvakare sezviri kukurudzirwa nemamwe mapoka. Zvichakadaro, mapurisa neChipiri akasunga Mufundisi Evan Mawarire, avo vanove mumwe wevari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vasaende kumabasa nemusi weChitatu. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare nemusi weChipiri, VaChombo vati mapurisa achange akagadzirira zvakakwana kuchengetedza runyararo munyika pahurongwa hwemazuva maviri hwekusaenda kumabasa huri kurongwa nemamwe masangano. VaChombo vati kunyange hazvo zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvine nhuna dzazvo nehurumende, pane nzira dziri pamutemo dzazvinofanira kutevedzera vachiti mapurisa achasunga vese vachakonzera mhirizhonga pakuramwa mabasa uku. VaChombo, avo vanga vakatsigirwa negurukota rinowona nezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, VaSydney Sekeramayi pamwe negurukota rinowona nezvevasori, VaKembo Mohadi, vati hurumende haisi kuzopinza mauto mumigwagwa vachiti mapurisa ari munyika akakwana kuti achengetedze runyararo. Vachipindura mubvunzo wekuti sei mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nehurumende yavo vasiri kutevedzera zviri kutaurwa neveruzhinji zvekuti vabve pachigaro, VaChombo vati VaMugabe havana kwavari kuenda sezvo vachiti vakapihwa masimba ekutungamira nyika neveruzhinji musarudzo dzemuna 2013. VaChombo vanoti kuramwa mabasa kuri kuda kuitwa kubva musi weChitatu kuri kurongwa nehurumende dzekunze idzo dziri kuda kuti hurumende yaVaMugabe ibve pachigaro kunyange hazvo hurumende dzekunze idzi dzichiti hadzineyi nehurongwa uhwu. Zvichakadai, gweta riri kumirira Mufundisi Mawarire, VaHarrison Nkomo vaudza Studio 7 parunhare manheru ano vari kukamba yemapurisa yeHarare Central Police Station kuti VaMawarire vari kupomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira kuti munyika musagadzikanane. Tichiri panyaya iyi, sangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu re Zimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights raburista mashoko ekuti riri kushushikana zvikuru nekusungwa kuri kuitwa vanhu vari kuronga nyaya yekuramwa mabasa mangwana. Mumwe mushandi wehurumende uyo aramba kudomwa nezita anoti vatowirirana nevamwe vavo kuti havasi kuzoenda kumabasa kwemazuva maviri ari kutevera zvisinei nekurudziro yaVaChombo yekuti vanhu vasateerere kurudziro yekurambwa mabasa iyi. Svondo rapera vashandi vazhinji munyika vakateerera kurudziro yekusaenda kumabasa iyi, danho rinonzi nevamwe ndiro riri kutyiwa zvakare nehurumende kuti vanhu vachatora pamazuva maviri ari kukurudzirwa kuti vanhu vasaenda kumabasa aya. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Vanoti VaMbeki Mutengesi, Ngavakumbire Ruregerero
text: Mutungamiri we MDCT, Va Morgan Tsvangirai, vapomera neChitatu vaimbova mutungamiri we South Africa, Va Thabo Mbeki, mhosva yokushanda pamwe chete nemutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, mukubirirwa kunonzi kwakaitwa sarudzo dzemuna 2002. VaTsvangirai vatiwo Va Mbeki vanoziva zvakaitika pasarudzo dzemuna 2008 idzo dzakazokonzera kuti pawumbwe hurumende yemubatanidzwa mushure mekunge VaTsvangirai vakunda VaMugabe musarudzo idzi. Vachitaura nevatori venhau pamuzinda webato ravo pa Harvest House zvichitevera kubuda kwakaita gwaro revatongi vematare edzimhosva veku South Africa, reJudicial Observer Mission, iro rakange richiongorora sarudzo dzemuna 2002, Va Tsvangirai vapomera hurumende yeSouth Africa yaiva pasi paVa Mbeki mhosva yekushanda neZanu PF mukudzvanyirira zvido zvevana veZimbabwe. Zvichitevera sarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika dzemuna 2002, Va Tsvangirai vakaenda kumatare vachiti sarudzo idzi dzakange dzabirirwa naVaMugabe, asi kusvika pari zvino matare haasati atura mutongo panyaya iyi. Nekune rumwe rutivi, bepanhau reku South Africa rakaenda kumatare richida kuti gwaro revaongorori ve South Africa ava ribuditswe pachena asi rakazobuda nemusi weChishanu svondo rapera mushure mekunge matare epamusoro soro munyika iyi ati gwaro iri riburitswe. Hurumende yeSouth Africa yakanga yapikisa kuburitswa kwegwaro iri. VaTsvangirai vaendererera mberi vachiti pakaitwa musangano wenyika dziri kuchamhembe kwe Africa muguta guru re Zambia re Lusaka muna Kubvumbi 2008, Va Mbeki vakataurawo zvakare kuti mu Zimbabwe maizoitwa sarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika dzechipiri, kana kuti presidential runoff, kunyange hazvo zvakange zvabuda musarudzo zvakange zvisati zvave kuzivikanwa. Vati izvi zvinoratidza kuti Va Mbeki vakange vachiziva zvose zvakanga zvichiitwa neZanu PF pakange pakapfimbikwa zvakange zvabuda musarudzo izvo zvakatora nguva inodarika mwedzi mumwe chete zvisati zvaziviswa kune veruzhinji. Zvichakadai, mukuru wesangano rinoongorora nyaya dzekufambiswa kwesarudzo munyika re Election Resource Centre, Va Tawanda Chimhini, vanoti hurumende ye South Africa inofanira kukumbira ruregerero panyaya iyi kuvana veZimbabwe. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende ye South Africa panyaya iyi. Gwaro re Judicial Observer Mission iri rinotiwo sarudzo dzemuna 2002 hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka uye rinoti pakange pane mhirizhonga yakanyanyisa yakavhiringa hupenyu hwenhengo dze MDC, vatungamiri vebato iri vakasungwa pamberi pesarudzo uyewo kuti gwaro revavhoti rakanga risiri mumawoko e MDC. Kunyange hazvo pakaitwa dzimwe sarudzo kubva muna 2002, MDC-T ichiri kungochema nenyaya dzimwe chetedzo uye kusvika pari zvino bato iri rinoti harisati rave negwaro revavhoti. Va Tsvangirai vati kubva muna 2000 pakaitwa sarudzo dzeparamende, Zimbabwe haisati yamboita sarudzo dziri pachena. Zvichakadai, Va Tsvangirai vati kusawirirana kuri kuitika mu Zanu PF kunoratidza kuti Va Mugabe havasisina nguva yakareba vari muhutongi. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko emudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, avo vari kukurudzira kuti mutevedzeri wemurume wavo mubato nemuhurumende, Amai Joice Mujuru, vasiye chigaro chavo vachivapomera mhosva dzehuori, kusagona basa pamwe nekuronga zvekubvisa Va Mugabe pachigaro zvechisimba. Kunyange hazvo vachiti gakava riri mu Zanu PF harinei nebato ravo, chinovarwadza sebato ndechekuti veruzhinji ndivo vari kutambura uku vari muhurumende vachiswera vachirwira masimba. Asi Amai Mujuru vari kuramba mhosva dzose dzavari kupomerwa vachiti mawoko avo akachena semukaka uye vanoti vakatokwidza nyaya iyi kumagweta avo nepamusana pekusvibiswa kwavanoti kuri kuitwa zita ravo. No media source currently available

headline: Kunyoresa Kuvhota Kwokonzera Mutauro Munyika
text: Sachigaro wesangano rinotungamira nyaya dzesarudzo reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, vanoti vanhu vachatanga kunyoresa kuvhota kuti vave pagwaro idzva rinoshandisa michina yechizvino zvino, kana kuti Biometric Voter Registration, nemusi weMuvhuro. Asi musi uyu, dare repamusoro reHigh Court rinenge richizeyawo nyaya yekuti zviri kuitwa neZEC zviri pamutemo here kana kuti kwete. Bato reMDC-T rakaendesa mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, mutevedzeri wavo, vanove zvekare gurukota rezvemitemo, vaEmmerson Mnangagwa, uye ZEC, kumatare richiti zvavari kuita munyaya dzesarudzo, kusanganisira nyaya yekutanga kunyoresa vavhoti, hazvisi pamutemo. Mamwe masangano, akaita seZimbabwe Election Support Network, aburitsawo mashoko kuvatori venhau nhasi achikurudzira hurumende kuti ivandudze mitemo yesarudzo kuitira kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzakachena. Sangano iri rati nyaya dzekutyora kodzero dzevanhu munguva yesarudzo, kusanganisira kuvaita kafiramberi nekuvatyisidzira, dzinofanira kumira. Sangano remubatanidzwa wemasangano akawanda akazvimirira munyika, Crisis In Zimbabwe Coalition, yaburitsawo mashoko kuvatori venhau richiti harisi kufara kuti ZEC haisi kunyatsoshandawo nemasangano akazvimirira oga muzvirongwa zvayo. Sangano iri ratiwo nenyaya yekushaya dzidziso yakakwana yezvekunyoresa kuvhota, sarudzo idzi dzichangoita sedzimwe dzakaitwa kare dzisina kutambirwa nemapato anopikisa. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwawo nemunyori mukuru weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vakati nemasikati eMuvhuro dare rinenge rozeya kuti zviri kuitwa neZEC zviri pamutemo here. No media source currently available

headline: VaDabengwa Voberekwa Kumusana naVaChamisa Kuti ZAPU Iwane Zvigaro
text: Bato reZAPU rinopinda muchibvumirano neMDC Alliance chekutsigira VaNelson Chamisa musarudzo. Mutungamiri webato reZAPU, VaDumiso Dabengwa, vazivisa nezvechibvumirano ichi pamusangano wavaita nevatapi venhau neChishanu muBulawayo. Mutauriri weZAPU, VaIphithule Maphosa, vanoti ZAPU haizi kupinda muMDC Alliance asi chibvumirano ichi chichaita kuti bato reZAPU ripiwe zvigaro gumi zvedare reparamende zvichakwikwidzwa nenhengo dzebato iri dzichitsigirwa neMDC Alliance. VaMaphosa vati bato ravo rakamboedza kutaura nemamwe mapato asi richitadza kuwirirana nawo izvo zvaita kuti rishande neMDC Alliance. Chipangamazano paUniversity of Pretoria, VaTinashe Mawere, vanoti VaDabengwa munhu ane nhoroondo inoremekedzwa mukurwira rusununguko rwenyika vachitiwo chibvumirano ichi chinogona kubatsira VaChamisa neMDC Alliance zvikuru. Mudzidzisi munyaya dzerunyararo nebudiriro uye vari muongorori wezvematongerwo enyika akazvimirira, Vincent Chakunda, vanotsinhirawo maonero aya. Mune imwewo nyaya, Zimbabwe Electoral Commission inoti vanhu mazana maviri nevashanu ndivo vakakwanisa kuendesa mazita avo kudare reNomination Court nezuro kuti vakwikwidze pazvigaro gumi nezviviri zvedare reparamende zviri mudunhu reBulawayo. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa naVaMudzuri Vodomwa Kuitwa VaTevedzeri VeBato reMDC
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC-T VaMorgan Tsvangirai vadoma VaElias Mudzuri naVaNelson Chamisa sevatevedzeri vavo. Vachitaura kumba kwavo kuHarare nevatori venhau VaTsvangirai vati zvavaita zvido zvebato ravo, “Kudoma kwandaita vaviri ava kunotevera kurudziro yakaitwa neNational Council nezuro." Vaviri ava pamwe naAmai Thokozani Khupe vachandibatsira kugadzirira sarudzo dzemuna 2018. Izvi zvave kureva kuti VaTsvangirai vanenge vave nevatevedzeri vatatu kusanganisa Amai Khupe. Kudomwa kwaVaChamisa naVaMudzuri kunotevera misangano miviri yakaitwa nezuro yeNational Council neNational Executive. VaTsvangirai vakazivisa mwedzi wapera kuti vainge vaine chirwere chegomarara rematumbu asi vakaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kuzosiya basa uye vanotarisira kunaya sezvo vari kudaira mushonga. Tichakupai zvizere nezvenyaya iyi muteerere Studio 7 na 7 pm pamasaisai anoti 909 am ne 4930 kilohertz pa short wave

headline: Veruzhinji Vomirira Kuona Gwara Richatorwa NaVaMnangagwa
text: Kunyangwe hazvo kuenda kwevaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe kwakatambirwa neveruzhinji, vamwe vanoti hutungamiriri hwakanaka hwaVaMnangagwa huchabuda chete zvichionekwa nemabatiro avachaita sarudzo dzakatarirwa gore rinouya. Kunyangwe hazvo mukugadzwa kwavo semutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakavimbisa kushanda pamwechete nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe pamwe nekusimbaradza runyararo, VaDaniel Chirume Chiunda vanoti pari zvino hazvina chinoratidza kuti mashoko emutungamiriri wenyika aya angavimbwa navo. VaChiunda vaudza Studio 7 kuti kudzoserwa kwemamwe makurukota ehurumende anozivikanwa nehuwori nekusagona basa zvinoita kuti vasavimba naVaMnangagwa kuti vachazadzisa zvivimbiso zvavo. VaChiunda vanoti kunyangwe haazvo VaMugabe vakabviswa murunyararo, vachazogutsikana nekushanduka kwezvinhu kana nyika yeZimbabwe ikaita sarudzo dzakasununguka kuti vanhu vapiwe mukana wekusarudza mutungamiriri wavanoda gore rinouya. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe VaStanley Mutetwa vanoti kunyangwe zvazvo vakafara nekubviswa kwaVaMugabe nemauto vanoti havafunge kuti bato reZanu PF richachinja maitiro aro sezvo riri kungotungamirirwa nevanhu vaibatsira nekutsigira maitiro aVaMugabe. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika nemagariro evanhu , Dr Tinashe Mawere, vari kuDepartment of Historical and Heritage Sudies and Center for Sexualities , Aids and Gender paUniversity ye Pretoria muSouth Africa, vanotiwo zvakaitika munyika zvinoratidza simba remauto muZimbabwe. VaMawere vanoti havaoni mauto achitendera hutongi hwemunhu asina kurwa hondo. VaMawere vanotiwo kushaikwa kwevechidiki nevanhukadzi vakawanda pamakurukota aVaMnangagwa zvinosimbaradza kutongi kwechiuto nezera revakaenda kuhondo. Vanotiwo kunyangwe hazvo VaMugabe vakatambudza zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakanyanya kwenguva ndefu, vati vakabatwa zvakana zvikuru mushure mekusiya basa nekudawo kwekuti vakaenda kuhondo. Veruzhunji vanoti vachakatarisira kuti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa ichagutsa zvido zvevana veZimbabwe mumwedzi yasara sarudzo dzisati dzaiitwa huye kuti pachaitwa sarudzo dzejekerere here. No media source currently available

headline: Mumwe Mutewedzeri weMutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, Vanobvisiswa Mari yeChibatiso
text: Mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiriri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, vabhadhariswa zviuru gumi zvemadhora emuZimbabwe semari yechibatiso kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba panyaya yavari kupomerwa yekurova mumwe mudzimai. VaBiti vari kupomerwa mhosva yekurova Amai Tatiana Aleshina vekuRussia muHarare svondo rapfuura. Mutongi wedare Amai Vongai Muchuchuti vati VaBiti vagare pakero yavakapa kudare uye havafaniri kupindira pakuferefetwa kwenyaya iyi. Vachuchisi panyaya iyi havana kupikisa kuti VaBiti vabhadhare mari yechibatiso uye vanzi vadzoke kudare musi wa18 Ndira gore rinouya apo pachatanga kunzikwa nyaya yavo. Gweta raVaBiti, VaAlec Muchadehama, vaudza dare kuti VaBiti havana mufaro nemasungirwo avakaitwa uyewo vaigona kubatwa neCovid- 19 nekuti pavakasungirwa paHarare Central Police Station hapana kana maSanitiser, ma mask nezvimwe zvinodzivirira denda reCovid 19. Pazvichemo zvavo, VaBiti vanotiwo vakanyimwa chikafu uye segweta, nhengo yeparamende nemhunhu ane mukurumbira, hazvaikodzera kuti vadzikisirwe pasi nemabatirwo avakaitwa nemapurisa. Dare rati nyaya yaVaBiti inofanira kuongororwa uye zvinenge zvabuda muongororo iyi zvounzwa kudare musi wa18 Ndira gore rinouya. Zvichakadai, mutauriri weMDC Alliance, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere, vati kunyange hazvo VaBiti vabhadhariswa mari yechibatiso, havasi kufara nemabatirwo avakaitwa nemapurisa. Mune imwewo nyaya, mumwe mushandi mukuru wekanzuru yeHarare, VaKainos Chingombe, avo vakasungwa nezuro vachipomerwa mhosva yekusashandisa mahofisi avo zvakanaka apo vakatenga motokari yaidhura zvakanyanya, vanzi nedare vadzoke nemuvhuro. Gweta ravo, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, vati VaChingombe vanoramba mhosva dzavari kupomerwa. Mune imwezve nyaya, mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, varangarira Amai vavo, avo vakashaya nguva pfupi yapfuura. Nyaradzo iyi yaitirwa kumusha kwavo kuGutu South mudunhu reMasvingo. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Voenda kuMatare Vachipikisa Zec Yakati VaMnangagwa Vakakunda Musarudzo
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzebumbiro remitemo yenyika dzinoti kana MDC Alliance ikakwidza nyaya yayo kumatare edzimhosva yekuti VaNelson Chamisa vakakunda mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, izvi zvinomisa kugadzwa kwaVaMnangagwa. VaChamisa vanoti vari kuronga kuenda mutare kunopikisa zvakaburitswa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, vachiti vane humbowo hunoratidza kuti vakakunda VaMnangagwa zvine mutsindo. Bumbiro remitemo yenyika rinopa vanenge vasina kufara nezvebuda musarudzo mazuva manomwe kubva panozviswa zvabuda musarudzo kuti vakwidze nyaya yavo kumatare. Kana izvi zvisina kuitika zvinoreva kuti vanenge vakunda musarudzo vanogadzwa semutungamiriri wenyika mukati memazuva mapfumbamwe kubva pazuva raitwa sarudzo. Vari kuziva zviri kuitika zvakare vari gweta muMDC Alliance, VaJacob Mafume, vaudza Studio 7 kuti MDC Alliance iri kuenda kumatare neMuvhuro kana Chipiri kuitira kuti inopikisa zvakaziviswa neZec. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzebumbiro remitemo yenyika, uye vari mutungamiri weNational Constitutional Assembly, VaLovemore Madhuku, vachitaura senyanzvi yemitemo vanoti kuti MDC Alliance ibudirire panyaya iyi, inofanira kuburitsa humbowo hwemagwaro ekuzvivisa zvakubuda musarudzo panzvimbo yega yega yakavhotera vanhu munyika uye magwaro avo anofanira kufanana neeZec pamwe nevamwe vakapinda musarudzo idzi. VaMadhuku vanoti matare anosungirwa kupedza nyaya iyi mukati memasvondo maviri uye panguva iyi VaMnangagwa ndivo vanenge vari mutungamiriri wenyika. Vanoongorora zvematonerwo enyika vakazvimirira, VaJoy Mabenge, vaudza Studio7 kuti sekunzwa kwavari kuita, MDC Alliance ine humbowo hwekuti sarudzo idzi dzakabiridzirwa, uye kana humbowoi uhwu hukatambirwa nematare bato iri rinogona kubudirira. Asi vanoti zvinogana kunetsa kana MDC Alliance ikatadza kuburitsa humbowo. Sachigaro veZec, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, vakati VaMnangagwa vakawana 50.8 percent, ukuwo VaChamisa vachiwana 44.3 percent musarudzo yemutungamiriri wenyika yaikwikwidzwa nevanhu makumi maviri nevatatu, kusanganisira VaMadhuku.

headline: Muzvare Lynda Masarira Opika Jeri Achibva Kumba
text: Murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu uye ari mutungamiri wesangano remadzimai ari munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika reZimbabwe Women in Politics Alliance, Muzvare Lynda Masarira, vatongerwa kugara mujeri kwegore nemwedzi mitanhatu mushure mekubatwa nemhosva pakuratidzira kwakaitika gore rapera. Dare ramejasitiriti rekuMbare muHarare ratura mutongo wekuti Muzvare Masarira vagare mujeri kwegore nemwedzi mitanhatu mushure mekubatwa nemhosva yekukanganisa kufamba kwevanhu nemotokari kwavanonzi vakakonzeresa pakuratidzira kwakaitwa gore rapera mumusha weMufakose pakaramwa veruzhinji mabasa kwemazuva maviri. Asi mimwe mwedzi minomwe yasendekwa parutivi vachinzi vasapare mhosva yakadai zvakare mukati memakore mashanu ari kutevera. Dare rati pamwedzi gumi nemumwe yasara, Muzvare Masarira vanogona kuipika kana kuti vonoshanda pachena paMarlborough Clinic kubva na8 dzemangwani kusvika 4 dzemasikati kwemasvondo gumi nemaviri. Muzvare Masarira, avo vasarudza kunoshanda pachena sezvaturwa nedare, vaudza Studio7 kuti vachapikisa kubatwa kwavo nemhosva pamwe nemutongo uyu vachiti paitwa chavati chitororo pakutongwa kwenyaya yavo. Muzvare Masarira vakasungwa zvichitevera kuratidzira kwakaitika muna Chikunguru gore rapera mushure mekuramwa mabasa kwemazuva maviri kwakakurudzirwa nemasangano akaita se Hashtag ThisFlag pamwe neTajamuka. No media source currently available

headline: Mufundisi Oramba Ari Mutirongo Mushure Mekutadza Kuunganidza Mari yeChibatiso
text: Pastor Patrick Phillip Mugadza, avo vakasungwa neChishanu chapfuura mushure mekuratidzira kuVictoria Falls, vachiri muhusungwa mushure mekukundikana kuunganidza mari yechibatiso yakatarwa nedare. Mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti kuVictoria Falls, Amai Lindiwe Maphosa, neChipiri vakazotara madhora mazana mashanu semari inofanirwa kubhadharwa naVaMugadza kuti vakwanise kutongwa vari kunze. Pastor Mugadza, vanove mukuru weRemnant Church iri kuKariba, vakasungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita zvisina maturo kana kuti criminal nuisance, vachinzi vakatyora Section 46 of Criminal Law (Codification and Reform) Act Chapter 9:23. Mfundisi ava vakasungwa mushure mekunge varatidzira kumusangano wepagore weZanu PF vaine chinyorwa chakanzi “Mr President The People Are Suffering, Proverbs 21.13”. Sangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, iro riri kumirira mufundisi uyu, rinoshora zvikuru kumbunyikidzwa kwekodzero dzaPastor Mugadza. Mutauriri wesangano iri, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vanoti bumbiro remitemo idzva rinobvumidza munhu kuita sezvakaitwa naPastor Mugadza pamwe naVaItai Dzamara, avo vaikurudzirawo VaMugabe kuti vasiye chigaro. VaMafunda vanoti gweta riri kumirira Pastor Mugadza, VaThulani Nkala veZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, vave kuronga kukwira kumatare makuru kuti atarisisewo nezvenyaya iyi. VaDzamara vairatidzirawo vari muAfrica Unity Square vachikurudzira kuti VaMugabe vasiye basa vachiti vari kutadza kutonga. Asi vakazotsakatika mushure mekupambwa nevanhu vasingazivikanwi musi wa 9 Kurume wegore rino. Pastor Mugadza vakanzi vadzoke zvakare kudare nemusi wa 5 Ndira 2016. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inovhota Ichiramba Kutambira Chisungo cheUN Chinorambidza Kupondwa kweMarudzi, Kuparwa kweMhosva dzeHondo neZvimwe
text:
Zimbabwe imwe yenyika gumi neshanu dzakavhota dzichipikisa kutambirwa kwechisungo cheUnited Nations General Assembly chinorambidza kupondwa kwevanhu, kuparwa kwemhosva dzehondo pamwe nerusarura pakati pemarudzi. Asi chisungo ichi chakabudirira zvichitevera kutambirwa kwachakaitwa nemusi weChipiri nenyika zana negumi neshanu dzinosanganisira vavakidzani veZimbabwe, South Africa neBotswana.

Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vari mukuru weMedia Center, VaEnerst Mudzengi, vati chisungo chakatambirwa neUnited Nations ichi chinopa nyika dziri musangano iri mukana wekuyamura zvizvarwa zvedzimwe nyika kana zvave kushungurudzwa nehurumende dzazvo.

Mudzidzisi mukuru pachikoro cheUnversity of Zimbabwe uye vari mukuru
weMass Public Opinion of Zimbabwe, Professor Eldred Masunungure, vati kuvhota kweZimbabwe kune chekuita nekusada kuferefetwa kwenyika munyaya dzemhirizhonga dzakaitika musarudzo dzakapfuura. Zimbabwe ine nhoroondo yemhirizhonga inozivikanwa pasi rose zvichitevera kupondwa kwakaitwa vanhu munguva yeGukurahundi kumatunhu eMatabeleland neMidlands, iyo yakasiya vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi maviri vafa. Pane mhirizhonga yakaitikawo muna 2000 apo bato idzva reMovement for Democratic Change, MDC, rakatyorerwa kodzero dzenhengo dzaro, dzimwe nhengo dzebato iri dzinoti Talent Mabika naMorgan Chiminya dzikaurayiwa mumhirizhonga yakaitika kuBuhera. Vakauraya vaviri ava vanozivikanwa asi havana kusungwa. Muna 2005 vanhu vakaputsirwa dzimba dzavo nehurumende izvo zvakasiya vanhu vanodarika mazana manomwe ezviuru vasina pekugara, uye vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nemazana mana ezviuru vakasara vavhiringwa neOperation Murambatsvina. Sangano reUnited Nations rakatumira nhumwa rayo, Amai Anna Tibaijuka, avo vakaburitsawo gwaro raishora zvainge zvaitwa nehurumende yeZimbabwe. Muna 2008 zviuru nezviuru zvenhengo dzeMDC zvakaparadzirwa dzimba, kutorera zvipfuyo pamwe nekufirwa nehama mumhirizhonga yakaitika musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika yakadzokororwa mushure mekunge mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vakunda vaive mutungamiri wenyika panguva iyi, muchakabvu Robert Mugabe, nemavhoti anonzi aive pasi pemavhoti anotarisirwa nemutemo kuitira kuti munhu anzi akunda sarudzo iyi zviri pamutemo. VaTsvangirai vakabuda musarudzo iyi vachiti havangarambe vari musarudzo yaiurayisa vatsigiri vavo. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo,
vati kuvhota kwakaita Zimbabwe muGeneral Assembly kunoburitsa pachena kuti vatungamiri vemunyika vanofarira kupondwa kwezvizvarwa zvemunyika.

Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika,
VaFredrick Shava, kana gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, sezvo mbozhanhare dzavo dzanga dzisingadavirwe. Asi mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaGeorge Charamba, vanyora
padandemutande ravo kuti kuvhota kweZimbabwe kuUnited Nations
kwakazembera panhoroondo yenyika, zvakadzidzwa nenyika
mukushamwaridzana kwayo nedzimwe nyika pamwe nemanzwisisiro anoita vatungamiri munyaya dzepasi rose. Asi vachangotora mhiko kuti vave nhengo yekomisheni yekuregererana, reZimbabwe Peace and Reconciliation Commission, VaObert Gutu, vati vanotambira danho reZimbabwe. Dzimwe nyika dzavhota dzichipesana nedanho iri dzinosanganisira
Russia, Cuba, Nicaragua, Burundi, North Korea, Egypt nedzimwe idzo
dzinonzi nevezvematongerwo enyika dziri pasi pehurumende dzinotonga
nechisimba. Gore rapera, Zimbabwe yakava nyika yoga yemuAfrica yakapikisa chisungo cheGeneral Assembly chekuomesera Myanmar nepamusana perusarura rudzi kwairi kuita munyika iyi. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Alliance Inoshora SADC Pakusaita Hurukuro yeZviri Kunetsa muZimbabwe
text: Zvichitevera kupera kwemusangano wevatungamiri venyika dzeSADC pasina zvataurwa pamusoro pezviri kuitika muZimbabwe, bato guru rinopikisa, reMDC Alliance, rinoti zvinorishamisa kuti vatungamiri veSADC vakaregera kukurukura zviri kunetsa muZimbabwe kunyange hazvo mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vakaona zvakakodzera kutuma nhumwa dzavo ku Zimbabwe kunoita hurukuro pamusoro penyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. Mugwaro ravatumira kuvatori venhau, vanoona nezvekudyidzana nevekunze mubato reMDC Alliance, Muzvare Gladys Hlatywayo, vanoti hurumende yaVaEmerson Mnangagwa iri kushandisa dambudziko re COVID-19 senzira yekudzvanyirira vanhu munyika. Muzvare Hlatywayo vanoti vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, vatori venhau, magweta, vanomirira vashandi nevemasangano anomirira vanhu, vemakereke nevemapato anokwikwidza vanoshungurudzwa apo vachiita mabasa avo zviri pasi pemutemo. Muzvare Hlatywayo vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo richaramba richiedza kuita hurukuro neSADC, pamwe chete nevatungamiri venyika dziri musangano iri nevamwe, kusvika nyaya yeZimbabwe yagadziriswa. No media source currently available  Asi sachigaro vebato re Zanu-PF muNorth America, VaRegis Charumbira, vanoramba mashoko ese ataurwa mugwaro reMDC Alliance, vachiti chirwere cheCOVID-19 hachisi chekutamba nacho, naizvozvo hurumende inoisa mirairo inodzikisa mafambiro evanhu kuti ibatsire mukuchengetedza hupenyu hwevanhu vayo.  VaCharumbira vanoti SADC haina kukurukura pamusoro peZimbabwe nekuti muZimbabwe hamuna dambudziko rinokodzera kukurukurwa. No media source currently available

headline: ZPP: Mapurisa Aityora Kodzero Zvikuru Mauto Asati Apindira
text: Sangano re Zimbabwe Peace Project, ZPP, rinoti kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika kwakadzikira mumwedzi wa Mbudzi, panguva iyo kurwisana mubato reZanu PF kwaitsviriridza. Sachigaro weZPP, VaOkay Machisa, vanoti kunyange hazvo kupindira kwakaitwa nemauto kwakadzikisa kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu zvakanyanya, shuviro yavo ndeyekuona mauto achidzokera kunogara kubharaki awo. VaMachisa vanotiwo huwandu hwevanhu vakamhang'ara vachiti vakanga vasiri kubatwa zvakanaka nemauto hwakakwirira. Vati ongororo yavakaita inoratidza kuti mapurisa aityora kodzero dzevanhu zvikuru mauto asati apindira. No media source currently available

headline: Vaive Varwiri veHondo yeRusununguko Vapfumbamwe Vange Vari Muhusungwa Voregererwa
text: Gweta riri kumirira vaimbove varwiri vehondo yerusununguko vapfumbamwe vange vari muhusungwa, VaPaidamoyo Saurombe, vanoti vsungwa ava vazoregedzwa vahienda kudzimba dzavo nhasi mambakwedza kunyangwe hazvo vange vambonzi vachamiswa pamberi pedare. VaSaurombe vanoti zvinhu zvinokatyamadza kuti vaive varwiri verusununguko vanobatwa nekuseri kweruoko zvakadayi panguva ino yeCovid-19. VaSaurombe vaudza Studio7 kuti zvakanga zvichiitwa nevanhu ava zvakange zviri pamutemo sezvo vakange vachida kunyatsonzwa zvizere pamusoro pemari dzavanopihwa idzo vanoti dzishoma.    Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Varume Vari Kupomerwa Mhosva yeKuuraya Musoja kuChivhu Vanonzi Vapfurwa Vakafa neMauto neMapurisa
text: Varume vaviri vakapfura masoja maviri mumwe wacho akafa muChivhu nezuro\nvapfurwa vakafa nhasi kuNyazvidzi pedyo nekuBuhera. Nunurai Jena\nanotipa nyaya inotevera. Vaviri ava, avo vasati vave kuzivikanwa mazita avo vapfurwa nemasoja achibatsirana nemapurisa. Mutauriri wemapurisa Asst Comm Paul Nyathi vabvuma kuti vaviri ava vapfurwa vose vakafa uye pfuti dzavakatora dzawanikwa vachinadzo. Masoja maviri aya akapfurwa pane imwe kamba yemapurisa diki pedyo neChicken Inn kuChivhu. Kamba yemapurisa iyi ine mauto nemapurisa ari kubatsirana kuona kuti vanhu vatevedzera here kurudziro yekuti vagare mudzimba senzira yekutevedzera mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. VaNyathi vanoti munhu akapfura mauto aya akapinda pakamba apa ndokukumbira mumwe muuto kuti vataura panze ndokuzodzoka mukamba vose achibva apfura nekuuraya mumwe muuto mumwe akakuvara zvakaipisisa asati atiza nemumwe wake. Kupfurwa kwemasoja uku kuri kuuya apo hukama hwevanhu nemasoja husina kumira zvakanaka nekuda kwekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kuri kupomerwa mamwe masoja munyika. Makore maviri apera mugore ra2018 muna Nyamavhuvhu vanhu vatanhatu vakapfurwa vakafa nevanofungidzirwa kuti masoja vachiratidzira asi hapana musoja akasungwa kunyange pakaitwa ongororo yaitungamirwa nevaive mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaKgalema Mothlanthe. Asi vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 vati kunyangwe vanhu vakanetsana hapafanire kudeurwa ropa sezvo paine matare anofanira kutonga nyaya dzose. Gweta uye vari mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaDzikamai Bere vanoti hukama hwevanhu nemasoja hauna kunaka zvachose vachiti hukama uhu hunofanirwa kugadziriswa kuti vanhu vakwanise kuyamura mapurisa nemasoja mubasa ravo. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC Alliance VaClifford Hlatswayo vanoti masoja, mapurisa nevanhu vanofanirwa kuremekedzana kuti nyika ifambire mberi zvakanaka. Mamwe magweta ataura neStudio 7 ati kufa kwevanhu vakuraya muuto uku kuchapa kuti nyika isazive kuti chii chaizvo chakapa kuti padeuke ropa asi vachiti zvinonetsa kubata vanhu vanenge vachipomerwa mhosva yekuuraya uye vaine pfuti. Vanhu nemasoja vakamboita hukama hwakasimba apo masoja akabatsira kupidigura vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika mushakabvu Robert Mugabe. Asi vamwe vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vanoti masoja haafanire kupindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika sezvinokurudzirwa nebumbiro remitemo. Nezure wakare vamwe vanhu vakaonekwa vakatakura nekumhanyisa muuto ainge akuvara kuchipatara.

headline: MDC T Yoshora Mashoko eGurukota reDunhu reManicaland, Muzvare Chimene
text: Bato rinopikisa reMDC-T rinoti riri kunyorera mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, tsamba yenyunyuto pamusoro pemashoko anonzi akautaurwa negurukota rinoona nedunhu reManicaland, Muzvare Mandiitawepi Chimene, ekuti vachavharisa mabhizimusi everudzi rwechi India kana vakaramba vasingapinde mumisangano yavari kushevedzera. Vachitaura pamashoko avo ekutambira mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko, mudunhu ravo svondo rapera, Muzvare Chimene vakati vemabhizimusi ava vari kuramba kupinda mumisangano yavari kushevedzera, vakati vari kuvapa mazuva mashanu chete ekuti vasangane navo, kutadza kwavo kuita izvi mabhizimusi avo aizovharwa. Asi mutauriri weMDC T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti mashoko aMuzvare Chimene ane rusarura, uye vanhu ivava ndivo vashoma vevasara vachiri kuwanisa vanhu mabasa munyika zvichitevera kuvharwa kwemakambani akawanda. Studio7 yaedza kubata Muzvare Chimene asi tanzi tivabate neChipiri sezvo vanzi vanga vari mumusangano. VaGutu vanoti aka hakasi kekutanga kuti Muzvare Chimene vatyisidzire vanhu. Vanoti pavakainda muhofisi, Muzvare Chimene vakatyisidzira vemakambani anochera mangoda kwaChiadzwa kuti vasapinze nhengo dzeMDC mabasa, vachinzi vakati vanenge vatsaudzira vaizotorerwa marezinesi avo. VaGutu vanoti gurukota iri rakatyisidzira zvakare vekanzuru yeMutare nemashoko ekuti rinoda kuumba imwe kanzuru inenge iri pasi paro, isina nhengo dzeMDC. No media source currently available

headline: Botswana Yomakidza Vapoteri Kudzokera Kumusha Kwavo
text: Hurumende yeBotswana inoti ichaita musenga bere kune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe izvo zviri muhupoteri munyika iyi kana zvikasasarudza kunyoresa kuti zvidzoserwe kumusha musi wa31 Zvita usati wapera. Asi hurongwa hweBotswana uhwu hwuri kushoropodzwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu pamwe nevapoteri avo vanoti vakatiza mhirizhonga nekumbunyikidzwa munyika nenhengo dzebato rinotonga reZANU PF. Mudzidzisi wemitemo paGaborone University College of Law and Professional Studies, VaCharles Kungwengwe, vanoti danho iri rinoratidza kuti hurumende yeBotswana hairemedzi zvisungo zvakaitwa nesangano remubatanidzwa wenyika dzepasi rose, reUnited Nations. Sangano rinochengetedza kodzero dzevapoteri pasi rose reUnited Nations High Commissioner of Refugees rakasunga kuti hakuna nyika inofanirwa kumanikidza kudzosera vapoteri kwavakatiza kana paine kuratidza kuti hupenyu hwavo huri munjodzi nokuda kwezvematongerwo enyika kana chii zvacho. Chisungo ichi chakaitwa musi wa23 Nyamavhuvhu 1977 chichitsigira chimwe chisungo che United Nations Convention chakaitwa muna 1951. Imwewo nyanzvi munyaya dzekodzero dzevapoteri uye vachidzidzisa mitemo paUniversity of Botswana, VaTakudzwa Matambo, vashoropodza danho reBotswana vachiti vapoteri ava vanogona kukwidza nyaya yavo kumatare edzimhosva vachipikisa zviri kuitwa neBotswana. Mukokeri wesangano remubatanidzwa wemapato anorwira kodzero dzevashandi muBotswana, reBotswana Federation of Trade Unions, VaGadzani Mhotsa, vanoti hurumende yeBotswana yatora danho iri isana kutsanangurira veruzhinji kuti yakaongorora here mamiriro ezvinhu muZimbabwe kana kuti kwete. Mutauriri wevari muhupoteri muBotswana, VaBhekimpilo Weza, vaudza Studio7 kuti hurumende yeBotswana haisi kuda kuteerera nhunha dzeavo vakatiza mhirizhonga yakaitika munyika mushure mesarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika yakadzokororwa muna 2008. Vapoteri vari muBotswana vazhinji vakatiza kuZimbabwe muna 2008, vazhinji vavo vachiti vatsigiri veMDC vakatiza misha yavo mushure mekurayirwa hama dzavo mumhirizhonga yakaitika mugore iri. Mukuru anoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwevapoteri muhurumende yeBotswana, Amai Gloria Letlhage, vanoti Botswana iri kuita hurongwa uhu zviri pamutemo asi varamba kutsanangura kuti sei vachidaro. Asi Botswana inoti mupoteri anenge asina kuzvipira kudzokera ega kumusha kwake panopera gore rino, anozoita zvekumakidzwa kudzoserwa kuZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: VaZuma Votarisirwa muZimbabwe neMusi weChina
text: Hurumende yeSouth Africa nemusi weMuvhuro yakaburitsa mashoko ekuti mutungamiri wenyika iyi VaJacob Zuma vari kutarisirwa kupinda muZimbabwe nemusi weChina kuzoita misangano yekudyidzana nemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. VaZuma vachaenda nemakurukota akawanda anosanganisa gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika amai Maite Nkoana-Mashabane, gurukota rezvekuchengetedzwa kwenyika amai Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika VaRob Davies; gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaMalusi Gigaba, gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvino VaDipuo Peters uye gurukota rezvevashandi Amai Mildred Oliphant. Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika VaMike Bimha vanoti vanofunga kuti musangano uyu uchabatsira nyika mbiri idzi. No media source currently available

headline: Mutewedzeri weMutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, Vanosungwa Vachipomerwa Mhosva Yekutuka Mumwe Mudzimai
text: Mashoko atichangotambira anoti mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, vasungwa nemapurisa vachipomerwa mhosva yekurova mumwe muzvinabhizimusi wechidzimai, Amai Tatiana Aleshina. Mutaururu weMDC Alliance, Muzvare Fadzai Mahere vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaBiti vari mumaoko emapurisa anoona nezvemutemo nekugadzikana, kana kuti Law and Order, uko vanonzi vachiri kubvunzurudzwa. Muzvare Mahere vanoti VaBiti vari kunzi vakarova mudzimai uyu, asi magwaro emapurisa ekuvarovera mhosva, kana kuti charge sheet, ari kuti vakatuka mudzimai uyu mushure mekunge vaita kutaudzana vari panze pedare reHarare Magistrate Courts. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi kuti tinzwe divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. Takundikanawo kubata gweta raVaBiti, VaAlec Muchadehama sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga isiri kuita. VaBiti vanotarisiorwa kumiswa pamberi pedare neMugovera.

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Vanoti muZimbabwe Hamuna Runyararo
text: Nyika dzepasi rose dzacherechedza zuva rerunyararo pasi rose, kana kuti International Day of Peace. Asi vakawanda vanoti hapana runyararo muZimbabwe nekuda kwezvehupfumi nezvematongerwo enyika zvisina kumira zvakanaka. Vakawanda vanoti munyika hamuna runyararo nekuda kwezvinhu zvakawanda zvinosanganisira kufa kwevanhu vakawanda nechirwere chekorera, kushaya mari kumabhangi, kutadza kutenga zvekudya nekuda kwemitengo yakakwira, pamwe nekumbunyikidzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kwakaitwa musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. VaClifford Jabangwe vanoti hapana runyararo munyika panguva ino apo mapurisa ari kuswera achitandanisa vanhu vanotengesa zvinhu zvavo mumigwagwa. VaJabangwe vanoti vanhu vakawanda vari kushungurudzwa mupfungwa. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaPassmore Nyakureba, vanoti runyararo zvinoreva kugadzikana kwezvinhu mupfungwa nemanzwiro evanhu kana vachirarama munyika. VaNyakureba vanoti vanhu vakawanda hapana chavanopemberera zuva rerunyararo ivo vachirara mumitsetse yemabhangi vachitsvaka mari, vechidiki vasina mabasa uye kuzvipatara vanhu vachifa nekushaya mishonga. Vamwe vagarii vanoti kuurayiwa kwevanhu nemasoja vachiratidzira muHarare mwedzi wapera mucherechedzo wekuti munyika hamuna runyararo. Asi mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi, VaLangton Mubaiwa, vanoti munyika mune runyararo. VaMubaiwa vanoti zviri kuita mapurisa zvekubvisa vanotengesera mumigwagwa idanho rekuisa runyararo munyika. Chiyero chenyika dzine runyararo cheGlobal Peace Index 2018 chinoratidza kuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzakawanda hadzina runyararo rwakakwana sezvinotarisirwa. Global Peace Index 2018 inoratidza kuti Iceland nedzimwe nyika dzakaita seNew Zealand, Austria, Portugal neDenmark ndidzo dziri pamusoro kuve nerunyararo pasi rose. Syria ndiyo inonzi ine mhirizhonga yakawanda pasi rose pamwe nenyika dzakaita seAfghanistan, South Sudan, Iraq pamwe neSomalia. Zuva reInternational Day of Peace rinocherechedzwa musi waGunyana 21 gore rega rega, uye gore rino ndereche makumi manomwe kubva pakatarwa zuva iri kuti richerechedzwe nenyika dzose zdiri muUnited Nations. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weNyika VaMnangagwa Vonanga kuMaputo kuMusangano weSADC Troika
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kusimuka vakananga kuMaputo kumusangano weSADC Double Troika, uyo uri kutarisirwa kuzeya dambudziko rekusagadzikana kwakatarisana nedunhu rekuchamhembe kweAfrica pamwe nehondo iri mudunhu reCabo Delgado muMozambique. Nhepfenyuro yeZBC inoti VaMnangagwa vachatungamira chikwata cheZimbabwe chichange chichinopinda mumusangano uyu. Mozambique ndiyo ine husachigaro hweSADC Troika pari zvino, uye Malawi ndiyo yave kuzotarisirwa kutora chigaro ichi. SADC iri kutarisirwa kutumira mauto kudunhu reCabo Delgabo kuitira kuti abatsire hurumende yeMozambique kupedza hondo yakakonzerwa nevanopfurikidza mwero, iyo yasiya vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matanhhatu vatiza misha yavo. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa mavhinga, vanoti zvakakosha kuti VaMnangagwa vabatane nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuSADC kumusangano uyu, asi vatungamiri ava havafanirwe kukanganwawo kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu vavo. No media source currently available

headline: Mapato Anopikisa Okurudzira Vanhu Kugara Kumba neMugovera
text: Mapato mana makuru anopikisa akurudzira neChishanu veruzhinji munyika kuti vacherechedze zuva rakawana nyika kuzvitonga neMugovera vari kudzimba dzavo achiti haazi kuzopinda mumhemberero dzakarongwa nehurmende yeZanu PF sezvo bato iri richishandisa mukana uyu kunyomba vamwe. No media source currently available Mapato aya anoti MDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, Mavambo Kusile Dawn, ZAPU neNational Consitutional Assembly anoti zvinosuwisa kuti vammwe vakarwira hondo yerusununguko vave kushungurudza vamwe vavo vechitema. Vachiverenga mashoko emapato ayo pachiitiko chapindwa naVaTsvangirai nemukuru weMKD VaSimba Makoni, munyori kukuru muMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vati hapana chekupemberera sesvo vanhu vari kuyaura nenhamo nenzara. Vatiwo mapato avo azvipira kushanda pamwe chete kuti asunungure vanhu kubva kuhutongi hweZanu PF. Vakurudzira vanhu kuti vacherechedza zuva iri mudzvimba dzavo sezvo pasina chikonzero chekuenda kumhemberero dzinorongwa neZanu PF mumatunhu akasisyana siyana munyika. VaTsvangirai vati vaimbosienda kumhemberero idzi apo vaive muhurumende yemubatanidzwa asi vakazowona kuti hazvibatsiri sezvo vainyombwa pamhemberero idzi. Mutauririri weNCA, VaMaddock Chivasa,vati kutambura kuri kuita zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvichenda kunze kwenyika uko zviri kushungurudzwa sezviri kuitika kuSouth Africa pari zvino kunoratidza pachena kuti hurumende haina hanya nezvido zveveruzhinji. Asi bato ReZanu PF rinoti zvinhu zviri kufamba zvakanaka munyika uye richaita mhemberero kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium muHarare apo mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vanotarisirwa kutaura. Munyori anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mubato iri, VaIgnatius Chombo, vanoti mhemberero idzi dzichaitwa pasi pedingindira rinosimbaradza kubatana, runyararo pamwe nekuzvida seznyika. Makurukota ematunhu anotarisirwawo kutaura mashoka aVaMugabe mumatunhu ese munyika.

headline: VaChiwenga Vanoviga Magamba Matatu paHeroes Acre
text: Vakafananobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantine Chiwenga, varadzika magamba matatu ehondo yerusununguko vachiudza nyika kuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chave nehukasha hwakanyanya. Chirwere ichi chakauraya vaive gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, vaive kurugukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaJoe Biggie Matiza, pamwe nevaive mukuru wemajeri, VaParadzai Zimondi, avo vavigwa semagamba ehondo. Vachiviga vatatu ava paHeroes Acre, VaChiwenga vati aka ndekekutanga izvi zvichiitika uye zvakonzerwa nedenda reCovid-19. Vati zvinosuwisa kuti vaviga mamwe magamba nhasi mushure mekuradzika mamwe magamba maviri nguva pfupi yapfuura anoti, VaMorton Malianga, pamwe nevaive gurukota redunhu reManicaland, Amai Ellen Gwardzimba, avo vakshaya mushure mekubatwawo neCovid-19. VaChiwenga vati Covid-19 yavadzidzisa kuti munhu wese anofa sezvo iri kuuraya varombo nevapfumi. Vati zvava kuda kuti vanhu vose vabatane mukurwisa denda iri kuti Zimbabwe ikunde chirwere ichi. VaChiwenga vati magamba matatu aya kashanda zvakasimba kuti veruzhinji vave neraramo yakanaka kubva muna 1980 kusvika pakushaya kwavo. Vatsanangura VaMoyo semunhu aidadisa kushanda naye vakati kunyange vakabuda muchiuto, vakaramba vachiita basa guru rekugadzirisa hukama hweZimbabwe nedzimwe nyika. Vatiwo VaZimondi vakavandudza nekusimudzira majeri munyika. VaChiwenga vatiwo VaMatiza vange vari kuita basa guru rekugadzirisa migwagwa nenhandare munyika. VaMoyo vakashaya musi wa21 Ndira, VaMatiza naVaZimondi vakashaya musi wa22 Ndira. Kunyange hazvo mitemo weWorld Health Organisation uchiti vanofan neCovid-vanofanira kuvigwa mukati memazuva matatu, vatatu ava vachengetwa mazuva aya adarika. Mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vatii mutemo unofanira kutevedzwa zvisinei kuti munhu igamba here kana kuti kwete. Vatiwo hurumende inofanira kutenga mishonga yenhomba yeCovid-19 pajekerere. Vati hurumende inofanira kuzivisa veruzhinji kuti mishonga ichashandiswa ichange ichibva kumakambani api uye kutsanangurira vanhu kuti hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba iyi huchange hwakamira sei. Zvichakadai, vatori venhau vese vaenda kuHeroes Acre vaongororwa paHeroes Acre pakare kuti vane hutachiwana hweCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Inoti Vanhu vemuZimbabwe Ngavabatane Kukurudzira VaMugabe Kubva paChigaro Vachishandisa Nzira Dziri paMutemo
text: Bato rinopikisa reMDC-T rakaburitsa mashoko kuvatori venhau nemusi weMuvhuro richiti mhuri yeZimbabwe inofanira kubatana yoshandisa nzira dzose dziri pamutemo kuti vamanikidze mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nevamwe vari muhurumende yavo kuti vasiye basa nekuti vakundikana kutonga. MDC-T yati iri kushora zvikuru vanhu veZanu-PF vari kuda kufora nemusi weChitatu vachiratidza kuti vari kutsigira VaMugabe mukufora kwavanoti Million Man March. VeMDC-T vati vanhu veZanu-PF ava vanofanira kufora vachiti VaMugabe vaende pamudyandigere. Vati hurumende yaVaMugabe yaendesa nyika kumawere munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye iri kutonga nedemo. Mutauriri weMDC-T VaObert Gutu vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato reZanu-PF rapererwa nemazano nekudaro rinofanira kukanda mapfumo pasi. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association VaVictor Matemadanda vati vave kukurudzira nhengo dzebato ravo kuti dzibatane nevamwe mukuratidzira uku. Vakarwa hondo yerusununguko vaimbe vatsika madziro vachiti havatenderana nekufora uku sezvo vaiti vamwe vechidiki vebato iri vane pamuromo pasingamharwe nenhunzi. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoudza African Union Kuti Vari Kuchengetedza VaMugabe Zvakanaka
text: Mutungami wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakapinda mumusangano wavo wekutanga kuAfrican Union kuAddis Ababa, Ethiopia nemusi weSvondo. Musangano wechimakumi matatu kana kuti 30th AU Assembly wevatungamiri wenyika watanga. No media source currently available Vachitaura pamusangano uyu VaMnangagwa vakaudza vamwe vatungamiri venyika kuti vaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakachengetedzeka. Izvi zvakatambirwa nemufaro nevamwe vatungamiti venyika dzemuAfrica. Vachitaura nemusi weMugovera pamusangano weNew Partnership for Africa’s Development kana kuti NEPAD, VaMngangagwa vakati Zimbabwe yakazvipira kutevedzera zviga zveAfrican Union. Vakatiwo Zimbabwe yakazvipira kushanda nedzimwe nyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Asi vanotungamira sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica VaDewa Mavhinga vaudza Studio 7 kuti vatungamiri veAU ava vanofanira kukurudzira VaMnangagwa kuti vaite sarudzo dzakachena. No media source currently available

headline: VaMkwananzi Vanobvisiswa Mari yeChibatiso
text: Nhengo ye Tajamuka, Va Promise Mkwananzi, vabvisiswa mari yechibatiso inoita madhora makumi mashanu kuitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba. Va Mkwananzi vakasungwa pa Media Center muHarare neChishanu masikati apo vaitaura nevatori venhau vachiburitsa kusafara kwavo nemabatirwo ari kuitwa vanotengesera zvinhu zvavo mumigwagwa. VaMkwamanzi vanoti vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita mhirizhonga muHarare musi wakapfurwa vanhu nemasoja vakafa apo vatsigiri veMDC Alliance vairatidzira vachiti havasi kufara nemabatirwo aiitwa zvaibuda musarudzo neZimbabwe Electoral Commission. VaMkwananzi vanoti pakaitika kuratidzira uku ivo vaive kumba vachiona paterevhizheni zvaibuda musarudzo. Vanotiwo havasi kufara nemabatirwo avakaitwa nemapurisa, uye vasvitsa nyaya iyi mudare kuitira kuti iongororwe. No media source currently available

headline: VaMusendekwa Vovimbisa Hupenyu Hunotapira kuVagari vekuGutu South
text: Imwe nhengo yeMDC Alliance inoti hupenyu hwevanhu vekumaruwa huchange huchinakidza kana mubatanidzwa wavo ukakunda Zanu PF iyo vanoti ndiyo yakaunza hurombo muvanhu. Vachitaura pamusangano waitirwa paPengaudzoke muGutu South, vari kumirira MDC Alliance musarudzo yemumiri weGutu South muparamende, VaErium Musendekwa, vati hurumende yaVaNelson Chamisa ichapedza hurombo huri kuvhiringa hupenyu hwevanhu vari kumaruwa. VaMusendekwa vatiwo Pengaudzoke inzvimbo yakasaririra nepamusana pekuti Zanu PF iri kutadza kuunza budiriro. VaMusendekwa varatidza kutsutsumwa pamusangano uyu, apo pabuda mashoko ekuti vatsigiri venhengo ichavakwikwidza ye Zanu PF, VaPupurai Togarepi, vaifamba mudzimba dzevanhu vachivatyityidzira kuti vasaende kumusangano weMDC Alliance. Asi VaMusendekwa vaudza vatsigiri vavo kuti vasatyityidzirwe, uye kuti vamhangare nyaya iyi kuvaongorori vesarudzo ve Eurpean Union vange vari pamusangano uyu. Mumwe wevapinda mumusangano uyu, VaChristopher Guva, vatiwo vatsigiri veZanu PF vakati vachanyora mazita emunhu wese achaonekwa pamusangano uyu vozorakashwa sezvakamboitika muna 2008. Studio7 yakundikana kubata VaTogarepi kuti vatipe divi ravo. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rinowana Pator Mawarire Vasina Mhosva
text:
Dare rapamusoro reHigh Court ratura mutongo wekuti Mufundisi Evan Mawarire, avo vanga vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kupidgura hurumende yevaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kubudikidza nekuratidzira kwakaitika gore rapera, havana mhosva. 

Mutongi wedare repamusoro, Muzvare Priscilla Chigumba, vatura mutongo wekuti VaMawarire havana mhosva yavakapara nokudaro vave munhu akasununguka.

Muzvare Chigumba vati hapana humbowo hwakajeka hwakasvitswa kudare nemagweta ehurumende pamwe nevafakazi panyaya iyi hunoratidza kuti VaMawarire vakakurudzira vanhu kuti vabvise hurumende yaVaMugabe pachigaro vachiti mavhidhiyo ose akaratidzwa dare anoratidza kuti VaMawarire vakurudzira veruzhinji kuratidzira murunyararo vachiti izvi zvinobvumidzwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika.

Mutongi atiwo hapana humbowo hunoratidza kuti vanhu vakaita zvemhirizhonga pakuratidzirwa kwakaitwa kwemazuva maviri gore rapera kwaidaizwa kuti Shutdown Zimbabwe vakanga vakurudzirwa naVaMawarire kuti vaite mhirizhonga iyi.

Gweta raVaMawarire, VaHarrison Nkomo, vanoti vafara nemutongo waturwa nedare.

VaMawarire vanoti havafainira kunge vakatombomiswa mudare kubva pekutanga. VaMawarire vakasungwa gore rapera mushure mekuratidzira kwakatambirwa nevanhu vakawanda kusanganisira chikwata che Tajamuka. Zvichakadai, dare repamusoro rakatarisirwawo kutura mutongo nhasi wekuti ma aliens obvumirwa kunyoresa kuvhota here musarudzo dzegore rinouya kana kuti kwete. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Alliance Yokumbira Musangano neZEC
text: Mubatanidzwa unopikisa weMDC Alliance wanyora tsamba kuZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC uchikumbira kuita musangano nekomisheni iyi kuti vazeye nyaya dziri kunetsa dzakanangana nesarudzo, idzo dzasarirwa nemazuva makumi maviri nemashanu chete. Mutsamba yanyorwa naVaJameson Timba, avo vari kumiririra vari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika vakamirira MDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa kuZEC, mubatanidzwa uyu unoti uri kuda kuona gwaro richashandiswa pakuvhota uye kuti richachengetedzwa kupi. Mumashoko avo, VaTimba vanotiwo vanodawo gwaro revavhoti rine mifananidzo re Biometric Voter Registration. Sachigaro weZEC Amai Priscilla Chigumba vanoti vakagadzirira kuita musangano nemapato ose ari kukwikwidza musarudzo kuti vazeye zvichemo zvavo. VaChamisa vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter vanoti vanyorerarawo kuvatungamiri venyika dzemuSADC neAfrican Union nezvemamiriro akaita zvinhu muZimbabwe. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaMaxwell Saungweme vanoti zvichemo zvine mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance zvakakosha asi hapachina nguva yekuti zvigadziriswe sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzozeya Zvinoreva Sarudzo Dziri Kuitwa muAmerica
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika pamwe nedzehupfumi dzinoti hadzioni paine chinochinja pakudyidzana pakati peZimbabwe neAmerica zvisinei nei nekuti ndiyani akunda musarudzo idzi. Sachigaro musangano reZimbabwe Editors Forum, VaDumisani Muleya, vanoti vakawanda muZimbabwe neAfrica yose vane tarisiro yekuti vari kumirira Democratic Party musarudzo yemutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, vakunde nekuti vari kumirira Republican Party, VaDonald Trump, vanogara vachinyomba vanhu vanobva kune dzimwe nyika uye havadi kuti vanhu ava vagare muAmerica. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour Economic Development Research Institute, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vanoti hapana chichachinja zvakanyanya kunyange VaBiden, avo vakambove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, vakakunda. Vanotiwo VaTrump, avo vanova mutungamiri weAmerica pari zvino, vakakunda, vanogona kutoomesera Zimbabwe nedzimwe nyika dzepasi rese. Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika vachidzisa paUnversity of Zimbabwe, Dr Prolific Mataruse, vanoti kunyange hazvo VaTrump naVaBiden vakasiyana, vane muonero akafanana paZimbabwe. Asi vanoti zvinhu zvingatorerukira Zimbabwe pasi paVaTrump nekuti munhu anoita zvemabhizimisi uye vakasununguka kushanda nenyika dzakaoma musoro seZimbabwe izvo zvinocherechedzwa nekusangana kwavakaita nemutungamiriri weNorth Korea. Dr Mataruse vanoti America inyika inoomesera hurumende dzinotyora kodzero dzevanhu seZimbabwe, zvisineyi kuti ndiyani anenge ari mutungamiri. VaMuleya vanoti kunyange VaBiden vakakunda, zvirango zvinoramba zviripo kudzamara Zimbabwe yagadzirisa zvinodiwa pasi pemutemo wezvirango weZimbabwe Democracy and Recovery Act of 2001.
