Sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nekudziyadzana nedzimwe nyika, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaKindness Paradza, vanoti vanoziva kuti kusanduka kwemutungamiri weAmerica hakusandure zvirango kana mutemo wenyika iyi wekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika. Asi vanoti vachataura nehurumende neparamende itsva yekuAmerica kuti zvirango zvibviswe. Gurukota rinoona nekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusisio Moyo, vanoti kunyange hazvo pachimboiita kupopotedzana pakati peAmerica neZimbabwe, vari kutaurirana nenyika iyi nechinangwa chekugadzirisa hukama pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Kunyange hazvo paine zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende, America ndiyo nyika inopa rubatsiro rwakanyanya kuZimbabwe munyaya dzehutano, chikafu, dzidzo nezvimwe. Kubva muna 1980, America yapa Zimbabwe rubatsiro rwemabhiriyoni matatu nemazana mashanu ezviru zvemadhora ekuAmerica. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inoramba Kuti Pane Vanhu Vari Kupambwa Kana Kushungurudzwa Munyika
text: Hurumende inoti munyika hamuna dambudziko rekutyorwa kwedzokero dzevanhu ichi vanoti pane dambudziko iri ndevaya vasingazive zviri kuitika munyika pamwe nevanopikisa hurumende neshamwari dzavo dziri kunze kwenyika. Asi mapato anopikisa nemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu anoti pane humbowo hwakawandisa hunoratidza kuti hurumende iri kutyora kodzeo dzevanhu. Munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vati manyepo kuti munyika mune dambudziko rekutyorwa kwekodzeo dzevanhu vachiti mashoko aya ari kubva kuvavengi veZimbabwe vanozivikanwa mukati nekunze kwenyika. Vati hurumende iri kuchengetedza runyararo munyika nekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. VaMangwana vati hurumende haisi kuzorega vanhu vachiratidzira panguva ino yeCovid-19 kuti vaparadzire chirwere sezvainge zvarongwa svondo rapfuura. Vati vanhu vari kutaurisa pamusoro peZimbabwe ngavanyarare vachiti kunyika dzakaita seIndia neSouth Africa kwakatofa vanhu vakawanda hurumende dzeko dzichiedza kudzivirira kupararira kweCovid. VaMangwana vati dzimwe nyika dzepasi rese dzapindira kutaura zvisina maturo pamusoro peZimbabwe nekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe ndizvo zvakatanga kurova bembera zvichitaura manyepo pamusoro penyika yazvo. Asi mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vaudza Studio 7 ichokwadi kuti mauto nemapurisa ari kurova, kutora zvinhu zvevanhu pamwe netyora kodzero dzavo achivanda nekuti ari kudzivirira kupararira kweCovid. Mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiriri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, vati hapana munhu angataura kuti munyika hamuna mhirizhonga ivo vanhu vari kusungwa, kubhinywa, kurohwa pasina chikonzero zuva zuva.  VaBiti vatiwo veruzhinji vane humbowo hwekutyorwa kuri kuitwa kodzero nehurumende uhwo vari kutora vachishandisa mbozhanhare dzavo mazuva ose. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, VaMusa Kika, vati mashoko ehurumende ndeekuda kuramba zvinhu zviri kuitika munyika asi vakati hazvishamisa nekuti hurumende yagara isingakoshesi kodzero dzevanhu. Vatiwo kana makomisheni ehurumende anoti Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission neNational Peace and Reconciliation Commission akataura nguva pfupi yapfuura kuti munyika muri kuitika zvinhu zvisina kunaka panyaya yekodzero dzevanhu. VaKika vati vana veZimbabwe vanofanira kuramba vachitaura zvichemo zvavo kudzamara hurumende yatevedza mitemo nezviga zvekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu zvayakabvuma kutevedza pasi pemasangano eSouthern African Development Community, African Union neUnited Nations. Vatiwo zvinofadza kuti dzimwe nyika nemasangano akasiyana siyana pasi rese vave kutoudza hurumende yeZimbabwe kuti irege kumbunyikidza vanhu. Sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, iro riri kumirira vanhu vakawanda vari kusungwa pamwe nekurowa, rinoti vanhu vanodarika makumi matanhatu vakasungirwa kana kuroverwa nyaya ine chekuita nekuratidzira kwainge kwakarongwa kuitwa musi wa 31 Chikunguru.  Bato riri kutonga kuSouth Africa reAfrican National Congress pamwe nehurumende yenyika iyi, United Nations nevanyarikani pasi rese, vakatotaura kuti zviri kuitika muZimbabwe hazvina kunaka uye vari kuedza kutaura nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa kuti isiyane nezvairi kuita. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yotsika Madziro Kuti CCC Isasarudze Anofanobata Chigaro chaMeya muHarare
text: Kunetsana kurikuitika pakati pebazi rezvekutongwa kwematunhu nekanzuru yeHarare koenderera mberi vamwe vachiti zvokonzera kusabudirira kwezvirongwa zveguta kusanganisira kucheneswa kweguta. Tsamba yatambirwa nekanzuru huyewo iri mumaoko eStudio 7 kubva kubazi rezvekutongwa kwematunhu inoti, kusarudzwa kwevakafanobata chigaro chameya weHarare, VaEnock Mupamaonde vebato reCitrizens Coalition for Change nemusi weChishanu chapfuura kwakaitwa zvisiri pamutemo nekudaro zvese zviga zvakatorwa nekanzuru mumusangano uyu hazvisi pamutemo. Tsamba iyi yauya mushure mekunge VaMupamaonde vaita musangano nevatori venhau. Asi vachitaura neStudio 7 VaMupamaonde vati vakatyamadzwa zvikuru netsamba iyi vachitiwo haisi pamutemo sezvo yabva kune vakasanobata chigaro chemunyori webazi iri vachitiwo vacharamba vari pachigaro ichi sezvo vakasarudzwa zvichitevedzwa mutemo. Vatiwo zviri kuitwa izvi inzira chete yekungovhiringidza mabasa akanaka anoda kuitwa nekanzuru yavo. Tsamba iyi inotiwo bazi rezvematunhu rinoti rinocherechedza vari noti vakafanobata chigaro chameya VaStewart Mutizwa veMDC-T avo vakasarudzwa panguva iyo mamwe makanzura ainzi aitsigira mutungamiri weMDC Alliance panguva iyoyo VaNelson Chamisa akadzingwa mukanzuru naVaDouglas Mwonzora veMDC-T VaMtizwa vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo patavafonera tichida kunzwawo maonero avo panyaya iyi. Gweta VaMarufu Mandevere vaudza Studio 7 kuti hakuna chisiri pamutemo chakaitwa nemakanzura akaita musangano neChishanu vachiti guta rinofanirwa kutungamirirwawo nemunhu akasarudzwa nemakanzura akasarudzwa nevanhu. Izvi zvatsigirwawo neumwe wemakanzura eCitizen Coalition for Change VaDenford Ngadziore avo vati hapana chakaipa kuti vasarudze vakafanobata chigaro chameya vakamirira kudzoka kwameya Jacob Mafume. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu VaJuly Moyo. Asi mumwe kanzura weguta reHarare, VaMartin Matinyanya vekuMbare vakapinda pasi pebato reZanu PF vashoropodza zvakanyanya makanzura ebato reCCC vachiti varikuvhiringa mabasa ekanzuru nekuda kuchinja chinja zvakabvumirwa panguva iyo vaive vasiri makanzura, Mumusangano wavo nevatori venhau, VaMupamaonde vatetera kuvagari vemuHarare kuti vabatsirwe kuchenesa guta vachiti havana zvekushandisa zvakakwana. Vatiwo vakawirirana kutanga chirongwa chekuchenesa guta kubva china chevhiki rino kwemasondo mana. VaMupamaonde vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo kune kunyunyuta kukuru kubva kuvagari kuti kanzuru inowana mafuta ekudzingirirana nevatengesi vemumugwagwa asi vachishaya mafuta ekufambisa mota dzinotakura marara vati mari dzekanzuru dzinezvinangwa zvakasiyana-siyana nekudaro vanodzingirirana nevatengesi ava ibasawo ravo. Vatiwo mumusangano wavakaita neChishanu vakaramba zvekuti vanhu makumi matanhatu vaende kuZimbabwe International Trade Fair uko kwaifanirwa kushandisa mari yavati yaisvika zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nezvitanhatu yekuAmerica vakakurudzira kuti kuende vanhu vatanhatu chete. Asiwo vamwe vataura neStudio 7 vanoti zvisinei nechiga ichi vanhu vakaenda kuZITF vanodarika zvakatarwa nemusangano izvi. VaMupamaonde vatiwo kanzuru yavo iri kuzeya nyaya yekuti zvikamu makumi maviri nezvishanu kubva muzana zvemari inobhadharwa nenzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana dzemuguta ishande kunzvimbo idzi, No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yogadzirira Kuratidzira neMusi weChitatu muZanu-PF Muine Zinyekenyeke
text: Masangano akawanda munyika akaita seHash Tag This Flag, Tajamuka nemamwe ari kukurudzira vanhu kuti vasaende kumabasa nemusi weChitatu vachiratidza kunyunyuta kwavo nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika anoti haasi kuzodzokera kumashure nehurongwa uhu. Izvi zvinotevera kuratidzira kwakaitwa muHarare nemusi weMuvhuro vachiti vaneta nenyaya yehuori hwavanoti huri kuitwa nevakuru vehurumende nemapurisa. Mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhu vanofanira kumira tsika yekupisa nekupwanya zvinhu uye kurwisa mapurisa. Asi zvisati zvamboitika munhoroondo yenyika sangano revakarwa hondo reZimbabwe Liberation National War Veterans Association rati harione chakaipa nevanhu vanoratidzira murunyararo. Vesangano iri vatiwo havasi kufara nenyaya yekuti hurumende haisi kuvapa zvayakavavimbisa. Mutauriri wevakarwa hondo VaDouglas Mahiya vanoti nyaya yekuratidzira iri mubumbiro remitemo rakavhoterwa nevanhu vose munyika. No media source currently available Vanotungamira Hash Tag This Flag Pastor Evan Mawarire vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana kudzokera shure pahurongwa hwavo sezvo zvinhu zvaita manyama amire nerongo munyika. Mutauriri wesangano reTajamuka iro rinova mubatanidzwa wevechidiki mumapato ezvematongerwo enyika uye vemasangano akazvimira oga VaPromise Mkwananzi vanotiwo hurongwa hwavo hwekuratidzira huri kufamba zvakanaka. No media source currently available VaStan Zvorwadza vesangano reNational Vendors Union of Zimbabwe vatiwo naivo vari kutsigira kuratidzira kwemusi weChitatu. No media source currently available KuMasvingo kunonzi hakuna kumira zvakanaka sezvo vagari vari kunzi vange vabuda mudhorobha na 7 manheru emusi weChipiri. Vanhu vane chitsama vemasangano akazvimirira oga vakambosungwa vachinzi vaironga kuratidzira. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reCommunity Tolerance Reconciliation and Development (COTRAD), VaZivanai Muzorodzi vanoti vari kuenderera mberi nekuratidzira kuMasvingo. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro vechidiki muZanu-PF varikushora nyaya yekuratidzira kuri kurongwa nevanhu uku. Mutevedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvevechidiki mubato iri VaKudzanai Chipanga vakaudza nhepfenyuro yeZBC kuti vanhu havana fanire kutambira kuridziro yekuratidzira nemusi weChitatu. Vatiwo mapurisa anofanira kuona kuti munyika mune runyararo.

headline: Mumwe Mutori weNhau Opinda muSarudzo dzeMutungamiri weNyika
text: Mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira zvakare vachiitawo zvekutsikisa mimhanzi, VaTonderai Makaniwa, vanoti vari kukwikwidza sarudzo yemutungamiriri wenyika vakamirira bato ravo richangobva mukuumbwa reZimbabwe Word of Yaweh Expression, kana kuti Zimbabwe WOYE. VaMakaniwa, avo vakamboshanda kuZimbabwe Broadcasting Corporation, Joy TV, Munhumutapa African Broacasting Corporation vanoti vakagara vachida kuita zvematongerwo enyika asi kuti hutongo hwevaive mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, hwekumbunyikidza vanopikisa ndihwo hwaiita kuti vasiyane nezvematongerwo enyika panguva iyoyo. Vanoti kuenda kwaVaMugabe kwakavapa mukana wekutanga bato ravo reZimbabwe WOYE iro vati rinomirira vechidiki uye vati rinokurudzira mabasa evaimbi, vana nyanduri pamamwe nemabasa emitambo yemafirimu nezvimwe. VaMakaniwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo richakwikwidza sarudzo dzeparamende mumatunhu eBulawayo, Harare neManicaland uko rine nhengo dzakawanda pamwe nemukana wekukunda. Patavabvunza kuti vakagadzirira here kuita izvi, VaMakaniwa vati vakagadzirira uye vatove nenhengo dzichamira Zimbabwe WOYE munzvimbo idzi. Vati basa ravo harinei nekutungamira nyika. VaMakaniwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakatozivisa kuti vanoda kupinda musarudzo kuZimbabwe Electoral Commission uye pari zvino vakatounganidza mari nazvose zvinodiwa nedare reZEC rinonyoresa vanoda kukwikwidza reNomination Court. Bato raVaMakaniwa nderimwe remapato anodarika zana nemakumi mana akatarisirwa kukwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rino. Zvichakdai, vechidiki mubato reNational People Party rinotungamiririrwa naAmai Joice Mujuru vanoti namangwana vachapaurura chirongwa che#Joice is My Choice, chinove chirongwa chekutsvagira mutungamiriri webato ravo rutsigiro. Vanoona nezvekurongwa kwemisangano mubazi revechidiki muNPP, VaIan Hamandishe, vaudza Studio7 kuti chirongwa ichi chichaparurwa naAmai Mujuru kuBorrowdale. Zimbabwe ichaita sarudzo yemutungamiriri wenyika, dzeparamende nemakanzuru mukati memwedzi mishona inotevera. VeZEC vakatozivisa kuti vakanyoresa kuvhota vanofanira kunongorora kuti mazita avo ari mugwaro revavhoti here kutanga musi wa19 kusvika musi wa 29 mwedzi uno. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoshorerwa Chinono paKuvandudza Mitemo Yakaita sePOSA neAIPPA
text: Nyika dzakawanda dzakabudirira dziri kuratidza pachena kuti hadzisi kufara nekukundikana kwehurumende yeZimbabwe kuvandudza mitemo inonzi iri kutyora kodzero dzevanhu uye yezvekudyidzana munyaya dzekutengeserana. Mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, VaBrian Nichols, vanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter nhasi kuti pavanhu mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu vari muZimbabwe, vanhu zana nemakumi mana chete ndivo vakatongerwa zvirango uye America ichabvisa zvirango zvakatemerwa vatungamiri venyika chete kuburikidza nemutemo weZIDERA ndokunge vaunza hutongo hwejekerere. Kushorwa uku kwapa kuti hurumende iite chipatapata kutumira makurukota ayo kuti aite misangano nevamiriri vedzimwe nyika vachitaura nezvemitemo yavanoti vari kuvandudza kusanganisa yakaita sePOSA neAIPPA. Nezuro gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, vakasangana nevamiriri veBritain neCanada kumahofisi avo eMunhumutapa. Gurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vaudzawo Studio7 kuti vari kusangana nevamwe vamiriri vedzimwe nyika ava vachivaudza nezvavari kuita panyaya yekuvandudza mitemo. Vanoti vakatosangana nevamiriri kubva kunyika gumi dzakabudirira. No media source currently available Mutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, vari kuitawo zvimwe chetezvo. Asi vanopikisa nemasangano anoongorora zvemitemo akaita seVeritas vanoti hurumende iri kungobata vekunze kumeso nekuti hakuna zvakawanda zvairi kuvandudza. Mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri weMDC, VaTendai Biti, vanoti hurumende haina zvairi kuita kuvandudza zvinhu uye vachapikisa mabhiri ose achaunzwa kudare reparamende nekuti anopa hurumende mukana wekuramba ichimbunyikdza vanhu. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Alliance Inocherechedza Kusvitsa Makore Makumi Maviri neMaviri Kubva Pakaumbwa MDC
text: Bato reMDC Alliance nhasi rachecherechedza makore makumi maviri nemaviri kubva pakaumbwa bato reMDC muna 1999, ukuwo MDC-T ichiti ichacherechedza zuva iri mangwana. Muchakabvu Morgan Tsvangirai ndivo vakava mutungamiri weMDC wekutanga muna 1999. MDC Alliance yacherechedza zuva iri kubudikidza nemashoko aturwa nemutungamiri webato iri, Nelson Chamisa, kuvatsigiri vavo vachishandisa madandemutande sezvo vasiri kukwanisa kuita misangano nevatsigiri vavo nepamusana pechirwere cheCovid 19. VaChamisa vati rwendo rwafambwa nebato ravo rwunorwadza kubudikidza nekushungurudzwa kwenhengo dzavo asi vati vane chivimbo chekuti veruzhinji vachawana rugare kana vakakunda musarudzo dzemuna 2023. VaChamisa vati bato ravo rine hurongwa hwekugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana neveruzhinji munyika vachiti hurumende yeZanu PF yatadza kupa veruzhinji rugare kubudikidza nehuori hunonzi hwakatekeshera muhurumende. Zvichakadai, MDCT inotungamirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora inoti ichaita musangano pamuzinda webato iri paMorgan Richard Tsvangirai House mangwana apo bato iri richaitawo mhemberero dzekucherechedza kusvitsa kweMDC makore makumi maviri nemaviri bato iri raumbwa. Mutauriri waVaMwonzora, VaLloyd Damba, vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo rine basa guru rekupedzisa rwendo rwakatangwa nevamwe vavo rwekurwira shanduko vanosanganisira vashakabvu vanoti VaTsvangirai, VaGibson Sibanda, VaIsaac Matongo, Amai Getrude Mtombeni nevamwe. VaDamba vati kutsemuka nepakati kwakaita bato ravo zvichitevera mutongo wedare repamusorosoro uyo wakati VaChamisa havana kusarudzwa zviri pachena kuti vatsive VaTsvangirai, hakuvatadzise kukunda musarudzo vachiti bato ravo harisi kurwisana naVaChamisa asi kuti riri kurwisana nehutongi hwebato reZanu PF pamwe nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, Muzvare Sibongile Mgijima, vati kunyange hazvo mapoka eMDC aya akapatsanurana, MDC Alliance yaVaChamisa ndiyo ine mukana wekukunda musarudzo. Kubva zvakavambwa MDC muna 1999, bato iri harisati rakwanisa kupinda mumasimba kunyange hazvo VaTsvangirai vakamboumba hurumende yemubatanidzwa nemushakabvu VaRobert Mugabe muna 2009 zvichitevera kusafamba zvakanaka kwesarudzo dzemuna 2008 izvo zvakaita kuti nhengo dzeMDC dzakawanda dzirasikirwe nehupenyu mumhirizhonga yakaitika pamberi pesarudzo yechipiri yemutungamiri wenyika pakakunda VaTsvangirai VaMugabe musarudzo yekutanga asi vakashaya mavhoti anodiwa pamutemo kuti vanzi ndivo vahwinha sarudzo. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzezveMatongerwo eNyika Dzopesana paMaonero Adzo Pane Zviri Kukonzera Mhirizhonga muNyika
text: Imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika inoti kusamira kwezvinhu zvakanaka munyika kuri kuitika iye zvino kuri kukonzerwa nekunonoka kwehurumende kugadzirisa zvinhu, izvo zvave kuita kuti vana veZimbabwe vanyunyute. Izvi zvinotevera mhirizhonga yaitika muHarare yakonzerwa nevemakombi vanga vachinyunyuta nekuwanda kwemapurisa mumigwagwa, vanonzi vanenge vachida chioko muhomwe. Kutaridzira nemhirizhonga izvi zvinouya mazuva mashoma nyika yasangana nekumwe kuratidzira kukuru kwakaitika kuBeitbridge neChishanu chapfuura, vanhu vachinyunyuta nemutemo unorambidza vanhu kupinza zvinhu munyika. VaCharles Mutasa, avo vanoshanda vakazvimirira vanoti hurumende yakarara nezamu mumukanwa payakaregerera zvinhu zvichienda kumawere munyaya dzekuwondomoka kweupfumi, izvo zvoita kuti imukirwe nevana vayo. “Hurumende yedu yakaregerera zvinhu nekuti kana wakaona kuti kunetsa kwemari mumabhanga, hakuna kungotanga, asi kuti zvinhu zvakaitika munguva hombe,” VaMutasa vanodaro. Asi imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika uye vari sachigaro weZanu PF kuUnited Kingdom, VaNick Mangwana vanoti hurumende iri kuziva nezvematambudziko ose aya, uye iri kuita zvose zvainogona kuti igadzirise zvinhu. “Hurumende iri kuziva matambudziko ose aya, uye iri kuita zvose zvainogona kugadzirisa zvinhu. Chainokumbira chete ndechekuti vanhu vaipe nguva yekugadzirisa zvinhu,” VaMangwana vanoti zvinhu zvichanaka kubva muna Gunyana, vachiti kuuraya midziyo kuri kuitwa nevanhu vari kuratidzira hakuna zvakunobatsira. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rinoti Nyaya yeKuri Kudhindwa Magwaro eKuvhotesa Inzwikwe Chimbichimbi
text: Dare repamusoro ratura mutongo wekuti nyaya yekutengwa kwebepa rinogadziriswa gwaro rekuvhotera pamwe ne ink ichashandiswa pakuvhota musarudzo dzemwedzi unouya inzwikwe nechimbichimbi. Mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaPisirayi Kwenda, vatura mutongo uyu panyaya yakakwidzwa kudare nemutungamiri wePeople’s Democratic Party, PDP, VaTendai Biti, pamwe nemutauuriri webato iri, VaJacob Mafume, vachiti inzwikwe musi wa 30 mwedzi uno usati wadarika. VaBiti naVaMafume vakaenda kudare repamusoro vachida kuti komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, kana kuti ZEC, iise pajekerere nyaya yekutengwa kwebepa richagadziriswa mapepa ekuvhotesa pamwe ne ink ichanyikwa zvigunwe nevanhu vanenge vavhota musarudzo dzemwedzi unouya. Gweta raVaBiti naVaMafume panyaya iyi, VaJeremiah Bhamu, vaudza dare kuti nyaya iyi inofanira kunzwikwa nechimbichimbi sezvo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatotara zuva resarudzo uye vachakwikwidza musarudzo idzi vachitarisirwa kusvitsa mazita avo kudare rinotambira mazita evachada kukwikwidza musarudzo idzi re nomination court neChina. Mumapepa ari pamberi pedare, VaBiti naVaMafume vanoti kutengwa kwebepa richagadziriswa mapepa ekuvhotesa kunofanira kuitwa zviri pachena kuitira makambani ose anokwanisa kutengesera ZEC bepa iri awane mukana wakaenzana uye zvinhu zvichiitwa zviri pachena kwete zvakaitwa neZEC kuti yakangofuma yave kutaura kuti bepa iri richabva kune imwe kambani iri kuSouth Africa yaisiri kubudira veruzhinji pamwe nevemapato ezvematongerwo enyika pachena. Gweta reZEC, VaTawanda Kanengoni, vabvuma kuti nyaya iya inzwikwe nechimbichimbi pasina kupikisana naVaBamu. Zvichakadai, mapato mazhinji ari kuda kukwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rino aswera achimhanya-mhanya kuti aendesa mapepa awo ku nomination court iyo ichagara mangwana mumatunhu ose emunyika mangwana. No media source currently available Zvichakadai, matare awanawo vaimbova gurukota rezvematunhu, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, vasina mhosva pamhosva yavanga vachipomerwa yekubuda munyika zvisiri pamutemo. Mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti, Amai Josephine Sande, vatura mutongo wekuti vaimbova gurukota rezvematunhu, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, avo vanga vachipomerwa mhosva yekubuda munyika zvisiri pamutemo, havana mhosva yavakapara. Mutongi wedare ati makasha embumburu dzakashandiswa dzakawanikwa kumba kwaVaKasukuwere pamwe nekuboorwa kwemadziro pamwe nekupwanyika kwakaitwa mahwindo emba yavo kwakakonzerwa nekuridzwa kwakaitwa pfuti munguva yeOperation Restore Legacy zvakazoita kuti vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiye basa, zvinoratidza kuti hupenyu hwaVaKasukuwere hwakange hwave panjodzi. Mutongi wedare aenderera mberi achiti nehupfumi huna VaKasukuwere uye semunhu anofamba nepasipoti yevanhu vanoremekedzwa, kana kuti diplomatic passport, hazvaikodzera kuti VaKasukuwere vangobuda munyika zviri kunze kwemutemo pasina chikonzero chakati tsvikiti. VaKasukuwere vati vafara zvikuru nemutongo waturwa nedare. VaKasukuwere ndevamwe vemakurukota ehurumende akatiza munyika pakaitwa chirongwa che Operation Restore Legacy nemasoja achitungamirwa nemukuru wawo panguva iyi, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vakazoitwa mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika mushure mekunge VaMugabe vapidigurwa. VaKasukuwere vakazodzoka munyika mwedzi wapera mushure mekupedza mwedzi mitanhatu vari kunze kwenyika kwavakaenda muhupoteri. No media source currently available

headline: VaJim Kunaka veZanu PF Vopomerwa Mhosva yeKutyisidzira Nhengo dzeMDC-T neRufu
text: VaJim Kunaka, avo vakambenge vabuda muZanu PF vachinopinda mubato reZimbabwe People First rinotungamirirwa naAmai Joice Mujuru asi vakazodzokera kuZanu PF, vanonzi vatyisidzira nerufu VaDenford Ngadziore, vanove munyori muboka revechidiki vebato reMDC T mudunhu reHarare. VaKunaka vanonzi vachaira VaNgadziore nhare vakatanga nekutaura zita ravo vachibva vazozivisa kuti nhasi usiku nhengo dzebato reZanu PF dzichapisa dzimba nemidziyo yevatsigiri vebato rinopikisa reMDC T. VaKunaka vanonzi vapa zvikonzero zvekuti vachapisa dzimba idzi nekuda kwezviri kuitwa nevatsigiri veMDC T zvekuratidzira vachishora hurumende yaVaRobert Mugabe pamwe nebato ravo reZanu PF. VaNgadziore vanoti mashoko avatambira kubva kuna VaKunaka aya avatyisa chose sezvo VaKunaka vachizivikanwa nenyaya dzemhirizhonga pamwe nechikwata chavo cheChipangano. “Tave kutotyira hupenyu hwedu nekuti VaKunaka vanozivikanwa nemhirizhonga. Saka ndaudzawo hutungamiri hwebato redu uye vamwe vangu vechidiki kuti tione kuti tachengetedza hupenyu hwemhuri dzedu pamwe nemhuri dzedu,” VaNgdziore vanodaro. No media source currently available Asi VaKunaka varamba mashoko aya pavabvunzwa neStudio 7 vachiti hapana kana chikonzero chingaita kuti vade kurwisa VaNgadziore nekuti havasi munhu avangatya.  VaKunaka vanoti kana vaine zvavanoda kuita kunhengo dzeMDC T vanongoita zvisina dambudziko. "Ndinovatyisidzira pakayi? I think that's being stupid. I think you better find a better story for me to answer. You better find chimwe chiri nhingi, handina kana dhiri navo avo. Handityisidziri munhu ini nekuti kana ndichida munhu ndino dealer naye one-on-one. he is not even a threat to me," VaKunaka vaudza Studio 7 parunhare. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, vanofungidzirwa kuti inhengo dzeZanu-PF mudunhu reMasvingo vanonzi neChina usiku vakapisa musha wasachigaro weMDC-T Youth Assembly mudunhu iri VaPhillip Chingini vakaparadza midziyo inokosha zviuru zvemadhora. Nhengo yeMDC-T iyi inonzi inogara mumusha weChiredzi uye yaipomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira vanhu kuti varatidzire mumasvingo kutigira MDC-T. Asi sachigaro weZanu-PF mudunhu iri VaAmasa Nenjana varamba mashoko ekuti bato ravo riri kuita zvemhirizhonga.

headline: VaMwonzora Vanoti Ndivo Vave paNyanga Sezvo Vachiti Vakakunda Zvine Mutsindo
text: VaDouglas Mwonzora vanoti vakasarudzwa zviri pachena kutsiva mushakabva Morgan Tsvangirai semutungamiri webato reMDCT pakongiresi yechimbichimbi yakaitwa nemusi weSvondo. VaMwonzora vakakunda Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, VaElias Mudzuri pamwe naVaMorgan Komichi pakongiresi yechimbichimbi yekutsiva mushakabvu Tsvangirai. VaMwonzora vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakakunda zviri pachena kunyange vakakundwa ava vari kugunun’una kuti sarudzo hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka uye Muzvare Khupe vachiti vambomisa VaMwonzora basa. Asi Amai Khupe vakaudza vatori husiku hweSvondo kuti sarudzo hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka vachiti VaMwonzora vakashandisa chikiribidi kuti vakunde musarudzo idzi. Izvi zvatsinhirwa neumwe wevaikwikwidza musarudzo idzi VaElias Mudzuri avo vatiwo mhirizhonga nekusavhota zvakanaka kwevanhu vaifanira kuvhota zvinhu zvisingatarisirwe mubato rakaita seravo. VaMudzuri vati havasi kutambira zvakabuda musarudzo dzanezuro vachiti chavekudikanwa ndechekuti vagare pasi sehutungamiri hwebato kuti vaone kuti votora matanho api. Mibvunzo yatatumira Muzvare Khupe nevamwe vakakwidza musarudzo idzi VaMorgen Komichi yanga isati yapindurwa. Zvichakadaro, VaMwonzora vati vatotanga basa rekuumba musangano wavo kubva zvino zvichienda mberi vakati zviri kutaurwa nevakakundwa musarudzo zvinhu zvisina musoro. Tichiri panyaya iyi, nhengo yekomiti yepamusoro muMDC Alliance, VaLovemore Chinoputsa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kongiresi yakaitwa neMDCT haisi pamutemo sezvo vachiti paive nevanhu vashoma panevanofanira kunge varipo. Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika muMDCT vanoti kusafamba zvakanaka kunonzi kwakaita kongiresi yebato iri kunogona kusiya bato iri ratsemuka zvakare. No media source currently available

headline: AFCON: ‘Tichine mukana’
text: AIMBOVE murairidzi wemaWarriors – Joey ‘Mafero’ Antipas – okurudzira chikwata chenyika ichi kuti chisawore mwoyo asi kuti chigobata basa sebasa nemusi weChishanu apo chichasangana neMalawi mumutambo wechipiri muboka racho reGroup B.   MaWarriors ari kuCameroon uko ari kukwikwidza kumutambo we2021 Total Energy Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON).   Mumutambo wekutanga, maWarriors akakundwa 1-0 neSenegal izvo zvakarwadza vatsigiri vose venhabvu sezvo akakundirwa mumiti rekupedzisira apo maLions of Teranga akazopihwa pena iyo akanwisa mutambo ukazopera uri 1-0.   Mumutambo wese uyu, maWarriors aitamba zvinonwisa mvura izvo zvakaona mubati wepagedhi – Petros Mhari – achirwa semvumba achishungurudza vatambi veSenegal vanosanganisira Sadio Mane avo vakatadza kuzunza mambure kusvikira vazoita zvekupihwa pena.   Mafero anoti matambiro akaita chikwata chaNorman Mapeza chemaWarriors nemusi weMugovera anodasisa saka vanofanirwa kuramba vaine matambiro mamwe chete musi weChishanu apo vachasangana neMalawi.   “MaWarriors akadadisa kunyangwe hazvo takazobvutirwa mutambo uyu pekupedzisira, asi takange takaibata Senegal mutambo wese uye chikwata chenyika ichi chaitamba zvinonwisa mvura.   “Ngatichitarire zviri mberi musi weChishanu apo tiri kusangana neThe Flames of Malawi. Tiri kufanira kuhwina mutambo uyu neunozotevera weGuinea kuti tifambire mberi mumutambo weAFCON. Mitambo miviri yasara iyi yakatikoshera saka tinofanirwa kuihwina,” anodaro.   MaWarriors achatamba neThe Flames musi weChishanu nenguva dza6 manheru uye achazobandana neGuinea neChipiri svondo rinotevera.   Musi weChishanu uyu, zvimwe zvikwata zviri kuboka reGroup B izvo zvatotungamira – Senegal neGuinea sezvo zvave nezvibodzwa zvitatu – ndizvo zvichavhurisa mutambo apo zvichatamba na3 masikati. Izvi zvinoreva kuti uyu mutambo wekuti maWarriors achange achiongorora kuti uchafamba sei sezvo vazhinji vave kutarisira kuti Senegal ikunde Guinea apo chikwata chenyika ichi chozokundawo Malawi neGuniea mumitambo miviri yasara.   Mafero anoti anoshuvira kuti kudai Senegal yakunda Guinea.   “Tingade hedu kutarisa kune zvimwe zvikwata kuti zviri kutamba sei, asi chikuru ndechekuti isu mitambo yedu miviri yasara ngatiihwine zvine mutsindo tigobudirira kuenda kuround of 16 uko tisati tamboenda kubva zvatakatanga kukwikwidza kuAFCON,” anodaro Mafero.   MaWarriors paakatanga kurwira kuenda kumutambo weAFCON, aitungamirwa naMafero uyo akarairidza mitambo miviri yekutanga iyo yakaona achiita mangange – 0-0 neBotswana mutambo wekutanga uyo wakatambirwa muno kozoti wechipiri maWarriors akahwina 2-1 kuZambia.

headline: Murairidzi waZemura aroveswa pasi
text: MURAIRIDZI waJordan Zemura kuchikwata cheAFC Bournemouth, Scott Parker adzingwa basa nhasi zvichitevera kuzvambaradzwa kwavakaitwa neLiverpool 9-0 nemusi weMugovera wadarika.   Kurakashwa kwakaitwa Bouthmouth neLiverpool hakuna kugamuchirwa nevaridzi vechikwata ichi pamwe nevatsigiri venhabvu avo vakakatyamadzwa zvikuru sezvo pange padarika mwaka mizhinji pasati pamboita chikwata chinokundwa 9-0.   Parker abva aita murairidzi wekutanga kudzingwa basa muEnglish Premier League mwaka uno uye adzingwa pangotambwa mitambo mina chete.   Muridzi weBournemouth – Maxim Demin – anyora padandemutande kuti, “Tinoda kutenda zvikuru kuna Scott nechikwata chake panguva yataive tose.   “Kudzoka kwataita muPremier League achirairidza chikwata chedu tichagara tichikurangarira kwemakore akawanda anotevera.   “Asi kuti tirambe tichibudirira sechikwata, tinofanirwa kufamba negwara chairo rebasa redu uye kupanana rukudzo nguva dzose.   “Gadziriro dzekutsvaga murairidzi mutsva anomutsiva dzatotanga.”   Mumitambo yakarairidzwa naParker mwaka uno muPremiership, wekutanga chikwata chake chakakunda Aston Villa 2-0, ndokuzokundwa 4-0 neManchester City, chikazokundwa zvakare 3-0 neArsenal uye 9-0 neLiverpool.

headline: Tiri kuronga kudzora nhabvu: Zifa
text: MUKURU wesangano rinoona nezvenhabvu muno reZifa, Felton Kamambo, anoti hutungamiri hwenhabvu huchasangana svondo rino kuti vagokurukura nechinangwa chekuti mutambo uyu udzoswe asi uchizotambwa pasina vatsigiri.   Nhabvu yemuno yaifanirwa kunge yakatanga muna Kurume kana Kubvumbi asi nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19, yakambomiswa senzira yekuti vanhu vasaungane uye chirwere ichi chisapararire.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Kamambo anoti Zifa nemamwe masangano enhabvu anosanganisira Premier Soccer League (PSL) vachasangana kuti vagoronga gwara rekufamba naro iro vachazopa kuSports and Recreation Commission.   “Hutungamiri hwenhabvu tichasangana svondo rino tironge kuti tofamba nenzira ipi iyo inoita kuti nhabvu yedu idzoke. Chimwe chinhu chikuru chatichakurukura kuti nhabvu itambwe pasina vatsigiri, kana pane zvatinenge tawirirana tichazvipa kuSRC vozvizeya ivo vozotiudza kuti zvinoita here,” anodaro Kamambo.   Anoenderera mberi achiti kuti nhabvu igotambwa pasina vatsigiri richave dambudziko guru kuzvikwata zvizhinji sezvo zvakawanda zvichirarama nemari iyo zvinowana pagedhi inenge yabhadharwa nevatsigiri.   Asi anoti ivo sesangano vakazvipira kubatsira zvikwata zvose zvemuno neimwe mari yekuti zvifambise mabasa azvo kuitira kuti zvisazonyanyoremerwa.   “Isu tichabatsira zvikwata zvose nekubhadhara imwe mari yakafanana neyevaridzi vepembe, chikuru chatiri kuda kuti nhabvu itambwe uye zvikwata zvedu zvisanyanyoremerwa.   “Kune dzimwe nyika sekuEurope nhabvu yave kutambwa isina vatsigiri saka isu tokwanisa kuzviitawo,” anodaro Kamambo.

headline: ‘80% yevatambi veZim vanonwa Bronco’
text: MURAIRIDZI weBulawayo City, Philani ‘Beefy’ Ncube, otaura mashoko anokatyamadza zvikuru ekuti chikamu che80 percent chevatambi venhabvu vanotora zvinodhaka zvisingatenderwi mumuviri, kunyanya Broncleer.   Ncube akataura izvi pamutambo wakaona chikwata chake chichisangana neHighlanders apo vakahwina 1-0, achiti  mumwe mutambi wemuchikwata ichi aive akadhakwa, ndokuti, “Ndinoziva kuti ichokwadi anotora zvinodhaka”.   “Regai ndikuudzei, 80 percent yevatambi vemuZimbabwe vanotora zvinodhaka. Handichataure mazita, asi patakatamba neHighlanders, pange pane mutambi mumwe chete wemuchikwata chavo ange akatodhakwa. Aingovata. Saka ndinotoziva kuti anotora zvinodhaka. Ipapo wonzwa vamwe vachiti murairidzi ngaadzingwe basa,” anodaro Ncube uyo anotaura zvaanoda akasununguka uye achizivikanwa kuti haatsengi mazwi ake.   Anoti dambudziko guru nderekuti vamwe vatsigiri ndivo vane mhosva yekutengesa zvinodhaka izvi zvisingatenderwi mumuviri kuvatambi.   Anoti kutorwa kwezvinodhaka kwakazonyanya kuwedzerwa nekuuya kwakaita denda reCovid-19.   “Dambudziko guru nderekuti vamwe vatsigiri ndivo vanotengesera vakomana zvinodhaka izvi. Asi ndivo vanhu vanezenge vave kuti Mandla Mpofu, Joey Antipas kana Beefy ngaaende,” anodaro Ncube.   Anoti matambiro ave kuita chikwata chake mwaka uno, izvo zvaona Amakhosi ichitora zvibodzwa zvina mumitambo miviri yadarika, inyaya yekugadzirisa kutorwa kwezvinodhaka.   “Chandakaudza vakomana ndechekuti vanofanirwa kuzvisunda vega. Ndakavaudza kuti vasiyane nezvinodhaka votanga kuvimba nezvavanoita. Vechidiki ava vari kuzvikanganisa nekutora zvinodhaka. Zvinosiririsa nekuti mangwana varairidzi tisu tozopomerwa mhosva.   “Asi chokwadi vari kutungamira vatambi ava vanofanirwa kugara navo pasi vokurukura nhau dzine chekuita nekutorwa kwezvinodhaka,” anodaro.   Ncube anoenderera mberi achiti, “Mwaka usati watanga, PSL inofanirwa kuunza vanamazvikokota vodzidzisa vakomana kuti kune hupenyu mberi Covid-19 yapera. Iyi inyaya isina kumbobatwa-batwa kusvika nanhasi chaiye.   “Vakomana vange vachitora zvinodhaka senzira yehupenyu hwavo. Nyaya yekutora zvinodhaka iyi ichavakanganisa mwedzi mina inotevera. PSL neFootballers Union of Zimbabwe vanofanirwa kutora matanho nyaya yacho isati yaenderera mberi. Ndokuzivisa kuti vakomana ava vanogona kupasa kuvhenekwa Covid-19 kwete kutariswa zvinodhaka. Chimwe chinorwadza ndechekuti kana kuvatambi vechidiki zvatozara.”   Nyanzvi yezveutano kuZimbabwe Olympic Committee arizve chiremba wemaWarriors, Nick Munyonga, anoti hurongwa huripo hwekurwisa kutorwa kwezvinodhaka, asi kushaikwa kwemari ndiro dambudziko.   “Muchaona kuti senyika tinoita ongororo yekuvheneka vatambi kakawanda kuburikidza nerutsigiro runobva kugurukota rezvemitambo uye neWorld Anti-doping pamitambo yakasiyana kana zvikwata zvichigadzirira kunokwikwidza.   “Takanyorera kuPSL tikavapa mabhajeti kuti pagoitwa zvirongwa zvekuvheneka vatambi. Tinoitisa zvidzidzo munyika yese. Zvirongwa zviripo hazvo asi kwete zvepamusoro nekuda kwenhau yemari.   “Kuvheneka munhu mumwe chete panodiwa US$500, kusanganisira mari yekufambisa. Saka imari yakawanda, asi tinoziva kuti gurukota redu riri kuedza kugadzira bhajeti kuburikidza neZOC,” anodaro Mushonga uyo anove zvekare sachigaro weAfrica Zone V1 Region Anti-doping.

headline: ‘NHABVU INODA PAINE VATSIGIRI’
text: MUTAMBI wechikwata chenyika cheZimbabwe Warriors necheYeni Malatyaspor chekuTurkey, Teenage Hadebe, anoti nhabvu hainakidze kutamba munhandare isina vatsigiri.   Mwaka wenhabvu weTurkish Super Lig – uko Hadebe ari kutambira – unotarisirwa kudzoka mumasvondo ari kutevera.   Mitambo mizhinji pasi rose yambenge yakamiswa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 icho chaurauya vanhu vakawandisa. Asi kutanga masvondo achangodarika, kune dzimwe nyika nhabvu yava kuita ichidzoka asi ichitambwa munhandare dzisina vatsigiri.   Muhurukuro dzange dzichiitwa kuTurkey, pane fungidziro huru yekuti mitambo yenhabvu yeko inogona kusimudzira musi wa12 Chikumi.   Achitaura neKwayedza ari kuTurkey, Hadebe anoti ari kufara kuti nhabvu yave kudzoka asi anoti zvikwata zvinofanirwa kugadzirisa pavanotambira kuti pange pakachena uye pakachengetedzeka panyaya dzeutano.   “Kunyangwe hangu ndiri kufara kuti tave kudzoka kuzotamba nhabvu zvekare, asi zvandaona nekudzidza zvange zvichityisa. Vanhu vari kufa kunze uko, saka tinofanirwa kunge takachengetedzeka uye takangwarira tichitevedzawo mutemo nekurudziro dzeveutano.   “Ndanga ndasuwa nhabvu yangu nekuti ndiyo inondichengeta, saka ndiri kutarisira kutamba zvakanaka zvekare,” anodaro.   Kunyangwe zvazvo achiti ari kutarisira kudzoka kwenhabvu, Hadebe anoti zvichamuremera kutamba munhandare dzisina vatsigiri sezvo iye ange ajaira kutamba pamberi pechaunga chevanhu.   “Tajaira kutamba nhandare dzakazara nevatsigiri vachitikuza. Zvino izvi zvitsva kwandiri, saka zvichandiremera nekuti vatsigiri vanotipa manyuku-nyuku ekutamba zvakanaka.   “Asi totongojaira zviripo nekuti pakupera kwezuva tinofanirwa kubata basa, uye tiine utano,” anodaro muchinda anoti kana achitamba kumashure kwechikwata chemaWarriors uyu anoita zvekusunga chishwe chaicho.   Svondo richangodarika nhabvu yakatanga kutambwa kunyika yeGermany asi munhandare dzisina vatsigiri.   Mimwe yemitemo yakaiswa mitsva ndeyekuti vatambi venhabvu havachatenderwa kukwazisana nemaoko uye kana vakanwisa, pakupembera havabvumidzwe kumbundirana.

headline: Mudzimai wekutanga kuridza pembe kuWC
text: wechidzimai wekuFrance — Stephanie Frappart — achanyora nhoroondo nemusi weChina apo achaita mudzimai wekutanga kuridza kumutambo weWorld Cup wevarume.   FIFA yakazivisa kuti Frappart ndiye acharidza pamutambo weCosta Rica neGermany.   Achange ari muchikwata chemadzimai vacharidza mumutambo uyu nevamwe vanosanganisira Neuza Back wekuBrazil naKaren Diaz wekuMexico avo vachange vari vatevedzeri vake. — The African Referees Platform

headline: Nhabvu yePSL yodzoka
text: Ndooka   ZVIKWATA zvose zvinokwikwidza muPremier Soccer League (PSL) zviri pakati pekunyoresa vatambi vazvo segadziriro yekudzoka kwemitambo yeCastle Premiership.   Mitambo iyi ichasimudzirwa nemusi wa12 na13 Kukadzi zvichitevera kumiswa kwayakaitwa munaZvita gore radarika nekuda kwezororo reKirisimasi uye kupa mukana kuchikwata chenyika chemaWarriors kuti chigadzirire kuenda kunokwikwidza kuAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) kuCameroon uko chakadzoka mushure mekuburitswa mumutambo uyu.   Mukushi wemashoko wePSL – Kudzai Bare – anoti mitambo yeCastle Premiership ichasimudzira masvondo anotevera.   “Hurongwa hwekudzoka kwemitambo yePSL huri kufamba mugwara uye kutaura kuno zvikwata zviri kunyoresa vatambi vazvo.   “Kana tapedza, mitambo inenge yave kusimudzira uye iri kutarisirwa kutanga musi wa12 na13 Kukadzi mazuva ayo atagara takazivisa kuti ndiwo mitambo iyi ichasimudzirwa,” anodaro Bare.   Zvisinei, mitambo iyi paichadzoka, mizhinji yacho inogona kukanganiswa nekunaya kuri kuita mvura uye izvi zvinotevera yambiro yakapihwa nebazi rinoona nezvemamiriro ekunze reMeteorogical Services Department (MSD) yekuti munyika muri kutarisirwa kunaya mvuya yakawanda kwenguva ndefu.   Bare anoti PSL ichabatana nemamwe masangano anoona nezvenhabvu mumazuva anotevera vachitenderera kunhandare dzakasiyana vachiongorora mamiriro akaita nhandare idzi.   “Nguva yatiri tinoziva kuti ndeyekunaya kwemvura saka mimwe mitambo inogona kukanganiswa nekudaro tichange tichiona mafambiro anenge achiita mitambo yacho.   “Zvagara hazvo kuti patichasimudzira nhabvu ndipo kubva kare paitanga mitambo yePSL asi kungoti apa chete tichangoti kurumidzei zvishoma. Asi mumazuva anotevera tichatenderera tichiongorora nhandare dzedu tichiona kuti dzakagadzirwa zvakadii uye dzinokwanisa here kutambirwa mitambo panguva ino yatiri,” anodaro Bare.   Zvakadaro, pakamiswa mitambo yePSL munaZvita, zvikwata zvakawanda zvange zvatamba mitambo mitatu uye zvimwe miviri.   Izvi zvakaona chikwata cheManica Diamonds chichitungamira palogo zvichitevera kuhwina kwachakaita mitambo yacho yose iri mitatu chiine zvibodzwa zvipfumbamwe.   Manica Diamonds iri kuteverwa neNgezi Platinum iyo, kubva pamitambo yayo mitatu, yakakwanisa kuhwina miviri ndokuita mangange mumwe chete uye ine zvibodzwa zvisere.   FC Platinum, iyo yakatora zvakare mukombe wePSL mwaka wadarika, ndiyo yakagara pechitatu iine zvibodzwa zvitanhatu izvo yakawana kubva mumitambo miviri.   Pechina pakagarwa neTriangle United iyo ine zvibodzwa zvitanhatu kubva mumitambo mitatu. Triangle yakahwina mitambo miviri ndokukundwa mumwe chete.   Kune rimwe divi, Bulawayo City ndiyo yakasenga iri pasi pelogo sezvo yangokwanisa kuwana chibodzwa chimwe chete kubva mumitambo mitatu yayatamba.   Chikwata ichi chakakundwa mumitambo miviri uye ndokuita mangange 3-3 neWhawha.

headline: Monalisa okunga tsiva
text: SHASHA yetsiva yechidzimai — Monalisa “Queen Monalisa” Sibanda — inoti yadzoka mugym umo iri kuita gadziriro dzekurwira kuchengetedza bhande rayo reWomen International Boxing Association (WIBA) World Inter-continental light-weight iro yakahwina mugore ra2019.   Monalisa akahwapura bhande iri mushure mekukunda Joice Awino wekuKenya uye aifanirwa kunge akarwira kurichengetedza kare asi izvi hazvina kukwanisika zvichitevera kumiswa kwakamboitwa mitambo pasi rose senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Muhurukuro svondo rino, Monalisa anoti Covid-19 yakakanganisa hurongwa hwake hwa2020 hwekurwira kuchengetedza bhande rake.   “Ndadzoka manje, ndiri mushishi kugadzirira kuti ndigorwira bhande rangu, zvange zvakaoma kungogara mutambo wandinodisisa tisiri kuwana mukana wekuutamba.   “Asi kudzoka kwemitambo nekupihwa kwatakaita mikana yekuti tigokwikwidza zvave nechiedza kwatiri isu vari mune zvemitambo. Dai pasina iyo Covid-19 ndakatorwa kare asi zvose zvange zvakangomiswa nekuda kwedenda iri,” anodaro.   Shasha iyi iye zvino yave kufanirwa kuzorwira kuchengetedza bhande rake musi wa10 Chikunguru asi pari zvino hapasati pazivikanwa kuti achatatsurana nemutambi upi.   Anoti hutungamiriri hwetsiva huri mushishi kumutsvagira mutambi wekuzosangana naye saka ari kugara akagadzirira kuzorwira kuchengetedza bhande rake.   “Iye zvino pachiri kutsvagwa mutambi wandichazosangana naye, hapasati pazivikanwa kuti ndicharwa nani nekuti mazuvaano nekuda kweCovid-19 panotombotanga paongororwa kuti mutambi ari kubva kunyika ipi sezvo dzimwe nyika dziri muboka redzinoonekwa sedzinopisa nekuda kweCovid-19.   “Zvakafanana nekuti ini chaiye mutambo uyu ndinoda kuutambira muno asi zvikakona ndinenge ndakutonzi ndiende kunorwira kuTanzania uko kwange kusina lockdown kana kumiswa mitambo nekuda kweCovid-19,” anodaro Monalisa.   Anoti anotenda zvikuru vakotsveri vake nevamwe vatsigiri vakamira naye panguva iyo mitambo yakange isiri kutambwa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   “Ndine hama dzakawanda dzakanditsigira zvinhu zvakaoma, vashoma vanonzwisisa isu vatambi vetsiva vechidzimai. Saka ndinopa kutenda kune avo vange vachimira neni,” anodaro Monalisa.

headline: ‘GEMS TAVE KUMBERI’
text: uyo ange ari kuLIVERPOOL, England naAbel Ndooka ari muHarare SHASHA yemutambo wenetball inotambira chikwata cheZimbabwe chemaGems — Adelaide Thandeka Muskwe — uyo aive kuLiverpool uko aimirira nyika kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup, anoti ave kumberi kwehanzvadzi yake, Admiral, uyo anotambira nhabvu maWarriors.   MaGems akanyora nhoroondo yekuve chikwata chekutanga chenetball chakanokwikwidza kuWorld Cup uye ndokutamba zvinonwisa mvura apo akakunda zvimwe zvikwata zvinosanganisira Sri Lanka, Barbados neNorthern Ireland.   Adelaide naAdmiral mapatya uye vose vakaberekerwa muno ndokuzoenda kunogara kuEngland uko kwavakakurira.   Mukukura kwavo, Adelaide aitamba netball kozoti Admiral ari mutambi wenhabvu. Admiral iye zvino anotambira Leicester City inove chimwe chezvikwata zvikuru zvenhabvu muEngland.   Muchinda uyu haana kuenda kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations kuEgypt asi akambotamba mumakwikwi eCosafa Castle Cup kuSouth Africa nguva yadarika.   Adelaide anotambirawo chikwata cheSeven Stars kuEngland uye anoti ari kunzwa manyuku-nyuku nekuwaniswa kwaakaita mukana wekumirira nyika kumutambo weVitality World Cup.   Adelaide anoti anogara achitsigira hanzvadzi yake kumitambo yake yenhabvu uye akafara zvikuru kuona Admiral achiuyawo kuzomutsigira apo maGems aikweshana neNew Zealand.   Admiral pamwe nevabereki vavo vaive muchaunga nemusi weMuvhuro svondo rapera pamberi vachitsigira Adelaide pamwe nemaGems apo aitamba neNew Zealand mumutambo uyo akakundwa 36-79.   “Hanzvadzi yangu ndiyo ine mukurumbira asi ndinonzwa mufaro chaizvo kumuona achiuya kuzonditsigira mumitambo yangu.   “Ini kubva kare ndogara ndiri kunhandare dzakasiyana ndichimuona achitamba nhabvu saka tinotsigirana tese mitambo yedu uye vabereki vedu havashaikwe kumitambo yedu, saka ndinonzwa kufara ndichiona kuti rutsigiro tinarwo. Isu maGems tave kumberi nekuti takakwanisa kukwikwidza kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup,” anodaro Adelaide.   Zvakadai, chikwata chemaGems chakapedza makwishu aya chiri pechisere zvichitevera kukundwa kwachakazoitwa mitambo yacho miviri yekupedzisira apo wekutanga chakakundwa 43-59 neMalawi kozoti 58-47 neUganda.

headline: ‘Karate handi zvimbokoma’
text: SHASHA yekarate, Sensei Thomas Chiwomba, anoti mutambo uyu hausi wekukurudzira vatambi kuti varwe nevanhu asi kuti unotodzidzisa uye kukurudzira runyararo nekuzvibata.   Anoti vatambi vekarate vane tsika yekurwa nevamwe vakatorasika zvikuru.   “Mutambi wekarate pazvimbokoma haana kumira zvakanaka izvozvo tinozviziva nekuti anogona kukuvadza munhu.   Asi isu hatikurudzire mhirizhonga pakarate yatinofundisa, kwete. Tinoda runyararo uye kuzvibata saka vaye vanoita karate yemhirizhonga vakatorasika zvikuru.   “Saka tinotovakurudzira kuti huyai kuZKU tikudzidzisei karate yemazvo,” anodaro Chiwomba.   Anoti zvirongwa zvegore ra2020 zvose zvakaenda mudondo nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 icho chakakonzeresa kuti mitambo yose imbomiswa senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwacho.   Chiwomba, uyo anove technical director kuKyokushin Nakamura iri pasi peZimbabwe Karate Union (ZKU), anoti gore ra2020 vatambi vazhinji vekarate vaifanirwa kunokwikwidza kune mitambo yakawanda munyika muno nekunze kwenyika asi zvose hazvina kubudirira nekuda kweCovid-19.   “Gore rino, tarasikirwa nemitambo yakawanda uye mitambo iyi ndiyo mimwe yange ichiraramisa vatambi vakawanda. Asi chatinoziva ndechekuti hupenyu hwevanhu ndihwo hwakakosha uye tinohutungamidza pamberi.   “Vatambi vekarate vanopedza nguva zhinji vachiita gadziriro dzavo saka vanozoda kuenda kunokwikwidza kumitambo yakasiyana kuti vawane zvinovararamisa,” anodaro Chiwomba.   Anoti iye zvino apo nzvimbo dzinoitirwa karate dzakambovharwa vave kutyira kuti vatambi vazhinji vanogona kufuririka vakagara kudzimba dzavo pasina zvavari kuita.   “Chinhu chave kutyisa kuti vatambi vedu vanogona kufuririka vari kumaraini kwavanenge vari ikoko, vakasatariswa vanorasika uye tinovatyira zvikuru.   “Vanoda kugara vachingotariswa uye vachipihwa mabasa ekuita kuti vasarasike muhupenyu hwavo,” anodaro Chiwomba.

headline: Messi oshuwira World Cup
text: Lionel Messi, anoti anoda chaizvo kuhwina mukombe weWorld Cup iyo ichatanga masvondo mashoma ari kutevera kuRussia. Shasha yeBarcelona iyi haasati ambohwina mukombe mukuru achitambira nyika yake uye anoti dai zvaikwanisika aishandura mumwe wemikombe 32 yaakahwina neBarcelona ouhwina nenyika yake.   Kaputeni weArgentina uyu aive muchikwata chakakundwa neGermany mufainari yeWorld Cup mugore ra2014 uye mwaka uno akahwina mikombe yakawanda neBarcelona. Izvi zvakamuona achihwina La Liga uye neCopa del Rey.   “Ndaigona kushandura mukombe mumwe chete neBarcelona, kuushandura kuita wenyika yangu,” Messi akaudza El Trece. “Kuhwina mukombe weArgentina zvinhu zvingave zvikuru kwandiri zvandingayemura.”   Zvisinei, Messi akataura hake kuti chikwata chaJorge Sampaoli hachisi chimwe chezvichatarisirwa kuhwina kuRussia pachatanga makwishu eWorld Cup musi wa14 Chikumi.   “Ndinovimba zvikuru nechikwata chino, tiri kushanda nesimba tese, tine vatambi vane tarenda guru uye tichasvika kure,” anodaro. – SportsMail Football

headline: FC Platinum Yokurudzirwa Kukunda Mitambo yepaMusha Kuti Ibudirire muMakwikwi eCaf Champions League
text: Chikwata cheFC Platinum chirikuvhura makundano enhabvu egore rino asi paine mibvunzo. Vanotevera mutambo wenhabvu havasi kugutsikana nematambiro arikuita FC Platinum pamusha payo mumitambo yeCaf Champions League vakatarisana nemutambo mukuru neOrlando Pirates yekuSouth Africa iyo yakatora mukombe uyu muna 1995. Nhoroondo yenhabvu muAfrica inotaura kuti zvikwata zvinokunda nemutsindo pamusha ndizvo zvinowanzoenderera mberi nemakundano asi matambiro eKugona Kunenge Kudada muMandava Stadium asimudza mibvunzo mumukana wavo wekusvika kuma kota fainari. FC Platinum yakatatarika zvinotyisa neCnaps yekuMadagascar ndokuzokunda 1-0 mumutambo uyo vaitarisirwa kukanda zvibodzwa pamadiro, ndokuzoita zvekare mangange 0-0 ne Otoyo Oho yekuCongo. Muteveri wenhabvu VaFrancis Mwendamberi vanoti Kugona Kunenge Kudada inofanira kuwedzera mwando pamatambiro ayo pamusha kana ichida kubudirira mumakwikwi aya. Pamusoro peOrlando Pirates, FC Platinum iri mugungano rimwechete ne Esperance yekuTunisia iyo ine mukombe uyu pamwe ne Horoya yeku Guinea. Zvikwata zviviri zvinopedza zviri pamusoro mugungano iri ndizvo zvinoenderera mberi nemakwikwi aya. Muteveri wechikwata cheDynamos VaObert Masvotore vanoti FC Platinum isatarise mazita kana mukurumbira une zvikwata zvavari kusangana nazvo. Mumwe muteveri wemutambo uyu VaTatenda Makazhu ndivo vanofunga kuti Kugona Kunenge Kudada inokwanisa kusvika mufainari yemakundano aya. Asi murairidzi wePirates Milutin Sredojevic audza mapepanhau ekuSouth Africa kuti ari kutya kutamba nechikwata cheFC Platinum nenyaya yekuti chikwata chitsva mumakundano aya uye ati anoremekedza murairidzi wacho Norman Mapeza zvakanyanya. Ati sezvo Pirates iri kutamba neFC Platinum mumutambo wekutanga kuMandava Stadium kuZvishavane, zvinonetsa zvikuru kuenda iko nemugwagwa. Asi Pirates iri kubheja kuti inosimudza mukomb weChampions League kechipiri munhoroondo yayo. Asi FC Platinum ichange isina mutambi akatamba zvinonwisa mvura mwaka uno kana kuti Soccer Star of the Year, Rodwell Chinyengetere, uyo ave kuenda kunotambira Baroka FC ku South Africa naWinston Mhango uyo arikuenda kuSouth Africa zvekare. Kugona Kuenge Kudada irikutarisira kusvika kana kudarika chidanho chakasvikwa neDynamos iyo yakasvika mufainari yeCaf Champions League muna 1998 nemuma semi finari muna 2008. No media source currently available `

headline: HATITYE SRI LANKA: GEMS
text: ari kuLIVERPOOL, England naAbel Ndooka ari muHARARE KAPUTENI wechikwata chenyika chenetball chemaGems — Perpetual Siyachitema — anoti vacharwa semvumba uye vanoda kusimudzira mureza weZimbabwe kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup ayo ari kuitirwa kuLiverpool, kuEngland.   Achitaura neKwayedza, Siyachitema anoti maGems achatamba nemwoyo wose kuti vagohwina mitambo yavo vagopedza vari pakati pezvikwata zvikuru zviri kumakwishu aya.   MaGems ari muboka reGroup A umo achasangana nezvikwata zvinoti Australia — iyo inove shasha ine mukombe wenetball — Sri Lanka neNorthen Ireland.   Mutambo wekutanga wechikwata chenyika ichi uriko musi weChishanu chino apo chichasangana neSri Lanka kunhandare yeM&S Bank Arena kuLiverpool Court Two.   Mushure mezvo, maGems achazosangana neAustralia musi weMugovera ozopedzisira neNorthen Ireland musi weSvondo.   Siyachitema anoti kubva zvavakasvika kuEngland, vange vachiongorora mitambo yeSri Lanka iyo yavachasangana navo mumutambo wekutanga ndokuona kuti vatambi vayo varefu zvikuru kusiyana navo sezvo vakati pfupikei.   “Takaongorora chikwata cheSri Lanka, chine vatambi varefu zvikuru kudarika isu asi murairidzi wedu akatsvaga nzira dzekuti tinogona kuvakunda sei.   “Zvekureba kwavo hatisi kuzozvitarisa uye hazvireve kuti vachatikunda, isu ticharwa semvumba mumutambo uyu,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Isu senyika pasi rese tiri pechi13 pakutamba netball saka kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup tiri kuda kurwa zvakasimba totamba sechikwata kuti tirpedze tiri mutop 8.”   Achitaura pamusoro perutsigiro rwavakawana kubva kumakambani akasiyana anosanganisira Simbisa Brands, Econet, National Foods nemamwe, Siyachitema anoti zvakavasimudzira morari yavo uye zvave kuvatuma kuti vashande nesimba kumakwishu aya.   “Tinotenda zvikuru makambani ese akatibatsira kuti rwendo rwedu rureruke kuenda kumakwishu aya, zvaisava nyore kudai vasipo saka tinotenda zvikuru.   “Rutsigiro rwatawana rwaunza mufaro kwatiri isu vanasikana veZimbabwe uye zvave kutituma kuti titambe nesimba kumakwishu aya,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Pazvikwata zvese zvemuAfrica, maGems ari kumakwishu aya nezvimwe zvikwata zvinoti South Africa, Uganda neMalawi.   Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Netball Association, Leticia Chipandu, anoti vasikana vemaGems vacharwa vamire mumitambo yavo.   Kubva kare, zvikwata zvizhinji zvaikwikwidza kumakwishu epasi rose akasiyana hazvina kumbobvira zvauya nemukombe izvo zvakapedzisira kuitwa nechikwata chemaGolden Girls icho chakahwina menduru yegoridhe kumaOlympics mugore ra1980.   Asi, Chipandu anoti rwendo rwuno zviri kuzoshanduka.   “Chandinovimbisa ndechekuti hatisi kungoburitswa mumutambo uyu uchangotanga, izvo kwete bodo.   “Vasikana vachatamba kusvika kumagumo uye ndinokuvimbisai kuti tichaunza mufaro mukuru kunyika yedu kubva kumakwishu aya,” anodaro Chipandu.

headline: AFCON: ‘Tinosvika kure’
text: MUTUNGAMIRIRI wesangano reZimbabwe Football Association Zifa) – Felton Kamambo – anoti chikwata chemaWarriors chine vatambi vakawanda vepamusoro saka vanofanirwa kutamba zvinogutsa kudarika zvavaimboita kare mumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations (AFCON) uyo uchatanga munguva pfupi iri kutevera.   Mutambo uyu uchatanga nemusi wa21 Chikumi apo MaWarriors achasangana nechikwata cheEgypt icho chichange chiri pamusha. Zvikwata zviviri izvi zviri muboka reGroup A pamwechete nezvimwe zvinoti Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) neUganda.   Munhorowondo yenhabvu yemaWarriors achienda kuAFCON, chikwata ichi chaingokundirwa kumagroup-stages. Asi, Kamambo anoti boka rakaiswa maWarriors svondo radarika pamberi rakanaka saka chikwata chavo chiri kufanirwa kubata basa sebasa.   “Draw raive rakanakisa chaizvo. Chikwata chedu chiri kufanirwa kutamba zvakanakisa, zvepamusoro kudarika zvachakamboita kare.    Japhet Mparutsa   “Tine chikwata chakanakisa chaizvo chine vatambi vepamusoro vanogona kubata basa sebasa,” anodaro Kamambo.   Vatambi vepamusoro vari muchikwata chemaWarriors vanosanganisira kaputeni Knowledge Musona, Khama Billiat, Marvelous Nakamba, Tinotenda Kadewere naGeorge Chigova.   Japhet “ShortCat” Mparutsa – uyo aimbove mubati wepagedhi weDynamos, Black Rhinos nemaWarriors – anoti mukana mukuru uripo wekuti chikwata chenyika ichi chisvike kure asi hunge chatanga zvakanaka mumutambo wacho neEgypt. Anoti zvakakosha kuti maWarriors awane zvibodzwa pamutambo uyu.   “Kana tikakwanisa kuwana chibodzwa chimwechete kana zvitatu paEgypt, mutambo unenge wavhurika. Asi tikakundwa zvinogona kutiomera nekuti Congo chikwata chakasimba zvikuru,” anodaro ShortCat.   Anoti DRC ichange ine huturu hwekundwa kwayakaitwa nemaWarriors nguva yadarika mumutambo wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kuAFCON.   “Zvasiyana manje nepakurwira kuenda kuAFCON nekuti zvikwata zvese zvichange zviri kumakwishu aya zvichida kuhwina.   “Asi tinogona kupedza tiri pechipiri muboka redu, hunge tikatanga zvakanakisa pamutambo wekutanga uyo tichasangana neEgypt,” anodaro Mparutsa.   Shasha pakutsigira nhabvu – Chris “Romario” Musekiwa – anoti gore rino nderemaWarriors nekudaro anofanira kuita zvinorova kumutambo uyu.    Chris Musekiwa   Anoti pazvikwata zvese zvichasangana nemaWarriors, Egypt chete ndiyo yega ingatyise.   “Draw takariona, rakanakisa chaizvo uye takaritambira. Chikwata chedu chine mukana mukuru wekusvika kure mumutambo uyu.   “DRC ingatityise nekuti inenge ine huturu hwekuikunda kwatakaita pakurwira kuenda kumakwishu aya, asi hedu tinoziva kuti toipedzera.   “Chikuru chinongodiwa kuti tigadzirire zvakasimba kuenda kumutambo uyu chete nekutamba mitambo yehushamwari nezvikwata zvepamusoro,” anodaro.

headline: Tiri pa’tight’: Dynamos
text: CHIKWATA cheDynamos chinoti kunyangwe zviite sei hachife chakabuda muligi reCastle Premiership zvisinei nekuti parizvino chiri panguva yakaoma apo chiri kuswedera pedyo nekuburitswa kuti chiende kunokwikwidza kuDivision One.   Mwaka wegore rino hausi kufamba zvakanaka kuchikwata ichi icho chinozivikanwa sechikuru munyika yese panyaya dzenhabvu sezvo chiine mikombe yakawanda yachakahwina yeligi nemimwe.   Asi matambiro ari kuita DeMbare mwaka uno haasi kugutsa zvaita kuti chive chimwe chezvikwata zvave kurwira kuti chisaburitswe muCastle Premiership.   Maneja weDynamos – Richard Chihoro – anotsidza kuti kunyangwe zviite sei DeMbare kana kuti Glamour Boys haife yakaburitswa muCastle Premiership uye ichatosunga dzisimbe mumitambo yayo yasara kuti ipone.   “Izvozvo manje ndizvo zvisingambofe zvakaitika. Kukutaurirai pachokwadi, Dynamos hapana kwainoenda, chinodiwa chete kuti tigadzirise pari kukanganisika chete.   “Tinofanirwa kungotaura nevakomana kuti vagadzirise pari kukanganisika chete tigosimukira. Rangarirai kuti ichi chikwata ndicho chakapedza chiri pechipiri mwaka wadarika nevatambi vachinacho, asi pane vashoma vakaita saChristian Epoupa vakazobva uye vamwe ndivo vari kutamba saka zvinogadzirika. Hatibude ipapo ndinoramba,” anodaro Chihoro.   Dynamos yasarirwa nemitambo misere kuti mwaka wa2018 upere uye pamitambo yose iyi iri kufanirwa kuhwina mina kuti isaburitswe muligi iri.    Mumitambo iyi, ichasangana nezvikwata zvinoti CAPS UNITED, Bulawayo Chiefs, FC Platinum, Black Rhinos, Herentals, Triangle United, Mutare City neNichrut.   Achibvuzwa kuti nhabvu yemuno ingazonakidze here kana Dynamos isisimo muPSL, Chihoro anoti,  “Hatingafunge nezvazvo nekuti hapana kwatiri kuenda, tiri kudzoka, gore rino range risiri redu chete.”   Kwayedza yakaitawo hurukuro nemukushi wemashoko weZifa, Xolisani Gwesela, ichida kunzwa kuti kana Dynamos ikaburitswa muCastle Premiership zvinokanganisa nhabvu yemuno here, iye ndokuti, “Hatisi n’anga kuno kuZifa, hatisi anagodobori, hatizive zvichaitika. Saka ngatitange taona kuti mwaka uchapera sei, tozotangira ipapo. Kana chikwata chichikwikwidza muPSL zvinorakidza kuti chikuru saka zvese zvinofanirwa kurwa kuti zvirambe zvirimo, kana chinenge chakurirwa munochiona nekuburitswa,” anodaro Gwesela.   Mutungamiri wevatsigiri veDynamos, Benjamin Munzira, anoti iye zvino yave nguva yekuti munhu wese anozviti anoda chikwata ichi achitsigire kuti morari yevatambi isimukire vagorwa semvumba varambe vari muPSL.    Anoti pakagara chikwata chavo pakashata chaizvo uye hachifanirwe kuve chiri ipapo.   “Iyi haisiriyo DeMbare yatinoziva, payave pakaoma, patambo chaipo inofanirwa kushanda nesimba kuti isimuke. Handizvo zvatinoitarisira kuti ive ichiita, saka zvinotoda kuti tibatane tose tinoti tinoda chikwata ichi chisimuke kubva pachiri.   “Vatambi vacho vari kuda kusimudzirwa saka zvinotoda isu vatsigiri tibatane tiwane zvatinovaitira kuvafadza kuti vasadzikire, shuwa iyi handiyo DeMbare yatinoziva,” anodaro Munzira.    Shasha pakutsigira nhabvu Chris ‘Romario’ Musekiwa anoti haatombode kufunga nezvekuburitswa kweDynamos muCastle Premiership achiti vamwe varairidzi vakamboirairidza kare vakaita saSunday Chidzambwa, Kalisto Pasuwa uye Moses Chunga ngavauye vabatsire Lloyd Mutasa mumitambo yasara kuti chikwata chake chisaburitswe muPSL.   Anoti pave kudiwa mushandirapamwe nekuti pachimire hapana kunaka uye hapasipo panotarisirwa kuti chinge chiri.   “Shasha dzakambotambira chikwata ichi uye vamwe vakambochirairidza vakaita saMhofu Chidzambwa naPasuwa ngavabatsire Mutasa nekuti basa iri harichade ari ega, zvave kutoda kubatsirana kuti basa rifambe mitambo yese yasara ihwiniwe chikwata chigare muPSL machakakodzera,” anodaro Romario.

headline: Vakawanda Vochema Shasha yeNhabvu Diego Maradona
text: Mutambi wenhabvu akaita mukurumbira pasi rose akatungamira Argentina mukusimudza mukombe weWorld Cup muna 1986, Diego Maradona ashaya nechirwere chemoyo mavhiki maviri achangobuda muchipatara cheOlivos Clinic munyika iyi paine mashoko ekuti ainge aine ropa rainge ragwamba muhuropi hwake. Vatambi, varairidzi nevatsigiri venhabvu vari kutumira mashoko kudzinhepfenyuro uye madandemutande akasiyana siyana. Nhepfenyuro dzose pasi rose dziri kutaurawo nezverufu urwu. Maradona ange ave nemakore makumi matanhatu ekuberekwa. Diego akatambira zvikwata zvakawanda zvinosanganisira Boca Juniors, Napoli ne Barcelona. Muna 1986, Maradona akanwisa bhora neruko pamutambo neEngland ichibva yabuda mumakwikwi aya. Paakabvunzwa nevatori venhau akati rwainge rwuri ruoko rwaMwari kana kuti “Hand of God.” Diego ainetsekanawo zvakanyanya nenyaya yekuputa nekunwa zvinodhaka zvakaita secocain nedoro. Maradona akamborairidzawo nyika yake yeArgentina uye ange ave murairidzi wechikwata cheGimnasia y Esgrima munyika yake.

headline: Asensio orambira kuMadrid
text: (22) acharamba ari kuReal Madrid mwaka unotevera, semashoko akabva kumumiriri wake.   Mutambi uyu ange achinzi ari kudiwa neLiverpool mushure mekunge angotamba mitambo 11 yaakatanga kubva pa38 mwaka wadarika kuLa Liga.   Achipindura apo ari World Cup kuRussia nenyika yake mushure mekunge abvunzwa nevatori venhau nezvekuenda kuLiverpool, Asensio anoti, “Kana World Cup yapera, ndipo ndichataura nezvenyaya idzodzo. Izvezvi ndiri kungofunga zvekusarudzwa kuzotambira nyika yangu.”   Kunyangwe mashoko aya achitenderera, mumiriri wake Horacio Gaggioli akasimbisa kuti haasi kuzobva kuSantiago Bernabeu pari zvino.   “Marco haasi kuzobva, acharamba ari neReal Madrid,” Gaggioli akaudza Calciomercato.   “Ari kuramba achisimukira nguva dzese. Mwaka unotevera, ndinofunga kuti achave mutambi mukuru weMadrid.”   Asensio ange achitamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura kubva zvaakaenda kuchikwata ichi icho chine mukombe weChampions League mugore ra2014 uye akamboenda kune zvimwe zvinosanganisira Mallorca neEspanyol nechikwereti. — SportsMail football

headline: Pochettino orumbidzwa
text: ari kurumbidza Mauricio Pochettino semurairidzi anogona basa zvakanyanya apo Manchester City yakatarisira kutatsurana neParis Saint-Germain mumakwikwi eChampions League.   Pochettino ari kupinda mumutambo uyu paine runyerekupe rwakanyanya maringe neramangwana rake apo bepanhau reSportsmail rakamboburitsa nyaya yekuti anogona kuda kuramba chikwata chake achienda kuManchester United.   Vazhinji vari kutsutsumwa kuti angakwanisa here kusimudza mikombe yakawanda mushure mekutadza kuhwinha mukombe mukuru ari kuTottenham uye paakatadza paLigue 1 title nepaChampions League nePSG mwaka wapfuura.   Mugadziriro dzemutambo wemusi weChitatu kuEtihad, Guardiola anoti: ‘’Unogona kuva maneja anogona basa zvakanyanya asi usingatore mukombe.   ‘’Mamaneja ane mukana wekutora mukombe ari pamusoro, zvikwata zvikuru zvine mari yakawanda uye vatambi vanogona. Zvisinei kumamaneja hazvisi nyore kuhwinha.   ‘’Izvi hazvirevi kuti mamaneja ari muChampionship kana asiri muchikwata chevatanhatu vari pamusoro pePremier League havagone basa munyaya dzezvidavado, kutaurirana uye kutungamirira. Hazvina basa kutora mikombe”.   Guardiola naPochettino vane nhoroondo yakakura vese muChampions League, kubva mazuva apo Pochettino aiva kuTottenham. Spurs yakarova City mumaquarter finals eChampions League muna2019. Tottenham yakanga yasvika kumafainari apo yakakundwa zvibodzwa 2-0 neLiverpool.   Kubva ipapo, mukombe mumwe chete wakatorwa naPochettino ndeweCoupe De France nePSG mwaka wapfuura. – SportsMail

headline: Zifa yokumbira FIFA
text: AKAFANOBATA chigaro chemutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa), Gift Banda, anoti vakanyorera kuFIFA vachikumbira kuti Zimbabwe idzorwe mumhuri yenhabvu yepasi rose zvichitevera zvirango zvayakatemerwa izvo zvakaona ichiburitswa mumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations.   Svondo radarika, sangano reSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) rakazivisa kuti Banda ndiye akafanobata chigaro chemukuru weZifa zvichitevera kumiswa basa kwakaitwa Felton Kamambo achipomerwa mhosva yekuti aive asiri kuita basa rake nemazvo.   Kamambo akamiswa basa pamwe chete neaive mutevedzeri wake, Philemon Machana naBrighton Malandure uyo aive nhengo yebhodhi raaitungamirira.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Banda anoti yakwana nguva yekugadzirisa nhabvu yemuZimbabwe kuti ichisimukira igove nechiremerera chakanaka.   Zvichitevera kugadzwa kwaakaitwa pachigaro chinopisa ichi, Banda anoti bhodhi rake rakatonyorera kuFIFA richikumbira kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe zvibviswe.   “Takanyorera kuFIFA svondo radarika neChishanu tichivazivisa patasvika panyaya dzenhabvu dzemuno uye tichikumbira kuti zvirango zvavakaisa zvibviswe. Kutaura kuno takamirira kunzwa kubva kuFIFA asi tinoziva kuti tiri kutarisira kugamuchira mashoko anofadza kubva kwavari.   “Hakuna nyika inopihwa zvirango neFIFA zvoramba zviripo zvachose, zvinotobva chete. Saka isu tinovimba kuti muhurukuro dzatiri kuita neFIFA tichasvika apo patichawirirana kuti zvirango zvatakatemerwa zvigobviswa,” anodaro.   Mumwedzi yadarika, vatambi vemaWarriors vakaita saKhama Billiat naKnowledge Musona vakasendeka shangu dzavo dzekutambira chikwata chenyika ichi kuchiti vamwe vanotambira kuEngland vakadai saTendayi Darikwa vange vave kutsvaga zvikonzero zvakasiyana zvekusauya kuzotamba nekuda kwezvinyunyuto zvakare.   Banda anoti anozviziva kuti vatambi vazhinji vane zvinyunyuto nekudaro bhodhi rake richaona kuti ragara pasi nevatambi vose vonzwa zvichemo zvavo pamwe nekuzama kuzvigadzirisa.   “Tiri kutanga patsva kugadzirisa zvinhu zvose zvine chekuita nenhabvu yemuno muZimbabwe.   Chimwe chinhu chikuru chatinoda kuita kugara pasi nevatambi vedu vose vemuno nevekuEurope tonzwa zvinyunyuto zvavo isu toshanda kuzvigadzirisa.   “Vatambi vedu vane chitsama vanotambira nhabvu yavo kunze kwenyika vange vave kusada kuuya nekuda kwezvinyunyuto zvakawanda. Saka tiri kuzvigadzirisa zvose, tozofamba pamwe chete tichifara,” anodaro.   Banda anoti rimwe basa guru riripo pari zvino kuona kuti nhandare dzinotambirwa nhabvu dzagadziriswa dzisvike padanho rinotarisirwa neFIFA neCAF.   “Ino ndiyo nguva yekuti tigadzirise zvinhu zvose tivake patsva nhabvu yedu muno. Dai takanzi titambe mitambo yekurwira kuenda kuAFCON shuwa zvaibuda here tichinotambira kune dzimwe nyika dzakaita seZambia, Mozambique neSouth Africa?   “Zvange zvisingambobude, isu tiri kuda kuti mitambo yedu inge ichitambirwa muno. Saka nguva ino ndiyo yekugadzirisa zvose zvange zvakakanganisika zvigotibatsira kuti nhabvu yedu painodzorwa zvinhu zvose zvinge zvakarongeka.   “Vanhu pavanotaura nezvezvikwata zvenyika, vanongofunga maWarriors chete asi tine zvemaUnder-15, 17, 21, 23 nezvimwe zvemazera akasiyana. Saka toda kuti kwese kubva kune vechidiki kunge kwakarongeka,” anodaro Banda.

headline: Tanganda Half Marathon yadzoka
text: SHANGWITI dzemujaho wekumhanya dzemuZimbabwe nepasi rose dziri kutarisirwa kukwikwidza mumujaho weTanganda Half Marathon uyo uchaitwa svondo rinotevera.   Mujaho uyu wadzoka gore rino zvichitevera kumiswa kwawainge wambaoitwa makore maviri adarika nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 icho chakaona mitambo yose ichimbomiswa senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri.   Mutungamiri wesangano reNational Athletics Association of Zimbabwe – Tendai Tagara – anoti mujaho weTanganda Half Marathon wakakosha zvikuru munyika sezvo uriwo wavanoshandisa kusarudza vamhanyi vanozonomirira nyika kumijaho mikuru yakaita seWorld Half Marathon.   Mujaho weWorld Half Marathon gore rino uchaitirwa kunyika yeChina munaGumiguru uye shasha dzinohwina paTanganda Half Mara[1]thon dzinobva dzawana tikiti rekuenda kumujaho mukuru uyu.   “Zvinhu zvinofadza kuti mumwe wemijaho mikuru munyika medu weTanganda Half Marathon wadzoka. Uyu mujaho mukuru wataigara tichitarisira makore ose sezvo uriwo watinoshandisa kusarudza vamhanyi vanozonomirira nyika kuWorld Half Marathon.   “Saka tinotenda vakotsveri vedu veTanganda nekutirongera mujaho uyu uyo wakatikoshera pamwe nevamhanyi vedu vakasiyana.   “Vachahwina mumujaho uyu vachangobva vawana tikiti rekuenda kuChina munaGumiguru kunomirira nyika kumujaho weWorld Half Marathon,” anodaro Tagara.   Farai Garai anove operations manager kuTanganda Tea Company anoti vanonzwa manyukunyuku nekudzoka kwemujaho uyu.   “Tatarisira kudzoka kwemujaho wedu uyo tange tave nemakore maviri tisiri kuronga nekuda kweCovid-19 sezvo inguva iyo taifanira kumbochengetedza hupenyu hwedu.   “Tiri kutarisira shangwiti dzinomhanya dzinodarika 1 000 kuuya kuzokwikwidza nekuti kune vakawanda vari kugara vachiridza nhare vachida kunzwa nekunyoresa mujaho uyu,” anodaro Garai.   Shasha dzekumhanya marathon dzinoti Misheck Sithole naOlivia Chitate ndivo vakapedzisira kuhwina mujaho weTanganda Half Marathon mugore ra2019.

headline: Afcon: Ngatirongekei
text: VARAIRIDZI nevatsigiri venhabvu votambira nemufaro mukuru draw rekurwira kuenda kumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) 2023 iro rakaona Zimbabwe ichiiswa muboka Group K pamwe chete neMorocco, South Africa neLiberia.   Muboka iri muri kutarisirwa kubuda zvikwata zviviri zvichaenda kumutambo mukuru wenhabvu wemuAfrica uyo uchatambirwa kuIvory Coast gore rinotevera.   Murairidzi wenhabvu ane mukurumbira, Luke ‘Vahombe’ Masomere, anoti maWarriors anogona kukunda chero chikwata chipi chemuAfrica asi hunge kana akarongeka chete.   Anoti gadziriro dzekuenda kuIvory Coast dzinofanirwa kutanga izvezvi kwete kumirira mazuva ekupedzisira.   “Draw takariona rakanaka chose, Zimbabwe tinotokunda zvikwata zvose zviri muboka redu, topedzerana nazvo zvose uye tiri kutoenda kuIvory Coast.   “Chinhu chikuru chatinofanirwa kuita kurongeka chete, totanga kuita gadziriro dzedu pachiri nenguva chete.   Kazhinji tinozvikanyira zvinhu zvedu toga nekusarongeka, saka ngatirongeke tigoenda kuIvory Coast,” anodaro Vahombe. Kuchiti murairidzi weCranborne Bullets, Nesbert ‘Yabo’ Saruchera, anoti mazuva ano hakuchina chikwata chinonzi chiri muAfrica sezvo zvose zvichitamba nhabvu yepamusoro.   “Tichitarisa muboka redu, zvikwata zvese zvatichasangana nazvo tinozvikunda, hapana chatinofanirwa kutya. Patichasangana nazvo tinofanirwa kuhwina mitambo yedu yose yemuno tozoenda kwavo kunorwa kuti tibve tiine chibodzwa chete, tikadaro ndinoona tichibuda muboka iri tichienda mberi,” anodaro Yabo.   Mutsigiri mukuru wenhabvu, Adomsi Mukwasi, anoti Zimbabwe yatove netikiti rekuenda kuIvory Coast gore rinotevera.   “Tichitarisa zvikwata zvese zvatichasangana nazvo, hapana chingativhundutse kubva pane South Africa, Liberia kana iyo Morocco. Tiri kufanirwa kungorongeka chete,” anodaro Mukwasi.   Aimbove sachigaro weBlue Swallows, Public Mpofu, anotiwo draw rakanaka uye chiri kungodiwa kuti gadziriro dzechikwata chenyika dzitange paine nguva kuitira kuti pasawane chinokanganisa mafambiro achaita mitambo yemaWarriors.   “Draw rakanakisa chaizvo asi chinhu chinongodiwa chete kurongeka, toita gadziriro nguva ichiripo. Pasina izvozvo hapana kwatinoenda, ngatigadzirire pachiri nenguva,” anodaro Mpofu.   Zvakadaro, sangano reConfederation of African Football (CAF) rakazivisa kuti riri kupa Zimbabwe masvondo maviri ekuti idzorere vatungamiriri veZifa pabasa zvichitevera kudzingwa kwavakaitwa vachipomerwa kusaita basa ravo zvakanaka uye kana izvi zvikasaitwa maWarriors anobva aburitswa mumutambo weAfcon.   Nekune rimwe divi, gurukota rezvemitambo nevechidiki, Dr Kirsty Coventry, vanoti mamiriro ezvinhu zvichitevera zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nesangano rinoona nezvenhabvu pasi rose reFifa achazivikanwa munguva pfupi iri kutevera.

headline: ‘Tave kuda Afcon’
text: . Chiyangwa otaura nezvekuhwinha kuCosaf   MUTUNGAMIRIRI wesangano rinoona nezvenhabvu munyika reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa), Phillip Chiyangwa, anoti hapana chinotadzisa maWarriors kuhwina mukombe weAfcon zvichitevera kutora kwakaita chikwata ichi mukombe weCosafa svondo rapera.   Zimbabwe yakasimudza mukombe weCosafa apo yakakunda Zambia 4-2 mufainari yemutambo uyu kuPolokwane, kuSouth Africa. Chiyangwa anoti maWarriors munguva pfupi inotevera achange ave kuita gadziriro dzemutambo weAfcon apo achasangana neCongo kuStade Municipal deKintele kuBrazzaville muna Gunyana.   “Zvikwata zvizhinji zvemuAfrica takazvikunda saka hapana chinotitadzisa kuti tirwire mukombe weAfcon, tinozviita uye tichazviita, Afcon ndiyo yatave kuda.   “Asi chikuru ndechekuti titange tabudirira kuenda kumutambo uyu muna Gunyana,” anodaro.   Anoti maWarriors ave kukodzerawo kukwikwidza muWorld Cup.

headline: Benjani adzingwa neNgezi
text: MURAIRIDZI weNgezi Platinum Stars, Benjani Mwaruwari adzingwa basa nechikwata ichi nhasi zvichitevera kusatamba zvinogutsa kwachange chichiita mumitambo yacho yeCastle Lager Premiership.   Benjani adzingwa basa mushure mekurairidza chikwata ichi mumitambo 13 iyo akangokwanisa kuhwina mitatu, ndokuita mangange mitanhatu uye kukundwa mina.   Akagadzwa pachigaro chinopisa ichi zvichitevera kudzingwa basa kwainge kwakaitwa Rodwell Dhlakama mwedzi mishoma yadarika.   Zvakawanda zviri kutevera.

headline: Loga marara: Grobbelaar
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa munhabvu ichitambira maWarriors nezvikwata zvinosanganisira Highlanders neLiverpool — Bruce “Jungleman” Grobbelaar — inoti Zdravko “Loga” Logarusic, uyo ari kutungamirira chikwata chenyika, murairidzi nhando pane vose vakamborairidza maWarriors.   Achitaura pachirongwa chaAlois Bunjira cheZim Soccernet, icho anoita hurukuro neshasha dzaakambotamba nadzo nhabvu, Jungleman anoti anoda chaizvo kudzoka kuzoshanda nemaWarriors sezvo pari zvino ari kutambisirwa nguva yawo naLoga.   Kusvika pari zvino, Loga arairidza maWarriors mumitambo 14 apo akangokwanisa kuhwina mumwechete, ndokuita mangange mimwe mishanu uye ndokukundwa misere. Nemusi weChipiri chino, maWarriors akakundwa 2-1 neEthiopia mumutambo wekurwira kuenda ku2022 World Cup.   Jungleman anoti matambiro ari kuita maWarriors anoratidza kuti Loga hapana zvaanoziva. “Ndinoda chaizvo kudzoka kuzoshanda nemaWarriors izvozvi, asi pane mumwe munhu aripo ari kuita basa iri. Asi mumaziso angu, muchinda uyu hapana zviri kuzivikanwa, arairidza mitambo inopfuura 12 akahwina mumwechete akaita mangange mishanu uye mimwe yese kurohwa chete, zvoratidza kuti ndiye murairidzi nhando pane vose vakambotungamira chikwata chenyika yedu.   “Nhoroondo yemitambo yaarairidza inotaura zvakawanda,” anodaro Jungleman.   Anoti chikwata chemaWarriors chiripo pari zvino chizere netarenda rinonwisa mvura zvekuti vanogona kusvika padanho rechikwata chakamboita mukurumbira che“The Dream Team” icho chaakatambirawo nevamwe vatambi vanosanganisira Peter Ndlovu apo vairairidzwa naReinhard Fabisch.   “Chikwata chatinacho iye zvino chine tarenda rinodadisa rinonwisa mvura uye vanogona kusvika padanho ratakasvika isu seDream Team. Vanofanirwa kungobikwa chete vorakidzwa gwara chairo rekufamba naro.   “Tine vatambi vakawanda vari kutambira kunyika dzeEurope, saka murairidzi wedu anofanirwa kuvabata vose ovakurudzira kuti vauye kuzotambira maWarriors uye ovazivisa zvakanakira kutambira nyika yavo.   “Ini ndikapihwa basa iri nhasi, chekutanga kubata vatambi vose ndovakurudzira kuti huyai kumusha mutambire nyika yenyu,” anodaro Jungleman.   Jungleman anoti matambiro ari kuita maWarriors anoratidza kuti Loga hapana zvaanoziva.

headline: Vakaona maWarriors mahara
text: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vane chitsama nemusi weChishanu chadarika vakaona bhora remaWarriors neBotswana reAfcon Qualifier kuNational Sports Stadium “mahara’’ sezvo vaingosvetuka mudhuri vachipinda munhandare iyi apo mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police aive akayeva.   Mubhadharo wekupinda munhandare yeNSS waive $20 kubhombera, kugara paBay 15 kusvika ku18 kwaiita $50 kozoti kuVIP kwaita $120.   Asi kune vamwe – vanhurume nevanhukadzi –  vakapinda mahara apo vaisvetuka mudhuri vachipinda mukati menhandare.   Kwayedza yakazvionera vamwe vatsigiri venhabvu vachisvetuka mudhuri vachipinda munhandare iyi uye mamwe mapurisa aitonzwikwa achikurudzira vatsigiri ava achiti, “Svetukai nekuchimbidza”.   Mutauriri wemapurisa munyika Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vanoti imhosva huru kana mapurisa akatyora mutemo nekusaita basa ravo nemazvo zvakadai sekupihwa chiokomuhomwe vachisiya munhu achipara mhosva.   Vanoti pachaferefetwa nyaya yemapurisa ari kupomerwa kuti aisiya vanhu vachisvetuka mudhuri vachipinda munhandare yeNSS nenzira dzechitsotsi.   “Imhosva huru iyoyo uye hatitombozvitendere, kana paine vaizviita tichavatsvaga uye vakabatwa mutongo wavanopihwa wakakura zvekusvika pakudzingwa basa.   “Hatitarisire mapurisa edu kuita izvozvo zvekupinza vanhu munhandare mahara ivo vachifanirwa kuchengetedza kuona kuti vanhu havasi kupinda mahara uye hatitode kunzwa kuti pane vari kutambira chiokomuhomwe kuti vanhu vatyore mutemo. Isu semapurisa, hatidi hunhu ihoho,” vanodaro Asst Comm Nyathi.   Mutauriri wesangano reZifa uyo anovazve competitions manager, Xolisani Gwesela, paakaziviswa nezvenyaya iyi neKwayedza musi watambwa mutambo uyu akangoti anoda kurakidzwa mifananidzo yacho iyo akarakidzwa nemutori wenhau uno asi ndokungoridza tsamwa achirakidza kushamisika nazvo.   Svondo rino, Kwayedza yakazomutumira mibvunzo paWhatsApp ichibvumunzisisa kuti Zifa yakawana marii kubva pamutambo weZimbabwe neBotswana, Gwesela ndokuti vachiri kumboongorora kuti vakawana marii.   Paakabvunzwa nezvenyaya yemapurisa ayo aisiya vanhu vachipinda munhandare mahara, Gwesela anoti akange asina kuona mifananidzo yacho zvakanaka saka anoda kuti munyori uno amutumire.   “Tichiri kuongorora kuti tione kuti zvakafamba sei.   “Mubvunzo wechipiri, tangai manditumira mifananidzo yacho, handinda kuiona zvakanaka,” anodaro Gwesela.   Mumutambo uyu, Zimbabwe neBotswana zvakaita mangange 0-0 izvo zvakasiya vatsigiri vazhinji vemaWarriors vachigunun’una zvikuru.   Zvakadai, mumutambo wakatambirwa kuLusaka, kuZambia nemusi weChipiri chino, Zimbabwe yakakunda Zambia 2 – 1.   MaWarriors ari muGroup H umo mune zvimwe zvikwata zvinosanganisira Algeria, Zambia neBotswana.

headline: Haisi nguva yekufunga nhabvu, asi upenyu: PSL
text: PREMIER Soccer League (PSL) inoti ichamirira kuudzwa pamwe nekupihwa mvumo neSport and Recreation Commission (SRC) kuti nhabvu izotanga kutambwa zvekare zvichitevera kumiswa kwayakaitwa pamwe chete nemimwe mitambo apo mukombe weChibuku Super Cup wange uri pakati pekutambwa.   Nguva pfupi yadarika apo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwakatanga kukwira zvekare, SRC yakamisa mitambo yose kunze kweyezvikwata zvichamirira nyika zvinosanganisira maWarriors ayo ari kuSouth Africa uko ari mumitambo yeCosafa Cup kozoita chikwata chenyika checricket chemaChevrons chiri kubandana necheBangladesh mumitambo yeTest match, one day international netwenty20 series. Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino, chamangwiza wePSL – Kennedy “Kenny” Ndebele – anoti sePSL, vari kukoshesa mitemo yose yeHurumende yekurwisa denda reCovid-19 uye havasi kufunga nezvekudzoka kwenhabvu pari zvino sezvo chinhu chikuru chavari kukoshesa utano neupenyu hweveruzhinji.   “Utano neupenyu hweruzhinji ndizvo zvakakosha panguva ino, saka ngatimbomire zvekufunga kuti nhabvu inodzoka rinhi kana kuti tichatanga kuitamba rinhi apo vamwe vanhu vari kufa.   “SePSL tiri kutevedzera zvose zvatinenge taudzwa kuti tiite neSRC neHurumende nekuti denda iri riri kuuraya vanhu uye nguva ino yatiri haina kumira zvakanaka zvachose. Kana nguva yekuti nhabvu ichidzoka ikakwana ndine chivimbo kuti SRC ichatizivisa ipapo tobva tasimudzira mutambo weChibuku Super Cup uyo watakambosendeka parutivi kwazvino.   “Ino inguva yekuti tichengetedze upenyu hweveruzhinji,” anodaro Ndebele. Ndebele anoenderera mberi achiti kudzoka kwenhabvu yePSL kuri mumaoko eSRC saka naizvozvo ivo vachangotevedzera gwara ravanenge vaziviswa kuti vagofamba naro.   “Zvinhu zvose zviri mumaoko eSRC, isu hatikwanise kupikisa mitemo yeHurumende. Covid-19 iriko uye kana zvichinzi mitambo imbomira kuitira kuti vanhu vachengetedzeke, ndizvo zvatinotevedzera izvozvo.   “Saka gwara ratichapihwa maringe nekuzodzoka kwenhabvu zvose zviri mumaoko eSRC, ndiyo inotiudza zvekuti totevedzera saizvozvo,” anodaro.
