Apo zvimwe zvikwata zvange zvichiendesa vatambi vazvo kunobaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19, Kwayedza yakaedza kubvunza kuna Ndebele kuti vari kuona sei mafambiro ari kuita nyaya dzekubaiwa kwenhomba yeCovid-19 muzvikwata zvavo uye zvikwata zvose zvati zvaenda here, iye ndokupindura achiti, “Panguva ino hatisati tave kukwanisa kutaura nezvenyaya iyoyo, tichazokuzivisai pamberi apo kuti zvingani zvabaisa vatambi vazvo nhomba yeCovid-19.   “Asi semutemo wenyika wekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19, zvakakosha kuti munhu wese anobaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19.”

headline: Kuda okunga zvibhakera
text: SHASHA yetsiva yechidzimai yeWorld Boxing Council (WBC) Interim Title – Kudakwashe Memory “Take Money” Chiwandire – atanga gadziriro dzake svondo rino dzekuzosangana naYamileth Mercado wekuMexico.   Vatambi vaviri ava vacharwira bhande rina Mercado reWBC Gold mumutambo uchiri pakati pekurongwa.   Kutaura kuno, chikwata chaTake Money naMercado zvakamirira kupihwa gwaro neWBC kuti vachitanga kuita hurukuro dzekuronga mutambo uyu.   Murairidzi waTake Money arizve maneja wake, Clyde Musonda, anoti chikwata chavo chakamirira kunzwa kubva kuWBC kuti vochitanga rinhi kuita hurukuro nechikwata chaMercado.   Anoti apo vakamirira gwaro iri, vakatotanga kuita gadziriro dzemutambo uyu sezvo vari kuda kuti Take Money agare akagadzirira.   “Take Money akatanga gadziriro dzake svondo rino takatarisana nemutambo waMercado, kunyangwe zvazvo tichakamirira kunzwa kubva kuWBC nekuti ndivo vanotipa mvumo yekuti chitangai kuita hurukuro mushure mekuita ongororo yavo.   “Isu tiri kuda kugara takagadzirira nekuti patichasangana naMercado, Take Money anenge asiri kumirira Zimbabwe chete, asi Africa yose. Saka tinoda kutorera Mercado bhande rake riuye kuno,” anodaro Musonda.   Anoti kana hurukuro dzekuronga mutambo uyu dzikatanga, shuviro yavo ndeyekuti uitwe gore rinotevera munaKukadzi kana Kurume.   Musonda anoti murwendo rwekugadzirira mutambo uyu, vachaenda kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neNamibia kunoita gadziriro sezvo mutambo wavatarisana nawo uri mukuru.   “Sezvo mutambo wedu wekupedzisira apo takarwa naZulina Munoz waive uri munaGumiguru, tinoda kuti unotevera Kudah agorwa naMercado munaKukadzi kana Kurume.   “Asi, hunge hurukuro dzedu nechikwata chake dzikafamba zvakanaka.   “Tiri pakati pekuita hurukuro, tichaenda naKudah kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neNamibia tichinosimbaradza gadziriro dzake dzemutambo uyu nekuti nyika idzi dzine magym etsiva ane zvinhu zvose zvakakwana anobatsira kuti gadziriro dzedu dzifambe zvakanaka,” anodaro Musonda.

headline: Zim Cricket yotarisira kuna Houghton
text: ZIMBABWE Cricket inoti iri kutarisira zvikuru kubva kumurairidzi mutsva wemaChevrons – Dave Houghton – uyo akagadzwa pachigaro chinopisa ichi svondo radarika.   Houghton akatsiva Lalchand Rajput zvichitevera kupihwa kwaakaitwa chigaro chitsva chatechnical director.   Givemore Makoni anove managing director weZC anoti Houghton inyanzvi yecricket muZimbabwe nekudaro chikwata chemaChevrons chichange chiri mumaoko akanaka.   Aka kachange kari kechipiri Houghton achiraidza maChevrons uye akambochitambira chikwata ichi ari kaputeni asati atanga kurairidza mutambo uyu.   “Dave Houghton igamba recricket munyika yedu uye anoziva zvinodiwa kuti mutambo uyu usimukire zvikuru. Saka takamupa basa iri nechinangwa chekuti asimudzire mutambo uyu sezvo tange tadzikira.   “Munhu akatambira maChevrons ari mutungamiri wevatambi ndokuzorairidza chikwata ichi zvekare makore ayo chaitamba mhando yecricket yepamusoro-soro. Saka tinotarisira zvikuru kwaari uye tinovimba kuti achasimudzira zvekare matambiro echikwata chedu,” anodaro Makoni.    Givemore Makoni   Zvichitevera kugadzwa kwake, Houghton ari kutarisirwa kutungamira maChevrons mumutambo we2022 ICC Men’s T20 World Cup Global Qualifier B wekurwira kuenda kuICC 2022 T20 World Cup uyo uchatambirwa kuAustralia munaGumiguru gore rino.   Mutambo wekurwira kuenda kumakwishu aya uchatambirwa muno mwedzi unotevera uye uchange uine zvikwata zvisere. MaChevrons ari muboka rekutanga rine zvimwe zvikwata zvinoti Jersey, Indonesia neUnited States of America kuchiti rimwe boka rine zvikwata zvinoti Hong Kong, Netherlands, Papua New Guinea neUganda.   Muboka rega-rega muchabuda zvikwata zviviri izvo zvichaenda kumasemi-final.   Zvikwata zvinohwina musemi-final ndizvo zvichabudirira kuenda kuAustralia.

headline: Tichapedzerana neBurkina Faso: Mpandare
text: MANEJA wechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors – Wellington Mpandare – anoti vari kutarisira kuti vachatamba nhabvu yepamusoro apo vari kusangana neBurkina Faso nhasi mumutambo wavo wechipiri wemuGroup A Africa Nations Championship (CHAN) kuCameroon.   Mutambo wekutanga wemaWarriors wakatambwa nemusi weMugovera wadarika apo vakakundwa 1-0 neCameroon.   Mpandare anoti kupedza nguva refu vatambi vasingatambe nhabvu uye kuvhiringidzwa kwavakazoitwa neCovid-19 kwakakonzera kuti chikwata chavo chisatambe zvakanaka.   “Zvange zvisiri nyore kwatiri nekuti nhabvu munyika haisi kutambwa kwegore rose uye kuzoti iyo Covid-19 yakativhiringidza zvikuru gadziriro dzedu dzeCHAN.   “Chimwezve, mutambo wekutanga wagara unonetsa muchitamba nechikwata chinenge chiri pamusha pacho. Asi tinotarisira kusvika kure,” anodaro Mpandare.   Anoenderera mberi achiti,”Tinotarisira kuti tichatamba zvakasiyana patiri kusangana neBurkina Faso. Yakati simbei kudarika Cameroon zvayo.”

headline: MaUnder-19 oenda kuWorld Cup
text: ZIMBABWE Cricket (ZC) yakadoma chikwata chemadzimai cheUnder-19 chichanokwikwidza kumutambo weInternational Cricket Council (ICC) Under-19 Women’s T20 World Cup kuSouth Africa.   Mutambo weICC Under-19 Women’s World Cup uchatanga nemusi wa14 Ndira uye uchizopera nemusi wa29 Ndira.   Zimbabwe yakaiswa muboka reGroup B rine zvimwe zvikwata zvinoti England, Pakistan neRwanda.   Muchinyorwa, ZC inoti chikwata chakasarudzwa naTrevor Phiri kuenda kumutambo uyu chichatungamirirwa naKelis Ndlovu uyo anove kaputeni.   Ndlovu mumwe wevatambi vecricket vechidzimai vari kusimukira munyika uye nguva pfupi yadarika, akambonomirira Zimbabwe achitambira chikwata chevakuru.   Izvi zvakamuona achitamba mumutambo weICC Women’s T20 World Cup Qualier 2022 kuUnited Arab Emirates munaGunyana gore radarika.   Kumutambo weUnder-19 World Cup, kuchange kuine zvikwata 16 izvo zvakaiswa mumapoka mana ezvikwata zvina.   Muboka rega-rega, muchabuda zvikwata zviviri zvichazonokwikwidza kuSuper Six League zvichirwira kupinda mufainari yemutambo uyu.   Zimbabwe mumutambo wekutanga ichasangana neEngland nemusi wa15 Ndira, yozosangana neRwanda nemusi wa17 Ndira uye mutambo wekupedzisira wemuboka iri ichatatsurana nePakistan nemusi wa19 Ndira.   Chikwata cheZimbabwe chichaenda kuWorld Cup kuSouth Africa chine vatambi vanotevera: Kelis Ndhlovu (kaputeni), Kelly Ndiraya, Kay Ndiraya, Adel Zimunhu, Natasha Mutomba, Vimbai Mutungwindu, Danielle Meikle, Tawananyasha Marumani, Michelle Mavunga, Olinda Chare, Kudzai Chigora, Betty Mangachena, Chipo Moyo, Faith Ndhlalambi naRukudzo Mwakayeni.

headline: Manica Diamonds yadzinga Nhumwa
text: CHIKWATA chenhabvu cheManica Diamonds nhasi chadzinga basa murairidzi wacho Johanisi Nhumwa pamwe chete nevatevedzeri vake vose.   Nhumwa adzingwa basa zvichitevera kukundwa kwakaita Manica Diamonds nezuro neDynamos FC 1-0 uye asiya chikwata ichi chakagara pechi10 palog kubva mumitambo 29 yachatamba mwaka uno.   Chinyorwa chabva kuManica Diamonds chinoti, “Manica Diamonds Football Club inoda kuzivisa vose vainoshanda nayo kuti taparadzana nemuridzi wedu, Johanisi Nhumwa nevatevedzeri vake.   “Tinotenda zvikuru nebasa ravakaita kuchikwata chedu saka tinovashuvira rombo rakanaka mune remangwana ravo.” Manica Diamonds yabva yatsiva Nhumwa naJairosi Tapera uyo achange achitevedzerwa naTafadzwa Mashiri, Patrick Mandizha, Thembinkosi SIbanda nevamwe.

headline: Japan chidzidzo — Makusha
text: SHANGWITI yemujaho wekumhanya — Ngoni Makusha —inoti yakadzidza zvakawanda kumakwikwi emaOlympics ayo pari zvino ari kuitirwa kuJapan uye yave kushanda nesimba kuti igokwanisa kudzokera zvekare kumitambo iyi mumakore mana anotevera.   Makusha mumwe wevatambi vashanu vange vachimirira nyika kumitambo iyi.   Nemusi weMugovera akakwikwidza mumijaho miviri apo wekutanga wakaita kuti azopinda mumujaho mukuru umo akazopedza ari pechinomwe ndokubva aburitswa mumutambo uyu.   Achitaura ari kuJapan achigadzirira kudzoka kumusha, Makusha anoti zvinhu zvinofadza zvikuru kumirira nyika kumutambo mukuru wakaita semaOlympics uye ave kutotanga kugadzirira kuzoenda kunokwikwidza zvakare kune mimwe inotevera.   “Ndiri kunzwa kufara kuti ndakazadzikisa chishuwo changu chekukwikwidza kumaOlympics. Ndakadzidza zvakawanda zvandichagara nazvo uye iye zvino ndave kutotanga gadziriro dzangu dzekuti ndizodzokera kune mamwe maOlympics anotevera. Gore rinotevera, ndinoda kunokwikwidza kumaWorld Championships,” anodaro Makusha.   Kunyangwe hake ari kudzoka kumusha asina menduru yaakabata, Makusha anoti haasi kutarisira izvozvo nekuti chikuru kwaari kwaive kuenda kunokwikwidza kumutambo uyu achidzingirirana nedzimwe shasha dzepasi rese.   Anoti rutsigiro rwaange achiwana rwuri kumusimudzira zvekuti acharamba achishanda nesimba. “Rutsigiro rwandange ndichipihwa kubva kuvanhu vakawanda rwunosimudzira naizvozvo ini ndicharamba ndichishanda nesimba kuitira kuti mune remangwana ndigounza menduru. “Chikuru chandaitarisira pandakaenda kumutambo uyu kusvika ndokwikwidzawo zita rangu rozivikanwa izvo ndakakwanisa kuita.   Kukwikwidza kumutambo uyu kwakanakisa chose nekuti unoramba uchidzokera, iye zvino ndave kushanda nesimba kuitira kuti ndigoramba ndichidzokera kunokwikwidza kumutambo uyu.”

headline: MaChevrons omirira Sri Lanka
text: CHIKWATA cheZimbabwe Cricket (ZC) chemaChevrons chichasangana necheSri Lanka mumitambo miviri yeTest Match Series ichatambirwa kuHarare Sports Club mwedzi uno.   Mutambo wekutanga uriko musi wa19 uye uchizopera musi wa23 Ndira kozoti wechipiri uchizotanga musi wa27 uchipera musi wa31 Ndira.   Murairidzi wemaChevrons, Lalchand Rajput, anoti ari kutarisira zvikuru kumutambo uyu.   “Sri Lanka chikwata chikuru mumutambo uyu uye change chichitamba zvepamusoro kwenguva refu. Saka ndiri kutarisira zvikuru mumutambo weTest match uyu. Kwatiri kutanga patsva uye zvakatinakira kutanga nemutambo uyu wakakura sezvo unoburitsa zvipo zviri muvatambi vedu,” anodaro.   Chikwata chemaChevrons chiri kupinda mukembi svondo rino umo chichatanga kuita gadziriro dzacho.   MaChevrons akapedzisira kukwikwidza mumutambo wetest mugore ra2018 apo akasangana neBangladesh, kuBangladesh.   Rajput anoti ane chivimbo chikuru kuti chikwata chake chichatamba zvinonwisa mvura chiri pamusha.   “Tinowanzotamba zvakanaka tiri pamusha saka tine chivimbo chikuru kuti tichatamba zvinogutsa uye zvinofadza. Vatambi vedu vange vachitamba mitambo yakasiyana-siyana saka tinofanirwa kutamba zvepamusoro. Hatina hedu kutamba mitambo yakawanda asi ndinoziva vatambi vari kutarisira zvikuru mumutambo uyu,” anodaro.   Sri Lanka yakapedzisira kutamba nemaChevrons mumitambo yeTest match mugore ra2016 ndokuhwina mitambo yose iri miviri.   Zvakadaro, ZC yakazivisa svondo rino kuti Sean Williams ndiye achange ari kaputeni wechikwata ichi mumitambo yeTest match kozoti Chamu Chibhabha achambofanobatawo chigaro chehukaputeni mumitambo yeOne Day International neTwenty20 series.   Vaviri ava vakatsiva Hamilton Masakadza uyo akasendeka kutamba mutambo uyu gore radarika.   Masakadza ave director of cricket kuZC uye ndiye akakurudzira bhodhi reZC kuti rikwidziridze vatambi vaviri ava kuvagadza pazvigaro izvi.

headline: Kuzunza mambure konetsa
text: 2017: 17; 2018: 17   Abel Ndooka MUMAKORE masere adarika, zvikwata zvinokwikwidza muCastle Premiership zviri kukundikana kubika mutambi anokwanisa kunwisa ka20 mumwaka mumwe chete.   Izvi zvakapedzisirwa kuitwa mugore ra2010 apo Norman Maroto – uyo aitambira Gunners FC – akanwisa ka22 ndokuhwina mubairo weGolden boot.   Kubva gore iri, hapanazve mumwe mutambi akwanisa kuzviita uye mwaka uno Rodwell Chinyengetere weFC Platinum – shasha dzeCastle Premiership – ndiye akahwina mubairo uyu asi akakwanisa kunwisa ka17 chete mwaka wese.   Gore radarika, Dominic Chungwa akanwisawo ka17 zvakare achitambira CAPS UNITED.   Muhurukuro nevamwe varairidzi, vanoti kuti muCastle Premiership munyatsobude mutambi anonwisa ka20 kana kudarika mumwaka mumwe chete zvinogona kuti netsei nekuti vatambi vacho hakuna.

headline: TAMIRIRA CHAN, COSAFA: MHOFU
text: MURAIRIDZI wechikwata chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors – Sunday “Mhofu” Chidzambwa anoti panguva ino ave kumbomira kufunga zvemakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) asi kurwira kuchengetedza mukombe weCosafa Senior Men’s Challenge Cup uye nekuenda kumutambo we2020 African Nations Championship (CHAN).   Svondo radarika, maWarriors akabudirira kuenda kumutambo weAfcon uyo uchaitirwa kuEgypt kutanga musi wa21 Chikumi uchizopera musi wa19 Chikunguru.   Chikwata chenyika ichi chakarakasha Congo-Brazzaville 2-0 zvakaita kuti chipedze chiri pamusoro muboka racho  muGroup G.   Aka kachange kari kechina maWarriors achienda kumutambo uyu.   Gore rino, zvakawanda zviri kutarisirwa kubva kumaWarriors kuAfcon sezvo makore adarika paakamboenda kumakwishu aya aingokundirwa muchikamu chekutanga.   Mhofu anoti panguva ino ave kumbomira kufunga zveAfcon sezvo chikwata chake chine mimwe mitambo ikoshosha iri kutevera yeCosafa neCHAN.   “Zvinhu zvinofadza kuti tiri kuenda kuAfcon zvakare asi panguva ino tave kufunga zvemimwe mitambo iri kutevera yeCosafa neCHAN.   “Tisu shasha dzeCosafa saka tinoda kurwira kuchengetedza mukombe wedu uyu munguva inotevera apo pachatambwa mutambo uyu,” anodaro.   Anoti mitambo yeCosafa neCHAN anoda kuishandisa kuongorora vatambi – kunyanya vanotambira nhabvu yavo muligi reCastle Premiership – ovapawo mukana wekurwira zvinzvimbo zvakasiyana muchikwata icho achazotakura kuenda nacho kuEgypt.   “Vatambi vatichasarudza kuenda navo kuCosafa neCHAN tinoda kuvapa mukana wekurwira zvinzvimbo muchikwata chevakuru icho chatichatakura kuenda nacho kuAfcon.   “Hatisati tave nechikwata chatichatakura kuenda kumutambo uyu, tichiri kuongorora vatambi vese uye vamwe vasina kumbobvira vambotamba vanogona kutokwana tikaenda navo,” anodaro.   Mutambo weCHAN unotambwa nevatambi vanotambira munyika dzavo chete.   MaWarriors haasati ambohwina mutambo uyu asi mugore ra2014 akasvika kusemi-fainari yemakwishu aya apo airairidzwa naIan “Dibango” Gorowa.   Mhofu anoti zvinonetsa kuti maWarriors ahwine mukombe uyu sezvo pese pavanenge vavaka chikwata chakasimba chinenge chichirwira kuenda kumutambo uyu, vamwe vatambi vanobva vatengwa kunze kwenyika saka zvinotoda kuti vabike vechidiki vakawanda.    Sunday Chidzambwa   “CHAN inonetsa kuti pese patinenge taruka chikwata chedu chevatambi vemuno, tave kugadzirira mumwe mutambi anobva abva atengwa kunze kwenyika, oenda kunotambira kunze. Saka zvinokanganisa gadziriro dzedu dzatinenge tichiita.   “Saka vechidiki ngavabikwe kuti zvisazotinetsa kutsvaga vamwe vatambi vekutsiva vanenge vabva,” anodaro.   Zvakadai, mutambo wemaWarriors neCongo-Brazzaville wainge wakazara nhandare zvekuti pane fungidziro huru kuti sangano rinotungamira nhabvu reZimbabwe Football Association rakaita mari kubva pamutambo uyu.   Mukushi wemashoko weZifa – Xolisani Gwesela – anoti vachiri kumboverenga kuti matikiti akatengwa mangani uye vachabvisa dhora patikiti roga roga rakatengwa voendesa kunobatsira mhuri dzakasangana nemafashamu emvura yaive nedutu guru yeCyclone Idai.   “Tichiri kumboverenga matikiti edu tione kuti akatengwa mangani uye isu tichabvisa dhora rimwe patikiti rese rakatengwa toenda kunobatsira vanhu vakasangana nemafashamu eCyclone Idai iyo yakauraya vanhu kunzvimbo dzakaita seChimanimani,” anodaro Gwesela.

headline: Mitambo yeCastle Premier Soccer League Yotsvuka Ropa
text: Makundano eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League atsvuka ropa kwasara mitambo mishanu kuti mitambo ipere. Zvave pachena kuti zvikwata zvitatu zvinoti FC Platinum, Caps United pamwe neHighlanders ndizvo zvasara zvichiri nemukana wekutora mukombe uyu. FC Platinum yaramba yakabatirira nzvimbo yayo yepamusoro mushure mekurova Dynamos 2-0 muMandava. Kugona Kunenge Kudada yave nemapoinzi makumi mashanu nerimwechete, rimwechete pamusoro peCaps United iyo yaramba iri pachinhanho chechipiri mushure mekurova How Mine 3-2. Vatsigiri veCaps United vakapemberera zvikuru mushure mekukunda kwavo. Asi pakave nekunyunyuta kukuru mushure mekunge Highlanders yapihwa penareti mutambo wave kupera neNgezi Platinum Stars. Vatambi veNgezi Platinum Stars vakaunganira muridzi wepembe vachiti yaive isiri penareti sezvo bhora risina kubatwa sezvaive zvaonekwa nemubati wepembe zvakapa kuti Highlanders ikunde 2-1. Kunyange zvakadaro. Highlanders yaramba iri pachinhanho chechitatu nemapoinzi makumi matatu nemasere.. Mutsigiri wechikwata ichi VaLovemore Majecha vanoti vari kunzwa kufara vachitarisira zvakawanda mwaka uno. ZPC Kariba yakadarika Dynamos nemapoinzi matatu mushure memangange 0-0 neMutare City Rovers. NeMugovera kwakaitazve mangange pakati zero kwa zero pakati peChapungu neBulawayo City. Chicken Inn yakaitawo mangange 1-1 neTriangle. Hwange yakatora mapoinzi matatu mushure mekukudambura Border Strikers 2-0.

headline: Boika onanga Germany
text: MUTAMBI wetsiva ane mukurumbira, Brendon ‘Boika’ Denes, ari mushishi kuita gadziriro dzekuenda kuGermany uko ari kutarisirwa kusangana naLaszlo Toti chizvarwa chekuHungary.   Boika, uyo ari kubatsirwa gadziriro dzake naClyde Musonda weDeltaforce Boxing Promotions, anoti uyu mukana mukuru waapihwa wekuramba achisimukira mumutambo wetsiva. Boika mitambo yake inorongwa nesangano reLionheart Boxing Promotions iyo inotungamirirwa naEdward Mendy anove chizvarwa chekuAmerica uye achatatsurana naToti musi wa30 Kubvumbi.   “Ndinonzwa manyukunyuku nemukana uyu wandapihwa wekuti ndiende kuGermany kunosangana naToti. Uyu mutambo mukuru kwandiri uye ndiri kushanda nesimba kuti ndigouhwina sezvo shuviro yangu kuti ndirambe ndichisimukira mumutambo wetsiva.   “Saka ndiri kushanda nesimba ndichibatsirwa mugadziriro dzangu naClyde Musonda uye neveCharles Manyuchi Academy,” anodaro.   Musonda anoti Boika mumwe wevatambi vetsiva vari kusimukira uye vane chipo saka anovimba kuti achanokunda mumutambo wake.   “Boika mutambi akazvibata anoziva zvaanoita saka ndinofara zvikuru kumubatsira mukugadzirira mutambo wake waakatarisana nawo.   “Ari kugadzirira mutambo wake ari mumaoko angu uye ini ndinofara chaizvo kumubatsira nekuti akanohwina senyika tinenge tahwinawo,” anodaro Musonda.   Boika anonyanyokuzivikanwa zvichitevera kuhwina kwaakaita mabhande eWBF intercontinental super lightweight mugore ra2019 uye akazohwina zvekare bhande reWBC Africa welterweight title gore radarika.

headline: Jongwe oshuvira Boston Marathon
text: SHANGWITI yemujaho wemarathon wewiricheya iri kusimukira — Stellah Jongwe — anoshuvira kuenda kunokwikwidza kumujaho mukuru une mukurumbira weBoston Marathon uyo unoitirwa kunyika yeUnited States of America.   Mujaho uyu unoitwa gore rega-rega munaKubvumbi uye unomhanywa neshasha dzakawanda dzinobva kunyika dzakasiyana. Shangwiti dzemarathon pasi rese dzakatotanga kunyoresa kuti dzigoenda kunokwikwidza kumujaho uyu wegore rinotevera.   Murairidzi waJongwe, Wilson Nyakoko, anoti chikwata chavo chiri kushanda zvakasimba kuti chikwanise kutumira Jongwe kunokwikwidza kuBoston Marathon.   Anoti Jongwe ane tarenda rinonwisa mvura saka vanoda kumuona achikwikwidza mumujaho mukuru uyu uyo uchabatsira kuti zita rake risimukire pasi rese.   “Jongwe musikana ari kusimukira zvakanyanya munyaya dzekukwikwidza mumujaho wemarathon wewiricheya uye sechikwata tiri kutarisira zvikuru kubva kwaari.   “Mwedzi yadarika, akahwina menduru yegoridhe kuSouth Africa saka tine chivimbo chekuti tikamutumira kuBoston Marathon anonodzoka negoridhe zvekare.   “Iye zvino tiri kushanda siku nesikati tichimhanya-mhanya kuona kuti tawana vakotsveri vanotibatsira kuti rwendo rwedu naJongwe rufambe zvakanaka kuenda kuBoston. Saka tiri kufamba tichigogodza kwakasiyana,” anodaro Nyakoko.   Jongwe akabudirira kuenda kumujaho uyu, anobva aita mumwe wevashoma vakwanisa kuenda kumakwikwi aya ayo anopindwa neshasha dzinodarika 27 000 dzinobva kunyika dzakasiyana.   Gore rino, range riri raJongwe sezvo akakwanisa kuhwina mijaho inosanganisira weOteniqua Wheelchair Challenge unoitirwa kuGeorge kuSouth Africa, Tanganda Half Marathon neCBZ Half Marathon.

headline: Mitambo yePremier Soccer League Yopinda Muvhiki reChinomwe Dynamos Ichinzi Isaite Mhirizhonga
text: Mhuri yenhabvu irikutarisira mitambo isina mhirizhonga apo makwikwi eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League ari kupinda musvondo rechinomwe. Mhuri yenhabvu munyika haisati yakanganwa mhirizhonga yakaitika svondo rapera apo vatsigiri veDynamos vakamuka chibhebhenenga mushure mekunge chikwata chavo chadamburwa 1-0 neFC Platinum vachitarisira kuti izvi hazvidzokororwe apo chikwata ichi chakananga kuBulawayo kunosangana neTsholotsho Pirates. Makwikwi eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League arikupinda musvondo rechinomwe apo Dynamos yacho iripachinhanho chakaoma chegumi neshanu asi mumwe mutsigiri Dembare VaShepard Manatsa vanoti vamwe vavo vanofanira kubvuma kukundwa kana izvi zvaitika. Asi VaManatsa vanoti chishuwiro chavo nedechekuti vakunde Tsholotsho Pirates kuitira kuti varambe vari muhondo yekukwikwidza kutora mukombe uyu uyo vakatorerwa neChicken Inn gore rapera. Asi vanoongorora zvemutambo wenhabvu vanoti zvirikutarisirwa naVaManatsa angangove maroto sezvo chikwata chavo chiri kutatarika. Dynamos ikakundwa, inosaririra zvikuru pazvikwata zviri kutungamira sezvo FC Platinum iyo iripamusoro soro isiri kutemwa nemusoro nekuti irikusangana neBorder Strikers iyo isina kana poindi imwechete kana chibodzwa zvacho pamitambo mitanhatu yavatamba. Muteveri weFC Platinum VaTerrence Kuhuni vanoti varikufara zvikuru nematambiro arikuita chikwata chavo vachiti ivo vakatarisa zvimwe zvikwata varikuona kunge FC Platinumn iri pamberi mberi zvinotyisa. VaKuhuni vanoti havasi kumbotarisa zvemutambo weBorder Starikers vachiti ivo vakatokunda kare. Asi kugona kunenge Kudada haifanire kudherera Border Strikers sezvo zvikwata zvinenge zviri pakaoma kudai zvinowanzoita mashiripiti anenge asingatarisirwe neveruzhinji. FC Platinum ikakundwa inenge yapa mukana kuHighlanders iyo iripamusha neHarare City. Vemumusha weHarare City varikuzhamba sezvirikuitawo veDynamos zvekuti svondo rapera vaishevedzera kuti murairidzi wavo VaTaurayi Mangwiro vanofanira kusiiswa basa. Izvi zvakaramba kutambirwa nevanoisa mari kuchikwata ichi vekanzuru yeHarare, vatsigiri ava vave kushevedzera kuti chikwata chavo chinofanira kukunda. Mumwe wavo vari kuti Harare City inofanira kukunda ndiVaLawrence Chapata avo varikuchemera mapoinzi matatu. Chikwata chiri pachinhanho chechitatu cheCaps United chiri pamusha asi kwete muNational Sports Stadium. Chiri kunotambira kuRufaro Stadium sezvo nhandare yeNational Sports Stadium yakachengeterwa mutambo uripo pakati pemaYoung Warriors nemaUnder 20 eCameroon nesvondo. MaGreen Machine akadamburwa mumutambo wavo wesvondo rapera 2-1 neHow Mine asi murairidzi wavo VaLloyd Chitembwe vanoti mutambo uyo yatove mvura yakaerera. Mumwe mutambo uripo ne Svondo uri pakati peChapungu neNgezi Platinum Stars Mitambo yese ye muHarare iri kutambwa neMugovera kupa mukana kumutambo wemaYoung Warriors nemaCameroon Cups we2017 Africa Youth Championships. Asi mune mamwe maguta, neSvondo mitambo iri ko ndeiyi. Mutare City Rovers ne Chicken Inn (Sakubva), Hwange ne How Mine (Colliery) and Highlanders v Harare City (Barbourfields) Nhengo yeWarriors Fan Club VaTendai Dzuwa vanoti veruzhinji vanofanira kuenda kuNational Sports Stadium kunokuza maYoung Warriors kuti akunde mumutambo wakakosha uyu. Chikwata chichakunda mumitambo miviri chichasangana neicho chichakundawo pamutambo weLibya neBenin munzira yekuenda kuma 2017 Africa Under 20 Championships. Makwikwi emuAfrica aya achaitirwa muZambia munaKubvumbi gore rinouya. Totarisa mutambo wekiriketi Masemi fainari e 2016 Associate Provincial League ari kubaka moto kuMasvingo neBindura apo zvikwat zvina zvasara mumakwikwi aya zvirikubandana. Chikwata cheSouthern Rocks chirikusangana neWestern Tigers kuMasvindo panguva imwecheteyo Centrals irikuratidzana masimba nePower Turbines kuBindura. Zvikwata zvichakunda mumitambo iyi zvirikusangana mufainari musi wa 28 Chivabvu. No media source currently available

headline: Kudyiwa muma’pena’ inenge njuga: Ndiraya
text: CHIKWATA cheDynamos FC chakaburitswa mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup neFC Platinum zvichitevera kukundwa kwachakaitwa 4-2 kumapena apo mutambo wainge wapera uri mangange 0-0 nezuro. Aka kave kechipiri Dynamos ichiburitswa neFC Platinum padanho iri sezvo yakaburitswa zvekare mumutambo wegore radarika.   Achitaura zvichitevera kukundwa kwakaita chikwata chake, murairidzi weDeMbare, Tonderai Ndiraya anoti zvinovarwadza zvakanyanya.   “Zvinorwadza, ukatarisa basa rainge rwaitwa nevakomana uye matambiro avaita mumutambo uyu. “Zvinorwadza kuti mutambo uyu wakazosvika kumapena. Mapena anonetsa, anenge njuga. “Asi zvinowanikwa mumutambo. Tatamba zvakanaka mumamitsi 90. Zvinorwadza kukundwa mutambo nenzira iyi. Zvinowanikwa mumutambo, asi tingaitei?” anodaro Ndiraya.   Mune mumwe mutambo wakatambwa nezuro, Black Rhinos yakakunda Chicken Inn 11-10 kumapena mushure mekunge mutambo wavo wapera uri mangange 1-1, kuchitiwo Bulawayo Chiefs yakakunda Highlanders 1-0 mumutambo wakatambirwa kunhandare yeBabourfields.   Zvichitevera kupera kwemitambo yequarter-final, draw resemi-final rakabva raitwa iro rakaona FC Platinum ichipihwa Herentals kuchiti Black Rhinos ichasangana neBulawayo Chiefs.

headline: ‘Joshua, Wilder votyanana’
text: akapa chikwata chaDeontay Wilder kusvika pakupera kwevhiki rino kuti mutambi wavo agorwa naAnthony Joshua kana kuti osiyana nazvo voronga zvavo mumwe mutambo naAlexander Povetkin muna Gunyana. Hurukuro dziri kuitwa dzekuronga mutambo uyu pakati pevatambi vaviri ava – Joshua naWilder – avo vasati vambokundwa muboka reheavyweight.   Baba vaHearn, Barry, akatombosangana nevamiriri vaWilder Shelly Finkel kuNew York masvondo adarika kuti vapedzise hurukuro dzekuronga mutambo uyu waJoshua uyo ane mabhande eIBF, WBA neWBO kuti asangane naWilder uyo ane bhande reWBC.   Asi iye zvino Hearn (Jnr) anoti mukana wekuti mutambo uyu uitwe gore rino mudiki sezvo vave kutarisira kuti Joshua arwe naPovetkin muna Gunyana.   Izvi zvinoreva kuti mutambo waJoshua naWilder, uyo uchaburitsa mutambi mumwe achazobata mabhande mana makuru mutsiva, uchambomirwa kuitwa kusvika muna Kukadzi 2019.   Hearn anoti, “Baba vangu vakasangana naShelly uye vave kugara vachikurukura. Vakasangana svondo radarika musi weChishanu, uye vakatitumira mashoko padandemutande musi weMuvhuro mangwanani saka tiri kuvapindura. “Ndinofunga kuti tichazvigadzirisa asi WBA iri kugara ichitibvunza zuva nezuva kuti tave papi uye isu tiri kugara tichiwedzera mazuva ehurukuro acho.” – Sportmail Boxing

headline: Croatia mu’semi-final’, Bazil kumba

headline: ZC yorongera Pakistan
text: CHIKWATA cheZimbabwe Cricket (ZC) chemaChevrons svondo rino chakatanga gadziriro dzekuenda kunokwikwidza nePakistan mumitambo mitanhatu yeOne Day International nemitatu zvekare yeTwenty20 International.   Uyu uchave mutambo wekutanga wechikwata ichi chichienda kunze kwenyika kubva kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yakasiyana pasi rose nechinangwa chekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Mwedzi wadarika, ZC yaifanira kusangana neAfghanistan asi mutambo uyu wakazomiswa zvakare nekuda kwedenda iri. Zvisinei, vatambi vechikwata chenyika ichi vakaramba vachiita gadziriro dzavo vari kudzimba. Mukushi wemashoko weZC, Darlington Majonga anoti mutambo uyu uchaona ZC ichitamba mitambo yekutanga yeICC Cricket World Cup Super League.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichatatsurana mumitambo mitatu yeODI ichatanga musi wa30 Gumiguru uye mimwe miviri ichizotambwa musi wa1 na3 Nyamavhuvhu.   Kana mitambo iyi yapera, zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichatatsurana zvakare musi wa7, 8 na10 Nyamavhuvhu mumitambo yeT20 International Series.   “Gadziriro dzedu dziri kufamba zvakanaka uye tine tarisiro yekuti tichaenda kuPakistan kunotamba mitambo mitanhatu iyi pasina chikoneso.   “Gore rino, takatadza kutamba mitambo mizhinji asi haticheme hedu nekuti chakakosha kuchengetedza hupenyu hweveruzhinji. Saka pari zvino zvinenge zvave kuendeka nekudaro tinotarisira kunosangana nePakistan,” anodaro Majonga.   Mwedzi yadarika, ZC yaifanira kutamba nezvikwata zvinosanganisira Afghanistan, Ireland neAustralia asi mitambo iyi yose yakamiswa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19.

headline: Khabib otya kurangwa nababa vake
text: Nurmagomedov – Abdulmanap – oyambira kuti murango waachapa mwana wake uchange uri mukuru kudarika waachapihwa neUFC uye neNevada State Athletic Commission zvichitevera nyaka-nyaka yaakakonzera pakapera mutambo wake naConor McGregor.   Kunyangwe hake akakumbira ruregerero nekutangisa kwaakaita hondo zvichitevera kukunda kwaakaita McGregor mumutambo wavo wekurwira bhande, Khabib ave kutya murango waachapihwa nababa vake vadzokera kumba kwavo kuRussia.   “Mutambo uyu ndewerukudzo. Kwete kutaura marara pamusoro pemumwe munhu. Handitaure zvakawora zvemumwe munhu ini, baba vangu, chitendero changu kana nyika yangu, izvi zvakandikoshera. Baba vanhu vachandiranga zvikuru pandiri kudzokera kumba,” anodaro Khabib.   Abdulmanap haana kufara nezvakaitwa nemwana wake, uyo ainge achangobva kukunda McGregor apo akasvetuka kubva munhandare yavairwrira ndokunorwa naDillion Dallas mumwe wemuchikwata chaMcGregor.   “Unoita zvese zvaunoda uri muoctagon (nhandare), kunze uko kwete nekuti kune vana, vanhukadzi uye nevanhuwo vanenge vachiona.   “Chikwata changu chagara chichizivikanwa nekuda kwekuzvibata, ndiko saka murango wandichamupa Khabib uchange wakakura kudarika waachapihwa neUFC,” anodaro Abdulmanap.   Achitaura nenyaya yekuzvibata, Abdulamanap anoti haana kufara kuti vanhu vatatu kubva muchikwata chake cheDagestani vakasungwa munyonga-nyonga iyi. Vakasvetuka kupinda munhandare ndokurova McGregor apo hondo yakatanga kuLas Vegas T-Mobile Arena.   Khabib ane hukama hwakasimba nababa vake avo vaive murairidzi wake kubva achiri mudiki apo akapihwa zita remadunhurirwa rekuti Eagle.   Akatanga kudzidziswa zvewrestling aine makore mapfumbamwe ekuberekwa uye baba vake vakashandura imwe kamuri yemba yavo kuve gym yaKhabib yekushandisa pamwe nevanini’na vake nedzimwe hama dzavo. – Sportsmail UFC

headline: FC PLATINUM, ESPERANCE DHUMA-DHUMA! … Munhandare isina vatsigiri
text: NORMAN Mapeza, murairidzi weFC Platinum anogashira mashoko ekuti chikwata chake chichatatsurana necheEsperance manheru eChishanu chino munhandare ichange isina vatsigiri mumutambo weCAF Champions League. Sangano rinotungamirira nhabvu muAfrica, reConfederation of African Football (CAF) rakatonga kuti Esperance itambe mitambo yayo miviri inotevera pamusha payo munhandare ichange isina vatsigiri.   Danho iri rinouya mushure mekunge vatsigiri veEsperance vakonzera zhowezhowe pamitambo yechikwata ichi miviri nezvikwata zvinoti Primero Agosto yekuAngola neAl Ahly yekuEgypt.   Zvinoreva kuti mutambo weEsperance neshasha dzemuZimbabwe, FC Platinum, uyo uriko nemusi weChishanu ikoko, uchatambwa munhandare ichange isina vatsigiri – danho rinogadzirwa naMapeza semakomborero asi ari matambudziko nekune rimwe divi.   “Tingade kutamba navo (Esperance) vatsigiri varimo, asi danho iri (mutongo weCAF) rinogona kutinakira,” anodaro Mapeza.   “Chekutanga ndechekuti danho iri rinovabvisa pakuti vari kutamba vari pamusha, tose tova nemikana yakafanana.   “Zvoreva kuti, kana dai zvazvo isu tichatamba tisiri pamusha, tichaita setiri pamusha uye Esperance ichange isina mutsigiri uya wechi12.   “Asiwo, kushaikwa kwevatsigiri kunogona kuuraya kunakidza kwemutambo sezvo kuvapo kwavo kuchingoita kuti mutambo uendeke,” anodaro.   Zvenhandare isina vatsigiri padivi, Mapeza achapinda mumutambo uyu nehuchenjeri.   “Hurongwa hwedu hahuna kusanduka,” anodaro Mapeza.   “Aka ndekekutanga kedu kutamba muCAF Champions League saka chakakosha kuti machinda angu anakirwe nemutambo achidzidza.   “Kusiyana neOrlando Pirates, Esperance chikwata chakatosiyana, naizvozvo tichavaremekedza.   “Esperance inotyisa, ndivozve vane mukombe wemuAfrican uyu saka tichatamba navo takachenjera,” anodaro.   Keputeni weFC Platinum, Mhari anowirirana nezvinorehwa nemurairidzi wake achiti mutambo wavachangobva kuita mangange 0-0 neOrlando Pirates yekuSouth Africa waunza chivimbo muchikwata chekuZvishavane ichi.   “Tisati tatamba neOrlando Pirates, tanga tichingotambwa hunyunyu muchikwata chatiri. Ndinovimba izvi zvasanduka,” anodaro Mhari.   “Takakwanisa kumira uye mutambo iwoyo wakatipa chivimbo.   “Machinda ari kufara uye tinovimba kuramba takadaro patinotamba neEsperance Chishanu chino,” anodaro.

headline: MaSoccer star aripi?. . . vamwe votambura, vamwe zviri kufaya
text: KUPERA kwemwaka wega-wega wenhabvu makore ese kunopihwa mubairo weSoccer Star of the Year kumutambi anenge atamba zvinonwisa mvura kudarika vamwe vose.   Vatambi vakagashidzwa mubairo uyu vanosanganisira George Shaya, Shacy Tauro, Moses Chunga, Peter Ndlovu, Wilfried Mugeyi naAgent Sawu uye vamwe vachingobva kuhwina mubairo uyu vakabva vawana mukana wekuenda kunotambira kunze kwenyika.   Asi makore adarika, vamwe vatambi vakahwina mubairo uyu vakakundikana kusvika kure mumutambo uyu. Mubvunzo unouya pakadai ndewekuti saka vanosarudza mutambi anozogachidzwa mubairo uyu vanovhotera mutambi chaiye here kana kuti kungosarudza wavanenge vachida?   Ongororo kubva mugore ra2010, inotaridza kuti vatambi vanoti Charles Sibanda (2010), Washington Arubi (2011), Denver Mukamba (2012), Tawanda Muparati (2013), Dennis Dauda (2014), Danny Phiri (2015), Hardlife Zvirekwi (2016) naRodwell Chingetere (2017) vakahwina mubairo uyu.   Pavatambi ava, vatatu chete vanoti Arubi, Mukamba naPhiri ndivo vakakwanisa kutengwa nezvikwata zvekuSouth Africa, asi Mukamba akadzoka mushure mekanguva kadiki. Charles Sibanda (2010)

headline: Tsigirai Emery: Mkhitaryan
text: anoti anofunga kuti sitayera yekutamba nhabvu yaUnai Emery ichabhadhara zvikuru kuArsenal uye anokurudzira vatsigiri vechikwata ichi kuti vatsigire murairidzi wavo mutsva uyu.   Chizvarwa chekuSpain ichi chakakundwa mitambo yacho miviri yekutanga agadzwa pachigaro chinopisa zvichitevera kutsiva kwaakaita Arsene Wenger mwaka uno.   MaGunners akakundwa 2-0 neshasha dzePremier League, Manchester City, mumutambo wekutanga ndokuzokundwa unotevera 3-2 neChelsea musi weMugovera, kunyangwe akambomira-mira akanwisa kaviri.   Mkhitaryan anoti Emery anoda nguva yekuronga tsoro dzake muchikwata ichi sezvo ari kuedza kushandura mashandiro aiitwa naWenger uyo akarairidza Arsenal kwemakore 22.   “Hazvina kunyanyosiyana asi pane zvimwe zvakangosiyana hazvo nekuti vanhu vaviri ava vakasiyana uye vari kutamba kana kufunga nezvimwe zvakasiyana,” anodaro.   “Emery akachengeta mafungiro aWenger asi ari kuvaka zvimwe zvitsva. Anoziva kuti anogona kuunza zvimwe zvinhu zvitsva kuchikwata chino. Hazvisi nyore nekuti zvinoda nguva chete.   “Tinofanirwa kuramba tichishanda nesimba nekuti tine murairidzi mutsva, mafungiro matsva uye tinoda kutamba nenzira yakasiyana sepanguva yaWenger,” anodaro. – Sportsmail Football

headline: ‘Batsirai Dynamos’ . . . zvave kuda Mwari: Romario
text: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vezvikwata zvakasiyana vokurudzirwa kuti vabatane nezvikwata zvavo mukuzvibatsira kupedza matambudziko azvinenge zvichisangana nawo kwete kukonzera nyonga-nyonga nekupindira munyaya dzine chekuita nezvehutungamiriri.   Mashoko aya akataurwa nemutungamiri wevatsigiri veDynamos, Benjamin Munzira, achiti harisi basa revatsigiri kutaura kuti hutungamiri hwechikwata ngaushandurwe asi kutsigira vatambi nhabvu.   Mwaka uno Dynamos haisi kunyatsotamba zvinonwisa mvura izvo zvaiona ichihwina mitambo mitatu chete kubva pa12 yayatamba ndokuita mangange mitatu zvakare uye ikarakashwa mitanhatu.   Svondo radarika, chikwata ichi chakakundwa neFC Platinum 2-0 apo murairidzi wacho – Biggie Zuze – akashoropodza vatungamiriri veDeMbare achiti vanofanirwa kupa vatambi mari kuti vatambe zvemhando yepamusoro.   “Chandinoziva kuti vatsigiri venhabvu harisi basa ravo kuti vataure kuti hutangamiri ngaubve, kwete izvozvo hatizvitambire. Hutungamiri ngausiiwe hwakadaro, chedu kutsigira zvikwata chete zvakadaro,” anodaro Munzira.   Nguva yadarika, rimwe bandiko revatsigiri veDynamos rakakurudzira vatsigiri vechikwata ichi kuti vasaende kunochitsigira kusvikira hutungamiri hwechikwata ichi hwashandurwa.   Asi Munzira anoti nzira yakatorwa nevatsigiri ava handiyo uye inotaridza kurasikwa kwavo gwara.   “Vatsigiri hatifanirwe kurasika kudaro, harisi basa redu kutaura mashoko akadai aya. Isu ngatitsigire chikwata sezvachiri kwete kuda kukonzera nyonga-nyonga, kwete.   “Dai tiri kutsvaga nzira dzekubatsira zvikwata zvedu chete. Zvikwata zvese zvakaomerwa, zvingori zviviri chete zvine mari FC Platinum neNgezi Platinum ndiko saka zvichigara zvichihwina nekuti morarari yevatambi vavo inenge yakasimuka,” anodaro.   Mashoko ake anotsinhirwa nemutungamiri weDynamos Kadoma Chapter, Hurbet Manyowa, achiti nehuwandu hwevatsigiri vezvikwata zvakasiyana – kunyanya Dynamos – vanogona kubatsira nezvakasiyana kusanganisira mari izvo zvinobvisa mutoro unenge une hutungamiri hwezvikwata izvi.   “Isu Dynamos tinoziva kuti tine vatsigiri vakawanda chaizvo, nehuwandu hwedu kana tikati munhu wega abvise $1 kana $0,50c pamwe tinounganidza mari yakawanda chaizvo yoenda kunobatsira vatambi vechikwata chedu.   “Zvino vamwe ndivo vanongona kutaura chete asi tikasvika pakuti ngatibatsirei chikwata havawanikwe ipapo. Basa kukurudzira vamwe kuti vasauye kunhandare kuzotsigira chikwata, zvino zvinobatsirei zvamunenge maita?   “Zvinozivikanwa nemunhu wese kuti seDynamos chaiyo inotorarama nemari yapagedhi saka mukasaenda kubhora kwacho zvino hapana chaichawana, vave kukuvara vatambi manje ivo vatiri kuda kubatsira,” anodaro Manyowa.   Zvakadaro, mumwe mutsigiri mukuru weDynamos, Chris “Romario” Musekiwa, anoti kudzikira kuri kuita chikwata ichi kwave kuda nyasha dzaMwari chaidzo.   “Zviri kuitika izvi zvinowanikwa, zvichadarika, asi zviri kurwadza hazvo wena. Zvave kuda nyasha dzaMwari chaidzo. Hutungamiri hwechikwata ichi ngavape murairidzi wacho Biggie Zuze mari atenge vatambi chaivo uye ngavapewo vatambi mari vafare,” anodaro Musekiwa.

headline: MaWarriors tichiri nemukana: Mpandare
text: MANEJA wechikwata chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors – Wellington Mpandare – anoti Zimbabwe ichiri nemukana mukuru wekubudirira kuenda kumutambo weQatar World Cup zvisinei nekukundwa kwayakaitwa neGhana musi weMugovera. MaWarriors akakundwa 3-1 nemaBlack Stars eGhana neMugovera wadarika mumutambo wakatambirwa kuGhana uye zvikwata zviviri izvi zviri kusangana zvekare munyika muno neChipiri chino mumutambo uyo maWarriors anofanirwa kuhwina.   MaWarriors akangokundwa mutambo uyu chete mukana wavo wekuenda kuWorld Cup unobva watopera. Mpandare anoti maWarriors achiri mumujaho wekurwira kuenda kuQatar World Cup uye ari kufanirwa kuhwina mitambo yawo yese yasara, kutanga neweGhana.   “Tichirimo murwendo rwekurwira kuenda kuQatar. Chatinofanirwa kuita kuhwina mitambo yedu yose yasara chete,” anodaro Mpandare.   Kana maWarriors akahwina mitambo yavo yose yasara, anenge ave nezvibodzwa 10 uye achishuvira kuti zvimwe zvikwata zviri muboka reGroup G zvirasikirwe nezvibodzwa mumitambo yazvo yasara.

headline: Martinez anoda kugara pasi naRonaldo
text: wePortugal, Roberto Martinez, akazivisa chinangwa chake chekuda kugara pasi naCristiano Ronaldo kuti vakurukure nezveramangwana rake kuchikwata ichi sezvo zvisingaizivikanwe kuti anoda kuita sei nePortugal zvichitevera kupera kweWorld Cup.   Ronaldo akasiiwa naFernando Santos mumitambo yePortugal yemaknockout kuQatar asi aimbove murairidzi weBelgium uyu anosimbirira kuti anoda kutaura nemutambi uyu zvichitevera kugadzwa kwaakaitwa.   Martinez akagadzwa kuve murairidzi mutsva wePortugal nemusi weMuvhuro sezvo ange amboita chibvumirano chemuromo chete zvisinei nekutatarika kwaakaita kuWorld Cup neBelgium.   Anonzi achaedza kutaura nemutambi mutsva weAl-Nassr uyu. Achitaura nevatori venhau kekutanga abva kugadzwa semurairidzi, Martinez anotaura nezvechinangwa chake chekuumba chikwata chakasimba vachienda kumberi.   “Matanho anotorwa munhandare,’’ anodaro.    Cristiano Ronaldo   “Ini handitore matanho muhofisi. Ndinovimba ndichataura nevatambi vese.   “Cristiano Ronaldo mutambi aripowo ipapo. Ave nemakore 19 ari muchikwata chenyika.   “Ndinovimba tinogona kugara naye pasi toumba chikwata chakasimba. Izuva rekugutsikana kukuru, asi mangwana tichatanga kuita basa.” – SportsMail Football

headline: Take Money orongera Munoz
text: SHASHA yetsiva yeWorld Boxing Council (WBC) Female Super-bantamweight – Kudakwashe ‘Take Money’ Chiwandire – oenda kuSouth Africa kunosimbaradza gadziriro dzemutambo waakatarisana nawo naZulina Munoz wekuMexico.   Svondo radarika, Take Money akapihwa rutsigiro nekambani yeKGK Logistics iyo iri kumubhadharira mari yendege kuenda kuSouth Africa nepekugara panguva yaanenge achiita gadziriro dzake kunyika iyi.   Take Money naMunoz vari kutarisirwa kurwa nemusi wa27 Nyamavhuvhu kuHarare International Conference Centre (HICC).   Chiwandire anoti rubatsiro rwaakapihwa rwekuti aende kuSouth Africa kunoita gadziriro dzake ruchabatsira zvikuru uye ndokupa chivimbiso chekuti achashanda nesimba kuti agochengetedza bhande rake.   “Handina neremuromo, asi kungotenda chete masangano ese ari kuuya achindibatsira mugadziriro dzangu ndakatarisana nemutambo wangu mukuru uri kutevera naZulina Munoz.   “Zvakandikoshera zvikuru kuona ndichirangarirwa uye ndinofara chaizvo nekuti kusimudzirwa kwemwanasikana.   Saka ndinopa kutenda kukuru nerutsigiro urwu, dai zvikaramba zvakadaro.   “Ndinovimbisa kuti ndichashanda nesimba kuti bhande rangu randinaro rirambe riri muno risabude, mureza wenyika yedu yeZimbabwe urambe uchisimudzirwa,” anodaro Take Money.   Murairidzi pamwe namaneja wake – Clyde Musonda – anoti vakaronga mitambo yehushamwari yakawanda iyo Chiwandire achanotamba kuSouth Africa nevatambi veko izvo zvichamubatsira zvikuru mugadziriro dzake.   Anoti kuenda naChiwandire kunze kwenyika kunoita gadziriro kunopa mutambi uyu nguva yekuti angofunge zvegadziriro dzake pasina zvimwe zvinomukanganisa.   “Tangosarirwa nemwedzi mumwe chete kuti mutambo uchisvika. Saka zvakakosha kuti nguva yatiri ino Take Money anyatsoita gadziriro dzake munzvimbo yakasununguka isina chinomukanganisa.   “Naizvozvo tinotenda hama dzedu dzatibatsira kuti tigoenda kuSouth Africa uko tichanoita gadziriro dzedu kusvika tidzoke kuzosangana naMunoz. Takaronga mitambo yakawanda ichaona Take Money achisangana nevatambi vetsiva vekuSouth Africa vakasiyana izvo zvichibatsira gadziriro dzake.   “Munoz tinomuziva kuti ishasha asi isu tichamurakidzawo kuti Chiwandire ishashawo zvekare uye bhande redu harisi kuzobva muno, richasara muno,” anodaro Musonda.   Chiwandire akahwina bhande reWBC Female Interim Super-bantamweight mushure mekukunda Cathrine Phiri wekuZambia mwedzi yadarika.   Izvi zvakabva zvaona vatambi vakawanda vekunyika dzakasiyana vachida kusangana naye kusvika iye nechikwata chake vazosarudza Munoz.   Akakunda Munoz, anenge ave kukwanisa kuenderera mberi mumutambo uyu opihwa mukana wekurwira bhande reWBC Super Bantamweight Gold iro rina Yamileth Mercado wekuMexico zvakare.

headline: Ndazvipira: Chigova
text: MUBATI wepagedhi wemaWarriors – George Chigova – anoti akazvipira kubatsira chikwata chake panguva iyo mutambo unenge waoma uye ari mudenga rechinonwe zvichitevera kubata kwaakaita mapena matatu apo Zimbabwe yakasangana neBotswana mumutambo weCosafa Cup quarter-final svondo rapera kuPolokwane, kuSouth Africa.   Mutambo wezvikwata zviviri izvi wakange wakapera uri mangange 1-1 ndokuenda kumapena apo Chigova akaita zvinorova ndokubata mapena matatu akatevedzana zvakaita kuti maWarriors akwanise kufambira mberi mumutambo uyu.   Achitaura ari kuPolokwane apo vakange vagadzirira kutamba neLesotho mumutambo wesemi-final neChitatu svondo rino, Chigova anoti akangozviudza mumwoyo make kuti nguva yasvika basa ngaribatwe kuti chikwata chienderere mberi.   “Zvamunoziva mapena anotarisirwa saka ndakangozviudza kuti ngandishande nesimba kuti ndibatsire chikwata kuenda kumberi mumutambo uyu.   “Tange tave panguva yakaoma nekuti takatadza kushandisa mikana yatakawana mumutambo wedu saka pakazosvika kumapena hauzive zvinoitika. Asi ndinofara kuti tichiri mumutambo uyu takakwanisa kusarohwa nehana tasvika kumapena,” anodaro.   Panguva iyo Chigova ari kurumbidzwa nemunhu wese munyika nehunyanzvi hwaakataridza musi weSvondo, mutambi uyu anoti chakakosha ndechekuti chikwata chavo chakabudirira kuenderera mberi mumutambo uyu.   “Chikuru ndechekuti tiri kufambira mberi mumutambo uyu uye chishuvo chedu kuti tirwire kuchengetedza mukombe wedu,” anodaro Chigova.   Hunyazvi hwakarakidzwa naChigova svondo rapera hwakamuona achipinda mumabhuku enhoroondo evatambi vepagedhi, shasha pakubata mapena sekatsi.   Aka hakasi kekutanga mutambi uyu achitaridza hunyanzvi hwake sezvo mugore ra2014 akabata mamwe mapena apo maWarriors akasvika kusemi-fainari yemutambo weCHAN neLybia uyo wakatambirwa kuSouth Africa zvakare.   Panguva iyi, Chigova akaedza nepaanogona kubatsira chikwata chemaWarriors nekubata mapena asi akazorasiswa nevamwe vatambi vanosanganisira Peter “Rio” Moyo, Simba Nhivi, Milton Ncube naAli Sadiki avo vakatadza kunwisawo avo mapena.   Dzimwe shasha pakubata mapena dzinosanganisira Japhet “Shortcat” Mparutsa uyo aitambira Dynamos FC nemaWarriors. Mugore ra1985 mufainari yeNetbrew Zifa Cup apo ainge ave kutambira Black Rhinos, Shortcat akabatira Henry “Beef” Chari pena mutambo uyu ndokupera uri mangange 1-1.   Kozoti Tapiwa Kapini – uyo akambotambira Highlanders – akanetsa zvikuru achibata mapena kuchikwata ichi uye nepaaitambira maYoung Warriors.   Tafadzwa Dube vazhinji vachiri kumurangarira iri katsi chaiyo panyaya dzekubata mapena apo aitambira CAPS United uye neFC Platinum.

headline: Africa Yose Yotarisira kuMorocco
text: Hupenyu hweAfrica mumakundano e2022 World Cup hwasarira mumaoko eMorocco zvichitevera kubuda mumakundano aya kweSenegal, Tunisiia, Cameroon neGhana. Morocco irikutamba zvinodakadza uyezve yakasimudza chivimbo mairi mushure mekurova Belgium neCroatia mukusvika muRound of 16 umu. Asi Spain iyo yakatora mukombe uyu muna 2010 yakasiyana zvikuru neBelgium iyo isina nhoroondo yakasimba mumakundano aya kana Croatia iyo inongozivikanwa nekupinda kwayakaita mufainari muna 2018 uyezve nemutambi Luca Modric. Asi zvakamira zvakadai, mutsigiri wenhabvu VaChris Gwaze vanoti Morocco yakasimba zvekukwanisa kubudirira mumutambo neSpain uyu. Chimwe chiwata chermuAfrica chakasvika muchikamu chenyika gumi nenhatu cheSenegal chakabuda mumakwikwi aya mushure mekurohwa 3-0 neEngland nezuro. Aimbobatira ZPC Kariba muPSL, Shepard Saizi anoti haasi kushamiswa nekubuda kweSenegal mumakundano aya. Mumwe mutsigiri wenhabvu VaLameck Jekapu vanoti vakarwadziwa nekubuda kweSenegal pamwechete neCameroon, Ghana, neTunisia, asi vane chivimbo kuti Morocco ichaita mashiripiti. Morocco irikutarisira kusvika mukota fainari kekutanga uyezve kuita chikwata chekutanga muAfrica kusvika muma semi fainari emakundano aya. Asi muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaJustice Muzanenhamo vanoti Africa haifanire kuve nechivimbo chakanyanya mumakundano eWorld Cup aya. Morocco iri kutarisira zvakanyanya kubva kunaAchrag Hakimi uyo akaberekerwa kuSpain anotambira PSG naHakim Ziyech. Spain ine vatambi vane mukurmbira vakaita saPedri, Gavi, Torres nevamwe. Asi chikwata chiri kutarisirwa kutora mukombe uyu Brazil iri kupinda munhandare manheru ano na 9pm neSouth Korea. Veruzhinji vanotevera mutambo uyu vanoti South Korea haimire paBrazil iyo ine vatambi vane mukurumbira vakawandisa vakaita seNeymarVinicius Jnr, Casemiro, Richarlison. South Korea iri kutarisira kubva kuna Son Heung-min. Brazil ikakunda inopinda mumakota fainari emakundano aya. Parizvino, Argentina, England, France, neNetherlands, dzatove mukota fainari kare.

headline: Mbare Junior League yosimudzira vechidiki
text: VECHIDIKI vokurudzirwa kuti vapinde mune zvemitambo nechinangwa chekugadzirira remangwana ravo pane kuswera vachitora zvinodhaka zvisingatenderwe mumuviri.   Kurudziro iyi yakapihwa nasachigaro weMbare Junior Football League – Stanley Kavayi – achiti mitambo yakakosha muhupenyu hwevechidiki.   Kavayi, uyo anove murairidzi wenhabvu zvekare, anoti vechidiki vakawanda vane matarenda emitambo yakaita senhabvu, cricket nebasketball asi hupenyu hwavo huri kuenda mudondo nekuda kwezvinodhaka.   Anoti vari kuronga mitambo yakasiyana yekuti vechidiki vatambe.   “Mitambo yakakosha nekuti inobatsira kubika vechidiki nekuvarakidza gwara chairo. SeMbare Junior Football League, tiri kuronga mitambo yenhabvu yekuti vechidiki vatambe nekuti donzvo redu kuvabvisa pedyo nezvinodhaka.   “Kune vechidiki vakawanda vekuti unotoona kuti uyu ane chipo mumitambo asi anozomedzwa nezvinodhaka. Saka isu tiri kuda kuvabata toshanda navo kusvika vakura tovabatsira kuti vagotengwa nezvikwata zvakasiyana,” anodaro.   Anoti vari kupota vachishevedza varairidzi vezvikwata zvakasiyana avo vanouya vachiongorora mitambo yavo votsvaga vatambi vekutenga.   “Patinotamba mitambo yedu kazhinji panenge pane varairidzi vezvikwata zvemuPremier Soccer League (PSL) kana Division One avo vatinoshevedza kuti vauye kuzoona vatambi vakasiyana.   “Kana pakauya varairidzi vakasiyana, ndinoziva kuti zvinopa vatambi manyuku-nyuku ekutamba nhabvu yepamusoro sezvo vanenge vachiziva kuti vane mukana wekutengwa nezvikwata zvikuru,” anodaro Kavayi.   Anoti pachavharwa zvikoro, Mbare Junior Football League icharonga mitambo yakasiyana senzira yekuti vechidiki vawane zvinovavaraidza sezvo vamwe vanogona kufuririka kutora zvinodhaka apo vanenge vakazorora.

headline: Fury adzoka mudariro
text: ine bhande retsiva reheavyweight – Tyson Fury – akadzoka kuMarbella nemurairidzi wake Ben Davison apo vari kugadzirira mumwe mutambo wemaround 12 uyo uchareva zvakawanda kumutambi uyu anozivikanwa saGypsy King.   Fury ange achimbozorora hake ari pazororo reKirisimasi nemhuri yake zvichitevera mutambo wake naDeontay Wilder uyo wakaitwa musi wa1 Zvita gore radarika.   Muchinda uyu aimbove unified champion kare uye kaviri kese akazvamburwa akadonha pasi naWilder uyo anove shasha ine mabhande eWBC kuLos Angeles, mumutambo uyo wakazopera uri mangange.   Iye zvino Fury adzoka kuMarbella uye zvikwata zviviri izvi zviri kutarisirwa kutanga hurukuro dzemumwe mutambo une mari zhinji mwedzi uno.   Pamufananidzo uyo waakaisa paInstagram, Fury akange anaDavison mumwe mutambi wetsiva, Joe McCann naJono Carroll apo ari kuedza kusimudzira kubva paakasira mugore ra2018.   Mushure mekupedza makore maviri asiri kukwikwidza, Fury akadzoka mutsiva gore radarika munaChikunguru akasangana naSefer Seferi ndokuramba achikwikwidza izvo zvakamuona achirwa zvakare naFrancesco Pianeta.   Kunyangwe vamwe vatambi ava vaive vepasi, Fury akazokwidza makata ndokusangana naWilder ndokumisidzana nechizvarwa chekuAmerica ichi kwenguva refu mumutambo wavo muna Zvita. – SportsMail boxing

headline: MaGems Otendwa neKusimudza Mureza weNyika
text: Chikwata cheZimbabwe chemaGems nhasi chapedza rwendo rwacho rweNetball 2019 Vitality World Cup chiri pachinhanho chechisere. New Zealand yakakunda Australia 52- kwa 51 ichibva yasimudza mukombe uyu.  Chikwata ichi nezuro chakarohwa neUganda 58-47 mumutambo wavo wekugumisira we2019 Vitality World Cup ndokupedza chiri pachinhanho chechisere mumakundano aive nezvikwata gumi nezvitanhatu zvaive zvakaungana muLiverpool, England, kubva musi wa 12 Chikunguru.  Izvi zvinotevera kurohwa kwavakaitwa zvekare neNew Zealand, Malawi, Jamaica,nhasi neUganda, izvo zvavadzorera shure mumakwikwi avakashura mare zvaive zvisingatarisirwe.  MaGems ari kudzoka kumusha misoro yavo iri mudenga mushure mekupedza vari pachinhanho chechipiri nekuenda munharaunda yechipiri kubva mugungano raive rakaoma nezvikwata zvinoti Australia, Northern Ireland neSri Lanka.  Vakatungamira chikwata ichi Amai Letitia Chipandu vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kudada nechikwata chemaGems.  Studio 7 yabatawo mumwe mutambi wechikwata chemaGems Ndaizivei Madzikangava  Muteveri wezvemitambo VaTinashe Museti vanoti vasikana ava vanofanira kutendwa zvakasimba nezvavakaita kuLiverpool, kwete nemari chete.  Kaputeni wechikwata ichi Perpetual Siyachitema anoti aka kaive kekutanga kuenda kumakundano aya zvekuti vave kutarisira kuenda kuWorld Cup inotevera uko varikutarisira kunokwikwidza zvinemutsindo kutora mukombe.  MaGems arikutarisirwa kusvika akamirirwa nechaunga panhandare yendege yeRobert Mugabe International Airport mushure mekuita zvaive zvisingafungirwe nevakawanda kwete muZimbabwe chete asi pasi rese.  Vanotevera mitambo vanoti chikwata ichi chinofanira kusiiwa chakabatana kudaro chichigadzirira kurwira nzvimbo yekuenda kumakundano e2023 ayo achaitirwa muSouth Africa.  Tombotarisa zvakabuda mumitambo yeCastele Premier Soccer League yakatambwa nezuro, Dynamos neCaps United dzakaita mangange 1-1 mumutambo weHarare Derby uyo wakatambirwa muRufaro Stadium.  Mutambo uyu wakaunganidza chaunga chinotyisa icho change chichida zvakasiyana vamwe vari veMakepekepe vamwe vari veDembare nevamwewo vezvikwata zvanga zvisingatambe nhasi.  Asi mukugumisira zvikwata izvi zvagovana mapoinzi ndokusiya Makepekepe achiri pachinhanho chechitatu, Dembare iri pachinzvimbo chegumi.  FC Platinum ndiyo ichiri pamusoro pemakundano aya nepoindi imwechete pamusoro peChicken Inn mushure mekurova Chapungu 1-0 muManndava Stadium nezuro.  Mimwe mitambo yanga iriko neSvondo yakapera seizvi….  Manica Diamonds 1 Highlanders 1 TelOne 0 Mushowani 2  Mitambo yeMugovera yakapera seizvi…  FC Platinum 1 Chapungu 0 Ngezi Platinum 2 Black Rhinos 0 Chicken Inn 2 Bulawayo Chiefs 0 ZPC Kariba 0 Triangle 0 Herentals 2 Hwange 2 Yadah 1 Harare City 1  Kwatambwa mitambo gumi nemishanu, zvikwata zvina zviri pamusoro-soro ndeizvi..  FC Platinum 31 points Chicken Inn 29 points Caps United 27 points Black Rhinos 24 points   No media source currently available

headline: Ozil siyana nazvo: Emery
text: Unai Emery, otsigira Mesut Ozil kuti asaterere mashoko ekumushoropodza ari kubva kuGermany zvichitevera kusendeka kwaakaita kutambira nyika iyi nhabvu, ndokuti ari kumuona achitamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura mwaka unotevera.   Ozil akasendeka kutambira nhabvu Germany svondo rino zvichitevera kunetsana kwakaitika apo akatorwa mufananidzo aine mutungamiri wenyika yeTurkey, Erdogan, nyika yake yakatarisana nekuenda kumutambo weWorld Cup.   Vanoita zvematongerwo enyika kuGermany uye vanyori vemapepanhau vazhinji vakashoropodza izvi ndokubvunza kuti akazvipira chaizvo here kuGermany pakabuda mifananidzo iyi yaOzil uyo anobva kuTurkey.   Svondo rino mutungamiri weBayern Munich, Uli Hoeness, akapomera Ozil mhosva yekutamba nhabvu yemarara kwemakore akawanda ndokuti chikwata chake chaikanganisika matambiro acho nekuda kwake.   Murairidzi mutsva weArsenal — Emery — ange achitarisira zvimwewo zvitsva apo aitaura nevatori venhau kekutanga kuSouth-East Asia asi mibvunzo yaaibvunza yange ingori yaOzil nedanho raakatora.   Shoko range riri rimwe chete rekutsigira Ozil nedanho raakatora. “Idanho remwoyo wake rakatorwa naMesut uye ini ndinorikoshesa. Ndiye anofunga zvaanoona zvakamunakira, akatsanangura kwandiri uye isu kuno tiripo kumubatsira chete,” anodaro. — SportsMail Football

headline: Mitambo kumaruwa yosimudzirwa
text: SANGANO rakazvimirira reFunani Foundation rosimudzira vechidiki vekumaruwa vane matarenda mumitambo yakaita secricket, rugby, nhabvu, tenesi nehockey kuburikidza nekuvapa zvekushandisa pamwe nekuvadzidzisa.   Mitambo yakaita secricket, hockey kana tenesi kazhinji inozivikanwa ichinzi ndeyevana vanodzidza kuzvikoro zvakasimukira.   Mutungamiri weFunani Foundation, Ray Funani, anoti chishuwo chesangano ravo kupa mikana kune vana vari kumaruwa kuti varakidze matarenda avo mumitambo iyi.   “Kune vana vakawanda vanogara kunze kweHarare vane matarenda anonwisa mvura mumitambo yakaita serugby, cricket, hockey netenesi asi kuzvikoro zvavo kana kunharaunda hakuna kwekuitambira. Saka isu tiri kuda kuvawanisa mukana wekuti vaidzidzire uye varakidze nyika nepasi rese tarenda ravo.   “Chimwe chikonzero ndechekuti takaona kuti kunze ikoko ndiko kune vanhu vakawanda saka tikashanda navo tinowana vatambi vane tarenda tovabatsira kuti ribikwe,” anodaro Funani.   Anoti parizvino sangano ravo riri kubatsira zvikwata zviri kunzvimbo dzakadai seHwedza, Mhondoro neGoromonzi uko riri kushanda nevarairidzi vemitambo iyi kudzidzisa vechidiki.   Anoti vari kushandawo nevamwe vemasangano akadai seClasswave Investments avo vari kuvabatsira nezvekushandisa zvemitambo yakasiyana.   Svondo radarika, Funani Foundation – kuburikidza neClasswave Investments – yakabatsira chikwata cheRamah Sports Academy nekuchipa zvekushandisa mumutambo wecricket.

headline: ‘Mwoyo wangu uri panaMayweather’
text: SHASHA yetsiva Tinashe “Chairman” Mwadziwana anoti tsiva ndiwo hupenyu hwake uye anoyemura zvikuru mutambi ane mukurumbira Floyd “Money” Mayweather (Jnr) zvekuti akasvika pakutumidza mwanakomana wake zita rekuti Floyd.   “Ini pasi rose Floyd Mayweather (Jnr) ndicho chibaba chetsiva, hakuna mumwe anotevera. Ndiye wandinoyemura nekuti akaita zvikuru mumutambo uyu. Ndinomuda chaizvo zvekuti mwanakomana wangu ndakatomupa zita rekuti Floyd, kubva kuna Mayweather,” anodaro.   Pavatambi vepasi rose, Mwadziwana anoti anoshuvira kumbosangana naPaulus Ambunda wekuNamibia uyo anoti anotamba tsiva yepamusoro.   “Paulus Ambunda wekuNamibia ishasha, ndakamuona achitamba ndikatorwa mwoyo nekugona kwake. Ini ndinoda kusangana naye uye ndinoziva kuti tichasangana chete nerimwe zuva,” anodaro Mwadziwana.   Anoti haambofa akakanganwa mutambo wake wekuMalawi weBantamweight mugore ra2015 apo akarova Robert Kachiza wekunyika iyi kusvika afenda muround rechipiri sezvo wakamusimudzira zvikuru kusvikira paari nhasi uno. Kurova kwaakaita Kachiza kusvikira afenda kwakakatyamadza gurukota rezvemitambo nekusimudzirwa kwevechidiki rekuMalawi Grace Obama Chiumia ndokuti kukundwa kwake kwakanyadzisa nyika.   Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino, Mwadziwana – uyo parizvino anova Zimbabwe National Super Bantanweight Champion – anoti mutambo wake wa2015 ndemumwe wemitambo yakamubatsira kusimukira kusvika ave shasha yemuZimbabwe.   “Ndichiri kurangarira zvikuru gore ra2015 ndakabika Kachiza munyika make kuMalawi, ndakamubinha akafenda muround rechipiri. Gurukota remitambo rekunyika yavo Grace Obama Chiumia avo vaive munhandare vachiona mutambo uyu vakauya kuzondikorokotedza ndokundipa jezi reLiverpool rekunditenda nematambiro andainge ndaita.   “Kubva ipapo handina kubva ndambomira, ndakaramba ndichingokavira bhora mberi sezvo shuviro yangu kuti ndive mumwe wevatambi vakuru vetsiva munyika ino,” anodaro Mwadziwana.   Mugore ra2017, Mwadziwana akazosangana naKachiza zvakare kuStodart Hall kuMbare, muHarare. Mwadziwana akahwina zvakare mutambo uyu ndokupihwa mubairo wekombi, sitendi yemba nemari US$2 000 napuromota wake aimutsigira.   Anoti hupenyu hwake hwaave kurarama parizvino kuburikidza netsiva.   “Kugara kwandave kuita izvezvi kuburikidza netsiva, mutambo uyu waita kuti ndive neimba yandinoti yanguwo yandakavaka uye ndine kombi inondiwanisawo mari pandinenge ndisingarwe. Zvinhu zvinofadza zvikuru kuti basa rako riri kukupa raramo uye zvinokutuma kuti urambe uchishanda nesimba,” anodaro.   Kubva achitanga tsiva, Mwadziwana atamba mitambo 28 ndokuhwina 17 uye akakundwa 11.   Parizvino ndiye ane bhande reZimbabwe Super Bantamweight iro raakahwina mugore ra2018 uye ari kuronga kurwa kurichengetedza mwedzi uno mumutambo uchiri kurongwa nemapuromota ake.   Kana akakwanisa kurichengetedza, tarisiro yake kutanga kurwira mamwe mabhande makuru ekunze akadai seWorld Boxing Union (WBU) neWorld Boxing Organisation (WBO).   “Parizvino ndine mutambo uchiri kurongwa kuti ndigorwira kuchengetedza bhande rangu reZimbabwe National Bantamweight. Kana ndikakwanisa kuhwina zvinoreva kuti ndinenge ndave kusimukira kuenda mberi mumutambo uyu ndave kukwanisa kurwira mamwe mabhande ekunze. Saka mutambo uchiri pakurongwa handisati ndanyatsoziva zvizere sezvo puromota wangu ari kumhanya-mhanya kugadzirisa. Ini ndiri kuita gadziriro dzangu ndakangomirira kunzwa kuti mutambo wakutsva,” anodaro.

headline: Kaka odzoka munhabvu
text: wenhabvu weBrazil, Kaka, anonzi ari kutarisirwa kudzoka kuzotambira chikwata cheMonza icho chiri kutungamirwa naSilvio Berlusconi.   Shasha iyi yakasendeka shangu dzenhabvu gore radarika mushure mekutamba kwemakore akawanda, asi ari kunzi ari kudiwa naBerlusconi uyo aimbove muridzi weAC Milan.   Berlusconi ari kuda kuonekwa simba rake zvichitevera kutenga kwaakaita chikwata ichi chemuSerie C.   Sekutaura kwebepanhau rekuSpain, Marca, Berlusconi anofarira Kaka zvikuru zvichitevera nguva yavakashanda vese kuMilan uye ari kuda kuti mutambi uyu abatsire Monza kuti isimudzirwe mwaka uno.   Kaka zvinonzi ari kudawo kuenda kuchikwata ichi nekuda kwekushanda zvakanaka kwaakaita naBerlusconi kuSan Siro, uko kwaakagara makore matanhatu kubva 2003 kusvika 2009, ndokuzombodzoka mugore ra2013.   Parizvino haana chikwata chaari kutambira zvichitevera makore matatu aakatambira Orlando City yemuMLS.   Mutambi uyu anozivikanwa nematambiro anonwisa mvura uye achinwisa zvinodadisa.   Kaka akahwina mubairo weBallon d’Or uye akambotambira chikwata cheReal Madrid chekuSpain.   Berlusconi akatengesa AC Milan makore maviri adarika, iye zvino kambani yake yeFininvest yakazivisa svondo radarika kuti yakange yapedza kutenga chikwata ichi nemari inosvika 2,2 miriyoni paunzi asi inogona kusvika ku2,6 miriyoni.   Berlusconi – uyo aimbove prime minister weItaly – akatengesa AC Milan kune kambani yekuChina nemari inosvika $800 miriyoni mugore ra2017. – Sportsmail Football

headline: Germany Yoburitswa Mumakwikwi eWorld Cup
text: Germany iyo yakasimudza mukombe weWorld Cup kuBrazil muna 2014 nezuro yakaburitswa muchikamu chekutanga chemakwikwi aya kuRussia mushure mekurohwa 2-0 neSouth Korea muGroup F.  Mune mumwe mutambo muGroup iri, Sweden yakatova Mexico 3-0 asi nyika mbiri idzi dzakabudirira kuenda muchikamu chechipiri. Germany yapinda munhoroondo yezvikwata zvakasimudza mukombe zvozobuditswa muchikamu chekutanga. izvi ndizvo zvakaitwa France, Italy neSpain. Mitambo yenhabvu yeWorld Cup iri kutambirwa kuRussia iri kuenderera mberi nhasi. Pane mumwe mutambo wakatambwa nezuro muGroup E, Brazil 2- Serbia 0, Costa rica 2, Switerland 2. Nhasi muGroup H mitambo iriko yakamira yakadai, Senegal neColumbiA kochizoti Japan nePoland. Muzvikwata zvabudirira mukupinda muzvikwata gumi nezvitanhatu kana kuti Round of 16, France iri kutamba neArgentina musi weMugovera na 4 masikati panguva imwe Uruguay ichitamba nePortugal. Nemusi weSvondo Spain iri kutamba neRussia musi nenguva dza 4 masikati apo Croatia inenge ichitamba ne Denmark. Mumwe mutambo pakati peBrazil neMexico unenge uriko nemusi weMuvhuro.

headline: Fury otatsurana naWilder
text: anoti vakanyorerana pasi chibvumirano nevamiriri vaDeontay Wilder kuti vaviri ava vagorwe mumutambo weheavyweight muna Zvita kuLAs Vegas.   Puromota wemutambi uyu, Frank Warren, uyo anozivikanwa saGypsy King akataura svondo rino kuti mapoka maviri aya ange ari muhurukuro uye Fury ane chivimbo chekuti mutambo uyu uchabvumidzwa kuti uenderere mberi asi hunge kana akahwina mutambo wake wechipiri apo achasangana naFrancesco Pianeta mwedzi uno.   “Zvave kuitika manje, hunge ndikakunda Pienata,” Fury akaudza Behind The Gloves.

headline: Morocco Yopinda Muchikamu cheChipiri kuWorld Cup Iri Pamusoro peGungano Rayo Uye Isina Kana Kukundwa
text: Morocco yave nyika yechipiri kubva kuAfrica kupinda muchikamu chechipiri chemakwikwi eFIFA World Cup mushure mekurova Canada 2-1 nhasi. Senegal ndiyo yakatanga kupinda muchikamu chechipiri ichi. kana kuti Round of 16. Morroco ndiyo yapedza yakatungamira Group F isina kudyiwa kana mutambo mumwe chete. Nyika iyi yakashura mare apo yakarova Belgium 2-0 uye kuita mangange 0-0 neCroatia. Nyika dzabudirira kuenda kuchikamu chechipiri dzave gumi nembiri arizvino uye dzinoti, Potugal, Brazil, Argentina, Poland, France, England, Australia, Senegal, Croatia, Morocco, USA, Netherlands. Panyika dzemuAfrica dzange dziri kumakwikwi aya, Tunisia ndiyo yakatanga kubuda. Ghana neCameroon dzasarwa nemutambo mumwe chete.

headline: Tinogona kutora ‘coach’ wekunze: ZIFA
text: SANGANO rinotungamirira nhabvu yemuno reZimbabwe Football Association (ZIFA) rinoti rinogona kugadza mumwezve murairidzi wechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors wekunze kana wemuno kuti agotsiva Zdrvako “Loga” Logarusic uyo akadzingwa basa kutanga kwesvondo rino.   Zvichitevera kudzinga kwavakaita Loga basa, ZIFA iri pakati pekutsvaga murairidzi wekutsiva chizvarwa chekunyika yeCroatia ichi, icho chakakwanisa kurairidza mitambo 14 chete yemaWarriors ndokuhwinha mumwe chete.   Pari zvino ZIFA ichambogadza murairidzi anongofanobata chigaro ichi kwekanguva kadiki uyo vachapa basa rekutungamira maWarriors mumitambo yemwedzi unotevera apo achange achirwirira tikiti rekuenda kuQatar World Cup. Mutungamiriri weZifa – Felton Kamambo – anoti ZIFA yatanga basa rekutsvaga murairidzi anotsiva Loga.   “Zvichitevera kupesana kwatakaita naLoga, veruzhinji vangade kuziva kuti tinogona kugadza mumwe murairidzi wemaWarriors anove chizvarwa chekunze kwenyika asi hunge kana ane magwaro akakwana uye akatifadza patinoita hurukuro naye.   “Iye zvino tave kushambadza basa iri tichitsvaga murairidzi mutsva anouya kuzotungamira chikwata chedu. “Saka basa iri tinogona kungopa chero murairidzi, angave wemuno kana wekunze anenge atifadza ane zvatiri kutsvaga ndiye achapinda panyanga,” anodaro Kamambo.   ZIFA yainge yambovimbisa kuzivisa murairidzi achafanobata chigaro ichi musi weChipiri svondo rino usati wadarika asi haina kuzoita saizvozvo.   Mumitambo 14 iyo Loga akarairidza maWarriors, akangokwanisa kuhwina mumwe chete, ndokuita mangange mishanu uye ndokukundwa misere.   Zvisinei, asiya maWarriors abudirira kuenda kumitambo yeAfrica Cup of Nations iyo ichatambwa gore rinotevera kuCameroon. Asi, asiyawo chikwata chenyika ichi chiri pasi muGroup G murwendo rwekurwira kuenda ku2022 Qatar World Cup apo chiine chibodzwa chimwe chete kubva mumitambo miviri yachatamba kusvika pari zvino.   Mwedzi unotevera, maWarriors achasangana neGhana mumitambo miviri yakatevedzena yekurwira kuenda kuQatar iyo vanofanirwa kuhwina kuti varambe vaine mukana.

headline: WC yakandivhura mhanza: Perpetual
text: KAPUTENI wechikwata chenyika chenetball chemaGems, Perpetual Siyachitema, anoti zvekutamba mutambo uyu zviri muropa uye kuenda kwavakaita kunokwikwidza kuWorld Cup yakaitirwa kuLiverpool, kuEngland nguva yadarika kwakavavhurira mikana yakasiyana.   MaGems akanyora nhorowondo kuve chikwata chekutanga kubva muZimbabwe kuenda kunokwikwidza kuWorld Cup uko chikwata ichi chakanotamba zvinodakadza.   “Hakuna zvimwe zvikwata zvevarume zvemuno zvakamboenda kuWorld Cup sesu asi ndinoti kuburikidza nekuenda kwatakaita kumakwishu aya kwakativhurira mukana uye netball yave kutsigirwa.   “Kubva ndakatanga kutambira maGems mugore ra2009, ndaingoshuvira kutambira netball kumakwishu makuru uye ndakazokwanisa kuzviita. Kumutambo uku ndaiziva kuti kwaizouya shasha kubva kuzvikwata zvakasiyana, kunyanya zvekuAustralia kuzonditarisa ndichitamba,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Siyachitema akazvarwa mugore ra1983 kuChitungwiza uko kwaakakurira.    Akadzidza kuzvikoro zvinoti Tasimukira Primary School, Seke 5 High neSeke 3 High.   Anoti achiri kuchikoro, ndipo paakatanga kutamba netball achitevera matsimba amai vake nemukoma wake avo vakambotambawo mutambo uyu.   Shasha iyi yakazvarirwa mumhuri yevatambi vemitambo yakasiyana sezvo baba vake – Fanuel Siyachitema – vaimbove mutambi wenhabvu ane mukurumbira kunyika yeZambia.    Amai vake nemukoma wake vese vaitamba netball muNetball Super League.   “Ndakazvarirwa mumhuri yevatambi vemitambo yakasiyana, baba vangu vaive mutambi wenhabvu ane mukurumbira kuZambia kozoti amai uye mukoma wangu vese vakatamba netball muSuper League.   “Vabereki vangu vaitoti ramba uchiita zvemitambo nekuti zvichazokupa pundutso uye ndiri kutozviona zvichitoitika iye zvino,” anodaro.   Anoti mwanasikana wake – Gugulethu – uyo ane makore 16 ekuberekwa, ari kutambawo netball pamwechete nebasketball.   “Mwanasikana wangu anotambawo netball nebasketball saka ndinofara chaizvo kuti tine zvatinofarira pamwechete.   “Iniwo ndichikura ndaimbotamba basketball panguva yandaitamba netball asi ndakazosiya basketball nekuti netball ine zvakawanda zvakayakanakira sezvo une mukana wekuzopinda basa.   “Tiri kumba, ndinoshanda nemwana wangu ndichimubatsira zvakasiyana zvemutambo uyu, ndinoda chaizvo kuti azosvike kure mumutambo uyu,” anodaro.   Shasha iyi yakwanisa kutambira zvikwata zvinosanganisira Matiza Queens, Honde Queens, Telecel Queens, ZRP PPU, Gathsmine, Trojan Mine Bindura, Railstars Bulawayo, ZPC Hanngwe uye parizvino ari kutambira pamwe nekurairidza Glow Petroleum Queens.   Siyachitema anoti murume wake ndiye chiremba wake uye anomutsigira zvikuru mumutambo uyu.   “Murume wangu haadi neni, ndiye chiremba wangu anombondibatsira kana ndakuvara. Anonditsigira zvikuru kunyangwe hazvo ndichipedza nguva ndefu ndisipo ndichifamba nemutambo uyu,” anodaro Siyachitema.

headline: Ndiyani Achatora Mukombe weCastle Premier Soccer League Pakati peCaps ne FC Platinum
text: Mhemberero yekutora mukombe weligi yanga yakarongwa nevatsigiri veCaps United yambomiswa kwete nekuda kwavo. Kunyange hazvo Caps United neMugovera yakarova Ngezi Platinum Stars 1-0, mhemberero yavo yakakanganiswa neFC Platinum iyo yakadambura Highlanders 3-0 ndokuramba ichikwikwidza nemaGreen Machine pamukombe weCastle Lager Premier Soccer League. MaGreen Machine aitarisira kutora mukombe nekurova Ngezi Platinum Stars, vachitarisirawo panguva imwecheteyo kuti FC Platinum yaiita mangange kana kurohwa neHighlanders, izvo zvakaramba kuitika. Kwasara mutambo mumwe chete, zvikwata zviviri izvi zvasiyana nemaponzi maviri chete, Caps United iine mapoinzi makumi matanhanhu, FC Platinum ichitevera nemaponzi makumi mashanu nemasere. Makundano aya ari kupera svondo rino apo Caps United iri kusangana neChapungu kuAscot Stadium panguva imwecheteyo Kugona Kunenge Kudada iri kutamba neTsholotsho Pirates kuLuveve. Mitambo iyi yakaoma zvikuru sezvo Chapungu neTsholotsho Pirates dziri kurwira kuramba dziri muPremier Soccer League mwaka unotevera. Murairidzi weNgezi Platinum Stars Tonderayi Ndiraya anoti makundano aya asvika pakaoma asi semaonero ake, Caps United iri pamberi zvishoma mukuenda mumitambo wekupedzisira. Mutambi weCaps United Ronald Pfumbidzai anoti mumitambo yekugumisira iyi havasi kuzotarisa kuti FC Platinum yatamba sei asi vachaona kuti vaita zvavanotarisirwa zvekurova Chapungu. Mumwe mutambi wemaKepekepe Phineas Bamusi anoti mukombe uri mumaoko avo asi vanofanira kuurwira zvakasimba. Mimwe mitambo yemuPSL yakapera seizvi….  Triangle 0 Dynamos 1 Tsholotso 1 Byo City 2 Mutare City 2 Harare City 2 Chicken Inn 1 Border Strikers 0 Hwange 0 Chapungu 0 ZPC Kariba 0 How Mine 0  Mighty Warriors Chikwata chenyika chevanhukadzi chemaMighty Warriors chakatanga makundano acho eAfrica Women’s Cup of Nations zvakanaka mushure mekuita mangange 0-0 neSouth Africa. MaMighty Warriors anofanira kukunda Egypt nemusi weChipiri kuti vasimbise mukana wavo wekusvika muma semi fainari emakundano aya. Mutambo weZimbabwe wekugumisira mugungano iri uriko musi weChishanu neCameroon. Sachigaro weCAPS Omiswa Basa Mune imwewo nyaya. VeZIFA vamisa basa sachigaro weCaps United VaLewis Uriri avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekushevedzera musangano wezvikwata zvePSL usina kutenderwa neveZifa. VaUriri vanonzi vakashevedzera musangano uyu musi wa 29 Gumiguru apo vanonzi vakafurira zvikwata zvenhabvu yepamusoro izvi kuramba chisungo cheZIFA Assembly chekuti muPSL mubude zvikwata zvina. Gwaro rakabva kuZifa rinoti kutanga nemusi weMuvhuro uno VaUriri havachatenderwi kuve nechekuitita nezvemutambo wenhabvu muZimbabwe. Studio Seven haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna VaUriri kuti vanoti chii nezvenyaya iyi. Svondo rapera, veZifa vakamisa basa sachigaro wePSL VaPeter Dube pamwe naChief Executive Officer weHighlanders VaNdumiso Gumede vachipomerwa mhosva dzakasiyana siyana. No media source currently available

headline: MaChevrons opinda muhondo
text: CHIKWATA chenyika cheCricket chemaChevrons chiri kupinda muhondo svondo rino apo chichatanga kubandana necheIreland mumitambo mishanu yeTwenty20 International Series nemitatu yeOne Day International (ODI) iyo ichange iri yeInternational Cricket Council (ICC) Men’s Cricket World Cup Super League.   Mitambo yeICC Super League ndeyekurwira tikiti rekuenda kuICC Cricket World Cup iyo ichatambirwa kunyika yeIndia mugore ra2023.   Zvikwata zvichapedza zviri pamusoro muTop 8 zvinobva zvabudirira kuenda kuWorld Cup asi zvinosara zvinenge zvave kuenda nenzira yekutamba mimwe mitambo yemaqualifiers iyo inozorongwa patsva neICC.   Saka maChevrons ari kutofanirwa kuhwina mitambo yawo yeSuper League kuti agowana tikiti rekuenda kuWorld Cup.   Muchinyorwa chakabva kuZimbabwe Cricket (ZC), mutauriri weZC Darlington Majonga anoti maChevrons achatanga kutatsurana neIreland musi weChishanu kuClontarf uye mimwe mitambo ichatambirwa kuBready kunyika iyi.   “Chikwata chedu chemaChevrons chiri kupinda muhondo necheIreland mumitambo mishanu yeT20 series nemitatu yeODI uye yeODI ichange iri yeSuper League yekurwira kuenda kuWorld Cup. “Mitambo iri kutanga Chishanu chino chatakatarisana nacho uye ichatambwa mazuva anoti 27 na29 Nyamavhuvhu kozoti mimwe ichatambwa musi wa1, 2 na4 Gunyana.   Mitambo yeODI ichazotambwa mumazuva anoti 8, 10 na13 Gunyana,” anodaro Majonga. MaChevrons paanopedza kutatsurana neIreland, anobva ananga kuEdinburg kuScotland uko zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichasangana mumitambo mitatu yeT20 ichatambwa mumazuva anoti 15, 17 na19 Gunyana.

headline: ZOC yotaura nezvemaOlympics
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Olympic Committee (ZOC) rinoti parizvino munhu mumwechete anokwikwidza mumutambo weRowing ndiye akwanisa kubudirira kunomirira nyika kumitambo ye2020 Tokyo Summer Olympics iyo ichaitirwa kuJapan munaChikumi.   Mitambo iyi yaifanirwa kuitwa gore radarika asi ndokuzomiswa nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19. Chamangwiza weZOC — Stephen Mudawarima — anoti kuderera kwevatambi vachanomirira nyika kumitambo yemaSummer Olympics yegore rino kwakanyanya uye kuri kukonzerwa nekunyuka kweCovid-19 zvichitevera kumiswa kwakamboitwa mitambo yose.   “Kutaura kuno tangove nemutambo mumwe chete weRowing wabudirira kuenda kumaOlympics achaitwa gore rino.   Sangano reZimbabwe Rowing Association ndiro richazotizivisa kuti ndiani achazoenda kunomirira nyika kuJapan achiita Rowing.   “Covid-19 ndiyo yakakanganisa zvakawanda, ndiyo yaita kuti huwandu hwevatambi vedu vachaenda kumitambo iyi yemaOlympics hunyanye kudzikira kudaro,” anodaro Mudawarima.   Mudawarima anoti pane vatambi vanomhanya mijaho yemarathon nevanotuhwina vari kuenda kunokwikwidza kumitambo yakasiyana kunze kwenyika vachirwira kuenda kumakwikwi ekuJapan aya. Shasha dzemujaho wemarathon dzichanokwikwidza kuRome, kuItaly uko kuri kuitwa mijaho yekurwira kuenda kuTokyo kozoita dzekutuhwina dziri kuSouth Africa uko dziri kuzamawo mhanza yadzo.   “Svondo rino, tiri kutumira shangwiti dzekumhanya dzemarathon kuRome, Italy uko vachanorwirawo tikiti ravo rekuenda kuJapan kozoti kuSouth Africa kutaura kuno kune vari kuzamawo vanotuhwina. “Asi chatinoziva ndechekuti gore rino tichange tine nhengo shoma chaizvo dzichanomirira nyika kumutambo uyu,” anodaro Mudawarima.   KumaOlympics akaitwa muna2016 kuBrazil, Zimbabwe yakatumira vatambi vemitambo yakawanda vanosanganisira maMighty Warriors ayo akabva anyora nhorowondo yekuve chikwata chenhabvu chekutanga kubva munyika muno kunokwikwidza kumitambo iyi.   Panguva iyi — Dr Kirsty Coventry, avo pari zvino vave gurukota revechidiki, mitambo nezvekutandara — vakakwikwidzawo kumitambo iyi ndokunyora nhorowondo yekuve shasha kubva muZimbabwe kuhwina menduru dzakawanda kumaOlympics mumutambo wekutuhwinha.

headline: Chabvondoka kuDivision One
text: ZVIKWATA zvinokwikwidza muNorthern Region Division One zvokurudzirwa kuti zvitambe nhabvu kusvika zvadambuka makumbo sezvo zvichange zviri muTop 8 munaKubvumbi ndizvo zvichanotatsurana mumutambo weAxis Super 8 Tournament.   Mwaka uno, Northern Region iri kuronga mutambo weAxis Super 8 Tournament uyo uchaona zvikwata zvisere zvichapedza zviri muTop 8 zvichizonokwikwidza mumutambo uyu, uyo uchatanga munaChivabvu.   Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weNorthern Region, Sweeney Mushonga, anoti zvikwata zvose zvinokwanisa kupinda mumutambo uyu uyo unokosha US$20 000.   Mushonga anoti zvikwata zvakawanda zvine mukana wekupinda mumutambo uyu sezvo zvose zviri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura.   “Kutanga munaChivabvu, zvikwata zvinenge zvapedza zviri muTop 8 munaKubvumbi zvichapinda mumutambo weAxis Super 8 uyo unozotanga mwedzi unotevera. Zvikwata zvose zvine mukana wekupinda mumutambo uyu saka tichaona pakupera kwaKubvumbi,” anodaro Mushonga.       Anoti pakupera kwemwaka wegore rino, shasha dzeNorthern Region ndidzo dzichapinda muPremier League kwete dzeAxis Super 8.   “Pakupinda muPremier League, shasha dzinopedza dziri pamusoro muNorthern Region ndidzo dzichazoenda kuPremier League kwete dzeAxis Super 8.   “Axis Super 8 iripo pakuti mitambo iwande, vamwe vatambi vagowana mukana wekutambawo uye mitambo igonakidza,” anodaro Mushonga.   Zvakadaro, svondo rino kuchange kusingadanwe anonzwa mumutambo weNorthern Region apo pachasangana Herentals Under-20 neSimba Stars mumutambo wezvikwata zviviri izvi izvo zviri kutungamira pari zvino.

headline: ‘Zimbabwe ine mukana wekuenda kuWC’
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa munhabvu – Carlos ‘Murehwa’ Max – anoti anoshuvira kuona maWarriors achimbotambawo kumutambo weFIFA World Cup uye hakuna chinotadzisa chikwata ichi kuenda kumakwishu aya sezvo chizere nevatambi vanotamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura kunyika dzinosanganisira dziri kuEurope.   Apo mutambo World Cup uri kuenderera mberi kuQatar, Africa iri kumirirwa nenyika shanu dzinoti Senegal, Ghana, Tunisia, Morocco neCameroon.   Murehwa, uyo akambotambira maWarriors, anoti hakuna chinotadzisa chikwata chenyika ichi kuenda kuWorld Cup asi hunge kana zvinhu zvose zvakarongeka.   “Iye zvino senyika takakomborerwa kuti tine vatambi vakawanda vari kutambira nhabvu yavo kuEurope muzvikwata zvikuru saka kana tikarongeka tinoenda kuWorld Cup.   “Chiremerera chikuru kuona nyika yedu ichitamba kuWorld Cup, todawo kuiona iriko saka zvinoda mushandirapamwe kuti zvigokwanisika kuitika.   “Asi chekutanga ndechekuti ngatirwise zvirango zvatakatemerwa neFIFA neCAF zvibviswe tibve tatotanga gadziriro dzemutambo unotevera wa2026. Gadziriro dzinotanga izvezvi,” anodaro Murehwa.   Munhoroondo yenhabvu yeZimbabwe, maWarriors haasati ambobudirira kuenda kuWorld Cup kunyangwe zvazvo akapotsa nepadiki panguva yaairairidzwa naReinhard Fabisch apo akatadziswa nemutambo mumwe chete paakazokundwa neCameroon.   Pachapera mutambo weWorld Cup kuQatar, ndipo panobva patotanga gadziriro dzemutambo we2026 FIFA World Cup iyo icharongwa nenyika nhatu dzinoti United States of America, Mexico neCanada.    Carlos Max apo aitambira chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors   Zvakadaro, Murehwa – uyo akambotambira zvikwata zvenhabvu zvinosanganisira CAPS United, Dynamos neArcadia United – vazhinji havazive kuti zita rake remadunhurirwa iri rakatangira kupi.   Anoti zita iri akaripihwa nevatsigiri vechikwata cheCAPS United panguva iyo aitambira Green Machine.   Anoti iye nevamwe vemuchikwata chake vaitamba nhabvu zvainwisa mvura zvakaona vachipihwa mazita emadunhurirwa nevatsigiri senzira yekuvarumbidza.   “Ndichiri kuCAPS United, kana waitamba nhabvu zvinonwisa mvura, vatsigiri vaikupa zita remadunhurirwa.
