Ini ndakazoona ndakushevedzwa kunzi Murehwa, ndikangozvigamuchira.   “Taive nevamwe vatambi vakaita saJoel Shacky Tauro akasvika pakushevedzwa kunzi Mr Goals nekuti ainwisa zvaidakadza, vamwe vakaita saNever Chiku ainzi Maswera sei kuchiti Joel Shambo ainzi Headmaster,” anodaro Murehwa.

headline: ‘Ndamirira Ambunda’
text: SHASHA yetsiva Tinashe “Chairman” Mwadziwana anoti zvishuvo zvemwoyo zvake zvave kuzadzikiswa apo achasangana nemutambi wekuNamibia, Paulus “The Rock” Ambunda, pazuva rekupemberera Zimbabwe kuwana kuzvitonga kuzere.   Mwedzi yadarika, Kwayedza yakaita hurukuro naMwadziwana achiti anoshuvira kumbosangana naAmbunda uyo waanoti anotamba tsiva yepamusoro yaanoyemura zvikuru.   Mwadziwana anoti izvi ndizvo zvakazotuma mamwe mapuromota kuti abatane aronge mutambo uyu uchamuona achisangana naAmbunda musi wa18 Kubvumbi kuMbare Netball Complex vachirwira bhande reWorld Africa Boxing Association Super Bantamweight World Title.   “Ndiri kunzwa manyuku-nyuku zvikuru nekuti mutambo wandainge ndakamirira hupenyu hwangu wazouya manje. Paulus Ambunda mutambi mukuru wetsiva muAfrica muno.   “Uyu mutambo wandaigara ndichingoshuvira uye ndinotarisira kuti ndikauhwina uchandisvitsa pane rimwe danho hombe chairo,” anodaro Mwadziwana.   Maneja wake, Clyde Musonda anoti gadziriro dzemutambo uyu dzave padanho repamusoro.   “Chairman makore adarika ndiye mumwe wevatambi vetsiva vemuno vange vachidadisa uye tinofara nekusimukira kwaari kuita.  Musi wa18 Kubvumbi, achasangana naAmbunda kuMbare Netball Complex uko kunobva Chairman saka tinoziva kuti chaunga chichauya kuzopemberera mwana wacho wemuMbare,” anodaro Musonda.   Mwadziwana kusvika parizvino arwa mitambo 30 ndokuhwina 18, akakundwa mimwe 12 yacho.   Ambunda arwawo mitambo 30 ndokuhwina 27, ndokukundwa mitatu chete.

headline: Hatizivi pachadzoka nhabvu: PSL
text: SANGANO rePremier Soccer League (PSL) rinoti harizive kuti nhabvu yemuno ichatanga kutambwa rinhi sezvo pari zvino vari kumbotevedzera mitemo yakatarwa neHurumende yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Kubva pakambomiswa mitambo yose munyika muno muna Kurume gore radarika apo pakatanga kunyuka denda reCovid-19, hakuna kuzombobvira kwatambwa mitambo yePSL.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, chamangwiza wePSL – Kennedy ‘Kenny’ Ndebele – anoti pari zvino havasi kumbofunga pamusoro pekuti nhabvu ichadzoka rinhi sezvo nyika iri mushishi yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi.   “Tiri kutevedzera mitemo yeHurumende iri kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vagare kudzimba,  takanzi tishandire kumba saka iye zvino takagara kumba uye tiri kushandira kudzimba dzedu.   “Nyika iye zvino iri palockdown, danho iro rakatorwa neHurumende kuti denda reCovid-19 risarambe richipararira. Saka isu tiri kutevedzera mutemo weHurumende.    Nguva ino, nyaya yekuchengetedza hupenyu hwevanhu yakakosha zvikuru,” anodaro Ndebele.   Kubva pakanyuka chirwere cheCovid-19 gore rapera, kune dzimwe nyika dzakadai seSouth Africa, Zambia neTanzania nhabvu yakadzoka ikatanga kutambwa munhandare dzisina vatsigiri nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri.   KuTanzania nhabvu ichiri kutambwa pamberi pevatsigiri uye nguva pfupi yadarika chikwata cheFC Platinum chakasangana necheSimba Sports Club kunyika iyi mumutambo weCAF Champions League qualifiers.   Gore radarika, zvikwata zvinokwikwidza muPSL zvakange zvambopihwa mvumo yekutanga kuita gadziriro dzazvo.   Izvi zvakaona chikwata chemaWarriors – icho pari zvino chiri kuCameroon uko chiri kukwikwidza mumutambo eCHAN – chiita gadziriro kuburikidza nekutamba mitambo yehushamwari nezvikwata zvemuno.   Mitambo iyi ndiyo yakashandiswa nemurairidzi wemaWarriors, Zdravko ‘Loga’ Logarusic, kusarudza vatambi vekuti vazopinda muchikwata chekuenda nacho kuCHAN.

headline: Haye osendeka tsiva
text: (37) ari kutarisirwa kusendeka magirovhosi ake etsiva izvo zvichamuona achizorora kubva mumutambo uyo waatamba kwemakore anodarika 16. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko ange achibva kuruzhinji ekuti shasha iyi ngaichisiya tsiva.Haye akataura padandemutande reTwitter svondo rino kuti ramagwana rake acharizivisa nekuchimbidza uye SportsMail iri kuziva kuti akaronga kuti achisiya mutambo uyu zvichitevera kukundwa kwaakaitwa kaviri kakatevedzana naTony Bellew.   Vazhinji vanoti shasha iyi yaifanirwa kuve yakasiya tsiva paakakundwa naBellew pekutanga gore radarika, apo paakakuvara gumbo rake, uye kuzorikitwa kwaakaitwa zvakare mwedzi uno ndiko kwave kumutuma kuti achisiya mutambo uyu izvo zvakarakidza kuti haasisiriye mutambi waaive kare apo akahwina bhande reWBA heavyweight mugore ra2009.   Mabhande aakahwina mumakore masere ekutanga mumutambo uyu acharangarirwa zvikuru mumakore anotevera sezvo Haye akave mumwe wevatambi vetsiva vepamusoro kwemakore akawanda. Asi anoteverwa nenyaya dzakawanda dzinosvibisa zita rake kubva pakunyepera kutyoka chigumwe zvichitevera kukundwa kwaakaitwa naWladimir Klitschko uye kurwa naDereck Chisora pamberi pevatori venhau (press conference) zvichitevera kukundwa kwakaitwa Chisora naVitali Klitschko mugore ra2019. – SportsMail boxing

headline: ‘Fifa yativhiringa’
text: MUBATI wepagedhi wemaWarriors neMichigan Stars yekuUnited States of America – Tatenda ‘Marshall’ Mkuruva – ari kutsutsumwa kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe neFifa zvadzosera kumashure zvakanyanya kusimukira kwevatambi vechidiki.   Achinyora papeji rake reFacebook, Mkuruva anoti vatambi venhabvu vechidiki vakawanda vane chido chekusimudzira matarenda avo kuburikidza nekuwaniswa mikana yekunotambira kunze kwenyika kumaligi akaita sekuEurope nekuAmerica asi izvi hazvisi kukwanisika pari zvino nekuda kwezvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe neFifa.   Mkuruva anoti yave nguva yekuti hutungamiri hwenhabvu nevese vane chekuita nenyaya iyi vagare pasi vataurirane kuti mamiriro ezvinhu aya agadziriswe.   “Vatambi venhabvu vari kurasikirwa nenguva nemikana yekuti vaonekwe pasi rese kuti vafambire mberi mumutambo uyu.   “Senyika, tinosvika kure sei munyaya dzenhabvu kana remangwana revechidiki riri kukanganisika nezvinhu zvinogona kugadzirisika nyore?” anodaro Mkuruva.   Zimbabwe pari zvino haisi kukwanisa kukwikwidza mumitambo yenhabvu nedzimwe nyika nekuda kwezvirango zvayakatemerwa neFifa pamwe neCAF.   Izvi zvinotevera kudzingwa basa kwakaitwa mutungamiriri weZifa, Felton Kamambo, pamwe chete nebhodhi raaitungamira neSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) vachipomerwa mhosva yekusaita basa ravo nemazvo.   Kamambo akabva atsiviwa naGift Banda uyo aive mutevedzeri wake asi ainge ambomiswa basa zvakare naKamambo.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza nguva pfupi yadarika, Banda anoti bhodhi ravo rine chivimbo chikuru chekuti zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe neFifa pamwe chete neCAF zvichabviswa.   Anoti pari zvino vari pakati pekuita hurukuro nemasangano maviri aya vachionesana gwara rekufamba naro.   Banda anotiwo zvirango izvi zviri kuvapa mukana wekugadzirisa zvinhu zvakawanda zvainge zvakakanganisika munhabvu yemuno, kusanganisira nhandare idzo dzinofanirwa kuvandudzwa kuti dzisvike padanho rinotenderwa kuti dzigotambirwa mitambo mikuru.   “Hakuna nyika inopihwa zvirango zvoramba zviripo, zvinotobva chete.   Saka isu neFifa neCAF tiri kuita hurukuro uye ticharamba tichiita hurukuro tichionesana navo patinenge tasvika panyaya iri kunetsa munhabvu yedu yemuno.   “Zvirango izvi zvatipawo mukana wekuti tigadzirise zvange zvakakanganisika zvakawanda munhabvu yedu,” anodaro Banda.

headline: Vatsigiri vemaWarriors Vofara neGadziriro yeMakwikwi eAfrica Nations Cup
text: Chikwata chemaWarriors chiri kuratiza kuti chiri munzira yakajeka apo chakananga kumakwikwi e2017 Africa Cup of Nations. Chikwata ichi nezuro chakadambura maTaifa Stars ekuTanzania 3-0 mumutambo wekuenzana masimba, izvo zvirikugutsa veruzhinji kuti maWarriors achanokwikwidza zvine mutsindo kuAFCON. Vanhu havana kuuya kunhandare sezvaitarisirwa asi vashoma vacho vaivemo vakanakidzwa nematambiro echikwata chavo icho chakawana zvibodzwa kubva kuna Knowledge Musona, Nyasha Mushekwi pamwe naMathew Rusike. Zvakabuda pamutabo uyu zvakakosha kumaWarriors kwete mugadziriro yavo yeNations Cup chete asi muma Fifa World rankings zvekare sezvo veFifa vanoshandisa mitambo yakadai kugadzira mamiriro ezvikwata muhurongwa hwepasi rese. Mutsigiri weDynamos VaObert Masvotore vanoti zvakaitika neTanzania zvinobatsira kutyisidzira zvikwata zvanga zvichitarisira Zimbabwe pasi kuma Africa Cup of Nations vachiwedzera ivo kuti ikozvino Zimbabwe iri kuenda kuGabon iinechiremera. Aimbotambira maWarriors neCaps United Alois Bunjira anoti kukunda kwemaWarriors zvinhu zvinofadza zvikuru achiti ivo semaonero ake tarenda rakazara muchikwata chenyika ichi. Mutsigiri weCaps United VaShingirai Mthombeni varikudada nemaitiro emaWarriors vachiti ivo dai varamba vakadai kusvikira pachapera maAfrica Cup of Nations finals. Mutambo weTanzania wauya svondo rimwechete maWarriors achangobva kukunda Zambia 1-0. Asi Bunjira anoti pachine zviviri kana zvitatu zvinoda kugadziriswa maWarriors asati ave kurota zvekutora mukombe wemuAfrica. Pamusoro pevatambi vakabva kunze kwenyika, murairidzi wemaWarriors Kalisto Pasuwa akashandisawo vatambi vanotambira zvikwata zvemuno vakaita saHardlife Zvirekwi weCaps United, Teenage Hadebe weChicken Inn pamwe na Tatenda Mukuruva weDynamos, avo arikuongorora kuti angaende navo here kuma fainari. Pasuwa anoti ari kuda mimwe mitambo miviri kana mitatu yekuedzana masimba kuti akwanise kugadzira chikwata chakasimba icho achaenda nacho kuGabon. Mutungamiri weZifa VaPhillip Chiyangwa vakavimbisa mitambo nezvikwata zvine mukurumbira muAfrica zvakaita seEgypt neIvory Coast maWarriors asati asimuka kuenda kumaAfrica Cup of Nations. Asi vatsigiri venhabvu vanoti zveZIFA kutenda maruva wadya chakata.

headline: Makuwerere muPremier Soccer League Apo Mitambo Yosvika kwaMvura Yacheka Makumbo
text: Zvikwata zviri pamusoro pegungano reCastle Lager Premier Soccer League zvatarisana nemitambo yakaoma mukupera kwesvondo. Zvikwata zvitatu zviri kurwira mukombe weCastle Lager Premier Soccer League, FC Platinum, Caps United ne Highlanders zviri panguva yakaoma apo zviri kusangana kunze kwemusha nezvikwata zvakaomerwa mumakundano aya. FC Platinum iyo iri kutungamira makundano ezvikwata gumi nezvitanhatu aya, yakananga kuRufaro Stadium uko irikusangana nechikwata chaMoses Chunga icho chine chinangwa chekupedza chiri pazvikwata zvisere zvinenge zviri pamusoro mukupera kwemwaka. Chunga naNorman Mapeza uyo anorairidza Kugona Kunenge Kudada vakatamba vese muchikwata chemaWarriors asi vanga vasati vawana mukana wekuratidzana masimba avo muhurairidzi. Aimbotambira chikwata cheCaps United Charles Manjera anoti mutambo uyu wakabaka moto zvekuti wakaoma kudoma chikwata chinokunda. Manjera anoti semaonero ake mutambo uyu unoita mangange. Asi chikwata chakanyanyoomerwa nemutambo iCaps United. Makepekepe, iyo yakasiiwa nepoindi imwechete neFC Platinum yakananga kuBeitbridge uko irikusangana neBorder Strikers. Border Strikers ndiyo iri pasi pasi mumakundano aya asi zvikwata zviri kurwira hupenyu hwazvo zvinonetsa kukunda. Border Strikers ine murairidzi mutsva Luke Masomere uyo asati akunda mumitambo miviri iyo atamba zvekuti arikutarisira kukunda mumutambo wake wekutanga pamusha muDubulavadzimu Stadium. Muongorori wezvemutambo wenhabvu VaSilas Mukonoweshuro vanoti Caps United innge yaita raki ikakwanisa kudzoka nepoindi kuBorder. Highlanders irikubudawo muBulawayo asi yakananga padyo nepamba muGweru umo iri kutamba neChapungu muAscot Stadium. Panowanzotamba zvikwata izvi zvinowanzoita mangange asi kwete ikozvino apo Highlanders yakatarisana nemukombe, Chapungu yacho ichirwira kuramba iri muPremier League. Mimwe mitambo iriko yakamira seizvi  Mugovera Ngezi v Tsholotsho - Baobab ZPC Kariba v Triangle - Nyamhunga How Mine v Mutare City- Luveve  Svondo  Bulawayo City v Chicken inn- Barbourfields Mabhiza Mujaho mukuru wekutanga kwemwaka 2016/2017 weZimbabwe National Army Charity Shield uriko neMugovera muBorrowdale Race Course uiine mabhiza masere. Bhiza rirkutarisirwa kutora mukombe uyu ndeiro rinobva kuSouth Africa Eurakilon asi richiraridzwa nemurairidzi wemuno Gokhan Terzi. Mutasvi wemabhiza VaTapuwa Manxusa vanoti Eurakilon rinotora mukombe. Mamwe mabhiza angangorwisa zvine mutsindo anosanganisa Approval Rating, Newton Power na The Mutineer. Asi zvasaririra kune avo vanobheja kuti vaone kuti vanokanda mari yavo pabhiza ripi. Cricket Zvichakadaro, aimbove kaputeni wechikwata chenyika cheZimbabwe Heath Streak ndiye adomwa kuita murairidzi mutsva wechikwata chenyika checricket chemaChevrons. Mashoko ari kufamba asina kutsinhirwa ari kuti Streak akapihwa basa iri neChishanu mushure mekutambura kwechikwata chenyika kwenguva yakareba. Streak uyo aimbove mutungamiri wevatambi anoziva vatambi vemuno uyezve nematambiro avo zvekuti anokwanisa kusimudzira matambiro echikwata ichi. Streak anobva abatana naTatenda Taibu uyo akambotamba naye muhurongwa hwevarairidzi muchikwata ichi. Taibu achangopihwa basa rehumaneja. Streak ndiye anofungidzirwa kuti akakunda vamwe vaidawp basa iri vanoti Andy Blignaut, Peter Kirsten uye Justine Summons. Izvi zvinotevera kudzingwa basa kwaDav Whatmore muna Chikumi.

headline: Ndichiri kuzvinzwa: Duduza ‘. . . makore handiwo anotamba nhabvu’
text: KAPUTENI weDynamos FC – Edward “Duduza” Sadomba – anoti makore handiwo anotamba nhabvu uye mwaka uno anoda kurakidza nyika yose kuti tarenda richirimo maari.   Duduza – uyo ane makore 35 okuberekwa – akakatyamadza vatsigiri venhabvu apo akazivisa kuti ave kudzoka kuzotambira DeMbare mushure mekunge apedza makore anodarika 10 achitamba bhora kunyika dzakasiyana dzinosanganisira Mozambique, Sudan, United Arab Emirates neLibya uko akakwanisa kuwana ruzivo rwakadzama rwemutambo uyu.   Achitaura neKwayedza pamusoro pekudzoka kwake kuDeMbare svondo rino, Duduza anoti makore handiwo  anotamba nhabvu.   Anoti mukana waakapihwa kuDynamos achaushandisa kurakidza vatsigiri venhabvu zvaaiita makore ese achitambira kunze kwenyika.   “Nhabvu haitambwe nemakore, tarisai vatambi vakaita saGianluigi Buffon weItaly ane makore 41 ekuberekwa asi nanhasi achiri kudhonza chete. Ini ndichiri kunzwa sekamwana kadiki uye ndiri kunzwa kuti zvichirimo.   “Zvinongodiwa kugona kuzvibata zvakanaka chete,” anodaro.   Chero zvazvo vatambi venhabvu makore ano kana vave nemakore 35 ekuberekwa vanenge vave kutarisirwa kunzi ndiyo nguva yavanosendeka shangu dzangu dzavo, Duduza anoti makumbo ake haasati aneta uye haazive kuti achazorega rinhi kutamba mutambo uyu.   “Chokwadi ndechekuti muviri wangu hausati waneta uye ndikatamba zvakanaka mwaka uno ndinofunga kuti ndinogona kuramba ndichidhonza kwemakore akawanda.   “Chikuru ndechekuti ndigadzirire zvakasimba kuti varairidzi vangu vandipe mukana wekuramba ndichitamba masvondo ese,” anodaro.   Svondo radarika, Duduza akarakidza kuti zvekutamba nhabvu hazvisati zvapera apo akanwisa mumutambo weCharity Challenge Cup pakati peDynamos neCAPS UNITED wakatambirwa kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium. Mumutambo uyu, DeMbare yakahwinha 2-0.   Akapedza mutambo wose achitemesa musoro vatambi veKepekepe izvo zvakarumbidzwa nevatsigiri vazhinji venhabvu vaimuona kekutanga achitambira DeMbare zvichitevera kudzoka kwaaita.   Duduza – uyo aive kuNorth Africa uko aitambira nhabvu kuzvikwata zvinosanganisira Al Hilal, Al Ahly nezvimwe –  anoti anoda kusimudzira vechidiki kuti vagosvika padanho raakasvika uye vagorarama hupenyu hwaari kurarama kuburikidza nenhabvu.   “Chandakaona mukufamba kwangu kwese kwandakaita nenhabvu ndechekuti kunze uko vanokoshesa mutambo uyu uye vanokoshesa basa ravo. Kana nguva yenhabvu yasvika vanoita zvenhabvu zvavanenge vachibhadharirwa kunzi vaite, havaite zvekutamba vanoita basa nemazvo.   “Ndinoda kupa ruzivo urwu kuvanin’ina vangu kuDynamos kuti vazive kuti kana vachida kusvika padanho randasvika vanotofanirwa kuzvishandira uye vashande nesimba,” anodaro.   Panguva yaaive kunze kwenyika, Duduza akambowana mukana wekutambira chikwata chemaWarriors asi haana kuzokwanisa kuenda kumitambo mikuru yakaita seAfrica Cup of Nations.   Anoti kudzoka kwake kuDynamos achashanda nesimba uye orakidza murairidzi wemaWarriors – Sunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzambwa – kuti chipo chichiripo kuti agoshevedzwa muchikwata chichaenda kunokwikwidza kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations kuEgypt.   Duduza ari kuedza kutevera matsimba evatambi vakaita saRoger Milla wekuCameroon uyo akanomirira nyika yake kumutambo weFIFA World Cup 1994 ave nemakore 42 ekuberekwa uye naEl Hadary wekuEgypt akakwanisawo kutambira nyika yake kumutambo we2018 World Cup kuRussia ane makore 45 ekuberekwa.   “Hapana mutambi wenhabvu asingade kumirira nyika yake, ini mukana uyu ukauya ndigafare chaizvo.   “Kana tikabudirira kuenda kumutambo weAfcon, ndingafare chaizvo kana ndikapihwa mukana naMhofu wekumirira nyika yangu,” anodaro Duduza.

headline: Muchatiguta muPSL: Balakasi
text: MUTAMBI weSimba Bhora – Tinashe Balakasi – oyambira zvikwata zvemuPremier Soccer League kuti zvichavaguta mwaka unotevera zvichitevera kupinda kwavakaita muPSL.   Balakasi, mwaka uchangopera weRuyamuro Northern Region Division One, akanwisa ka29 ndokunyora nhoroondo yekunwisa kanodarika ka20 mumwaka mumwe chete.   MuCastle Premiership, pave nemwaka yakawanda pachishaya mutambi anokwanisa kunwisa kanodarika ka20 mwaka mumwe chete izvo zvakapedzisira kuitwa naNorman Maroto mugore ra2010 apo aitambira Gunners FC.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Balakasi anotsidza kuti mwaka wa2023, uyo uchange uri wekutanga weSimba Bhora muPSL, zvikwata zvizhinji zvichamuguta sezvo achange achipisa sezvaaiita muNorthern Region.   “Gore rinotevera, ndichange ndichitokwikwidza nevamwe vatambi ndichivarakidza kuti ndinotonwisa sezvavanotoita uye ndinogona kutovadarika.   “Ndinoda kuvarakidza kuti ndiri mutambi wepamusoro saivo,” anodaro.   Mutambi uyu asati aenda kuSimba Bhora, akambotambira muPSL kuzvikwata zvinoti Harare City neCAPS United.   Panguva iyi, akangokwanisa kunwisa kana chete paaitambira zvikwata izvi.   Anoti haana kutamba zvinonwisa mvura apo akambotambira muPSL nekuti aisanyatsowana mikana yekutamba kuzvikwata izvi.   “Pandakambotambira muPSL ndaisanyatsowana mikana yakakwana saka handina kunyatsotamba zvinonwisa mvura. Asi, iye zvino ndadzoka nechikwata chinovimba neni nekudaro ndicharakidza zvikwata zvese chipo changu uye ndinoda kunyora imwe nhoroondo,” anodaro.   Balakasi anoti mumakore maviri anotevera, anoshuvira kunge ave kutambira nhabvu yake kunze kwenyika. Anoti mwaka unotevera achashanda nesimba kuitira kuti azoshevedzwa kuzotambira chikwata chenyika asi hunge kana zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe neFIFA zvabviswa.   “Mutambi wese wenhabvu shuviro yake kutambira kunze kwenyika uye kutambira nyika yake. Saka iniwo ndinotarisira kuti mumakore maviri anotevera, ndinge ndave kutambirawo kunze kwenyika. Ndinoda kutanga kutambira kuSouth Africa uye ndinovimba ndikashanda nesimba zvinoitawo kuti ndigoshevedzwa kuzotambira nyika yangu.   “Izvezvi nekuda kwezvirango zviripo ndinoziva kuti nyika yedu haisi kutamba nhabvu nezvikwata zvekunze. Asi kushanda nesimba kwakanaka nekuti kunoita kuti ndigare ndichitariswa nevarairidzi venyika kuitira panozobviswa zvirango ndinogona kuwanawo mukana,” anodaro Balakasi.   Zvakadaro, Simba Bhora iri mushishi kuita gadziriro yekusangana neGolden Eagles mufainari yeAxis Solutions Super 8 Tournament ichatambwa musi wa22 Gumiguru kuRufaro Stadium.   Vaimbi vanoti Sulumani Chimbetu naBaba Harare vanotarisirwa kuzoridza pamutambo uyu vachivaraidza vatsigiri venhabvu.

headline: Chess yotambwa padandemudande
text: VATAMBI vechess vemuno vakaremara mitezo vachakwikwidza mumutambo wavo wekutanga weInternational Chess Federation Online Olympiad vachitamba kuburikidza nedandemudande (online).   Mitambo yechess haina kumbobvira yakanganiswa nekumiswa kwakamboitwa mimwe mitambo pasi rose senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19.   Sangano reWorld Chess Federation rakatanga kufambidzana nenguva kare izvo zvakaona mitambo ichitambwa kuburikidza nedandemutande.   Mutambo uyu uchatanga musi wa27 Mbudzi uye uchatambwa kwemasvondo matatu.   Zvikwata zvichakwikwidza mumutambo uyu zvichabva muAfrica, Europe, Asia nekuAmerica.   Zimbabwe ichange ichimirirwa nevatambi vana vanoti Tapiwa Gora, Chikafu Onai, Natasha Shonhiwa naTafadzwa Mashonganyika.   Mutauriri weZimbabwe Chess Federation, Thabo Elisha anoti mutambo uyu wakakosha zvikuru kune vatambi vemuno sezvo uchavabatsira nekuvawanisa mikana yakasiyana.   MuAfrica, Zimbabwe iri muboka rinonzi Zone 4.5 umo mune zvikwata zvakawanda asi kubva muboka iri nyika ino neZambia chete ndizvo zvakakwanisa kubudirira kuti zvigokwikwidza mumitambo iyi.   “Tiri kutarisira zvikuru kuti vatambi vedu vagokwikwidza mumitambo iyi uye tinoda chaizvo kuti vagohwina.   “Chess yange ichingotambwa zvayo, haina kunyanyokanganiswa nekuda kwelockdown sezvo taikwidza padandemutande nekudaro mutambo uyu uchatotambirwa padandemutande. Ndizvo zvakanakira chess nekuti mumwe anotambira ari kunyika yake mumwe ari kwaari, hapana chikonzero chekuti musangane sezvinoitwa mune mimwe mitambo,” anodaro Elisha.   Vatambi vemuno vachange vachitambira vari pamahofisi eZimbabwe Chess Federation ayo ari paJoina City muguta reHarare.   Shasha dzichahwina pamutambo uyu dzichawana  menduru nemimwe mibairo yakasiyana.

headline: Covid-19 yanyuka muzvikwata zvePSL
text: PREMIER Soccer League yazivisa kuti Covid-19 yanyuka muzvimwe zvikwata zvayo.   Muchinyorwa chabva kumutauriri wePSL, Kudzai Bare, anoti vagashira mashoko anoti chirwere ichi chanyuka muzvikwata zvakasiyana naizvozvo vari kushanda nemachiremba kuti vagodzivirira kupararira kwacho.   “Tagashira mashoko anoti denda reCovid-19 ranyuka muzvikwata zvedu.   “Kutaura kuno tiri kushanda nenyanzvi dzezveutano nekomiti PSL Sport Medicine nemamwe mapoka kuedza kuona kuti tadzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri.   “Tinokurudzira zvikwata zvose kuti zvitevedzere matanho ose ane chekuita nekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri,” anodaro Bare.   Zvakawanda zviri kutevera.

headline: MaChevrons hutu kuAustralia
text: CHIKWATA chenyika checricket chemaChevrons chakaenda kuAustralia uko chichabandana nemaAussies mumitambo mitatu yeOne Day International yeSuper League yekurwira kuenda kuInternational Cricket Council (ICC) World Cup India 2023.   Zvichitevera kupera kwakaita mutambo wemaChevrons neIndia weODI uyo chikwata chemuno chakakundwa “whitewash”, akabva atonanga kuAustralia kunorwira zvibodzwa zvekuenda kuWorld Cup.   MaChevrons neAustralia achatamba mitambo mitatu kutanga nemusi weSvondo apo wechipiri uchizotambwa svondo rinotevera musi weChitatu uye wekupedzisira uchatambwa musi wa3 Gunyana.   Muchinyorwa chakabva kuZimbabwe Cricket (ZC), mukushi wemashoko weZC, Darlington Majonga anoti mutambo uyu wakakosha zvikuru kumaChevrons.   Anoti kana chikwata chenyika chakahwinha mutambo uyu zvibodzwa zvavo zvinoramba zvichiwedzera izvo zvinozovabatsira kubudirira murwendo rwekuenda kuWorld Cup vasingazotambiswe mimwe mitambo.   “Mutambo uyu ndewezvikwata 13 wekurwira kuenda kuICC Men’s Cricket World Cup 2023 iyo ichatambirwa kuIndia,” anodaro.   Chikwata chenyika ichi chakaenda nemutambi wacho Blessing Muzarabani uyo akakundikana kutamba neIndia sezvo ainge akakuvara.   Zvisinei, maChevrons achange asina vamwe vatambi vakakosha vanosanganisira Craig Ervine, Tendai Chatara, Wellington Masakadza naMilton Shumba.    Lady Chevrons   Kuchitiwo nerimwe divi, chikwata chemaLady Chevrons chiri kusangana necheSouth Africa cheEmerging Women Team apo chiri kuita gadziriro dzekuenda kuUnited Arab Emirates kumitambo yekurwira kuenda kuICC Women’s T20 World Cup.   ZC yakaumba chikwata chevatambi 15 avo yakatakura kuenda navo kuSouth Africa.   MaLady Chevrons neSouth Africa vachasangana muzuva anoti 28, 29, 31 Nyamavhuvhu uye 2 na3 Gunyana.

headline: MaChevrons osangana neIreland
text: CHIKWATA chenyika checricket chemaChevrons chichatanga goredzva ra2023 nekusangana neIreland mumitambo mitanhatu inoti mitatu yeOne Day International (ODI) nemimwe mitatu zvakare yeTwenty20 International Games (T20).   Zvichitevera kudzoka kwakaita maChevrons kubva kuAustralia nguva yadarika kuWorld Cup uko akadadisa nekusvika kuSuper 12, uyu ndiwo uchaita mutambo wavo wekutanga gore rinotevera.   Zimbabwe Cricket yakazivisa kuti mitambo yemaChevrons neIreland yese yeODI neT20 ichatambirwa kunhandare yeHarare Sports Club.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichitanga kubandana mumitambo yeT20 mazuva anoti 12, 14 na15 Ndira. Mitambo yeT20 painongopera, yeODI inobva yatanga uye ichatambwa nemusi wa18, 20 na23 Ndira.   Chikwata chaDave Houghton ichi chiri kutarisira kutanga goredzva nekuhwina mutambo uyu sezvo kubva pakadzoka murairidzi uyu, chakatanga kutamba cricket inonwisa mvura.

headline: Zemura akatamba, Bournemouth ikahwinha
text: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors, Jordan Zemura, akatambira chikwata chake cheAFC Bournemouth svondo richangodarika apo chakabva kumashure ndokukunda cheNottingham Forest 3-2.   Zemura akatanga arimo mumutambo uyu asi akazoburitswa pakapera chikamu chekutanga chemutambo uyu, apo vainge vakakundwa 2-0. Muchikamu chechipiri (second half), Bournemouth yakaburitsa Zemura ndokupinza Ryan Fredericks ndokurwa kusvika vahwina 3-2.   Uyu wange uri mutambo wechipiri watambwa neBournemouth zvichitevera kudzingwa basa kwakaitwa Scott Parker svondo radarika mushure mekunge chadashurwa 9-0 neLiverpool.   Mumutambo wekutanga wakatambwa neBournemouth Parker adzingwa, yakaita mangange 0-0 neWolverhampton Wanderers uye mutambo uyu, Zemura akatamba maminitsi 69 akazotsiviwa zvekare naFredericks.   Tichitarisa vamwe vatambi vemaWarriors vakatamba svondo radarika kuzvikwata zvavo kuEurope, muEngland Division One Brendan Galloway akatambira chikwata chake chePlymouth Argyle apo chakakunda cheDerby County 3-2.   Kuchitiwo muchinda Marshall Munetsi akatamba mutambo wose apo chikwata chake cheStade deReims chakaita mangange 1-1 necheLens mumutambo weLigue 1 kuFrance.

headline: Zimbabwe Yodzoka kuMaOlympics Ari Maoko Chete
text: Team Zimbabwe irikudzoka kumba isina chayakabata kubva kuma 2016 Olympic Games. Vamhanyi vatatu vanga vasara vakaremerwa nerwendo mushure mekutadza kupinda kana pavamhanyi gumi vekutanga mumwe wavo akatadza kupedza nzendo yemarathon. Partson Ndlovu akapedza ari pachinhanho chemakumi mana nemumwe, achiteverwa naCuthbert Nyasango uyo aive pachinzvimbo chemakumi mashanu nemasere. Wirimai Juwao akatadza kupedza mujawo uhu. Apo Ndlovu ari kudzokera kuAmerica uko anogara, Nyasango naJuwao vakananga kumba kuzosangana nevamwe vatambi gumi vaive kuma Olympics pamwe nemaMighty Warriors avo vakakundikanawo kuwana menduru zvikuru pamwedzi uyo kwaive nemakundano aya. Kunyange hazvo Kirsty Coventry akasvika mufainari yemakwikwi ake, vamwe vese vakarohwa munharaunda yekutanga zvinoratidza kuti ramangwana remitambo reZimbabwe rine rima. Zvakamira zvakadai. Shasha yakabuda zvine mutsinde pama Olympic Games ndi Usain Bolt wekuJamaiaca uyo akatora menduru nhatu dzegoridhe mu100 metres, 200 metres pamwe ne 4 x 100 metres. Aya ave maOlympics matatu akateverana Bolt achitora menduru nhatu pamakundano ega ega. Asi mutinhwini wekuAmerica, Michael Phelps akapinda munhoroondo semutambi akatora menduru dzakawanda mumakwikwi emaOlympics. Totarisa nyaya dzenhabvu. Vatsigiri veDynamos vakave nemufaro neSvondo apo chikwata chavo chakatamba zvinodaadza ndokurova Harare City 2-1. Dembare yaifanira kuve yakabuda nezvibodzwa zvakawandisa dai yakashandisa mikana yavakawana. Pakapera nhabvu, nyaya dzaitaurwa ndedzematambiro aive aita chikwata kwete kuti murairidzi ngaeende serwange rwave rwiyo mazuva apera. Murairidzi weDynamos Lloyd Mutasa anoti ari kufara zvikuru nekukunda kwavakaita asi achiwedzera kuti vane mutoro wakaoma kumberi. Anoti vakomana vake vese vanga vaine shungu dzekuda kukunda ndosaka izvi zvaitika. Harare City iri kuti svondo rino ikakunda, svondo rinouya yokundwa, izvo zvisikufadza vatsigiri vavo. Asi caputeni wevatambi Arnold Chivheya anoti zvinowanikwa munhabvu achiti iye varikuyedza kuzvigadzirisa. Kukunda kwakaita Dynamos kwaauya panguva inofadza zviuru apo vavakidzani vavo veCaps United vakarohwa 3-1 neBulawayo City. Hapana aitarisira kuti izvi zvichaitika asi zvasiya maGreen Machine ave nemapoinzi mashanu pasi peFC Platinum iyo yakafamba zvakanaka kuTriangle uko vakanokunda 2-1. Highlanders irikuramba ichirohwa asi ikozvino yakadamburwa 1-0 neZPC Kariba kuNyanhunga. Asi Bosso iri kuramba iri pachinhanho chechitatu, poindi imwe chete pamusoro peDynamos. Mimwe mitambo yakapera seizvi.. Chicken Inn 1 Tsholotsho 0 Mutare City 2 Hwange 1 How Mine 1 Chapungu 1 Borders Striker 2 Ngezi Platinum 0  Kwapera mitambo makumi maviri, zvikwata zvina zviri pamusoro soro ndeizvi.. FC Platinum 42 points Caps United 37 points Highlanders 32 points. Dynamos 31 points.  Zvina zviri pasi pasi ndeizvi….  Hwange 24 points Mutare City 18 points Tsholotsho 13 points Border Strikers 13 points. No media source currently available
